[\[1a\]]
[\[1a.1\]]@#/_/'dul ba pa bzhugs so/_/
[\[1b\]]
[\[1b.1\]]@#/_/'dul ba gzhung dam pa/_bam po nyi shu gsum pa/_mdor na/_khye'u gnyis rgal gsum pa dang /_/phrin pa dag dang dge 'dun zhing /_/yo byad rnams dang phur pa 
[\[1b.2\]]dang /_/shing dang bya tshang rnam gnyis so/_/tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos khyim bdag mgon med pa la zas sbyin gyi bu rnams thar bar byas pa ni rgyas par rnam par 'byed pa las ji 
[\[1b.3\]]skad 'byung ba bzhin no/_/khyim bdag cig gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams gdugs tshod la spyan drangs nas/_sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun 
[\[1b.4\]]rnams ni byon gyi dge slong zhig gtsug lag khang na 'dug ste bsod snyoms mnos so/_/de na khyim bdag mgon med pa la zas sbyin gyi khye'u rnams dze ta'i tshal na rtse ba las g.yon can dag gis 
[\[1b.5\]]brkus pa dge slong des thos te/_des sngags bslabs nas ring po ma lon par des 'di snyam du ma la bdag gis sngags 'dis sad do snyam du bsams nas des sngags de brjod pa dang /_g.yon 
[\[2a\]]
[\[2a.1\]]can de dag dpung gi tshogs bzhis bskor bar gyur nas de dag gis khye'u de rnams bor te bros so/_/de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis thos nas de la dge slong dag gis 'di ni phas pham pa'i nyes pa byung ngo zhes smras pa dang /_dge slong de 'gyod 
[\[2a.2\]]pa skyes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong khyod kyis ji ltar bsams te khye'u rnams thar bar byas zhes smras pa dang /_sngags sad par bsams so zhes gsol nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sngags brjod pa 
[\[2a.3\]]la nyes pa med do/_/ljongs ko sa lar dge 'dun gyi chos gos bgos pa dang /_dge slong gzhi pa zhig grong gzhan du song nas de la lhan cig spyod pa gnyis shig yod de de gnyis kyis mkhan po'i gos so sor mnos so/_/de gnyis kyis mnos te dong ba 
[\[2a.4\]]dang /_gcig la gcig mkhan po'i gos khyod kyis mnos sam zhes dris so/_/khyod kyis kyang mnos kho bos kyang mnos na gang gis mi dbang bar mnos pas phas pham pa byung ba ni mi shes so zhes smras pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[2a.5\]]mnos pa la nyes pa med de 'on kyang gzhan shes par byos shig_/gzhongs ko sa lar dge 'dun gyis gos bgos pa dang /_dge slong gzhi ba zhig grong gzhan du song nas/_dge slong de'i mdza' bo zhig yod de/_des de'i gos mnos nas des 'ongs pa 
[\[2a.6\]]dang /_'di skad du tshe dang ldan pa 'di ni khyod kyi gos yin te kho bos mnos nas 'ongs so zhes smras pa dang /_ngas khyod la ma bcol to zhes smras nas/_dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_phas pham pa'i 
[\[2b\]]
[\[2b.1\]]nyes pa med de ma bcol bar rnyed pa ma mnod cig_/mnos na ni nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/gzhongs ko sa lar gos rnams bgos pa'i tshe dge slong zhig na ba dang de'i nad g.yog gis gos mnos nas des khyer te song ba dang /_dge slong de yang dus las 'das te dge slong 
[\[2b.2\]]des ji ltar bya ba mi shes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de ste sngar dus las 'das la phyis mnos na ni de nyid du slar phul cig_/'on te sngar mnos la phyis dus las 'das na ni yo byad gzhan ji lta ba de ltar byos shig_/dge slong zhig gis dge slong 
[\[2b.3\]]zhig la tshe dang ldan pa tshur shog_/chung ngu chung ngu nas ma byin par blangs pa dang nyes par mi 'gyur ro zhes smras pa dang /_dge slong dag gis thos nas bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sbyor ba gcig gis rin thang brtsi bar bya'o/_/
[\[2b.4\]]khyim bdag cig dge 'dun gyi zhing rmed pa dang /_de la dge slong gzhi ba zhig 'ongs nas 'di skad du khyim bdag yang na shas byin cig_/yang na zhing ma rmed cig ces smras kyang des ma mnyan te rmos pa dang /_dge slong des thong ba'i rtse mor nyal lo/_/de nas khyim bdag 
[\[2b.5\]]des thong ba bor nas 'di skad du dge sbyong 'di lta bu dang bral bar shog shig ces 'phya zhing spong ste mi snyan par zer ba dang /_dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_nyes pa med de/_phyin chad dge slong gis 'di ltar lus mi sdug par ma 
[\[2b.6\]]byed cig_/dge slong zhig gis dge slong zhig la 'di skad du tshe dang ldan pa tshur shog mchod rten gyi nor brkus kyang bdag cag gnyis la nyes par mi 'gyur ro zhes smras pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag mchod rten gyi yo byad srung ma yod pa 
[\[2b.7\]]las ni de ste rin thang tshang na phas pham par 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gzhi ba zhig dge 'dun gyi zhing rmed du bcug pa dang /_de nas shin tu mi ring ba zhig na khyim bdag cig kyang zhing rmed de/_khyim bdag de 'ongs nas btsun pa kho bo'i zhing ma rmo shig ces smras pa dang /_'di khyod 
[\[3a\]]
[\[3a.1\]]kyi ma yin te dge 'dun gyi zhing ngo /_/btsun pa kho bo'i dbang du mi ma yin pa bstan to zhes smras nas/_khyim bdag des sngon mtshams su phur pa btab pa de brkos so/_/de brkos nas bstan pa dang des thong ba bor nas khyim bdag de song ba'i 'og tu des de'i phur 
[\[3a.2\]]pa nang du bsnur te zhing rmed pa dang /_khyim bdag de slar 'ongs nas/_btsun pa da gzod kyang kho bo rgyal na ci'i phyir da dung yang zhing rmed ces smras pa dang /_dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de ste dngos po tshang na phas pham 
[\[3a.3\]]par 'gyur ro/_/dge slong zhig gis khyim bdag gi me tog gi shing zhig ma byin par blangs pa dang /_dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de ste dngos po tshang na phas pham par 'gyur ro/_/'bras bu'i shing yang de bzhin no/_/
[\[3a.4\]]dge slong gi 'chag sar shing zhig skyes te/_de la 'ol ba'i tshang 'chas nas des de dag 'chag pa la shing 'dor zhing skad 'byin pa dang /_des de'i tshang bshig nas de skad 'byin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dga' bo la dga' bo 'ol ba ci'i phyir 
[\[3a.5\]]skad 'byin ces rmas pa dang /_dge slong dag gis 'ol ba'i tshang bshig pa'i slad du'o/_/'ol ba'i tshang ma gzhig cig_/sus bshig pa de la nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis 'ol ba'i tshang bshig nas tshon bskol ba de yang rgyas par de bzhin no/_/
[\[3a.6\]]mdor na/_la phug sdong bu 'bras bu dang /_/'dab ma me tog rnam gsum du/_/rta dang rta zhon rku ba dang /_/gru rgal ba dang nor bu'o/_/mnyan du yod pa na khyim bdag cig la la phug gi ra ba zhig yod de der dge slong zhig song nas 'di skad du la phug slong zhes smras pa 
[\[3a.7\]]dang /_btsun pa rin stsol cig_/rin med do/_/rin med par ji ltar gsol/_chos kyi phyir rin med par byin cig_/btsun pa de ste 'dir 'ongs so cog la rin med par byin na kho bo cag gi zas dang gos cung zad kyang med par 'gyur ro zhes smras pa dang /_ci cung zad kyang 
[\[3b\]]
[\[3b.1\]]mi sbyin nam/_cung zad kyang mi gsol lo zhes smras nas/_des la phug gi ra ba de sngags kyis bskams pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_phas pham pa'i nyes pa med mod kyi nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/la phug gi ra ba ji lta ba bzhin du sdong bu'i ra ba dang /_
[\[3b.2\]]lo ma'i ra ba dang /_'bras bu'i ra ba rnams kyang de bzhin no/_/rta zhig rtswa za zhing 'dug pa dang /_dge slong zhig gis rtswa chang ba gang blangs nas rta'i mdun du bsgrengs pa dang /_de yang de'i phyi bzhin du 'ong bar gyur nas/_dge slong des 'di ltar brku bar bya'o snyam ste lus 
[\[3b.3\]]rnam par bsgyur ba dang /_de 'gyod pa skyes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_phas pham pa'i nyes pa ni med kyi nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/dge slong zhig gis tshong pa 'gron pa mang po dag cig dang lhan cig gzhongs ko sa lar dong nas mya ngan gyi lam zhig 
[\[3b.4\]]tu phyin pa dang /_tshong pa de rta la zhon nas de dag gis btsun pa mya ngan gyi lam 'di ni 'jigs pa dang bcas kyis rta la bcibs la myur du bzhud do zhes smras pa dang /_dge slong dag gis rta la zhon te de dag gis der 'di ltar brku bar bya'o snyam nas lus rnam par bsgyur ba dang /_dge 
[\[3b.5\]]slong de dag 'gyod pa skyes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_phas pham pa'i nyes pa ni med de nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/dge slong zhig rin po ches gang ba'i gru dang lhan cig rgal ba las des der 'di ltar brku bar bya'o snyam nas lus rnam par bsgyur ba dang /_
[\[3b.6\]]dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_phas pham pa'i nyes pa ni med de nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/tshong pa zhig gi gru rin po ches gang ba chur bying ba dang /_de brel ba dang rin po che'i sgrom chus khyer te dge slong dag cig 'og na chu la 'khru 
[\[3b.7\]]zhing 'dug pa de dag gis rin po che'i sgrom mthong nas de dag gis de phyung ba dang /_tshong pa des mthong ste/_btsun pa dag rin po che'i sgrom 'di ni bdag gi lags so zhes smras pa dang /_'di chus khyer ba las nged kyis rnyed do/_/btsun pa dag bdag gis gru rin po ches 
[\[4a\]]
[\[4a.1\]]gang ba chur bying ste/_de nas kho bo brel ba dang /_rin po che'i sgrom bu 'di chus khyer te/_rin po che'i sgrom 'di ni bdag gi lags so zhes smras pa dang /_de ste khyod kyi yin na khyer cig_/dge slong de dag 'gyod pa skyes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[4a.2\]]bka' stsal pa/_nyes pa med do/_/dge slong gzhi ba zhig gis phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi yo byad rku sems kyis gnas nas gnas su spos pa dang /_dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_phas pham pa'i nyes pa med de/_nyes 
[\[4a.3\]]pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/rkun po dag cig gis ba zhig khrid de dgon pa'i gnas su 'dzegs nas de dag gis der btags te dong ba dang /_gnas der dge slong dag nyin par spyod pa'i phyir dong ba dang /_de dag gis ba de mthong nas de dag gis snying rje ste btang ba dang /_de 
[\[4a.4\]]dag 'gyod pa skyes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_phas pham pa'i nyes pa med de/_nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/mdor na/_ro dang gser gyi phreng ba dang /_/byan lag byi ba rnam pa gnyis/_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]gsum dang kog tshe gnyis/_/rnyi dang bya 
[\[4a.5\]]rgya bya tshang ngo /_/mnyan du yod pa na gzhan dag ro la gsol ba 'debs te/_khyim bdag des kyang dgos pa zhig gsol nas/_de'i dgos pa de grub pa dang /_des de la ras dkar po zhig gis g.yogs te bzhag pa la dge slong nag po dga' bo zhes bya ba de der song nas 
[\[4a.6\]]ras de blangs pa dang /_de la dge slong rnams kyis khyod la phas pham pa'i nyes pa byung ngo /_/dngos po gang gi phyir/_khyod kyis ro'i ras ma byin par blangs pa'i phyir ro zhes smras pa dang /_de 'gyod pa skyes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_phas pham pa'i 
[\[4a.7\]]nyes pa med de/_nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/grong khyer yangs pa can na ro gser gyi phreng ba btags pa zhig rang la bsrung zhing 'dug go zhes dge slong nag po dga' bo zhes bya ba des thos te de der song nas/_ro de la 'thog pa las ro de smra ba dang /_de dpa' ba la nus 
[\[4b\]]
[\[4b.1\]]pas na des gser gyi phreng ba phrogs te khyer ba dang /_dge slong rnams kyis thos nas de yang de bzhin du rgyas par ro/_/bud med mang zhig chu bo ma dzi ra ba ti'i ngogs su gos dang rgyan rnams bzhag ste khrus byed pa na/_spre'u zhig shing las babs nas rgyan rnams khyer te shing 
[\[4b.2\]]la slar 'dzegs pa dang /_de dag slar byung nas gos rnams bgos te rgyan rnams thogs zhes byas na mu tig gi do shal med nas gang gi tshe ma rnyed pa de'i tshe dong ngo /_/de nas spre'u des mu tig gi do shal de de nyid du slar bor ba dang /_dge slong dag cig shin tu mi ring ba zhig na 
[\[4b.3\]]'chag cing 'khod pa de dag gis mu tig gi do shal de mthong nas blangs te bud med de dag la byin no/_/bud med dag na re khyod kyis mu tig gi do shal 'di brkus so zhes smras pa dang /_'di nged cag gis ma brkus kyis khyed cag khrus byed pa na spre'u zhig shing las babs nas 
[\[4b.4\]]mu tig gi do shal 'di blangs te slar shing la 'dzegs so/_/gang gi tshe khyod kyis btsal te ma rnyed nas dong ba de'i tshe slar babs te de nyid du bzhag go/_/dge slong de dag 'gyod pa skyes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_nyes pa med do/_/dge slong gis byan 
[\[4b.5\]]lag gi tshang bshig ste sgo nga blangs pa dang /_byan lag de sgra 'byin te de bzhin rgyas par ro/_/dge slong mang zhig gtsug lag khang zhig na 'khod pa dang byi ba dag cig byi khung nas byung ste nor dang zas brkus shing byi khung du slar song ba dang /_de dag 'di snyam du gyur to/_/
[\[4b.6\]]bdag cag gi la rku ba de su zhig snyam du bsams te/_dge slong dag gis bsod snyoms las bskor nas gdugs tshod la sdod cing 'dug pa dang /_byi ba de yang khung bu nas byung ste/_kha zas khyer nas de bzhin du byi khung du slar song ba dang /_dge slong de dag 'di snyam du 
[\[4b.7\]]bdag cag la rku ba ni 'di yin no snyam du bsams te/_de dag gis de bzung nas dge slong dag la bstan te bdag cag la rku ba ni 'di yin no zhes smras pa dang /_dge slong de dag gis smras pa khyed la phas pham pa'i nyes pa byung ngo /_/dngos po gang las khyed kyis byi ba la ma 
[\[5a\]]
[\[5a.1\]]byin par blangs pas so zhes smras pa dang /_dge slong de dag 'gyod pa skyes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_nyes pa med kyis dge slong rnams kyi gang yin pa de long shig_/byi ba'i gang yin pa de ni mi blang bar bya'o/_/byi bas bca' 
[\[5a.2\]]ba dang bza' ba'i rnams khyer te 'ongs shing dge slong zhig gi mal stan gyi 'og tu bzhag pa dang /_dge slong des nang par sngar so shing zos gdong bkrus nas byin len byas te/_de zos pa dang dge slong dag gis tshe dang ldan pa khyod rtag par lag pa dang /_rkang pa legs par 
[\[5a.3\]]bkrus kyang bsod snyoms la grong du mi 'jug na/_de ci'i phyir zhes smras pa dang /_bdag ni byi bas bca' ba dang bza' ba khyer te 'ongs shing mal stan gyi 'og tu 'jog ste bdag gis sngar byin len byas nas zos so zhes smras pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa khyod ni phas pham pa'i nyes pa byung 
[\[5a.4\]]ngo /_/dngos po gang gi phyir/_khyod kyis byi ba'i bca' ba dang bza' ba ma byin par blangs pa'i phyir ro/_/de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong de ni tshe snga ma la byi ba'i pha yin te/_de pha 
[\[5a.5\]]la byams pas na dge slong de la kha zas khyer te 'ongs shing byin pas nyes pa med do/_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]shig rngon pas bsnyags nas gtsug lag khang du 'ongs pa dang rngon pa de dag gis bdag cag gi [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]de ni bsnyags te gtsug lag khang du song gis slar byin cig ces 
[\[5a.6\]]smras pa dang /_de dag gis gang gi tshe ma thob pa de'i tshe bor te dong ba dang /_dge slong de dag 'gyod pa skyes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_nyes pa med do/_/rngon pas [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]mdas phog pa de yang de bzhin du rgyas par bya'o/_/rngon pas [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]shig 
[\[5a.7\]]mda' dug can gyis phog pa gtsug lag khang du 'ongs pa dang /_rngon pa de dag gis bdag cag gis [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'di mda' dug can gyis phog ste/_gdon mi za bar 'chis slar byin cig ces smras pa dang /_dge slong de dag gis slar ma byin nas de dag gis bor te dong ngo /_/de 
[\[5b\]]
[\[5b.1\]]dag dong ba'i 'og tu [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]de yang dus las 'das nas dge slong de dag gis ji ltar bya mi shes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rngon pa de dag la slar byin cig_/dge slong gis rngon pa la gnod par bya ba'i phyir kog tshe bcad na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/
[\[5b.2\]]snying rje bas bcad na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du bya'i rnyi yang gnod par bya ba'i phyir bcad na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/snying rje bar bsams te bcad na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis bya rgya gnod par bya ba'i phyir bcad na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/
[\[5b.3\]]snying rje bar bsams te bcad na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/bya tshang yang de bzhin no/_/mdor na/_gos 'tshong ba dang tshong 'dus pa/_/bca' ba gru gsum thug pa dang /_/zong dang dngos po chos gos so/_/dge slong zhig gis gos 'tshong ba ra ro ba zhig gis ras zhig 
[\[5b.4\]]blangs nas khyer te song ba dang /_gos 'tshong bas mthong nas des de la ras ma rku zhes smras pa dang /_bstan nas khyer te 'ong ngo zhes smras so/_/dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_phas pham pa'i nyes pa ni med de nyes pa sbom por 
[\[5b.5\]]'gyur ro/_/dge slong zhig gis tshong 'dus pa la skyin por mang zhig blangs pa dang /_des skyin pa bdas na des 'di snyam du 'di la mi sbyin no snyam bsams pa dang /_de 'gyod pa skyes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_phas pham pa'i nyes pa med de nyes pa 
[\[5b.6\]]sbom por 'gyur ro/_/dge slong zhig na ba dang de khur ba gru gsum dang /_thug pa la dad nas des 'di snyam du khur ba gru gsum dang /_thug pa byas te dge 'dun la'ang gsol/_bdag kyang bza'o snyam ste/_des nad g.yog rnams la dge 'dun la'ang gsol/_
[\[5b.7\]]kho bo yang bzas khur ba gru gsum dang /_thug pa yang sbyor cig ces smras nas/_des de la rin byin pa dang de dag gis 'di snyam du bdag cag la khur ba gru gsum dang /_thug pa ci dgos kyis 'di gcig pu la khur ba gru gsum dang /_thug pa byin la rin de bgo'o snyam 
[\[6a\]]
[\[6a.1\]]bsams nas de dag gis de la khur ba gru gsum dang /_thug pa byin te rin bgos pa dang /_dge slong de dag 'gyod pa skyes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_phas pham pa'i nyes pa med de/_nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/dge slong 
[\[6a.2\]]nad pa zhig yod de/_de la zong mang du yod pas des 'di snyam du 'di dag ni bdag shi ba dang dge 'dun gyis bgos so snyam du bsams nas/_des nad g.yo ba rnams la tshe dang ldan pa dag kho bo la sran chung gi tshod ma zhig byin cig ces smras nas de dag gis de la sran chung gi tshod 
[\[6a.3\]]ma zhig byas te byin pa dang /_nad g.yog de dag brel bar gyur nas/_des zong dang sran chung gi tshod mar bsres nas 'thungs pa dang /_de kha zas lci bas dus las 'das te dge slong de dag 'dus nas dur khrod du bor ro/_/de dag gis de bor nas nad g.yog rnams la dge 
[\[6a.4\]]slong de'i zong mang po bgo bar byas khyer te shog ces smras pa dang /_dge slong dag gis btsal nas ma rnyed de/_de dag stan las langs te dong ngo /_/dge slong de gcan gzan gyis lto dral te rgyu ma drangs so/_/rgyu ma drangs pa dang zong rnams sa la byung zhing 'dug go/_/dge 
[\[6a.5\]]slong zhig dur khrod du mi ro la rtog tu song ba dang /_des zong de mthong nas de dag khyer te dge 'dun la phul ba dang /_dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_nyes pa med do/_/dge slong nad pa zhig yod de de la shing gi dngos po mang du yod 
[\[6a.6\]]pa dang /_des nad g.yog rnams la tshe dang ldan pa dag dge slong rnams bos shig_/dge 'dun la 'bul lo/_/mchod rten la 'bul lo/_/gang zag rnams la 'bul lo zhes smras pa dang /_nad g.yog rnams 'di snyam du dge 'dun dang mchod rten la phul na bdag cag 
[\[6a.7\]]gis cung zad kyang mi thob bo snyam nas/_de dag gis dge slong ma bos so/_/dge slong de yang dus las 'das nas de dag 'gyod pa skyes pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_nyes pa med de/_nad pa dang mi mthun par nad g.yog gis ma byed cig_/nad 
[\[6b\]]
[\[6b.1\]]pas ji ltar bsgo ba bzhin du de dag gis bsgrub par bya'o/_/'on te rnam grangs gzhan zhig tu 'god par gyur na yang ji ltar nad pas bsgo ba de ltar byos shig_/dge slong nad pa zhig yod de/_de la lhung bzed dang chos gos mang du yod pa dang /[ (]das [,]des [)]nad g.yog rnams la dge 
[\[6b.2\]]slong rnams bos shig mchod rten la 'bul lo/_/dge 'dun la 'bul lo/_/gang zag la 'bul lo zhes smras pa de yang de bzhin du rgyas par brjod par bya'o/_/mdor na/_tsan da la ka so da yi/_/sbyar ma dang ni brnya ba dang /_/su shi ma dang bzang sbyin dang /_/
[\[6b.3\]]rang gir 'du shes lhung bzed blangs pa dang /_/a dzi ta dang sha shi gub ta dang /_/rang gi gos rnams brkus pa'o/_/mdo tshigs su bcad pa 'di ni ji ltar rnam par 'byed pa las 'byung ba bzhin no/_/mdor na/_dge slong ma yang gnyis ldan dang /_/maud gal bu dang 
[\[6b.4\]]gzhan yang gnyis/_/pi lin da yi gnyis po dang /_/nye dga' bo dang spong ba po'o/_/dge slong ma gnyis dang ldan pa na ji ltar 'dul ba bzhin no/_/mnyan du yod pa'i tshong pa dag cig gru chen por zhugs nas rgya mtsho mching rnam rgal te de dag rgya mtsho mching rnam gyi nang nas dong ba dang gru bo che 
[\[6b.5\]]klus bzung nas lha bran rnams la gsol kyang ma btang ba dang /_de na tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po grong du nye bar 'gro ba'i dge bsnyen zhig yod de/_des 'di snyam du de ste 'phags pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos dgongs na ni bkra shis par gyur cig ces bsams pa dang /_gnas brtan gyis 
[\[6b.6\]]kyang dgongs te ji ltar sems snyoms par zhugs pas bya'i rgyal po nam mkha' lding du gyur nas/_gru'i dngor 'dug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa dang /_klu de dag skrag ste/_gru bo che de btang nas tshong pa rnams bde bar mnyan du yod par phyin te/_
[\[6b.7\]]thams cad ni 'phags pa maud gal gyi bu'i mthu'o zhes brjod nas/_dge slong dag gis 'di ji lta zhes dris pa dang /_de ltar gyur pa rgyas par smras te/_de nas dge slong de dag gis tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la ni phas pham pa'i nyes pa byung ngo /_/dngos po gang 
[\[7a\]]
[\[7a.1\]]gi phyir/_klus gru zin pa ma byin par btang ngo zhes smras pa dang /_dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_maud gal gyi bu khyod kyis ji ltar bsams te btang zhes smras pa dang /_rdzu 'phrul rnam par sprul par bsams 
[\[7a.2\]]so/_/maud gal gyi bus rdzu 'phrul gyis btang ba la ni nyes pa med do/_/mnyan du yod pa'i tshong pa dag nor khyer te ljongs rgyur dong nas de dag mya ngam gyi nang du phyin pa dang /_'gron pa mang po de dag rkun pos bskor nas de dag gis lha rnams la gsol kyang ma btang ba dang /_
[\[7a.3\]]de dag gi nang na tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi grong du nye bar 'gro ba'i tshong pa zhig yod pa des 'di snyam du de ste gnas brtan gyis dgongs na ni bkra shis par gyur cig ces bsams pa dang /_gnas brtan gyis kyang dgongs nas ji ltar sems snyoms par zhugs pas rkun po rnams dpung 
[\[7a.4\]]gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pas bskor bar gyur pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa dang /_rkun po de dag skrag ste/_'gron pa mang po rnams btang ste bros pa dang /_tshong pa de dag bkra shis shing bde bar mnyan du yod par phyin to/_/de dag gis ji ltar gyur pa 
[\[7a.5\]]dge slong rnams la rgyas par smras te snga ma bzhin no/_/pi lin da'i bu gnyis ni rgyas par 'dul ba las ji skad 'byung ba bzhin no/_/shAkya'i bu nye dga' bo dbyar gyi zla ba tha ma la gang du dge slong ji snyed cig dbyar tshul du zhugs/_gang du dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa ji snyed cig rnyed 
[\[7a.6\]]ces gtsug lag khang du rgyu zhing spyod de/_de gnas gang dang gang du phyin pa'i dge slong de dag gis tshig snyan pas bsu ba dang /_khyed bde bar gnas sam zhes dris te 'dug nas dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa ci yod pa 'on cig dang bgos la/_gang kho bo'i gos kyi skal ba de ni 
[\[7a.7\]]bkur ro zhes smras pa dang /_de dag gis khyer te 'ongs nas de'i mdun du bzhag pa dang /_de bgos nas dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyi gos kyi skal ba khyer te langs pa dang /_des yang gnas brtan da dung ma bzhud par bzhugs shig ces smras pa dang /_nye dga' bo 
[\[7b\]]
[\[7b.1\]]yang gtam snyan pa gtam sna tshogs bde ba la spobs pa dang ldan te/_rigs pa dang grol ba la spobs pas na des ji ltar gnas brtan la dad par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bshad pa dang /_des bdag gi gos kyi skal ba ci yod pa tshe dang ldan pa bzhes shig ces smras 
[\[7b.2\]]pa dang /_de bzhin du gnas brtan gnyis pa dang /_gnas brtan gsum pa dang dge slong de dag las mang zhig gis gos de la byin nas/_des gos de dag khur du khyer te dze ta'i tshal du zhugs pa dang /_dge slong dag gis tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' bo la gos 'di dag 
[\[7b.3\]]ga las brnyes zhes dris nas/_des de dag la de lta bur gyur pa rgyas par smras so/_/de lta bu 'byung mod kyi/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis ni da dung bslab pa'i gnas ma bcas so/_/rgan zhugs gnyis ni rgyas par ji ltar 'dul ba las 'byung ba bzhin no/_/dge 
[\[7b.4\]]slong gis gzhan gyi dbyar gyi gos skal ba ma len cig_/sus blangs pa de nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i lhan cig spyod pa spong ba po zhes bya ba des pa/_tshul khrims dang ldan pa zhig ste/_de khyim bdag gzhan zhig gi grong du nye bar 'gro ba yin 
[\[7b.5\]]te/_de la bu gnyis shig yod de khyim bdag de yang nad kyis btab bo/_/de de la nad 'drir song ba dang /_des de la nor byin no/_/gnyis pos ni ci yang ma thob nas des tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'khangs pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos spong ba po chad pas 
[\[7b.6\]]bcad pa dang /_de sngon slob ma las rab tu byung bas na des slob ma lnga brgya tsam zhig gzengs bstod de bdag gi mkhan po la bzod pa gsol cig ces smras pa dang /_khyod kyi mkhan po la bzod pa ji ltar bya/_khyod kyis khye'u rnams khrid la mkhan po'i drung du dengs 
[\[7b.7\]]shig dang /_des khyed cag la chos 'chad par 'gyur gyis gang gi tshe chos bshad zin par gyur pa de'i tshe khye'u dang bu mo rnams bor la dengs shig dang /_de dag ngus pas bu mo dang khye'u de dag khrid de deng zhes de zer ba dang /_de la de ste spong ba po la yang bzod par 
[\[8a\]]
[\[8a.1\]]mdzad dam zhes smros shig ces smras pa dang /_de dag gis ji ltar bsgo ba bzhin gang gi tshe chos bshad zin pa de'i tshe khye'u dang bu mo rnams bor te dong ba dang /_de dag rab tu ngus nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos smras pa/_khye'u dang bu mo 'di dag khrid la deng 'di dag ci'i 
[\[8a.2\]]phyir dong zhes smras pa dang /_de dag gis de ste spong ba po la yang bzod par mdzad dam zhes smras pa dang /_bzod par byas/_nyes byas kyi nyes pa bshags par gyis shig_/mdor na/_phag dang bu ram shing gi sdong bu dang /_/gnag dga' bo yi chos gos dang /_/mar bre gang dang 
[\[8a.3\]]a ga ru/_/gzig dang seng ge lnga pa'o/_/phag dang bu ram shing gi sdong bu dang /_gnag dga' bo'i chos gos rnams ni rgyas par ji ltar 'dul ba las 'byung ba bzhin no/_/dge slong bsod nams che ba tshong pa rnams la grags pa de la tshong pa gzhan zhig gis de la ci dgos pa dang ci 
[\[8a.4\]]mkho ba rnams bdag gis gsol lo zhes bstabs pa dang /_dge slong de'i nad g.yog des 'di snyam du tshong pa de yang dang yang du stobs na de la bdag gis ji ltar snying nas stobs sam/_kha 'gron tsam du stobs bgam mo snyam du bsams nas de de'i drung du song ste/_'di skad du mkhan po la mar 
[\[8a.5\]]zhig dgos so zhes smras pa dang /_de la mar bre gang byin nas yang btsun pa sran ma'i khu ba'am sha khu'ang rung ste ci dgos pa 'di nas snoms shig ces smras pa dang /_de ltar bgyi'o zhes smras nas dge slong des mar de dge slong de'i sran ma'i khu ba dang sha'i khu ba rnams su cung zad 
[\[8a.6\]]blugs so/_/ji tsam zhig na tshong pa de dge slong de la 'phags pa kho bos khyod la mar ni sngar bskur ro/_/de ste gzhan yang sran ma'i khu ba'am sha khu yang rung ste/_ci dgos pa de dag long shig ces spring ba dang /_dge slong des nad g.yog de la tshong pa 'di zhes bya ba la mar 
[\[8a.7\]]blangs sam zhes dris nas blangs so zhes smras pa dang /_'o na phas pham pa'i nyes pa byung ngo /_/mkhan po la tshong pa de yang dang yang du stobs nas brtag cing bgam pa'i phyir bdag gis blangs nas mkhan po yir bgyis so zhes smras pa dang /_dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas/_
[\[8b\]]
[\[8b.1\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_nyes pa med de de nas 'di dang 'di blang ngo zhes dris te song shig_/mdor na/_bde ba ldan dang 'du shes dang /_/chung ma gnyis dang sdig can lnga/_/mngal na gnas pa bcur byas dang /_/dge slong ma yin gzhan yang bcu/_/sangs 
[\[8b.2\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das yul br-i dzi'i thang shing gi gnas na bzhugs te/_klung bde ldan gyi ngogs kyi dge slong rnams la bslab pa'i gnas ma bcas pas las dang po pa rnams la nyes pa med par gyur pa na dge slong dag the tshom dang yid gnyis dang 'gyod pa rnams skyes te/_
[\[8b.3\]]bdag cag gis bslab pa'i gnas ma bcas par dge slong mang zhig la 'chi bar bstabs na/_bdag cag gi las dang po gang yin snyam pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_klung bde ldan gyi drung du dge slong dag gnas ma bcas pa na 'das pa dang bcas pa ni 
[\[8b.4\]]thams cad du las dang po pa ste/_las dang po la nyes pa med do/_/dge slong gis mi la mi ma yin par 'du shes te 'tsho ba dang phral ba dang /_dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_mi la mi ma yin par 'du shes na nyes pa sbom por 
[\[8b.5\]]'gyur ro/_/mi ma yin pa la mi ma yin par 'du shes na'ang nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/mi ma yin pa la the tshom na'ang nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/dge slong zhig yun ring zhig tu nad kyis gzir nas des bdag la 'di ci dgos snyam du bsams nas dge slong des mdza' bo'i 
[\[8b.6\]]drung du song ste 'di skad du gri byin zhes smras pa dang /_khyod la gri cir dgos/_re zhig byin cig ces smras nas/_des byin pa dang /_de gnas khang du zhugs te sgo bcad de gtan pa bcug skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug nas/_bdag nyid kyis srol kong bcad do/_/de de ltar gri lag 
[\[8b.7\]]na thogs bzhin du dus las 'das pa dang /_dge slong des nyi ma gnyis sam gsum lon nas 'di snyam du dge slong des gri khyer te song gis song la blta'o/_/snyam du bsams nas/_de de'i gnas khang du song ba dang /_dge slong de skyil mo krung bcas te srol kong bcad de gri thogs 
[\[9a\]]
[\[9a.1\]]bzhin du dus las 'das par mthong nas/_dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas/_gang cung zad 'di dus las 'das pa thams cad ni rgyu ba dag las byung ste/_de ste bdag gis gri ma byin par gyur na ni 'di yang bdag nyid kyis 'tsho ba dang phral bar mi 'gyur ro snyam du bsams pa 
[\[9a.2\]]dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_nyes pa med de/_phyin chad nad pa la bab bab tu gri ma sbyin cig_/dge slong zhig grong gzhan zhig gi grong du nye bar song nas de grong du phyin pa dang /_de'i bud med des btsun pa tshur spyon mi tshangs par spyad do zhes smras pa dang /_dge 
[\[9a.3\]]slong gis khyod kyi khyo de ni khro la mi srun no zhes smras pa dang /_des btsun pa ji nas khro la mi srun par mi 'gyur ba de ltar bgyi'o zhes smras nas/_des de la dug byin pa dang /_khyim bdag de dus las 'das so/_/dge slong de zhag gcig 'das pa dang khyim der song ba dang /_bud 
[\[9a.4\]]med des btsun pa tshur spyon mi tshangs par spyad do zhes smras pa dang /_sring mo de skad ma zer cig_/kho bo ni tshangs par spyod pa yin no/_/des btsun pa gang gi tshe kho mos khyo 'tsho ba dang phral ba de'i tshe gdod tshangs par spyod dam zhes smras pa dang /_ci khyod kyis khyo 'tsho ba dang phrol cig 
[\[9a.5\]]ces kho bos smras sam/_khyod kyi khyo 'di khro la mi srun pa'o zhes ma smras sam/_ci kho bos khyod kyi khyo 'di khro la mi srun pa'o zhes ni smras kyi/_khyod kyi khyo 'di 'tsho ba dang phrol cig ces ni ma smras so/_/dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[9a.6\]]nyes pa med do/_/dge slong grong gzhan du grong du nye bar song nas byed pa las khyod kyi khyo 'di na'o zhes bya ba ni rgyas par ro/_/dge slong zhig gis gsad par bsams te/_brdegs pa las dus las 'das na phas pham par 'gyur ro/_/dus las ma 'das na nyes pa sbom por 
[\[9a.7\]]'gyur ro/_/dge slong zhig gis ma bsrung ba'i phyir mngal na gnas pa mnyes pa las mngal na gnas pa shi na phas pham par 'gyur ro/_/ma shi na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/gnyis ka shi na phas pham par 'gyur ro/_/gnyis ka ma shi na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/mngal 
[\[9b\]]
[\[9b.1\]]na gnas pa'i mi shi ba phyung na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/byol song gi mngal na gnas pa phyung na yang nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/de ltar dge slong mas byas na'ang de bzhin no//_//'dul ba gzhung dam pa/_bam po nyi shu bzhi pa/_mdor na/_rtsab mo rnam 
[\[9b.2\]]pa lnga pa dang /_/las gsar dag dang rdo ba dang /_/ba lang rwa dang wa mo dang /_/stan dang smyon par gyur pa'o/_/dge slong zhig gis dge 'dun la btung ba rtsab mo brims pa dang /_der dge slong mang zhig dus las 'das so/_/dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[9b.3\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_nyes pa med do/_/dge slong mdza' bo gnyis shig 'khod pa las gcig nad kyis btab ste nyal nas/_des nad g.yog la tshe dang ldan pa rtsab mo zhig rnyed na ni kho bo bde bar 'gyur ro/_/zhes smras te/_rgyas par ni 'dul ba las ji skad 'byung ba bzhin 
[\[9b.4\]]no/_/bram ze zhig glog pa'i nad kyis gzir ba dang /_de dge slong zhig gi drung du song ste 'di skad du btsun pa gal te rtsab mo zhig rnyed na ni bde bar 'gyur ro zhes smras pa dang /_khyod bram ze log par lta ba rtsab mo cir dgos/_btsun pa sngon bdag nad kyis btab pa na yang rtsab 
[\[9b.5\]]mo zhig 'thungs pas bdag bde bar gyur to/_/dge slong des rtsab mo blud pa dang /_de dus las 'das so/_/dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_nyes pa med do/_/dge slong zhig dur khrod du mi ro la rtog tu song ba dang /_de na mi zhig 
[\[9b.6\]]gsal shing zhig btsugs shing 'dug pa dang /_des dge slong la btsun pa de ste kho bo la rtsab mo zhig blud na ni kho bo bde bar 'gyur ro/_/zhes smras pa dang /_dge slong des de la rtsab mo blud nas de dus las 'das so/_/dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[9b.7\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_nyes pa med do/_/rkun po lnga brgya zhig dge slong ma zhig gis rtsab mo blud pa dang /_de dag kyang dus las 'das te rgyas par ni 'dul ba las ji skad 'byung ba bzhin no/_/dgon pa gsar can zhes bya ba na gnas khang sar pa zhig rtsig pa las dge slong zhig 
[\[10a\]]
[\[10a.1\]]gi lag pa nas pha gu zhig lhung ba dang /_'og na las byed pa zhig 'dug pa de'i steng du lhung nas de dus las 'das so/_/dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_nyes pa med de/_bag yod par byos la grogs gyis shig_/
[\[10a.2\]]dgon pa la dge 'dun gyis gnas khang sar pa rtsig pa na dge slong zhig bla gab med pa'i steng na so phag 'jog pa'i lag pa nas ste'u lhung ste/_'og na rtsi gu mkhan las byed pa'i steng du lhung nas de dus las 'das so/_/dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[10a.3\]]bka' stsal pa/_nyes pa med de/_bag yod par byos la grogs gyis shig_/dgon par dge 'dun gyi dugs bya ba'i khang pa zhig rtsig ste/_dge slong dag gdung ma steng du 'dren pa las dge slong nyung la khur che zhing lci bas de dag gis btang ba dang /_'og na shing mkhan 
[\[10a.4\]]shing 'jog pa'i steng du lhung nas de dus las 'das so/_/dge slong de dag 'gyod pa skyes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_nyes pa med de/_nyung ngu mas khur lci ba ma 'degs shig_/skas 'degs pa'ang de bzhin no/_/dgon par dugs bya ba'i khang pa zhig rtsig 
[\[10a.5\]]ste/_de na dge slong zhig sel po'i nang du 'jim pa steng du skyed pa na thag pa ngan te chad pas 'og na rtsig gu mkhan las byed pa'i steng du 'jim pa'i sel po lhung nas de dus las 'das so/_/dge slong de dag 'gyod pa skyes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_nyes 
[\[10a.6\]]pa med kyis bag yod par byos la grogs gyis shig_/bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bzhugs so/_/dge slong zhig ri'i drung na skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug pa dang /_dge slong zhig gis ri'i rtse mo nas rdo ba bsgril ba dge slong de'i steng du lhung nas dge slong de dus las 
[\[10a.7\]]'das so/_/dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shin tu rtogs la bag yod par byos la rdo bsgril bar bya'o/_/dge slong zhig ba lang gi nang du song ba dang /_glang mi srun pa zhig gis brdungs nas khye'u zhig gi steng du 'gyel ba dang 
[\[10b\]]
[\[10b.1\]]khye'u dus las 'das so/_/dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_bag yod par byos la ba lang gi nang du song shig_/dge slong zhig nad yun ring pos sgur bor gyur pa dang /_de 'di snyam du bdag gson te ci rung gis song la bdag nyid 
[\[10b.2\]]g.yang sa nas mchong ngo snyam du bsams te/_des bdag nyid g.yang sa nas mchongs pa dang /_drung na wa mo zhig mi ro la za ba de'i steng du dge slong lhung nas wa mo de ni dus las 'das so/_/dge slong de ni drang por gyur pa dang /_dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas/_bcom 
[\[10b.3\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_nyes pa med de/_de ltar lus kyis log par 'gyur ba ma byed cig_/dge slong nad pa zhig stan gyi steng na 'dug pa la de'i nad g.yog gis tshe dang ldan pa longs zhes smras pa dang /_des kyang kho bo ma bslang shig shir 'ong ngo zhes smras 
[\[10b.4\]]kyang tshe dang ldan pa longs zhes smras nas/_de langs pa dang dus las 'das so/_/dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_phas pham pa'i nyes pa med de/_nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis smyon pa zhig la gsod [(]sams [,]sems [)]kyis 
[\[10b.5\]]brdegs te de dus 'das na ni phas pham par 'gyur ro/_/dus ma 'das na ni nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/mdor na/_yo byad mang dang ma zhu dang /_/phol mig gnyis dang zas ma yin/_/sman dang zas bzang spyod lam dang /_/nyes pa med de gzhan yang sbyar/_/dge slong zhig 
[\[10b.6\]]nad yun ring pos gzir nas de'i nad g.yog skyo ste de la khyod myur du 'chi bar 'gyur gyis nad g.yog mi bya'o zhes smras te des nad g.yog ma byas pas de dus las 'das so/_/dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_phas pham pa'i nyes pa 
[\[10b.7\]]med de/_nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/dge slong snod spyad dang yo byad mang ba zhig na ba de la khyod kyi nad g.yog mi bya'o/_/shi na yang dge 'dun gyi bgo ba mang por 'gyur ro zhes smras nas/_des de'i nad g.yog ma byas pa dang /_de dus las 'das so/_/dge slong de 
[\[11a\]]
[\[11a.1\]]'gyod pa skyes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_phas pham pa'i nyes pa med de/_nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/dge slong zhig zas ma zhu bar 'dug pa dang /_nad g.yog gis re zhig rkyongs shig zhes smras pa dang /_des nad g.yog la kho bo 
[\[11a.2\]]shir 'ong gis ma brkyang shig ces smras pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa rkyongs shig ces smras nas/_des brkyang ba dang /_de dus las 'das so/_/dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_phas pham pa'i nyes pa med de/_nyes pa sbom por 
[\[11a.3\]]'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis phol mig ma smin par brtol te de dus las 'das na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/smin par brtol na nyes pa med do/_/dge slong mas phol mig ma smin par brtol te dus las 'das na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/smin par brtol na nyes 
[\[11a.4\]]pa med do/_/dge slong zhig na ba dang de dang 'phrod pa'i zas ni ma rnyed nas de'i nad g.yog gis mi 'phrod pa'i zas shig byin nas tshe dang ldan pa 'di las ci yog pa zo shig_/des zos te dus las 'das na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/de dang 'phrod pa'i zas shig byin 
[\[11a.5\]]pa las dus las 'das na nyes pa med do/_/dge slong zhig na ba dang de dang 'phrod pa'i sman ma rnyed na de'i nad g.yog kyang de bzhin no/_/dge slong nad pa zhig gis nad g.yog la tshe dang ldan pa nad g.yog kho bo gnas khang nas phyir phyung shig_/phyis shig_/khrus 
[\[11a.6\]]shig_/kho bo nang du khrid cig_/'dug tu chug cig ces smras nas/_'dug tu yang bcug_/snyes su yang bcug pa las dus las 'das na/_thams cad la'ang nyes pa med do/_/mdor na/_khar ba pho long chu rnams dang /_/dgon pa gnyis dang bla gtun dang /_/
[\[11a.7\]]khros pa thal mo brnangs pa'o/_/dge slong zhig 'dug pa na yur te dge slong gis de la khar bas bskyod pa dang /_de dus las 'das so/_/dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_nyes pa med de/_de'i tshe na de la mtshon lta bu zhes 
[\[11b\]]
[\[11b.1\]]bya ba'i rlung byung ngo /_/gzhan yang pho long gis phog ste dus las 'das pa dang /_gzhan yang chus phog ste dus las 'das pa 'di dag kyang de bzhin du rgyas par bshad do/_/bcu bdun sde rnams kyang rgyas par ni rnam par 'byed pa las ji skad 'byung ba bzhin no/_/khyim 
[\[11b.2\]]bdag gzhan zhig gsar du dad de des dus sar pa'i 'bru sar pa dang /_'bras bu sar pa de dang de dag dge 'dun la phul te bdag nyid phyis za'o/_/dgon pa pa gzhan zhig khyim der song ba dang /_khyim bdag des 'di snyam du da phyin chad dge 'dun la mi dbul bar 
[\[11b.3\]]dgon pa pa 'di la dbul lo snyam bsams nas des de la byin no/_/dge slong de dag gis khyim bdag de sngon chad ni dus sar pa'i 'bru sar pa dang /_'bras bu sar pa de dang de dag dge 'dun la phul nas phyis bdag nyid za na de ni des ma byin pas na dge slong dgon pa 
[\[11b.4\]]pa zhig khyim der song ba des bkag par gyur gyis song la de bos shig ces smras pa dang /_de dag gis bos nas dgon pa pa khyim bdag de ni dus sar pa'i 'bru sar pa dang /_'bras bu sar pa de dang de dag dge 'dun la thog mar phul nas phyis bdag nyid za na khyod de'i 
[\[11b.5\]]khyim du song nas khyod kyis bkag par gyur to zhes smras pa dang /_btsun pa ma bkag go/_/ma bsgo'o zhes smras nas de dag gis 'di smrar mi btub kyis khrid la dong du chug shig ces smras te/_de dag gis de dong du bcug pas de dus las 'das so/_/dge slong dag 
[\[11b.6\]]'gyod pa skyes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_phas pham pa'i nyes pa med de/_nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/khyim bdag gzhan zhig dge slong gi dge 'dun dbyar gnas pa rnams la chos gos 'bul ba las dge slong dgon pa pa zhig khyim der 'ongs nas 
[\[11b.7\]]khyim bdag de 'di snyam du da phyin chad dge 'dun la mi dbul bar dgon pa pa 'di la dbul lo snyam du bsams nas des dgon pa pa de la byin pa dang /_dge slong de dag 'di snyam du khyim bdag de dge slong gi dge 'dun dbyar gnas pa rnams la gos 'bul na dge slong dgon 
[\[12a\]]
[\[12a.1\]]pa pa zhig der song ba des bkag par gyur pa snyam gyis song la de bos shig ces smras pa dang /_de dag gis de bos nas dgon pa pa khyim bdag de ni dge slong gi dge 'dun dbyar gnas pa rnams la gos dbul ba las da mi dbul ba ni khyod de'i khyim du song nas 
[\[12a.2\]]bkag par ma gyur tam zhes dris na/_btsun pa bdag gis ni ma bkag go/_/ma bsgo'o zhes smras pa dang /_de dag gis 'di smrar mi btub kyis khrid la sgo leb kyi bar du tshir cig ces smras nas de dag gis sgo leb kyi bar du btsir ba dang /_de dus las 'das so/_/dge 
[\[12a.3\]]slong de dag 'gyod pa skyes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_phas pham pa'i nyes pa med de/_nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/dge slong zhig bsod snyoms spyod pa dang sgo dog pa zhig na bla gtun zhig bsgreng zhing 'dug pa las de'i chos gos kyi grwas bsngos 
[\[12a.4\]]pas khye'u'i steng du 'gyel nas khye'u de dus las 'das so/_/dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_phas pham pa'i nyes pa med de/_bag yod par byos la bsod snyoms spyod cig_/bram ze zhig gis nang par sngar bkra shis pa dang /_
[\[12a.5\]]ltas byas nas khyim gyi nang na 'dug pa dang /_dge slong zhig khyim der bsod snyoms spyod pa la de khros nas phul ba dang /_dge slong de khye'u zhig gi steng du 'gyel nas khye'u shi bar gyur to/_/dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[12a.6\]]nyes pa med do/_/dge slong thal mo'i rig sngags 'debs shing de lag pas byugs te thal mo cig bsnun pa dang /_de dus las 'das so/_/dge slong de dag 'gyod pa skyes te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_nyes pa ni med de/_bag yod par byos 
[\[12a.7\]]la thal mo snun cig_/dge slong zhig brnangs te shi la thug pa dang de la dge slong zhig gis khu tshur cig bsnun nas brnangs pa de khrag dang bcas te byung nas dge slong de dus las 'das so/_/dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[12b\]]
[\[12b.1\]]phas pham pa'i nyes pa med de/_ci nas kyang bag yod par byas te brnangs pa yang byung bar gyur la dus las kyang 'das par mi 'gyur ba de ltar bsnun par bya'o/_/mdor na/_stan gnyis pa dang pha gnyis dang /_/gzhan yang btang ba gnyis pa dang /_/'dra bar gyur 
[\[12b.2\]]pa spre'u dang ni/_/rkun po rnams la bsdigs pa'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka nag pos ma brtags par stan la 'dug par ni rnam par 'byed pa las ji skad du rgyas par 'byung ba bzhin no/_/sbom mo dga' ldan mo yang de bzhin du sbyar ro/_/dge slong zhig gis 
[\[12b.3\]]pha lam du phul nas dus las 'das pa yang rnam par 'byed pa las ji skad 'byung ba bzhin no/_/dge slong rgan zhugs pha spad gnyis shig lhan cig tu dze ta'i tshal du dong ba las gtsug lag khang gi grong du phyin pa dang /_phas bu las 'dir gzig rnams kyis 'jigs 
[\[12b.4\]]par 'gyur gyi nang du 'khod do zhes smras pa dang /_bus de la rgan zhugs deng khyim pa dang lhan cig tu 'khod na de dag dang bdag cag tu bye brag ci yod ces smras pa dang /_bu khyod ni mel tshe byos shig kho bo nyal lo zhes smras so/_/de nas rgan zhugs de nyal ba dang /_
[\[12b.5\]]dge slong de yang nyal lo/_/rgan zhugs de sngur pa can zhig ste/_de'i sgras gzig 'ongs nas des de'i mgo bo nas bzung ba dang /_des sgra phyung nas gzig gis btang ste bros so/_/dge slong des me mar blangs nas brtags na dus las 'das te 'di snyam 
[\[12b.6\]]du des nang du 'khod do zhes zer na yang bdag gis de'i tshig ma mnyan pas gang cung zad 'di dus las 'das par gyur pa de thams cad ni bdag gis nyes so snyam ste/_dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_nyes pa med de/_
[\[12b.7\]]mel tshe byos shig_/dge slong zhig gis gsad sems kyis dge slong zhig 'jigs pa dang bcas pa'i gnas su btang ba dang /_de dus las 'das na phas pham par 'gyur ro/_/dus las ma 'das na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das grong khyer 
[\[13a\]]
[\[13a.1\]]yangs pa can na bzhugs te/_dge slong dag nags chen por nyin par spyod du dong ngo /_/des der spre'u zhig bsad pa dang /_dge slong zhig gis khyod la phas pham pa'i nyes pa byung ngo /_/dngos po gang gi phyir/_mi'i 'tsho ba dang bral ba dang /_mi dang 'dra ba 'di gnyis la bye 
[\[13a.2\]]brag ci yod ces smras so/_/dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_phas pham pa'i nyes pa med de/_ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/rkun po bsdigs pa yang rgyas par 'dul ba las ji ltar 'byung ba bzhin no/_/mdor na/_mgo 
[\[13a.3\]]ldan sngon gyi sman pa dang /_/'gegs te shi bar gyur pa dang /_/grong khyer yangs pa can gnas dang /_/'geg thag chad dang brgyugs pa'o/_/mnyan du yod pa na khyim bdag gzhan zhig las bu khye'u zhig btsas te chen por gyur pa dang /_mgo bos so phag 
[\[13a.4\]]bsregs pa tshogs pas de'i ming mgo ldan du btags so/_/de ji tsam na rab tu byung nas de don cig la grong du zhugs pa dang /_khyim bdag gzhan zhig gi chung ma zhig kyang khye'u zhig khrid de rjes bzhin du 'ongs nas de yang glo g.yas g.yon lta zhing song ngo /_/de la lug 
[\[13a.5\]]thug cig gis snyogs pa dang dge slong des kyang mgo bo btud de song ba las des kyang bdag la brdungs par shes nas lug thug des de la brdungs pa dang /_dge slong de khye'u'i steng du 'gyel nas khye'u dus las 'das so/_/dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas/_bcom ldan 
[\[13a.6\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_nyes pa ni med de/_dge slong spyod lam de lta bur ma 'gro bar gnya' shing srid du ltos shig_/sngon sman pa las rab tu byung ba gzhan zhig gis dge slong nad pa zhig gi drung du 'ongs pa dang /_des de la gtar kha thob shig ces smras nas/_des 
[\[13a.7\]]kyang de la gtsags bu cig btab ste/_gtsags bu de slar phyung ba dang /_dge slong de dus las 'das so/_/dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_nyes pa ni med de/_phyin chad dge slong dag ma bslabs par sman dpyad ma 
[\[13b\]]
[\[13b.1\]]byed cig_/dge slong nad pa gzhan zhig nad ma sos nas/_de 'di snyam du bdag 'tsho ste ci rung gis bdag nyid 'chi'o snyam du bsams te/_dge slong des nad g.yog la 'di skad du tshe dang ldan pa thag pa zhig byin cig ces smras so/_/des de la byin nas de 'gags pa dang /_de 
[\[13b.2\]]dus las 'das so/_/dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_nyes pa med de/_dge slong gis bab bab tu nad pa la thag pa ma sbyin cig_/dge slong zhig bsod snyoms spyod pa na grong khyer yangs pa can na gnas pa dag kyang mda' 
[\[13b.3\]]dang /_gzhu lag na thogs pa 'ongs nas dge slong des bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]kho bo ma gsad par 'di la 'phongs shig ces smras pa dang /_des mda' 'phangs nas de der bsad do/_/dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_nyes pa med 
[\[13b.4\]]de/_dge slong gis de skad ma bsgo shig_/dge slong nad pa gzhan zhig kyang rgyas par ni snga ma ji lta ba bzhin du thag pa khyer nas nags chen por song ba dang /_des der shing la 'dzegs nas tha gu des btags te des lkog ma zhags mig tu bcug nas lus mchongs pa 
[\[13b.5\]]dang /_thag pa chad nas de'i 'og na khyi bu byung ba zhig 'dug ste de'i steng du dge slong lhung ba dang /_khyi de bu dang bcas te dus las 'das te/_dge slong de dag gis thos nas rgyas par bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[13b.6\]]dge slong snga ma ni nyes par 'gyur gyi phyi ma la nyes pa med do/_/dge slong lus kyis 'di ltar brtsal ba ni ma byed cig_/byas na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gzhan zhig grong du don cig yod de/_des dge slong nad sos nas ring por ma lon pa zhig khrid de song ba 
[\[13b.7\]]dang /_lam du rkun pos skrag nas des de la tshe dang ldan pa skyen par 'dong zhes smras pa dang /_des mi nus so zhes smras nas/_dge slong gis tshur shog bcom ma re zhes smras nas/_des de ltar khrid de de yang grong du khrid pa dang dus las 'das so/_/de 'di 
[\[14a\]]
[\[14a.1\]]snyam du de ste bdag gis dge slong de khrid de ma 'ongs na shi bar mi 'gyur ro snyam bsams nas dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_nyes pa med de/_phyin chad dge slong gis nad pa nyam chung bar gyur pa de lta bu lam 
[\[14a.2\]]du ma bkri shig_/mdor na/_bde ldan 'du shes bsgo ba dang /_/dgra bcom bram ze dbang po dang /_/chos gos dag dang bsod snyoms dang /_/grong du nyer 'gro rnam pa gnyis/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yul br-i dzi'i 'od ma'i tshal gyi grong na bzhugs 
[\[14a.3\]]so/_/klung bde ldan gyi ngogs na gnas pa'i dge slong rnams la bslab pa'i gnas ma bcas pas las dang po pa la nyes pa med de/_bdag cag gis bslab pa'i gnas ma bcas pa na med la med bzhin du mi las bla mar gyur pa'i chos shig rigs mang po la smras 
[\[14a.4\]]na/_bdag cag gi las dang po pa gang yin snyam nas dogs pa dang /_'dzem pa dang 'gyod pa skyes so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag bslab pa'i gnas ma bcas pa na klung bde ldan gyi ngogs na gnas pa'i dge slong rnams kyis 
[\[14a.5\]]'das pa dang bcas pa ni thams cad las dang po pa yin pas/_las dang po pa la nyes pa med do/_/dge slong zhig gis mi la mi ma yin par 'du shes te med la med bzhin du mi las bla mar gyur pa'i chos smras pa dang /_dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas/_bcom 
[\[14a.6\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_mi la mir 'du shes na phas pham par 'gyur ro/_/mi ma yin pa la the tshom na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/mi ma yin pa la mir 'du shes na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/dge slong zhig gis khyim bdag cig la med la 
[\[14a.7\]]med bzhin du mi las bla mar gyur pa'i chos smras pa dang /_khyim bdag de yengs nas btsun pa ci gsung zhes smras so/_/dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_phas pham pa'i nyes pa ni med de/_nyes pa sbom por 
[\[14b\]]
[\[14b.1\]]'gyur ro/_/khyim bdag cig gis dge slong zhig la btsun pa khyod dgra bcom pa lags kyis chos gos dang /_bsod snyoms dang /_mal stan dang /_nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang /_yo byad kyi [(]mchag [,]mchog [)]rnams 'os so zhes smras pa dang /_cang mi smra bas khas blangs pa yin te nyes pa 
[\[14b.2\]]sbom por 'gyur ro/_/khyim bdag cig gis dge slong zhig la sdig pa med pa'i chos tshangs pa dang ldan nam zhes smras na cang mi smra bas khas blangs pa yin te/_nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/de ste btsun pa dgra bcom pa yin na bdag gi bsod snyoms bzhes shig ces 
[\[14b.3\]]smras pa dang /_de cang mi smra bas khas blangs pa yin te/_nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/dge slong zhig gzhan gyi grong du nye bar 'gro zhes de snga dro'i dus su sham thabs bgos te grong du song ba dang /_de la khyim bdag gis btsun pa de ste dgra bcom pa lags na nang du 
[\[14b.4\]]gshegs shig ces smras pa dang /_cang mi smra bar nang du 'ongs na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du stan la 'dug zan long la gsol cig_/rjes su yi rang ba gyis shig_/slar byung shig ces smras pa dang /_de cang mi smra na khas blangs pas nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/
[\[14b.5\]]dge slong zhig grong gzhan zhig na grong du nye bar 'gro ba yin te/_snga dro sham thabs bgos nas grong der song ba dang /_khyim bdag gis btsun pa de ste dgra bcom pa lags na khyim gyi nang du gshegs shig ces smras pa dang /_kho bo dgra bcom pa cung zad kyang ma lags 
[\[14b.6\]]na de ste khyod bzod na ni nang du mchi'o zhes smras na nyes pa med do/_/stan la bzhugs bshos dang skyu rum dang bca' ba rnams bzhes la gsol cig_/rjes su yi rang bar gyis shig_/slar byung shig ces smras pa dang /_kho bo ni dgra bcom pa cung zad kyang ma lags 
[\[14b.7\]]na de ste khyod kyis bzod na phyir 'byung ngo /_/zhes smras na nyes pa med do/_/khyim bdag gis dge slong zhig la btsun pa khyod dbang po'i sgo rnams ni shin tu bsdams shing legs par bsrungs pa'o zhes smras pa dang /_cang mi smra bar khas blangs na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur 
[\[15a\]]
[\[15a.1\]]ro/_/slar phyung shig ces smras pa las kho bo dgra bcom pa ni cung zad kyang ma lags so zhes smras nas phyir byung na nyes pa med do/_/mdor na/_drug byas dang ni mngon shes dang /_/me yi phung po med pa dang /_/ma 'da' gi ni sgra rnams dang /_/dri za dang ni 
[\[15a.2\]]lha ma yin/_/rdzing bu brdung dang 'ba' la ha/_/dka' thub 'og ma rgyun du gnyis/_/'thabs pa gnyis dang khye'u gnas bde bar 'ongs/_/mdzes pa dang ni 'di gnyis dang /_/mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa gnyis po rgyas par shes par bya'o/_/mdor na/_'char ka 
[\[15a.3\]]sbom po nam mkha' dang /_/mgo la lag pa gnyis kyis byugs/_/sgre'u dugs khang khrus las dang /_/gnas dang tshul bzhin ma yin pa'o/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/_bslab pa'i gnas ma bcas pa las dang po la nyes pa med par gyur pa na tshe dang ldan 
[\[15a.4\]]pa 'char ka 'di snyam du bdag gis ni bslab pa'i gnas ma bcas par lan mang zhig tu bsams bzhin du khu ba phyung na bdag gis las dang po gang yin snyam nas the tshom du gyur pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_bslab pa'i gnas ma bcas pa na 'char 
[\[15a.5\]]kas 'das pa dang bcas pa ni thams cad kyang las dang po pa ste/_las dang po pa ni nyes pa med do/_/dge slong zhig gis sbur bur phyung ngam/_nam mkha' la spyod dam/_nam mkha' la phyung ngam/_pho mtshan mnams sam/_btsir te dga' bar tshor ram/_btsir te 
[\[15a.6\]]btang phyung ngam/_'phags pa las btang ngam/_brtsams nas slar btang yang rung ste/_thams cad nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/dge slong zhig gis brlas bsngos te khu ba phyung ba dang /_dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[15a.7\]]nyes pa med do/_/dge slong zhig la bud med zhig gis lag pa gnyis kyis rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal ba dang /_des khu ba phyung ste/_dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_nyes pa med do/_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]sgra'i ma sa ga ma dge slong 
[\[15b\]]
[\[15b.1\]]rnams kyi rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te/_des tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal ba dang /_des de khu ba phyung nas [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]sgra'i ma sa ga ma'i mgo bor lhung ba dang /_de phyogs gcig tu song ste lag pa gnyis mgo la byugs nas 'di skad du tshangs pa 
[\[15b.2\]]mtshungs par spyod pa de dag ni bcom ldan 'das kyi drung na shin tu nyon mongs par tshangs par spyad pa spyod de bdag gis ni rnyed pa rab tu rnyed do zhes mgu bar brjod pa brjod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa de 'gyod pa skyes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_nyes pa med 
[\[15b.3\]]de/_sgre'u chongs shig_/dge slong zhig gis sgre'u la reg ste khu ba phyung ngo /_/dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_nyes pa med do/_/dge slong zhig dugs khang na las byed pa las khu ba byung ngo /_/dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes 
[\[15b.4\]]nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_nyes pa med do/_/dge slong zhig gnas nas gnas su 'chag pa na de khu ba byung ste/_dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge 'dun lhag ma'i nyes pa ni med kyis nyes pa sbom por 
[\[15b.5\]]'gyur ro/_/tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa'ang de bzhin no/_/mdor na/_bud med rnam pa lngar byas dang /_/gnod pa la yang rnam pa lnga/_/gzung ba la yang lngar byas te/_/dur khrod pa la drug tu'o/_/dge slong zhig la ma dang /_sring mo dang /_bu mo dang /_chung 
[\[15b.6\]]ma dang /_mdza' na mo rnams kyis 'grogs nas ring por ma lon par mgul nas 'khyud pa dang khu ba byung ngo /_/dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_nyes pa med do/_/dge slong zhig gis bud med me las phyung /_chu dang /_g.yang 
[\[15b.7\]]sa dang /_mtshon dang /_gcan gzan dang /_mi ma yin pa rnams las thar bar byas pa dang /_de khu ba byung ngo /_/dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_nyes pa med do/_/dge slong la bud med cig gis rkang pas bzung ngam/_byin pa 
[\[16a\]]
[\[16a.1\]]dang /_pus mo dang /_brla dang /_mdzub mo rnams kyis bzung ba dang /_de khu ba byung ngo /_/dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_nyes pa med do/_/dge slong zhig gis rnam par sngos pa las khu ba byung ba dang /_bam pa dang 
[\[16a.2\]]sbos pa dang rnam par dmar ba dang /_rnam par zhigs pa dang /_keng rus la khu ba phyung na thams cad dge 'dun gyi lhag mar 'gyur ro/_/mdor na/_'phrug pa 'drud pa mdzub mo dang /_/chu las sbrid par gyur pa dang /_/nang gi dgur ni byas pa dang /_/spyod pa rnam pa nyi shu'o/_/
[\[16a.3\]]dge slong zhig gis 'phrug pa las khu ba byung na nyes pa med do/_/'drud pa'ang de bzhin no/_/dge slong des pho mtshan las bzung ba dang /_khu ba byung nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/dge slong zhig bsod snyoms la 
[\[16a.4\]]spyod pa de na na chung gzhon nu zhig gdangs te 'dug par gyur pas 'phags pa tshur spyon kho mo la 'di dang 'di lta bu mdzod ces smras nas des der mdzub mo bcug go/_/dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/
[\[16a.5\]]dge slong zhig khrus byed pa na pho mtshan chu'i rgyun du bsdad pa dang de sbrid pas khu ba byung ngo /_/dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/dge slong zhig gis mgo bo dang /_rna ba dang /_sna'i nang du khu ba phyung 
[\[16a.6\]]na thams cad dge 'dun gyi lhag mar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong zhig gis rtsib logs dang /_rgyab dang /_brang dang /_lto gnyer dang /_skra'i nang du khu ba phyung na thams cad dge 'dun gyi lhag mar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis lag pa dang /_phrag pa dang /_dpung ba'i 
[\[16a.7\]]nang du khu ba phyung na thams cad dge 'dun gyi lhag mar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis rked pa dang /_byin pa dang /_rkang pa dang /_brla rnams kyi nang du khu ba phyung na thams cad dge 'dun gyi lhag mar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong zhig gis la ba dang /_phying ba dang /_par tang 
[\[16b\]]
[\[16b.1\]]dang /_sngas rnams su khu ba phyung na thams cad nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis khri dang /_khri'u dang /_shing stan dang /_khri bar du khu ba phyung na thams cad nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/dge slong zhig gis bum pa dang /_bum bu dang /_skyogs dang /_bum 
[\[16b.2\]]pa'i nang du khu ba phyung na thams cad nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/dge slong zhig gis rdo dang /_zhal zhal byas pa dang /_zhal zhal byas pa'i nang dang /_sgo gtan dang /_sha mer mer po rnams su khu ba phyung na thams cad nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/mdor na/_'char ka 
[\[16b.3\]]'du shes rkang pa phrag pa dang /_/ma dang sor mo med las phyung ba dang /_/rkang pa la sogs bzung ba dang /_/sngo la sogs las 'khyud pa'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas bslab pa'i gnas ma bcas pa na bdag gis bud med mang po dang lhan cig lus kyis kun tu reg par gyur na 
[\[16b.4\]]de dag la bdag gi las dang po pa ni gang yin snyam du bsams pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_bslab pa'i gnas ma bcas pa na 'char ka 'das pa dang bcas pa thams cad/_las dang po pa ste las dang po pa la nyes pa med do/_/dge slong zhig 
[\[16b.5\]]gis ni mi'i bud med la mi ma yin par 'du shes te bzung ngo /_/dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_mi la mir 'du shes na dge 'dun gyi lhag mar 'gyur ro/_/rgyas par ni rnam pa bzhir shes par bya'o/_/dge slong gis bud med cig la 
[\[16b.6\]]rkang pas phul na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/bud med kyis dge slong la rkang pas phul na nyes pa med do/_/dge slong gis bud med la phrag pas phul na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/bud med kyis dge slong la phrag pas phul na nyes pa med do/_/dge slong cig gis ma'i mgul 
[\[16b.7\]]nas 'khyud pa dang /_dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_nyes pa med do/_/dge slong zhig la bud med kyis sor mos bzung ngo /_/dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_nyes pa med do/_/dge 
[\[17a\]]
[\[17a.1\]]slong zhig gis bud med cig me dang /_chu dang /_g.yang sa dang /_mtshon dang /_gcan gzan dang /_mi ma yin pa rnams las thar bar byas so/_/dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_nyes pa med do/_/dge slong 
[\[17a.2\]]la bud med cig gis rkang pas bzung /_byin pa dang /_pus mo dang /_brla dang /_sor mos bzung ngo /_/dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_nyes pa med do/_/dge slong gis bud med kyi ro sngon por gyur pa'i mgul nas 'khyud/_
[\[17a.3\]]bam pa dang /_rul ba dang /_ro dmar por gyur pa dang /_'thor ba dang /_keng rus rnams kyi mgul nas 'khyud na thams cad nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/mdor na/_gred nas rdeg 'chos bu mo dang /_/mun pa bud med phrad pa dang /_/bud med gzhon nus 'grong 
[\[17a.4\]]gdangs pa/_/stan lnga pa dang bcu gsum mo/_/bud med cig gred de rdeg 'chos pa dang /_dge slong zhig gis bslang na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gred de rdeg 'chos pa las bud med cig gis bslang na nyes pa med do/_/dge slong rgan po zhig bu mo 
[\[17a.5\]]la ltar song nas bu mo de'i pang bar 'dug go/_/dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_nyes pa med do/_/dge slong zhig nam phyed na gcin gci zhing 'dug pa dang /_bud med cig kyang phyir byung ste 'ong ba dang /_mun pa'i nang du 
[\[17a.6\]]gdong thugs su phrad de de rdeg 'chos nas de'i steng du 'gyel to/_/dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_nyes pa med do/_/dge slong zhig grong du bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang /_na chung gzhon nu ma zhig 'grong gdangs te 
[\[17a.7\]]'dug nas des 'phags pa tshur spyon 'di dang 'di mdzod cig ces smras pa dang /_des der bong ba bcug_/bsod snyoms bcug pas btsangs/_khar bas btsogs shing rdeg na thams cad nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/dge slong zhig gis bud med la chos bshad 
[\[17b\]]
[\[17b.1\]]pa dang /_des de'i stan rkang pa dang /_brla dang /_byin pa dang /_rked pa dang /_rtsib logs dang /_rgyab dang /_lag pa dang /_phrag pa dang /_mgo rnams kyis phul na thams cad nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/mdor na/_'char ka bde dang 'du shes dang /_/
[\[17b.2\]]bung bu gnas ngan len pa dang /_/sring mo spyod pa ngan par bcas/_/kho bos mthong dang khyod kyi mdun/_/de dang de ste de yid mgu/_/bslab pa'i gnas ma bcas pa las dang po la nyes pa med pa na/_tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas 'di ltar bdag gis bud med 
[\[17b.3\]]mang zhig la gnas ngan len gyi tshig smras na/_bdag gi las dang po gang yin snyam nas the tshom du gyur pa ni rgyas par ro/_/des de ltar gyur pa dge slong rnams la smras pa dang /_dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[17b.4\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_bslab pa'i gnas ma bcas pa na 'char ka 'das pa dang bcas pa ni thams cad las dang po pa ste/_las dang po pa la ni nyes pa med do/_/dge slong zhig gis mi'i bud med la mi ma yin par 'du shes te gnas ngan len gyi tshig smras so/_/dge 
[\[17b.5\]]slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_mi la mir 'du shes na ni dge 'dun gyi lhag mar 'gyur ro/_/rgyas par ni dri bar bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul gyi chos su smra na ni nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/cho 'phrul med pa'i chos su smra na ni dge 
[\[17b.6\]]'dun gyi lhag mar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong zhig bud med cig gi drung du song nas 'di skad du sring mo rgya rna ru zhig byin cig ces smras pa dang /_'phags pa [(]khyad [,]khyod [)]la rgya rna ru ci zhig bgyi/_mos go nas 'phags pa rgya rna ru sta gon bgyis lags so/_/zhes smras pa dang /_dge slong 
[\[17b.7\]]de 'gyod pa skyes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/dge slong zhig grong du bsod snyoms la spyod pa na bud med cig 'grong gdangs te 'dug nas 'phags pa 'di bzhin mdzod ces smras pa dang /_khyod kyi lus skal ba 'di lta bu 
[\[18a\]]
[\[18a.1\]]dang mthun pas bong bu dang 'di ltar 'di bzhin byos shig_/dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge 'dun gyi lhag ma'i nyes pa med de/_nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/dge slong zhig rang bzhin gyis gnas ngan len gyi 
[\[18a.2\]]tshig smra ba zhig ste/_des bud med cig la gnas ngan len gyi tshig smras so/_/dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge 'dun gyi lhag ma'i nyes pa med de/_nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/dge slong ma zhig nang par sngar langs te/_
[\[18a.3\]]khrus byas mig sman gyis bskus/_mgo bshad de chos gos rnying chags byas pa gyon nas mnyan du yod par song ba dang /_dge slong zhig bsod snyoms spyod pa des de mthong nas des sring mo khyod skyes pa la steg cing spyad pa spyod do zhes smras so/_/dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas/_
[\[18a.4\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/dge slong rgan po zhig bu mo ltar song ba dang /_de'i bu mo log par spyod pa zhig ste/_des bu mo 'di ltar khyim gnyis 'jig par ma byed cig_/des mi thub pa na ji ltar bgyi zhes smras pa dang /_de ste 
[\[18a.5\]]mi thub na der mgal dum chug shig ces smras so/_/dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge 'dun gyi lhag ma'i nyes pa med de/_nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/dge slong zhig grong gzhan du grong du nye bar 'gro ba yin te/_de snga dro sham 
[\[18a.6\]]thabs bgos nas grong der song ba dang /_des khyim bdag de'i chung ma la sring mo kho bo la byin cig ces smras pa dang /_'phags pa khyod la ci gsol/_sring mo kho bo la de byin cig ces smras pa dang /_mos go ste 'phags pa sta gon bgyis so zhes smras pa dang /_dge 
[\[18a.7\]]slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/sring mo khyod la gang mthong ba'o/_/'phags pa bdag la ci zhig gzigs/_sring mo khyod la gang mthong ba de byin cig_/mos go nas 'phags pa sta gon bgyis so 
[\[18b\]]
[\[18b.1\]]zhes smras pa dang /_dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/sring mo khyod kyi mdun na ci yin pa de byin btsun pa bdag gi mdun na ci mchis/_sring mo khyod kyi mdun na gang yod pa de byin cig_/mos 
[\[18b.2\]]go nas 'phags pa sta gon bgyi'o zhes smras pa dang /_dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/dge slong zhig grong gzhan du grong du nye bar 'gro ba yin te/_de snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos bgos nas 
[\[18b.3\]]lhung bzed khyer te grong der song ba dang /_khyim pa de'i chung ma de la sring mo khyod kyis yid du 'ong ba gang yin pa de byin cig ces smras pa dang /_'phags pa bdag la yid du 'ong ba ci zhig mchis/_sring mo khyod kyi yid du 'ong ba gang yin pa de byin cig_/mos go nas 
[\[18b.4\]]'phags pa sta gon bgyi'o zhes smras pa dang /_dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge 'dun gyi lhag ma'i nyes pa med de/_nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro//_//'dul ba gzhung dam pa/_bam po nyi shu lnga 
[\[18b.5\]]pa/_mdor na/_dga' dang yid du 'ong ba dang /_/chu dang bca' ba rnams dang yang /_/thug pa dag dang bza' ba'i rnams/_/smras pa dag kyang de bzhin no/_/dge slong zhig grong gzhan zhig tu grong du nye bar 'gro ba yin te/_khyim bdag des chung ma la dge slong de ci 
[\[18b.6\]]dga' ba byin cig ces smras te song ngo /_/dge slong de'ang snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos bgos nas lhung bzed khyer te khyim der song ba dang /_bud med des btsun pa khyim bdag gi mchid nas dge slong de ci dgyes pa stsol cig ces mchi na/_'phags pa khyod ci dgyes/_
[\[18b.7\]]sring mo bdag ni khyod nyid la dga'o zhes smras pa dang /_mos kyang go nas 'phags pa sta gon bgyi'o zhes smras so/_/dge slong de bdag la dge 'dun gyi lhag ma'i nyes pa ma byung grang snyam du 'gyod pa skyes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge 'dun gyi 
[\[19a\]]
[\[19a.1\]]lhag ma'i nyes pa med de/_nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/yid du 'ong ngo zhes bya ba'ang de bzhin no/_/dge slong zhig grong gzhan zhig gi grong du nye bar 'gro ba yin te/_de snga dro sham thabs bgos nas grong der song ba dang /_khyim bdag de'i chung ma la sring mo 
[\[19a.2\]]bdag la chu lud cig ces smras pa dang /_btsun pa chab bcus te mchis gzhes shig_/sring mo khyod nyid chu yin no zhes smras pa dang /_mos kyang go nas 'phags pa sta gon bgyi'o zhes smras so/_/dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[19a.3\]]nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/sring mo bdag la bca' ba byin cig_/btsun pa chos kyi bar du gzhes shig_/sring mo bdag gi bca' ba khyod nyid yin no/_/des 'phags pa sta gon bgyi'o zhes smras so/_/dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[19a.4\]]bka' stsal pa/_nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/sring mo bdag la thug pa byin cig_/btsun pa bsgral gyi bar du gzhes shig_/sring mo khyod nyid kho bo'i thug pa'o/_/des 'phags pa sta gon bgyi'o zhes smras so/_/dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas/_bcom ldan 
[\[19a.5\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/dge slong zhig grong gzhan zhig gi grong du nye bar 'gro ba yin te/_de snga dro sham thabs bgos te grong der song nas/_des khyim bdag gi chung ma de la sring mo bdag la zan byin cig ces smras pa dang /_'phags pa 
[\[19a.6\]]bsgral gyi bar du gzhes shig_/sring mo khyod nyid bdag gi zan no/_/des go nas 'phags pa sta gon bgyi'o zhes smras so/_/dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/dge slong zhig gis bud med la gnas 
[\[19a.7\]]ngan len gyi tshig smras na/_de ma go nas mos btsun pa de ji skad gsung zhes dris so/_/dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge 'dun gyi lhag ma'i nyes pa med de/_nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/mdor na/[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]bu dang 
[\[19b\]]
[\[19b.1\]]spring ba dang /_/ming dang 'phags pa chung ma gsum/_/smad 'tshong gnyis dang bud med dang /_/gzhon nu skyes pa khu tshur ro/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dze ta'i tshal mgon med pa la zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/bslab pa'i gnas ma bcas 
[\[19b.2\]]te las dang po pa la nyes pa med pa ni [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]lta bu'i bu nag po de 'di snyam du bslab pa'i gnas ma bcas par bdag gis rigs mang zhig la smyan byas na bdag gi las dang po gang yin zhes sems la the tshom dang dogs pa dang 'gyod pa skyes nas/_des de ltar gyur pa dge 
[\[19b.3\]]slong rnams la smras pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_bslab pa'i gnas ma bcas pa na [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]lta bu'i bu nag pos 'das pa dang bcas pa thams cad las dang po pa ste las dang po pa la nyes pa med do/_/dge slong zhig grong gzhan zhig gi grong du 
[\[19b.4\]]nye bar 'gro ba yin te/_de grong der song ba dang /_khyim bdag des smras pa/_'phags pa bud med 'di zhes bgyi ba la tshur shog shig ces bgyi bar spyod dam/_de na re nus te lan slar skyel ma nus so zhes smras pa dang /_'o na dran te grub par ji ltar shes par 
[\[19b.5\]]bya/_gnas 'di zhes bya bar dge slong zhig gzhag go/_/dge slong de khyim gzhan zhig tu btang ste/_dge slong de yang slar byung ba mthong nas/_des de la tshe dang ldan pa skad cig 'di na 'dug shig ces smras pa dang /_de gnas der 'dug nas khyim bdag de phyir 
[\[19b.6\]]byung ste/_dge slong de la btsun pa legs so legs so zhes bya ba'i don de grub mod ces smras pa dang /_de ci zhig brda'o zhes smras so/_/dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_nyes pa [(]mad [,]med [)]do/_/dge slong zhig grong gzhan zhig 
[\[19b.7\]]tu grong du nye bar 'gro ba yin te/_de grong der phyin pa dang /_khyim bdag des smras pa/_dge slong de la 'phags pa bud med 'di zhes bgyi ba la 'di ltar tshur shog ces phrin bgyi bar spyod dam/_des nus so zhes smras nas song ste bsgo ba dang /_bud med des btsun pa kho 
[\[20a\]]
[\[20a.1\]]mo ni mi 'tshal to zhes nas de dag gi don de ma grub bo/_/dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge 'dun gyi lhag ma'i nyes pa med de/_nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/khyim bdag cig gi chung mas nyes pa 
[\[20a.2\]]cung zad cig byas te/_des de la rdog pas brdegs nas bskrad pa dang /_de na yang dge slong grong gzhan zhig gi grong du nye bar 'gro ba yin te/_des de gnyis bsdums nas de gnyis dum par gyur to/_/dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[20a.3\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_de ste rdo gsum bor ba'am shags bkye ste chung ma ma yin par bsgrags pa de dag gis smyan byas na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/dge slong zhig grong gzhan zhig gi grong du nye bar 'gro ba yin te/_de grong der phyin pa dang /_khyim bdag des smras pa/_
[\[20a.4\]]'phags pa smad 'tshong ma 'di zhes bgyi ba la tshur shog shig ces phrin bgyi bar spyod dam/_des nus so zhes smras nas der song ste mo la bsgo ba dang /_de 'di snyam du pha gir nyal du mi khom gyis nga nyal lo snyam du bsams nas de nyal ba las nam langs nas de gnyis kyi don de ma grub 
[\[20a.5\]]bo/_/dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge 'dun gyi lhag ma'i nyes pa ni med de/_nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/dge slong zhig grong gzhan zhig gi grong du nye bar 'gro ba yin te/_de grong der phyin pa dang /_khyim bdag des smras 
[\[20a.6\]]pa/_btsun pa smad 'tshong ma 'di zhes bgyi ba la tshur shog ces phrin bgyi bar spyod dam/_des nus so zhes smras nas de song ste bsgo ba dang /_mo yang 'ong ba las bar du gzhan gyis phrogs nas de gnyis kyi don de ma grub bo/_/dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[20a.7\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/dge slong zhig grong gzhan zhig gi grong du nye bar 'gro ba yin te/_de grong der phyin pa dang /_khyim bdag des smras pa/_'phags pa bud med 'di zhes bgyi ba la phrin 'di skad bgyi bar spyod dam/_des nus so zhes 
[\[20b\]]
[\[20b.1\]]smras te song nas de la bsgo ba dang /_de yang rgyan thogs te chas ma thag tu khyo 'ongs nas de gnyis kyi don ma grub bo/_/dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/khyim bdag gnyis shig mdza' ste de gnyis kyi 
[\[20b.2\]]chung ma sbrum par gyur pa dang /_de ste khyod las bu mo zhig btsas te kho bo las khye'u zhig btsas na khyod kyi bu mo kho bo'i khye'u la byin cig_/'on te kho bo'i bu mo la khyod kyi khye'u btsas na ni khyod kyi khye'u la sbyin no/_/de nas gcig la ni khye'u zhig btsas/_gcig la ni bu mo 
[\[20b.3\]]zhig btsas pa dang khyim bdag de dus las 'das so/_/de dus las 'das pas khyim srid kyang dmas par gyur te/_khyim bdag des bu mo mi sbyin no snyam du bsams pa dang /_khye'u des thos nas de na dge slong zhig grong gzhan du nye bar 'gro ba yin te/_grong der phyin pa 
[\[20b.4\]]dang /_de la khye'us smras pa/_'phags pa bu mo 'di zhes bgyi ba la khyod bdag gi ma dang pha gnyis kyis ma btsas par bdag la byin na bdag kyang las smin pas longs spyod dmas par gyur te/_longs spyod lta da rung yang rnyed par 'gyur gyis da yang kho bo ma btang 
[\[20b.5\]]shig ces phrin bgyi bar spyod dam/_des nus so zhes smras nas de song ste bsgo ba dang /_bu mo de ma dang pha'i drung nas bros te de'i drung du song nas de gnyis 'dus par gyur to/_/dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge 'dun gyi lhag ma'i 
[\[20b.6\]]nyes pa med de/_nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/khyim bdag cig gis bud med la kho mo la 'di bdag gi skabs phye shig ces smras pa na/_des bdag mi khom mo zhes smras pa dang /_khyod ji tsam na khom pa bdag gis ji ltar rtogs par bya/_kho mo la grong du nye bar 'gro 
[\[20b.7\]]ba'i dge slong zhig yod kyis der rgyab tu khu tshur cig brgyab pa na shes par mdzod cig_/dge slong de yang grong der 'ongs pa dang /_bud med des smras pa/_'phags pa khyim bdag 'di zhes bgyi ba'i rgyab tu khu tshur cig mdzad par spyod dam/_des nus so zhes smras te song 
[\[21a\]]
[\[21a.1\]]nas khyim bdag de'i rgyab tu khu tshur cig brgyab pa dang /_de btsun pa don grub kyis legs so legs so zhes smras pa dang /_'di ni ci zhig_/de ni brda'o/_/dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge 'dun gyi lhag 
[\[21a.2\]]ma'i nyes pa med de/_nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/mdor na/_grong du nyer 'gro rnam gnyis dang /_/gzhan yang dge 'dun rnams kyi gnyis/_/gos dang nad par gyur pa dang /_/gzhon nu ma dang rnam pa lnga/_/dge slong zhig grong gzhan gyi grong du nye bar 'gro ba 
[\[21a.3\]]yin te/_de grong der phyin nas bud med des smras pa/_'phags pa khyim bdag 'di zhes bya ba la tshur spyon zhes phrin bgyi bar spyod dam/_de ste dge 'dun la bshos sbyor nus na ni nus so zhes smras pa dang /_des rgyu sbyin nas dge slong des bshos sbyar te khyim bdag de 
[\[21a.4\]]bos pa dang /_de gnyis phrad par gyur to/_/dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge 'dun gyi lhag ma'i nyes pa ni med de nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/de ltar khyim bdag la yang de bzhin no/_/khyim bdag gi chung ma gzugs 
[\[21a.5\]]legs la sdug cing mdzes pa zhig gzhongs gyad gnas zhes bya ba'i blon po chen po gzhan zhig gis btus te/_des de la phrin pa du mar btang yang bud med de ma btub nas khyim bdag de dus las 'das so/_/de dus las 'das nas nyes pa cung zad cig gi phyir blon po chen 
[\[21a.6\]]po des de ci nas kyang phyir yang bdag cag gnod pa med par bde bar 'gyur ba'i thabs cung zad kyang med dam zhes smras pa dang /_thabs shig yod de/_blon po chen po des kho mo la bdas te/_des phrin pa lan du mar btang yang kho mo ma btub bo zhes zer ro/_/'o na bu mo 
[\[21a.7\]]spro bar gyis shig dang /_khyod gcig pu'i mthus skye bo 'di rnams bde bar 'gyur ro zhes smras pa dang /_mos de la 'o na da phrin pa su btang zhes smras nas bdag cag la grong du nye bar 'gro ba'i dge slong yod kyis de phrin par btang ngo /_/dge slong de yang grong der phyin nas 
[\[21b\]]
[\[21b.1\]]khyim bdag gi chung ma des smras pa/_'phags pa blon po chen po 'di zhes bgyi ba la kho mo'i khyim 'di dang /_kho mo'i nor 'di dang /_rdzas 'di dag thams cad 'bul gyis tshur spyon zhes bgyi bar spyod dam/_nus so zhes smras te/_de song nas de la bsgo ba dang /_de gnyis dum 
[\[21b.2\]]par gyur nas dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/khyim bdag gi chung ma zhig gis dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang zhig brtsigs te/_des der chos gos dang rjes su phan pa'i sman rnams 'bul ba las 
[\[21b.3\]]khyim bdag gi chung ma de dus las 'das nas/_de dus las 'das pa dang gtsug lag khang der chos gos dang rjes su phan pa'i sman rnams 'bul ba su yang med de/_dge slong dag gis khyim bdag de'i drung du song ste 'di skad du khyim bdag khyod kyi chung ma des gtsug lag khang ji ltar byas pa de ltar 
[\[21b.4\]]khyod kyis kyang chos gos dang rjes su phan pa dang nad pa'i sman cung zad mi 'bul lam zhes smras pa dang btsun pa chung ma de ni bsod nams dang ldan la mthu chen mo zhig ste/_gang cung zad smras pa de thams cad de'i phyir bgyid na/_de ste bdag la khyim bdag 'di zhes bya ba'i chung mas zan bskyal 
[\[21b.5\]]bar bgyi na de bzhin du da dung yang 'bul bar rngo thog go zhes smras pa dang /_dge slong de dag khyim bdag de'i chung ma'i drung du song nas 'di skad du khyim bdag gi chung ma khyod kyis khyim bdag 'di zhes bya ba la zan sbyin par nus sam zhes smras nas btsun pa mi nus so/_/kho mo'i khyim 'di 
[\[21b.6\]]nyid na bya ba mang du yod pa de nyid kyang mi nus na gzhan la bskyal ba lta ci smos/_de dag gis khyim bdag gi chung ma spro bar gyis shig_/mchod rten la 'bul lo/_/dge 'dun la 'bul bar 'gyur ro zhes bsgo ba dang /_khyim bdag gi chung ma'ang dad pa zhig ste/_des dad do zhes 
[\[21b.7\]]smras nas de gnyis yang dang yang du 'drul ba dang dum par gyur to/_/dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_nyes pa med do/_/khyim bdag cig gis dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang zhig brtsigs te des der chos gos dang na ba'i sman rnams 
[\[22a\]]
[\[22a.1\]]'bul zhing rjes su phan 'dogs pa las khyim bdag de dus las 'das te/_de yang rgyas par ni de bzhin no/_/khyim bdag gi chung ma des de ste khyim bdag 'di zhes bgyi ba'i phyir las rnams la btang na ni 'di bzhin du yang 'bul bar nus so zhes 
[\[22a.2\]]smras pa yang rgyas par te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_nyes pa med do/_/dge slong zhig grong gzhan zhig gi grong du nye bar 'gro ba yin te/_de grong der phyin nas/_khyim bdag gis smras pa/_'phags pa ming 'di zhes bgyi ba'i chung ma la 
[\[22a.3\]]tshur shog ces phrin bgyi bar spyod dam nus so zhes smras nas de song ste bsgo ba dang /_bud med de yang nad kyis btab/_khyim bdag de yang nad kyis btab par gyur te/_de gnyis ka nad kyis btab nas don de ma grub par gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[22a.4\]]nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/dge slong zhig grong gzhan zhig gi grong du nye bar 'gro ba yin te/_de grong der phyin pa dang /_bud med des smras pa/_'phags pa khyim bdag 'di zhes bya ba la tshur spyon zhes phrin bgyi bar spyod dam/_nus so zhes smras nas de der song ste 
[\[22a.5\]]de la bsgo ba dang /_khyim bdag de yang nad kyis btab par gyur/_bud med de yang nad kyis btab par gyur te/_gnyis ka nad kyis btab pas don de ma grub bo/_/dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/
[\[22a.6\]]dge slong zhig grong gzhan zhig gi grong du nye bar 'gro ba yin te/_de snga dro chos gos dang sham thabs bgos lhung bzed khyer te grong der phyin pa dang /_khyim bdag des smras pa/_khyim bdag 'di zhes bgyi ba la khyod kyi bu mo'am sring mo cig bdag gi bu la stsol cig ces phrin 
[\[22a.7\]]bgyi bar spyod dam/_nus so zhes smras nas/_de song ste bsgo ba dang /_khye'u de ni dus las 'das bu mo de sgur mor ram/_smyon mar gyur tam/_gzhan la byin par gyur nas/_dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_nyes pa sbom por 
[\[22b\]]
[\[22b.1\]]'gyur ro/_/dge slong zhig grong gzhan zhig gi grong du nye bar 'gro ba yin te/_snga dro chos gos dang sham thabs bgos nas lhung bzed khyer te grong der phyin pa dang /_rgyas par 'di yang de bzhin du bya ste/_khye'u de nad kyis btab pa dang bu mo de yang nad kyis btab bam/_sgur mor
