[\[72a\]]
[\[72a.1\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_thams cad kyis ma bgrang bar dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan dang /_gtsug lag khang skyong gnyis kyis grongs shig_/dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan dang /_khang skyong gnyis kyis kyang ma dran nas de dag nyes pa'i 
[\[72a.2\]]dmigs su gyur pa dang /_de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis/_bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_'jim pa'i ril bu bco lnga byos la srad bu la brgyus te zhog la nyin re re zhing drang bar gyis shig_/srad bu 'phyongs par gyur pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis 'od 
[\[72a.3\]]ma'i byang bu bco lnga byos la srad bu la brgyus te zhog la de la nyin gcig re re bzhin drongs shig ces gsungs pa dang /_dge slong thams cad kyis de bzhin drangs pa dang /_dran pa nyams par gyur te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan 
[\[72a.4\]]gyis drang bar gyis shig_/bram ze dang khyim bdag dag gis kyang der 'ongs nas 'phags pa de ring tshes grangs du zhes dris pa dang /_dge slong dag gis dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan dang /_khang skyong gis shes so zhes der gtad pa dang /_de dag gis smras pa/_
[\[72a.5\]]'phags pa de dag khyed kyi tshes grangs kyi mdzod pa yin nam/_khyed la dris na ci'i phyir gzhan la gtod/_khyed cag nyid kyis smros shig_/de dag la lan med nas cang mi zer bar 'khod do/_/bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams 'phya zhing gtsug lag khang nas byung 
[\[72a.6\]]ste dong ngo /_/de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_bram ze dang khyim bdag dag 'phya ba ni yus te/_de bas na dge 'dun gyi nang du tshes grangs brjod par bya'o snyam du dgongs nas/_dge 
[\[72a.7\]]slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams 'phya ba ni yus kyis/_de lta bas na dge 'dun gyi nang du tshes grangs brjod par gyis shig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge 'dun gyi nang du tshes grangs brjod par gyis shig ces bka' stsal pa dang /_
[\[72b\]]
[\[72b.1\]]dge slong rnams kyis dge 'dun gyi nang du tshes grangs brjod kyis zla ba phyed po 'dzin par mi byed do/_/khyim bdag dang bram ze dag gis smras pa/_'phags pa khyed kyis zla ba phyed po gzung ba yang mi shes te/_de ltar ma bzung na yar gyi zla ba phyed dang /_mar gyi zla ba phyed 
[\[72b.2\]]po ji lta bur shes par 'gyur/_de dag lan med nas cang mi smra bar 'khod do/_/de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_zla ba phyed po zung la tshes grangs brjod par bya'o/_/brjod pa ni 
[\[72b.3\]]'di bzhin du brjod par bya ste/_dge 'dun thams cad 'dus shing 'khod pa dang /_dge slong gcig gis rgan rims kyi dang por 'dug la rim gro dang bcas pas thal mo sbyar la tshig 'di skad du smros shig_/de ring ni zla ba mar gyi tshes gcig ste/_gtsug lag 
[\[72b.4\]]khang gi bdag po dang lha rnams kyi phyir tshigs su bcad pa re re rjod cig_/dge slong rnams kyis tshes grangs ni brjod kyis/_gtsug lag khang gi bdag po'i ming nas ma smos pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gtsug lag khang gi bdag po'i ming 
[\[72b.5\]]nas kyang brjod par bya'o/_/'di skad du sbyin bdag ming 'di zhes bya bas sang dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams bshos la spyan drangs kyis/_de la btsun pa rnams kyis dge ba'i yid kyis brtse bar mdzod cig_/gtsug lag khang gi bdag po la ji lta ba gzhan yang 
[\[72b.6\]]sbyin par byed pa dang /_sbyin pa'i bdag po la yang dge ba'i yid kyis brtse bar mdzod cig_/ji ltar dge ba'i yid kyis brtse bar mdzad pas na/_de'i dge ba'i chos rnams 'phel bar 'gyur gyis 'grib par mi 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du gzhan yang de na rkyen 
[\[72b.7\]]du gnas pa'i sems can thams cad la yang so so'i ming nas brjod par bya'o/_/dge slong dag gis kyang tshig thams cad rdzogs pa'i rjes la so so nas tshigs su bcad pa re re lhogs shig_/bram ze dang khyim bdag dag kyang der 'ongs nas/_'phags pa de 
[\[73a\]]
[\[73a.1\]]ring tshes du zhes dris pa dang /_de dag gis smras pa/_kye deng ni bco lnga'o/_/bram ze dang khyim bdag gis smras pa/_'phags pa 'jig rten pa thams cad kyi ni de ring bcu bzhi na khyed cag gi ji ltar na bco lnga/_ci khyed cag zhag 'dums par mi 
[\[73a.2\]]byed dam/_de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_zhag 'dums par yang byos shig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis zhag 'dums par byos shig ces gsungs pa dang /_dge slong dag 
[\[73a.3\]]zla ba phyed phyed cing zhag 'dums par byed do/_/bram ze dang khyim bdag dag kyang der lhags nas/_'phags pa de ring tshes grangs du zhes dris pa dang /_dge slong dag gis smras pa/_kye de ring nged kyi bcu bzhi'o/_/de dag gis yang smras pa/_'phags pa 
[\[73a.4\]]de ring 'jig rten pa thams cad kyi ni bco lnga na khyed cag gi ji ltar bcu bzhi/_ci khyed cag zla ba phyed phyed cing zhag re 'dums par byed dam/_de dag gis smras pa/_'dums par byed do/_/bram ze dang khyim bdag dag de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 
[\[73a.5\]]'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams 'phya ba ni yus te/_de lta bas na zla ba phyed phyed cing zhag 'dums par ma byed cig_/dus gcig gi zla ba phyed dang gnyis 'das shing zhag 'dums 
[\[73a.6\]]par byos shig_/de ltar na lo gcig la gso sbyin bcu bzhi pa ni drug go/_/de'i lhag ma rnams ni bco lnga pa'o/_/de nas yang bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams lhags nas/_'phags pa da ltar gyi zla ba 'di khyed kyi gang zhes dris pa dang /_dge slong dag gis 
[\[73a.7\]]smras pa/_kye nged kyi ni 'di dbyar zla tha [{]chungs so[,]chung ngo [}]/_/de dag gis smras pa/_'phags pa 'jig rten thams cad kyi ni zla ba 'di dbyar zla 'bring po na ji ltar na khyed kyi dbyar zla tha [{]chungs[,]chung[}]/_ci khyed kyis zla ba shol ma bor ram/_de dag gis smras pa/_ma bor ro/_/
[\[73b\]]
[\[73b.1\]]bram ze dang khyim bdag dag 'phya bar gyur nas/_de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams 'phya ba ni yus kyis/_de lta bas na zla ba shol bor 
[\[73b.2\]]cig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis zla ba shol bor cig ces gsungs pa dang /_dge slong dag gis lo re re zhing shol bor ro/_/bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams yang der lhags nas/_'phags pa da ltar gyi zla ba 'di khyed kyi gang zhes dris pa dang /_dge slong dag 
[\[73b.3\]]gis smras pa/_kye nged cag gi da ltar ni dbyar zla 'bring po'o/_/de dag gis yang smras pa/_'phags pa 'jig rten pa thams cad kyi ni zla ba 'di dbyar zla tha [{]chungs [,]chung [}]na/_khyed cag gi ji ltar dbyar zla 'bring po/_ci khyed cag lo re re zhing shol 'dor ram/_de dag 
[\[73b.4\]]gis smras pa/_'dor ro/_/bram ze dang khyim bdag dag 'phya nas de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag khyim bdag dang bram ze rnams 'phya ba ni yus kyis de lta bas 
[\[73b.5\]]na lo re re zhing zla ba shol ma 'dor bar lo drug drug cing shol bor cig_/drug lnga sum bcu ste/_de lta bur zhag dang /_zla ba phyed dang /_zla ba dang lor bsgres na mnyam par 'gyur te/_mu stegs can gyis glags btsal kyang glags mi rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/bcom 
[\[73b.6\]]ldan 'das kyis lo drug drug cing zla ba shol bor cig ces gsungs pa dang /_dge slong dag gis lo drug drug cing zla ba shol 'dor ro/_/rgyal po dag ni lo gsum gsum zhing shol 'dor bar byed do/_/dge slong dag gis de bzhin ma byas pa dang /_blon po dag 'phya 
[\[73b.7\]]bar gyur nas de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag blon po rnams 'phya ba ni yus te/_de lta bas na rgyal po'i gzhung bzhin du yang gyis shig_/skar ma mi mthun par 
[\[74a\]]
[\[74a.1\]]gyur te/_dge slong dag gis de lta bur mi sbyor ba dang /_skar ma rtsi ba la mkhas pa dag dge slong dag la 'phya nas de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong rnams 
[\[74a.2\]]skar ma rtsi ba dag 'phya ba ni yus te/_de lta bas na skar ma rtsi ba'i rjes su yang 'jug par yang byos shig_/gleng gzhi'i nang nas sgo dang po'i tshigs su bcad pa gnyis pa'o//_//mdor na/_yongs su dag pa gnyis bya dang /_/mtshams kyang rnam 
[\[74a.3\]]pa bzhir bya ste/_/de bzhin dad pa nam mkha' las/_/ma bkrol ba yang snga ma bzhin/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa na dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pA lis 
[\[74a.4\]]zhus pa/_btsun pa mtshams kyi nang na mchis pas mtshams kyi slad rol na mchis pa rnams la/_yongs su dag pa stsal du rung ngam/_u pA li mi rung ngo /_/btsun pa mtshams kyi slad rol na mchis pas mtshams kyi nang na mchis pa la yongs su dag pa 
[\[74a.5\]]stsal du rung ngam/_u pA li mi rung ngo /_/btsun pa mtshams kyi nang na mchis pas mtshams kyi slad rol na mchis pa'i las bgyir rung ngam/_u pA li mi rung ngo /_/btsun pa mtshams kyi slad rol na mchis pas mtshams kyi nang na mchis pa'i las bgyir 
[\[74a.6\]]rung ngam/_u pA li mi rung ngo /_/btsun pa las bgyid pa mtshams kyi nang na mchis bzhin du mtshams kyi slad rol na mchis pa rnams la las bgyir rung ngam/_u pA li mi rung ngo /_/btsun pa las bgyid pa mtshams kyi slad rol na mchis bzhin du mtshams kyi 
[\[74a.7\]]nang na mchis pa rnams la las bgyir rung ngam/_u pA li mi rung ngo /_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pA lis zhus pa/_btsun pa dad pa len pa'i dge slong gis dad pa blangs nas nam mkha' la mchis na dad pa blangs pa zhes bgyi'am/_ma 
[\[74b\]]
[\[74b.1\]]blangs pa zhes bgyi/_u pA li ma blangs pa ste/_gdod long shig_/btsun pa mtshams snga ma ma bkrol bar slad ma dgum du rung ngam/_u pA li mi rung ngo /_/gleng gzhi'i nang nas sgo dang po'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa gsum pa'o//_//
[\[74b.2\]]'dul ba gzhung dam pa/_bam po sum bcu rtsa gcig pa/_mdor na/_bskor ba dang ni 'jig pa dang /_/shing dang sa yi skye ba dang /_/mi 'byung ba dang 'byung ba dang /_/'chi ba yang ni de bzhin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa na dze ta'i 
[\[74b.3\]]tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs pa'i tshe na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pA lis zhus pa/_btsun pa mtshams la mtshams kyis bskor du rung ngam/_u pA li dkyil 'khor dang /_chus bskor ba dang /_dge slong ma'i 
[\[74b.4\]]dbyar mo khang ma gtogs par gzhan mi rung ngo /_/mtshams la mtshams kyis gzhig tu rung ngam/_u pA li mi rung ngo /_/btsun pa rnam pa dus mtshams gzhig par 'gyur/_/u pA li lnga ste/_dge 'dun thams cad kyis bor te dong ba dang /_dge 'dun thams 
[\[74b.5\]]cad mtshan 'phos pa dang /_dge 'dun thams cad slar babs pa dang /_dge 'dun thams cad dus byas pa dang /_gsol ba'i las dang lnga'o/_/btsun pa shing gcig las gtsug lag khang gnyis kyi mtshams dgum du rung ngam/_u pA li rung ngo /_/de bzhin 
[\[74b.6\]]du gtsug lag khang gsum mam bzhi yang rung ste/_shing nyid ni gcal bar byos shig_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gzhongs ka shir spyad pa spyod pa na gnas gzhan zhig tu 'dzum pa mdzad do/_/chos nyid kyis nam sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad pa 
[\[74b.7\]]de'i tshe 'od sngon po/_ser po/_dmar po/_dkar po'i rnams zhal nas 'byung ste/_kha cig ni 'og tu 'gro/_kha cig ni steng du 'gro/_'og tu song ba de rnams ni sems can dmyal ba yang 'tsho dang /_thig nag po dang /_kun dmyal dang /_'o dod 'bod pa dang /_
[\[75a\]]
[\[75a.1\]]'o dod 'bod pa chen po dang /_'tshig pa dang /_rab tu 'tshig pa dang /_bstir med pa dang /_chu bur dang /_rgyun du chu bur dang /_a ta ta dang /_ha ha pa dang /_hu hu pa dang /_ut+pal lta bu dang /_pad ma lta bu dang /_pad ma chen po lta bu 
[\[75a.2\]]rnams su phyin nas/_gang tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba de dag la bab na bsil bar gyur/_grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba de dag la bab na dro bar gyur te/_des sems can de dag la gnod pa ni bde ba'i khyad par du gyur pa dang /_de dag 'di snyam du kye ci bdag 
[\[75a.3\]]cag 'di nas shi 'phos sam/_'on te gzhan du skyes snyam du bsams pa dang /_de dag dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis sprul pa btang ngo /_/de dag gis sprul pa mthong ba dang 'di snyam du kye bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos pa yang med/_gud 
[\[75a.4\]]du skyes pa yang ma yin gyi/_sngon ma mthong ba'i sems can 'di'i mthus na/_bdag cag gnod pa las bde ba'i khyad par du gyur to snyam bsams nas de dag sprul pa la sems dad par gyur nas/_sems can dmyal ba'i gnod pa'i las med par gyur te/_
[\[75a.5\]]gang du bden pa rnams kyi snod du gyur pa der lha dang mi'i nang du mtshams 'dzin par gyur to/_/gang steng du song ba de ni rgyal chen bzhi'i lha dang sum bcu rtsa gsum dang /_mtshe ma dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /_
[\[75a.6\]]tshangs ris dang /_tshangs lha nye phan dang /_tshangs chen dang /_snang ba dang /_tshad med snang ba dang /_kun snang dang ba dang /_chung dge dang /_tshad med dge ba dang /_dge rgyas dang /_sprin med dang /_bsod nams 'phel dang /_'bras bu che dang /_mi che 
[\[75a.7\]]ba dang /_mi gdung ba dang /_shin tu mthong ba dang /_gya nom snang ba dang /_'og min la sogs par song nas mi rtag pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_stong pa dang /_bdag med pa brjod cing tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyang brjod do/_/'byung bar bya phyir 
[\[75b\]]
[\[75b.1\]]brtsam par byos/_/sangs rgyas bstan la brtson par byos/_/'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin/_/'chi bdag sde rnams gzhom par byos/_/gang zhig rab tu bag yod par/_/chos 'dul 'di la spyod 'gyur ba/_/skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs 
[\[75b.2\]]nas/_/sdug bsngal tha mar 'byin par 'gyur/_/de nas 'od zer de dag stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su bskor nas slar bcom ldan 'das kyi slad bzhin du 'brang zhing dong ngo /_/de ste bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa'i las lung ston par 
[\[75b.3\]]bzhed na ni bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/ma 'ongs pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni mdun du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/sems can dmyal bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/byol song 
[\[75b.4\]]du skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi rting par mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]su skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi mthe bor mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/mir skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni pus mo gnyis su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/stobs 
[\[75b.5\]]kyi 'khor los sgyur bar lung ston par bzhed na ni phyag g.yon pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni phyag g.yas pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/lhar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni lte bar mi snang 
[\[75b.6\]]bar 'gyur ro/_/nyan thos pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni zhal du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/rang byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni mdzod spur mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni 
[\[75b.7\]]gtsug tor du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas 'od zer de dag bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum du bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi gtsug tor du mi snang bar gyur to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo gnyis sbyar te/_bcom ldan 
[\[76a\]]
[\[76a.1\]]'das la gsol pa/_kha dog sna tshogs du ma stong /_/zhal nas byung ba mang po ste/_/phyogs kun des ni snang gyur pa/_/nyi ma ji ltar shar ba bzhin/_/tshigs su bcad de yang smras pa/_rgod dang zhum las rnam bral nga rgyal spangs/_/sangs 
[\[76a.2\]]rgyas skye bo mchog gi rgyur gyur pa/_/rkyen med dung dang pad mo'i rtsa ltar dkar/_/rgyal ba dgra thul 'dzum pa nye bar ston mi mdzad/_/de tshe rang gis mkhyen cing blo brtan pa/_/rgyal dbang nyan pa thos su re ba'i rnams/_/thub pa'i khyu mchog brtan pa'i gsung 
[\[76a.3\]]rab kyis/_/the tshom skyes pa dge bas bsal bar mdzod/_/rgya mtsho las ni ri rgyal brtan pa bzhin/_/yang dag mgon pos rgyu med 'dzum mi sten/_/brtan pas gang phyir 'dzum pa nyer bstan pa/_/de ni skye bo mang po thos par 'tshal/_/btsun pa de bzhin 
[\[76a.4\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu ma mchis rkyen ma mchis par 'dzum par mi mdzad na/_btsun pa ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis na 'dzum pa mdzad/_kun dga' bo de ni de bzhin no/_/de ni de bzhin te/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom 
[\[76a.5\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad do/_/kun dga' bo phyogs 'dir yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung bzhugs nas chos bstan to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo rings shing myur bar stod g.yogs 
[\[76a.6\]]bzhi ltab tu bltab ste bting nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gdan bting ba 'di la bzhugs par gsol/_gnas 'dir yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung dang /_da ltar gyi bcom ldan 'das dang yang dag 
[\[76a.7\]]par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gnyis bzhugs par 'gyur ro zhes gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/legs so kun dga' bo ngas ma smras par khyod kyis shes pa ni legs so zhes 
[\[76b\]]
[\[76b.1\]]gsungs nas gdan bting ba de la bzhugs so/_/bzhugs nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo phyogs 'di ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi gtsug lag khang ngo /_/'di ni 'chag sa'o/_/'di ni stegs 
[\[76b.2\]]bu'o/_/'di ni sgo khang ngo /_/'di ni zhabs 'khru ba'i sa'o/_/'di ni bsro khang ngo /_/'di ni rung ba'i khang pa'o/_/'di ni dugs khang ngo /_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pA lis zhus pa/_btsun pa rung ba'i sa zhes kyang bgyi 
[\[76b.3\]]mi rung ba'i sa zhes kyang bgyi na/_btsun pa ji tsam gyis na rung ba'i sar rig par bgyi/_u pA li dam pa'i chos yod pa'i tshe rung ba dang mi rung bar 'gyur/_dam pa'i chos zhig par gyur na thams cad kyang rung ba'o/_/btsun pa ji tsam gyis na dam pa'i chos 
[\[76b.4\]]mchis pa zhes bgyi/_ji tsam gyis na zhig pa zhes bgyi/_u pA li ji srid du las byed cing nan tan byed pa yang yod pa'i bar du ste/_las byed la nan tan byed pa yang yod na dam pa'i chos yod pa zhes bya'o/_/las kyang mi byed la nan tan byed pa dag 
[\[76b.5\]]kyang med na de ni dam pa'i chos zhig pa zhes bya'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pA lis zhus pa/_btsun pa mtshams kyi nang na rgyal ba bzhugs bzhin las bgyir rung ngam/_u pA li rung ngo /_/rgyal bas grangs su bskangs la las bgyir 
[\[76b.6\]]rung ngam/_u pA li mi rung ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_u pA li sangs rgyas dkon mchog kyang gzhan/_dge 'dun dkon mchog kyang gzhan no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pA lis zhus pa/_btsun pa mi bskyed pa'i mtshams bskyed du rung 
[\[76b.7\]]ngam/_u pA li mi rung ngo /_/btsun pa ji tsam gyis na mtshams bskyed du mi rung ba zhes bgyi/_u pA li gsum gyis te/_dkyil 'khor dang /_chus bskor ba dang /_mtshams kyi nang ngo /_/btsun pa chu klung 'bab pa'i pha rol tu mtshams dgum du dung 
[\[77a\]]
[\[77a.1\]]ngam/_u pA li mi rung ngo /_/de ste zam pa brtan po zhig yod na rung ngo /_/de ste btsun pa zam pa chad dam zhig par gyur na/_ji tsam gyis na mi 'jig pa zhes bgyi/_u pA li slar yang bcing bar bya ba'i sems yod na zhag bdun du 'jig 
[\[77a.2\]]par mi 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pA lis zhus pa/_btsun pa dge slong gis mtshams 'gum pa'i tshe las byed pa'i dge slong gum ste/_dus bgyis na bkum pa zhes bgyi'am ma bkum pa zhes bgyi/_u pA li mtshan 
[\[77a.3\]]ma rnams brjod la las kyang mang du byas na bcad pa zhes bya'o/_/bzlog pa ni ma bcad pa'o/_/btsun pa dge slong ma'i mtshams gcod pa'i tshe las bgyid pa'i dge slong ma gum ste/_dus bgyis na bkum pa zhes bgyi'am ma bkum pa zhes bgyi/_de ste u 
[\[77a.4\]]pA li mtshan ma rnams brjod la las kyang mang du byas na bcad pa zhes bya'o/_/bzlog pa ni ma bcad pa zhes bya'o/_/gleng gzhi'i nang nas sgo dang po'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa bzhi'o//_//mdor na/_sa dang nam mkhar las bya ba/_/mtshams dang 
[\[77a.5\]]yongs su dag pa dang /_/gnas gcig 'dug pa'i dge slong gis/_/las rnams kun la blta ba'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa na dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs pa'i tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[77a.6\]]la tshe dang ldan pa u pA lis zhus pa/_btsun pa sa la mchis pa dag gis sa la mchis pa dag dang lhan cig tu las bgyir rung ngam/_u pA li mi rung ngo /_/dad pa byin pa ni rung ste/_de ste sa la gnas pas grangs su tshang la sa la gnas pa'i rnams las dad 
[\[77a.7\]]pa yang blangs par gyur pa'o/_/btsun pa sa la mchis pas rtsig pa la mchis pa dang lhan cig tu las bgyir rung ngam/_u pA li mi rung ngo /_/dad pa byin pa ni rung ste/_de ste sa la gnas pa dag mang por tshang la rtsig pa la gnas pa'i rnams las dad pa yang 
[\[77b\]]
[\[77b.1\]]blangs par gyur pa'o/_/sa la mchis pa dag gis shing la mchis pa dag dang lhan cig tu las bgyir rung ngam/_u pA li mi rung ngo /_/dad pa byin pa ni rung ste/_de ste sa la gnas pa dag mang por tshang la shing la gnas pa rnams las dad pa yang blangs par 
[\[77b.2\]]gyur pa'o/_/btsun pa sa la mchis pa dag gis nam mkha' la mchis pa dag dang lhan cig tu las bgyir rung ngam/_u pA li mi rung ngo /_/btsun pa rtsig pa'i steng na mchis pa dag gis rtsig pa'i steng na mchis pa dag dang lhan cig tu las bgyir rung ngam/_
[\[77b.3\]]u pA li mi rung ngo /_/dad pa byin na rung ste/_de ste rtsig pa'i steng na gnas pa dag grangs su tshang la rtsig pa'i steng na gnas pa'i rnams las dad pa yang blangs par gyur pa'o/_/btsun pa rtsig pa'i steng na mchis pa dag gis sa la mchis pa dag dang 
[\[77b.4\]]lhan cig tu las bgyir rung ngam/_u pA li mi rung ngo /_/dad pa byin pa ni rung ste/_de ste rtsig pa'i steng na gnas pa dag gis grangs su tshang la sa la gnas pa'i rnams las dad pa yang blangs par gyur na'o/_/btsun pa rtsig pa'i steng na mchis pa dag gis 
[\[77b.5\]]shing gi steng na mchis pa dag dang lhan cig tu las bgyir rung ngam/_u pA li mi rung ngo /_/dad pa byin na rung ste/_de ste rtsig pa la gnas pa dag grangs su tshang la shing gi steng na gnas pa rnams las dad pa yang blangs par gyur pa'o/_/btsun pa rtsig pa'i 
[\[77b.6\]]steng na mchis pa dag gis nam mkha' la mchis pa dag dang lhan cig tu las bgyir rung ngam/_u pA li mi rung ngo /_/btsun pa shing la mchis pa dag gis shing la mchis pa dag dang lhan cig tu las bgyir rung ngam/_u pA li mi rung ngo /_/dad pa byin na 
[\[77b.7\]]rung ste/_de ste shing la gnas pa dag grangs su bskangs la shing la gnas pa'i rnams las dad pa yang blangs par gyur pa'o/_/shing la mchis pa dag gis sa la mchis pa dag dang lhan cig tu las bgyir rung ngam/_u pA li mi rung ngo /_/dad pa 
[\[78a\]]
[\[78a.1\]]byin na rung ste/_de ste shing la gnas pa dag gis grangs su bskangs la sa la gnas pa rnams las dad pa yang blangs par gyur pa'o/_/btsun pa shing la gnas pa dag gis rtsig pa la mchis pa dag dang lhan cig tu las bgyir rung ngam/_u 
[\[78a.2\]]pA li mi rung ngo /_/de ste shing la gnas pa dag gis grangs su bskangs la sa la gnas pa'i rnams las dad pa yang blangs par gyur na'o/_/btsun pa shing la mchis pa dag gis nam mkha' la mchis pa dag dang lhan cig tu las bgyir rung ngam/_
[\[78a.3\]]u pA li mi rung ngo /_/btsun pa nam mkha' la mchis pa dag gis nam mkha' la mchis pa dag dang lhan cig tu las bgyir rung ngam/_u pA li mi rung ngo /_/btsun pa nam mkha' la mchis pa dag gis sa la mchis pa dag dang lhan cig tu las 
[\[78a.4\]]bgyir rung ngam/_u pA li mi rung ngo /_/btsun pa nam mkha' la mchis pa dag gis rtsig pa la mchis pa dag dang lhan cig tu las bgyir rung ngam/_u pA li mi rung ngo /_/btsun pa nam mkha' la mchis pa dag gis shing la mchis pa dag dang 
[\[78a.5\]]lhan cig tu las bgyir rung ngam/_u pA li mi rung ngo /_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pA lis zhus pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dul ba 'di'i dkyil 'khor las las brgya rtsa gcig tu gsungs pa/_btsun pa las 
[\[78a.6\]]brgya rtsa gcig pa de'i nang nas las dus na dad pa dang bcas par 'gyur/_dus na dad pa ma mchis par 'gyur/_u pA li thams cad kyang dad pa dang bcas pa ste/_mtshams bcad pa ni ma gtogs so/_/btsun pa rdzu 'phrul lam sgyu mas mtshams 
[\[78a.7\]]dgum du rung ngam/_u pA li mi rung ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_u pA li rdzu 'phrul dang sgyu ma la ni tha snyad du gdags pa med do/_/btsun pa gza' dang /_'od zer dang /_nyi ma dang /_zla ba dang /_skar ma rnams kyis mtshams dgum du rung ngam/_
[\[78b\]]
[\[78b.1\]]u pA li mi rung ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_u pA li gza' dang /_'od zer dang /_nyi ma dang /_zla ba dang /_skar ma rnams mi brtan pa'i phyir ro/_/btsun pa chu rlabs kyis mtshams dgum du rung ngam/_u pA li mi rung ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_u 
[\[78b.2\]]pA li chu rlabs ni mi brtan pa'i phyir ro/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pA lis zhus pa/_btsun pa yongs su dag pa len pa'i dge slong gis yongs su dag pa blangs nas steng gi nam mkha' las mchis na des yongs su dag pa blangs 
[\[78b.3\]]pa zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li ma blangs pa ste/_gdod blang dgos so/_/btsun pa las bgyid pa gcig gis las kyi tshig kyang gcig gsol ba yang gcig gis gnas bzhir sde bzhi la las bgyir rung ngam/_u pA li rung ste/_de ste gnas bzhir 
[\[78b.4\]]dge slong gsum gsum gnas la/_gsol ba dang las kyang mngon du gyur cing der gsol bar byed pa'i dge slong gis gnas bzhi'i mtshams su sab mo'am/_re lde'am/_khri 'am/_gzhan dag kyang rung /_des mnan te de'i steng du 'dug nas las bya'o/_/
[\[78b.5\]]las byed pa de nyid de dag gi grangs su skong ba'o/_/btsun pa dge slong gcig gis gnas gcig tu mchis la gnas bzhir las bgyir rung ngam/_u pA li rung ste/_de yang gnas bzhir 'di lta ste/_bsdigs pa'i las dang /_smad pa dang /_bskrad 
[\[78b.6\]]pa dang /_slar bsdum pa dang /_ma mthong ba'i phyir spang ba dang /_slar las mi byed pas spang ba'i las dang /_sdig pa la lta ba slar ma btang bas spang ba'i las dang /_chad pa'i las de rnams la mngon du gnas par gyur la/_las byed pa'i dge slong gis 
[\[78b.7\]]gnas bzhi'i mtshams sab mo'am re ldes mnan te 'dug pa'o/_/gleng gzhi'i sgo dang po'i tshigs su bcad pa lnga pa'o//_//mdor na/_phyed dang gsum las 'das pa dang /_/phyed dang gsum yang ri yi steng /_/dge 'dun bye ba skya rengs dang /_/
[\[79a\]]
[\[79a.1\]]mtshams kyi nang du byin gyis brlabs/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa na dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pA lis zhus pa/_btsun pa 
[\[79a.2\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis mtshams chen po chod cig ces gsungs na/_btsun pa mtshams chen po de'i tshad ji tsam lags/_u pA li dpag tshad phyed dang gsum mo/_/btsun pa phyed dang gsum phan chad kyang mtshams zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li ma yin te/_dpag 
[\[79a.3\]]tshad phyed dang gsum tshun chad mtshams so/_/btsun pa 'og gi khams kyi mtshams gang lags/_u pA li ji tsam chu la thug par gyur pa'i bar du'o/_/btsun pa dpag tshad phyed dang gsum las 'das te/_chu la thug par gyur na ci de yang mtshams zhes 
[\[79a.4\]]bgyi'am/_u pA li ma yin no/_/dpag tshad phyed dang gsum tshun chad ni mtshams yin gyi/_de phan chad ni mtshams ma yin no/_/btsun pa steng gi khams su mtshams gang lags/_u pA li ji tsam shing gi rtse mo 'am rtsig pa'i steng la thug par 
[\[79a.5\]]gyur pa'i bar du'o/_/btsun pa dpag tshad phyed dang gsum phan chad kyi shing gi rtse mo 'am/_rtsig pa'i steng du gyur na ci de yang mtshams zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li ma yin no/_/u pA li dpag tshad phyed dang gsum tshun chad ni mtshams so/_/de phan 
[\[79a.6\]]chad ni mtshams ma yin no/_/btsun pa ri'i mtshams gang lags/_u pA li ji tsam chus bskor ba la thug pa'i bar du'o/_/btsun pa dpag tshad phyed dang gsum phan chad gcig tu chus bskor bar gyur na ci de yang mtshams zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li 
[\[79a.7\]]ma yin no/_/u pA li dpag tshad phyed dang gsum tshun chad ni mtshams so/_/de phan chad ni mtshams ma yin no/_/btsun pa dbyar gyi nang du dge 'dun bye ste/_de na dge slong zhig zhag bdun du byin gyis brlabs te/_bdag chos la phyogs par 
[\[79b\]]
[\[79b.1\]]bsams bzhin du chos ma lags pa'i phyogs kyi nang du mchis na dbyar chad pa zhes bgyi'am/_dbyar ma chad pa zhes bgyi/_u pA li de ste de dag gis lta ba la yang dad la der song nas/_skya rengs shar na dbyar chad pa zhes bya'o/_/de ste lta ba la yang 
[\[79b.2\]]ma dad la der song nas/_skya rengs ma shar na de dbyar ma chad pa zhes bya'o/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis dbyar tshul na gnas pa'i tshe/_dge slong gis zhag bdun du byin gyis brlabs te/_mtshams kyi slad rol du song shig ces gsungs 
[\[79b.3\]]na/_gang du byin gyis brlab par bgyi/_u pA li mtshams kyi nang du'o/_/ji lta bur bgyi/_dge slong gi mdun du 'dug nas thal mo sbyar ba bya ste/_tshig 'di skad ces smros shig_/dgongs shig tshe dang ldan pa bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi 
[\[79b.4\]]ba mtshams kyi nang gnas 'dir dbyar dang po'am tha ma yang rung ste tshul du zhugs pa las/_bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge 'dun gyi don la mtshams kyi slad rol du mchi ba'i slad du zhag bdun byin gyis brlabs te/_bdag dbyar 'dir ro/_/
[\[79b.5\]]bdag dbyar 'dir gnas so zhes kun rgyas par bya ste snga ma bzhin no/_/gleng gzhi'i sgo dang po'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa drug go/_//mdor na/_sde lnga rnams te bsams bzhin du/_/kun rgyu gnyen la'ang de bzhin te/_/lung la the tshom 
[\[79b.6\]]byung ba dang /_/ma thob phyir yang 'gro ba'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa na dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pA lis zhus pa/_btsun pa 
[\[79b.7\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis dbyar tshul du 'jug par gyis shig ces gsungs na/_gang dag tshul du 'jug par bgyi/_u pA li de ni lnga ste/_dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge slob ma dang /_dge tshul pha dang /_dge tshul ma'o/_/ji ltar 'jug par 
[\[80a\]]
[\[80a.1\]]bgyi/_thams cad kyang snga ma bzhin du'o/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis zhag bdun du byin gyis brlab par byas na/_dge bsnyen gyi don la mtshams kyi slad rol du song shig ces gsungs na/_btsun pa de ste mu stegs can zhig mchis na/_
[\[80a.2\]]de'i don la yang mchi bar bgyi'am/_u pA li de ste sdig pa la lta ba de las dbral bar 'dod na 'gro bar bya'o/_/btsun pa gnyen zhig mchis na/_de'i don la yang mchi bar bgyi'am/_'gro bar bya'o/_/btsun pa dge slong zhig gzhung la the tshom mam dogs 
[\[80a.3\]]pa zhig mchis na/_de yang mchi bar bgyi'am/_u pA li de yang 'gro bar bya'o/_/btsun pa dge slong gis ma thob pa las thob pa'i slad du/_ma chud pa las chud pa'i slad du/_mngon du ma bgyis pa las mngon du bgyi ba'i slad du/_the tshom mam dogs 
[\[80a.4\]]pa zhig mchis na/_de yang mchi bar bgyi'am/_u pA li de yang 'gro bar bya'o/_/gleng gzhi'i sgo dang po'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa bdun no//_//mdor na/_ma dras gos kyang de bzhin te/_/'on te grong du 'gro ba dang /_/kun tu rgyu dang de bzhin pa/_/
[\[80a.5\]]gtan la bab na gong lugs so/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa na dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pA lis zhus pa/_btsun pa ma dras pa'i gos byin 
[\[80a.6\]]gyis brlab par rung ngam/_u pA li mi rung mod kyi rnam pa de lta bu'i rkyen gyis na rung ngo /_/btsun pa ma dras pa'i gos 'tshal nas grong du mchir rung ngam/_u pA li mi rung mod kyi de lta bu'i rkyen gyis na rung ngo /_/btsun pa ma dras pa'i gos 'tshal te/_khyim 
[\[80a.7\]]pa'i khyim du mchir rung ngam/_u pA li mi rung mod kyi de lta bu'i rkyen gyis na rung ngo /_/btsun pa ma dras pa'i gos 'tshal te/_khyim pa'i khyim du gnas su mchis su rung ngam/_u pA li mi rung mod kyi de lta bu'i rkyen gyis na rung ngo /_/btsun pa ma dras 
[\[80b\]]
[\[80b.1\]]pa'i gos 'tshal te/_kun tu rgyu ba'i khyim du mchir rung ngam/_u pA li mi rung mod kyi de lta bu'i rkyen gyis na rung ngo /_/btsun pa ma dras pa'i gos 'tshal te/_kun tu rgyu ba'i gnas su mchis su rung ngam/_u pA li mi rung mod kyi de lta bu'i rkyen gyis na rung ngo /_/
[\[80b.2\]]btsun pa ma dras pa'i gos 'tshal te/_slad rol du mchir rung ngam/_u pA li mi rung mod kyi de lta bu'i rkyen gyis na rung ngo /_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pA lis zhus pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis chos gos khru tshad du byos 
[\[80b.3\]]shig ces gsungs na/_btsun pa la la zhig khru thung zhing lus ring na des kyang khru tshad du bgyi'am/_u pA li de ni khru tshad du bya ba ma yin gyi/_de'i lus kyi tshad du byos shig_/btsun pa gang la thabs kyis chos gos mi langs na/_des ji ltar bgyi/_
[\[80b.4\]]u pA li des gong lugs su gyis la chongs shig_/gleng gzhi'i sgo dang po'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa brgyad pa'o//_//mdor na/_lham la rnam pa lngar bya ste/_/seng ge gcan gzan mi srun dang /_/'dug par yang ni mi rung ste/_/pags pa la 
[\[80b.5\]]ni nyal mi bya'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pA lis zhus pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bal glang cang 
[\[80b.6\]]shes kyi pags pa las bgyis pa'i lham ma 'chang shig gsungs na/_btsun pa ci bal glang phal gyi pags pa la yang lham bgyis te/_bcang bar mi bgyi'am/_u pA li de dag gi pags pa la yang lham byas te bcang bar mi bya'o/_/u pA li de 
[\[80b.7\]]ci'i phyir zhe na/_de dag kyang sna stobs dang ldan pa/_so stobs dang ldan pa/_rkang stobs dang ldan pa'o/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis rta cang shes kyi pags pa las bgyis pa'i lham ma 'chang shig ces gsungs na/_btsun pa ci rta phal gyi pags pa'i 
[\[81a\]]
[\[81a.1\]]lham yang bcang bar mi bgyi'am/_u pA li de'i pags pa'i lham yang bcang bar mi bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_u pA li de dag mgyogs pa dang ldan/_stobs dang ldan pa'i phyir ro/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis seng ge dang /_stag dang 
[\[81a.2\]]gzig gi pags pa las bgyis pa'i lham ma 'chang shig ces gsungs na/_btsun pa gcan gzan mi srun pa gzhan dag kyang mchis na/_de dag gi pags pa las bgyis pa'i lham bcang bar mi bgyi'am/_u pA li de dag gi pags pa la lham byas pa 
[\[81a.3\]]yang ma 'chang shig_/u pA li de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de dag kyang sen mo'i stobs dang ldan/_mche ba'i stobs dang ldan pa'i phyir ro/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis pags pa'i steng du ma 'dug shig ces gsungs na/_btsun pa ji tsam gyis na pags 
[\[81a.4\]]pa'i steng du mchis pa zhes bgyi/_u pA li de ni ji tsam rkub bzhag par gyur pas so/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis pags pa'i steng du ma nyal cig ces gsungs na/_btsun pa ji tsam gyis na pags pa'i steng du nyal ba zhes bgyi/_de ni u pA li 
[\[81a.5\]]ji tsam 'phres par gyur pa'o/_/gleng gzhi'i sgo dang po'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa dgu pa'o//_//mdor na/_sha rjen dang ni rtsab mo dang /_/yongs su btsags par gyur pa dang /_/gzhang 'brum gcad par mi bya ste/_/gtsug lag khang dang 
[\[81a.6\]]bca' ba'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa na dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pA lis zhus pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong 
[\[81a.7\]]se ka ta bro 'tshal ba la sha rjen byin cig ces gsungs na/_btsun pa su las blang bar bgyi/_u pA li de ni sha 'tshong ba rnam pa lnga las so/_/rnam pa lnga gang zhe na/_shen pa dang /_khyim bya gsod pa dang /_ri bya gsod pa dang /_phag gsod pa 
[\[81b\]]
[\[81b.1\]]dang /[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]gsod pa rnams so/_/'o na btsun pa sus blang zhing byin len bgyi/_u pA li dge bsnyen dad pas so/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/_de'i dus na dge slong gzhan zhig na bar gyur nas de sman pa'i drung du song ste/_nad med cig ces smras nas 
[\[81b.2\]]bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]bdag nad 'di dang 'di lta bu zhig gis btab na dpyad cig ston cig_/des 'phags pa mar 'thung shig dang 'tsho bar 'gyur ro zhes smras pa dang /_des bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo zhes smras pa dang /_sman pas khyod kyi ston 
[\[81b.3\]]pa ni thugs rje can yin gyis gnang bar 'gyur ro zhes smras pa dang /_de ltar gyur pa dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de ste sman pas mar gyis 'tsho bar 'gyur zhes bsgo na 'thung shig_/dge slong 
[\[81b.4\]]des mar 'thungs na skom gyis gzir bar gyur te/_des sman pa la bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]bdag ni skom pas gzir to/_/des smras pa 'phags pa rtsab mo skyur po 'thung shig_/des smras pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis dus ma yin pa'i zas ma gnang na ji ltar 'thung bar 
[\[81b.5\]]bya/_sman pas smras pa/_'phags pa khyod kyi ston pa ni thugs rje can yin te gnang du gdon mi za'o/_/de ltar gyur pa dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de ltar na rtsab mo skyur po 'thung shig 
[\[81b.6\]]ces rjes su gnang ba dang /_dge slong dag gis rtsab mo skyur po ji ltar btung ba mi shes so/_/de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag rtsab mo skyur po ni rnam pa 'di lnga'o/_/
[\[81b.7\]]lnga gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_'bras bu'i chang las tshar gyur pa dang /_'bru'i chang las tshar gyur pa dang /_zho'i chu dang /_dar ba dang /_rtsab mo dang lnga'o/_/de la 'bras bu'i chang las tshar gyur pa ni gang 'bras bu rnams las byas pa dang /_ma rung ste skyur por 
[\[82a\]]
[\[82a.1\]]gyur pa'o/_/'bru'i chang las tshar gyur pa ni gang 'bru rnams las sbyar nas ma rung ste skyur por gyur pa'o/_/zho'i chu ni zho las chu byung ba'o/_/dar ba'i khu ba ni dar ba zho'i chu lta bur gyur pa'o/_/rtsab mo ni rtsab mo nyid yin no/_/de dag gi nang du 
[\[82a.2\]]chus bslad la ras kyi nang du btsags te/_ji ltar mda' rgyu'i kha dog bzhin du gyur pa de ni dus dang /_dus ma yin pa dang /_na ba dang /_mi na ba'i dge slong dag btung bar bya ste/_de la the tshom ni ma byed cig_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/_de'i tshe na 
[\[82a.3\]]dge slong gzhan zhig gzhang 'brum gyi nad kyis btab nas des 'brum bu sen mos bcad pa dang /_de slar sdug bsngal zhing rtsub la tsha zhing gnod la na bar gyur pa dang /_de sdug bsngal gyis rab tu gzir nas des 'di snyam du bdag la bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[82a.4\]]sdug bsngal zhing dog pa dag tu gyur kyang ma dgongs snyam bsams pa dang /_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs rje chen pos bskul nas de'i gnas su byon te/_dge slong ci nyes zhes rmas pa dang /_de snying rje zhing mi dga' nas mig mchi mas gang mchil mas 
[\[82a.5\]]brnangs bzhin du tshig ngal nas/_bcom ldan 'das la ji ltar gyur pa rgyas par gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag ngas snga nas kyang gzhang 'brum ma gcod cig ces ma bsgo'am/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal 
[\[82a.6\]]lags so/_/'o na khyod kyis ci'i phyir de ltar bya/_bcom ldan 'das sdug bsngal gyis gzir ba'i slad du'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag dge slong 'di ni sdug bsngal gyis gzir bas na nyes pa med kyis/_
[\[82a.7\]]ngas yang 'di ltar bsgo ba ni dge slong dag gzhang 'brum gyi nad kyis gzir na sen mo la sogs pas bdag nyid kyis kyang ma gcad cig_/gzhan yang gcod du ma gzhug shig_/de la dpyad rnam pa gnyis su sbyar zhing bya ste/_sman dang sngags kyis so/_/dge slong gzhang 
[\[82b\]]
[\[82b.1\]]'brum gyi nad kyis gzir ba la sen mo la sogs pas bcad dam/_gcod du bcug na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shAkya'i grong 'dab tshong pa sbu bu can zhes bya ba na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe na khyim bdag gzhan zhig bdag 
[\[82b.2\]]nyid dang /_bdag nyid mos/_bdag nyid dga' nas gtsug lag khang zhig brtsigs te/_tshe dang ldan pa sgra can 'dzin gang zag gcig pu la phul lo/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa sgra can 'dzin ji srid cig gi bar du gtsug lag khang der gnas nas lhung 
[\[82b.3\]]bzed dang chos gos khyer te gzhongs spyod du song ngo /_/khyim bdag des 'phags pa sgra can 'dzin ji srid kyi bar du gtsug lag khang der gnas nas lhung bzed dang chos gos khyer te gzhongs spyod du song zhes thos so/_/de skad ces thos nas khyim bdag 
[\[82b.4\]]des gtsug lag khang de dge 'dun la phul lo/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa sgra can 'dzin ji srid dga' ba'i bar du gzhongs spyad nas lhung bzed dang chos gos khyer te/_shAkya'i grong 'dab tshong pa sbu bu can zhes bya ba gang na ba der spyod cing song ste/_rim bzhin 
[\[82b.5\]]du spyod pa spyod cing tshong pa sbu bu can zhes bya bar phyin pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa sgra can 'dzin gyis khyim bdag des gtsug lag khang de dge 'dun la phul lo zhes thos so/_/de skad ces thos nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[82b.6\]]kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas tshe dang ldan pa sgra can 'dzin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa 'di ni khyim bdag gzhan zhig bdag nyid dang /_bdag nyid mos/_
[\[82b.7\]]bdag nyid dga' nas gtsug lag khang zhig brtsigs te/_bdag gang zag gcig pu la stsal nas gtsug lag khang der bdag ji srid cig gi bar du mchis te/_lhung bzed dang chos gos 'tshal nas gzhongs spyod du mchis pa dang /_khyim bdag des 
[\[83a\]]
[\[83a.1\]]'phags pa sgra can 'dzin gtsug lag khang der ji srid cig gi bar du 'dug nas lhung bzed dang chos gos khyer te gzhongs spyod du song ngo zhes thos so/_/de skad thos pa dang /_khyim bdag des yang gtsug lag khang de dge 'dun la phul na btsun 
[\[83a.2\]]pa de la bdag gis da ji ltar bgyi zhes gsol pa dang /_sgra can 'dzin tshur shog_/khyim bdag de gang na ba der song ste drung du phyin pa dang /_khyim bdag de la 'di skad ces smros shig_/khyim bdag bdag gis lus dang ngag dang yid kyis nyes par gyur pa lta 
[\[83a.3\]]yod dam zhes smros shig_/btsun pa de bzhin du bgyi'o zhes tshe dang ldan pa sgra can 'dzin bcom ldan 'das las mnyan te/_khyim bdag de gang na ba der song nas phyin pa dang /_khyim bdag de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/khyim bdag bdag gis lus dang 
[\[83a.4\]]ngag dang yid kyis nyes par gyur pa lta yod dam/_'phags pa sgra can 'dzin gyis lus dang ngag dang yid kyi sgo nas cung zad tsam yang nongs par gyur pa ma mchis so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa sgra can 'dzin gyis khyim bdag de la legs par shin tu brtags 
[\[83a.5\]]shing smras te/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song nas drung du phyin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bdag gis khyim bdag de la khyim bdag bdag gis 
[\[83a.6\]]lus dang ngag dang yid kyis cung zad tsam yang nyes par gyur pa lta yod dam zhes bgyis na/_de 'di skad ces 'phags pa sgra can 'dzin khyod kyis lus dang ngag dang yid kyi sgo nas cung zad tsam yang nongs par bgyis pa ma mchis so zhes mchi'o/_/de'i 
[\[83a.7\]]tshe na tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs na bsil yab thogs te/_bcom ldan 'das la g.yob cing 'dug pa dang /_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la/_kun dga' bo song la shAkya'i grong 'dab 
[\[83b\]]
[\[83b.1\]]tshong pa sbu bu can zhes bya ba na gnas shing 'khod pa'i dge slong thams cad 'dun khang du sdus shig ces bka' stsal pa dang /_btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal lo zhes gsol nas/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das las mnyan te/_shAkya'i grong 
[\[83b.2\]]'dab tshong pa sbu bu can zhes bya ba na dge slong ji snyed gnas shing 'khod pa de dag thams cad 'dun khang du bsdus nas/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di 
[\[83b.3\]]skad du btsun pa bcom ldan 'das dus la bab par dgongs na shAkya'i grong 'dab tshong pa sbu bu can zhes bgyi ba na/_dge slong ji snyed gnas shing 'khod pa de dag thams cad 'dun khang du 'dus nas mchis so zhes gsol pa dang /_de nas bcom ldan 'das 'dun 
[\[83b.4\]]khang gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas/_dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi mdun na gdan bting ba la bzhugs so/_/bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag gang gis gang zag gcig la sbyin pa byin te/_gzhan la 
[\[83b.5\]]byin na chos ma yin par byin pa ste/_chos ma yin par blangs pa'o/_/mi rung bar spyod pa'o/_/gnyis las mang ba'am/_dge 'dun la byin na yang chos ma yin par byin pa'o/_/chos ma yin par blangs pa'o/_/mi rung bar spyod pa'o/_/dge 
[\[83b.6\]]slong dag gang gis gang zag gnyis la sbyin pa byin pa gcig la byin nam/_gzhan la'am/_gnyis la'am/_mang po la'am/_dge 'dun la byin na chos ma yin par byin pa'o/_/chos ma yin par blangs pa'o/_/mi rung bar spyod pa'o/_/dge 
[\[83b.7\]]slong dag gang gis gang zag mang po la sbyin pa byin na gcig la byin nam/_gnyis la'am/_mang po gzhan la'am/_dge 'dun la byin na chos ma yin par byin pa'o/_/chos ma yin par blangs pa'o/_/mi rung bar spyod pa'o/_/dge 'dun la 
[\[84a\]]
[\[84a.1\]]byin te gang zag gcig la byin nam/_gnyis la'am/_mang po la byin nam/_dge 'dun gzhan la byin na chos ma yin par byin pa'o/_/chos ma yin par blangs pa'o/_/mi rung bar spyod pa'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi 
[\[84a.2\]]dge 'dun dag bye ste/_phyogs dang phyogs ma yin par gnas pa las phyogs gcig la sbyin pa de gzhan la byin na chos ma yin par byin pa'o/_/chos ma yin par blangs pa'o/_/mi rung bar spyod pa'o/_/dge slong dag gang gis gang zag gcig la 
[\[84a.3\]]sbyin pa byin pa gzhan la ma byin na chos bzhin du byin pa'o/_/chos bzhin du blangs pa'o/_/rung bar spyod pa'o/_/gnyis la ma yin/_mang po la ma yin/_dge 'dun la ma byin na chos bzhin du byin pa'o/_/rung bar spyod pa'o/_/dge slong dag gang 
[\[84a.4\]]gis gang zag gnyis la sbyin pa byin pa de gcig la ma yin/_gzhan la ma yin/_mang po la ma yin/_dge 'dun la ma byin na chos bzhin du byin pa'o/_/chos bzhin du blangs pa'o/_/rung bar spyod pa'o/_/dge slong dag gang gis gang zag mang po la sbyin 
[\[84a.5\]]pa byin pa de gcig la ma byin gnyis la'am/_mang po gzhan la'am/_dge 'dun la ma byin na chos bzhin du byin pa'o/_/chos bzhin du blangs pa'o/_/rung bar spyod pa'o/_/dge slong dag gang gis dge 'dun la sbyin pa byin pa de gang zag gcig la ma byin/_
[\[84a.6\]]gnyis la'am/_mang po 'am/_dge 'dun gzhan la ma byin na chos bzhin du byin pa'o/_/chos bzhin du blangs pa'o/_/rung bar spyod pa'o/_/yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun bye ste/_phyogs dang phyogs ma yin par gnas pa la phyogs 
[\[84a.7\]]gcig la sbyin pa byin pa de gzhan la ma byin na chos bzhin du byin pa'o chos bzhin du blangs pa'o/_/rung bar spyod pa'o/_/dge slong dag rgyal po ni sa gzhi la dbang ngo /_/bdag po ni mal stan la dbang ngo /_/dge slong ni lhung bzed dang chos gos la dbang ngo /_/sbyin 
[\[84b\]]
[\[84b.1\]]pa byed pa dang /_sbyin pa'i bdag po ni bdag gis byin pa'i chos rnams la slar 'chos pa'i rigs kyi gzhan la sbyin par ni ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dge slong dag sbyin pa ni snga ma yin te/_phyi ma ni ma yin no/_/de bas na sgra can 'dzin la gtsug lag khang 
[\[84b.2\]]slar byin cig_/dge slong dag gang gis sbyin pa gzhan la byin pa de yang gzhan la byin na/_de lta bu'i rkyen ma gtogs te/_'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag gis kyang tshe dang ldan pa sgra can 'dzin la gtsug lag khang slar byin no/_/
[\[84b.3\]]'dul ba gzhung dam pa/_bam po sum bcu rtsa gnyis pa/_gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/_bcom ldan 'das kyis lo lnga pa dang /_lo drug pa dang /_gtsug lag khang gi dus ston dang /_dus ston chen po dag byos shig ces gsungs pa dang /_bram ze dang 
[\[84b.4\]]khyim bdag dag gis kyang de bzhin byed do/_/der yul so so na gnas pa'i dge slong dag kyang 'dus nas de dag la bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can dag gis bca' ba mang du byin pa dang /_de dag gis cung zad cig zos nas lhag ma de dge tshul pha dag la byin no/_/
[\[84b.5\]]de dag gis kyang phyi de nyin dge slong de dag la de nyid byin len byas pa dang /_de dag gis dge tshul pha dag la khyed cag gi bza' ba 'di gang nas 'ongs zhes dris pa dang /_de dag gis smras pa/_khyed cag gis khar rtsang bdag cag la byin pa de nyid lags so/_/dge 
[\[84b.6\]]slong rnams kyis nged kyis 'di khyed la byin pa yin no/_/zhes smras te the tshom du gyur nas mi len pa dang /_de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_re ba yod bzhin du des byin la re ba 
[\[84b.7\]]yod bzhin du slar zos na de dag gis byin ni nyes byas te/_zos na ltung ba'o/_/re ba yod bzhin du des byin la re ba med bzhin du slar zos na de dag gis byin pa'i tshe ni nyes byas/_zos na nyes pa med do/_/des re ba med bzhin du byin la re ba yod bzhin du 
[\[85a\]]
[\[85a.1\]]zos na de dag gis byin pa'i tshe ni nyes pa med/_zos na ltung ba'o/_/re ba med bzhin du byin la re ba med bzhin du zos na de dag gis byin pa'i tshe yang nyes pa med la za ba'i tshe yang nyes pa med do/_/gleng gzhi'i sgo dang po'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa bcu 
[\[85a.2\]]pa rdzogs te/_sgo dang po rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//mdor bsdus pa ste/_bsgo ba dang yang bsgrags pa dang /_/ma bting ba yang de bzhin te/_/bslab pa byin dang las byed dang /_/bzod par bya dang bskrad pa dang /_/chos dang mnyam pa'i tshul bzhin te/_/
[\[85a.3\]]rtsig pa chad pas gcad pa dang /_/mdo rnams bsdus pa'i gnyis pa'o/_/mdor na/_bsgo ba dris la lan glon pa'i/_/dge slong dus las 'das pa ste/_/mnyan du yod na rtsod pa dang /_/dge 'dun gnyis dang chos gos so/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[85a.4\]]'das mnyan du yod pa na dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/mnyan du yod pa na khyim bdag gzhan zhig 'dug pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma zhig blangs nas de de dang lhan cig tu rtse dga' yongs su spyod do/_/de rtse dga' 
[\[85a.5\]]zhing yongs su spyad pa las de'i chung ma sems can dang ldan par gyur te/_de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang bu pho zhig btsas te/_de zhag bdun gsum nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du btsas pa'i btsas ston chen po rgya cher byas nas rigs dang mthun par ming btags 
[\[85a.6\]]so/_/de dus phyi zhig na/_bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/_de yang dus phyi zhig na nad kyis btab ste/_dus las 'das pa dang /_dge slong dag gis de lhung bzed dang /_chos gos dang bcas te dur khrod du bor ba bram ze dang khyim bdag 
[\[85a.7\]]lam der byung ba dong ba de dag gis mthong nas/_de dag gcig la gcig gtam du 'dzer cing 'dong ste/_kye bdag cag khyim pa khyim na gnas pas thabs rnam pa du mas nor rdzas dag bsgrubs kyang snod spyad dang gos dag ni mi 'dor na dge sbyong shAkya'i bu 'di 
[\[85b\]]
[\[85b.1\]]dag ni sgo'i them pa brgya rgal zhing dka' bzhin du lto 'gengs shing bsod snyoms sgrub na ci'i phyir lhung bzed dang chos gos 'dor zhes smra ba na dge slong dag kyang de'i mdun nas tshur 'ongs pa dang /_de dag gis de dag la smras pa/_'phags pa bdag cag khyim pa 
[\[85b.2\]]khyim na gnas te/_thabs rnam pa du mas nor rdzas bsgrubs kyang snod spyad dang gos mi 'dor na khyed cag sgo'i them pa brgya rgal zhing dka' bzhin du lto 'gengs pa'i bsod snyoms bsgrubs te/_lhung bzed dang chos gos 'di ga las 'ong na de ci'i phyir khyed 
[\[85b.3\]]kyis dge slong 'di'i lhung bzed dang chos gos su bcas te dur khrod du bor zhes smras pa dang /_de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo zhes smras pa dang /_de dag cang mi zer bar dong ngo /_/de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag la smras pa dang /_dge slong dag gis 
[\[85b.4\]]bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lhung bzed dang chos gos su bcas te ma dor cig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis lhung bzed dang chos gos su bcas te ma dor cig ces gsungs pa dang /_dge slong dag gis gcer bur 
[\[85b.5\]]bor nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gcer bur ma dor bar smad g.yogs dang rngul gzan gyis dkris te bor cig_/de nas dge slong dag gis gos bzang po dang bor nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bzang po dang ma dor cig ces bka' stsal pa dang 
[\[85b.6\]]de dag gis ngan pa dang bor ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis ngan pa yang ma dor bar 'bring po dang bor cig ces bka' stsal to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis lhung bzed dang chos gos su bcas te ma dor cig ces bka' stsal pa dang /_dge slong dag gis ji ltar bya 
[\[85b.7\]]ba mi shes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gang phongs pa de la byin cig ces bka' stsal to/_/drug sde dag rtag tu phongs pa ltar byed nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis drug sde dag la ma sbyin par ji ltar rgan rims bzhin du byin cig ces bka' stsal pa 
[\[86a\]]
[\[86a.1\]]dang /_gsar bu dag ma thob par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dris pa la lan 'debs pa'i dge slong gis dge 'dun la bsgo la dge slong gi dge 'dun thams cad 'dus shing 'khod pa dang /_gtsug lag khang skyong gis dge 'dun gyi nang du rin 
[\[86a.2\]]thang bskyed par byos shig ces bka' stsal to/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/_mnyan du yod pa na dge slong gzhan zhig dus 'das nas de'i lhung bzed dang chos gos dge slong ma zhig gi lag tu bzhag go/_/dge slong dag gis de'i ro bsregs nas slar 
[\[86a.3\]]gtsug lag khang du phyin nas lhung bzed dang chos gos dag btsal na ma rnyed de/_de dag gis dge slong ma'i dbyar mo khang na dge slong ma ming 'di zhes bya ba zhig la yod par shes nas de dag gis dge slong ma'i dbyar mo khang du dong ste/_'phags ma dge slong 'di zhes 
[\[86a.4\]]bya ba dus 'das pa de'i lhung bzed dang chos gos 'di na gtams shing 'dug pa de tshur byin cig ces smras pa dang /_des smras pa/_'phags pa dge slong de gang du dus 'das nged kyi gtsug lag khang du dus las 'das so/_/'phags pa khyed kyi de na mchis 
[\[86a.5\]]pa ni khyed dbang /_bdag cag gi de na mchis pa ni bdag cag dbang ngo /_/ji ltar zhe na/_bdag cag gi yang chos kyi ming po lags so zhes smras pa dang /_de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[86a.6\]]dge slong gi lhung bzed dang chos gos ni dge slong dag dbang gis dge slong ma dag ma 'chang shig ces bka' stsal to/_/mnyan du yod pa na dge slong ma gzhan zhig dus las 'das nas de'i lhung bzed dang chos gos dge slong zhig la bzhag go/_/dge slong ma 
[\[86a.7\]]dag gis de'i ro bsregs nas/_dge slong ma'i dbyar mo khang du lhags te/_lhung bzed dang chos gos btsal na ma rnyed nas gtsug lag khang zhig na dge slong ming 'di zhes bya ba zhig la yod par shes nas/_de dag gtsug lag khang du 'ongs te dge slong dag 
[\[86b\]]
[\[86b.1\]]gi rkang pa la phyag 'tshal nas/_'phags pa dge slong ma ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dus las 'das te/_de'i lhung bzed dang chos gos 'di na mchis na/_de bdag cag 'tshal gyis slar stsol cig ces smras pa dang /_des smras pa/_dge slong ma de gang du 
[\[86b.2\]]dus las 'das/_bdag cag gi dbyar mo khang du dus las 'das so/_/de ltar na 'phags ma khyed kyi de na 'dug pa ni khyed dbang mod/_nged kyi de na yod pa ni nged dbang ba ste/_de yang nged kyi chos kyi sring mo yin no zhes smras pa dang /_de ltar gyur pa 
[\[86b.3\]]dge slong ma dag gis dge slong dag la smras pa dang /_dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis de ste dge slong ma'i lhung bzed dang chos gos yin na de dge slong ma dag gi yin te/_dge slong ma dag dbang bas na 
[\[86b.4\]]dge slong dag ma 'chang shig ces bka' stsal to/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/_mnyan du yod pa na dge slong gzhan zhig gzhongs spyad pa spyod cing ri brags kyi grong gzhan zhig tu phyin nas/_de khyim pa'i khyim zhig tu dus las 'das te/_de des 
[\[86b.5\]]dur khrod du bor nas lhung bzed dang chos gos sbas te bzhag go/_/dus phyi zhig na dge slong ma mang zhig gzhongs spyad pa spyod cing ri brags kyi grong der phyin pa dang /_khyim bdag des de dag mthong ste/_'phags ma bdag gi khyim du dge slong zhig dus 
[\[86b.6\]]las 'das pa'i lhung bzed dang chos gos 'di lags kyis snoms shig ces smras pa dang /_de dag gis smras pa/_khyim bdag 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang bas dge slong dbang ngo /_/de ltar gyur pa dge slong ma dag gis dge slong dag la smras so/_/
[\[86b.7\]]dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis gang na dge slong med pa de dag tu ni dge slong ma dag gis blang bar bya ste/_de la the tshom ma byed cig ces bka' stsal to/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/_mnyan du yod par 
[\[87a\]]
[\[87a.1\]]dge slong ma mang zhig gzhongs spyad pa spyod cing dong ba na de dag las dge slong ma zhig na bar gyur nas/_de dal bus 'gro zhing phyi nas 'ong ba las de lam stor te/_ri brags kyi grong gzhan zhig tu phyin nas de khyim pa'i khyim du dus las 'das so/_/des 
[\[87a.2\]]de dur khrod du bor nas lhung bzed dang chos gos sbas te bzhag go/_/de nas dus phyi zhig na dge slong mang zhig gzhongs spyad pa spyod cing ri brags kyi grong der phyin pa dang /_khyim bdag des de dag mthong nas 'phags pa dag bdag gi khyim du dge slong ma zhig 
[\[87a.3\]]dus las 'das te/_de'i lhung bzed dang chos gos 'di lags kyis snoms shig ces smras pa dang /_de dag gis smras pa/_khyim bdag bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ste/_'di dag ni dge slong ma dbang ngo /_/de ltar gyur pa dge slong rnams kyis 
[\[87a.4\]]bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis gang na dge slong ma med pa der ni dge slong rnams kyis blang bar bya ste/_de la the tshom ma byed cig ces bka' stsal to/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang 
[\[87a.5\]]ldan pa u pA lis zhus pa/_btsun pa dge slong zhig dus las 'das te/_de dbang ba'i lhung bzed dang chos gos khyim pa'i de na mchis na/_de gang dbang bcom ldan 'das kyis gang de sngar 'ongs pa dbang ngo zhes bka' stsal to/_/gnyis mchis na gang dbang /_
[\[87a.6\]]gang sngar bslangs pa'o/_/gnyis kas bslangs na gang dbang /_gang gis sngar thob pa'o/_/gnyis kas thob na gnyis ka dbang ngo /_/de ste gnyis kas thob na gang la khyim gyi bdag po dad de byin pa de dbang ngo /_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/_de'i tshe na 
[\[87a.7\]]dze ta'i tshal na dge slong gnyis shig 'thab par gyur te/_dge slong gzhan dag gis bskor cing 'khod do/_/bram ze dang khyim bdag gis de mthong nas/_de dag gis 'phags pa bdag cag gis khyim pa 'thab pa dag mthong ba yang bdag cag gis gcugs 
[\[87b\]]
[\[87b.1\]]par bya na khyed cag gis ci 'di mi gcugs par bskor te 'khod dam zhes smras pa dang /_de na gzhan dag gis smras pa/_'di dag nyid 'thab mo byed pa yin na ci'i phyir gcugs zhes smras pa dang /_de dag lan med nas cang mi zer bar 'khod do/_/de ltar gyur 
[\[87b.2\]]pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la bskor cing ma 'khod par gcugs par byos shig ces bka' stsal pa dang /_de dag gcugs kyang gtong du ma btub nas/_de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom 
[\[87b.3\]]ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis de ste gcugs kyang ma btub na spang ba'i las byos shig ces bka' stsal to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis spang ba'i las byos shig ces bka' stsal pa dang /_dus phyi zhig na dge slong gnyis 
[\[87b.4\]]shig nges pa'i gtam byed de/_de gnyis na re 'di ni 'thob pa'o/_/'di ni 'thob pa'o zhes nges pa'i gtam smra ba na gcig la gcig ngag rtsub po smras pa dang /_de gnyis kyang dge slong dag gis spang ba'i las byas nas/_de gnyis kyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[87b.5\]]dag bdag cag ni nges pa'i gtam smra na gcig la gcig ngag rtsub po smras su zad na/_ci'i phyir khyed kyis nged gnyis la spang ba'i las kyis bcad ces smras pa dang /_de dag gis tshe dang ldan pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'thab pa rnams la spang ba'i las byos shig 
[\[87b.6\]]ces gsungs pas na nged kyis khyed gnyis la spang ba'i las byas so zhes smras pa dang /_de dag cang mi smra bar 'khod do/_/de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de gnyis la spang ba'i las 
[\[87b.7\]]mi bya bar gcugs par byos shig_/de ste gnas 'cha' ba zhig na ni de'i mkhan po dang slob dpon gyis sgo shig_/de ste rgan pa zhig na ni des dge 'dun thams cad 'dus la rtsod pa zhi bar byos shig_/de ste des kyang ma slon na sdod de gnyis la spang ba'i las byos shig_/
[\[88a\]]
[\[88a.1\]]gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pA lis zhus pa/_btsun pa mtshams kyi bar du dge slong zhig dus las 'das na gum pa de'i yo byad rnams su dbang bar 'gyur/_u pA li de ni mgo gang logs su 
[\[88a.2\]]bor ba'o/_/btsun pa gnyis kar mgo bor na/_gang dbang bar 'gyur/_u pA li de ni gnyis ka'o/_/gleng gzhi'i sgo gnyis pa ste tshigs su bcad pa dang po'o//_//mdor na/_bsgrag par bya dang shing rta dang /_/de nas phreng ba gos rnams dang /_/dge 
[\[88a.3\]]'dun gos kyang de bzhin te/_/the tshom so so'i skye bo'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/mnyan du yod pa na ya mtshan can du ma gnas shing 'khod do/_/gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa na 
[\[88a.4\]]bzhugs pa de'i tshe na mu stegs can rnams kyi mthu nyams nas rnyed pa chung bar gyur te/_de dag gis ji tsam 'dod pa blangs nas mu stegs su bya ba bya bar brtsams pa dang /_khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin pa chos kyis nang par sngar langs nas bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i 
[\[88a.5\]]phyir 'gro'o/_/ji tsam dus phyi zhig na khyim bdag mgon med pa la zas sbyin pa nang par sngar langs nas dze ta'i tshal du song ba dang /_mu stegs can dag ci 'dod pa blangs te/_de dag gis de yang dag par bskul nas des bsams pa 'di dag ni ngan du smra ba'i chos dang 'dul 
[\[88a.6\]]ba'i mu stegs can dag ste/_ci 'dod pa dag bslangs te mu stegs can gyi bya ba byed de/_bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang mdo sde de dang de dag las ma dad pa dag ni dad pa phun sum tshogs par yang dag par bskul bar byos shig_/gzhug par byos shig_/dgod par 
[\[88a.7\]]byos shig ces gsungs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su gnang na ni bdag gis skye bo mang po dag kyang dge 'dun la yon 'bul ba la rab tu dgod do snyam du bsams nas/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo 
[\[88b\]]
[\[88b.1\]]bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa ngan du smra ba'i chos dang 'dul ba'i mu stegs can 'di dag ci 'dod pa blangs nas mu 
[\[88b.2\]]stegs su bgyi ba bgyid na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na ni de dang de dag tu zhes bya ba nas dge 'dun la yon 'bul bar dgod do zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin no/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de ltar na ngas khyim bdag rjes su gnang 
[\[88b.3\]]gis ci 'dod pa bslangs te/_sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun la bya ba byed par byos shig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis ci 'dod pa blangs te/_sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun la bya ba byos shig ces bka' stsal nas/_khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 
[\[88b.4\]]gyis yang dag par bskul bar brtsams pa dang /_bram ze dang khyim bdag dag gis 'phags pa dag kyang yang dag par bskul na ni bdag cag la bsod nams de bas kyang rab tu mang bar 'gyur ro zhes smras pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge 
[\[88b.5\]]slong dag gis kyang grogs gyis shig_/bram ze dang khyim bdag dag gis de ste bdag cag gi ming nas brjod na ni legs par 'gyur ro zhes smras pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis sbyin bdag gis byin na brjod par byos shig ces bka' stsal pa dang /_khyim bdag 
[\[88b.6\]]gis kyang brjod par byas nas bram ze dang khyim bdag gis de ste 'phags pa dag gis brjod na ni bdag cag la de bas kyang bsod nams mang du 'gyur ro zhes smras pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag gis kyang brjod par byos shig_/
[\[88b.7\]]bram ze dang khyim bdag dag gtsug lag khang du 'ongs nas phul ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis gtsug lag khang du yang brjod par byos shig ces bka' stsal to/_/rjod par byed pa de skye bo mang po dag gis bskor nas mi snang bar gyur pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[89a\]]
[\[89a.1\]]kyis shing rta'i steng du 'dzegs la brjod cig ces bka' stsal pa dang /_tsha ba dang char pa dang rlung rnams byung bar gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis khang bu rtseg ma byos shig ces bka' stsal to/_/skye bo mang po dag gis sgo bsgribs pas na/_
[\[89a.2\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sgo bzhi thod la brjod pa bzhi zhog shig_/de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin ci 'dod pa blangs nas gos zung mang po gos zung brgya stong mang po rnams bsogs pa dang /_des 'di snyam du gos mang zhig tshogs kyis da ni bdag 
[\[89a.3\]]gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dag bshos gsol la sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun rgan rims su yon dbul lo snyam bsams nas/_des dze ta'i tshal gos sna tshogs kyis brgyan te gos kyi phreng bas steng kun tu sbyangs nas 
[\[89a.4\]]srung ma yang bzhag ste/_mdza' bo dang gnyen dang phu nu dag kyang mgron du bos so/_/de nas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun du bcas te/_dze ta'i tshal du bshos la spyan drangs so/_/de nang par 
[\[89a.5\]]sngar langs te gdan bting nas bum pa chus bkang ste bzhag nas/_bcom ldan 'das dang nyan thos kyi dge 'dun du bcas te bshos gsol nas/_bcom ldan 'das la btsun pa 'jig rten na yon gnas su mchis zhes zhus pa dang /_khyim bdag gnyis te slob pa dang 
[\[89a.6\]]mi slob pa'o/_/de la yang khyim bdag slob pa la rnam pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad yod do/_/mi slob pa la rnam pa dgu'o/_/slob pa rnam pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad po gang zhe na/_rgyun du 'jug pa'i 'bras bu mngon du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa dang /_rgyun du zhugs pa dang /_lan gcig phyir 
[\[89a.7\]]'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa dang /_lan gcig phyir 'ong ba dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba dang /_dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu mngon du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa dang /_dad pas rjes su 'brang ba dang /_
[\[89b\]]
[\[89b.1\]]chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang /_dad pas rnam par grol ba dang /_lta bas thob pa dang /_gong nas gong du 'gro ba dang /_tshe gcig gis thogs pa dang /_bar ma dor mya ngan las 'da' ba dang /_skyes ma thag tu mya ngan las 'da' ba mngon par 'du byed pa dang bcas 
[\[89b.2\]]pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang /_mngon par 'dus ma byas pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang /_gong du 'phar ba rnams te 'di dag ni slob pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad ces bya'o/_/mi slob pa dgu gang zhe na/_chos 'gribs pa dang /_chos ma 'gribs pa 
[\[89b.3\]]dang /_gsang ba'i chos dang /_rjes su srung ba'i chos dang /_mi g.yo bar 'dug pa dang /_so sor rtogs nas skal ba can du mi 'gyur ba dang /_mi bskyod pa'i chos dang /_shes rab kyis rnam par grol ba dang /_gnyis ka'i cha las rnam par grol ba 'di 
[\[89b.4\]]dag ni mi slob pa dgu zhes bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces gsungs so/_/bde bar gshegs pas de skad gsungs nas/_ston pas yang gsungs pa/_lus dang ngag yid drang por gyur pa yi/_/slob dang mi slob 'jig rten 'di na bzhugs/_/
[\[89b.5\]]de dag sbyin zhing mchod par 'os pa ste/_/mchod pa'i zhing rab der byin 'bras bu che/_/de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin rgan rims kyi mdun du 'dug ste/_brjod pa bskos nas 'phags pa brjod pa'i tshe 'di skad du gang bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi dge 'dun 
[\[89b.6\]]la sbyin par rigs pa/_rab tu sbyin par rigs pa/_thal mo sbyar bar rigs pa/_phyag bya bar rigs pa/_bla na med pa'i bsod nams kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi yon gnas su gyur pa gang yin pa de dag la gos 'di dag 'bul gyis ci bder bzhes shig ces gsung 
[\[89b.7\]]shig_/de nas dge slong rjod par byed pa des rgan rims kyi mdun du 'dug la 'di skad du gson cig_/btsun pa'i dge 'dun rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi dge 'dun sbyin par rigs pa/_rab tu sbyin par rigs pa/_thal mo sbyar bar rigs pa/_phyag bya 
[\[90a\]]
[\[90a.1\]]bar rigs pa/_bla na med pa'i bsod nams kyi zhing /_'jig rten gyi yon gnas gang yin pa de dag la gos rnyed pa 'di dag 'bul gyis ci bder bzhes shig ces brjod do/_/de nas dge slong 'dod chags dang bral ba zhe sdang dang bral ba gti 
[\[90a.2\]]mug dang bral ba gang yin pa de dag ni 'di snyam du gyur to/_/khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin ni 'di skad du brjod de/_gang bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi dge 'dun sbyin par rigs pa/_rab tu sbyin par rigs pa/_thal mo sbyar bar rigs pa/_phyag bya bar 
[\[90a.3\]]rigs pa/_bla na med pa'i bsod nams kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi yon gnas de dag la gos rnyed pa rnams 'bul gyis ci bder bzhes shig ces brjod de/_bdag cag ni bla na med pa yin pas na bdag gis rnyed pa 'di dbang mod kyis/_bcom ldan 'das kyis dge 
[\[90a.4\]]slong dag khyed kyis dge ba rnams ni bcab par bya'o/_/sdig pa rnams ni bsgrag par bya'o zhes gsungs na/_bdag cag gos rnyed pa'i phyir bdag nyid brjod pa lta ga la rung /_bdag cag ni 'dod chags dang bral ba/_zhe sdang dang bral ba/_gti mug dang bral 
[\[90a.5\]]ba'o zhes smras nas cang mi zer bar 'khod do/_/kun tu sbyor ba'i lhag ma dang bcas pa gang yin pa de dag kyang 'di snyam du/_bla na med pa la bsngos pas na bdag cag ni kun tu sbyor ba'i lhag ma dang bcas pa yin pas bdag cag ni mi dbang ngo snyam bsams nas cang 
[\[90a.6\]]mi zer bar 'khod do/_/bcing ba thams cad kyis bcings pa gang yin pa de dag ni 'di snyam du/_bla na med pa la de 'bul lo snyam du bsams nas de dag cang mi smra bar 'khod do/_/kun tu sbyor ba'i lhag ma dang bcas pa dag kyang cang mi zer bar 'khod do/_/
[\[90a.7\]]bdag cag ni bcing ba thams cad kyis bcings pas na/_bdag cag ni thams cad kyi thams cad du mi dbang ngo snyam du bsams nas de dag kyang cang mi smra bar 'khod do/_/de'i tshe khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis gos phul ba de dag dge slong gcig 
[\[90b\]]
[\[90b.1\]]gis kyang ma blangs pa dang /_de yang 'di snyam du bdag 'phags pa'i dge 'dun dag gis lhung bzed khas phub par ma gyur grang snyam du bsams nas/_de'i lus skya bo bseng bseng po rid cing skem la rmya bar gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste drung du 
[\[90b.2\]]phyin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug ste/_khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis don de bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_sangs rgyas ni mkhyen bzhin du 'dri ste/_
[\[90b.3\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la/_kun dga' bo khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin pas dge slong dag la gos sbyar te byin na/_ci'i phyir ma blangs zhes rmas pa dang /_des btsun pa khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis/_'di 
[\[90b.4\]]skad du gang bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi dge 'dun sbyin par rigs pa/_rab tu sbyin par rigs pa/_thal mo sbyar bar bgyi ba nas de dag cang mi mchi bar mchis so zhes bgyi ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin brjod de/_de ltar na khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 
[\[90b.5\]]gyis stsal ba dge slong gcig gis kyang ma blangs so zhes gsol pa dang /_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la kun dga' bo song la mnyan du yod pa na dge slong ji snyed gnas shing 'khod pa de dag thams cad 'dun khang du sdus shig_/ces bka' 
[\[90b.6\]]stsal pa dang /_btsun pa de bzhin bgyi'o zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das las mnyan te/_mnyan du yod pa na dge slong ji snyed gnas shing 'khod pa de dag thams cad 'dun khang du bsogs nas/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin 
[\[90b.7\]]pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das da dus la bab par dgongs shig_/mnyan du 
[\[91a\]]
[\[91a.1\]]yod pa na dge slong ji snyed gnas shing mchis pa de dag thams cad 'dun khang du 'dus shing tshogs so zhes de skad ces gsol pa dang /_de nas bcom ldan 'das 'dun khang gang na ba der gshegs te byon pa dang /_gdan bting ba la bzhugs 
[\[91a.2\]]so/_/bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal te/_dge slong khyed khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis gos mang po bsdus te byin na ci'i phyir ma blangs zhes gsungs pa dang /_dge slong rnams cang mi zer bar 'khod 
[\[91a.3\]]do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni mkhyen bzhin du 'dri ba ste/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la yang kun dga' bo dge slong rnams ci'i phyir mi smra bar 'khod ces rmas pa dang /_de ltar gyur pa bcom ldan 'das la yang 
[\[91a.4\]]rgyas par gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag khyed nga'i drung du mya ngan las 'da' bar bsams te rab tu byung ngam/_btsun pa de bzhin no zhes gsol to/_/dge slong dag de lta bas na nga'i drung du mya 
[\[91a.5\]]ngan las 'da' bar bsams te rab tu byung ba de la ni ba na phrag stong ri ba'i gos dang /_mig lnga brgya yod pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa dang /_ro sna brgya dang ldan pa'i zas rnams rjes su gnang ngo /_/dge slong dag tshul khrims nyams pa dag ni dge 'dun gyi kun 
[\[91a.6\]]dga' ra ba la rkang pa'i rting pa gcig tsam yang yongs su spyad pa mi gnang ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshul khrims nyams pa'i gang zag la ni nyes pa'i dmigs 'di bcu yod de/_bcu gang zhe na/_tshul khrims kyis bdag smad pa dang /_gzhan dang lha dang 
[\[91a.7\]]ston pas smad pa dang /_tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa mkhas pa dang /_chos nyid kyis smad pa dang /_phyogs phyogs su sdig pa mi snyan pa'i sgra dang tshigs su bcad pas grags par 'gyur ba dang /_ma rtogs pa rnams rtogs par mi 'gyur ba dang /_rtogs 
[\[91b\]]
[\[91b.1\]]pa rnams nyams pa dang /_sngon thos pa rnams brjed par 'gyur ba dang /_rnam par 'gyod bzhin du dus byed pa dang /_lus dang bral nas shi ba'i 'og tu ngan 'gro ngan song du log par ltung nas sems can dmyal bar skye'o/_/'on kyang dge slong dag gis spyad 
[\[91b.2\]]pa ni bzhi ste/_bdag po med cing yongs su spyod pa dang /_byin pas yongs su spyod pa dang /_gnang bas yongs su spyod pa dang /_bu lon gyis yongs su spyod pa'o/_/de las dge slong 'dod chags dang bral/_zhe sdang dang bral/_gti mug dang bral 
[\[91b.3\]]ba de dag ni bdag po med cing yongs su spyod pa'o/_/kun tu sbyor ba'i lhag ma dang bcas pa dag ni byin pas yongs su spyod pa'o/_/so so'i skye bo dge ba can bsam gtan dang klog pa la zhugs pa rnams ni gnang bas yongs su spyod pa'o/_/le lo can dag 
[\[91b.4\]]ni bu lon gyis yongs su spyod pa'o/_/tshul khrims nyams pa ni yongs su spyod pa thams cad mi gnang ngo /_/de lta bas na rnyed pa zhig yod na dge 'dun gyis mnyam par bgo bar bya'o/_/gleng gzhi'i sgo gnyis pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa gnyis 
[\[91b.5\]]pa'o//_//mdor na/_bting ba dang ni ma bting ba/_/phyung ba dang yang ma phyung ba/_/de bzhin mtshams kyi phyi rol gnas/_/thos pa yi rang bsams pas so/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa na dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi 
[\[91b.6\]]kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pA lis zhus pa/_btsun pa dge 'dun gyis gtan pa bting ba dge slong gis shin tu myong bzhin du gtan pa bting bar mi 'gyur bar mchis sam/_u pA li 
[\[91b.7\]]yod de 'di lta ste/_dge 'dun gyi gtan pa 'ding ba'i tshe dge slong des dad pa ma byin la gnyid kyis log ste/_dge 'dun gyi gtan pa bting bar 'gyur ro/_/u pA li de ltar na dge slong gtan pa shin tu myong bzhin gtan pa bting bar mi 'gyur ro/_/btsun 
[\[92a\]]
[\[92a.1\]]pa dge 'dun gyi gtan pa shin tu ma myong bzhin du gtan pa bting bar 'gyur ba mchis sam/_u pA li yod de/_dge slong zhig gis dge 'dun gyi gtan pa bting ba'i tshe dad pa byin la nyal la dge 'dun gyis gtan pa yang bting bar 'gyur te/_
[\[92a.2\]]de ltar na dge 'dun gyi gtan pa bting ba shin tu ma myong ba yang gtan pa bting bar 'gyur ro/_/u pA li de bzhin du dge slong gis dge 'dun gyi gtan pa 'ding ba'i tshe dad pa byin pa la gnyid kyis log gam snyoms par zhugs pa ste/_shin tu ma myong yang gtan 
[\[92a.3\]]pa bting bar 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gtan pa 'byin pa'i tshe myong bar gyur kyang gtan pa ma phyung bar 'gyur ba mchis sam/_u pA li yod de/_'di lta ste/_dge slong gis dge 'dun gyi gtan pa 'ding ba'i tshe dad pa ma byin la gnyid 
[\[92a.4\]]kyis log gam snyoms par zhugs pa ste/_u pA li de ltar na dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gtan pa 'byin pa'i tshe myong bar gyur kyang gtan pa ma phyung bar 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa dge slong zhig gis dge 'dun gyi gtan pa 'byin pa'i tshe myong bar ma gyur kyang gtan pa phyung bar 'gyur 
[\[92a.5\]]ba mchis sam/_u pA li yod de/_'di ltar dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis gtan pa 'byin pa'i tshe dad pa byin la gnyid kyis log gam snyoms par zhugs sam/_mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song yang rung ste/_dge 'dun gyis gtan pa phyung ngo zhes thos te/_thos nas 
[\[92a.6\]]kyang legs par phyung ngo /_/shin tu byung ba'o zhes rjes su yi rang ba'o/_/gleng gzhi'i sgo gnyis pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa gsum pa'o//_//mdor na/_bslab pa byin dang tshul shing dang /_/gang la las rnams bya ba dang /_/bcu gnyis rnams la 
[\[92a.7\]]slar 'khyal dang /_/mi gtsang ba dang mi brtsan pa/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa na dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pA lis zhus pa/_btsun pa 
[\[92b\]]
[\[92b.1\]]bslab pa stsal bas/_tshul shing brim zhing las bgyir rung ngam/_u pA li mi rung ngo /_/ma ning dang za ma dang /_dge slong ma sun phyung ba dang /_pha bsad pa dang /_ma bsad pa dang /_dgra bcom pa bsad pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa la ngan 
[\[92b.2\]]sems kyis khrag phyung ba dang /_mu stegs can dang /_mu stegs can du song ba dang /_rkun gnas dang /_so sor gnas pa dang /_mi gnas pas tshul shing brim zhing las bgyir rung ngam/_u pA li mi rung ngo /_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[92b.3\]]gang la las bya ba de slar 'khyal yang mi brtsan no zhes gsungs na/_btsun pa gang la chos bzhin ma lags par las bgyis pa de ltar 'khyal na yang mi brtsan par 'gyur ram/_u pA li de ni brtsan no/_/btsun pa gang zag gis las bcu gnyis bskos pa'i 
[\[92b.4\]]tshe de dag 'di skad du nged cag la ma bsko shig ces mchi na/_ci de dag de ltar 'khyal ba yang mi brtsan nam/_u pA li brtsan no/_/de ni ngas chad pas gnas pa rnams kyi phyir bsams te gsungs so/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis mi gtsang ba rnams 
[\[92b.5\]]slar 'khyal na mi brtsan no zhes gsungs na/_btsun pa ji tsam gyis na mi gtsang ba zhes bgyi/_u pA li de ni gang la phas pham pa bzhi'i nang nas gang yang rung ba zhig byung bar gyur pa ste/_de tsam gyis na mi gtsang bar 'gyur ro/_/gleng gzhi'i sgo gnyis pa'i 
[\[92b.6\]]mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa bzhi pa'o//_//mdor na/_bslab pa byin dang las byed dang /_/rkun gnas kyang ni de bzhin te/_/bsnyen rdzogs mtshams kyi phyi rol dang /_/mngags te gtang bar mi bya ba'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa na 
[\[92b.7\]]dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pA lis zhus pa/_btsun pa las bgyid pa bslab pa stsal bas las bgyis na/_bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/_'on te ma bgyis pa zhes bgyi/_
[\[93a\]]
[\[93a.1\]]u pA li ma byas pa zhes bya ste/_slar yang bya dgos so/_/de bzhin du ma ning dang za ma dang mi gnas pa'i bar du snga ma bzhin du bya'o/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/_dge slong gzhan zhig la dge slong zhig bsnyen par rdzogs par 'dod 
[\[93a.2\]]nas des bsnyen par rdzogs par bya ba'i dge slong rnams sbran te/_des bsnyen par rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir des dge tshul pha de khrid de/_dkyil 'khor du dong nas dge slong dag dang lhan cig tu dkyil 'khor du phyin nas/_de mtshams kyi phyi rol du mngags 
[\[93a.3\]]te btang ba dang /_de gnyen dag gis khrid de song ngo /_/tshe dang ldan pa de dag rab tu 'byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs nas dge slong gi dngos por gyur pa'i bar chad du gyur pa dang /_de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa 
[\[93a.4\]]dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na dge slong dag gis bsnyen par rdzogs par 'dod pa de mtshams kyi phyi rol du ma mngags shig_/'di lta ste/_dge slong dag 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i bu rab dbang bskur ba'i 
[\[93a.5\]]rigs pa dbang ma bskur na rgyal tshab 'thob pa de rab tu bsrung bar bya ba dang /_rab tu bskyang bar bya ba de bzhin du dge slong gis bsnyen par rdzogs par 'dod pa de yang rab tu bsrung zhing bskyang ba'i rigs so/_/de lta bas na dge slong dag gis bsnyen par 
[\[93a.6\]]rdzogs par 'dod pa'i dge tshul pa de rnams mi thos pa'i nye 'khor tsam du spangs la/_mthong ba'i nye 'khor tsam du thal mo sbyar te mngon du lta bzhin zhog shig_/de ltar na nyes pa'i dmigs su mi 'gyur ro/_/gleng gzhi'i sgo gnyis pa'i mdo'i tshigs 
[\[93a.7\]]su bcad pa lnga pa'o//_//mdor na/_bzod pa gsol bar byed dang mtshams/_/spu bsnyal ba yang de bzhin no/_/thab mo rgod pa bsdigs pa dang /_/smad par bya dang rigs sun pa'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i 
[\[93b\]]
[\[93b.1\]]dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pA lis zhus pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bsdigs pa'i las bgyis pas bzod pa gsol cig ces gsungs na/_gang du 
[\[93b.2\]]bzod pa gsol bar bgyi/_u pA li de ni mtshams kyi nang du'o/_/ji ltar bzod pa gsol bar bgyi/_spu langs shing rab tu langs pa las dge 'dun la spu nyal bar byed pa byung bar stsol/_phyag 'tshal ba mngon du ston cing /_thab mo rgod pa de 
[\[93b.3\]]yang slar gtong ba'o/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis thab mo rgod pa'i dge slong dag la bsdigs pa'i las byos shig ces gsungs na/_de ste btsun pa de la bsdigs pa'i las bgyid pa'i tshe ma rangs par gyur na/_de la thabs ji ltar bgyi/_u pA li de'i yo 
[\[93b.4\]]byad dang rdzas las kha cig gis lhung bzed dang chos gos khyer cig_/kha cig gis ni bar bur gyi snod dag khyer la phyi rol du phyung ste bor cig_/de ste ka ba la 'jus na yang ka ba chod cig_/de ste sgo skyes la 'jus na yang sgo skyes phyung la de la ngo zlog mi phod pa 
[\[93b.5\]]ma byed cig_/de slar sus bcos par bgyi/_dge 'dun gyis so/_/su la bcos pa'i yo byad dgug_/sbyin bdag la slongs la de ste ma 'byor na dge 'dun thams cad kyi nor las byos shig_/de la the tshom du ma byed cig_/de ste btsun pa dge slong
