[\[93b.7\]]tshul pha dang /_dge tshul ma zhig thab mo rgod par gyur pa dang /_de dag la yang bsdigs par bgyi'am/_de la the tshom du ma byed cig ces bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin no/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs sun pa'i dge slong la bskrad pa'i las 
[\[94a\]]
[\[94a.1\]]byos shig ces gsungs na/_de ste btsun pa de la bskrad pa'i las bgyid pa'i tshe de ma rangs par gyur na de la ji ltar bgyi/_u pA li de la yo byad rnams zhes bya ba nas/_the tshom ma byed cig ces bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin no/_/de bzhin du dge slong 
[\[94a.2\]]mas rigs sun pa dang /_dge slob ma dang /_dge tshul pha dang /_dge tshul ma dag la yang bskrad pa'i las bgyi'am/_de la the tshom du ma byed cig ces bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin no/_/gleng gzhi'i sgo gnyis pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa drug pa'o//_//
[\[94a.3\]]'dul ba gzhung dam pa/_bam po sum bcu rtsa gsum pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis tshul khrims nyams pa'i dge slong skrod cig ces gsungs na/_sus bskrad par bgyi/_de ni dge 'dun gyis bskrad par bya'o/_/de'i yo byad la kha cig gis lhung 
[\[94a.4\]]bzed dang chos gos khyer/_kha cig gis ni bar bur gyi snod dag khyer te phyi rol tu phyung la bor cig_/de ste ka ba la 'jus na ka ba chod cig_/sgo skyes la 'jus na sgo skyes kyang phyung la de la ngo zlog mi phod par ma byed cig_/slar sus bcos par bgyi/_dge 'dun 
[\[94a.5\]]gyis so/_/'chos pa'i yo byad su la dgug_/yon bdag la bskul lo/_/des kyang ma 'byor na dge 'dun thams cad kyi nor gyis slar bcos par bya ste/_de la the tshom du ma byed cig_/tshul khrims nyams pa'i dge slong la ji lta bar dge slong ma dang /_
[\[94a.6\]]dge slob ma dang /_dge tshul pha dang /_dge tshul ma dag kyang de bzhin no/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim pa la smod par byed pa'i dge slong de la slar bsdum pa'i las byos shig ces gsungs na/_btsun pa de snye dge slong mas kyang khyim pa la smad 
[\[94a.7\]]par gyur na de la yang slar bsdum pa'i las bgyi'am/_u pA li de yang slar bsdum pa'i las byed du chug shig_/dge slob ma dang /_dge tshul pha dang /_dge tshul ma la yang de bzhin no/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong khyim pa la smod na 
[\[94b\]]

[\[94b.5\]]gnas dang /_/u pA lis ni ji ltar dris/_/nub mo lnga yang byin pa'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa na dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pA lis zhus pa/_

[\[95a\]]
[\[95a.1\]]yang gnas ma bcas par gzhongs spyad pa spyod du gnang ngam/_u pA li mi gnang ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_lo lnga ma lon pa mi rung ba'i phyir ro/_/de ste lo drug gam lo dgu lon la/_de yang chos lnga dang mi ldan na de gnas ma bcas par gzhongs

[\[95a.4\]]tshol zhing sbyor ba ma btang ba'o/_/gleng gzhi'i sgo gnyis pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa brgyad pa'o//_//mdor na/_mthun pa dag dang mi mthun pa/_/tshad gzung du yang med pa dang /_/bcabs pa dang ni ma bcabs pa/_/de bzhin ming dang rigs kyang ngo /_/

[\[95b\]]

[\[95b.5\]]dang /_/bslab pa byin la mi spyad de/_/de dag la ni dad mi sbyin/_/dge slong byed dam mi len to/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa na dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/drug sde dag dge 'dun gyi lhag ma

[\[96a\]]
[\[96a.1\]]dge slong gcig pur gnas pa der chad pa'i las ma byed cig ces bka' stsal to/_/gang dge slong gnyis sam gsum gnas pa der yang dge slong dag gis chad pa'i las ma byed cig_/gang na dge slong bzhi'am/_de las lhag pa yang 
[\[96a.2\]]rung ba gnas pa der dge slong dag gis chad pa dang /_gzhi nas bslang ba'i chad pa dang /_gzhi nas slar bslang ba dang /_yid mgu bar bya ba dang /_gzhi nas bslang ba'i yid mgu bar bya ba dang /_gzhi nas slar bslang ste yid mgu ba dag byos shig_/
[\[96a.3\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis gang na dge slong bzhi'am de las lhag par gnas pa de dag tu dge slong gis chad pa dang /_gzhi nas bslang ba'i chad pa dang /_gzhi nas slar bslang ba dang /_yid mgu bar bya ba dang /_gzhi nas bslang ba'i yid mgu bar bya ba dang /_

[\[96b\]]
[\[96b.1\]]pa gsum la yang chad pa ma byed par yongs su dag pa bzhi'am/_de las mang ba rnams la chad pa byos shig_/chad pa gcad pa la ji lta ba chad pa gzhi nas bslang ba dang /_gzhi nas slar bslang ba dang /_yid mgu bar byed pa dang /_gzhi nas bslang ste yid

[\[96b.3\]]btsun pa bslab pa stsal ba las dad pa blang du rung ngam/_u pA li de la dge slong du 'du shes bzhag na gdod rung ngo /_/gleng gzhi'i sgo gnyis pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa bcu pa rdzogs te sgo gnyis pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//mdor bsdus pa ni/_dkyil 'khor 
[\[96b.4\]]lhung bzed dugs khang dang /_/dud pa btung dang khar phor dang /_/lcags skra shing rta'i lte ba dang /_/gdang shing sgron ma mchod rten no/_/mdor na/_dkyil 'khor lha yi gnas dang ni/_/phyed dang gsum dang gnas mi 'cha'/_/lhung bzed med par rab 
[\[96b.5\]]tu byung /_/lhung bzed la yang mi bri ba'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dze ta'i tshal skyabs med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/dge slong dag gis gar bab bab tu lhung bzed bkrus pa dang /_sa phyogs der sbrang ma dag gis 
[\[96b.6\]]gang ste mi sdug par gyur pa bram ze dang khyim bdag dag gis mthong nas ci 'phags pa dag gis phyogs 'dir bshang gci bgyis sam zhes smras pa dang /_de dag gis bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]'dir bshang gci dag ni sus kyang ma byas kyi nged kyis lhung bzed bkrus so zhes 
[\[96b.7\]]smras pa dang /_de dag gis 'phags pa khyed kyis 'dir dkyil 'khor bya ba'i rigs so zhes smras pa dang /_de dag spa gong nas cang mi zer bar 'dug go/_/de dag 'phya ste/_dge sbyong shAkya'i bu dag ni mi gtsang ba ste/_gar bab bab tu lhung bzed 'khru'o 
[\[97a\]]
[\[97a.1\]]zhes smras pa dang /_de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams 'phya ba ni yus kyis de bas na gar bab bab tu lhung bzed 
[\[97a.2\]]ma 'khru bar dge slong dag gis lhung bzed gang du bkrus pa'i gnas der dkyil 'khor byos shig ces bka' stsal to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dkyil 'khor byos shig ces gsungs nas dge slong dag gis lhung bzed bkrus pa'i gnas der dkyil 'khor 
[\[97a.3\]]zlum por byas pa dang /_bram ze dang khyim bdag dag gtsug lag khang du 'ongs te gnas kyi bar na mar dkyil 'khor yod pa dag mthong nas/_kye 'di ci zhig ces dris pa dang /_kha cig gis yang kye 'di lta la shes pa byar ci yod/_dge sbyong shAkya'i bu dag 
[\[97a.4\]]ni nyi ma la dad do zhes smras so/_/gzhan dag gis kye de bzhin te/_dge sbyong shAkya'i bu dag ni nyi ma la dad pa bden no zhes smras pa dang /_de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[97a.5\]]de lta bas na nyi ma 'dra ba'i dkyil 'khor ma byed cig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis nyi ma dang 'dra ba'i dkyil 'khor ma byed cig ces gsungs pa dang /_dge slong dag gis zla ba kham pa 'dra ba'i dkyil 'khor byas so/_/der bram ze dang khyim bdag dag gis 
[\[97a.6\]]yang gtsug lag khang du lhags nas/_kye dge sbyong shAkya'i bu dag ni zla ba la dad do zhes smras pa dang /_de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na zla ba 'dra ba'i dkyil 
[\[97a.7\]]'khor kyang ma byed cig_/dge slong dag gru bzhir byed pa la zhugs pa dang /_gtsug lag khang der bram ze dang khyim bdag dag yang lhags nas/_kye dge sbyong shAkya'i bu dag ni ba lang la dad do zhes smras pa dang /_de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom 
[\[97b\]]
[\[97b.1\]]ldan 'das la gsol pa nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis de lta bas na dkyil 'khor gru bzhi dang /_rnam pa gnyis ltar ma byed par mdung rtse dang rnga 'dra bar byos shig ces bka' stsal nas/_dge slong rnams de cis bya ba mi shes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[97b.2\]]bka' stsal pa/_ba lang gi lci ba'am sa'am chus byug par gyis shig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dkyil 'khor rnam pa gnyis byos shig_/ces gsungs pa dang /_dge slong dag gis sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun la de 'dra'i dkyil 'khor rnam pa gnyis 
[\[97b.3\]]byas te/_des mgu bar gyur pa dang /_de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dkon mchog gsum la ni nyi ma'am/_zla ba 'am/_ji ltar dad pa rnam pa thams cad du byas te/_de la the 
[\[97b.4\]]tshom ma byed cig_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag sbyin par byed pa dang /_sbyin pa'i bdag pos gtor ma len pa'i lha dag la rnam pa gsum gyis dus dus su yang dag par mgu 
[\[97b.5\]]bar bya/_yang dag par mchod par bya/_yang dag par bde bar bya'o/_/gsum gang zhe na/_dus dus su gtsang ma'i byi bdar dang /_dus dus su gtor ma'i las kyang byed/_dus dus su byin pa'i yon kyang bsngo'o/_/dge slong dag sbyin par byed pa dang /_
[\[97b.6\]]sbyin bdag gis gtor ma len pa'i lha dag la dus dus su yang dag par mgu bar bya/_yang dag par mchod par bya/_yang dag par bde bar byas na sbyin par byed pa dang /_sbyin bdag rnams la yid dge bas slar brtse bar byed do/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de 
[\[97b.7\]]skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bde bar gshegs pas de skad gsungs nas yang ston pas gsungs pa/_skyes bu gang zag dad pa dag_/gang gis lha rnams mchod byed pa/_/ston pa'i bka' bzhin byed pa ste/_/sangs rgyas kyis kyang de la bsngags/_/
[\[98a\]]
[\[98a.1\]]sa phyogs gang na shes rab can/_/mkhas pa tshul khrims ldan 'khod pa/_/bshos gsol sbyin rabs bsgrag par bya/_/de dag rnged pas rjed par 'gyur/_/mchod pa byas pas mchod par 'gyur/_/de nas 'di la snying brtse ba/_/ma yis ji ltar bu 
[\[98a.2\]]la bzhin/_/lhas rjes brtse ba'i mi rnams kyis/_/bde zhing bzang po mthong bar 'gyur/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis skyes bu gang zag dad pas lha rnams la mchod na ston pa'i bka' bzhin byas pa yin te/_sangs rgyas dag gis kyang bsngags so zhes gsungs pa 
[\[98a.3\]]dang /_drug sde dag gis ra ba'i lha dang /_nags kyi lha dang /_bzhi mdo'i lha dang /_sum mdo'i lha dang /_'jig rten gyi lha dag la sogs te/_thams cad mchod pa byed pa dang /_dad pa'i bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa rnams 'phags pa 'di dag dge bar gsungs 
[\[98a.4\]]pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung na 'di ltar gnod pa sha dang khrag dang /_rkang dang /_tshil dag za zhing gzhan gyi srog 'phrog pa dag la mchod de/_bdag cag dge bsnyen gyis kyang ring du spangs na/_'di dag ni mchod pa byed do zhes nyes pa ngor brjod dpyas 'dogs shing mi 
[\[98a.5\]]snyan par zer nas de dag dge slong dag gis zlog pa dang /_ci'i phyir tshe dang ldan pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyis ni gang skyes bu gang zag dad pa dag gis lha dag la mchod par byas na ston pa'i bka' bzhin du byas pa yin te/_sangs rgyas dag gis kyang bsngags so zhes ma 
[\[98a.6\]]gsungs sam/_ci nged cag dad pa ma yin nam/_ci'i phyir na mi mchod ces smras pa dang /_de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag ngas khyim pa la dgongs te gsungs kyis 
[\[98a.7\]]dge slong dag la ma yin gyis de lta bas na dge slong dag gis lha rnams la mchod par ma byed cig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag lha rnams la mchod par ma byed cig ces gsungs pa dang /_drug sde dag gis de dag la gnod par byed pa la zhugs pa dang /_dge 
[\[98b\]]
[\[98b.1\]]slong de dag gi rmi lam du nged kyi nyes pa ci byas na nged la gnod par byed ces ston to/_/bram ze dang khyim bdag ma dad pa dag kyang 'phags pa rnams 'di dag gis khyed cag la gnod pa ci zhig byas na 'di dag ma rung bar byed ces 'phya'o/_/de ltar gyur pa dge slong 
[\[98b.2\]]dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis de la mchod par yang ma byed cig_/gnod par yang ma byed cig ces bka' stsal pa dang /_drug sde dag lam du zhugs te/_'dong ba'i tshe lha dag gi rten mthong ba dang byol te lam 
[\[98b.3\]]mthon dman dang tsher ma can du dong ba dang /_de na dge slong kha cig ni 'jag mas non/_kha cig ni tsher mas zug_/kha cig ni dred nas lhung ngo /_/de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[98b.4\]]stsal pa/_lam 'byol te ma 'dong bar lam drang por deng la/_lha dag gi rten la se gol gyi sgra phyung la zhal nas gsungs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa bklag par bya ste/_de la the tshom ma byed cig_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/_sangs rgyas 
[\[98b.5\]]bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pA lis zhus pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis lhan cig spyod pa dang /_nye gnas kyi dge slong gis mkhan po dang /_slob dpon la dus gsum du ltar song shig ces gsungs la/_mtshams chen po dpag tshad phyed 
[\[98b.6\]]dang gsum du chod cig ces kyang gsungs na/_btsun pa de lta na slob dpon dang mkhan po dpag tshad phyed dang gsum na mchis na de dag gis ji tsam na blta bar bgyi/_u pA li de dag gis zla ba phyed phyed cing ltar song shig_/de ste de dag rgyang grags ldan gnas 
[\[98b.7\]]na de dag gis zhag bdun nam brgyad na ltar song shig_/de tshun chad ni ji ltar dus su ltar song shig_/'dom lnga brgya na gnas na ni de dag gis dus gsum du ltar song shig_/de ltar ma song na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod 
[\[99a\]]
[\[99a.1\]]pa na ste/_tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' bo la rab tu 'byung bar 'dod pa zhig 'ongs nas des de lhung bzed med par rab tu phyung ngo /_/de'i tshe na dge slong dag gis lhung bzed bkrus nas lhung bzed bzhag pa'i sar bzhag ste/_mchod rten la phyag byas 
[\[99a.2\]]nas bdag bdag gi lhung bzed blangs te zas za ba'i gnas su 'khod do/_/gang gi tshe dge slong dag zas za ba'i tshe lhung bzed dag bkrus nas mchod rten la phyag byed pa la zhugs pa dang /_gsar du rab tu byung ba de yang de dag dang lhan cig tu phyag byas 
[\[99a.3\]]nas gang gi tshe dge slong dag mchod rten la phyag byas te lag pa bkrus pa dang /_gsar du rab tu byung ba des kyang gnas brtan kun shes kauN+Di n+ya'i lhung bzed blangs pa dang /_des slar bzlog go/_/de nas gang po dang /_ming chen dang /_ma 'gags pa dang /_shA 
[\[99a.4\]]ri'i bu dang /_maud gal gyi bu dang /_'od srung dang /_kun dga' bo dang /_re ba ti la sogs pa'i lhung bzed blangs te/_de dag gis kyang slar bzlog pa dang /_de mchi mas mig gang bzhin du phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/'dod chags dang ma bral ba'i dge slong 
[\[99a.5\]]dag 'di ltar lhung bzed dag med par sus rab tu phyung zhes phyas 'dogs so/_/kha cig gis ni nye dga' bo yin no zhes smras nas/_de dag gis nyes pa sbom po la spyod pa de ma gtogs par gzhan su zhig de ltar byed ces smras pa dang /_de ltar gyur pa dge slong 
[\[99a.6\]]dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong 'di rnams 'phya ba ni yus te/_de bas na dge slong dag gis lhung bzed med par rab tu ma dbyung bar dang por lhung bzed dag tshol la gdod rab tu phyung shig_/de ste 
[\[99a.7\]]mi 'byor na bdag gis lhung bzed chung ngu byin cig_/dge slong gis lhung bzed med par rab tu phyung na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/_tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa la nye gnas gzhon nu lhung bzed 'dzin pa zhig yod pa des 
[\[99b\]]
[\[99b.1\]]de'i lhung bzed dang /_bdag gi lhung bzed gnyi ga bkrus te/_lhung bzed de gnyis kyang 'dra ba zhig nas bdag gi gang yin/_slob dpon gyi gang yin pa mi shes nas/_phyi zhig na des tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa'i lhung bzed la slob dpon ma 'gags pa'i lhung 
[\[99b.2\]]bzed ces yi ge bris so/_/de nas dus phyi zhig na khyim bdag gzhan zhig gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams khyim du bshos la spyan drangs te/_khyim bdag de la sngon yongs su spyad pa'i smad 'tshong ma zhig yod de/_des de la bzang mo ngas 
[\[99b.3\]]sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dag bshos la spyan drangs kyis khyod kyang tshur shog la rang gi lag gis kyang brim par byos shig ces springs pa dang /_de yang brel ba'i rkyen cig byung nas der ma 'ongs so/_/bcom ldan 'das dang nyan thos kyi dge 'dun 
[\[99b.4\]]dag bshos gsol/_sbyin rabs gsungs nas slar bzhud pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa'i lhung bzed 'dzin pa gzhon nu de khyim de nyid du lhung bzed bkrus te 'gro'o snyam du bsams nas 'dug pa dang /_khyim bdag des 'phags pa lhung bzed skad cig 
[\[99b.5\]]g.yar/_mdza' ba zhig la lhung bzed kyi lhag ma zhig bskur ro zhes smras pa dang /_des bdag gi ni ma byin gyi/_tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa'i lhung bzed byin pa dang /_khyim bdag des de'i nang du bza' ba dang /_bca' ba gtsang mas bkang nas smad 'tshong ma 
[\[99b.6\]]de la bskur te/_phrin du bzang mo ngas ni kha zas 'di lta bus sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams tshim par byas kyis/_khyod kyis de la rjes su yi rang skyed cig ces spring ngo /_/des kha zas de dag byo ba dang /_lhung bzed kyi zhabs la yi ge 
[\[99b.7\]]'dug pa mthong nas/_bud med kyi bu ni rnam pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad la mkhas te/_des bklags pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa'i ming mthong nas des 'di snyam du bdag gis 'phags pa lha dang mis mchod pa'i lhung bzed de 'di bzhin du bskur ba'i mi 
[\[100a\]]
[\[100a.1\]]rigs so snyam du bsams nas des lhung bzed de dris phyis te/_de nas me tog bsung zhim pos bkang nas khri'u tshon gyis bris pa'i steng du bzhag ste/_de'i drung du btud nas pog por gyis bdug cing 'dug pa dang /_de nas skyes pa gzhan zhig 
[\[100a.2\]]kAr ShA pa Na lnga brgya dang /_dri dang phreng ba dag khyer te de'i drung du 'ongs nas/_bzang mo ci byed kun tu spyod kyis 'dong ngo zhes smras pa dang /_lhung bzed la mchod pa byas skad cig sdod cig_/des lhung bzed 'di gang nas 'ongs su'i yin zhes smras pa dang /_
[\[100a.3\]]mos ji ltar gyur pa zhib tu smras so/_/des khyod kyis ya mtshan can thams cad dag la yang sbyin pa gtong ste/_rab tu byung ba dag kyang ma shor to zhes smras pa dang /_de rna ba bkab nas sdig pa de lta bu ma byas kyis sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba'i rgyur 
[\[100a.4\]]gyur ta re zhes smras so/_/mos de skad smras kyang des log par byed pa de ma btang ngo /_/de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_dge slong gang mi bri ba bris pa de ni nyes pa'i dmigs 
[\[100a.5\]]su 'gyur gyis de bas na dge slong dag mi bri ba ma bri shig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag la mi bri ba ma 'dri shig ces gsungs pa dang /_dge slong dag gis gang mi bri ba mi shes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_mi bri ba rnam pa lnga 
[\[100a.6\]]ste/_so sor thar pa thams cad dang /_so sor thar pa dang ldan pa dang /_'dul ba thams cad dang /_'dul ba thams cad du ldan pa dang /_gang zag so so'o/_/mtshan ma can du bya ba ni nyes pa med do/_/gleng gzhi'i sgo gsum pa'i mdo'i tshigs su 
[\[100a.7\]]bcad pa dang po'o//_//mdor na/_dge tshul gyis ni lhung bzed bcag_/lhung bzed ji ltar bsreg par bya/_/sreg 'gebs gnang bar bya ba ste/_/drang srong chen pos rjes su gnang /_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa na dze ta'i tshal 
[\[100b\]]
[\[100b.1\]]skyabs med pa la zas sbyin pa'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/dge slong gzhan zhig gis dge tshul pha lhung bzed 'dzin pa de la des lhung bzed 'khrur bcug pa dang /_dge tshul pha de yang dran pa nye bar gnas pa ma yin pa zhig nas de'i lag nas lhung ste chag go/_/
[\[100b.2\]]dge slong de phongs par gyur te/_de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_dge slong dag gang cung zad dge slong dag gis dge tshul pha la lhung bzed 'khrur bcug na nyes pa'i dmigs su 'gyur 
[\[100b.3\]]te/_de bas na dge slong dag gis dge tshul pha dag lhung bzed 'khrur ma gzhug shig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag lhung bzed dge tshul 'khrur ma gzhug shig ces bka' stsal nas/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i dge tshul pha tsun da zhes bya ba lhung bzed 
[\[100b.4\]]'dzin te/_des mkhan po lhung bzed tshur stsol cig bkru'o zhes smras pa dang /_des bu bcom ldan 'das kyis bslab pa'i gnas bcas te/_dge slong gis dge tshul pha dag la lhung bzed 'khrur ma gzhug shig ces gsungs kyis nga nyid 'khrus khyod phar song 
[\[100b.5\]]shig ces smras pa dang /_des mkhan po ci bdag gis kyang nyes pa'i dmigs su 'gyur ram zhes smras pa dang /_des bu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni chos kyi bdag po bas na ngas ji ltar bya zhes smras pa dang /_de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 
[\[100b.6\]]'das la gsol nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge tshul pha dran pa nye bar gnas pa de dag la ni 'khrur gzhug ste/_de la the tshom du ma byed cig_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/_dge slong dag lhung bzed du zan zos nas de yang ma 
[\[100b.7\]]bcos pas btsas khyer nas rdol to/_/de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lhung bzed bsreg par byos shig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis lhung bzed sregs shig ces gsungs nas/_dge 
[\[101a\]]
[\[101a.1\]]slong dag gis lhung bzed shing gis bsregs pa dang /_lhung bzed ma rung bar gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis shing gis sreg par ma byed cig ces bka' stsal pa dang /_dge slong dag gis rtswa dang sog ma dag gis g.yogs te bsregs pa 
[\[101a.2\]]dang /_de nyid nyes pa'i dmigs su gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis rtswa dang sog mas g.yogs te sreg par ma byed cig ces bka' stsal nas/_dge slong dag gis ji ltar bsreg pa mi shes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis lhung bzed kyi sreg 
[\[101a.3\]]'gebs sbyor cig ces bka' stsal pa dang /_dge slong dag gis lhung bzed kyi sreg 'gebs ji ltar sbyor mi shes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sreg 'gebs la rnam pa gnyis te/_slob dpon gyis byas pa dang /_bdag gis byas 
[\[101a.4\]]pa'o/_/de la slob dpon gyis byas pa ni bum pa lta bu'o/_/bdag gis byas pa ni phru ba'am rdza ma yang rung ste/_thal bas bkang la rdza ma ji tsam ran pa phri shig ces bka' stsal pa dang /_dge slong dag gis gyo mo'i nang du de bzhin du bsregs pas de nyid 
[\[101a.5\]]nyes pa'i dmigs su gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_phyi rol du ni 'jim pa dang phub mar bsres pas yugs la nang du til gyi tshigs ma'am/_ba lang gi lci bas yugs te de skams pa dang /_sa gzhi byi bdar gyis la 'og tu phub 
[\[101a.6\]]ma dang /_til gyi tshigs ma dang /_gzhan yang byad bzang du 'gyur ba dag thing ste/_rtswa dang /_lci ba dang /_sog ma dag gis g.yogs la ci nas dud pa ma shor bar byos la sregs shig_/de'i g.yas g.yon chag chag thob la skyong nul gyis shig_/ci 
[\[101a.7\]]nas srog chags dag bde bar bya ba'i phyir ro/_/bsregs pa de grangs pa dang /_lhung bzed phyung la khrus te/_nam kha dog zhen par gyur gyi bar du bsreg par byos shig_/de bas na lhung bzed sreg 'gebs dang yo byad dag rjes su gnang ngo /_/gleng gzhi'i 
[\[101b\]]
[\[101b.1\]]sgo gsum pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa gnyis pa'o//_//mdor na/_gcig la gcig dang dugs khang dang /_/khyim pa gsum pa de bzhin te/_/gding ba dang ni de bzhin skra/_/lci bas byas pa kun thos pa'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod 
[\[101b.2\]]pa'i dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/mnyan du yod pa na khyim bdag gzhan zhig gis dge 'dun gyi phyir dugs khang zhig byas so/_/de nas drug sde dag gis gos gcig pus smad g.yogs byas te/_gcig la gcig las 
[\[101b.3\]]byed cing 'khod pa dang /_bram ze dang /_khyim bdag dag phyogs der lhags pa dang /_de dag gis de mthong nas/_kye 'di lta bu dag tu byed pa su zhig ces smras pa dang /_de na kha cig gis ni mu stegs can dag yin no zhes smras/_yang kha cig gis 'di dag ni 
[\[101b.4\]]mu stegs can ma yin gyi/_dge sbyong shAkya'i bu'o zhes smras pa dang /_de dag 'phya ba la zhugs te/_kye ston pa ni ngo tsha ba dang ldan na/_ci'i phyir 'di dag ngo tsha ba dang khrel med ces smras so/_/de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_
[\[101b.5\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams 'phya ba ni yus kyis/_de lta bas na dge slong dag dugs khang du gos gcig pu gon te gcig la gcig las ma byed cig_/dge slong dag gis gos gcig pu gon te dugs khang du 
[\[101b.6\]]las byas na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/_mnyan du yod pa na khyim bdag gzhan zhig gis dge 'dun gyi phyir dugs khang zhig byas pa dang /_der dge slong dag gis 'bru mar gyis byugs te/_rkang pa la reg nas 
[\[101b.7\]]mgo bo la reg_/mgo bo la reg nas kha la reg_/kha la reg nas lag pa dang rkang pa la reg_/lag pa dang rkang pa la reg nas slar yang kha la reg cing gos ngan pa zhig gis smad g.yogs te 'dug pa dang /_ji tsam zhig na khyim pa ma dad pa zhig phyogs der 
[\[102a\]]
[\[102a.1\]]'ongs nas/_des dge slong dag mthong ba dang /_des 'phya ba la zhugs te/_dge sbyong shAkya'i bu dag ni mi gtsang ba ste/_rkang pa la reg pa kha la reg par byas nas gos ngan pas smad g.yogs byas te/_gcer bur skye bo dag gi nang 
[\[102a.2\]]na 'dug go zhes smras pa dang /_de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams 'phya ba ni yus kyis/_de bas na dugs khang du khyim pa ma gzhug shig 
[\[102a.3\]]ma dad pa yang las byed du ma gzhug shig_/dugs khang gi sgo ba dge slong rnams skos la de dag gis khyim pa dag nang du ma gtang shig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dugs khang du khyim pa ma gtang shig_/las kyang byed du ma gzhug shig ces gsungs pa dang /_de 
[\[102a.4\]]nas dus phyi zhig na dugs khang du zhugs pa'i tshe khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin der 'ongs pa dang /_dge slong sgo bas smras pa/_khyim bdag nang du ma 'gro bar 'dug shig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim pa dugs khang du ma gtang shig ces bka' stsal 
[\[102a.5\]]to/_/des 'phags pa dag ci kho bo yang gzhan du 'gyur ram/_kho bos ni nges par 'phags pa dag gi las bya'o zhes smras pa dang /_de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gang dad pa 
[\[102a.6\]]dag ni dugs khang du thong /_las kyang byed du chug shig_/de la the tshom du ma byed cig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dad pa dag ni dugs khang du thong la las kyang byed du chug shig ces gsungs pa dang /_de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin nang du 'gro ba na de dang lhan 
[\[102a.7\]]cig tu bram ze zhig kyang 'ongs nas de ma btang ba dang /_des 'phags pa ci'i phyir na khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin ni nang du btang la bdag ni mi gtong zhes smras pa dang /_dge slong gis de la smras pa/_bram ze khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin ni dad pas nang du 
[\[102b\]]
[\[102b.1\]]btang ngo /_/des smras pa/_'o na bdag kyang dad par gyur na nang du gtong ngam zhes smras pa dang /_de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis de ste dad par gyur na nang du thong shig ces bka' stsal pa dang /_dge slong 
[\[102b.2\]]dag gis de skyabs gsum du btang nas nang du btang ngo /_/des yang dge slong dag rkang pa la reg nas kha dang mgo la reg cing gos ngan pas smad g.yogs nas sgren mor 'dug pa mthong ba dang /_de ma dad de 'phya ba la zhugs so/_/dge sbyong shAkya'i bu ni mi gtsang 
[\[102b.3\]]ba ste/_rkang pa la reg pa kha dang mgo bo la reg cing gos ngan pas smad g.yogs nas sgren mor 'dug go zhes smras pa dang /_de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na rab tu 
[\[102b.4\]]dad pa dag ni dugs khang gi nang du thong shig_/dad pa chung ba ni ma gtang shig/_//'dul ba gzhung dam pa/_bam po sum bcu rtsa bzhi pa/_gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/_mnyan du yod pa na khyim bdag gzhan zhig gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong 
[\[102b.5\]]gi dge 'dun dag dugs khang du spyan drangs te/_dge slong dag nang du zhugs pa dang /_de na dgra bcom pa'i dge slong zhig gis tshul khrims nyams pa'i dge slong zhig la las byed cing 'dug pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyang nang du gshegs nas des las byed pa 
[\[102b.6\]]gzigs nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong khyed cag gis dge slong 'di la dge slong 'dis las byed pa mthong ngam/_btsun pa mthong ngo zhes gsol pa dang /_dge slong las byed pa 'di ni dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa'o/_/
[\[102b.7\]]gang la las bya ba 'di ni tshul khrims nyams pa sdig pa'i chos can/_khong rul ba/_zags pa/_gsog tu gyur pa/_dung dgra lta bur spyod pa/_dge sbyong ma yin pa dge sbyong du yi dam 'dzin pa/_tshangs par spyod pa ma yin pa tshangs par spyod par yi dam 'dzin 
[\[103a\]]
[\[103a.1\]]pa ste/_de bas na dge slong dag seng ge lta bus wa 'dra ba'i las ma byed cig_/byas na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis seng ge 'dra bas wa lta bu'i las ma byed cig ces bka' stsal pa dang /_mnyan du yod pa na khyim 
[\[103a.2\]]bdag gzhan zhig de dang rigs mnyam pa las chung ma zhig blangs te/_de de dang lhan cig rtse dga' yongs su spyod do/_/des rtse dga' yongs su spyad pa las dus phyi zhig na chung ma sems can dang ldan par gyur nas/_de la zla ba brgyad dam dgu 'das pa dang bu btsas 
[\[103a.3\]]nas bu pho zhig byung ste/_de gzugs legs pa blta na sdug cing mdzes pa yan lag thams cad dang ldan pa zhig nas de btsas pa'i btsas ston chen po byas nas ming btags so/_/de bsrings bskyed nas cher gyur pa dang /_de dus phyi zhig na dze ta'i tshal du song ste/_
[\[103a.4\]]legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung nas de mdzod gsum dang ldan par gyur te/_des 'di snyam du bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag bu'i pha ma ni dka' bar bya ba byed de/_phan par byed pa'o/_/gso bar byed pa'o/_/skyed par byed pa'o/_/nu ma snun 
[\[103a.5\]]par byed pa'o/_/'dzam bu'i gling sna tshogs pa ston par byed pa yin te/_bus phrag pa gcig la ni ma/_gnyis pa la ni pha khyer te lo brgya tshang gi bar du khyer ram/_yang na sa gzhi chen po nor bu dang /_mu tig dang /_bai DUr+ya dang /_dung dang /_shel dang /_gser 
[\[103a.6\]]dang /_dngul dang /_a sma gar ba dang /_spug dang /_g.yas phyogs su 'khyil ba de lta bu dag gis dbang por bcug gam dbang phyug tu bcug kyang des ni pha dang ma la bus phan btags pa'am nye bar phan btags par mi 'gyur gyi/_gang gis pha ma dad pa 
[\[103a.7\]]med pa dad pa phun sum tshogs par byas sam/_yang dag par bskul tam/_dul bar byas sam/_'jug par byas sam/_so sor bkod dam/_tshul khrims ngan pa las tshul khrims phun sum tshogs par/_ser sna can las gtang ba phun sum tshogs par/_
[\[103b\]]
[\[103b.1\]]shes rab 'chal ba las shes rab phun sum tshogs par yang dag par bskul/_dul bar byas/_zhugs par byas/_so sor bkod na de lta bu ni bus pha dang ma la phan btags pa dang /_nye bar phan btags par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so snyam du bsams nas/_
[\[103b.2\]]bdag gis kyang ci nas pha ma la phan gdags pa cung zad cig bya'o snyam nas ji srid dga' ba'i bar du gzhongs spyod cing 'dug nas mnyan du yod pa gang na ba de logs su gzhongs spyod cing song ngo /_/mthar gyis spyad pa spyod cing mnyan du yod par phyin to/_/des de gnyis 
[\[103b.3\]]skyabs su 'gro ba dang /_bslab pa'i gnas la rab tu bkod do/_/de nas dus phyi zhig na des pha'i drung du nor las bsod nams su bya ba'i dngos po bdun po'i yon tan rgyas par brjod pa dang /_des 'phags pa bdag gis kyang nor sna bdun las bya ba'i bsod 
[\[103b.4\]]nams kyi dngos po cung zad cig bya'o zhes smras pa dang /_des bgres po de bzhin legs kyis gyis shig ces smras pa dang /_ci zhig bya/_dugs khang zhig gyis shig_/des dugs khang byas te/_khyim bdag de rang gi dugs khang du rang gis las bya ba la zhugs 
[\[103b.5\]]te/_shin tu ngal bar gyur nas bkru ba'i yo byad dang /_'bru mar dang phye la sogs pa mang du lhag go/_/de nas des bu bdag rab tu ngal bar gyur gyis nga'i rgyab cung zhig nyes shig ces smras pa dang /_des yab bcom ldan 'das kyis seng ge lta bus wa lta bu dag 
[\[103b.6\]]la bsnyen bkur ma byed cig ces bka' stsal te ma gnang ngo /_/zhes smras pa dang /_des bu seng ge dang wa gang zhes smras pa dang /_yab bdag ni seng ge dang 'dra/_khyod ni wa dang 'dra'o/_/bu de ci'i phyir zhes smras pa dang /_yab bdag ni tshul khrims dang 
[\[103b.7\]]ldan pa'o/_/khyod ni tshul khrims ngan pa dang ldan pa'o/_/bu de ltar wa dang 'dra ba nga lta bu las seng ge dang 'dra ba khyod lta bu skyes sam zhes smras pa dang /_de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[104a\]]
[\[104a.1\]]stsal pa/_dge slong dag rigs gang na pha ma la yang dag par mgu bar byed/_yang dag par mchod par byed/_yang dag par bde bar skyong bar byed pa'i rigs de ni tshangs pa dang bcas pa'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rigs kyi bu pha ma la chos 
[\[104a.2\]]bzhin byed/_tshul bzhin byed pa ni tshangs pa zhes bya'o/_/dge slong dag rigs gang na pha ma la yang dag par mgu bar byed/_yang dag par mchod par byed/_yang dag par bde bar bsnyen bkur byed pa de ni slob dpon dang bcas pa'o/_/de ci'i phyir 
[\[104a.3\]]zhe na/_rigs kyi bus pha ma la chos bzhin byas na slob dpon lta bur 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag rigs gang na pha ma la yang dag par mgu bar byed/_yang dag par mchod par byed/_yang dag par bde bar bsnyen bkur byed pa'i rigs de ni sbyin par rigs 
[\[104a.4\]]par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rigs kyi bus pha ma la chos bzhin du byas na sbyin par rigs pa'o/_/dge slong dag rigs gang na pha ma la yang dag par mgu bar byed/_yang dag par mchod par byed/_yang dag par bde bar bsnyen bkur byed na rigs 
[\[104a.5\]]de ni ma dang bcas pa'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rigs kyi bus pha ma la chos bzhin du byas na me lta bu'o/_/dge slong dag rigs gang na pha ma la yang dag par mgu bar byed/_yang dag par mchod par byed/_yang dag par bde bar bsnyen bkur byed na 
[\[104a.6\]]rigs de ni lha dang bcas pa'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rigs kyi bus pha ma la chos bzhin du byas na lha lta bur 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bde bar gshegs pas de skad gsungs nas ston pas yang gsungs pa/_pha dang ma 
[\[104a.7\]]gnyis tshangs pa ste/_/slob dpon lha yang de bzhin no/_/ji ltar me yi lha bran bzhin/_/bu yi sbyin pa'i gnas yin no/_/de bas de gnyis phyag bya zhing /_/phyi bar bya zhing bkru ba dang /_/rkang pa gnyis kyang bkru bar bya/_/de bzhin mkhas pas bsnyen bkur bya/_/yang na 
[\[104b\]]
[\[104b.1\]]bza' ba btung ba dang /_/bgo ba mal stan de bzhin te/_/de gnyis pha dang ma gnyis la/_/mkhas pas bsnyen bkur bcas byed na/_/'dir ni mnar bar mi 'gyur te/_/song nas mtho ris dga' bar 'gyur/_/gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo sde gsungs pa 
[\[104b.2\]]de'i tshe na dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis pha dang ma dang /_bla ma la ni rim gro bgyid pa'i yon tan brjod pa ni ngo mtshar che'o zhes zhus pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[104b.3\]]bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag 'di la ci zhig ngo mtshar cher yod/_da ltar de bzhin gshegs pa 'dod chags med/_zhe sdang med/_gti mug med/_skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal 
[\[104b.4\]]ba dang /_yid mi dga' ba dang /_'khrug pa rnams med bzhin du pha ma la rim gro bya ba'i yon tan brjod pa pas sngon 'das pa'i dus na nga 'dod chags dang bcas/_zhe sdang dang bcas/_gti mug dang bcas/_skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya 
[\[104b.5\]]ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi dga' ba dang /_'khrug pa rnams las yongs su ma grol ba na yang ma la gnod pa cung zad zhig byas nas sdug bsngal chen po rjes su myong ngo /_/phan pa cung zad zhig byas nas kyang bde ba chen po rjes 
[\[104b.6\]]su myong bar gyur te/_de dag legs par shin tu yid la byos shig dang bshad par bya'o/_/sngon byung ba ni dge slong dag sngon 'das pa'i dus na grong khyer bA rA Na sI na ded dpon mdza' bo zhes bya ba phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba/_gnas rgya che zhing yangs pa zhig ste/_
[\[104b.7\]]ngal bso po'i nor dang 'dra ba/_ngal bso po'i nor la 'gran pa zhig yod de/_des rigs mnyam pa'i chung ma zhig blangs nas/_de de dang lhan cig tu rtse dga' yongs su spyod do/_/de la rtse dga' yongs su spyad pa las bu pho rnams byung yang shi nas de bu med de bu 
[\[105a\]]
[\[105a.1\]]'dod pas lha gu lang dang /_ba ru Na dang /_ngal bso po dang /_ba sa ba la sogs pa lha stong la gsol kyang de'i bu gson par ma gyur te/_de la gzhan zhig gis de ste khyod la bu pho zhig btsas na bu mo'i ming du thogs shig dang yun ring du 'tsho bar 
[\[105a.2\]]'gyur ro zhes bsgo'o/_/de dus phyi zhig na de dang lhan cig tu rtse dga' yongs su spyad do/_/des rtse dga' yongs su spyad pas de'i chung ma sems can dang ldan par gyur nas/_zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon nas khye'u zhig btsas te/_de gzugs legs shing blta na 
[\[105a.3\]]sdug pa/_mdzes pa/_mdog gser gyi kha dog lta bu/_mgo gdugs 'dra ba/_lag pa ring ba/_dpral ba'i dbyes che ba dang /_kos ko ring ba/_smin ma snyoms pa/_sna mtho zhing yan lag dang nying lag thams cad du ldan pa zhig btsas te/_de btsas 
[\[105a.4\]]pa'i btsas ston chen po byas nas ming gdags par brtsams te/_mdza' bo'i bu de bu mo'i ming du btags pas na khye'u 'di'i ming bu mo mdza' mor gdags so/_/ci tsam na khye'u bu mo mdza' mo zhes bya ba de cher gyur pa dang /_de'i pha yang rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du 
[\[105a.5\]]zhugs te/_de de nyid du shi bar gyur to/_/de nas bu mo mdza' mos/_ma la bdag gi pha sngon gyi las 'bras bu gang gis 'tsho/_bdag kyang phyis de bzhin du bsgrub bo zhes smras pa dang /_mas bsams pa/_sngon rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du 'jug pa'i tshong pa yin 
[\[105a.6\]]no zhes 'di la smras na ni 'di nyid kyang rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du zhugs te de nyid du shi bar 'gyur ro snyam du bsams nas/_des bu khyod kyi pha ni sngon 'bru 'tshong ba byed byed de/_khyod kyang dga' na 'bru 'tshong ba gyis shig ces smras pa dang /_des 'bru'i tshong khang brtsigs 
[\[105a.7\]]te/_thog ma'i nyin par kAr ShA pa Na bzhi rnyed de/_des de dag ma la byin no/_/de nas dus phyi zhig na gzhan zhig gis de la khyod kyi pha ni sngon dri 'tshong ba'o zhes smras pa dang /_des 'bru 'tshong ba btang ste/_dri 'tshong ba'i tshong khang brtsigs so/_/de nas nyi ma 
[\[105b\]]
[\[105b.1\]]dang po'i tshe kAr ShA pa Na brgyad rnyed nas des yang de dag ma la byin no/_/de nas dus phyi zhig na gzhan zhig gis de la khyod kyi pha ni gser 'tshong ba yin no zhes smras pa dang /_des yang dri 'tshong ba btang ste/_gser 'tshong ba la zhugs pa dang /_de'i nyi ma dang po 
[\[105b.2\]]la kAr ShA pa Na bcu drug rnyed pa dang /_des yang de dag ma la byin no/_/phyi de nyin mo des kAr ShA pa Na sum bcu rtsa gnyis rnyed pa dang /_des de dag ma la byin no/_/de nas gser 'tshong ba phrag dog can dag gis grong khyer thams cad kyi gser 'dis bsdus so snyam 
[\[105b.3\]]du bsams nas/_bu mo mdza' mo la khyod 'di lta bu byed cing 'tsho ste ci rung /_khyod kyi pha ni sngon rgya mtsho chen por 'jug pa'i tshong pa yin na khyod sus 'di 'dra ba ngan pas 'tsho ba la 'jug tu bcug ces smras pa dang /_de gser 'tshong ba dag gi tshig des 
[\[105b.4\]]bskul bas de ma'i thad du song ste/_ma bdag gi pha ni 'di ltar sngon rgya mtsho chen po'i tshong pa'o zhes thos na rjes su gnong shig dang /_bdag kyang rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du zhugs la mchi'o zhes smras pa dang /_mas de la bu de ni bden mod kyi khyod ni gzhon la bu gcig pu ste/_
[\[105b.5\]]kho mo bor la rgya mtsho chen por ma 'gro shig ces smras pa dang /_de nas bu mo mdza' mos ma'i tshig ma mnyan te/_bdag gis grong khyer du gang rgya mtsho chen por zhugs shing 'dong du dad pa rnams 'dong ngo zhes des bdag nyid ded dpon du bsgrags so/_/de nas tshong pa lnga brgyas 
[\[105b.6\]]bskor te dong ba dang /_de ma'i snying du sdug pas dkrugs te/_ma mchi mas brnangs bzhin rkang pa gnyis la bzung ste/_bu kho mo bor te rgya mtsho chen por zhugs la ma 'gro shig ces byas pa dang /_de 'di ltar snying rje zhing mi dga' ste/_dal gyis smras pa la khros nas 
[\[105b.7\]]ma'i mgo bo rkang pas phul te/_de 'gron pa mang po dang 'grogs te song ngo /_/mas bu khyod la las 'di rnam par smin par ma gyur cig ces smras pa dang /_de nas de grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rnams la lta zhing rgya mtsho chen po'i 'gram du phyin 
[\[106a\]]
[\[106a.1\]]pa dang /_des dong tshe rnying pa lnga brgyas gru bo che nyos te/_gru'i nang du 'jug pa dang /_'byin pa dang /_mnyan pa dang /_nyag thag 'dzin pa dang /_phyogs rtog pa'i mi dag la gla byas nas des dril chen po lan gsum du bsgrags nas rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du 
[\[106a.2\]]zhugs te song ba dang /_ji tsam zhig na chu srin nya'i rigs kyis gru ma rung bar byas nas/_bu mo mdza' mo gru tshal zhig la 'jus nas mthar phyin to/_/de nas skam la song ba dang /_dga' ba zhes bya ba'i grong khyer de mthong ste/_de der song nas de na lha'i bu mo gzugs legs 
[\[106a.3\]]shing blta na sdug pa bzhi byung ste/_der 'ongs nas bu mo mdza' mo bde bar 'ongs sam/_'di ni bdag cag gi zas kyi khang pa dang /_btung ba'i khang pa dang /_gos kyi khang pa dang /_nyal ba'i khang pa dang /_nor bu dang /_mu tig dang /_baiDUr+ya dang /_dung dang /_shel 
[\[106a.4\]]dang /_byi ru dang /_gser dang /_dngul gyis gang ba yin gyis de bzhes shig_/tshur spyon bdag cag dang lhan cig bzhugs so zhes smras nas/_de dang lhan cig lo du ma/_lo brgya du ma/_lo stong du ma/_lo brgya stong du mar ji ltar sems can bsod nams byas 
[\[106a.5\]]pa/_dge ba byas pa/_rdzu 'phrul chen po/_mthu chen pos rang gi bsod nams la myong bar gyur pa bzhin myong bar gyur to/_/de dag gis lho phyogs kyi lam du ma 'gro shig ces bsgo ba dang /_de lho phyogs kyi lam du ma btang yang der 'gro bar 'then te/_de phyi zhig na 
[\[106a.6\]]lho phyogs su song ba dang /_des rtag tu ra ro ba zhes bya ba'i grong khyer mthong nas de'i sgor phyin pa dang /_de nas kyang lha'i bu mo de bas kyang gzugs legs pa/_de bas kyang blta na sdug pa/_de bas kyang mdzes pa brgyad byung ste/_de dag gis bu mo mdza' mo tshur spyon 
[\[106a.7\]]bde bar byon tam/_bdag cag gi zas kyi khang pa 'di dang /_skom gyi khang pa dang /_gos kyi khang pa dang /_nyal ba'i khang pa dang /_nor bu dang /_mu tig dang /_bai DUr+ya dang /_dung dang /_shel dang /_byi ru dang /_gser dang /_dngul dag gis gang bar yod kyis tshur 
[\[106b\]]
[\[106b.1\]]spyon lhan cig bzhugs so zhes smras nas/_de dag dang lhan cig lo du ma/_lo brgya du ma/_lo stong du ma/_lo brgya stong du mar ji ltar sems can bsod nams byas pa/_dge ba byas pa/_rdzu 'phrul chen po mthu chen pos myong ba bzhin myong bar gyur to/_/de dag gis kyang 
[\[106b.2\]]de la lho phyogs kyi lam du ma 'gro shig ces bsgo'o/_/de lho phyogs kyi lam du ma 'gro shig ces bsgo na je thur 'then te 'gro 'dod nas ji tsam zhig nas lho phyogs kyi lam du song ba dang /_dga' ba can zhes bya ba'i grong khyer mthong nas de'i sgor phyin pa dang /_de nas yang 
[\[106b.3\]]lha'i bu mo de bas kyang gzugs legs pa/_de bas kyang blta na sdug pa/_de bas kyang mdzes pa bcu drug byung ste/_de dag gis bu mo mdza' mo bde bar byon tam/_bu mo mdza' mo tshur spyon/_bdag cag gi zas kyi khang pa 'di dang /_skom gyi khang pa dang /_gos 
[\[106b.4\]]kyi khang pa dang /_nyal ba'i khang pa dang /_nor bu dang /_mu tig dang /_baiDUr+ya dang /_dung dang /_shel dang /_byi ru dang /_gser dang dngul dag gis gang ba yod kyis tshur spyon lhan cig bzhugs so zhes smras nas/_de dag dang lhan cig lo du ma/_lo brgya du ma/_lo stong du 
[\[106b.5\]]ma/_lo brgya stong du mar ji ltar sems can bsod nams byas pa/_dge ba byas pa/_rdzu 'phrul chen po/_mthu chen pos myong bar gyur pa bzhin myong bar gyur to/_/de dag gis kyang de la lho phyogs kyi lam du ma 'gro shig ces bsgo'o/_/de la lho phyogs kyi lam du ma 
[\[106b.6\]]'gro shig bsgo yang je thur 'then cing 'gro bar 'dod nas de ji tsam zhig na lho phyogs kyi lam du song ba dang /_bla ma'i tshangs pa zhes bya ba'i khang pa bzang po zhig mthong nas de'i sgor 'ongs pa dang /_de'i nang nas lha'i bu mo de bas kyang gzugs legs pa/_de bas kyang blta 
[\[106b.7\]]na sdug pa/_shin tu bzang mo sum bcu rtsa gnyis shig byung nas de dag gis bu mo mdza' mo tshur spyon/_mdza' mo bde bar byon tam/_bdag cag gi zas kyi khang pa 'di dang /_skom gyi khang pa dang /_gos kyi khang pa dang /_nyal ba'i khang pa dang /_nor bu dang /_mu tig 
[\[107a\]]
[\[107a.1\]]dang /_baiDUr+ya dang /_dung dang /_shel dang /_byi ru dang /_gser dang /_dngul la sogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis gang ba yod kyis tshur spyon lhan cig tu bzhugs so zhes smras nas/_de dag dang lhan cig lo du ma/_lo brgya du ma/_lo stong du 
[\[107a.2\]]ma/_lo brgya stong du mar ji ltar sems can bsod nams byas pa/_dge ba byas pa/_mthu chen po/_rdzu 'phrul chen pos myong ba bzhin myong bar gyur to/_/de dag gis kyang lho phyogs kyi lam du ma 'gro shig ces bsgo'o/_/de lho phyogs kyi lam du ma 'gro shig ces bsgo yang 
[\[107a.3\]]je thur 'then cing 'gro bar 'dod nas ji tsam zhig na lho phyogs kyi lam du song nas de phyi phyir zhing dad pa skyes te/_de rim gyis lho phyogs su song ba dang /_lcags las byas pa'i grong khyer zhig mthong ste de der zhugs so/_/zhugs ma thag tu de'i sgo yang slar bcad par gyur 
[\[107a.4\]]to/_/de nas yang nang du song ba dang sgo yang de bzhin du bcad do/_/de nas yang nang du song ba dang sgo yang bcad par gyur te/_ji tsam na skyes bu rab tu lus che ba zhig de nas byung ste/_de'i spyi bo la lcags kyi 'khor lo 'bar ba/_rab tu 'bar ba/_shin tu 'bar ba/_me lce gcig 
[\[107a.5\]]tu gyur pa zhig 'khor zhing 'dug ste/_de'i mgo las rnag khrag byung ba ni zas su za bar mthong ngo /_/de nas bu mo mdza' mos skyes bu de la khyod ci'i phyir de ltar gyur ces dris pa dang /_des ngas ni ma la gnod pa byas pa'i phyir ro/_/zhes skyes bu des de skad du smras 
[\[107a.6\]]ma thag tu bu mo mdza' mo de'i las kyang mngon du smin par gyur te/_bdag gis kyang ma la gnod pa byas nas de'i las kyis 'dir khrid de 'ongs so snyam du bsams pa dang /_de ma thag tu nam mkha' las sgra 'di skad du gang bcings pa de ni thar/_gang ma bcings pa 
[\[107a.7\]]de ni bcings pa'o zhes sgra de byung ma thag tu skyes bu de'i spyi bo na 'khor lo yod pa de ni med par gyur/_bu mo mdza' mo'i spyi bor 'khor lo byung ngo /_/de nas bu mo mdza' mo rab tu sdug bsngal bar skyes bu des mthong nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_rtag tu dga' 
[\[107b\]]
[\[107b.1\]]dang dregs byed cing /_/skyid pa byed pa bor byas te/_/tshangs pa bla ma'i khang pa nas/_/ci yi phyir ni khyod 'dir 'ongs/_/bu mo mdza' mos smras pa/_rtag tu dga' dang dregs byed cing /_/skyid pa byed pa bor byas te/_/tshangs pa bla ma'i khang pa nas/_/
[\[107b.2\]]'dir ni 'ong bar 'dod gyur pa/_/yun ring po yi las kyis gnyer/_/las kyis ring nas gnyer nas kyang /_/gang du las kyis gnyer ba der/_/las kyang rnam par smin par gyur/_/las gang rnam par smin pas na/_/'khor lo 'bar dang rab 'bar ba/_/
[\[107b.3\]]bdag gi srog la gnod gyur te/_/klad la 'khor lo 'bar bar gyur/_/mi des smras pa/_khyod kyis ngan pa'i sems bskyed de/_/dka' ba byed pa'i ma yi mgor/_/khyod kyis rdog pa brgyab pas na/_/de yi las kyi 'bras bu yin/_/bu mo mdza' 
[\[107b.4\]]mos smras pa/_'khor lo 'bar ba rab 'bar ba/_/bdag gi srog la gnod byed pa/_/lo grangs stong phrag ji srid du/_/nga yi klad na 'khor bar 'gyur/_/mi des smras pa/_lo grangs stong phrag drug bcu dang /_/lo grangs brgya yi bar du ni/_/'bar 
[\[107b.5\]]ba'i lcags kyi 'khor los kyang /_/khyod kyi mgo la 'jog par byed/_/de nas bu mo mdza' mo des mi de la kye skyes bu gzhan dag kyang 'dir 'ong ba lta yod dam zhes smras pa dang /_mi des smras pa/_gang gis las 'di lta bu byas pa dag ni 'dir 'ong bar 'gyur 
[\[107b.6\]]ro/_/de nas bu mo mdza' mo sdug bsngal gyis mngon du gzir ba dang /_sems can rnams la snying rje ba bskyed nas mi de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kye skyes bu ngas sems can thams cad kyi phyir 'khor lo 'di mgo la bzod par byas/_gzhan gang gis 'di 'dra ba'i las 
[\[107b.7\]]byas pa de dag 'dir ma 'ong shig ces smras ma thag tu bu mo mdza' mo byang chub sems dpa' de'i mgo las 'khor lo de shing ta la bdun tsam du nam mkha' la 'phags nas 'dug pa dang /_de yang dus 'das te dga' ldan gnam gyi lha'i khams su skyes so zhes bcom ldan 
[\[108a\]]
[\[108a.1\]]'das kyis bka' stsal to/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i dus na bu mo mdza' mo zhes bya ba de ni nga nyid yin te/_de'i tshe ngas tshong byas te/_kAr ShA pa Na ma la byin pa de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas ni grong khyer chen po rnam pa bzhir rab tu bde ba 
[\[108a.2\]]myong bar gyur to/_/de nas ngas ma la gnod pa cung zad cig byas pa de'i las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pas ni rnam pa 'di lta bu'i sdug bsngal myong bar gyur to/_/de lta bas na dge slong dag de bzhin du bslab par gyis shig_/pha dang ma la phan gdags par bya'i/_
[\[108a.3\]]gnod pa ma byed cig dang de lta bu'i gnod pa mi myong bar 'gyur ba ni ji ltar bu mo mdza' mo so so'i skye bo'i tshe na myong ba bzhin te/_yon tan mang por yang 'gyur zhing da yang de bzhin gshegs pa yin te/_dge slong dag de bzhin du bslab par byos shig_/dge slong dag de 
[\[108a.4\]]bas na tshul khrims rab tu nyams par gyur kyang rnam pa lnga la nye g.yog bya bar gnang ste/_lnga gang zhe na/_pha dang /_ma dang /_mkhan po dang /_slob dpon dang /_nad pa rnams so/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/_bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag la bka' 
[\[108a.5\]]stsal pa/_dge slong dag nyi ma ni shar/_bya rog ni zer/_zhing pa ni rmo rko byed/_ma lus par rku ba rnams ni du'o/_/dge slong dag de ni dper byas te/_don de mi shes pa'i phyir don de yang bstan par bya ste/_dge slong dag nyi ma shar ces bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag 
[\[108a.6\]]par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/bya rog zer ro zhes bya ba ni chos kyi snod gang zag rnams kyi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/zhing pa zhing rmed ces bya ba ni sbyin par byed pa dang /_sbyin bdag rnams kyi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/ma lus par rku ba rnams ni du'o zhes bya ba ni 
[\[108a.7\]]bdud kyi 'khor gyi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/de lta bas na dge slong dag ston pa ni nyan thos dag la thugs brtse bas thugs rje'i don ston pa/_phan par dgongs pa/_thugs rje bzhin pas na khyod la don byas kyis khyod kyis da bya ba'i rigs so/_/de 'di ltar dgon pa dang /_
[\[108b\]]
[\[108b.1\]]shing drung dang /_khang stong dang /_ri dang /_grog po dang /_ri phug dang /_sog ma'i phung po dang /_bla gab med pa dang /_dur khrod dang /_nags tshal gyi phyogs dang /_bas mthar gnas par bya ste/_dge slong dag bag med par ma byed cig_/phyis 'gyod par 
[\[108b.2\]]gyur ta re/_ngas bstan pa 'di ni ngas rjes su bstan pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dgon par gnas par gsungs pas na/_phyis 'gyod par gyur ta re/_'di ni ngas bstan pa'o zhes gsungs pa'i bar du snga ma bzhin no/_/dge slong dag dgon pa dang /_nags 
[\[108b.3\]]tshal gyi phyogs dang /_bas mtha' la gnas shing bsam gtan byed pa la zhugs so/_/mnyan du yod pa na khyim bdag gzhan zhig gis dgon pa la gnas pa'i dge slong dag gi phyir dgon par khyim brtsigs te/_ji tsam zhig na bsod snyoms pa gzhan zhig gzhongs 
[\[108b.4\]]spyad pa spyod cing mnyan du yod par phyin nas de yang slar khyim du 'ongs te 'dug pa dang /_de dus phyi zhig na de'i skra dang kha spu ring por gyur nas snga dro'i dus na sham thabs bgos te/_lhung bzed dang chos gos khyer te song ba dang /_de la khyim bdag des 'phags pa skra 
[\[108b.5\]]dang kha spu ring ngo zhes smras pa dang /_des bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]'breg mkhan med do zhes smras nas/_khyim bdag gis 'phags pa de ltar na bzhud cig dang /_bdag gis 'breg mkhan gtang ngo zhes smras pa dang /_des bsod snyoms bslangs nas slar song ba dang /_
[\[108b.6\]]des 'breg mkhan yang btang ngo /_/bsod snyoms pa de rab tu le lo can zhig ste/_de gding ba'i steng du 'dug bzhin skra bregs pa dang /_skra yang gding ba'i steng du lhung bas zad par 'dor ma nus so/_/khyim bdag des bsams pa/_'breg mkhan khyod song la dge slong 
[\[108b.7\]]de'i skra dang kha spu dag bregs sam ma bregs ltos shig ces smras pa dang /_de der song ngo /_/song nas gding ba'i steng du 'dug pa dang /_de'i gos la skra dag chags nas khyim bdag des bsod snyoms pa de la mgu ba dag byas nas slar khyim du song ba dang /_de'i 
[\[109a\]]
[\[109a.1\]]chung mas jo bo'i sras ci khyod 'breg mkhan gyi khyim na 'dug 'dug gam/_des gos la bltas na skra chags shing 'dug pa mthong nas des bsams pa/_bsod snyoms pa de gding ba'i steng du 'dug bzhin du skra ma bregs grang zhes de [(]bltar [,]ltar [)]'gro'o 
[\[109a.2\]]snyam bsams nas/_der song ste bltas pa dang /_de'i gding ba skra dag gis gang zhing 'dug pa mthong nas/_'phags pa gding ba'i steng du skra mi 'breg pa tsam yang mi shes sam zhes nyes pa ngor brjod pa dang /_bsod snyoms pa de gnong nas spa gong ste ngo tsha nas cang mi 
[\[109a.3\]]zer bar 'dug go/_/de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag khyim bdag de dag 'phya ba ni yus te/_de bas na dge slong gding ba'i steng na 'dug cing skra ma 'breg shig_/
[\[109a.4\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag gding ba'i steng na 'dug cing skra ma 'breg shig ces bka' stsal pa dang /_dge slong dag gis gnas khang dang /_bkad sa dang /_sgo khang du skra bregs nas de nyid nyes pa'i dmigs su gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[109a.5\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_gang dge 'dun gyi phyag dar byed pa'i gnas der skra ma 'breg shig_/bregs na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis gang dge 'dun gyi phyag dar bya ba'i gnas der skra ma 'breg shig ces gsungs pa dang /_dge 
[\[109a.6\]]slong kha cig rgas shing 'khogs la rid par gyur/_kha cig ni na bar gyur te/_phyi rol du 'gro mi nus/_mi na ba dag kyang tsha zhing char pa bab par gyur pa dang /_de dag kyang phyir 'byung mi nus nas gnod par gyur to/_/de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 
[\[109a.7\]]'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gang dge slong dag rgas shing 'khogs la rid par gyur pa dang /_na ste mi bde ba dag ni snga gang du skra breg par gyis shig_/mi na ba dag tsha zhing char pa bab par gyur te/_phyi rol du 'byung du mi 
[\[109b\]]
[\[109b.1\]]bde na de yang snga gang du skra breg par gyis shig_/sa'i dngos po thams cad du yang sa gzhi byi bdar bya/_yang na ni byed du chug shig_/skra ni bsdus la phyag dar khrod du bor cig_/sen mo gcod pa yang [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]'di bzhin no/_/gang mi bde bar gyur pa de 
[\[109b.2\]]la rjes su bcas kyi mi bde ba med pa de dag ni de ltar ma byed cig_/byed na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/_de'i tshe na dge slong zhig na bar gyur nas des rtsa ba dang /_sdong bu dang /_'dab ma dang /_'bras bu rnams 
[\[109b.3\]]kyi sman gyis gsos kyang de'i nad sos par ma gyur nas/_ji tsam zhig na sman pa gtsug lag khang du 'ongs pa dang /_de la dge slong dag gis bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dge slong 'di 'dra bar na bar gyur na sman dpyad kyi thabs ston ces smras pa dang /_des 'phags pa phyi dro 
[\[109b.4\]]phye zo shig dang sos par 'gyur ro zhes smras pa dang /_de dag gis bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]phyi dro phye bza' bar bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang na nged cag gis ji ltar phyi dro phye bza' bar bya zhes smras pa dang /_des 'phags pa khyed cag gi ston pa ni thugs rje can yin gyis 
[\[109b.5\]]gnang bar 'gyur ro zhes smras so/_/de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag ba lang rgan po so med pa dag gis nas ji ltar zos pa de bzhin du 'byung ba yod de/_de lta 
[\[109b.6\]]bas na rjes su gnang ba ni ba lang rgan pos zos pa'i nas las phyer thogs te byin cig_/de la the tshom ma byed cig_/de la phye de byin kyang sos par ma gyur nas/_dge slong dag gis sman pa la zhib tu smras pa dang /_des 'phags pa dag de ni ro yal bas mi phan 
[\[109b.7\]]te/_nas gzhan las phye byos la byin cig ces smras so/_/de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na gzhan gyis ma zos pa'i nas las phyer byos te tshags kyis tshogs la byin 
[\[110a\]]
[\[110a.1\]]cig ces bka' stsal pa dang /_dge slong dag gis de bzhin du byin yang sos par ma gyur nas/_dge slong dag gis sman pa la zhib tu smras pa dang /_des 'phags pa 'de gu byos la byin cig dang sos par 'gyur ro zhes smras pa dang /_de ltar 
[\[110a.2\]]gyur pa dag dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de ste sman pas bsgo na phye la 'de gu byos la byin cig_/de bzhin du phye las zan du byas pa dang /_de nyid kyang rung ste thams cad byin cig_/de la 
[\[110a.3\]]the tshom ma byed cig_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/_de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na dge slong gzhan zhig na bar gyur nas/_des rtsa ba dang /_sdong bu dang /_'dab ma dang 'bras bu'i sman rnams kyis gsos kyang sos par ma gyur nas phyi zhig na sman pa gtsug lag 
[\[110a.4\]]khang du 'ongs pa dang /_dge slong dag gis dris pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dge slong 'di na ba'i thabs 'di lta bu zhig na sman dpyad ston cig ces smras pa dang /_des 'phags pa dag phyi dro khu sha byin cig dang sos par 'gyur ro zhes smras pa dang /_de dag gis 
[\[110a.5\]]bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]phyi dro za bar bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang na de la phyi dro khu sha ji ltar bza' zhes smras pa dang /_des 'phags pa dag khyed kyi ston pa ni thugs rje can yin gyis gnang bar 'gyur ro zhes smras so/_/de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das 
[\[110a.6\]]la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag dred mo zhes bya ba'i srog chags zhig yod de/_des sha ji ltar zos pa de bzhin du 'byung gis de lta bas na rjes su gnang ba ni dred mos zos pa'i sha las khu shar byos te byin cig_/
[\[110a.7\]]de la the tshom ma byed cig_/de dag gis dred mos zos pa'i sha las khu shar byas te byin yang sos par ma gyur nas/_dge slong dag gis sman pa la zhib tu smras pa dang /_des 'phags pa dag de ni ro yal zin pas sha sar pa las byas pa byin cig dang sos 
[\[110b\]]
[\[110b.1\]]par 'gyur ro zhes smras so/_/de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de ste sman pas sha sar pa las khu shar byos la byin cig ces bsgo na ni de lta bas na rjes su gnang ba ni sha sar pa las 
[\[110b.2\]]khu shar gyis la dar gyis tshogs te byin cig_/dge slong dag gis de bzhin du byin yang sos par ma gyur nas/_dge slong dag gis sman pa la zhib tu smras pa dang /_des 'phags pa dag snag tshogs byos la byin cig ces smras pa dang /_de ltar gyur pa dge 
[\[110b.3\]]slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de ste sman pas snag tshogs byin cig ces bsgo na ni byin cig_/de la sogs te gtubs pa dang /_skam po thams cad kyang byin cig_/de la the tshom ma byed 
[\[110b.4\]]cig_/gleng gzhi'i sgo gsum pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa gsum pa'o//_//mdor na/_dud pa btung dang seng ras dang /_/snar blugs pa dang phor bu dang /_/khab ral dang ni mig byug pa/_/drang srong chen pos gnang ba'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[110b.5\]]'das mnyan du yod pa na dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pA lis zhus pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis dud pa btung ba'i sbub bu chongs shig ces gsungs na/_ji lta bu 
[\[110b.6\]]bcang bar bgyi/_u pA li rin po che las byas pa ma gtogs so/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis seng ras chongs shig ces gsungs na/_ji lta bu bcang bar bgyi/_bal las byas pa dang /_zar ma las byas pa dang /_ras las byas pa'o/_/btsun pa bcom 
[\[110b.7\]]ldan 'das kyis sna'i nang du blugs pa chongs shig ces gsungs na ji lta bu bcang bar bgyi/_u pA li rin po che las byas pa ma gtogs so/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes bzhin btung ba'i phor bu chongs shig ces gsungs na/_ji lta bu bcang bar bgyi/_
[\[111a\]]
[\[111a.1\]]u pA li de ni rin po che ma gtogs pa'o/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis khab ral chongs shig ces gsungs na/_ji lta bu bcang bar bgyi/_u pA li de ni rin po che las byas pa ma gtogs so/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis mig byug 
[\[111a.2\]]pa'i sman gyi snod chongs shig ces gsungs na/_ji lta bu bcang bar bgyi/_u pA li de ni rin po che las byas pa ma gtogs pa'o/_/gleng gzhi'i sgo gsum pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa bzhi pa'o//_//mdor na/_phor bu dang yang skud ris dang /_/
[\[111a.3\]]rkang gnas pa dang rkang rten dang /_/bkru sman dag dang rngan pa dang /_/shi bar gyur pa'i chos gos so/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa na dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la 
[\[111a.4\]]tshe dang ldan pa u pA lis zhus pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis sman gyi phor bu chongs shig ces gsungs na/_ji lta bu bcang bar bgyi/_u pA li de ni rin po che las byas pa ma gtogs pa'o/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis skud ris chongs shig ces 
[\[111a.5\]]gsungs na/_ji lta bu bcang bar bgyi/_u pA li skud pa bdun las byas pa ste/_bal dang /_ldum bu sha na ka dang /_ras bal dang /_gso ma dang /_rtswa du gu la dang /_ldum bu ko tam pa dang /_srin bal gyi skud pa las byas pa'o/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 
[\[111a.6\]]'das kyis rkang rten chongs shig ces gsungs na/_ji lta bu bcang bar bgyi/_u pA li de ni rin po che las byas pa ma gtogs pa'o/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis khri dang rkang rten chongs shig ces gsungs na/_ji lta bu bcang bar bgyi/_u pA li de ni rin po 
[\[111a.7\]]che las byas pa ma gtogs pa'o/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/_mnyan du yod pa na khyim bdag gzhan zhig na bar gyur nas des sman pa la dris pa bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]bdag nad 'di 'dra ba zhig gis btab na sman dpyad kyi thabs ston cig ces smras pa dang /_des 
[\[111b\]]
[\[111b.1\]]khyim bdag snum bag sngar zo shig dang phyis bkru sman gtang ngo zhes smras pa dang /_de snum bag za ba la zhugs so/_/ji tsam zhig na de'i grong du nye bar 'gro ba'i dge slong der 'ongs nas des khyim bdag ci byed cing 'dug ces smras pa dang /_des ji ltar gyur pa zhib 
[\[111b.2\]]tu smras so/_/des khyim bdag kho bo bkru sman gtong ba rab tu mkhas kyis sman pa la sbyin pa de kho bo la byin cig dang /_ngas khyod la bkru sman btang ngo zhes smras pa dang /_khyim bdag des legs kyis de bzhin du bgyi'o zhes smras nas des de bkru 
[\[111b.3\]]sman btang nas gtsug lag khang du langs te song ngo /_/khyim bdag de'i bkru sman mchod nas de'i nye du dag song ste sman pa la dris pa/_khyim bdag de bkru sman mchod na thabs ji lta bur bgyi zhes smras pa dang /_de la bkru sman sus blud/_de dag gis 
[\[111b.4\]]'phags pa 'di zhes bya bas blud do zhes smras pa dang /_de khros nas de nyid kyi gan du song la dris shig ces smras so/_/de dag gis de de'u shi ba las sos nas de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[111b.5\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na dge slong dag gis rngan pa len cing sman ma gtong shig_/de ste bkru sman btang na yang gud du ma 'gro shig_/de 'dra ba'i rkyen cig byung na yang sman dpyad ston la song shig_/de bzhin du ma byas par song na yang 'das pa dang 
[\[111b.6\]]bcas par 'gyur ro/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/_nor bdag gis nor chags pa bzung ste/_des de la dus 'di tsam zhig na byin cig ces dus btab nas btang ngo /_/des bsams pa/_de ltar dus btab tu zin kyang ngas dus bzhin du gzhal bar 
[\[111b.7\]]mi nus kyis ji nas dus la bab na bros te 'gro'o snyam du bsams so/_/phyis yang bsams pa/_yul dang bral te 'gro ba yang rab tu sdug bsngal gyis ji nas nor bdag de gsad do snyam bsams nas de dze ta'i tshal du 'gro ba'i lam du des de bsad do/_/ji tsam 
[\[112a\]]
[\[112a.1\]]zhig na drug sde dag gis de mthong nas de dag gis bsams pa/_bdag cag gis phyag dar khrod kyi gos rnyed do snyam bsams nas/_des bshu bar brtsams pa dang /_de'i gnyen dag gnas der 'ongs nas de dag gis de mthong ste ngu ba la 
[\[112a.2\]]zhugs nas khyed cag gis bsad do zhes smras pa dang /_de dag gis nged kyis ni ma bsad kyi gdon mi za bar dgras bsad do zhes smras so/_/de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[112a.3\]]dge slong dag de'i gnyen rnams dogs pa skyes pa ni yus te/_de bas na dge slong dag gis de 'dra ba'i phyag dar khrod ni ma len cig_/gang gi tshe na skye bo mang po dag gis rtogs par gyur pa de'i tshe na blang bar bya ste/_de ltar ma byas na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur 
[\[112a.4\]]ro/_/gleng gzhi'i sgo gsum pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa lnga pa'o//_//'dul ba gzhung dam pa/_bam po sum bcu rtsa lnga pa/_mdor na/_lcags kyi gong bu gzar bu dang /_/rgyab khur rked pa mgo bo dang /_/pha dang ma la gos dang 
[\[112a.5\]]zas/_/spu can chos gos gsum pa'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa na dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pA lis zhus pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 
[\[112a.6\]]'das kyis lcags kyi gong bu lcags thag gis thogs shig ces gsungs na/_lcags thag ji lta bur gdags par bgyi/_u pA li de ni rin po che las byas pa ma gtogs pa'o/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis sman gyi gzar bu chongs shig ces gsungs na/_
[\[112a.7\]]ji lta bu bcang bar bgyi/_u pA li de ni rin po che las byas pa ma gtogs pa'o/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag rgyab dang rked pa dang mgo la khur ma khyer cig ces gsungs na/_btsun pa dge slong ma dag gis kyang rgyab dang rked pa dang mgo la khur mi bkur bar 
[\[112b\]]
[\[112b.1\]]bgyi'am/_u pA li dge slong ma dag gis kyang rgyab dang rked pa dang mgo la khur ma khyer cig_/de ste [(]khyar [,]khyer [)]na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/_mnyan du yod pa na khyim bdag gzhan zhig gis rigs mnyam pa las chung 
[\[112b.2\]]ma zhig blangs te/_de dang lhan cig rtse dga' yongs su spyod do/_/de dang lhan cig tu rtse dga' yongs su spyad nas dus phyi zhig na de'i chung ma sems can dang ldan par gyur nas/_de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang /_de la bu gzugs legs pa blta na sdug pa/_
[\[112b.3\]]bzang ba/_yan lag thams cad dang ldan pa'i khye'u zhig btsas te/_de dag gis skyes pa'i skyes ston chen po byas nas ming btags so/_/de bsrings bskyed de cher gyur pa dang /_ji tsam dus phyi zhig na pha ma la ma gsol bar bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la 
[\[112b.4\]]rab tu byung ngo /_/de snga dro sham thabs bgos nas lhung bzed dang chos gos khyer te mnyan du yod par bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang /_de'i pha rgan pos mthong nas bu khyod rab tu byung na nged cag sus gso bar 'gyur zhes smras pa dang /_de spa gong nas cang mi smra 
[\[112b.5\]]bar gyur to/_/de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag pha dang ma ni bu'i dka' ba byed pa yin te/_de lta bas na bu rab tu byung yang pha ma gnyis kyi bza' ba dang bgo ba dag 
[\[112b.6\]]sbyor bar rjes su gnang ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis rab tu byung yang pha ma gnyis kyi bza' ba dang bgo ba dag sbyor cig ces gsungs pa dang /_dge slong dag gis ji ltar sbyar ba mi shes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gang lhung bzed dang chos 
[\[112b.7\]]gos lhag par gyur pa des sbyar bar byos shig_/de ste med na sbyin bdag las slongs te sbyor cig_/de ste dge 'dun du gtogs la dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa dbang bar gyur na de'i phyed byin cig_/de ste bsod snyoms pa zhig na bsod snyoms kyi phyed sbyin par gyis 
[\[113a\]]
[\[113a.1\]]shig_/de ltar ma byas na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/_mnyan du yod pa nas mi ring ba zhig na ri brags kyi grong zhig yod de/_ri brags kyi grong de na gtsug lag khang zhig yod pa de'i nang na rgan 
[\[113a.2\]]zhugs gzhan zhig gnas te/_de nas dus phyi zhig na mchod rten la phyag 'tshal ba'i phyir mnyan du yod par song ngo /_/drug sde rnams ni chos kyis kyang drug sde'i nang na gcig gis ni dze ta'i tshal gyi sgo srung bas na tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' bo sgo na 'dug pa des mgo 
[\[113a.3\]]dkar la smin ma ring ba zhig rgyang ring po nas 'ong ba mthong nas des bsams pa/_dge slong gnas brtan gang zhig 'dir 'ong bsur 'gro'am snyam bsams te/_de sngar song ba dang /_des gnas brtan bde bar 'ongs sam zhes smras so/_/des slob dpon phyag 
[\[113a.4\]]'tshal lo/_/phyag 'tshal lo zhes smras pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' bos bsams pa/_rgan zhugs 'dis slob dpon yang mi shes/_mkhan po yang mi shes par rig nas des rgan zhugs tshur shog_/gtsug lag khang du 'dong ngo zhes smras so/_/des 
[\[113a.5\]]gtsug lag khang du khrid nas ngal bsor bcug pa dang /_de cung zad cig 'dug nas slob dpon bdag ni mchod rten la phyag 'tshal du mchi'o zhes smras pa dang /_nye dga' bos sdod cig dang 'du ba'i dus la bab pa dang bya'o zhes smras pa dang /_des slob dpon 
[\[113a.6\]]bdag gis chos gos gsum ga yang khyer te ma 'ongs pas 'gro'o zhes smras pa dang /_nye dga' bos rgan zhugs sdod cig dang /_'dir chos gos gsum byin gyis brlab par bya'o zhes smras nas/_ji tsam na 'dus par gyur pa dang /_des de la par thang ni mthang 
[\[113a.7\]]gos su byin gyis brlabs/_la ba ni stod g.yogs su byin gyis brlabs/_be'u ras ni sbyar mar byin gyis brlabs te/_de nas la ba dang be'u ras gnyis phrag pa la bzhag nas par thang gis dkris pa'i steng du the gus dkris te dam du bcings nas de nas 'dus pa'i 
[\[113b\]]
[\[113b.1\]]nang du btang ba dang /_dge slong dag gis mthong nas/_dge slong kun tu bcings pa kha cig ni nyes pa ngor brjod do/_/kha cig gis ni rgan zhugs pha bi ci'i phyir smyon thabs byed ces smras pa dang /_des tshe dang ldan pa dag 'di ni kho bo'i chos gos gsum yin 
[\[113b.2\]]te/_kho bo ni glo bur du 'ongs na gang du gzhag ces smras pa dang /_de dag gis chos gos gsum de 'dra ba yin nam zhes smras pa dang /_des gang la med pa de ci 'dra bar 'gyur zhes smras so/_/de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa 
[\[113b.3\]]dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gang nyes pa'i dmigs su gyur pa de ni dge slong dag gis spu ring po las chos gos gsum du byin gyis brlabs pa ste/_de lta bas na dge slong dag gis spu ring po las chos gos gsum du byin gyis brlab par mi 
[\[113b.4\]]gnang bar dgongs nas bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag dge slong rnams nyes pa ngor brjod pa ni yus te/_nyes pa'i dmigs su gyur pa de ni spu ring po las chos gos gsum du byin gyis brlabs pa ste/_de lta bas na dge slong dag spu ring po las chos gos gsum 
[\[113b.5\]]byin gyis ma brlab shig_/de ste byin gyis brlabs na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag spu ring po las chos gos gsum du byin gyis ma brlab shig ces gsungs pa dang /_dad pa'i bram ze dang khyim bdag gis la ba dang phrug 
[\[113b.6\]]stan dang be'u ras dag phul ba dang /_dge slong dag the tshom skyes nas ma blangs pa dang /_des 'phags pa dag nam sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du mi 'byung ba'i tshe na ni mu stegs can dag yon gnas lags na/_da ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig 
[\[113b.7\]]rten du byung bas khyed cag yon gnas yin te/_da khyed kyis ma blangs na bdag cag gi dge ba'i zong med bzhin du 'jig rten pha rol du ji ltar 'gro zhes smras pa dang /_de dag cang mi zer bar gyur to/_/de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 
[\[114a\]]
[\[114a.1\]]gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag dad pa'i bram ze dang khyim bdag zer ba ni bden te/_de lta bas na ngas rjes su gnang gis long la spu thung rnams ni lhag pa'i gos su byin gyis rlobs shig_/spu ring po 
[\[114a.2\]]rnams ni yon bdag gir byin gyis rlobs la bcang bar gyis shig_/gleng gzhi'i sgo gsum pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa drug pa'o//_//mdor na/_dbu dang sen mo'i mchod rten dang /_/kha dog dkar po mar me dang /_/khyim dang mar me snod dag dang /_/
[\[114a.3\]]bal glang btsun mo rta babs so/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa na dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin ni chos kyis nang par sngar langs nas/_bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi 
[\[114a.4\]]dge 'dun gyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal du 'gro'o/_/ji tsam dus phyi zhig na bcom ldan 'das kyis sems can gyi bsod nams kyi don bstan pa'i phyir 'breg mkhan bkug nas skra dang kha spu yang bregs pa dang /_de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin dze ta'i tshal du 
[\[114a.5\]]song nas/_bcom ldan 'das la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su gnang na bdag gis dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten brtsig par bgyi zhes gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na khyim bdag ngas 
[\[114a.6\]]rjes su gnang gis rtsigs shig_/des gzhi yangs pa'i gnas zhig tu mdza' bo dang /_phu nu dang /_gnyen dag dang lhan cig tu rim gro cher byas nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten yang skye bo thams cad kyis blta na sdug pa 
[\[114a.7\]]zhig brtsigs na rdo thal gyis ma byugs pas mi mdzes par gyur nas/_de yang bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du song nas/_zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu skra dang sen mo'i 
[\[114b\]]
[\[114b.1\]]mchod rten skye bo thams cad kyis blta na sdug pa zhig brtsigs na rdo thal gyis ma byugs kyi bar du mi mdzes par gyur na/_de la bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_bdag gis rdo thal gyis byug par bgyi'o zhes gsol pa dang /_bcom 
[\[114b.2\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na khyim bdag ngas rjes su gnang gis rdo thal gyis skus shig_/des rdo thal gyis bskus nas dri dang /_bdug pa dang /_me tog gis mchod pa byas so/_/mtshan mo mar me med pas mi mdzes par gyur nas/_de 
[\[114b.3\]]yang bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten rdo thal gyis bskus nas 
[\[114b.4\]]dri dang /_byug pa dang /_me tog dag gis mchod pa bgyis na/_mtshan mo zhugs mar ma mchis te mi mdzes par gyur na/_de la bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su gnang na/_bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten mchod pa bgyis la 
[\[114b.5\]]mtshan mo zhugs mar gyi phreng ba bud do zhes gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na khyim bdag ngas rjes su gnang gis de la mchod pa gyis te/_nub mo dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten gyi steng du mar me'i phreng ba bus shig_/de 
[\[114b.6\]]nas mar zags nas mchod rten gyi kha dog dkar po yang ma rung bar gyur te/_des bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_mar me'i phreng ba 'og tu zhog shig_/des mar me'i phreng ba 'og tu bzhag pa dang /_khyis mar 
[\[114b.7\]]me 'thungs nas snod kyang khyer ro/_/de yang bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song nas zhabs la phyag 'tshal te gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten gyi 'og tu zhugs mar gyi phreng ba bzhag na/_khyi dag gis 
[\[115a\]]
[\[115a.1\]]mar 'tshal nas zhugs mar gyi snod kyang 'tshal te mchis na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_bdag gis zhugs mar gyi khang bu bgyi'o zhes gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de bas na 
[\[115a.2\]]khyim bdag ngas rjes su gnang gis de ltar byos shig_/des mar me'i khang bu dag kyang byas so/_/dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten la ba lang dag gis bsnyogs pa dang /_de yang bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song nas zhabs la phyag byas te 'di 
[\[115a.3\]]skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten brtsigs pa la ba lang dag gis bsnyogs par gyur na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis de la rjes su gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_bdag gis stegs bus 
[\[115a.4\]]bskor bar bgyi'o zhes gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na khyim bdag ngas rjes su gnang gis bskor bar byos shig_/des stegs bus bskor na rta babs med pa dang /_mi mdzes par gyur te/_de yang bcom ldan 
[\[115a.5\]]'das gang na ba der song nas zhabs la phyag 'tshal te gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten gyi tha ma stegs bus bskor na stegs bu de'i rta babs ma mchis te mi mdzes na/_de la bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[115a.6\]]rjes su gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_bdag gis stegs bu'i rta babs bgyi'o zhes gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na khyim bdag ngas rjes su gnang gis byos shig ces bka' stsal pa dang /_des rta babs byas te yo 
[\[115a.7\]]byad thams cad bsogs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten la mdza' bo dang phu nu dang gnyen dag bsogs nas mchod pa chen po byas so/_/skye bo mang po dag de lta bu mthong nas rab tu mos te/_de dag dad pa skyes nas de dag gis kyang rnam pa 
[\[115b\]]
[\[115b.1\]]de lta bur bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten dag gnas gnas su brtsigs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa na ji srid dgyes pa'i bar du bzhugs nas rgyal po'i khab gang na ba der gzhongs spyad pa spyod cing rgyal po'i khab tu byon to/_/
[\[115b.2\]]rgyal po'i khab kyi 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na bzhugs so/_/rgyal po gzugs can snying pos bcom ldan 'das dbus 'gyur 'chang nas gzhongs spyad pa spyod cing rgyal po'i khab tu byon to/_/rgyal po'i khab kyi 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na 
[\[115b.3\]]bzhugs par thos te thos nas rgyal po'i mthu chen po dang /_yo lang chen pos nang gi btsun mo dang /_gzhon nu dang /_blon po dang /_nang gi skye bo dag dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos 
[\[115b.4\]]phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang /_bag la nyal ba dang /_khams dang /_rang bzhin mkhyen nas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba'i chos de lta bu bshad de/_de thos pa dang rgyal po gzugs can 
[\[115b.5\]]snying pos lha stong phrag brgyad bcu dang lhan cig tu 'jig tshogs su lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byas so/_/des bden pa mthong nas lha stong phrag brgyad bcu dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das la dus gsum du 
[\[115b.6\]]ltar 'dong ngo /_/des dus phyi zhig na dpyid kyi dus la bab pas shing rtsi dag kyang me tog rgyas/_ngang pa dang /_khrung khrung dang /_rma bya dang /_ne tso dang /_ske ga dang /_ko ki la dang /_dzi ba dzi ba ka la sogs pa yang skad 'byin par byed pa'i nags stug po de na nang gi 
[\[115b.7\]]btsun mo dag gis bskor cing 'dug 'dug pa las/_de la nang gi btsun mo dag gis gsol pa/_lha bdag cag gis nyin re re zhing bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal lta zhing mchi bar mi nus na lha nang gi btsun mo dag gi dbus su de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu skra dang sen mo'i 
[\[116a\]]
[\[116a.1\]]mchod rten zhig brtsig par mdzod cig dang /_de la bdag cag gis rim gro bskyed de me tog dang /_dri dang /_byug pa dang /_spos dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dag gis mchod par bgyi'o zhes gsol pa dang /_des bcom 
[\[116a.2\]]ldan 'das la gsol ba btab ste/_bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu skra dang sen mo stsol cig dang /_bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten nang gi btsun mo dag gi dbus su brtsig go zhes gsol pa dang /_de nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[116a.3\]]kyis dbu skra dang sen mo stsal nas des bsti stang dang rim gro cher byas te/_nang gi btsun mo dag dang lhan cig tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten nang gi btsun mo'i dbus su brtsigs nas/_de la nang gi btsun mo dag gis mar me dang /_spos dang /_
[\[116a.4\]]me tog dang /_dri dang /_byug pa dag gis rab tu mchod pa byas so/_/gang gi tshe rgyal po ma skyes dgra la mi dge ba'i bshes gnyan lha sbyin gyis sbad nas pha chos can chos bzhin du rgyal po byed pa 'tsho ba dang yongs su phral nas bdag nyid rgyal por zhugs so/_/
[\[116a.5\]]de'i tshe na bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la chos kyi sbyin pa thams cad gcad par khrims bcas pas sus kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten la bya ba mi byed do/_/gang gi tshe bco lnga'i skabs 'byed pa'i dus la bab pa de'i tshe na yang dbu skra 
[\[116a.6\]]dang sen mo'i mchod rten la su yang phyag dar dang /_mar me dang /_me tog dag gis mchod pa mi byed do/_/de nas btsun mo dag gis dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten la rnam pa de lta bu mthong nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po dran te de dag mi dga' ste/_mya ngan 
[\[116a.7\]]byed cing kyi hud chos kyi rgyal po dang bral bar gyur nas bdag cag gi bsod nams kyang zad par gyur to zhes zer zhing ngu bar gyur to/_/de'i nang nas btsun mo dpal gyi blo gros ma zhes bya ba zhig gis 'tsho ba la ma bltas par sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rjes su dran nas dbu skra dang 
[\[116b\]]
[\[116b.1\]]sen mo'i mchod rten gyi phyag dar byas te mar me'i phreng ba dag phul lo/_/ji tsam na ma skyes dgra khang steng du byung ste bltas pa dang snang ba chen po byung ba mthong nas ma bi ci zhig ces dris pa dang /_gzhan zhig gis dpal gyi blo gros mas dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten 
[\[116b.2\]]la zhugs mar gyi phreng ba phul lo zhes smras pa dang /_dpal gyi blo gros ma bos nas ci'i phyir rgyal po'i khrims las 'gal bar bya zhes smras pa dang /_btsun mos kho mos rgyal po'i khrims dang 'gal mod kyi/_'on kyang kho mos chos kyi rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i khrims 
[\[116b.3\]]las ma 'gal lo zhes smras pa dang /_de khros te 'khor lo 'phangs nas de 'tsho ba dang phral ba dang /_de bcom ldan 'das la sems mngon par dad bzhin du dus las 'das pa dang /_sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i gnas bzang por skyes so/_/de'i tshe na lha rnams 
[\[116b.4\]]'dun sar 'dus so/_/de nas lha'i bu mo dpal gyi blo gros ma dpag tshad kho ra khor yug tu snang ba'i 'od kyis lus bskor nas lha'i 'dun sar song ngo /_/de nas brgya byin lha'i dbang pos dpag tshad kho ra khor yug tu rgya cher snang ba'i 'od mthong nas dris pa/_gser 
[\[116b.5\]]gyis lus la su yis bskus/_/pad mo ut+pal bzhin 'dra ba/_/dpal ldan mi mtshungs ci las byung /_/khyod las 'dir ni 'od byung ba/_/ci phyir khyod gdong pad mo kha 'bus 'dra/_/khyod ni gser gyi 'od 'dra ba/_/ci yi 'bras bu lha mo bdag la smros/_/gang 
[\[116b.6\]]gi las la byung ba spyod/_/lha mos smras pa/_'jig rten gsum gyi mgon po ni/_/skye bo rnams kyi mar me ste/_/sangs rgyas mchog gi mtshan mthong bas/_/mun sel de la mar me phul/_/nyon mongs mun pa sel la phul/_/zla ba'i 'od zer 'dra ba'i 'od 
[\[116b.7\]]mthong nas/_/thub pa gsal ba'i dngos po ste/_/ston pa'i 'od mthu mthong bas na/_/gsung ba mchog la phyag byas pas/_/de yi las kyis 'dir skyes te/_/bdag la rab tu gsal zhing mdzes/_/bdag gdong blta na sdug pa ni/_/pad mo zla bzhin rnam
