[\[117a\]]
[\[117a.1\]]par dag_/brgya byin gyis smras pa/_e ma'o zhing 'di yon tan can/_/nyes pa thams cad rnam spangs la/_/mtho ris gang du skye ba yi/_/khyod kyis sa bon der btab bo/_/gser bzhin spungs la dkar ba yi/_/rnam pa mchog la sus mi 
[\[117a.2\]]mchod/_/sangs rgyas pad mo kha 'byes bzhin/_/gang du lhag pas bskyed pa pad mo spyan/_/yan lag mchog rnams 'bar ba ste/_/spyan ni me tog ka ma la dang 'dra/_/chos nyid kyis lha'i bu pho'am lha'i bu mo yang rung ste/_sum bcu rtsa gsum du skyes nas ring 
[\[117a.3\]]po ma lon par gang nas shi 'phos pa dang /_gang du skyes pa dang /_las gang yin pas skyes pa ste/_sems 'di gsum skye bar 'gyur ro/_/lha'i bu mo dpal gyi blo gros mas bdag gang nas shi 'phos zhes bltas na mi las so/_/gang du snyam pa dang /_sum 
[\[117a.4\]]bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i khams bzang por skyes par mthong ngo /_/las gang yin zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das la sems rab tu dad pa'o snyam du sems nas/_de nas dpal gyi blo gros mas 'di snyam du bdag gis zhag lon la bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal blta bar mi 
[\[117a.5\]]rigs kyi ci nas bdag gis zhag ma lon par bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro'o snyam bsams nas/_de nas lha'i bu mo dpal gyi blo gros mas dri ma med pa'i 'tsher ba'i rna cha ni thogs/_lus do shal dang se mo dos brgyan te/_lha'i me tog ut+pal dang /_
[\[117a.6\]]pad mo dang /_ku mu da dang /_puN+Da rI ka dang /_man dA ra ba la sogs pa'i me tog dag gis pang pa bkang nas 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa rgya chen pos thams cad 'od kyis snang bar byas te/_bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis mngon par gtor nas chos nyan 
[\[117a.7\]]pa'i phyir song ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang /_bag la nyal ba dang /_khams dang /_rang bzhin mkhyen nas ji ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rab tu rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bshad de thos nas/_lha'i bu mo dpal gyi blo gros mas 
[\[117b\]]
[\[117b.1\]]'jig tshogs su lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byas so/_/des bden pa mthong nas brjod par bya ba rnam gsum brjod do/_/btsun pa bdag la 'di ltar ni phas kyang ma bgyis/_mas kyang ma bgyis/_
[\[117b.2\]]rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/_lhas kyang ma bgyis/_sdug pas kyang ma bgyis/_phu nu dang gnyen gyis kyang ma bgyis/_tshe snga ma la ma bgyis/_bram ze dang dge sbyong gis kyang ma bgyis te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi mchi ma dang khrag gi rgya mtsho ni bskams/_
[\[117b.3\]]rus pa'i ri las ni bsgral/_ngan song gi sgo ni bkum/_mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo ni phye ste bdag ni lha dang mi'i gnas su gzhag go zhes gsol to/_/smras pa/_khyod kyi mthus ni rab gsal ba/_/ngan song lam ste nyes mang po/_/mtho ris bsod nams 
[\[117b.4\]]sgo yang phye/_/mya ngan 'das pa'i lam yang bdag gis thob/_/khyod la brten nas nyes pa rnams kyang spangs/_/bdag gis rtag tu rnam dag mig kyang thob/_/'phags pa dga' zhing zhi ba'i lam yang thob/_/sdug bsngal mtsho las pha rol bdag 
[\[117b.5\]]rgal nas/_/'gro ba na yang lha mi rnams kyis mchod/_/skye rga 'chi ba'i nyes pa dang bral ba/_/srid pa stong du'ang rab tu mthong bar dka'/_/de ring thub pa'i zhal mthong 'bras bu thob/_/btud nas se mo do yang rab tu 'phyang /_/zhabs gnyis la yang 
[\[117b.6\]]phyag byas dga' ba skyes/_/rgyal la g.yas kyi phyogs nas bskor byas nas/_/lha yi 'jig rten khams su mngon du song /_/de nas lha'i bu mo dpal gyi blo gros ma tshong pa khe rnyed pa bzhin/_zhing pa lo legs pa bzhin/_dpa' bo g.yul las rgyal ba 
[\[117b.7\]]bzhin/_nad pa nad thams cad las thar ba bzhin/_longs spyod gang dang ldan pas bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du 'ongs pa'i longs spyod de nyid dang bdag gi gnas su song ngo /_/dge slong dag srod dang tho rangs mi nyal zhing thub pa la brtson zhing 'khod pa dang /_
[\[118a\]]
[\[118a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das kyi der 'od rgya cher snang ba mthong ngo /_/mthong nas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_ci bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das la zhal lta ba'i phyir tshangs pa 'khor gyi bdag po'am/_brgya byin lha'i dbang po'am/_'jig rten skyong ba 
[\[118a.2\]]bzhi'am/_gang zhig gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal ltar mchis zhes gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag tshangs pa 'khor gyi bdag po yang ma yin/_brgya byin lha'i dbang po yang ma yin/_'jig rten skyong ba bzhi la 
[\[118a.3\]]sogs pa lhags pa'ang ma yin mod kyi rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i chung ma dpal gyi blo gros ma zhes bya ba zhig gis bdag gi 'tsho ba la ma bltas te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten la mar me'i phreng ba phul ba dang /_de nas rgyal 
[\[118a.4\]]po ma skyes dgras 'khor lo 'phangs te 'tsho ba dang phral lo/_/de nga la sems mngon par dad bzhin du dus 'das nas sum bcu rtsa gsum du gnas bzang po'i lhar skyes so/_/de nub mo nga'i drung du 'ongs te de la ngas chos bshad nas des bden pa mthong ste 
[\[118a.5\]]bdag gi gnas su song ngo /_/de lta bas na dge slong dag bsod nams la 'jigs par ma byed cig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni bde ba'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/mos pa dang /_sdug pa dang /_shin tu sdug pa dang /_yid du 'ong bar gyur pa ni 'di lta ste/_
[\[118a.6\]]bsod nams so/_/dge slong dag khyed cag gis bsod nams ma yin pa la 'jigs par gyis shig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni sdug bsngal gyi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/ma mos pa dang /_mi sdug pa dang /_shin tu mi sdug pa dang /_yid du mi 'ong ba ni 'di 
[\[118a.7\]]lta ste/_bsod nams ma yin pa'o/_/dge slong dag ngas yun ring po nas kyang mngon par mthong ste/_yun ring po nas bsod nams byas pa/_rnam par smin pa la mos pa dang /_sdug pa dang /_shin tu sdug pa dang /_yid du 'ong ba dag myong bar 'gyur 
[\[118b\]]
[\[118b.1\]]ro/_/dge slong dag ngas lo bdun gyi bar du byams pa'i sems bsgoms pas bskal pa 'jig pa dang rtas pa bdun gyi bar du 'jig rten 'dir ma 'ongs so/_/'jig rten 'jig pa'i tshe kun snang ba'i lha'i ris su skyes so/_/rtas pa'i tshe tshangs pa'i gzhal 
[\[118b.2\]]med khang stong par skyes nas der yang ngas tshangs pa dang tshangs chen gyi bdag por gyur nas ngas zil gyis gnon gyi gzhan gyis ma yin no/_/sems can brgya phrag bcu la dbang sgyur te/_sems can gyi nang na mchog tu bsngags so/_/stong phrag sum bcu rtsa 
[\[118b.3\]]drug gi bar du brgya byin lha'i dbang por gyur to/_/brgya phrag grangs med pa'i bar du 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur te/_mtha' bzhi btul nas rin po che bdun dang ldan no/_/rin po che sna bdun ni rnam pa 'di lta bu yin te/_'di lta ste/_'khor lo rin po che 
[\[118b.4\]]dang /_bal glang rin po che dang /_rta rin po che dang /_nor bu rin po che dang /_chung ma rin po che dang /_khyim bdag rin po che dang /_dmag mi rin po che dang bdun no/_/nga la bu yang stong tshang nas de dag kyang dpa' ba dang /_nus pa dang /_gzugs su ldan pa/_pha 
[\[118b.5\]]rol gyi sde tshar gcod pa ste/_de yang ngas 'di ltar rgya mtsho'i mtha' tshun chad sa chen po 'di chos kyis btul gyi/_dbyug pa dang mtshon gyis gnon cing mi bde ba med par gnas so/_/de'i tshe yang nga 'di snyam du las gang gi 'bras bu rnam par smin pas bdag 'dir 
[\[118b.6\]]mthu che rdzu 'phrul che bar gyur snyam bsams nas/_yang 'di snyam du las 'di'i 'bras bu gsum dang las 'di'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa gsum gyis bdag 'di ltar mthu che rdzu 'phrul che bar gyur te/_gsum gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sbyin pa dang /_gdul ba 
[\[118b.7\]]dang /_dul ba'o snyam du bsams nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad gsungs nas yang ston pas 'di skad gsungs so/_/dge zhing bde bar 'dod pa yi/_/bsod nams rnam par smin la ltos/_/lo bdun bar du dge slong dag_/byams par byed pa'i sems 
[\[119a\]]
[\[119a.1\]]bsgoms pas/_/bskal pa 'jig cing rtas 'gyur ba/_/bdun du 'jig rten 'dir ma 'ongs/_/'jig pa'i tshe na bdag nyid ni/_/'jig rten kun snang dang bar gnas/_/rtas nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten na/_/tshangs chen dbang sgyur gnas su 
[\[119a.2\]]yang /_/lan bdun gyi ni bar du gnas/_/sum bcu rtsa drug bar du ni/_/lha yi rgyal po byas par gyur/_/brgya phrag grangs med par du yang /_/rgyal po rab tu 'jigs grags byas/_/rgyal rigs rgyal thabs spyi bor blugs/_/'dzam bu gnas kyi 
[\[119a.3\]]dbang por gyur/_/dbyug dang mtshon gyis ma yin par/_/'jig rten 'di yang thul bar byas/_/chos nyid kyis ni rkyen med par/_/yang dag rjes su slob par gyur/_/chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor nas/_/sa yi dkyil 'khor 'di dag tu/_/phyug cing 
[\[119a.4\]]longs spyod che ba der/_/de 'dra'i rigs su nga yang skyes/_/nor rdzas thams cad phun sum tshogs/_/rin chen sna bdun de bzhin te/_/nor dang yo byad mang por ldan/_/rgyal po grags shing 'jigs par gyur/_/mthu chen de yi rgyu yis ni/_/gang du skyes 
[\[119a.5\]]pa'i mchog tu gyur/_/sangs rgyas 'jig rten phan pa can/_/de yis 'di ltar bshad pa'o/_/ngo mtshar che ba 'di shes pa/_/de yang rdzu 'phrul chung ma yin/_/mkhas pa gang gis dad mi 'gyur/_/de ste rigs ni dma' gyur kyang /_/de la phan par 'dod pa dang /_/mthu 
[\[119a.6\]]rnams chen por mngon 'dod pa/_/dam pa'i chos la bla mar byos/_/sangs rgyas bstan la dran par gyis/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad gsungs pa dang /_dge slong dag yid mgu ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga'o/_/gleng gzhi'i nang nas 
[\[119a.7\]]sgo gsum pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa bdun pa'o//_//mdor na/_khyim rmang rta babs bcas pa dang /_/bag ma stegs bu bcas pa ste/_/ka ba mtshal gyis byugs pa dang /_/rtsig pa rgya skyegs ri mo bri/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dze ta'i 
[\[119b\]]
[\[119b.1\]]tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin pa bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad du de ste bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[119b.2\]]rjes su gnang na bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten la mtha' ma dri gtsang khang gis bskor la rta babs kyang gzugs par bgyi'o zhes gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na khyim bdag rjes su gnang 
[\[119b.3\]]gis byos shig_/yang bcom ldan 'das de ste rjes su gnang na bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten la ba gam bgyi'o zhes gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_khyim bdag de lta bas na ngas rjes su gnang 
[\[119b.4\]]gis byos shig_/de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de ste rjes su gnang ba na bdag gis ba gam gyis bskor ba bgyi'o zhes gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na khyim bdag ngas rjes su gnang gis byos shig_/yang bcom 
[\[119b.5\]]ldan 'das kyis de ste rjes su gnang na bdag gis ka ba dag mtshal gyis byug go zhes gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_khyim bdag de lta bas na rjes su gnang gis byos shig_/yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de ste rjes su gnang na bdag 
[\[119b.6\]]gis rtsig ngos rgya skyegs kyis bri bar bgyi'o zhes gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_khyim bdag de lta bas na rjes su gnang gis bris shig_/gleng gzhi'i nang nas sgo gsum pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa brgyad pa'o//_//mdor na/_ba 
[\[119b.7\]]lang so dang tha gu dang /_/phreng ba rin chen phreng ba can/_/g.yog ma dang ni snying po dang /_/snying po yi ni sgo yang ngo /_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa na dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dbu skra dang 
[\[120a\]]
[\[120a.1\]]sen mo'i mchod rten la mchod pa dang /_bkur sti byos shig ces gsungs na/_dge slong dag gis mchod rten la mchod pa byed pa na phur bu btab nas me tog gi phreng ba btags pa dang /_bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa dag gis mthong nas ci'i phyir 'di ltar 
[\[120a.2\]]dge slong dag gis ston pa'i mchod rten phur bu med pa la phur bu btab ces phyas 'dogs so/_/de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_bram ze dang khyim bdag 'phya ba ni yus te/_de lta bas 
[\[120a.3\]]na mchod rten la phur bus ma btab par ba lang gi so lta bu chung ngus thob shig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis ba lang gi so lta bu chung ngus thob shig ces bka' stsal pa dang /_dge slong dag gis mchod rten la khung bu brkos te ba lang gi so lta bu 'dzugs pa la zhugs pa 
[\[120a.4\]]dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis mchod rten la khung bu brkos te ba lang gi so lta bu ma gzugs par mchod rten rtsig pa'i tshe na tshugs shig ces bka' stsal to/_/dge slong dag mchod pa byed pa na mchod rten la 'dzegs nas me tog gi phreng ba rnams mgur chu'i bre la 
[\[120a.5\]]'dogs pa dang /_bram ze dang khyim bdag dag gis mthong nas ci'i phyir 'di ltar dge slong dag gis 'di ltar ston pa'i mchod rten la rdog pas rdzi zhing 'dong zhing 'dong zhes 'phyas 'dogs so/_/de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom 
[\[120a.6\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams 'phya ba ni yus te/_de lta bas na dge slong dag gis ston pa'i mchod rten la rdog pas rdzi zhing ma 'dong shig_/de ste mchod pa'i phyir na ni khyim pas 'dzegs shig_/de med na dge tshul pas rkang pa gnyis 
[\[120a.7\]]khrus la dris byug gam gos kyis dkris te 'dzegs shig_/de dag kyang med na dge slong gis ston par 'du shes zhog la dus la bab par soms te de ltar de bzhin du 'dzegs la dri'i ri mo byos shig_/mchod rten che ste 'dzeg mi nus pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[120b\]]
[\[120b.1\]]stsal pa/_thag pas thogs te 'dzegs shig_/dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten la me tog gi phreng ba dbul ba phul ba dang /_de dag rnyis te mi mdzes par gyur nas/_khyim bdag skyabs med zas sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten la me 
[\[120b.2\]]tog gi phreng ba phul ba dang de dag rnyis te mi mdzes nas/_de ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na ni bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten la rin po che'i phreng ba dbul lo zhes gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na khyim bdag gnang 
[\[120b.3\]]gis phul cig_/dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten la bya rog la sogs pa bya rnams 'khod de de dag gi rtug pas mchod rten ma rung bar gyur pa dang /_khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'das la dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten la bya rog la sogs pa bya rnams 
[\[120b.4\]]mchis shing rtug pas mchod rten ma rung bar bgyis na/_de ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na/_bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten la g.yog pa'i snying pos g.yog go zhes gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag de lta bas na gnang 
[\[120b.5\]]gis g.yog pa'i snying pos g.yogs shig ces bka' stsal pa dang /_des g.yog pa'i snying pos g.yogs so/_/g.yogs pa de dbyar 'drul zhing mun pas mi snang bar gyur pa dang /_khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'das la bdag gis dbu 
[\[120b.6\]]skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten la g.yog pa'i snying pos g.yogs pa de da ltar dbyar gyi chab kyis rul te mun par gyur nas mi mngon na de ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na bdag gis chab sgo gdod do zhes gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas 
[\[120b.7\]]na khyim bdag gnang gis sgo thod cig_/gleng gzhi'i nang nas sgo gsum pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa dgu pa'o//_//mdor na/_khar ba la sogs mchod rten bya/_/gser dang dngul la sogs pa dang /_/rgyal mtshan gyis su 'di la bskor/_/'bru mar la sogs chag 
[\[121a\]]
[\[121a.1\]]chag gdab/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa na dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs 
[\[121a.2\]]la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces bcom ldan 'das kyis de ste gnang na bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi khar ba'i mchod rten bgyi'o zhes gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_khyim bdag de lta bas na gnang gis byos 
[\[121a.3\]]shig_/yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de ste gnang na gser gyi mchod rten bgyi'o zhes gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_khyim bdag de lta bas na gnang gis byos shig_/de bzhin du dngul las byas pa dang /_bai DUr+ya las byas pa dang /_shel 
[\[121a.4\]]las byas pa rgya cher byos shig_/de ste yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten la rgyal mtshan 'bul lo zhes gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_khyim bdag de lta bas na gnang gis 
[\[121a.5\]]phul cig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal mtshan phul cig ces gsungs pa dang /_des ci 'dra ba zhig dbul ba mi shes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rgyal mtshan bzhi ste/_seng ge'i rgyal mtshan dang /_chu srin gyi rgyal mtshan dang /_klu'i rgyal mtshan dang /_
[\[121a.6\]]khyu mchog gi rgyal mtshan no/_/de ste yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten la 'bru mar gyis chag chag gdab bo zhes gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na khyim bdag gnang 
[\[121a.7\]]gis chag chag thob shig_/yang gsol pa/_de ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten la ldong ros kyis byug go zhes gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na khyim bdag gnang gis 
[\[121b\]]
[\[121b.1\]]yugs shig_/ji ltar ldong ros kyis byug pa de bzhin du tsan dan gyis byug pa yang rgya cher byos shig_/gleng gzhi'i nang nas sgo gsum pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa bcu pa ste/_gleng gzhi'i nang nas sgo gsum pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//mdor bsdus par na/_sgo leb 
[\[121b.2\]]dang yang de ltar dbyar/_/drug sde dag dang btso blag mkhan/_/gzhong pa gtan pa de bzhin te/_/kun tu rgyu dang skyin po dang /_/chag chag btab pa rung ba dang /_/de bzhin mdo rnams bsdus par brjod//_//mdor na/_sgo leb dang ni pus 'khyud dang /_/dra ba dang 
[\[121b.3\]]yang gzugs 'khor dang /_/zhing dang 'bras dang skye ba dang /_/nor las skyes dang gos rnams so/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe 
[\[121b.4\]]dang ldan pa u pA lis zhus pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis sgo leb la lag gzungs byos shig ces gsungs na ci 'dra ba las bgyi/_u pA li rin po che ma gtogs pa'o/_/yang gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis bus 'khyud chongs 
[\[121b.5\]]shig ces gsungs na/_ji ltar bcang bar bgyi/_u pA li skud pa sna bdun te/_bal gyi dang /_ldum bu sha na ka'i dang /_ras kyi skud pa dang /_zar ma'i dang /_rtswa du gu la'i dang /_ko tam ba ka'i dang /_srin bal rnams so/_/yang gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom 
[\[121b.6\]]ldan 'das kyis dra ba byos shig ces gsungs na ji lta bu las bgyi/_u pA li rnam pa bzhi ste/_rtswa mun dza'i dang /_bal ba dza dang /_zar ma'i dang /_ras kyi skud pa las so/_/yang gsol ba/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis dra ba'i gzugs 'khor byos shig 
[\[121b.7\]]ces gsungs na/_ji lta bu las bgyi/_u pA li rin po che ma gtogs pa'o/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/_mnyan du yod pa na khyim bdag gzhan zhig dad cing des la dge bar sems pa zhig 'dug ste/_de na gcer bu pa'i dge bsnyen pa'i 
[\[122a\]]
[\[122a.1\]]bu mo chung mar blangs te des de la bzang mo sangs rgyas ni ston pa/_chos ni rgyal mtshan/_dge slong ni yon gnas te/_de dag la bya ba byos shig ces bsgo ba dang /_de g.yos kun tu spyod de g.yo med pa ltar jo bo'i sras legs kyis de bzhin du bgyi'o zhes smras pa dang /_
[\[122a.2\]]khyim bdag de'i khyim du nyin gcig bzhin dge 'dun gyis bskos pa'i dge slong rnams bshos gsol lo/_/de nas dus phyi zhig na khyim bdag de ri brags kyi grong gzhan zhig tu don cung zad cig yod par gyur te/_des chung ma de la bsgo ba/_bzang mo kho bo yul 'di zhes bya ba'i ri drung gi grong 
[\[122a.3\]]du don cung zad cig yod par gyur te der 'gros/_khyod kyis de bzhin du sbyin gnas rnams la bshos gsol cig ces byas pa dang /_de g.yos kun tu spyod de/_g.yo med pa ltar jo bo'i sras legs kyis bshos gsol lo zhes smras so/_/de song nas bdag gis chung ma la bsgo zin na 
[\[122a.4\]]dge slong la yang bsgo'o snyam du sems te de gtsug lag khang du song nas/_dge skos kyi rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te smras pa/_'phags pa bdag yul 'di zhes bya ba'i ri brags kyi grong der don cung zad cig mchis par gyur te bdag der mchis khyod kyis de bzhin du dge 'dun gyis bskos pa'i 
[\[122a.5\]]dge slong gtang bar gsol/_des khyim bdag de bzhin du legs kyis gtang ngo zhes smras so/_/de nas khyim bdag des ston pa dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun la phyag byas te ri brags kyi grong der song ngo /_/dge 'dun gyis bskos pa'i dge slong dag phan tshun tshe dang ldan pa khyim 
[\[122a.6\]]bdag de'i chung ma ma dad pas gdugs tshod las snga zad du 'dong ngo zhes gtam byas na de dag gdugs tshod las sngar dong ba dang /_khyim bdag de'i chung mas mthong nas 'phags pa khyed ha cang sngar byon te ci de dag gi sug las gzhan ma mchis sam zhes nyes pa ngor brjod pa dang /_
[\[122a.7\]]de dag spa gong nas cang mi zer bar gdugs tshod bab kyi bar du 'khod nas zan zos te dong ngo /_/des phyi de nyin mo zas dag snga zad du sbyar te stan bting nas bya ra byed cing 'dug go/_/dge slong dag gdugs tshod bab khar dong ba dang /_des mthong nas dpyas pa dang /_dge slong dag 
[\[122b\]]
[\[122b.1\]]gcig la gcig tshe dang ldan pa gnyis kar yang 'phyas/_ji lta bu yang rung zos la dong nas tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa la bsgo ste phyin chad 'dir ni dge slong dag kyang mi 'dong bar bya'o zhes smras nas zan zos te gtsug lag khang du dong ngo /_/dge slong de dag gis ji lta bur gyur pa 
[\[122b.2\]]bzlas pa dang /_dge slong dag phyis der mi 'dong bar gyur to/_/ji tsam na khyim bdag de slar 'ongs nas bzang mo yon gnas dag bsgo ba bzhin du bshos gsol tam zhes dris pa dang /_des jo bo'i sras nyi ma gnyis shig_/gshegs te bshos gsol nas ma gshegs 
[\[122b.3\]]par gyur to zhes smras pa dang /_de skad thos nas gtsug lag khang du song ste/_'phags pa ci'i slad du dge 'dun gyis bskos pa'i dge slong rnams ma btang zhes smras pa dang /_de dag gis ji ltar gyur pa thams cad bzlas so/_/des 'phags pa de ltar na bdag gi zhing las skye ba'i 
[\[122b.4\]]'bras de 'phags pa rnams la dbul gyis khyed 'dir gsol cig ces smras pa dang /_des khyim bdag mi 'tshal lo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_ma btsos pa'i 'bru len par bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo zhes smras pa dang /_de cang mi zer bar 'dug go/_/de ltar gyur pa dge slong 
[\[122b.5\]]dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na gnang gis dge 'dun gyi phyir 'bras long la the tshom du ma byed cig_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/_mnyan du yod pa na khyim bdag gzhan zhig gis gang zag gzhan 
[\[122b.6\]]zhig gi phyir gnas khang zhig brtsigs te bzhag nas de'i nang du mal stan dag kyang mang du phul te bzhag pa dang /_dge slong dag gis mdzod chen po'i nang du gcig tu bsdus te bzhag go/_/dge slong des khyim bdag de la smras pa dang /_des 'phyas 'dogs so/_/de ltar gyur 
[\[122b.7\]]pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag khyim bdag de 'phya ba ni yus te/_de bas na mal stan ji ltar bsngos pa bzhin du spyad par bya ste/_der gang dag gnas pa de nyid dbang ngo /_/de nas yang khyim 
[\[123a\]]
[\[123a.1\]]bdag des gnas khang der gos kyi rnyed pa mang zhig phul ba dang /_de la mal stan 'ged pas dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa'i nang du brubs pa dang /_dge slong des khyim bdag de la smras so/_/de yang 'phyas 'dogs so/_/de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das 
[\[123a.2\]]la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag khyim bdag de 'phya ba ni yus te/_yon bdag gi dbang du byas long la dge slong dag khyim gyi rnyed pa de ni der gang gnas pa de dag nyid dbang ngo /_/de dag gis dge slong de la 'thob pa gzhan dag ma byin pa dang /_
[\[123a.3\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_der yang dge 'dun gyir gtogs pa'i rnyed pa de dag las kyang byin cig_/des kyang de la longs spyod du gyis la the tshom du ma byed cig_/gleng gzhi'i nang nas sgo bzhi pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa dang po'o//_//'dul ba gzhung dam 
[\[123a.4\]]pa/_bam po sum bcu rtsa drug pa/_mdor na/_gang zhig gang du gnas pa dang /_/dge slong des kyang de rung ba/_/las kyang sar pa'i yo byad dag_/zas dang mar me rung ba'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na 
[\[123a.5\]]bzhugs so/_/mnyan du yod pa na khyim bdag gzhan zhig gis gtsug lag khang du gnas khang dag brtsigs nas der mal stan kyang phul/_rnyed pa dag kyang bcas pa dang /_dge slong dag mal stan de dag kyang dge 'dun gyi nang du brubs te rnyed pa yang spyir bgos so/_/de ltar gyur 
[\[123a.6\]]pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dngos po nges par 'gyur ba la ma bskyod cig_/de na nges par gnas pa gang yin pa de dag gis spyad par bya ste/_rnyed pa yang bdag gir byos shig_/dge slong dag gis de 
[\[123a.7\]]la rnyed pa gzhan ma byin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gnyi ga yang byin la ci bder spyod par bya ste/_'on kyang dge slong rnams la ji ltar rgan rims su bsko bar bya'o/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/_mnyan du yod pa na khyim bdag gzhan zhig 
[\[123b\]]
[\[123b.1\]]'dug pa de'i drung du bsod snyoms pa gzhan zhig der song nas skyabs su 'gro ba dang /_bslab pa'i gnas la bzhag go/_/dus phyi zhig na yang nor las bsod nams su bya ba'i dngos po bdun po'i yon tan brjod pa dang /_khyim bdag de rab tu dad par gyur nas/_'phags pa bdag 
[\[123b.2\]]gis kyang nor las byas pa'i bsod nams kyi dngos po cung zad cig bgyi'o zhes smras pa dang /_bsod snyoms pa des/_khyim bdag de bzhin du byos shig ces smras pa dang /_'phags pa ci zhig bgyi/_dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang byos shig_/'phags pa bdag la kAr ShA pa 
[\[123b.3\]]Na ni mchis na/_bsod nams bya ba'i grogs dag ma mchis so/_/khyim bdag kAr ShA pa Na khyer te shog shig_/ngas khyod kyi bsod nams kyi grogs bya'o zhes smras pa dang /_des kAr ShA pa Na rnams byin nas las sar pa byed pa yang bskos so/_/des kAr ShA pa Na rnams 
[\[123b.4\]]gnas khang gi nang du bcug ste bzhag nas las cung zad tsam yang ma brtsams so/_/khyim bdag des 'di snyam du bdag gi gtsug lag khang ci tsam zhig byas pa ltar 'gro'o zhes bsams nas de der 'ongs na/_cung zad tsam yang ma byas par mthong ngo /_/des bsod snyoms pa la 
[\[123b.5\]]'phags pa ci'i phyir las dag ma brtsams zhes dris pa dang /_las sar pa byed pas 'dir yo byad dag dgos so zhes smras pa dang /_khyim bdag gis bdag gis kAr ShA pa Na phul ba de la las sar pa bya ba'i yo byad dag ci'i phyir mi sbyar/_des smras pa/_khyim bdag ngas phyogs 
[\[123b.6\]]bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi rdzas ma rung bar ji ltar bya zhes smras pa dang /_'phags pa de la nongs pa ma mchis kyis gyis shig_/de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de ste khyim bdag gis bsgo na las 
[\[123b.7\]]sar pa'i yo byad de dag las sbyor cig_/de la the tshom du ma byed cig_/des de las sar pa'i yo byad sbyar te/_bsod snyoms pa des las sar pa yang byas nas bsod snyoms slong du song ba dang /_khyim bdag des mthong nas 'phags pa khyod ni bsod snyoms spyod na bdag gi gtsug 
[\[124a\]]
[\[124a.1\]]lag khang gi las sar pa su bgyid ces smras pa dang /_khyim bdag sems can thams cad ni zas la gnas na cing ltogs bzhin du khyod kyi gtsug lag khang gi las sar pa byed dam/_los kyang bsod snyoms la 'jug mod ces smras pa dang /_des 'phags 
[\[124a.2\]]pa de lta na las sar pa'i rgyu de las bshos su mdzod ces smras pa dang /_des ci'i phyir na ngas phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyir bsngos pa bza' zhes smras pa dang /_des 'phags pa de la gnod pa med kyis zo shig ces smras nas/_de ltar gyur pa dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das 
[\[124a.3\]]la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de ste khyim bdag gis bsgo na de nyid la zan du zo shig_/de la the tshom du ma byed par bza' bar gyis shig_/de nas bsod snyoms pa de zas mi bzang ba zos pas gram par gyur pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[124a.4\]]zas ngan pa ma za shig ces gsungs pa dang /_zas bzang du za bar gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_zas bzang por yang ma za bar ji ltar gtsug lag khang gzhan gyi bza' ba'i thang de bzhin du zo shig_/snum bag ma rnyed nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[124a.5\]]stsal pa/_ji ltar gtsug lag khang gzhan na snum bag rnyed pa de ltar bya ste/_de la the tshom du ma byed cig_/bsod snyoms pa des las sar pa'i yo byad dag blta ba'i phyir 'bru mar bsod snyoms su blangs pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_las sar pa'i rgyu 
[\[124a.6\]]las 'bru mar nyos shig_/yo byad gzhan rnams ji dgos pa yang de las sbyar bar bya ste/_de la the tshom ma byed cig_/gleng gzhi'i nang nas sgo bzhi pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa gnyis pa'o//_//mdor na/_dge 'dun rnams kyi mal stan ni/_/bla gab med par mi bgo 
[\[124a.7\]]dang /_/tshon dang lhung bzed las byed mi bgo ste/_/srod 'das mtshan mo mal stan bgo mi bya/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa na dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/drug sde dag gis dge 'dun gyi mal stan bgos nas tshon 
[\[124b\]]
[\[124b.1\]]gyi las byed gos 'khru 'tshed/_lhung bzed kyi las byed pas gos rnams mes tshig_/dri ma can du yang gyur cing /_tshon gyis kyang ma rung bar gyur to/_/de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge 
[\[124b.2\]]'dun gyi gos gyon la tshon gyi las ma byed cig_/lhung bzed kyi las dang /_gzhan yang shing gsheg pa'i las dag ma byed cig_/byas na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/_yang drug sde dag gis dge 'dun gyi gos rnams gyon nas 
[\[124b.3\]]bla gab med par tshon rtsi'i las byed cing char bab bzhin du 'dug nas gos ma rung bar gyur te/_de ltar gyur pa dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge 'dun gyi gos rnams gyon la bla gab med par char bab bzhin du ma 
[\[124b.4\]]'dug shig_/'dug na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/_drug sde dag gzhongs spyad pa spyod pa las ri brags kyi grong gzhan zhig tu mtshan mo srod 'das te phyin pa dang /_ri brags kyi grong de na gtsug lag khang zhig yod pa der 'ongs nas dge 
[\[124b.5\]]slong dag gis so sor bshes pa'i gnas su ngal bso ba la zhugs so/_/de dag gis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag ngal bso ba ni phyis byas/_mal stan bged pa bos la rgan rims bzhin du mal stan dang /_gnas khang bgos shig_/de dag gis tshe dang ldan pa dge slong kha cig 
[\[124b.6\]]nyal nas srod kyang 'khor na gnod par byas te ci rung gis/_gang du bshes pa'i gnas su nyol cig dang /_sang nam langs nas gnas khang dang mal stan bgo bar bya'o zhes smras pa dang /_de dag gis tshe dang ldan pa dag ston pa bzhugs bzhin du khyed kyis bstan pa dag zhig 
[\[124b.7\]]par bya'am/_gnas khang dang mal stan dag nged cag dang rgan rims su bgos shig ces smras pa dang /_mal stan 'ged pas gnas khang dang mal stan dag 'ged pa la zhugs nas gsar bu rnams la ma bgos par nam nangs nas drug sde dag cung zad cig nyal nas/_nang par 
[\[125a\]]
[\[125a.1\]]sngar langs te mal stan dag slar phul nas dong ba dang /_dge slong dag gis ci'i phyir na mal stan dag slar phul/_de dag gis tshe dang ldan pa dag nged cag mchod rten la phyag 'tshal du 'ongs te da ni slar 'dong ngo zhes smras pa dang /_de dag gis tshe dang ldan pa dag 
[\[125a.2\]]de ltar na khyed cag gis mtshan rangs dge slong dag gtses te ci bya zhes smras pa dang /_de dag gis tshe dang ldan pa dag bstan pa brtan par bya ba'i phyir byas kyi/_nged la nyes pa ci yod ces smras pa dang /_dge slong dag gis dpyas btags so/_/de ltar gyur pa de dge slong dag gis bcom 
[\[125a.3\]]ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na mtshan mo srod 'khor phan chad stan dag ma bgo shig_/de ste glo bur du nub mo 'ongs na gang mdza' ba'i gnas su 'dug la/_de ste nam langs nas kyang 'dug par gyur na gnas khang yang 
[\[125a.4\]]bgos shig_/mal stan yang byin cig_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/_drug sde dag gzhongs spyad pa spyod cing dong nas ri brags kyi grong gzhan zhig tu phyin nas ri brags kyi grong de na gtsug lag khang zhig yod pa der phyin nas dge slong dag gis gang mdza' ba'i gnas su 
[\[125a.5\]]bzhag ste/_de nas mal stan bgo bar byed pa na rgan rims kyi khri'u'i steng du de dag nan gyis 'dug nas de dag la rgan rims kyis kyang bslang bar ma nus so/_/gang gi tshe mal stan dag bgos pa dang /_de'i tshe rgan rims kyi khri'u de dag lhan cig spyod pa dang /_nye gnas rnams la 
[\[125a.6\]]byin nas mal stan ma thob pa rnams 'phya bar gyur to/_/de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag dge slong gsar bu rnams 'phya ba yus te/_de bas na rgan rims kyi khri'u dag dang /_chung ngu 
[\[125a.7\]]na stan dag kyang rgan rims su bgos shig_/gleng gzhi'i nang nas sgo bzhi pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa gsum pa'o//_//mdor na/_snam phyi sa dang bkru ba'i sa/_/gci ba'i sa dang rkang pa bkrus/_/phyi ba snod dang gzar bu dang /_/rnam pa sna tshogs de bzhin no/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[125b\]]
[\[125b.1\]]bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa na dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/drug sde dag snam phyi sa'i sgo na 'chag cing gtam zer zhing 'dug nas/_dge slong dag la gnod par byed de/_tshe dang ldan pa dag skad cig sdod cig_/nged cag rgan rims su 
[\[125b.2\]]bya'o zhes smras nas de dag gis de'i nye 'khor du ston cing kha ton yang byed/_btso blag gi las kyang byed nas/_dge slong dag snam phyi sar 'dong du yang ngo tsha nas bshang gci la sogs pa yang bag yangs su byar med/_ji ltar 'ongs pa bzhin nang du 'jug tu yang med par de dag gis 
[\[125b.3\]]bgags pa dang /_de dag thams cad nad du gyur te de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na dge slong dag gis snam phyi sar song nas gtam zer zhing ma 'dug shig_/de'i nyen kor du ston 
[\[125b.4\]]par yang ma byed cig_/klog par yang ma byed cig_/kha ton yang ma byed cig_/btso blag gi yas kyang ma byed cig_/dge slong dag gis snam phyis na gtam zer zhing 'dug gam/_rim bzhin du byed dam/_de'i nyen kor du ston tam/_kha ton byed dam/_klog gam/_btso blag 
[\[125b.5\]]gi las byed na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag bkrus na 'khru zhing 'dug pa ma zin par drug sde dag gis nged rgan no zhes zer nas bslang ngo /_/de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge 
[\[125b.6\]]slong dag gis bkru sar dge slong bkru ba ma zin pa ma bslang shig_/bslang na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag gci sar song ba dang /_phyis drug sde dag der 'ongs te/_nged cag rgan gyis ji ltar rgan rims su 'jug go zhes smras pa dang /_de dag 'phya bar gyur 
[\[125b.7\]]to/_/de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag rgan rims su gci sar ma 'jug par ji ltar 'ongs pa'i rim bzhin du zhugs shig_/dge slong dag gis ji ltar rgan rims bzhin du 'jug 
[\[126a\]]
[\[126a.1\]]na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/_/drug sde dag gis dge slong dag rkang pa 'khru zhing 'dug pa la/_bkru ma zin par rkang pa 'khru ba'i 'og gzhi rgan rims su bya'o zhes te khyer ba dang /_de dag 'phya bar gyur to/_/de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag 
[\[126a.2\]]gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag gis dge slong dag gi rkang pa bkru ma zin par rkang pa bkru ba'i gzhi ji ltar rgan rims bzhin du ma bkur cig_/dge slong gis dge slong gi rkang pa bkru ba ma zin par 
[\[126a.3\]]rkang pa bkru ba'i gzhi rgan rims bzhin du khyer na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/_/drug sde dag gis dge slong dag gdong phyi bas gdong phyis ma zin par rgan rims su bya'o zhes zer nas gdong phyi ba khyer ba dang /_de dag 'phya bar gyur to/_/de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag 
[\[126a.4\]]gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag gis dge slong dag gi gdong phyi ba ma zin par rgan rims su ma bkur cig_/dge slong gis dge slong dag gi gdong phyi ba ma zin par gdong phyi ba rgan rims su khyer na 'das pa 
[\[126a.5\]]dang bcas par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du snod dang /_gzar bu dang /_kha gzar la sogs pa yang rgyas par sbyar bar bya'o/_/gleng gzhi'i nang nas sgo bzhi pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa bzhi pa'o//_//mdor na/_bum pa dang ni gzhong khung dang /_/lhung bzed nag po btung 
[\[126a.6\]]phor dang /_/spu gri'i bdar dang sen bcad pa/_/smang tsher dang ni rkang rten no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa na dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/drug sde dag gis dge slong dag btso blag gi las byed pa ma zin par dge 'dun 
[\[126a.7\]]gyi tshon gyi bum pa rgan rims bzhin du bya'o zhes zer te khyer ba dang de dag 'phya bar gyur nas/_de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag gis btso blag gi las byed pa ma zin par dge 
[\[126b\]]
[\[126b.1\]]'dun gyi tshon gyi bum pa dag rgan rims su ma bkur cig_/dge slong gis dge slong dag gi btso blag gi las byed pa ma zin par dge 'dun gyi tshon gyi bum pa rgan rims su khyer na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/_/bum pa la ji lta ba de bzhin du gzhong khung la yang de bzhin no/_/
[\[126b.2\]]drug sde dag gis dge slong dag zas za ba ma zin par lhung bzed nag po rgan rims su bya'o zhes zer nas khyer ba dang de dag 'phya bar gyur nas/_dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong gis dge slong dag zan 
[\[126b.3\]]bza' ba ma zin par lhung bzed nag po rgan rims su ma bkur cig_/dge slong gis dge slong dag zan bza' ba ma zin par lhung bzed nag po rgan rims su khyer na de dag 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/_/drug sde dag gis dge slong dag zan za zhing skom phyed tsam 'thungs 
[\[126b.4\]]pa dang /_btung ba'i phor bu rgan rims su bya'o zhes zer nas khyer te de dag 'phya bar gyur nas/_de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag gis dge slong dag zan za zhing skom phyed tsam 
[\[126b.5\]]'thungs pa la btung ba'i phor bu rgan rims su ma bkur cig_/dge slong dag gis dge slong dag zan za zhing skom phyed tsam 'thungs pa la phor bu rgan rims su khyer na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/_/drug sde dag gis dge slong dag skra phyed tsam bregs pa dang /_spu gri yang 
[\[126b.6\]]rgan rims su bya'o zhes zer te khyer ro/_/de dag 'phya bar gyur nas de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag gis dge slong skra dang kha spu phyed tsam bregs pa la spu gri rgan rims su ma bkur 
[\[126b.7\]]cig_/dge slong dag gis dge slong dag skra dang kha spu phyed tsam bregs pa dang spu gri rgan rims su khyer na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/_/drug sde dag gis dge slong dag skra dang kha spu 'breg pa'i spu gri rnon por bya ba'i bdar la phyed tsam bdar ba dang /_bdar rgan rims su 
[\[127a\]]
[\[127a.1\]]bya'o zhes zer te khyer ba dang /_de dag 'phya bar gyur to/_/de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag gis dge slong dag gi skra dang kha spu 'breg pa bdar la phyed tsam 
[\[127a.2\]]bdar nas rgan rims su ma bkur cig_/dge slong dag gis dge slong dag skra dang kha spu 'breg pa'i spu gri bdar la phyed tsam bdar ba la rgan rims su khyer na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/_/drug sde dag gis dge slong dag sen mo phyed tsam bcad pa dang /_sen mo bcad pa rgan 
[\[127a.3\]]rims su bya'o zhes zer nas khyer ro/_/de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag gis sen mo phyed tsam bcad pa la sen mo gcod pa rgan rims su ma bkur cig_/dge slong gis dge 
[\[127a.4\]]slong dag gi sen mo phyed tsam bcad pa las sen mo gcod pa rgan rims su khyer na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/_/drug sde dag gis dge slong dag sna spu phyed tsam btogs pa dang /_sna spu btog pa'i smang tsher rgan rims su bya'o zhes zer te khyer ro/_/de ltar gyur 
[\[127a.5\]]pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag sna spu phyed tsam btogs pa la sna spu btog pa'i smang tsher rgan rims su ma bkur cig_/khyer na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/_/drug sde dag gis 
[\[127a.6\]]dge slong dag dge 'dun gyi khri rkang rten du bcas pa la nyal zhing 'dug pa dang /_rgan rims su bya'o zhes zer te khyer ba dang /_de dag 'phya bar gyur nas/_de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag 
[\[127a.7\]]dge 'dun gyi khri rkang rten can gyi steng du nyal ba la rgan rims su ma bkur cig_/dge slong dag gis dge slong dag khri rkang rten can gyi steng du nyal zhing 'dug pa la rkang rten rgan rims su khyer na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/_/gleng gzhi'i nang nas sgo bzhi pa'i mdo'i tshigs 
[\[127b\]]
[\[127b.1\]]su bcad pa lnga pa'o//_//mdor na/_gtan pa skud pa gnyis pa dang /_/gri dang khab dang blang ba dang /_/gzhan yang 'di ltar ma zin par/_/bslang bar bya ba ma yin pa'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa na dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba 
[\[127b.2\]]na bzhugs so/_/drug sde dag gis shing leb kyi steng du sbyar ma dang /_stod g.yogs dang /_mthang gos dag dge 'dun gyi shing leb kyi steng du phyed tsam bting ba dang /_rgan rims su bya'o zhes zer te khyer ro/_/de dag 'phya bar gyur nas/_dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 
[\[127b.3\]]'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag dge 'dun gyi shing leb kyi steng du sbyar ma dang stod g.yogs dang /_mthang gos dag phyed tsam bting ba la dge 'dun gyi shing leb de rgan rims su ma bkur cig_/dge slong dag gis dge slong 
[\[127b.4\]]gi dge 'dun gyi shing leb kyi steng du sbyar ma dang /_stod g.yogs dang mthang gos dag phyed tsam bting ba la dge 'dun gyi shing leb rgan rims su khyer na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/_/drug sde dag gis dge slong dag gi chos gos dge 'dun gyi skud pas phyed tsam drubs pa 
[\[127b.5\]]dang rgan rims su bya'o zhes zer nas khyer ba dang /_de dag 'phya bar gyur te/_de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong gis dge slong dag gi chos gos dge 'dun gyi skud pas phyed tsam btsems pa 
[\[127b.6\]]las rgan rims su ma bkur cig_/dge slong dag gis dge slong dag gi chos gos dge 'dun gyi skud pas phyed tsam btsems pa las rgan rims su khyer na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/_/drug sde dag gis dge slong dag gi chos gos dag tshon las phyed tsam btso 
[\[127b.7\]]blag byas te/_dge 'dun gyi btso blag gi srad bu la bres pa dang /_rgan rims bzhin bya'o zhes zer te khyer ro/_/de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag gis dge slong dag gi 
[\[128a\]]
[\[128a.1\]]gos phyed tsam btso blag byas nas/_dge 'dun gyi btso blag gi srad bu la bres pa rgan rims su ma bkur cig_/dge slong dag gis dge slong dag gi gos phyed tsam btso blag byas pa dge 'dun gyi btso blag gi srad bu la bres pa rgan rims su khyer na 'das pa dang bcas 
[\[128a.2\]]par 'gyur ro/_/drug sde dag gis dge slong dag gi chos gos dge 'dun gyi gris phyed tsam dras pa dang /_rgan rims su bya'o zhes zer te khyer ba dang /_de dag 'phya bar gyur te/_de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[128a.3\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag gis dge 'dun gyi gris chos gos phyed tsam dras pa rgan rims su ma bkur cig_/dge slong dag gis dge slong gi chos gos dge 'dun gyi gris phyed tsam dras pa rgan rims su khyer na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/_/drug sde dag gis dge 
[\[128a.4\]]slong dag chos gos dge 'dun gyi khab kyis phyed tsam drubs pa la rgan rims bzhin bya'o zhes zer nas khyer ba dang /_de dag 'phya bar gyur te/_de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag gis 
[\[128a.5\]]dge slong dag gi chos gos dge 'dun gyi khab kyis phyed tsam drubs pa rgan rims su ma bkur cig_/dge slong dag gis dge slong gi chos gos dge 'dun gyi khab kyis phyed tsam drubs pa rgan rims su khyer na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/_/drug sde dag gis dge slong dag 
[\[128a.6\]]skra phyed tsam bregs pa dang /_dge 'dun gyi skra bzed pa'i ras rgan rims bzhin bya'o zhes zer te khyer ba dang /_de dag 'phya bar gyur to/_/de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag gis dge 
[\[128a.7\]]slong dag skra phyed tsam bregs pa dang /_dge 'dun gyi skra bzed pa'i ras rgan rims su ma bkur cig_/dge slong dag gis dge slong dag skra phyed tsam bregs pa dang /_dge 'dun gyi skra bzed pa'i ras rgan rims su khyer na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/_/drug sde dag gis 
[\[128b\]]
[\[128b.1\]]gang yang rung ba'i gnas su gzhan dang gzhan gyi las ma zin par dge 'dun gyi stan gyi steng na 'dug pa dang /_rgan rims bzhin bya'o zhes zer nas bslang ste btang nas de dag 'phya bar gyur to/_/de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom 
[\[128b.2\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag dge slong dag gis gang yang rung ba'i gnas su gzhan dang gzhan gyi las ma zin par dge 'dun gyi stan gyi steng du 'dug pa la rgan rims su bya'o zhes ma bslang shig_/dge slong dag gis dge slong dag gang yang rung ba'i gnas 
[\[128b.3\]]su gzhan dang gzhan gyi las ma zin bzhin du dge 'dun gyi stan gyi steng na 'dug pa la rgan rims su bya'o zhes bslang ste btang na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/_/gleng gzhi'i nang nas sgo bzhi pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa drug pa'o//_//mdor na/_mu stegs kun tu rgyu ba 
[\[128b.4\]]dang /_/mngon mtshan bdag shi byin pa med/_/yid ches par ni gzung ba lnga/_/gnyer phyir nye spyod dge slong ma'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na bzhugs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gang gi tshe yul mnyam dka'i rgyal 
[\[128b.5\]]po gzugs can snying po mkhas pa can lha stong phrag brgyad bcu dang /_yul mnyam dka'i bram ze dang /_khyim bdag brgya phrag stong dang bcas te bcom ldan 'das kyis bden pa la bkod pa de'i tshe na rgyal po'i khab tu 'di ltar kye khyed cag rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa dang /_yul 
[\[128b.6\]]so so nas lhags pa'i skye bo mang po dag nyon cig_/rgyal po nga'i yul na su yang rkun po ma byed cig_/gang gis byas pa de ngas yul dang phral te gtang ngo /_/nor bdag la ni nga nyid kyi mdzod dang bang ba nas sbyin no zhes dril chen bsgrags so/_/gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[128b.7\]]yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal dar la bab pa lta bu'i mdo sdes btul ba de'i tshe na des kyang mnyan du yod par 'di ltar rgyal po nga'i yul na su yang rkun po ma byed cig_/gang gis nga'i yul du rkun po byas pa de chad pa gsad pas bcad la/_nor bdag la ni nga nyid kyi bang ba dang 
[\[129a\]]
[\[129a.1\]]mdzod nas sbyin no zhes dril chen bsgrags so/_/de'i tshe na gang yul mnyam dka' na gnas pa'i rkun po rnams dang gang yul ko sa la na gnas pa'i rnams de'i sa mtshams kyi bar du dong nas 'khod do/_/yul mnyam dka' na gnas pa'i rkun po rnams 
[\[129a.2\]]dang /_yul ko sa la na gnas pa'i rnams thams cad sa mtshams kyi bar du dong ste 'khod nas/_'gron pa mang po dag 'dzoms so zhes de skad kyi sgra kun du grags so/_/de dag gis thos nas yul mnyam dka'i 'gron pa mang po bsel dang lhan cig yul ko sa lar 'dong ngo /_/
[\[129a.3\]]yul ko sa la nas kyang yul mnyam dkar de bzhin du 'dong ste/_ji tsam du dus phyi zhig na yul mnyam dka' nas 'gron pa mang po bsel dang bcas te/_yul ko sa lar dong ba dang /_de dag gang gi tshe mtshams las 'das nas yul ko sa lar phyin pa de'i tshe de nas ded dpon gyis 
[\[129a.4\]]smras pa/_kye ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal ni mi srun la gtum zhing khro ste dpa' zhing mthu dang ldan no zhes grag gis/_gal te 'gron pa mang po dang bdag cag rnams bcom na yang bsab par nus kyis/_bsel ba de dag slar khye shig ces smras pa dang /_'gron pa mang 
[\[129a.5\]]po dag gis smras pa/_de ltar na de bzhin du bgyi'o zhes smras nas bsel de dag slar bkye'o/_/rkun po rnams kyis bya ra btsugs te bsdad pa dang /_bya ra bas bsel ba slar log pa mthong nas/_des kye bsel ba rnams slar log gis 'gron pa mang po gzhom mo zhes 
[\[129a.6\]]smras nas 'gron pa mang po de dag shing sA la'i dgon par phyin pa dang /_bcom mo/_/de la tshong pa kha cig ni bsad/_kha cig ni bros so/_/de la bros pas mgo rdul gyis gang bar byas te rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi drung du song nas/_lha la bdag cag ni tshong pa lags na/_khyed kyi 
[\[129a.7\]]yul du phyin na tshong pa ma lags par gyur to/_/ci byas/_lha bdag cag ni rkun pos bcom mo/_/rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis 'phags skyes po la bka' stsal pa/_gzhon nu myur du rings par song la rkun po dang nor rnams zung la 'on cig ces bsgo ba dang /_lha de bzhin du bgyi'o 
[\[129b\]]
[\[129b.1\]]zhes nas dmag dpon 'phags skyes pos yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal las mnyan te/_dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa bal glang gi tshogs dang /_rta'i tshogs dang /_shing rta'i tshogs dang /_dpung bu chung gi tshogs rnams go cha bskon te myur bar [{]rings su [,]ring du [}]shing sA la'i 
[\[129b.2\]]dgon par dong ba dang /_rkun po dag de'i bar dgon pa na shing sA la stug po'i nang du zhugs te bag yangs su nor bgod cing 'khod pa dang /_'phags skyes pos de'i steng du brdzis te/_de dag gis rkun po kha cig ni bsad/_kha cig ni bros/_kha cig ni gson por bzung ngo /_/
[\[129b.3\]]de nas rkun po'i g.yul las rgyal te/_rkun po dang bcom pa'i nor rdzas dag khyer te/_rgyal po'i drung du song ste/_rkang pa la gtugs nas/_lha 'di dag ni rkun po'i nor ro zhes smras pa dang /_rgyal pos tshong pa dag la kye de dag bdag bdag gi nor dag ngo shes par byos la slar 
[\[129b.4\]]khyer cig ces bsgo ba dang /_de na mu stegs kun du rgyu ba dang /_dge slong dag kyang bcom pa'i nang du gtogs nas rgyal pos de thams cad phrogs pa'i nor rdzas slar byin pa dang /_kun du rgyu ba'i rang gi gos btsag gi nang du bcos pa dang /_dge slong dag gi yang khyer ro/_/dge 
[\[129b.5\]]slong dag gis bdag cag gi gos btsag gi nang du btsos pa ngo ma shes nas de dag rkun du rgyu ba dang /_lhan cig tu thab mo byung ba dang /_kun du rgyu ba mang po de dag gis de dag khyer ba dang /_rgyal po'i drung du song ste/_lha bdag cag gi gos btsag gi nang du btsos pa mu 
[\[129b.6\]]stegs can kun du rgyu bas 'tshal te slar mi ster to zhes smras pa dang /_rgyal pos mu stegs kun du rgyu ba de dag bkug ste/_kwa'i 'phags pa dag gi gos dag ci'i phyir bkur gyis slar phul cig ces bsgo ba dang /_de dag gis lha btsag gi nang du btsos pa 'di dag ni 
[\[129b.7\]]bdag cag gi gos so zhes smras pa dang /_rgyal pos 'phags pa dag khyed kyi gang yin pa shes par gyis la khyer cig ces smras so/_/dge slong dag gis gcig nas gcig tu phyung ste bltas pa dang /_kha cig ngo shes te lha 'di dag ni bdag cag gi gos so zhes smras pa 
[\[130a\]]
[\[130a.1\]]dang /_rgyal pos mu stegs can kun du rgyu ba dag la e ma'o mu stegs can kun du rgyu ba 'jab bur rku ba rkun ma yin na/_khyed cag ni rkun po chen po yin no zhes smras pa dang /_de dag lan med nas cang mi zer bar 'khod do/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_kye 'phags 
[\[130a.2\]]pa khyed cag gis da phan chad chos gos la mngon mtshan bya ba'i rigs so/_/de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag rgyal po de skad zer ba yus te/_de bas na chos gos dag mngon 
[\[130a.3\]]mtshan thob shig_/kha chag dang 'or thabs su drubs shig_/sgro gu yang thogs shig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis mngon mtshan thob shig ces gsungs na/_dge slong dag gis mi shes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_chos gos kyi mthar snag tsha'i 
[\[130a.4\]]thig le byos shig_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/_mnyan du yod pa na khyim bdag gzhan zhig gis de'i rigs mnyam pa zhig las chung ma zhig blangs nas/_de dang lhan cig tu rtse dga' yongs su spyod do/_/de dang lhan cig tu rtse dga' yongs su spyod pa las de 
[\[130a.5\]]dus phyi zhig na chung ma sems can dang ldan par gyur nas/_de zla ba brgyad dam dgu 'das pa dang /_bu khye'u zhig btsas te zhag bdun gsum nyi shu gcig gi bar du btsas pa'i btsas ston chen po byas so/_/de rigs dang mthun par ming yang btags nas de bsrings 
[\[130a.6\]]bskyed de cher gyur pa dang /_dus phyi zhig na de'i ma dus las 'das so/_/khyim bdag des kyang chung ma zhig blangs nas de dang lhan cig tu rtse dga' yongs su spyod do/_/rtse dga' yongs su spyad pa las dus phyi zhig bu pho gsum zhig btsas te/_de dag kyang rigs dang mthun 
[\[130a.7\]]par ming btags so/_/'di ltar dgra'i nang na chen chun 'thab pa gcugs che ste/_mos ma shi ba'i bu khye'u chen po de la rtag par gtses pa dang /_de ma dran nas yi chad de yul gzhan du song ba las legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ngo /_/de nas dus 
[\[130b\]]
[\[130b.1\]]phyi zhig na khyim bdag de na bar gyur nas/_de rtsa ba dang /_sdong bu dang /_lo ma dang /_me tog dang /_'bras bu dag gis sman byas kyang de'i nad tha gi bar ma gyur nas/_de na ba'i sdug bsngal gyis ring po mi thogs par dus 'da' bar shes nas/_des khyim tshes dag bsogs te 
[\[130b.2\]]'dus nas de'i nang du bu la smras pa bu dag khyed cag gi phu bo chen po dge sbyong shAkya'i sras kyi nang du rab tu byung ba de yang khyed kyis nor skal byin ces smras nas/_bsags pa kun mtha' zad par 'gyur/_/mtho ba'i mtha' ni 'jig par 'gyur/_/'dus pa'i mtha' ni 'gyes par 'gyur/_/
[\[130b.3\]]chos kyi mtha' ni zhi bar 'gyur/_/dus kyi chos dang ldan par gyur to/_/de'i bu ljongs spyod cing 'dug pa des bdag gi pha dus 'das so zhes thos te/_de yang 'di snyam du bdag song la ma yar mo dang nu bo dag gi mya ngan bsang gis chos bshad du 'gro'o snyam du sems nas/_de ji tsam 
[\[130b.4\]]dga' ba'i bar du gzhongs spyad de/_mnyan du yod pa gang na ba de logs su gzhongs spyod cing song ngo /_/rim bzhin du spyod cing mnyan du yod par phyin nas lam gyi ngal bsos te bdag gi khyim du 'ongs pa dang /_nang gi skye bo dag gis mthong nas ngus te ngu ba'i sgra dag khyim tshes dag 
[\[130b.5\]]gis thos nas de dag 'dus te kha cig ni skad phyung ste ngu /_kha cig ni mig mchi mas gang zhing 'dug nas/_so so'i skye bo dag ni 'dod chags dang ldan pas gnyen dang bral bar gyur pas mya ngan gyis mig mchi mas gang ngo /_/de yang ngu ga khyer zhing 'dug go/_/de na rgan mo gzhan 
[\[130b.6\]]zhig gis bu khyod kyi phas ni nor skal byin par nged kun gyis kyang thos na ma ngu shig_/skye ba yod na 'chi bar 'gyur ro zhes smras pa dang /_des cung zad tsam zhig gi bar du sems shing 'dug nas/_des ma yar mo dang nu bo dag la chos bshad do/_/de dag mya ngan cung zad sangs nas/_
[\[130b.7\]]de dag gis khyod kyi nor skal dag long shig ces smras pa dang /_des bsams pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis nga 'das nas byin pa ni med do zhes gsungs na/_ji ltar blang snyam du bsams nas/_tshe dang ldan pa dag nga ni rab tu byung ba la nor rdzas kyis byar med pa'i steng du bcom ldan 
[\[131a\]]
[\[131a.1\]]'das kyis kyang nga 'das nas byin pa med do zhes gsungs kyis/_khyed cag nyid khyer cig ces smras pa dang /_de dag gis nyes pa ngor brjod pa/_'phags pa long la sbyin pa yang byin cig_/bsod nams kyang byos shig_/de la nyes pa ci zhig yod ces

[\[131a.3\]]pa ni khyim bdag gi ste brtsan no/_/rab tu byung ba la ni de lta bu med do/_/de bas na khyim pas de bur bsams te byin pa long shig_/sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun la bya ba'i phyir te de la the tshom du ma byed cig_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/_dge slong dag lci ba'i ri lu dang /_
[\[131a.4\]]so shing dang /_bkru ba'i yo byad dang /_ba lang gi lci ba rnams 'chag sa dang khyams dang sgo khang dag tu bor nas ljongs spyad pa spyod du 'dong ngo /_/de dag la dge slong dag gis the tshom skyes nas ma spyad do/_/de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom

[\[131a.6\]]gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/_mnyan du yod pa na khyim bdag gzhan zhig 'dug pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma zhig blangs nas/_de dang lhan cig tu rtse dga' yongs su spyod do/_/de la rtse dga' yongs su spyad pa las dus phyi zhig na chung ma sems can dang ldan par 
[\[131a.7\]]gyur nas/_de zla ba brgyad dam dgu 'das pa dang /_bu mo zhig btsas nas de zhag bdun gsum nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du btsas pa'i btsas ston chen po byas nas rigs dang mthun par ming btags te/_de bsrings bskyed de cher gyur pa dang /_khyim bdag gzhan zhig gis 
[\[131b\]]
[\[131b.1\]]de bslangs te/_de rdzangs la sogs pa brdzangs te btang ngo /_/dus phyi zhig na khyim pa de dus 'das nas de khyo dang bral ba'i mya ngan gyis gdungs nas legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ngo /_/de dus phyi zhig na mu ge byung nas bsod snyoms slong zhing 'dug pa 
[\[131b.2\]]dang /_de bsod snyoms spyod pa las srang zhig tu de'i phas mthong nas/_des smras pa/_bu mo da ltar gang na ji ltar 'tsho zhing 'dug ces smras pa dang /_des pha mu ge byung nas bdag rab tu bkres shing 'dug go zhes smras pa dang /_des bu mo de ltar na khyod rab tu ma byung na ni ngas khyed 
[\[131b.3\]]la mi 'dod bzhin du sbyin na/_da bsod snyoms ma byed par bdag gi khyim du zan za zhing dbyar mo khang du song zhig_/des khas blangs nas de grogs gcig dang gnyis kyis zos shing dbyar mo khang du song ngo /_/zhag du ma zhig gi bar du der zos nas/_bu bsod snyoms pa gnyis ni zas 
[\[131b.4\]]sbyin par mi nus kyis/_khyod gcig pu 'dir zan zos shing song shig ces smras pa dang /_des pha bcom ldan 'das kyis gcig pur grong du 'gro bar ma gnang ngo zhes smras pa dang /_de cang mi zer bar 'dug go/_/de ltar gyur pa dge slong ma dag la smras pa dang /_dge slong ma dag 
[\[131b.5\]]gis dge slong la smras nas/_dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de ltar na ngas gnang gis dus 'di 'dra ba la ni dge slong mas dge slong ma'i dge 'dun la gnyen dang /_lhan cig 'dre bar nye spyod kyi sdom pa gsol 
[\[131b.6\]]cig_/gsol pa ni 'di ltar gyis shig_/stan bting ba la gaN+DI brdungs te/_dge slong ma'i dge 'dun dag 'dus shing 'khod pa dang /_ji ltar rgan rims su phyag byos la/_rgan rims kyi mdun du pha gu'am stan nang tshangs can gyi steng du 'dug nas thal mo sbyor la tshig 
[\[131b.7\]]'di skad ces smros shig_/gson cig 'phags ma'i dge 'dun ma rnams bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bas/_'di 'dra ba'i mu ge'i dus la bab nas bsod snyoms bslang ba yang mi nus na/_'phags ma'i dge 'dun ma la bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'phags ma'i dge 'dun ma 
[\[132a\]]
[\[132a.1\]]las gnyen dang lhan cig tu 'dre bar nye spyod kyi sdom pa gsol na/_'phags ma'i dge 'dun ma dag gis bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la gnyen dang lhan cig 'dre bar nye spyod kyi sdom pa gsol cig_/brtse ba can brtse ba'i phyir ro/_/de ltar lan gnyis 
[\[132a.2\]]lan gsum du brjod par bya'o/_/de'i 'og tu dge slong ma gcig gis gsol ba gyis la las byos shig_/gson cig 'phags ma'i dge 'dun ma rnams/_dge slong ma ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di 'di ltar mu ge'i dus la bab ste/_'phags ma'i dge 'dun ma dag las gnyen 
[\[132a.3\]]dang lhan cig tu 'dre bar nye spyod kyi sdom pa gsol na/_de ste 'phags ma'i dge 'dun ma rnams kyis dus la bab cing bzod na 'phags ma'i dge 'dun ma rnams kyis gnong la/_'phags ma'i dge 'dun gyis dge slong ma ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di gnyen dang lhan cig tu 'dre bar nye 
[\[132a.4\]]spyod kyi sdom pa stsol cig_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/las kyang 'di bzhin du bya'o/_/gson cig 'phags ma'i dge 'dun ma rnams/_dge slong ma ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di 'di ltar mu ge'i dus la bab ste/_'phags ma'i dge 'dun ma rnams la gnyen dang lhan cig 'dre bar nye spyod 
[\[132a.5\]]kyi sdom pa gsol te/_de las 'phags ma'i dge 'dun ma rnams kyis dge slong ma ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di 'di ltar mu ge'i dus la bab na gnyen dang lhan cig 'dre bar nye spyod kyi sdom pa gsol na/_'phags ma rnams las gang la dge slong ma ming 'di zhes bgyi ba mu ge'i dus 
[\[132a.6\]]la bab ste/_gnyen 'dun dang lhan cig tu 'dre bar nye spyod kyi sdom pa stsal bar bzod pa ni cang ma gsung shig_/mi bzod pa ni smros shig_/'phags ma'i dge 'dun gyis dge slong ma ming 'di zhes bgyi bas gnyen dang lhan cig tu 'dre bar nye spyod kyi sdom pa stsal te de de bzhin du 
[\[132a.7\]]'dzin to/_/dge slong mas gnyen dang lhan cig tu 'dre bar nye spyod kyi sdom pa dge 'dun ma dag gis byin par gyur na/_gcig pu gnyen gyi khyim du zas za bar gyis la de la the tshom du ma byed cig_/nam mu ge'i tshe ni rjes su gnang ngo /_/de ma yin par ma gnas shig_/mu ge ma 
[\[132b\]]
[\[132b.1\]]byung bar gnas na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/_/gleng gzhi'i nang nas sgo bzhi pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa bdun pa'o//_//mdor na/_bskyi ba la ni rnam pa gnyis/_/ras la yang ni rnam gsum ste/_/nyo bar yang ni 'dod pa dang /_/sder bsdus par ni gyur pa'o/_/
[\[132b.2\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/dge slong gzhan zhig gis khyim bdag cig las kAr ShA pa Na zhig bskyis pa dang /_de dus kyi mtha' zhig tu ci zhig gis dus 'das nas/_dge slong de ji ltar dus 
[\[132b.3\]]'das pa khyim bdag des thos so/_/dge slong de ji ltar dus 'das pa khyim bdag des thos nas gtsug lag khang du song ste shes bzhin du dge slong dag la dris pa/_'phags pa 'di zhes bgyi ba'i dge slong de gang na mchis/_de dag gis smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dus 'das 
[\[132b.4\]]so/_/'phags pa des bdag gi kAr ShA pa Na zhig bskyis te 'tshal to/_/bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]de ni dur khrod du bskyal gyis der song ste dos shig_/'phags pa khyed kyis de'i lhung bzed dang /_chos gos bgos na bdag gis ji ltar dur khrod du song ste bda'/_khyod kyis stsol cig 
[\[132b.5\]]ces smras pa dang /_de ltar gyur pa dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag khyim bdag des ni legs par smras te/_de'i nor las bskyis pa dge slong dag gis byin cig_/de dag gis gang nas sbyin 
[\[132b.6\]]pa mi shes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de'i lhung bzed dang chos gos yod pa las byin cig_/dge slong de dag gis lhung bzed dang chos gos de dag byin pa dang /_lhung bzed dang chos gos de dag ma 'dod nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal 
[\[132b.7\]]pa/_tshongs la byin cig_/dge slong dag gis de dag thams cad byin no/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_ji tsam blangs pa de tsam du byin la lhag ma bgos shig_/mnyan du yod pa na dge slong gzhan zhig gis khyim bdag cig las kAr ShA pa Na zhig bskyis pa 
[\[133a\]]
[\[133a.1\]]dang /_de dus kyi mtha' zhig tu ci zhig gis 'das pa dang /_dge slong de dag gis snga ma bzhin du lhung bzed dang chos gos btsongs nas de la byin no/_/khyim bdag gis smras pa/_'phags pa der bdag las 'di tsam zhig 'tshal te/_bdag la ni 'di las 
[\[133a.2\]]ma stsal gyis/_gzhan yang stsol cig ces smras pa dang /_de lta bur gyur pa dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de la de'i lhung bzed dang chos gos ni 'di las med do zhes sgo shig_/de ste yid mi ches na 
[\[133a.3\]]go bar gyis shig_/go bar bsgo yang mi btub na de la dge 'dun gyi'am/_gang zag gzhan gyi las ni ma sbyin cig_/rigs kyi gzu bo rnams kyis go bar bsgo la thong shig_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na/_dge slong zhig gis gos 'tshong ba las ras shig rin ma 
[\[133a.4\]]byin par blangs pa las dge slong de dus 'das nas/_dge slong de dus 'das so zhes gos kyi bdag po des thos nas/_de gtsug lag khang du 'ongs te shes bzhin du dge slong rnams la 'phags pa dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di ga la mchis zhes dris pa dang /_de dag gis 
[\[133a.5\]]smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dus 'das so/_/'phags pa des bdag las ras shig rin sbyin par byas te khyer ro/_/bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]de dur khrod du bskyal gyis der song la dos shig_/'phags pa de'i chos gos dang lhung bzed ni khyed rnams kyis bgos na/_bdag ci'i phyir dur 
[\[133a.6\]]khrod du song ste bda'/_khyed rnams kyis byin cig de ltar gyur pa dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong rnams gos 'tshong ba 'di smra ba ni bden gyis de ni byin cig_/dge slong rnams kyis de'i ras nyid byin pa 
[\[133a.7\]]dang des 'phags pa rnams bdag la des rin thang 'di tsam du 'tshal to zhes smras pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis de nyid tshongs la byin cig ces bka' stsal pa dang /_dge slong rnams kyis de btsong bar brtsams pa dang snga ma'i rin thang du ma lon nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[133b\]]
[\[133b.1\]]bka' stsal pa/_lhag ma ni chos gos dang lhung bzed rnams tshongs la byin cig_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na/_dge slong zhig gis tha ga pa la ras 'thag pa'i phyir skud pa dang rngan pa byin pa las/_dge slong de dus 'das pa dang /_dge slong rnams kyis tha ga pa la 
[\[133b.2\]]bos te bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]khyod la dge slong ming 'di zhes bya bas ras 'thag pa'i phyir skud pa dang rngan pa byin pa de slar phul cig ces smras pa dang /_des 'phags pa rnams bdag gis de la ras sbyin par byas kyi/_skud pa dang rngan pa ni ma lags so zhes smras pa dang /_dge slong rnams 
[\[133b.3\]]kyis de ji ltar bya ba ma shes nas/_de ltar gyur pa dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa tha ga pa smra ba ni bden gyis ras su long shig ces bka' stsal pa dang /_dge slong rnams kyis phra mo las 
[\[133b.4\]]bkug pa dang /_de la 'phags pa rnams bdag gis de la sbom po sbyin par byas so zhes smras pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong de ni dus 'das kyis ji ltar byin pa de lta bu long shig_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/_dge slong zhig gis gos 
[\[133b.5\]]'tshong ba la kAr ShA pa Na byin te/_ras shig byin cig ces smras pa dang /_dge slong de dus 'das nas dge slong rnams kyis gos 'tshong ba la bos te/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]khyod la dge slong ming 'di zhes bya bas ras kyi rin zhig byin pa de 'on cig ces smras pa dang /_des 'phags pa 
[\[133b.6\]]rnams de la ras su sbyin par bgyis so zhes smras pa dang /_dge slong rnams kyis de la ji ltar bya ba mi shes so/_/de ltar gyur pa dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams gos 'tshong ba de smra ba ni bden gyis/_ras 
[\[133b.7\]]su long shig ces smras pa dang /_dge slong rnams kyis phra mo bkug nas des 'phags pa rnams bdag gis de la sbom po dbul bar bgyis so zhes smras pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong de ni dus 'das na/_ji lta bu byin pa de bzhin 
[\[134a\]]
[\[134a.1\]]long shig/_//'dul ba gzhung dam pa/_bam po sum bcu rtsa bdun pa/_gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/_drug sde rnams 'jig rten pa la grags par gyur te/_gang su yang rung nyo ba dang /_btsong ba de dag de dag gi drung du dong nas/_
[\[134a.2\]]'phags pa dngos po 'dis ci ri zhes 'dri'o/_/de nas mnyan du yod pa na khyim bdag gnyis shig gcig ni gos nyo/_gcig ni 'tshong ste/_de gnyis rin thang gi gtam smra zhing 'khod pa'i steng du nye dga' bo phyogs der 'ongs pa dang /_de gnyis kyis 'phags pa nye dga' bos 
[\[134a.3\]]bcad pa brtsan no/_/gcig na re yang de bzhin du brtsan par bya'o zhes smras nas/_de gnyis kyis tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' bo la 'phags pa gos 'di'i rin ji tsam zhes smras pa dang /_des gcig la gsang ste bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]khyod nyo ba'am 'on te 'tshong ba zhes dris so/_/des 
[\[134a.4\]]bdag ni nyo ba'o zhes smras pa dang /_nye dga' bos 'di ni kAr ShA pa Na nyi shu ri'o zhes smras nas/_gnyis pa la yang gsang ste/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ci khyod nyo ba'am 'on te 'tshong ba zhes dris pa dang /_des 'phags pa bdag ni 'tshong ba zhes smras pa dang /_nye dga' bos 'di ni kAr ShA 
[\[134a.5\]]pa Na bzhi bcu ri'o zhes smras pa dang /_de gnyis gsang ste bslus nas yang gnyi ga'i mngon sum du khyed cag ji lta bur legs pa de lta bur byos shig ces smras so/_/de la gang 'tshong ba des 'di ni kAr ShA pa Na bzhi bcu ri'o zhes smras pa dang /_gang nyo ba des bdag gis dad pa dang 
[\[134a.6\]]yid ches pa las 'di ni kAr ShA pa Na nyi shu ri'o zhes smras pa dang /_des smras pa/_khyod kyis dad pa dang yid ches pa su yin/_'phags pa nye dga' bo yin no/_/bdag cag gnyis la des shes bzhin du gtses te/_bdag la des kAr ShA pa Na bzhi bcu ri'o zhes smras so/_/
[\[134a.7\]]des smras pa/_bdag la yang des shes bzhin du gnyis ka la slu ba'i phyir mdor na des gnas ngan len la mtshungs par spyod kyis phyin chad dgos pa yod na yang de la mi 'dri'o zhes smras so/_/de ltar gyur pa dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/_bcom 
[\[134b\]]
[\[134b.1\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong rnams khyim bdag de gnyis 'phya ba ni yus kyis/_de bas na dge slong rnams kyis dngos po gang la yang rin thang ma gcod cig_/khyim pa rtsod pa'i drung na ma 'dug shig_/dge slong gang gis dngos po la gang yang rin bcad dam/_
[\[134b.2\]]khyim pa rtsod pa'i drung na 'dug na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dngos po gang la yang dge slong gis rin thang ma gcod cig ces gsungs na/_dge slong gis chos gos dang /_gos nyo bar 'dod pa'i phyir tshong dus su song ste/_der khyim pa dang lhan 
[\[134b.3\]]cig tu kAr ShA pa Na'am/_pa Na gcig gam/_pa Na bzhi'am/_bzhi cha'i phyed dam/_bzhi cha'i phyed kyi phyed bskyod pa dang /_des khros te 'phags pa bdag cag ni spogs pa yin na/_khyed cag kyang lhag par spogs byed pa chen po'o zhes smras pa dang /_de ltar gyur pa dge slong 
[\[134b.4\]]dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong rnams de dag de skad zer ba ni yus kyis/_de lta bas na dge slong rang gis nyo bar ma byed cig bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rang gis nyo bar ma byed cig ces gsungs pa dang /_dge slong 
[\[134b.5\]]rnams kyis ji ltar nyo bar bya ba mi shes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gtsug lag khang na gnas pa'i dge bsnyen pha la tshol cig_/gtsug lag khang na gnas pa'am/_dge bsnyen dad pa med la nges par nyo bar 'dod par gyur na/_gtan la bab pa'i tshig lan 
[\[134b.6\]]gnyis lan gsum du smra bar bya ste/_kAr ShA pa Na la sogs pa'i tshul gyis bskyed par mi bya'o/_/dge slong gis nyo bar 'dod kyang rung nyo bar mi 'dod kyang rung ste/_kAr ShA pa Na la sogs pa'i tshul gyis tshig lan gnyis lan gsum du 'das par bskyed cing smra na 'das pa dang bcas 
[\[134b.7\]]par 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun gyi phyir rin thang bskyed kyang nyes pa med do/_/gleng gzhi'i sgo bzhi pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa brgyad pa'o//_//mdor na/_rtsa bas 'tsho ba las par mi bya ste/_/rnam pa bzhi ni mi bgo ste/_/bsrung ba dang yang 
[\[135a\]]
[\[135a.1\]]mang du bya/_/ca co mang po 'byin pa'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na bzhugs so/_/gang gi tshe rgyal po gzugs can snying pos dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams la bza' shing drung stong dang ldan pa'i 
[\[135a.2\]]kun dga'i ra ba zhig phul ba de'i tshe na/_dge slong rnams kyis 'bras bu zos nas phyal bar bor bas na mda' lta bu'i nags su gyur to/_/de nas dus phyi zhig na rgyal po lam de phyogs su phyin pa dang /_des de dag mthong nas/_des blon po rnams la mda' lta bu'i nags su 
[\[135a.3\]]gyur pa'i kun dga'i ra ba 'di su'i zhes smras pa dang /_blon pos lha bza' shing drung stong dang ldan pa'i kun dga' ra ba dag lhas 'phags pa rnams la phul ba de nyid 'di lags te/_de dag gis 'bras bu zos nas phyal bar bor bas na da ni mda' lta bu'i nags su gyur to zhes 
[\[135a.4\]]smras pa dang /_rgyal pos smras pa/_kye 'phags pa de dag 'di la zhal ta dang las mi byed dam/_des lha de dag bsam gtan dang kha ton la zhugs pas 'di'i sug las dang zhal ta mi bgyid do zhes smras pa dang rgyal po cang mi smra bar 'dug go/_/de ltar gyur pa dge slong 
[\[135a.5\]]rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na rtsa bas 'tsho ba la phyal bar ma dor bar las gyis shig_/dge slong rnams kyis sus las bya ba mi shes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gnas 
[\[135a.6\]]'cha' ba rnams kyis byos shig_/de rga bas na de dag gis las bya bar mi nus te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge 'dun thams cad kyis las byos shig_/de las kha cig ni rid rgas 'khogs/_kha cig ni na bas las byed mi nus/_drug sde rnams 
[\[135a.7\]]ni byed du mi btub pas na las ma byas pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'khor rnam par dbye bas 'khor rnam par phye la skal skal du gos te las byos shig_/dge slong rnams lung nod pa dang /_klog pa dang /_kha ton byed pa dang /_tshul bzhin yid la 
[\[135b\]]
[\[135b.1\]]byed pa rnams dang sde de la zhugs pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de 'ba' zhig la yang 'jug par mi bya ste/_la lar so shing bza' bar bya/_la lar gdong bkru bar bya/_la lar ni rkang pa bkru bar bya/_dge slong de dag gis de bzhin du las byas 
[\[135b.2\]]nas 'bras bu rgyal te smin par gyur pa dang /_ji tsam na dge slong dag cig glo bur du 'ongs pa dang /_de dag gis 'bras bu rgyal zhing smin pa de dag mthong nas/_de dag gis tshe dang ldan pa'i rnams bdag cag kyang a mra smin pa'i 'bras bu bza' bar bgyi na kho bo cag kyang 
[\[135b.3\]]dbang ngam zhes smras pa dang /_dge slong rnams kyis 'di dag ni bdag cag gis sngar bgos na bzar ga la yod ces smras pa dang /_de dag 'phya bar gyur nas/_de ltar gyur pa dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[135b.4\]]stsal pa/_glo bur du 'ongs pa rnams la yang byin cig_/dge slong rnams kyis bgos pa'i lhag ma la byin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong rnams rnam pa 'di bzhi ni mi bgo ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun thams 
[\[135b.5\]]cad dbang ba dang /_mchod rten thams cad dbang ba dang /_nad pa thams cad kyi rung ba dang /_rin thang nar mar bza' ba thams cad do/_/de bas na dge slong rnams kyis rtsa bas 'tsho ba rnyed dam/_'bras bu'am/_me tog la sogs pa gang zag rnams kyis yongs su spyod 
[\[135b.6\]]pa bzhin du yongs su spyod cig_/de dag mngon sum du dbang ba yin pas na zhal ta byos la me tog dang 'bras bu rnams ni dge 'dun la brims shig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis mngon sum du dbang ba yin pas so sor zhal ta byos la me tog dang 'bras bu rnams dge 'dun la brims 
[\[135b.7\]]shig ces gsungs pa dang /_dge slong rnams kyis de dag zhal ta byas pas me tog dang 'bras bu smin pa dang /_de dag yal bar bor nas me tog dang 'bras bu rnams rkun po rnams kyis khyer ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis srung ma zhog shig ces gsungs nas/_dge 
[\[136a\]]
[\[136a.1\]]slong rnams kyis nyung ngu zhig bzhag ste/_de nyid nyes pa'i dmigs su gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_mang du 'khor la de dag las phyed ni sngar zan zo zhig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis shing thog a mra'i 'bras bu smin pa dge 'dun la 
[\[136a.2\]]brims shig ces gsungs pa dang /_gang gi tshe smin par gyur pa de'i tshe srin bus zos par gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gnas 'cha' ba rnams kyis so sor brtag par byos shig so sor brtag par byed pa de dag ca co che nas dge slong rnams kyis de
