[\[136a.4\]]gleng gzhi'i sgo bzhi pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa dgu pa'o//_//mdor na/_rung bar bya dang dge tshul pha/_/bdag gis byin gyis brlabs pa dang /_/blangs shing byin len byed pa dang /_/yang na de ltar bstan pa dang /_/mtshams bcing ba dang stong pa dang /_/thab mo dang ni 
[\[136a.5\]]rdzogs pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na bzhugs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis shing thog a mra'i 'bras bu brims shig ces gsungs pa dge slong rnams sus brim pa mi shes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[136a.6\]]rung bar byed pas brims shig_/rung bar byed pa med na dge tshul phas byos shig_/dge tshul pha med na dge slong rang gis lag pa bkrus te byin len byos la so sor rung bar gyis te brim par byos shig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rang gi lag pa khrus la byin len byos te so sor 
[\[136a.7\]]rung bar byos la brims shig ces bka' stsal pa dang /_'bras bu mang pos gang ba'i skon bu gcig pus ma theg nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_khyim pas kyang grogs byos la gnyi gas brim par bya ste/_gang khyim pas brims pa de ni byin len du bya'o/_/
[\[136b\]]
[\[136b.1\]]gang dge slong gis brims pa de ni byin len bya mi dgos so/_/a mra gzhan zhim por grags pa zhig yod na/_de dag bsres la rim la brims pa dang /_thams cad thob par gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag so sor brims shig ces gsungs so/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[136b.2\]]kyis a mra gang zhim por grags pa so sor brims shig ces gsungs pa dang /_drug sde rnams kun dga'i ra bar dong nas de dag gis a mra zhim por grags pa de rang gis blangs nas/_gtsug lag khang du 'ongs te byin len byas shing zos pa dang /_dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/_
[\[136b.3\]]tshe dang ldan pa dag a mra zhim po de dag ma brims na ci'i phyir zad dam zhes dris pa dang /_srung ma rnams kyis de dag brim du ga la mchis/_drug sde rnams kyis blangs te gtsug lag khang du dong nas byin len byas te zos so zhes smras pa dang /_dge slong rnams 'phya'o/_/de ltar 
[\[136b.4\]]gyur pa dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_dge slong rnams gang su zhig sngar blangs la phyis byin len byed na nyes pa'i dmigs su 'gyur te/_de bas na dge slong gis sngar blangs pa las phyis byin len mi bya'o snyam du 
[\[136b.5\]]mkhyen nas/_dge slong dag drug sde rnams kyis ni mi rigs par byas kyis de bas na dge slong rnams sngar blangs pa las phyis byin len ma byed cig_/sngar blangs pa phyis byin len byas na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/_dge slong 
[\[136b.6\]]rnams me tog dang /_'bras bu dang /_bca' ba dang /_gzhan yang bza' ba dang /_btung ba 'brim pa la mdzub mos bstan cing 'di byin cig_/'di dag byin cig ces smra/_de yongs su zos pa dang /_brim pa ma snyoms par gyur nas/_'dod chags dang ma bral 
[\[136b.7\]]ba'i dge slong kha cig gis dpyas pa dang /_de ltar gyur pa dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag 'phya ba ni yus te/_de bas na dge slong gis mdzub mos 'di byin cig_/'di dag byin cig 
[\[137a\]]
[\[137a.1\]]ces bstan cing bza' bar mi bya'o/_/dge slong gis mdzub mos 'di byin cig 'di dag byin cig ces bstan cing zos na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/_/btung ba med pa ni drod chung bas smin pa 'dod pa dang /_drod che bas ma smin pa 'dod pa'o/_/
[\[137a.2\]]gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/_drug sde rnams ljongs spyad pa spyod pa na ri brags kyi grong gzhan zhig gi gtsug lag khang zhig tu phyin na de'i dge slong dag nyin par spyod pa'i phyir dong ste/_gtsug lag khang de stong par lus pa dang /_drug sde po rnams dga' bo dang nye 
[\[137a.3\]]dga' bo gtsug lag khang stong pa mtshams ma bcad pa 'dir bdag cag rnams kyis 'dir gnas na ji ltar gnas par bya/_mtshams bcad kyis tshur shog ces smras nas/_de dag gis legs kyis de bzhin du bya'o zhes smras nas/_de dag gis mtshams bcad ma 
[\[137a.4\]]thag tu snga na gnas pa'i dge slong dag lhags pa dang /_drug sde po rnams kyis de la ngal so shig ces byas na/_de dag gis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa rnams 'di ltar khyed cag ni glo bur du lhags pa'o/_/nged ni snga nas gnas pas na khyed cag la bdag cag gis ngal so 
[\[137a.5\]]shig ces bya ba'i rigs so zhes pa dang /_drug sde po rnams kyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag cag gis kyang mtshams bcad do/_/de dag gis smras pa/_bdag cag gis kyang sngar mtshams bcad do zhes smras nas/_dge slong de dag ci mtshams snga ma brtsan 
[\[137a.6\]]nam/_'on te phyi ma brtsan zhes te the tshom skyes pa dang /_de ltar gyur pa dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong glo bur ba rnams gtsug lag khang du zhugs ma thag tu stong par mthong na yang mtshams 
[\[137a.7\]]gcad par mi bya'o/_/lam gyis ngal bso ste shin tu brtags nas snga na gnas pa med na gdod mtshams gcad par bya'o/_/gzhan du na gcad par mi bya'o/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/_dze ta'i tshal gyi sgor khyim pa gnyis shig thab mo byung ste/_de na dge slong 
[\[137b\]]
[\[137b.1\]]gcig 'dus pa de la gcig gis dbang bcugs nas/_des de la rgyal po'i pho brang du che bzhi byas te cig shos po chad pas bcad pa dang /_des de la 'phya'o/_/de ltar gyur pa dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal 
[\[137b.2\]]pa/_dge slong dag khyim pa de 'phya ba ni yus kyis/_de bas na dge slong rnams thab mo byed pa'i drung na ma 'dug par che bzhi yang ma byed par byol te song shig_/dge slong thab mo byed pa'i drung na 'dug cing che bzhi byed na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/_/gleng gzhi'i sgo bzhi 
[\[137b.3\]]pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa bcu pa'o/_/gleng gzhi'i sgo bzhi pa rdzogs so//_//mdor bsdus pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams dang /_/yul bskor dang ni yon gyi snod/_/kun 'dus pa dang stegs bu dang /_/rnga chen 'khor lo tha ma'o/_/mdor na/_
[\[137b.4\]]drang srong chen pos gnang bar gsungs pa ni/_/byang chub sems dpa'i sku gzugs dang /_/stegs bu dang ni rgyal mtshan dang /_/ba dan lcags kyi ka ba'o/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/_khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na/_bdag 
[\[137b.5\]]gis bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i sku gzugs bgyi'o zhes gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_khyim bdag gnang gis byos shig_/bcom ldan 'das de ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na bdag gis byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs la rgyal 
[\[137b.6\]]mtshan gyis bskor ro zhes gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_khyim bdag gnang gis skor cig_/bcom ldan 'das de ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na bdag gis gzugs stegs bus bskor ro zhes gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[137b.7\]]bka' stsal pa/_khyim bdag gnang gis stegs bus bskor cig_/yang de ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na bdag gis gzugs la lcags kyi ka bas bskor ro zhes gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_khyim bdag gnang gis skor cig_/yang 
[\[138a\]]
[\[138a.1\]]de ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na bdag gis lcags kyi ka ba'i steng du ba dan gdags par bgyi'o zhes gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_khyim bdag gnang gis thogs shig_/gleng gzhi'i sgo lnga pa'i mdo'i 
[\[138a.2\]]tshigs su bcad pa dang po'o//_//mdor na/_byang chub sems dpa'i yul bskor dang /_/de bzhin rgyan dang byug pa dang /_/khyogs dang shing rta ba dan dang /_/gdugs dang rgyal mtshan snyan gyi rgyan/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dze ta'i tshal

[\[138a.4\]]khyim bdag gnang gis skor cig_/byang chub sems dpa'i rgyan med de mi mdzes nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin pas de ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na/_bdag gis byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs la rgyan 'bul lo zhes gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das

[\[138a.6\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_khyim bdag gnang gis brgyan par byos shig_/byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs grong khyer du rkang pas khyer ba dang /_khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis de ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na bdag gis byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs 
[\[138a.7\]]khyogs las grong khyer du bkur bar bgyi'o zhes gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_khyim bdag gnang gis khyer cig_/khyogs las khyer yang mi mdzes par gyur nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis de ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na 
[\[138b\]]
[\[138b.1\]]bdag gis byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs shing rta las bkur bar bgyi'o zhes gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_khyim bdag gnang gis de bzhin du byos shig_/shing rta yang ba dan dang gdugs med pas mi mdzes par gyur nas/_khyim

[\[138b.5\]]dgag cing /_/rgyan tshogs rnams kyang mi gzhig go/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis de ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na bdag gis byang chub 
[\[138b.6\]]sems dpa'i gzugs kyi zhabs la yon dbul lo zhes gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_khyim bdag gnang gis phul cig_/de'i mchod ston gyi tshe yul sna tshogs na gnas pa'i dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma dang /_gzhan 
[\[138b.7\]]yang blta bar 'dod pa'i phyir phal mo che lhags pa rnams kyis de la yon dbul ba [{]mangs [,]mang [}]pas rnyed pa de sus bkur ba dge slong rnams kyis mi shes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong gis bkur bar bya'o zhes pa dang /_dge slong gnas brtan dag gis 
[\[139a\]]
[\[139a.1\]]khyer ba dang mi dga' ba skyes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gnas bca' bar byed pa dang /_gzhan yang gzhon pa dang rgan pa rnams kyis bkur bar bya'o/_/dge slong gnas brtan dang /_gnas brtan dag gis ni bsrung bar byos 
[\[139a.2\]]shig_/yon phul ba dang /_me tog dang /_gos la sogs pa shing rta'i thog tu bzhag pa dang /_kha cig lhung ba ma byin par len pa dag gis thugs thub tu khyer nas/_khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis de ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na bdag gis shing rta'i steng du phreng

[\[139a.4\]]pa dag gis 'phags pa dag bdag cag ji ltar dad pa de bzhin du ma dad pa yang skyes te/_kye ma'o khyed kyis rol mo rnams kyang zhi la/_skye bo mang po yang so sor gyes nas gzugs kyi rgyan rnams bkrol na ci nyes zhes dpyas pa dang /_de ltar gyur pa dge slong rnams kyis bcom 
[\[139a.5\]]ldan 'das la gsol nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag bram ze dang /_khyim bdag rnams 'phya ba ni yus te/_de bas na rol mo rnams kyang ma zhi/_skye bo mang po yang so sor ma gyes par dge slong rnams kyis gzugs kyi rgyan ma rtul cig_/brtul na

[\[139a.7\]]ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis yul so so na gnas pa'i dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma rnams mthong ba dang /_yid dga' ba 
[\[139b\]]
[\[139b.1\]]skyes nas des bsams pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong rnams 'di ltar dus su sbyin pa ni rnam pa lnga ste/_lnga gang zhe na/_glo bur du 'ongs pa dang /_'dod pa rnams la sbyin pa byin pa 'di ni sbyin pa'i dus dang po'o/_/nad pa dang nad g.yog la sbyin pa 
[\[139b.2\]]byin pa 'di ni sbyin pa'i dus gnyis pa'o/_/lo nyes shing phongs brel ba la sbyin pa byin pa 'di ni sbyin pa'i dus gsum pa'o/_/gang su la yang rung ste lo thog gsar pa dang /_'bras bu gsar pa dang /_gsar thog de dag des thog mar tshul khrims dang ldan pa yon tan dang ldan pa 
[\[139b.3\]]la byin zhing /_de'i 'og tu bdag za ba 'di ni sbyin pa'i dus bzhi pa'o/_/gang su yang rung ste/_rlung ldang ba'am/_yul rmugs pa'am/_char 'bab pa'am/_grang ba la sogs pa de lta bu'i rnam pas rlung ldang ba dang /_yul rmugs pa dang /_char 'bab pa dang /_grang ba la zan 
[\[139b.4\]]nam/_skyo ma'am/_thug pa'am/_skom la sogs pa de dag phyir byung ste/_dge 'dun la 'bul zhing 'phags pa 'di zos na lus kyang mi gsher/_chos gos la yang char gyis mi phog ste bde ba la reg cing gnas par 'gyur ro zhes sbyin pa 'di ni sbyin pa'i dus lnga pa'o/_/
[\[139b.5\]]de ltar na 'di ni yul so so na gnas pa'i dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma la sogs pa lam gyi ngal ba rnams la de ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na bdag gis de dag 'dus pa'i zas sbyar ro snyam du bsams te/_bcom ldan 'das

[\[139b.7\]]pa la sbyin pa byin pa 'di ni sbyin pa'i dus dang po zhes bya ba nas/_snga ma ltar bde ba la reg par gnas par bya ba 'di ni dus kyi sbyin pa lnga pa'o zhes bya ba'i bar du sbyin pa'i dus lngar gsungs na/_da 'dir byang chub sems dpa'i mchod pa chen po la yul so so nas mchis pa'i dge 
[\[140a\]]
[\[140a.1\]]slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma la sogs pa glo bur du mchis pa lam gyis yongs su gdungs pa de rnams la de ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na bdag gis 'dus pa de dag gi zas sbyar ro zhes gsol pa dang /_bcom

[\[140a.6\]]gtsug phud kyi mchod ston sbyar ro zhes gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_khyim bdag gnang gis sbyor cig_/yang zla ba gang la bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa'i ye shes mngon du chud ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[140a.7\]]khyim bdag dpyid zla tha [{]chungs [,]chung [}]la'o/_/de ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na bcom ldan 'das 'dzam bu'i grib ma la gzugs bzhugs pa la mchod ston chen po sbyar ro zhes gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_khyim bdag gnang gis sbyor cig_/gleng 
[\[140b\]]
[\[140b.1\]]gzhi'i sgo lnga pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa bzhi pa'o//_//mdor na/_rtswa stan dang ni the tshom dang /_/snga phyi dag tu 'dug pa dang /_/ca co dag dang lam rnams dang /_/gaN+DI dung dang rnga rdung ba'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa na dze ta'i tshal mgon

[\[140b.3\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis rtswa'i stan la 'dug par bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang /_dge slong rnams zan zos pa dang the tshom skyes nas rtswa stan te khyer te dong nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_stan khyer te ma 'dong bar phung por byos te zhog la/_gang gi tshe dus ston yongs 
[\[140b.4\]]su rdzogs par gyur pa de'i tshe thams cad 'or cig_/dge slong rnams ston mo'i dus la snga phyir 'dug pas gzhan zan zos te song bar gyur/_gzhan gdod 'ongs pa ma thob ste brel bar gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]ji lta ba bzhin du 'dug shig ces gsungs so/_/
[\[140b.5\]]dge slong mang po 'dus pa dang ca cor gyur pas dus ma shes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis dus brjod par byos shig ces gsungs pa dang /_de dag de nyid du dus la bab bo/_/dus la bab bo zhes brjod pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gaN+DI brdung bar byos shig_/

[\[140b.7\]]bus la rnga yang rdungs shig ces gsungs so/_/gleng gzhi'i sgo lnga pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa lnga pa'o//_//mdor na/_der ni rnga yang brdung bar bya/_/de nas shing rta dbyung ba dang /_/dngos po byung dang rnyed pa dang /_/ji ltar tshul bzhin bsgo bar bya'o/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[141a\]]
[\[141a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa na dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ba na bzhugs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gaN+DI dang dung kha bsdoms pa dang rnga rdungs shig ces bka' stsal na/_de dag gis gaN+DI brdungs pa'i rjes bzhin brdungs pa dang /_
[\[141a.2\]]nad pa dang las la gtogs pa rnams la gnod par gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gang gi tshe nad pa rnams zas mnos zin par gyur la/_las byed pa rnams kyang zas zos zin pa de'i tshe na gaN+DI dang dung kha bsdoms pa dang /_rnga rdungs shig_/mchod ston 
[\[141a.3\]]zin kyang so so na gnas pa'i dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma la sogs pa so sor ma dong ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis shing rta phyung shig dang de dong nas rang 'dong ngo zhes gsungs pa dang /_mchod ston de'i tshe dge slong rnams kyis rnyed 
[\[141a.4\]]pa grub pa de ji ltar bgo ba mi shes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_ji ltar rgan rims su mnyam par gos shig_/dge slong mang po 'dus pa de dag ca co byed pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_bcu zhing gcig tu bgo bar bya'o/_/brgya zhing 
[\[141a.5\]]gcig tu'o/_/de'i 'og tu stong zhing gcig tu rnyed pa bgo bar byos shig_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pA lis zhus pa/_btsun pa gal te bcu'i nang nas gcig dus las 'das na gum pa'i yo byad su dbang zhes zhus pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[141a.6\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_u pA li de ste bgo ba'i tshe dus 'das na shi ba'i yo byad dge 'dun 'dus pa dbang gis spyir gos shig_/'on te bgos nas dus 'das na ni dgu po rnams kyis 'thob bo/_/de bzhin du brgyad stong sde rnams la yang sbyar bar bya'o/_/gleng gzhi'i sgo 
[\[141a.7\]]lnga pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa drug pa'o//_//gleng gzhi'i sgo lnga pa rdzogs te/_gleng gzhi rnams rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//rkyang pa'i sgo'i mdor na/_phyag ni thog mar bya ba dang /_/gnyis pa'i snod rnams ma nges pa/_/gsum du yo byad rnams kyang ste/_/de ni rkyang 
[\[141b\]]
[\[141b.1\]]bar btags pa'o/_/mdor bsdus pa na/_phyag 'tshal ba dang gsing ma dang /_/de bzhin 'jog dang nyal dang khyi/_/de bzhin btung phor bu ram shing /_/de bzhin mar dang rtsa ba sdong po rnams/_/mdo rnams bsdus par gsungs pa'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[141b.2\]]'das mnyan du yod pa na dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe na dge slong gnyis shig rnam par gdon mi za ba'i gtam smra ba las gcig la gcig tshig rtsub po smras nas de la gzhon nus rgan po la rab tu spyos te/_de gnas khang 
[\[141b.3\]]du zhugs te 'dug pa dang /_gzhon nus bdag gis rgan pa la rab tu spyos kyis song ste bzod par gsol lo snyam bsams nas/_des de'i gnas khang du song ste rkang pa gnyis la gtugs nas btsun pa bdag gis khyod la rab tu spyos pa bzod par mdzod cig ces 
[\[141b.4\]]bzod pa gsol bar byed pa dang /_de cher khros nas gtses te gnod pa byas so zhes smras pa dang /_dge slong dag gis thos nas brgyugs te tshe dang ldan pa ci'i phyir 'o dod 'bod ces dris pa dang /_des smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa 'di 'di ltar bdag gi gnas khang du 
[\[141b.5\]]'ongs te gnod pa byed pa la ltos/_de dag gis de la tshe dang ldan pa ci'i phyir khyod kyis dge slong rgan pa 'di la gtses zhes smras pa dang /_des kyang ji ltar gyur pa smras nas de dag cang mi smra bar 'dug go/_/des bsams pa de'i phyir na bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag byos 
[\[141b.6\]]shig par gsungs te/_ji nas nga'i nyan thos rnams byams pa'i sems dang /_phan pa'i sems dang /_brtse ba'i sems kyis rang gi don sgrub par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs na 'di ltar 'di ni bdag mthong nas mi dga' ba dang /_khros par gyur na bdag gis 'di la bzod 
[\[141b.7\]]par byas te ci rung gis 'gro'o snyam bsams nas de song nas phyis de la phyag kyang mi byed na bzod par byed pa lta ci smos/_de nas dus phyi zhig na dge slong rgan pa de dge slong gzhan zhig dang lhan cig 'chag cing gtam zer zhing 'khod pa dang /_dge slong de yang dge slong 
[\[142a\]]
[\[142a.1\]]dag la phyag 'tshal ba las phyogs der 'ongs pa dang /_'chag pa'i grogs kyi dge slong des de la smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa 'di lta bu'i dge slong tshul khrims dang ldan pa 'di la ci'i phyir bzod par ma byas/_rgan pa des 'di ni 'di ltar sdig pa'i sems 
[\[142a.2\]]khro ba can te/_ltos shig dang da yang khyod la phyag byed kyi nga la mi byed do zhes smras pa dang /_de bzhin des phyag byas pa dang /_des smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa khyod kyis sdig pa'i sems can de mthong ngam/_tshe dang ldan pa mthong ngo /_/de nas des de la tshe dang ldan pa bdag 
[\[142a.3\]]gis gzhan du thos na gzhan du mthong ste/_khyod ni ngo tsha zhes 'gyod pa can bslab pa la mos pa'o zhes thos na/_khyod ci'i phyir de ltar ma yin zhes smras pa dang /_des btsun pa bdag gis ji ltar bgyi/_tshe dang ldan pa dge slong tshul khrims dang ldan pa 'di lta bu la khyod kyis 
[\[142a.4\]]ci'i phyir bzod pa mi bya zhes smras pa dang /_des ji ltar gyur pa rgyas par smras pa dang /_de 'phya bar gyur nas/_de ltar gyur pa dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong rnams dge slong de 'phya ba ni yus kyis/_
[\[142a.5\]]gang rnam par 'khon pa de bzod par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis gang 'khon pa de bzod par bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang /_gzhan zhig gis bzod par byas kyang ma bzod nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gang mi spyod pa de nye spyod du phyin pa dang phyag byos shig_/des 
[\[142a.6\]]kyang nad med cig ces smra'am yang na phyag byos shig_/de ltar mi byed na gnyis ka la 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khon pa'i dge slong la bzod par bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang /_dge slong gnyis shig rnam par gdon mi za ba'i gtam smra 
[\[142a.7\]]ba las 'khrugs pa dang /_mtshang 'dru ba dang /_'thab pa dang /_rtsod par gyur te/_de gnyis las dge slong gzhon pas dge slong rgan pa la tshig drag po mi snyan pas blong zhing khros te smras pa dang /_rab tu khros nas gnas khang du zhugs te sgo bcad nas des ngan 
[\[142b\]]
[\[142b.1\]]du smras pa'i tshig de lta bu sgom zhing 'dug go/_/de'i bar du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis mi mkhyen pa dang /_ma gzigs pa dang /_ma chud pa dang /_rnam par mi mkhyen pa med de sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag ni chos nyid kyis thugs rje chen po can 'jig rten 
[\[142b.2\]]la phan 'dogs pa la zhugs pa/_srung ba gcig pu dpa' ba/_gcig pu zhi gnas dang lhag mthong la gnas pa/_gdul ba'i dngos po gsum la mkhas pa/_chu bo bzhi las rgal ba/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i mthil la rab tu brtan pa/_mi 'jigs pa 
[\[142b.3\]]bzhis 'jigs pa med pa/_yan lag lnga rab tu rnam par spangs pa/_'gro ba lnga las yang dag par 'das pa/_yan lag drug dang ldan pa/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pa/_rtag tu drug la gnas pa/_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi me tog gis 
[\[142b.4\]]brgyan pa/_lam yan lag brgyad pa ston pa/_mthar gyis gnas shing snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la mkhas pa/_stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa/_phyogs bcur snyan par grags pa/_brgya phrag bcu las dbang sgyur ba'i mchog tu byung bas gang 'gribs/_gang 
[\[142b.5\]]'phel/_gang sdug bsngal du gyur/_gang dog par gyur/_gang gnod par gyur/_gang sdug bsngal dang dog pa dang gnod par gyur/_gang ngan song la gzhol/_gang ngan song la 'bab/_gang ngan song la rab tu bstan/_gang ngas ngan song las bton te mtho 
[\[142b.6\]]ris su thar pa'i 'bras bu la so sor dgod par bya/_gang dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa rnams ni bskyed par bya/_gang gis bskyed pa rnams ni yongs su smin par bya/_gang yongs su smin pa rnams ni rnam par dgrol bar bya'o zhes nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum 
[\[142b.7\]]du sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs shing ye shes snang ba la 'jug go/_/yang gsungs pa/_chu srin gnas pa'i rgya mtsho ni/_/dus las 'da' bar 'gyur srid kyi/_/gdul bar bya ba'i bu rnams la/_/sangs rgyas dus 'da' mi srid do/_/de nas 
[\[143a\]]
[\[143a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das gnas gzhan zhig tu 'dzum pa mdzad do/_/chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i tshe na zhal nas 'od zer sngon po dang /_ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_dkar po la sogs pa byung 
[\[143a.2\]]ste/_la la ni 'og tu 'gro'o/_/la la ni steng du 'gro ste/_de la gang 'og tu song ba des ni yang 'tsho ba dang /_thig nag po dang /_'dus pa dang /_'o dod 'bod pa dang /_'o dod 'bod pa chen po dang /_gdung ba dang /_rab tu gdung ba dang /_bstir med pa dang /_chu bur dang /_
[\[143a.3\]]rgyun du chu bur dang /_a Ta Ta dang /_ha ha ba dang /_hu hu ba dang /_ut+pal dang /_pad mo dang /_pad mo chen po la sogs pa'i sems can dmyal bar song ste/_gang tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba la des bab pa ni bsil bar gyur/_gang grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba 
[\[143a.4\]]de la bab pa ni dro bar gyur te/_des sems can de dag de lta bus gzir ba'i khyad par de dag bde bar byas pa dang /_de dag 'di snyam du kye bdag cag rnams 'di nas shi 'phos sam 'on te gzhan du skyes zhes bsams na/_de dag la rab tu dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir 
[\[143a.5\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis sprul pa btang nas de dag gis sprul pa mthong ba dang /_'di snyam du kye bdag cag rnams 'di nas shi 'phos par gyur pa yang med/_gzhan du skyes pa yang med kyis/_sngon ma byung ba'i sems can 'di mthong ba'i mthus na bdag cag gzir ba'i 
[\[143a.6\]]khyad par rnams bde bar gyur to snyam du bsams nas de dag sprul pa la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur pa dang /_dmyal bas gzir ba'i las zad par byas te gang du bden par gyur pa'i snod du der lha dang mi'i mtshams 'dzin to/_/gang steng du song ba des ni rgyal chen 
[\[143a.7\]]bzhi'i ris kyi lha dang /_sum bcu rtsa gsum dang /_mtshe ma dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /_tshangs ris dang /_tshangs lha nye phan dang /_tshangs chen dang /_chung snang dang /_tshad med snang dang /_kun snang dang /_dge 
[\[143b\]]
[\[143b.1\]]ba dang /_tshad med dge ba dang /_dge rgyas dang /_sprin med dang /_bsod nams 'phel dang /_'bras bu che ba dang /_mi che ba dang /_mi gdung ba dang /_shin tu mthong ba dang /_gya nom snang ba dang /_'og min gyi lhar song nas mi rtag pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba 
[\[143b.2\]]dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_bdag med pa rnams bsgrags te tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyang brjod do/_/'byung bar bya phyir brtsam par byos/_/sangs rgyas bstan la brtson par byos/_/'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin/_/'chi bdag sde rnams gzhom par byos/_/
[\[143b.3\]]gang zhig rab tu bag yod par/_/chos 'dul 'di la spyod 'gyur ba/_/skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas/_/sdug bsngal tha mar 'byin par 'gyur/_/de nas 'od zer des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bskor nas bcom ldan 'das kyi phyi bzhin du 
[\[143b.4\]]'brang ngo /_/de dag gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa'i las la lung ston bzhed par gyur na bcom ldan 'das kyi rgyab tu nub bo/_/ma 'ongs pa'i dus la lung ston par bzhed par gyur na mdun du nub bo/_/dmyal bar lung ston par bzhed par gyur na zhabs kyi 
[\[143b.5\]]mthil du nub bo/_/byol song du skye bar lung ston par bzhed par gyur na rting par nub bo/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]su skye bar lung ston par bzhed par gyur na zhabs kyi mthe bor nub bo/_/mir skye bar lung ston par bzhed par gyur na pus mor nub bo/_/stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i 
[\[143b.6\]]rgyal por lung ston bzhed par gyur na phyag g.yon pa'i mthil du nub bo/_/'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston bzhed par gyur na phyag g.yas pa'i mthil du nub bo/_/lhar skye bar lung ston bzhed par gyur na lte bar nub bo/_/nyan thos kyi byang chub tu lung ston bzhed par 
[\[143b.7\]]gyur na zhal du nub bo/_/rang byang chub tu lung ston bzhed par gyur na smin mtshams su nub bo/_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston bzhed par gyur na spyi bo'i gtsug tu nub bo/_/de nas 'od zer des bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas 
[\[144a\]]
[\[144a.1\]]nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs kyi rting bar nub pa dang /_de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos zhus pa/_ji ltar snang bar byed pa shar ba bzhin/_/zhal gyi nang nas byung ba mang po ni/_/kha dog rnam pa sna tshogs stong 
[\[144a.2\]]ldan pa/_/gang gis phyogs bcu kun tu snang gyur pa'o/_/yang tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/_rgod pa zhum rgyags spangs nas bral gyur pa/_/skye bo rnams kyi rgyur gyur sangs rgyas te/_/rgyal ba dgra rgyal dung dang pad mo bzhin dkar ba/_/rgyu med 'dzum pa nye bar 
[\[144a.3\]]ston mi mdzad/_/brtan pa'i thugs mnga' de dus rang gis mkhyen mdzod cig_/rgyal ba'i dbang la thos 'tshal nyan rnams la/_/brtan zhing thub pa'i khyu mchog dam pa yis/_/the tshom byung ba dge bas rnam par bsol/_/don med par ni rgya mtsho ri rgyal bstan/_/rdzogs 
[\[144a.4\]]pa'i sangs rgyas 'dzum pa mi ston te/_/brtan pas gang phyir 'dzum pa bstan pa de/_/skye bo mang po 'di dag thos par mos/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo de de bzhin te/_de de bzhin no/_/kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom 
[\[144a.5\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad do/_/kun dga' bo gang dge slong gzhon pa des dge slong la tshig ngan pas mtshang brus shing smras pas khros pa mthong ngam/_bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo /_/de gnas khang du zhugs te sgo 
[\[144a.6\]]bcad nas de'i tshig ngan du smras pa de phyi phyir sgom zhing 'dug go/_/de khros pas kun tu khebs nas phyi phyir bsgoms pas na zhe sdang gi sa bcu rab tu byung ste/_de dus 'das te shi 'phos nas de'i gnas khang de nyid du sbrul gdug par skye bar 'gyur ro//_//
[\[144a.7\]]'dul ba gzhung dam pa/_bam po sum bcu rtsa brgyad pa/_de ltar bcom ldan 'das tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang lhan cig gtam gsung ba'i bar du dge slong de yang tshig ngan du smras pa de lan mang du bsgoms shing shin tu khro bas kun tu khebs te mang du byas 
[\[144b\]]
[\[144b.1\]]pas zhe sdang gi sa bcu po thob pas na de 'chi 'phos dus 'das te de'i gnas khang nyid du sbrul gdug par skyes so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo skyes bu gti mug can de ni gnas khang de nyid du sbrul gdug 
[\[144b.2\]]par skyes kyis der song la drung du phyin na nga'i tshig gis nad med cig ces byos la/_'di skad du 'di ltar khyod nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/_dge sbyong gi 'bras bu bzhi las gang yang rung dge sbyong gi 'bras bu rtogs par 'gyur ba las da khyod khros pa'i dbang gis 
[\[144b.3\]]na 'dir sbrul gdug par skyes kyis dge slong de la bzod par byos shig_/'di las yang dus 'das na sems can dmyal bar skyes sa re zhes sgo shig_/btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas dge 
[\[144b.4\]]slong de khrid de dge slong de'i gnas khang du song nas sgo la dal nas bags kyis brdungs te smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]khyod la bcom ldan 'das nad med cig ces gsungs te/_'di ltar khyod nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung la dge sbyong gi 'bras bu bzhi las gang 
[\[144b.5\]]yang rung dge sbyong gi 'bras bu rtogs par 'gyur ba las da khyod khros pa'i dbang gis na 'dir sbrul gdug par skyes kyis dge slong 'di la bzod par byos shig_/'di nas dus byas nas kyang sems can dmyal bar skyes sa re zhes gsung ngo /_/de nas de nyid du 
[\[144b.6\]]khros pa'i dug btang nas gnas khang nas phyir ma byung zhing 'dug pa dang /_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la maud gal gyi bu tshur shog_/khyod kyis sbrul gdug pa gang na ba der song la phyin pa dang /_'di skad du dge slong de 
[\[144b.7\]]la bzod par byos shig ces bka' stsal pa dang /_des kyang der song ste smras pa dang /_de lde mig kyog po'i bu ga nas mgo tsam bstan te phyir nang du zhugs so/_/dge slong gis dge slong la sems kyis gnod par byas pas rang gi gnas khang du sbrul du skyes 
[\[145a\]]
[\[145a.1\]]so zhes sgra de lta bu mnyan du yod par kun du grags pa dang /_ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal nang gi btsun mo dang /_gzhon nu dang /_blon po dang /_grong mi dang /_gzhongs su bcas pas gang sgra de thos pa dang ltad mo lta 'dod pas de'i yid bskyod 
[\[145a.2\]]nas dze ta'i tshal du dong ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyang nyan thos chen po kun shes kauN+Di n+ya dang /_rlangs pa dang /_ming chen dang /_ma 'gags pa dang /_shA ri'i bu dang /_maud gal gyi bu chen po dang /_'od snang dang /_kun dga' bo dang /_nam gru la sogs pas bskor te 
[\[145a.3\]]rgyal po gsal rgyal dang de'i gnas khang du bzhud nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de nyid kyi skad du gsungs pa dang /_de rtabs bzhin du gnas khang nas phyir byung ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de khrid nas gtsug lag khang nas phyir phyung ste dze ta'i tshal gyi sgor 'khor brgya phrag 
[\[145a.4\]]du ma dang /_dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi mdun na gdan bting ba de la bzhugs pa dang /_de nas sbrul gdug pa de phan tshun kun du skye bo mang po la bltas te skrag nas bcom ldan 'das kyi gdan logs su rgan rims kyi mthar bcom ldan 'das la lta bzhin du 'khyil te 
[\[145a.5\]]'dug go/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de la bka' stsal pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]'di ltar khyod nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas dge sbyong gi 'bras bu bzhi las gang yang rung dge sbyong gi 'bras bu rtogs par 'gyur ba las da khyod 'dir shin tu khro bas kun tu khebs nas lan mang du 
[\[145a.6\]]bsgoms la dge slong la yang sems gdug pa bskyed pas da ltar sbrul gdug par skyes te/_'tshe ba dang gsod pa la chags shing gzhan gyi srog 'phrog cing gzhan 'tsho ba dang phral nas 'tsho bar byed de 'di nas shi 'phos na rgyud gang du skye/_gang du skye bar 'gyur/_gang du 
[\[145a.7\]]mngon par skye bar 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gang gi tshe de'i rigs dran par byas pa de'i tshe ngu bar gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de gsungs pa/_khyod ni byol song skye gnas gyur/_/mi dal bar yang skyes gyur na/_/don med par 
[\[145b\]]
[\[145b.1\]]ni ci phyir ngu /_/da ni ci zhig byar yod kyis/_/rgyal ba thugs rje ldan mnga' la/_/sems kyis legs par dad skyes dang /_/byol song skye gnas 'di spangs te/_/de nas mtho ris 'gro bar 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pa chud mi zos pas 
[\[145b.2\]]de'i kun du gnas pa de dang bral bar gyur te/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong de la bka' stsal pa/_tshur shog dge slong khyod kyis sbrul gdug pa de la bzod pa byos shig_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ji ltar bzod par bgyi/_ci de'i rkang pa la gtug par 
[\[145b.3\]]bgyi'am zhes gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis de la ji ltar sngon gyi dge slong yin par mngon du byas te the tshom du mi bya bar bya/_gtug par bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_ston pa'i bka' bzhin des rkang pa la gtugs pa dang /_des de'i mgo bo la reg par byas 
[\[145b.4\]]pa dang /_de gnyis skye bo mang pos mthong ba dang rab tu ngo mtshar skyes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis skye bo mang po de dag la de'i phyir de lta bu'i tshul du chos bshad de/_de thos pas na srog chags brgya stong du ma rnams kyis ni khyad par chen po rtogs par gyur to/_/sbrul gdug 
[\[145b.5\]]pa de yang bcom ldan 'das la sems mngon par dad nas de dus 'das pa dang sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i gnas bzang por skyes so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_de bas na dge slong rnams 'di dang gzhan dag kyang khro bas kun 
[\[145b.6\]]tu khebs na nyes pa'i dmigs su 'gyur te/_de bas na dge slong gis khros pa'i dge slong la ji ltar de'i khros pas khebs par gnas pa/_rnam par byang bar gnas pa de lta de lta bur gsol lo/_/des kyang sems kyis bzod par byos shig_/gang snga dro khros 
[\[145b.7\]]pa la des phyi dro bzod par gsol cig_/gang phyi dro khros pa la ni des nub mo'o/_/gang nub mo khros pa la ni des phyi de nyin mo bzod par gsol cig ces gsungs nas/_bcom ldan 'das gdan las bzhengs te nang du yang dag 'jog la 'jug pa'i phyir gtsug 
[\[146a\]]
[\[146a.1\]]lag khang du gshegs so/_/chos nyid kyis lha'i bu'am lha'i bu mo yang rung skyes nas ring po ma lon par gang nas shi 'phos gang du skyes/_las gang yin zhes sems pa rnam pa 'di gsum skyes te/_sbrul gdug pa las shi 'phos nas/_sum 
[\[146a.2\]]bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i ris bzang por skyes te bcom ldan 'das la sems mngon du dad pa bskyed par mthong ngo /_/de nas sngon gyi sbrul gdug pa lha'i bu des 'di snyam du bdag 'dir zhag lon te/_bcom ldan 'das ltar 'gro bar mi rigs kyi/_bdag 'dir zhag ma lon 
[\[146a.3\]]par bcom ldan 'das la ltar 'gro'o snyam du bsams nas/_de nas lha'i bu sngon sbrul gdug pa de dri ma med pa'i rna tsha 'phyang bzhin du thogs shing do shal dang /_se mo dos lus brgyan te/_de nyid kyi nub mo lha'i me tog ut+pal dang /_pad mo dang /_ku mu da dang /_puN+Da 
[\[146a.4\]]rI ka dang /_man dA ra ba la sogs pas pang ba bkang ste snang ba chen pos dze ta'i tshal thams cad du snang bar byas nas bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor te chos nyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa 
[\[146a.5\]]dang /_bag la nyal ba dang /_khams dang /_rang bzhin mkhyen nas de 'dra ba'i 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yang dag par rtogs par 'gyur ba'i chos bstan nas lha'i bu sngon gyi sbrul gdug pa des thos pa dang /_'jig tshogs su lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu ye shes kyi 
[\[146a.6\]]rdo rjes bcom ste rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byas so/_/des bden pa mthong bas dga' ba'i tshig gsum smras te/_btsun pas phan btags pa 'di lta bu ni mas kyang ma bgyis/_phas kyang ma bgyis/_rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/_lhas kyang ma 
[\[146a.7\]]bgyis/_sdug pas kyang ma bgyis/_bdag gi gnyen mang pos kyang ma bgyis/_sngon gyi pha mes rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/_dge sbyong dang bram zes kyang ma bgyis te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni bskams/_rus pa'i ri 
[\[146b\]]
[\[146b.1\]]las ni brgal/_ngan song gi sgo ni bcad/_mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo ni phye nas lha dang mi'i gnas su bzhag go/_/khyod mthus shin tu mi bzad ngan song gi/_/nyes pa mang du ldan pa'i lam rnams bcad/_/mtho ris 'gro ba'i lam phyir bsod nams mchog_/
[\[146b.2\]]mya ngan 'da' lam bdag gis de ring thob/_/khyod la brten pas nyes pa med pa yi/_/bdag deng shin tu gtsang ba rnam dag mig_/'phags pa'i yid du 'ong ba'i zhi gnas thob/_/bdag gis sdug bsngal rgya mtsho pha rol rgal/_/skye bo lha dang lha min mi yis mchod/_/
[\[146b.3\]]skye rga na dang 'chi las rnam par bral/_/srid pa stong du'ang mthong bar shin tu dka'/_/thub khyod deng bdag mthong bas 'bras bur bcas/_/de nas se mo do ni 'phyang bzhin du/_/zhabs gnyis la ni phyag byas dga' ba skyes/_/dgra thul de la g.yas su bskor nas ni/_/lha yi 
[\[146b.4\]]'jig rten lha yi yul der song /_/de nas lha'i bu sngon sbrul gdug pa de tshong pa khe thob pa ltar/_rna chun pa lo legs pa ltar/_dpa' bo g.yul las rgyal ba ltar/_nad pa nad thams cad las thar ba ltar/_ji lta bu'i longs spyod dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du 'ongs 
[\[146b.5\]]pa de lta bu'i longs spyod dang /_rang gi gnas su song ba dang /_dge slong dag srod dang tho rangs la mi nyal bar thub par brtson par spyod pa rnams kyis mthong ba bcom ldan 'das kyi drung na rgya cher snang ba mthong nas the tshom du gyur te/_bcom ldan 'das la bcom ldan 
[\[146b.6\]]'das ci mdang mtshan mo bcom ldan 'das la tshangs pa 'khor gyi bdag po ltar mchis sam/_lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /_'jig rten skyong ba bzhi dag blta ba'i phyir mchis sam zhes zhus pa dang /_dge slong rnams tshangs pa'i 'khor gyi bdag po yang ma yin/_lha'i 
[\[146b.7\]]dbang po brgya byin yang ma yin/_'jig rten skyong ba bzhi la sogs pas nga la blta ba'i phyir 'ongs pa yang ma yin gyi/_gang sbrul gdug pa dge slong gis bzod par byas pa de nga la sems mngon du dad nas dus las 'das pa dang /_sum bcu rtsa gsum ris kyi lha'i 
[\[147a\]]
[\[147a.1\]]gnas bzar por skyes nas de 'di ltar mdang nga'i drung du 'ongs te ngas de la chos bstan pa dang /_bden pa mthong nas rang gi gnas su song ngo /_/de bas na dge slong rnams kyis 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/_gang gis bzod par bya ba dang /_bzod 
[\[147a.2\]]pa'i yon tan brjod par bya ba de ltar dge slong dag khyed kyis bslab par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_dge slong de dag yid mgu nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga'o/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/_bcom 
[\[147a.3\]]ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pA lis zhus pa/_btsun pa bsnyen par rdzogs par bgyid na tshe dang ldan pa rnams bdag la bsnyen par rdzogs par ma byed cig ces mchi bzhin dge slong rnams kyis bsnyen par rdzogs par bgyis na bsnyen par rdzogs pa zhes bgyi'am/_bsnyen 
[\[147a.4\]]par ma rdzogs pa zhes bgyi/_u pA li bsnyen par rdzogs pa zhes mi bya ste/_bsnyen par rdzogs par byed pa rnams kyang 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/_/u pA li de ci'i phyir zhe na/_bsnyen par rdzogs pa nyid kyang bslab pa 'bul na bsnyen par ma rdzogs zhes bya na 
[\[147a.5\]]bsnyen par rdzogs par byed pa'i tshe lta ci smos/_yang bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pA lis zhus pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis dge tshul pha rnams lo nyi shu lon nas bsnyen par rdzogs par byos shig ces gsungs na/_dge tshul pha gzhan dag bdag gi lo 
[\[147a.6\]]grangs ni ma 'tshal/_de lus bong ni che ste/_de dge slong rnams kyis lo grangs ma rtogs pas the tshom skyes te bsnyen par rdzogs par mi bgyid na de dag la ji ltar nan tan bgyi zhes zhus pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_u pA li de lta bu ni mtshan las 
[\[147a.7\]]so sor rtogs la bsnyen par rdzogs par byos shig_/de la the tshom du ma byed cig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de ltar mtshan las rtogs la bsnyen par rdzogs par gyis shig ces gsungs pa dang /_dge slong rnams kyis de gcer bur phyung ste mtshan rtog pa la zhugs 
[\[147b\]]
[\[147b.1\]]pa dang /_de shin tu ngo tsha nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gcer bur ma dbyung bar ba so'am gos kyi gdang la lhung bzed dam chos gos kyi snod zhog la 'di phob shig ces smros la/_de ni mchan khung dang mchan la rtogs te de ste yod na bsnyen par rdzogs 
[\[147b.2\]]par bya'o/_/de ste med na bsnyen par rdzogs par mi bya'o/_/yang zhus pa/_btsun pa dge slong rnams kyis dge slong la dge slong ma'i las kyis bsnyen par rdzogs par bgyis na bsnyen par rdzogs pa zhes bgyi'am/_bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa zhes bgyi/_u pA li 
[\[147b.3\]]bsnyen par rdzogs pa zhes ni bya ste bsnyen par rdzogs par byed pa rnams ni 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa dge slong ma la dge slong dang /_dge slong ma rnams kyis dge slong gi las kyis bsnyen par rdzogs par bgyis na bsnyen par rdzogs pa zhes bgyi'am 
[\[147b.4\]]bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa zhes bgyi/_u pA li bsnyen par rdzogs pa zhes bya ste/_dge 'dun gnyi ga yang 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/_/rkyang pa'i sgo dang po'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa thog ma'o//_//mdor na/_gsing ma grong dang bsdus pa dang /_/sems 
[\[147b.5\]]bskyed pas ni gso sbyin dang /_/gsad pa gsum yang de bzhin te/_/rnam 'byed dge 'dun lhag ma'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/dge slong dag cig 'gron pa mang po 
[\[147b.6\]]dang lhan cig ljongs spyod du dong ba dang /_de dag de'i tshe gso sbyin la bab nas de dag gis sa gsing ma'i phyogs shig mthong nas de dag gis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag tshur sheg_/sa gsing ma'i phyogs pha bi la gso sbyin bya'o zhes der de dag gso sbyin byed pa 
[\[147b.7\]]la zhugs pa dang /_'gron pa mang po dag 'das nas de dag kyang phyi bzhin 'dong ba las bar du rkun pos bcom ste gtsug lag khang du phyin pa dang /_dge slong rnams kyis mthong ste bde bar 'ongs sam/_tshe dang ldan pa dag bde bar 'ongs sam/_ci bde bar spyad dam 
[\[148a\]]
[\[148a.1\]]zhes smras pa dang /_bde bar ga la spyad/_ci nyes/_bdag cag ni rkun pos bcom mo/_/de lta bur gyur pa dge slong rnams la smras pa dang /_dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal 
[\[148a.2\]]pa/_gsing ma la chags pa'i phyir gso sbyin ma byed cig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis grong dang nye ba'i 'khor du gso sbyin byos shig ces gsungs pa dang /_de las dge slong phyed ni grong du zhugs phyed ni phyi rol du 'khod pas de dag ma 'dus par gyur nas gso sbyin ma 
[\[148a.3\]]byas te/_de ltar gyur pa dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gang grong na gnas pa rnams ni grong du gso sbyin byos shig_/de bzhin du dge slong rnams gso sbyin bya ste gso sbyin la ma sdod cig_/sdod 
[\[148a.4\]]na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag cig tshong pa'i 'gron pa mang po dang lhan cig tu lam du zhugs pa dang /_dge slong gis tshong pa la bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]bdag cag gso sbyin byed kyis de'i bar du skad cig sdod cig ces smras pa dang /_de dag gis 'phags 
[\[148a.5\]]pa rnams 'di phyogs na rkun pos 'jigs kyis phyi bzhin spyon cig bsdad do zhes smras pa dang /_der sdod grang der sdod grang snyam nas dge slong rnams phyi bzhin du 'brang zhing de dag dong ba las nam nangs so/_/dge slong rnams kyis de ltar gyur pa bcom ldan 'das la 
[\[148a.6\]]gsol nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong rnams gso sbyin gyi tshe gso sbyin ma byas par ma 'gro shig_/yang na 'gro bzhin du gso sbyin byos shig_/dge slong dag gis 'gro bzhin du gso sbyin byed pa la zhugs pa dang /_tshong pa rnams kyis 
[\[148a.7\]]'phags pa bdag cag ni rkun pos 'jigs pas cang mi smra bar 'gro na khyed ci'i phyir ca co byed ces smras nas/_de ltar gyur pa dge slong de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gso sbyin rgyas par ma byed par 
[\[148b\]]
[\[148b.1\]]mdor byos shig_/dge slong rnams kyis mdor byed pa la zhugs pa dang /_'on kyang tshong pa de dag gis dpyas nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sems bskyed pa tsam gyis byin gyis rlobs shig_/de bas na dge slong rnams chos gos byin gyis brlab 
[\[148b.2\]]pa dang /_gos bsngo ba dang /_gso sbyin dang /_tshul nas byung ba 'di bzhi ni sems bskyed pa tsam gyis 'grub bo/_/de yang 'di ltar bya ste/_sangs rgyas la dmigs pa'i dran pa nye bar bzhag ste/_sems bskyed par byos la gso sbyin byin gyis rlobs shig_/de nas 
[\[148b.3\]]tshig tu yang brjod par bya ste/_deng dge 'dun rnams kyi bco lnga'i gso sbyin te/_bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bya ba'i yang bco lnga'i gso sbyin te/_bdag ming 'di zhes bya ba'i bar chad kyi chos rnams kyang yongs su dag go zhes rang gis brjod de gso sbyin byin gyis 
[\[148b.4\]]brlabs la/_gang gi tshe dge 'dun 'dus pa phrad pa de'i tshe dge 'dun dang lhan cig tu gso sbyin bya'o/_/de ltar lan gnyis de ltar lan gsum du brjod de gso sbyin de ltar bya'o/_/gso sbyin mi bya ba ni ma yin no/_/ma byas na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[148b.5\]]gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/_dge slong dag cig gzhongs spyad pa spyod pa na rkun pos zin nas de dag gis kye bsam rlag tu 'khod de ci byed kyis/_mgo reg 'di dag gsad do zhes smras pa dang /_dge slong dag gis bsams pa/_bdag cag ni gsad par 
[\[148b.6\]]chad par lta snyam nas de dag gis rkun po la kye ci'i phyir nged gsad ces smras pa dang /_rkun pos smras pa/_khyed la rgyal po dang /_phyug po dang /_tshong dpon dang /_ded dpon rnams rab tu dad pas khyed kyis de dag la smras pa dang /_de dag gis nged la gnod par byed do zhes 
[\[148b.7\]]smras pa dang /_de na dge slong gzhon nu cig gis [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smras pa las byung ba'i nyes pa ltung ba byung ste/_des tshe dang ldan pa rnams bdag gis ltung ba byung ba bshags pa de'i bar du bsdad par ci gnang zhes smras pa dang /_de dag gis de ltar na gnas 'di nyid du shogs 
[\[149a\]]
[\[149a.1\]]shig ces smras pa dang /_des dge slong gi mdun du 'chags pa la zhugs te/_dgongs shig tshe dang ldan pa rnams/_bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba shes bzhin gyi [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]smras pa las byung ba'i ltung ba'i nyes pa mchis te/_bdag gis tshe dang ldan pa'i 
[\[149a.2\]]mdun du bshags so/_/mthol lo/_/mi 'chab bo/_/bshags shing mthol na bdag la bde bar 'gyur gyi/_ma bshags ma mthol na ni ma yin no/_/des smras pa/_nye bar mthong ngam/_mthong ngo /_/phyin chad sdom par dam 'cha'am dam 'cha'o/_/de ltar lan 
[\[149a.3\]]gnyis lan gsum du smras pa dang /_rkun po de thams cad kyis thos nas de dag gis smras pa/_'phags pa khyed rnams [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]mi smra'am/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]mi smra'o zhes smras pa dang /_de dag mngon du dad nas 'phags pa rnams de ltar na/_deng la su la yang ma smra shig 
[\[149a.4\]]ces smras pa dang /_nad med cig su la yang mi smra'o zhes smras te dong nas de dag gtsug lag khang du lhags pa dang /_the tshom skyes nas de ltar gyur pa dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong rnams 
[\[149a.5\]]nags tshal gyi dbang po rkun po'i drung du bshags pa yin gyis de la the tshom du ma byed cig_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/_dge slong gzhan zhig ljongs spyad pa spyod pa la rkun pos zin nas de dag gis bsam rlag tu 'khod de ci byed kyis mgo reg 'di dag gsad 
[\[149a.6\]]do zhes smras pa dang /_dge slong dag gis bsams pa/_bdag cag ni gsad par chad par lta snyam nas de dag gis rkun po la kye ci'i phyir nged gsad ces smras pa dang /_rkun pos smras pa/_khyed la rgyal po dang /_phyug po dang /_tshong dpon dang /_ded dpon rnams 
[\[149a.7\]]mngon par dad pas na khyed kyis de dag la smras pa dang /_de dag gis nged la don med par byed do zhes smras nas/_dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/_thong shig dang su la yang mi smra'o/_/de dag gis de ste khyed kyis bco lnga'i dus na gcig tu 'dus shing 'don pa de nged cag la 
[\[149b\]]
[\[149b.1\]]rgyas par smra bar dam 'cha' na gtang ngo zhes smras pa dang /_de na dge slong cig gzhung kha don du lobs pas de bsad kyis 'jigs pas skrag pas so sor thar pa myur du bton pa dang /_de dag mngon par dad nas 'phags pa khyed kyis de thams cad yang dag par bzung 
[\[149b.2\]]ste srung ngam/_zhes smras pa dang /_de dag gis tshe dang ldan pa 'di ni ston pa'i bka' yin na ci'i phyir yang dag par 'dzin cing mi srung zhes smras pa dang /_de dag gis 'phags pa rnams legs kyis bzhud la su la yang ma gsungs shig ces smras pa dang /_nad 
[\[149b.3\]]med cig mi smra'o zhes smras te dong nas de dag gtsug lag khang du phyin pa dang /_de dag the tshom skyes te de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong rnams nags tshal gyi dbang po rkun 
[\[149b.4\]]po'i drung du kha thon bklags pa ni legs par bklags pa yin gyis de la the tshom du ma byed cig_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/_dge slong dag cig yul be'u zhes bya ba nas ljongs spyad pa spyod cing dong ba dang /_rkun pos zin nas de dag gis kye bsam rlag 
[\[149b.5\]]tu 'khod de ci byed kyis mgo reg 'di dag gsad do zhes smras pa dang /_de la rkun po cig dge slong gi rgyus shes pas des de dag mthong ba dang /_snying rje skyes nas des de dag thar par bya ni ma nus kyi snying brtse ba'i phyir kye 'di dag gsad de ci rung gis rtswa ma brngas pa la 
[\[149b.6\]]bcings te rdzas phrogs la dong dang de nyid rang bkres shing nyam chung bas gdungs te srog dang bral grang zhes smras pa dang /_de'i nang nas gcig gis smras pa/_kye 'di de skad smra na ji ltar bya zhes smras pa dang /_kha cig gis smras pa/_de ltar bya ba ni legs so zhes 
[\[149b.7\]]nas de dag gis de la phrogs nas rtswa ma brngas pa la bcings te dong ngo /_/yul be'u zhes bya ba'i rgyal po 'char po dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa dang [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]shor ba'i phyir dong ba dang /_de dag gis de dag rgyang ring po nas mthong nas des blon po la kye snang ba pha bi 
[\[150a\]]
[\[150a.1\]{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]ma yin nam zhes dris pa dang /_des lha ma 'tshal to zhes smras nas rgyal po der nye bar song nas mi yin par mthong ba dang /_des kye mu stegs gcer bu pa yin nam ci zhes smras pa dang /_de dag las gcig gis lha de bzhin no zhes smras 
[\[150a.2\]]pa dang /_de dag la dge slong gi rgyus shes pa zhig gis smras pa/_lha de ni mu stegs gcer bu pa ma lags kyis/_lha shAkya'i bu'i dge slong ngo /_/ji ltar shes/_lha de ltar logs gcig ni gnag_/gnyis pa ni dkar ro zhes smras pa dang /_de nas rgyal pos de la 
[\[150a.3\]]dris pa/_'phags pa khyod ci'i phyir 'di ltar 'dug_/lha bdag cag rkun pos bcom mo/_/'phags pa 'o na ci'i phyir de ltar 'dug_/lha 'di ltar bcings so/_/'phags pa 'di 'dra bar bcings pa ci'i phyir gcad de mi 'dong /_lha bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag gi 
[\[150a.4\]]bslab par bcas pa sa bon gyi grong dang srog chags kyi grong bshig gam bshig tu bcug na ltung ba'o zhes bya ba'i bslab pa'i bcings pas bcings so zhes smras pa dang /_rgyal po de dad cing mngon par dga' nas des de dag bkrol te re re la yang chos gos gsum gsum 
[\[150a.5\]]bskon no/_/de dag gtsug lag khang du phyin pa dang /_bdag cag gis rgyal po'i mdun du de ltar ltung ba smras so zhes te the tshom skyes pa dang /_des de ltar gyur pa dge slong rnams la rgyas par smras nas dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol te/_bcom ldan 
[\[150a.6\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po 'di ni rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba/_'jig rten pa thams cad kyi gtso bo yin pas na gang smras pa de ni legs par smras pa yin gyis de la the tshom du ma byed cig_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/_sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[150a.7\]]ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pA lis zhus pa/_btsun pa nongs pa dang bcas pas nongs pa dang bcas pa'i mdun du nongs pa bshags su rung ngam u pA li mi rung ngo /_/de ste dngos po mi mthun na ni rung ngo /_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/_dge slong gcig la dge 
[\[150b\]]
[\[150b.1\]]'dun gyi lhag ma'i nyes pa byung nas de 'gyod pa skyes pa dang /_de skya bo bseng bseng por gyur la rid cing nyam chung ste/_rmya la lus ma brtas par gyur nas de la dge slong dag gis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa khyod ci'i phyir skya bo bseng bseng por gyur la rid cing nyam chung 
[\[150b.2\]]la rmya ste lus ma brtas par gyur pa de'i nad smros shig ces smras pa dang /_de cang mi smra nas nam de dang mdza' ba'i dge slong gis mthong ste dris pa dang /_des de la rgyas par smras pa dang /_des tshe dang ldan pa de lta na dge slong rnams la brjod kyis shogs shig ces smras 
[\[150b.3\]]so/_/de ltar brjod na bdag nyid mchi'o zhes smras pa dang /_des de lta na tshur shog_/yul gzhan du dong la der de dag bshags so/_/zhes smras pa dang /_des kyang khas blangs nas de dang de lhan cig tu yul gzhan du song ba las de lam phyed du dus 'das 
[\[150b.4\]]pa dang /_dge slong des bsams pa/_gang gis don gyi phyir bdag 'gro ba de ni dus 'das na da ci'i phyir 'gro/_phyir ldog go snyam nas de phyir log pa dang /_de la dge slong dag gis bde bar 'ongs sam/_tshe dang ldan pa bde bar 'ongs sam/_ci khyed bde bar spyad dam zhes 
[\[150b.5\]]smras pa dang /_de ngu bar gyur nas de la dge slong dag gis tshe dang ldan pa ci'i phyir ngu zhes smras pa dang /_gang bdag dang lhan cig tu song ba'i dge slong de dus 'das pa'i phyir ro zhes smras pa dang /_de dag gis tshe dang ldan pa ci'i phyir ngu /_'dus byas thams cad ni chos 
[\[150b.6\]]nyid kyis de bzhin no zhes smras so/_/des de ni nyes pa dang bcas bzhin du dus 'das so zhes smras pa dang /_dge slong rnams kyis des dmyal bar ring du gnas par gyur pas na ngu ba 'di ni rigs so zhes smras pa dang /_de ltar gyur pa dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 
[\[150b.7\]]'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong rnams rigs kyi bu de ni nyes pa de las phyin te/_ngas ni bsam pa las nyes pa phyin par gsungs kyis chad pa'i las kyis ni ma yin no/_/de lta bas na gang de ltar rang bzhin gyis ngo tsha ba dang 
[\[151a\]]
[\[151a.1\]]ldan pa des gcig gi mdun du shogs shig par gnang ngo /_/des ni gcig gi mdun du shogs shig_/de la the tshom ma byed cig ces gsungs pa dang /_'dod chags dang bral ba ma yin pa skye bo tha dad pa mdo sde 'dzin pa dang /_'dul ba 'dzin pa 
[\[151a.2\]]dang /_ma lta bu 'dzin pa kha cig dang /_dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan dang /_grags pa dang /_bsod nams chen po kha cig gis ma brtags pas na dge 'dun gyi lhag ma'i nyes pa byung ste/_de dag chad par spyod pa la lhan cig spyod pa dang /_nye gnas dang bram ze dang khyim 
[\[151a.3\]]bdag dang gzhan yang rung nyung ngu thos pa'i dge slong rnams kyis kyang dpyas/_kha cig ni mi dga' bar gyur te/_de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de dag gis kyang phyis mi bya bar shin tu 
[\[151a.4\]]bsam pa brtun te gcig po'i mdun du shogs shig_/'di la the tshom ma byed cig_/rkyang pa'i nang nas sgo dang po'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa gnyis pa'o//_//mdor na/_gzhag pa'i rigs pa gzhag par bya/_/bdun lon nas kyang 'gro bar bya/_/mnyam du 
[\[151a.5\]]ma zin de bzhin te/_/gang gi ko ba mi rung ba'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la gtsug lag khang skyong gi res bab bo/_/yul ko sa la'i rgyal 
[\[151a.6\]]po gsal rgyal dze ta'i tshal du 'ongs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo gang na ba der song ste drung du phyin pa dang /_rkang pa la phyag 'tshal nas chos nyan pa'i phyir mdun du 'dug go/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos mdo 
[\[151a.7\]]sde la zhugs nas de las phye nas cung zad tsam zhig rgyas par bshad nas/_mdor 'chad pa la zhugs pa dang /_rgyal pos 'phags pa bdag la brel ba med kyis mdor ma bshad cig ces smras so/_/de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du smras pa dang /_tshe dang ldan 
[\[151b\]]
[\[151b.1\]]pa kun dga' bos rgyal po chen po khyod la brel ba med kyang bdag la brel ba yod do zhes smras pa dang /_'phags pa kun dga' bo ci zhig brel ces smras pa dang /_khang skyong bya dgos so zhes smras pa dang /_'phags pa kun dga' bo yang las kyi res mdzad dam/_
[\[151b.2\]]lha bdag ni dge 'dun gyi nang du gtogs pas na las bgyi 'tshal lo zhes smras pa dang /_rgyal pos 'di bdag gis bya ba yin no snyam du bsams nas/_de bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas 
[\[151b.3\]]'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bdag ni rgyal po rgyal thabs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba ste/_gang bdag gis bgyi ba'i las ni bdag bgyid do/_/gang nang gi btsun mos bgyi ba'i rigs pa yang nang gi btsun mos bgyid do/_/gang gzhon nus bgyi ba'i rigs pa 
[\[151b.4\]]yang gzhon nus so/_/gang blon po'am/_blon po chen po'am/_dmag dpon nam/_grong mi 'am/_gzhongs pa yang rung ste gzhongs pa nyid kyis las bgyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das kyang bla na med pa'i chos kyi rgyal po ste/_e ma'o bcom ldan 'das brtse ba can 
[\[151b.5\]]gyis kyang gzhag par 'os pa gzhag la las kyi res mi bsko bar ci gnang zhes gsol pa dang /_rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis gsol pa bzhin bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas zhal gyis bzhes so/_/rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis kyang cang mi gsung bas zhal 
[\[151b.6\]]gyis bzhes par rig nas rgyal po gsal rgyal bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das kyi drung nas song ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo song la mnyan du yod pa na gnas shing 
[\[151b.7\]]'khod pa'i dge slong thams cad 'dun khang du sdus shig ces gsungs pa dang /_btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das las mnyan te mnyan du yod pa na dge slong ji snyed gnas pa de thams cad 'dun khang du bsdus 
[\[152a\]]
[\[152a.1\]]nas/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa mnyan du 
[\[152a.2\]]yod pa na dge slong ji snyed gnas shing mchis pa de thams cad 'dun khang du 'dus te mchis lags na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis da dus la bab par dgongs shig_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 'dun khang gang na ba der bzhud de byon nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi mdun na 
[\[152a.3\]]gdan bting ba la bzhugs te bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag deng ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal nga'i drung du 'ongs te/_e ma'o bcom ldan 'das gzhag pa'i rigs pa rnams ni zhog la/_las kyi res la bka' stsal pa'i 
[\[152a.4\]]mi rigs so zhes zer gyis khyed cag gis deng phan chad gzhag pa'i rigs pa rnams las la ma bsko bar zhog cig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhag pa'i rigs pa rnams las la ma bsko shig ces gsungs pa dang /_dge slong dag gis gang gzhag par rigs pa ma 
[\[152a.5\]]shes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_mdo sde 'dzin pa dang /_'dul ba 'dzin pa dang /_ma lta bu 'dzin pa dang /_mang po 'chad pa dang /_dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan dag ni gzhag par rigs pa'o/_/de la mdo sde 'dzin pa ni de nyid las so/_/de 
[\[152a.6\]]bzhin du 'dul ba 'dzin pa dang /_ma lta bu 'dzin pa dang /_mang po la 'chad pa dang /_dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan dag kyang de nyid las yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo sde 'dzin pa dang /_'dul ba 'dzin pa dang /_ma lta bu 'dzin pa de ni de nyid las yin no 
[\[152a.7\]]zhes gsungs pa dang /_drug sde dag gis mdo sde'i le'u gcig gnyis bklags nas nged cag ni mdo sde 'dzin pa yin pas na nged la las kyi res ma dbab cig ces smras pa dang /_de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom 
[\[152b\]]
[\[152b.1\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gang mdo sde thams cad 'dzin pa de ni mdo sde 'dzin pa ste/_de ni las la ma bsko shig de bzhin du phas pham pa gcig gam gnyis lhogs pa dag gis nged kyang 'dul ba 'dzin pa'o/_/de bzhin du rab tu byed pa gnyis bklags pas 
[\[152b.2\]]kyang nga ni ma lta bu 'dzin pa yin gyis las kyi res la ma bsko shig ces smras pa dang /_de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gang 'dul ba thams cad 'dzin pa dang /_ma lta bu thams cad 
[\[152b.3\]]'dzin pa ni las la ma bsko shig_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/_de'i tshe yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal ri brags kyi grong dag cig log nas dmag ru gcig btang ba dang /_de dag gis slar bcom btags nas lhags so/_/de bzhin du lan gnyis 
[\[152b.4\]]lan gsum du btang yang slar btags bcom nas lhags so/_/blon po dag gis gsol pa/_lha ri brags kyi grong dag gi mthu ni cher gyur/_lha'i mthu ni 'gribs na de la lha nyid gshegs na ni ri brags kyi grong de dag kyang gdod khugs par 'gyur gyi gzhan gyis 
[\[152b.5\]]mi nus so zhes smras pa dang /_rgyal pos nga'i yul na ji snyed mtshon cha'i mthus 'tsho ba de thams cad ma 'khod par sheg shig ces dril chen po bsgrags so/_/de nas rgyal po mthu chen po dang lhan cig tu grong rdal der lhags nas thams cad bskor te 'khod do/_/'on 
[\[152b.6\]]kyang de dag nags tshal stug po la brten nas ma phebs pa dang /_blon pos lha khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin de bsod nams rab tu rgyas shing lha rnams kyis yongs su zin pas de 'dir mchis na gdon mi 'tshal bar ri brags kyi grong phebs par 'gyur ro zhes smras 
[\[152b.7\]]pa dang /_de nas rgyal pos khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la bsti stang cher byas nas khyim bdag khyod kyi ngo blta bar 'dod do zhes yi ge spring ngo /_/de yi ge de thos ma thag tu [{]rings [,]ring [}]bzhin du song ste ri brags kyi grong rdal der phyin to/_/'on kyang grong rdal de ma phebs nas 
[\[153a\]]
[\[153a.1\]]khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin de ring du thogs par gyur nas/_de dge slong rnams ma mthong ba'i phyir skya bo bseng bseng po rid cing lus ma brtas par gyur nas/_rgyal pos mthong ste dris pa/_khyim bdag khyod bu dag dran nam zhes smras pa dang /_
[\[153a.2\]]des lha bdag bu dran pa ni ma lags kyi/_'phags pa rnams blta bar 'tshal ba'i slad du'o zhes smras pa dang /_rgyal pos blon po dag la ngas bka' stsal pa skad du ma zer bar ci nas 'phags pa rnams 'dir byon pa'i thabs su sbyor cig ces yi ge spring ba dang /_blon po 
[\[153a.3\]]dag gis yi ge bklags nas gros byed pa la zhugs te/_kye de la thabs ji ltar bya zhes smras pa dang /_blon po rgan po gzhan zhig gis de lta blas de'i thabs shig bdag gis sbyar la dgye bar bya'o zhes smras nas/_des dze ta'i sgo na ar Da tshangs sbyin gyi skyed mos tshal zhig 
[\[153a.4\]]yod pa rnyings te/_mda' lta bu'i tshal du gyur pa de bcos legs byas/_mchod rten gyi dag ra nas skyed mos tshal der yur ba drang ngo zhes srad bu bres pa dang /_de dag nyid la gnod pas na lha lta zhing 'dong bar 'gyur ro zhes te/_de nas de dag gis skyed mos tshal 
[\[153a.5\]]rnying pa de 'chos pa la zhugs/_dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten gyi dbus su srad bu bres na srad bu 'di'i rgyud bzhin du yur ba brko'o zhes smras pa dang /_dge slong gtsug lag khang na gnas pa dang /_nyin par spyod du dong ba de dag 'dus te blon po de'i gan du dong nas bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]
[\[153a.6\]]'di ci zhig rtsom zhes smras pa dang /_'phags pa rnams lhas bdag cag la nga'i pha'i skyed mos tshal rnying pa chos shig dang /_nga der 'ong ngo zhes yi ge mchis pas na 'di dag bdag cag gis phyi bdar bgyis te der chu drang ba'i yur ba brko'o zhes smras pa dang /_ci khyed kyis 
[\[153a.7\]]bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten gzhig gam/_de ltar ma byed cig ces smras pa dang /_'phags pa dag lha'i bka' bzhin ni bdag cag gis mi bgyir mi rung ste/_bdag cag la mgo gnyis su ma mchis kyis lha'i bka' bcag tu mi rung ngo zhes smras 
[\[153b\]]
[\[153b.1\]]pa dang /_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]nged kyis lha la gsol gyis de'i bar du sdod cig ces smras pa dang /_'phags pa bdag cag gis bsdad kyis gsol ba mdzad du gsol zhes smras pa dang /_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]lha 'dug pa der ji srid yod/_'phags pa lam ring ngo /_/bzhin 
[\[153b.2\]{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]zhag gcig nas bdun gyis slar 'khor tam/_slar mi 'khor to/_/de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de ltar na dge slong dag sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun gyi phyir zhag bzhi 
[\[153b.3\]]bcur byin gyis rlobs la mtshams kyi phyi rol du 'dong bar gnang ngo /_/dge slong dag gis ji ltar byin gyis brlab pa ma shes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_stan rnams thing ste gaN+DI rdungs la dris pa'i lan glon pa'i dge slong cig bskos te dge 'dun thams cad 
[\[153b.4\]]'dus nas 'khod pa dang /_sngar dge slong gcig gam gnyis sam/_gsum yang rung dad par gyis te/_sangs rgyas srung dang chos byin dang /_dge 'dun sde khyed rnams gnas 'di'i mtshams kyi nang du dbyar snga ma'am/_phyi ma yang rung tshul du zhugs pa las dge 
[\[153b.5\]]'dun gyi don gyi phyir zhag bzhi bcur byin gyis brlabs te/_mtshams kyi phyi rol du dong la khyed dbyar gyi gnas 'dir te/_dbyar 'dir gnas par dad dam zhes bsgo la/_de ste dad na de'i 'og tu dge slong gcig gis gsol ba dang las byos shig_/gson cig btsun pa'i dge 
[\[153b.6\]]'dun rnams/_sangs rgyas srung dang /_chos byin dang /_dge 'dun sde 'di dag mtshams kyi nang gnas 'dir dbyar snga ma 'am phyi ma tshul du zhugs pa las/_'di dag dge 'dun gyi don gyi phyir zhag bzhi bcur byin gyis brlabs te/_mtshams kyi phyi rol du 'dong zhing 'di 
[\[153b.7\]]dag dbyar gnas 'di lags te/_dbyar 'dir gnas na de ste dge 'dun rnams kyis bzod cing dus la bab na dge 'dun gyis gnang la/_dge 'dun gyis sangs rgyas srung dang /_chos byin dang /_dge 'dun sde dag zhag bzhi bcur skos shig_/sangs rgyas srung dang /_chos 
[\[154a\]]
[\[154a.1\]]byin dang /_dge 'dun sdes dge 'dun gyi don gyi phyir zhag bzhi bcur byin gyis brlabs te mtshams kyi phyi rol du dong la/_de dag dbyar gnas 'di lags te dbyar 'dir gnas so/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/las kyang 'di bzhin du byos shig_/
[\[154a.2\]]gson cig btsun pa'i dge 'dun rnams/_sangs rgyas srung dang /_chos byin dang /_dge 'dun sde 'di dag dge 'dun gyi don gyi phyir zhag bzhi bcur byin gyis brlabs te mtshams kyi phyi rol du 'dong zhing /_'di dag dbyar gnas 'di lags te/_tshe dang ldan pa rnams 
[\[154a.3\]]las gang la sangs rgyas srung dang /_chos byin dang /_dge 'dun sde dag gis dge 'dun gyi don gyi phyir zhag bzhi bcur bsko bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig_/gang mi bzod pa de dag ni smros shig_/dge 'dun gyis sangs rgyas srung dang /_chos byin dang /_dge 
[\[154a.4\]]'dun sde 'di dag dge 'dun gyi don gyi phyir zhag bzhi bcur byin gyis brlabs te mtshams kyi phyi rol du mchis la de dag dbyar gnas 'di lags te dbyar 'dir gnas par dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang bas na cang mi gsung ste de de bzhin du 'dzin to/_/gang la dge 'dun gyis zhag 
[\[154a.5\]]bzhi bcur bskos pa de dag byin gyis rlobs te/_mtshams kyi phyi rol du dong shig de la the tshom du ma byed cig_/byin gyis brlab pa ni 'di bzhin du gyis shig_/dge slong gcig gi mdun du thal mo sbyor la 'dug ste tshig 'di skad du dgongs shig_/tshe dang ldan pa bdag 
[\[154a.6\]]ming 'di zhes bgyi ba mtshams kyi nang gnas dbyar snga ma'am phyi ma yang rung zla ba gsum mtshungs pa las/_bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge 'dun gyi don gyi phyir zhag bzhi bcur byin gyis brlabs te mtshams kyi phyi rol du mchis la bdag gi dbyar 'di lags te dbyar 
[\[154a.7\]]'dir gnas so/_/de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du smros shig_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pA lis zhus pa/_btsun pa zhag gcig tu byin gyis brlabs la mtshams kyi slad rol du mchi bar rung ngam/_u pA li rung ngo /_/de bzhin 
[\[154b\]]
[\[154b.1\]]du zhag gnyis sam/_zhag gsum mam/_zhag bzhi'am/_zhag lnga 'am/_zhag drug gam/_zhag bdun nam/_zhag brgyad dam/_zhag dgu 'am/_zhag bcu'am/_zhag nyi shu'am/_zhag sum cu'am/_zhag bzhi bcu'i bar du byin gyis brlabs te mtshams kyi 
[\[154b.2\]]phyi rol du 'gro bar rung ngo /_/btsun pa zhag bzhi bcu phan chad byin gyis brlab par rung ngam/_u pA li mi rung ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_u pA li mtshams kyi nang du ni zhag mang du gnas par bya'i mtshams kyi phyi rol du ni zhag nyung ngu gnas par bya'o/_/yang gsol pa/_
[\[154b.3\]]btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis zhag gcig tu byin gyis brlab par byos shig ces gsungs na/_su'i mdun du byin gyis brlab par bgyi/_u pA li de ni dge slong gcig gi gan du'o/_/de bzhin du zhag gnyis sam/_zhag gsum mam/_zhag bzhi'am/_zhag 
[\[154b.4\]]lnga'am/_zhag drug gi bar du byin gyis brlab par bya'o/_/zhag drug phan chad nas zhag bzhi bcu'i bar du ni dge 'dun la gsol te bskos na dge 'dun nam gang zag gi mdun du yang rung ci dga' bar byin gyis rlobs shig_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan 
[\[154b.5\]]pa u pA lis zhus pa/_btsun pa pags pa mi rung ba de'i sha yang mi rung ba lags sam/_u pA li pags pa mi rung ba de'i sha yang mi rung ba'o/_/de'i rgyus pa dang /_rus pa dag kyang mi rung ba'o/_/rkyang pa'i sgo dang po'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa gsum pa'o//_//
[\[154b.6\]]'dul ba gzhung dam pa/_bam po sum bcu rtsa dgu pa/_mdor na/_gzugs can snying po mal gos dang /_/phyi mo dus 'das de bzhin te/_/bya rog 'ug pa bya rgod dang /_/de dag bza' bar mi bya'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan 
[\[154b.7\]]da ka gnas pa na bzhugs pa'i tshe gang gi tshe rgyal po ma skyes dgra lha sbyin gyis bslus nas de'i pha chos can chos bzhin du rgyal po byed pa 'tsho ba dang phral ba de'i tshe mal gos dag mthong ba dang ngu bar gyur nas/_blon po dag gis lha rgyal po bgres po ni 'phags pa dag la dgyes 
[\[155a\]]
[\[155a.1\]]na gzims cha 'di dag kyang dge 'dun la dbul ba'i rigs so zhes smras pa dang /_des mal gos de dag gtsug lag khang du phul lo/_/dge slong dag gis de sgo khang du bting ste bzhag go/_/de dus phyi zhig na rgyal pos gtsug lag khang du 
[\[155a.2\]]'ongs nas des de mthong ba dang ngu bar gyur to/_/blon po dag gis 'phags pa dag khyed la sbyin pa ni mi mthong bar bya ba'i phyir na sgo khang du bting ba 'di ni nyes pa'i dmigs su gyur to zhes smras pa dang /_de dag cang mi zer bar 'dug go/_/de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis 
[\[155a.3\]]bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis sgo khang du ma gding shig ces bka' stsal nas/_yang thog tu bting ba dang /_de nyid nyes pa'i dmigs su gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis yang thog tu gding bar ma byed cig ces bka' stsal pa 
[\[155a.4\]]dang /_gnas khang du bting ste bzhag go/_/ma dad pa dag gis rgyal po'i mal gos ni dge slong dag gis nges par btsongs te zos pas na de sngon snang na da mi snang ngo zhes dpyas pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_tshes brgyad dam/_bcu bzhi'i 
[\[155a.5\]]tshe yang thog tu thing la zhog shig_/ma dad pa dag gis mthong nas lha'i mal stan dag ni dge slong dag gis btsongs nas zos te med do zhes smras pa dang /_de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[155a.6\]]yon du phul ba'i dngos po 'di ni rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i yin no zhes mtha' ma la yi ger bris te zhog shig_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/_de'i tshe na yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi phyi mo sdug cing yid du 'ong ba zhig dus 'das pa dang /_de phyir 
[\[155a.7\]]phyung ste bsregs nas/_shi ba'i cho ga byas te nang par sngar gos kyang gsher/_skra yang gsher bzhin du/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/_phyogs gcig tu 'dug 
[\[155b\]]
[\[155b.1\]]go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rgyal po chen po nang par sngar skra yang gsher/_gos kyang gsher bzhin du 'dir ci la 'ongs/_btsun pa bdag gi phyi mo rab 
[\[155b.2\]]tu sdug cing yid du 'ong ba zhig dus 'das pa dang /_de phyir phyung ste bsregs nas shi ba'i cho ga bgyis te/_de'i phyir nang par sngar gos kyang gsher/_skra yang gsher bzhin du 'dir mchis so/_/rgyal po chen po phyi mo rab tu sdug gam/_btsun pa rab tu sdug cing yid du 
[\[155b.3\]]mchi ste/_btsun pa phyi mo sos par byas bal glang mang po 'tshal zhes mchi ba zhig mchis na yang bdag gis bal glang mang po yang gtong ngo /_/de bzhin du rta mang po dang /_shing rta mang po dang /_rgyal srid phyed 'tshal na yang phyi mo sos na rgyal srid phyed kyang gtong phod 
[\[155b.4\]]do/_/btsun pa bdag gis de la de bzhin du mya ngan dang /_de bzhin du nyon mongs pa dang /_de bzhin du mya ngan gyis gzir bzhin du bsgrims kyang phyi mo sdug cing yid du 'ong ba dus 'das pa dang /_bdag gis 'di snyam du bsams so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis legs 
[\[155b.5\]]par gsungs pa ni ngo mtshar che ste/_sems can thams cad dang /_srog chags thams cad dang /_'byung po thams cad 'tsho ba'i mtha' ni 'chi bar 'gyur ro/_/mthar ni 'chi ba la thug pas na skyes na 'chi'o zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa ni ngo mtshar 
[\[155b.6\]]che'o zhes gsol pa dang /_rgyal po chen po de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_sems can thams cad dang /_srog chags thams cad dang /_'byung po thams cad kyang 'tsho ba'i mtha' ni 'chi bar 'gyur te/_mthar 'chi ba la thug pas na skyes phan chad mi 'chi ba med 
[\[155b.7\]]do/_/rgyal po chen po gang rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba dang /_bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba dang /_khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba de dag kyang 'tsho ba'i mtha' ni 'chi bar 'gyur te/_mthar 'chi ba la thug pas na skyes phan chad mi 'chi ba med do/_/yang rgyal po 
[\[156a\]]
[\[156a.1\]]chen po rgyal thabs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba skye bo mang po la dbang zhing brtson 'grus thob pa/_sa gzhi chen po'i dkyil 'khor yang rab tu btul cing gnas par byed pa de lta bu dag kyang 'tsho ba'i mtha' ni 'chi bar 'gyur te/_mthar 'chi ba la thug 
[\[156a.2\]]pas na skyes phan chad mi 'chi ba med do/_/rgyal po chen po yang 'di ltar rgyal po las drang srong du gnas na gnas pa 'bras bu rang lhung za ba rtsa ba dang 'bras bus 'tsho ba de lta bu yang 'tsho ba'i mtha' ni 'chi bar 'gyur te/_mthar 'chi ba la thug pas na skyes phan chad mi 'chi 
[\[156a.3\]]ba med do/_/rgyal po chen po 'di ltar yang lha tshe ring po kha dog dang ldan pa mang ba gzhal med khang mthon po na 'dug kyang de dag gnas de nas 'chi 'pho ba'i chos su 'gyur ro/_/'di ltar yang rgyal po chen po dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa/_bya ba bsgrubs pa khur bor ba/_rang 
[\[156a.4\]]gi don thob pa/_srid par sbyor ba zad pa/_yang dag pa'i bka' la sems kyis rnam par grol ba de dag gi lus kyang rje ba'i chos su 'gyur ro/_/yang 'di ltar rgyal po chen po rang sangs rgyas bse ru 'dra ba/_bdag gcig pu dul ba/_bdag gcig pu zhi ba/_bdag 
[\[156a.5\]]gcig pu mya ngan las zlo ba de dag kyang lus rje ba'i chos su 'gyur ro/_/yang 'di ltar rgyal po chen po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas stobs bcu dang ldan pa/_mi 'jigs pa bzhis mi 'jigs pa/_khyu mchog gi dam pa/_
[\[156a.6\]]seng ge'i sgra sgrogs pa de lta bu'i sku yang rje ba'i chos su 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po chen po rnam pa de lta bu thams cad kyang de bzhin du rig par gyis shig_/gang sems can thams cad dang /_srog chags thams cad dang /_'byung po thams cad kyang 'tsho ba'i mtha' ni 
[\[156a.7\]]'chi bar 'gyur te/_mthar 'chi ba la thug pas na skyes phan chad mi 'chi ba med de/_sems can thams cad kyang 'tsho ba'i mtha' ni 'chi bar 'gyur te/_ji ltar las byas de yis ni/_/bsod nams sdig pa'i 'bras bur 'gro/_/sdig pa'i las ni dmyal bar ltung /_/
[\[156b\]]
[\[156b.1\]]bsod nams byas pas mtho ris 'gro/_/kha cig lam la bsgoms pas ni/_/zag pa med par mya ngan 'da'/_/sangs rgyas dang ni rang sangs rgyas/_/sangs rgyas kyi ni nyan thos rnams/_/lus ni rnam par 'dor 'gyur na/_/skye dgu ma rabs smos ci dgos/_/
[\[156b.2\]]de nas yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' ste rjes su yi rangs nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi drung nas song ste/_bdag gi khyim du phyin pa dang /_phyi mo'i 
[\[156b.3\]]mal gos stong par mthong nas yang sdug pa shi ba'i mya ngan gyis sems 'khrugs nas blon po dag la smras pa/_kye ngas mal gos 'di mthong nas rab tu mi dga' ba skyes kyis song la 'phags pa'i dge 'dun dag la 'di phul cig_/de dag gis kyang dze ta'i tshal du 'phags 
[\[156b.4\]]pa'i dge 'dun dag la phul ba dang /_dge slong dag gis sgo khang du bting ste bzhag go/_/de nas dus phyi zhig na rgyal po de gtsug lag khang du 'ongs nas des de mthong ba dang /_de ngus so/_/blon po dag gis 'phags pa dag gis 'di mi bstan pa'i phyir khyed la dbul na 
[\[156b.5\]]sgo khang du bting ba de nyid nyes pa'i dmigs su gyur to zhes smras pa dang /_de dag cang mi zer bar 'dug nas/_de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sgo khang du ma gding bar yang thog tu thing 
[\[156b.6\]]shig_/de yang nyes pa'i dmigs su gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_yang thog tu ma gding bar gnas khang du thing shig_/de gnas khang du bting ba dang /_ma dad pa dag gis rgyal mo'i mal gos ni dge slong rnams kyis btsongs te zos gor 
[\[156b.7\]]ma chag_/snga na ni snang na da mi snang ngo zhes 'phya ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_tshes brgyad dam bcu bzhi'i dus su yang thog tu thing la zhog shig_/ma dad pa dag gis mthong nas/_'di ni lha mo'i mal gos ma yin gyi/_dge slong dag gis 
[\[157a\]]
[\[157a.1\]]nges par btsongs te zos so zhes smras pa dang /_de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis phul ba'i gos so zhes yi ger bris te zhog 
[\[157a.2\]]shig_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/_de'i tshe mnyan du yod par ser ba drag po zhig bab nas der [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dang bya mang zhig shi'o/_/skye bo mang po dag tho rangs sngar langs nas [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dang bya gang bzar rung ba la sogs pa ni bsdus te khyer/_bya rog la sogs te 
[\[157a.3\]]bzar mi rung ba ni bor ro/_/drug sde rnams chos kyis mang du za zhing ring du nyal lo/_/de dag ring zhig nas nam langs te thos ma thag tu myur du rings par dong nas de dag gis bya rog dang /_'ug pa dang /_bya rgod dang /_bya chu skyar mo dag blangs te 'ong ba bram ze dang khyim bdag 
[\[157a.4\]]gis mthong nas de dag gis 'phags pa 'dis ci zhig bya zhes smras pa dang /_de dag gis bza'o zhes smras nas/_'phags pa 'di dag ni bzar mi rung gis bor cig kye gzhan rnyed na yang blang na 'di ci'i phyir mi bza'/_de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das 
[\[157a.5\]]la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag bya rog la sogs pa sha bzar mi rung ba'i sha ma za shig_/zos na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/_/rkyang pa'i sgo dang po'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa bzhi pa'o//_//mdor na/_khyi dang khra dang 
[\[157a.6\]]'ug pa dang /_/mi sha za ba'i bya dag dang /_/rta dang dre'u wa dang ni/_/spre'u rnams bza' bar mi bya'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/mu ge byung nas khyim pa dag khyi'i sha za ba la 
[\[157a.7\]]zhugs pa dang /_drug sde dag mnyan du yod par bsod snyoms la dong ste/_khyim gang nas gang du 'ongs pa de dang der 'phags pa cung zad tsam yang ma mchis so zhes smras pa dang /_de nas yang khyim bdag gzhan zhig tu 'ongs pa dang /_de na rdze'u nang du khyi sha zhig 'tshod 
[\[157b\]]
[\[157b.1\]]de khol zhing 'dug go/_/khyim bdag gi chung mas 'phags pa cung zad kyang ma mchis kyis bzhud cig ces smras pa dang /_de dag gis smras pa/_rdze'u nang na khol zhing 'dug pa de ci yin/_'phags pa 'di ni khyi sha'o/_/ci khyed cag khyi sha za'am/_'phags pa mu 
[\[157b.2\]]ge byung bas na 'tshal lo/_/de ltar na nged cag kyang byin cig_/'phags pa khyed kyang gsol lam/_kye nged cag gi srog khyed la rten na khyed cag za na nged cag kyang ci'i phyir mi bza'/_de dag gis byin no/_/de byin pa dang khyer te song ngo /_/khyi dag gis snar bsnams pa 
[\[157b.3\]]tshor nas de dag gis bskor cing /_bdag bdag gi skad kyis zugs shing du ste phyi bzhin du 'brang ba bram ze dang khyim bdag gis mthong nas de dag gis smras pa/_'phags pa ci'i slad du khyi dag gis gtses bzhin du 'dong /_de dag gis smras pa/_bdag cag bsod 
[\[157b.4\]]snyoms khyi sha cung zad cig rnyed do/_/'phags pa ci khyed cag khyi'i sha za'am/_kye 'di lta bu bsod snyoms mi rnyed pa'i dus na nged cag ci ltogs bzhin du 'chi'am/_de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_
[\[157b.5\]]gang dge slong dag gis khyi sha zos pas ni nyes pa'i dmigs su gyur te/_de bas na dge slong dag khyi sha ma za shig_/dge slong dag gis khyi sha zos na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/_drug sde dag gis khra dang /_'ug pa dang /_bya mi 
[\[157b.6\]]sha za ba de dag gi sha yang za ba dang /_bram ze dang khyim bdag ma dad pa dag 'phya bar gyur nas/_de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag khra dang /_'ug pa dang /_mi sha za ba dag gi bya'i 
[\[157b.7\]]sha ma za shig_/dge slong dag gis khra dang /_'ug pa dang /_mi sha za ba dag gi bya'i sha zos na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/_ma byin par len pa dag gis yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi dre'u zhig brkus te khrid nas 
[\[158a\]]
[\[158a.1\]]nags stug po'i nang du bsad de sha khyer nas mgo sug bor te dong ngo /_/drug sde rnams chos kyis goms pa ni nang par sngar langs nas khang steng du byung ste phyogs bzhir bltas nas dud pa gang na che ba dang /_bya rgod gang na lding ba phyogs bzhir bltas nas der dong 
[\[158a.2\]]ngo /_/de dag gis nags stug po na bya rgod lding ba mthong nas/_de dag nags stug por rgyug cing rings par dong ba dang /_nags stug po de ni dre'u'i mgo dang rkang lag dang mjug ma dag mthong nas/_de dag gis smras pa/_dga' bo nye dga' bo rdul khrod pa zhig rnyed na blang
