[\[158a.3\]]ngam zhes pa dang /_legs kyis blang ngo zhes nas de dag gcig tu bsdus pa dang /_dre'u rdzi yan man tshol bas mthong nas de dag gis smras pa/_'phags pa dag ni drang srong gi rgyal mtshan 'dzin na ci'i phyir ngan du spyod pa mdzad/_nged cag gis ci zhig nyes zhes smras 
[\[158a.4\]]pa dang /_rgyal po'i dre'u ni khyed cag gis bsad do zhes smras pa dang /_sdig pa zhi bar gyur cig nged cag ni mi gsod do/_/'o na sus bsad ces pa dang /_ma byin par len pa dag gis bsad de/_nged cag gis ni mgo dang /_rkang pa dang /_mjug ma dag rdul khrod 
[\[158a.5\]]par byin gyis brlabs so/_/de dag gis ci 'phags pa khyed cag dre'u sha bsnams sam zhes smras pa dang /_za'o zhes smras pas de dag 'phya bar gyur to/_/de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[158a.6\]]gang dge slong dag srog chags dre'u sha zos pa ni nyes pa'i dmigs su 'gyur te/_de bas na dge slong dag gis srog chags rmig zlum gyi sha ma za shig_/de ste zos na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/_drug sde dag gis wa'i sha 
[\[158a.7\]]zos pa dang /_bram ze dang khyim bdag gis mthong nas smras pa/_btsun pa 'di ci lags/_wa'i sha'o/_/ci 'phags pa dag kyang wa'i sha bsnams sam/_za'o zhes smras pa dang /_de dag 'phya bar gyur nas de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 
[\[158b\]]
[\[158b.1\]]gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams 'phya ba ni yus te/_dge slong dag de bas na wa'i sha ma za shig_/dge slong dag gis wa'i sha zos na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa 
[\[158b.2\]]na ste/_dze ta'i tshal na spre'u zhig shing ka nas shing kar rgyu ba las lhung nas dus 'das te/_drug sde dag gis rdze'u zhig gi nang du bcug ste 'tshed pa dang /_bud med gzhan zhig bu chung ngu zhig stor nas de tshol zhing dze ta'i tshal du 'ongs na/_drug sde rnams rdze'u'i nang du 
[\[158b.3\]]spre'u btsos pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas des drug sde dag gis bdag gi bu 'dir ma btsos sam snyam bsams te rtog pa la zhugs pa dang /_ji tsam zhig na lhung lhung khol ba dang spre'u'i lag pa gyen du byung ba dang /_des brang brdungs te kyi hud bu kyi hud bu zhes smras pa dang /_de'i 
[\[158b.4\]]rkang pa yang byung ste/_kyi hud bu kyi hud bu zhes yang smras pa dang /_drug sde dag gis ci'i phyir de ltar byed ces smras pa dang /_des rkang lag byung ba 'di ni bdag gi bu'o zhes smras pa dang /_ji tsam nas mjug ma yang byung ngo /_/drug sde dag gis ci khyod kyi bu 'jug ma yod 
[\[158b.5\]]dam zhes smras pa dang /_de skyengs te smras pa/_'phags pa 'di ni spre'u 'am/_de dag gis smras pa spre'u'o/_/'phags pa dag spre'u sha yang bsnams sam/_des za'o zhes smras pa dang /_de dag 'phya bar gyur nas de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das 
[\[158b.6\]]la gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag spre'u ni mi sha dang 'dras/_de bas na dge slong dag spre'u'i sha ma za shig_/dge slong dag gis spre'u'i sha zos na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/_/rkyang pa'i sgo dang po'i mdo'i tshigs su 
[\[158b.7\]]bcad pa lnga pa'o//_//mdor na/_phor bu gos dang pags pa dang /_/'dab ma'i phor bus mi sbyin no/_/lcags kyi sbu bu ma gtogs par/_/nor bu khar bas btang ba'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun 
[\[159a\]]
[\[159a.1\]]dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe na mnyan du yod pa na dge slong gzhan zhig na ste/_de rab tu nad kyis gzir nas de sman pa'i drung du song ste nad med cig ces nas bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]bdag ni rnam pa 'di lta bu zhig tu na bar gyur na sman gyi thabs ston cig 
[\[159a.2\]]ces smras pa dang /_sman pas 'phags pa mas gtang ba'i sman gyis shig ces smras pa dang /_des bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo zhes smras pa dang /_'phags pa khyed kyi ston pa ni thugs rje can lags kyis rjes su gnang bar 'gyur ro zhes 
[\[159a.3\]]smras pa dang /_de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de ste sman pas bsgo la des sos par 'gyur na mas gtang ba byos shig de la the tshom du ma byed cig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis mas gtang 
[\[159a.4\]]ba'i sman thong shig ces gsungs pa dang /_de dag gis phor bus blugs pa dang /_bo ste ma rung nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_phor bus ma blugs shig ces gsungs pa dang /_gos kyi mtha' mas blugs pa dang de yang nyes pa'i dmigs su gyur 
[\[159a.5\]]nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gos kyi mtha' mas ma blugs shig ces gsungs na/_pags pa'i nang nas blugs pa dang de yang nyes pa'i dmigs su gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_pags pa'i nang nas ma blugs shig 
[\[159a.6\]]ces gsungs pa dang /_'dab ma'i phor bu'i nang nas blugs te/_de yang nyes pa'i dmigs su gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'dab ma'i phor bu'i nang nas ma blugs par sbu bu'i nang nas blugs par gyis shig_/des lcags kyi sbu 
[\[159a.7\]]bu nas blugs pa dang /_de nang du bcug na rab tu tsha zhing rtsub par gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lcags kyi sbu bu ma gtogs par nor bu'i sbu bu'am/_khar ba'i sbu bus gtang bar gyis shig_/rkyang pa'i sgo dang po'i mdo'i tshigs 
[\[159b\]]
[\[159b.1\]]su bcad pa drug pa'o//_//mdor na/_bu ram shing dang zho zhag 'bru mar dang /_/gso ma bsregs pa'i thug pa dang ni mar/_/rtsa ba 'bras bu sdong po lo mar bcas/_/thug pa thams cad blud par bya/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dze ta'i 
[\[159b.2\]]tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pA lis zhus pa/_btsun pa sman gcig las de nyid snga dro ba de nyid phyi dro ba de nyid zhag bdun pa/_de nyid nam 'tsho'i bar du rung bar 'gyur ba mchis sam 
[\[159b.3\]]u pA li bu ram shing ni snga dro'i'o/_/de'i khu ba ni phyi dro ba'o/_/bu ram ni zhag bdun pa'o/_/bu ram shing dang bu ram bsregs pa'i thal ba ni nam 'tsho'i bar du'o/_/u pA li zho ni snga dro ba'o/_/zho'i chu ni phyi dro ba'o/_/mar ni bdun pa'o/_/zho bsregs pa'i thal ba ni nam 
[\[159b.4\]]'tsho'i bar du'o/_/u pA li sha ni snga dro ba'o/_/tshil bu ni bdun pa'o/_/sha bsregs pa'i thal ba ni nam 'tsho'i bar du'o/_/u pA li til ni snga dro ba'o/_/til gyi mar ni bdun pa'o/_/til bsregs pa'i thal ba ni nam 'tsho'i bar du'o/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod 
[\[159b.5\]]pa na ste/_dge slong zhig na bar gyur nas sman pas mthong ste/_'phags pa gso ma'i thug pa byos la 'thung shig ces smras pa dang /_des de ltar gyur pa dge slong rnams la smras pa dang /_dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/_bcom ldan 
[\[159b.6\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de ltar sman pas bsgo ba de bzhin du gyis shig de la the tshom du ma byed cig_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/_dge slong gzhan dag cig yang na bar gyur nas de dag kha cig la ni sman pas yungs kar gyi thug pa 'thung shig ces 
[\[159b.7\]]bsgo/_kha cig la ni rtsa ba'i thug pa 'thung shig ces bsgo/_kha cig la ni sdong bu'i thug pa 'thung shig ces bsgo/_kha cig la ni 'bras bu'i thug pa 'thung shig ces bsgo ba dang /_de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom 
[\[160a\]]
[\[160a.1\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na ngas rjes su gnang gis sman pas nad pa la lung bsgo na thams cad kyi thug pa'ang 'thung shig de la the tshom du ma byed cig_/rkyang pa'i sgo dang po'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa bdun pa'o//_//mdor na/_
[\[160a.2\]]bu ram chu dang btung ba de bzhin te/_/zhag bdun bzhag par gyur pa dang /_/gzhan gyi phyir yang bsngo ba dang /_/rjes su phan gdags mya bar bya/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/bcom 
[\[160a.3\]]ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas te gzhongs spyod cing gshegs pa dang /_de dag ri brags kyi grong gzhan zhig tu phyin te/_ri brags kyi grong de na khyim bdag gzhan zhig gnas pa de gdul ba'i dus la bab par mkhyen nas/_bcom ldan 'das ri brags kyi grong der 
[\[160a.4\]]byon pa dang /_khyim bdag des bcom ldan 'das mthong nas de dad pa skyes te bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du 'ongs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang /_bag la nyal ba dang /_khams dang rang bzhin mkhyen nas ji ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur 
[\[160a.5\]]ba'i chos de lta bu bshad nas khyim bdag des thos pa dang 'jig tshogs su lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byas so/_/ji tsam dge slong de dag lam gyi ngal bas gzir nas log pa'i lha khang dang /_bkad sa dang /_
[\[160a.6\]]skyed mos tshal dang /_shing drung dag tu glos phab ste nyal zhing 'khod pa dang /_khyim bdag de rab tu dad pa thob pas na bkad sa dang /_lha khang dang /_shing drung dag tu rim gyis dge slong dag la phyag bya ba'i phyir song ba dang /_dge slong dag gnas na nyal zhing 'dug pa des 
[\[160a.7\]]mthong nas/_'phags pa dag bstan pa la shin tu brtson par bgyi ba la ci'i slad du na gzims shing 'khod ces smras pa dang /_de dag gis khyim bdag lam gyi ngal bas gzir zhing nyam chung ste dge ba'i phyogs spyod par mi nus so zhes smras pa dang /_des 'phags pa rnams de 
[\[160b\]]
[\[160b.1\]]ltar na ni phyi dro bu ram gsol bar bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na/_bdag 'tshal te mchis gsol cig ces smras pa dang /_de dag las kha cig na de khyim bdag de lags kyis bza' bar bgyi'o/_/kha cig gis tshe dang ldan pa khyim bdag 'ber tra si dag gis bu ram bza' ba 
[\[160b.2\]]la brten nas des dgra bcom pa mngon du gyur te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin rjes su gnang na bdag cag ni de ltar lam gyi ngal bas gzir te/_'jig rten na ma dad pa dag ni grong na 'khod bzhin du za'o zhes mi dga' bar 'gyur gyis gud du 'dong ngo zhes smras pa dang /_kha cig 
[\[160b.3\]]gis yang tshe dang ldan pa de ltar 'dong na bcom ldan 'das la zhu'o zhes smras nas/_de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_bu ram ni thams cad du bza' bar bya ste/_de la the tshom du ma byed cig_/bcom ldan 
[\[160b.4\]]'das kyis thams cad du bu ram zo shig ces bka' stsal nas/_dge slong de dag gis zos pa dang /_de dag lam gyi ngal bas skom gyis gdungs par gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_bu ram gyi chu gyis la 'thung shig_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[160b.5\]]'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pA lis zhus pa/_btsun pa bu ram chu zhag bdun par byin gyis brlabs te 'tshal na rung ngam/_u pA li mi rung ngo /_/btsun pa ji tsam gyi bar du bzhag la btung bar bgyi/_u pA li ji tsam na dang bar gyur te skyur por ma gyur cing rang bzhin ma 
[\[160b.6\]]nyams pa'i bar du'o/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gso sbyin dang /_tshul nas byung ba dang /_chos gos byin gyis brlabs pa dang /_gos bsngo ba dang /_gang zag gcig po mgron du bos pa dang /_'di lnga ni rang gis bsams pas 
[\[160b.7\]]'grub bo/_/zhes gsungs so/_/dge slong de dag gang du mgron du bos pa der de las gzhan du yang mgron du bos sam de las lhag par yang rung ste/_gcig tu ni bdag nyid/_gnyis su ni bdag gi sems btang nas gzhan gtang ba'o/_/mu ge'i dus la bab ste 
[\[161a\]]
[\[161a.1\]]dge slong rnams bsod snyoms kyis shin tu phongs par gyur to/_/dad pa'i bram ze dang khyim bdag dag gis dge slong gnas brtan dag zas la mgron du bos pa dang /_khyim bdag cig la khas blangs te gzhan btang ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[161a.2\]]bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na ngas mu ge byung zhing sdug bsngal la rnyed dka' ba'i dus na/_ji snyed du mgron du bos pa de thams cad bdag gir bya bar gyis de la bdag kyang zo shig_/dge slong dag kyang bgo bar bya'o/_/dge slong dag bram ze dang khyim bdag gzhan gyi 
[\[161a.3\]]der dong ba dang /_de dag gis 'phags pa khyed ni bdag cag gis mgron du ma bos kyi 'di zhes bgyi ba'i gnas brtan bdag cag gis spyan drangs so zhes smras so/_/de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[161a.4\]]stsal pa/_bdag nyid song la byin len byas te kham gnyis sam gsum zo la 'di skad du khyim bdag dge slong 'di dag zas kyis brel te/_'di la sbyin gyis rjes su yi rang bar gyis shig ces smros shig_/de bzhin du gnyis sam gsum mam ji snyed mgron du bos pa 
[\[161a.5\]]thams cad la byin cig_/thams cad de ltar byas nas tha mar mgron du bos pa ni ji tsam 'grangs par bza' bar bya ste/_'di la the tshom du ma byed cig_/rkyang pa'i sgo dang po'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa brgyad pa'o//_//mdor na/_mar ram de ste 'bru mar ram/_/gzhan 
[\[161a.6\]]yang bzhag par gyur pa dang /_/mig sman gyi ni gab tshe dang /_/yangs pa can dang rung ba'i gnas/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/dge slong gzhan zhig rlung nad kyis btab 
[\[161a.7\]]pa des sman pa'i gan du song ste/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]bdag la 'di 'dra ba'i nad kyis btab na sman ston cig ces smras so/_/des 'phags pa mar 'di tsam zhig gsol dang 'tsho bar 'gyur ro zhes smras so/_/de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag la smras pa dang /_dge slong dag 
[\[161b\]]
[\[161b.1\]]gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de ste sman pas mar 'thung shig par bsgo na btung bar bya'o/_/dge slong des 'thungs pa dang nyin par bde yang mtshan mo yang rlung nad langs so/_/dge slong dag gis sman pa la dris pa 
[\[161b.2\]]dang /_des mtshan mo yang 'thung shig ces smras so/_/dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis mtshan mo yang 'thung shig ces bka' stsal pa dang /_des mang du bsags nas zhag bdun du byin gyis brlabs te de sos 
[\[161b.3\]]par gyur to/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/_dge slong gzhan zhig nad kyis btab nas de yang sman pa'i drung du song ste/_nad med cig ces byas nas bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]bdag la 'di 'dra ba'i nad cig gis btab na sman gyi thabs ston cig ces smras so/_/des 'phags 
[\[161b.4\]]pa 'bru mar 'di tsam zhig 'thungs na sos par 'gyur ro zhes bsgo ba dang /_de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag la smras pa dang /_dge slong dag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de ste sman pas 'bru mar 'thung shig ces bsgo 
[\[161b.5\]]na 'bru mar 'thung shig_/dge slong des 'thungs pa dang /_nyin par sos kyang mtshan mo yang rlung nad de langs so/_/dge slong dag gis sman pa la dris pa dang /_des mtshan mo yang 'thung shig ces bsgo'o/_/dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/_
[\[161b.6\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_mtshan mo yang 'thung shig_/des 'bru mar bsags te zhag bdun du byin gyis brlabs nas 'thungs pa dang sos par gyur to/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/_dge slong gzhan zhig nad kyis btab pa dang /_de yang 
[\[161b.7\]]sman pa'i drung du song nas nad med cig ces smras nas/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]bdag la nad 'di lta bu zhig gis btab na sman gyi thabs ston cig ces smras so/_/des mar ram 'bru mar 'di tsam zhig 'thungs na sos par 'gyur ro zhes smras pa dang /_de bshes nyung bas btsal 
[\[162a\]]
[\[162a.1\]]kyang ma rnyed nas yang sman pa'i drung du song nas bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]khyod kyis bsgo yang kho bos 'bru mar yang ma rnyed na mar lta ga la rnyed gzhan lta cung zad ci rung ston cig ces smras pa dang /_des 'phags pa 'di zhes bya ba'i dge slong zhig gis 'bru mar sbyar na/_
[\[162a.2\]]'di zhes bya ba zhig gis mar sbyar gyis de'i gan du song dang /_gal te sbyar ba de'i lhag pa yod kyang srid do zhes smras pa dang /_de dag gi drung du song nas bslangs na/_de dag gis tshe dang ldan pa de zhag bdun las 'das te sbags par gyur pas med do zhes smras pa dang /_
[\[162a.3\]]de de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag la smras pa dang /_dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_nad pa'i thabs rtogs la mar ram 'bru mar gzhan ci yang rung bzhag pa yang blas bza' bar bya ste/_de la the tshom du ma 
[\[162a.4\]]byed cig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis mar ram 'bru mar ram gzhan ci yang rung bzhag pa yang blas zo shig_/de la the tshom du ma byed cig ces bka' stsal na byin len byed pa med do/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_byin len byed pa'i mi med na byin len ma byas kyang 
[\[162a.5\]]blas zo shig_/gang gi tshe na ba na gnang ba de sos nas ma spyod cig_/spyad na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pA lis zhus pa btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis mig sman gyi snod 
[\[162a.6\]]gang tshe chongs shig ces bka' stsal na/_ci 'dra ba bcang bar bgyi/_u pA li rin po che las byas pa ma gtogs so/_/yang zhus pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis yul yangs pa na mi rung ba rnam pa bcu spong la/_rung ba'i khang pa byin gyis brlab par gyis 
[\[162a.7\]]shig ces bka' stsal na/_ci btsun pa khang pa 'og rung bar byin gyis brlabs na khang pa'i steng yang rung bar byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ram/_u pA li ji ltar steng gi bzhin du ngos kyi yang brjod par bya'o/_/rkyang pa'i sgo dang po'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa dgu pa'o//_//
[\[162b\]]
[\[162b.1\]]mdor na/_rtsa sdong lo ma 'bras bu rnams/_/thams cad chang gis sbags pa dang /_/kha zas med par bkrus pa dang /_/yang na zas ngan de bzhin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i dngos po shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/gang gi tshe rgyal po 
[\[162b.2\]]zas gtsang mas shAkya'i rigs re re zhing yang shAkya lnga brgya zhig bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yog tu phul ba dang /_de dag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis rab tu phyung ngo /_/de dag sngon lus chang gis gsos pas na de dag chang med nas lus la nad zhugs so/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[162b.3\]]kyis gzigs nas/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la kun dga' bo ci'i phyir na shAkya dag_/rnyi rnyi bor gyur ces bka' stsal pa dang /_de ltar gyur pa bcom ldan 'das la zhib mor gsol nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal 
[\[162b.4\]]pa/_de ltar na ngas gnang ba ni chang du 'gyur ba rtsa ba dang sdong po la sogs pa bskams la phye mar gyis te ras dkar po'i nang du thum por gyis la chang gi mthu zhil ba rdza ma ma gang ba'i nang du lhugs shig de nas slar phyung ste lag pa khrus la chu kha zas med pa dang bsres te 
[\[162b.5\]]'dang bar tshogs la 'thung shig_/de skom na snga dro yang rung /_phyi dro yang rung ste the tshom ma byed par 'thung shig_/de ltar byos dang de dag chang la sred pa dang 'bral bar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong khyed ston pa nga la dmigs na ni chang ma 'thung shig_/ma blud cig_/rtsa mchog 
[\[162b.6\]]gis kyang ma reg shig_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/_dge slong gzhan zhig na bar gyur nas de la sman pas zas ngan pa byin cig ces bsgo ba dang /_de la dge slong kha cig gis ni shes kyi kha cig gis mi shes pa de dag gis tshe dang ldan pa u pA li la dris pa dang /_
[\[162b.7\]]des de dag zhib tu smras so/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pA lis zhus pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das dge slong swa te la zas ngan pa byin cig ces gsungs pa ni ci de yang byin len bgyi 'tshal lam/_u pA li de yang byin len byos shig_/su las byin 
[\[163a\]]
[\[163a.1\]]len bgyi/_u pA li de ni dge bsnyen dad pa las so/_/rkyang pa'i sgo dang po'i tshigs su bcad pa bcu pa ste/_sgo dang po rdzogs so//_//mdor bsdus par na/_snod dang chos gos gnyi ga dang /_/ko sa la dang sar pa de bzhin te/_/bsgrags dang 
[\[163a.2\]]chos gos sna tshogs dang /_/lhan cig pa yang dge slong ma rnams ni/_/tha mar byas te bsdus pa'i mdor gsungs so/_/mdor na/_snod dang yo byad gtsug lag khang /_/'gron pa mang bcom gos rnams dang /_/gos dang gdugs dang de bzhin shing /_/dur khrod pa dang de bzhin 
[\[163a.3\]]spangs/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe na khyim bdag gzhan zhig gis ri brags kyi grong gzhan zhig tu yo byad thams cad dang ldan pa'i gtsug lag khang zhig brtsigs nas phyogs bzhi'i 
[\[163a.4\]]dge 'dun la phul lo/_/de na mal stan dang /_snod spyad mang du gyur/_dge slong ni nyung ngu gnas te/_de'i nang nas kha cig gis tshe dang ldan pa dag mal stan dang snod spyad dang /_yo byad ma spyad na de dag chud zos par 'gyur gyis/_de dag las bdag cag la spyad par ci tsam dgos 
[\[163a.5\]]pa de tsam zhig bcangs la/_de'i lhag ma rnams ni gtsug lag khang gzhan du dbul lo zhes smras nas/_de dag gis de bzhin byas so/_/ji tsam zhig na bsod snyoms pa gzhan zhig gzhongs spyad pa spyod cing gtsug lag khang der 'ongs pa dang /_dge slong de dag gis ngal 
[\[163a.6\]]bsor bcug nas de yang dge 'dun de dag gi nang na rgan pa zhig ste/_gtsug lag khang du lam gyi ngal bso nas des de dag la tshe dang ldan pa mal stan mchis sam zhes smras na/_med do zhes smras pa dang /_dge slong dag gis ji ltar yin pa de la zhib tu smras so/_/de gding ba med 
[\[163a.7\]]par sa la de bzhin du nyal nas nang par sngar langs te/_lde mig kyog po dang /_lde mig khyer nas khyim bdag de'i khyim du song ba dang /_de nas khyim bdag des de la bde bar byon tam zhes pa'i tshig brjod nas stan khyer te phyir byung ba dang /_bsod snyoms pa de spyod lam zhi ba'i 
[\[163b\]]
[\[163b.1\]]tshul du 'dug go/_/bsod snyoms pas kyang de la nor las bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po bdun gyi yon tan rgyas par brjod pa dang /_khyim bdag gis 'phags pa bdag gis de thams cad bgyis so zhes smras pa dang /_bsod snyoms pas khyim bdag khyod kyi gtsug lag 
[\[163b.2\]]khang na mal stan dag yod med de/_mdang nga yang gding ba med par sa'i steng na de bzhin du nyal nyal te 'dir 'ongs so/_/khyed na re de thams cad bdag gis de bzhin du bgyis so zhes zer na/_'di ci nyes zhes smras pa dang /_khyim bdag gis 'phags pa kho bos ni der mal 
[\[163b.3\]]stan dang snod spyad dang /_yo byad rnams mang du sbyar na 'phags pa de dag gis gtsug lag khang gzhan du gdon ma zos par btang ngo zhes smras pa dang /_des khyim bdag nyid kyis gtsug lag khang gi lde mig kyog po dang /_lde mig ngo shes sam zhes smras pa dang /_
[\[163b.4\]]'phags pa shin tu 'tshal to/_/des de bstan pa dang /_des 'phags pa bzhud cig bdag kyang mchi'o zhes smras so/_/des bsod snyoms bsod pa dang /_khyim bdag kyang rjes bzhin du 'ongs nas/_des dge slong rnams bsdus nas 'phags pa bdag gis 'dir 
[\[163b.5\]]mal stan dang /_snod spyad dang /_yo byad mang du phul na de dag gar mchis zhes smras pa dang /_des ji ltar gyur pa de dag thams cad khyim bdag la smras pa dang /_des nyes pa ngor brjod de smras pa/_khyod kyis ma legs par byas te/_de yang der bas na da ci slar blang 
[\[163b.6\]]du rung ngam 'on te mi rung de dag gis smras pa/_mi rung ngo /_/'phags pa kho bos ni der ma phul gyis song la slar long shig_/de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gtsug lag khang gzhan du ma 
[\[163b.7\]]dbul cig_/ji ltar dmigs pa de bzhin spyad par bya'o/_/gzhan du na gang gis byin pa la rin thang bzhin du phob shig_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/_drug sde rnams 'gron pa mang po dang lhan cig tu gzhongs spyad pa spyod cing dong ba dang /_de dag chos kyis rdul 
[\[164a\]]
[\[164a.1\]]gyis 'jigs pa na yang na ni 'gron pa dag gi mdun du dong /_yang na phyi bzhin dong ngo /_/ji tsam na 'gron pa mang po rnams rkun pos bcom nas skye bo mang po rnams kyis nor bor te bros pa dang /_rkun po rnams kyis nor kun bkur ma nus nas de dag gis bzang 
[\[164a.2\]]ba bdams te khyer te dong ngo /_/drug sde rnams 'gron pa mang po'i phyi bzhin du 'brangs te dong ba las gnas der phyin pa dang /_de dag gis nor mang po bor ba mthong ste/_de nas dga' bo nye dga' bo phyag dar khrod pa rnyed kyis blang ngo zhes smras pa dang /_de dag gis de las kyang 
[\[164a.3\]]gos rnams bdams te khyer ro/_/'gron pa mang po ram mda' dang lam srungs su bcas te slar log pa de dag gis drug sde dag gis khyer ba rnams ngo shes nas/_de dag gis gang rkun po rnams kyis bor ba de yang dge sbyong mgo reg rnams kyis brkus so zhes bsams so/_/
[\[164a.4\]]drug sde rnams la kha ngan du 'phags pa dag drang srong gi rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa de lta bu'i log par spyod pa dag spyod pa zhes spyos te nyes pa ngor brjod pa dang /_de dag gis 'gron pa mang po rnams rkun pos bcom ste nged kyis ni ma yin gyi/_nged kyis phyag dar khrod kyi gos rnyed do 
[\[164a.5\]]zhes smras pa dang /_de dag gis phyag dar khrod kyi gos ni ma lags so zhes smras pa dang /_de lan med nas cang mi smra bar 'dug go/_/de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong rnams 
[\[164a.6\]]'gron pa mang po 'phya ba ni yus te/_de bas na dge slong dag gis 'gron pa mang po bcom pa'i gos ma bkur cig_/dge slong dag gis 'gron pa mang po bcom pa'i gos khyer na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang dad par gyur pa de dag gis 'phags pa dag 
[\[164a.7\]]ci bder snoms shig ces smras na dge slong dag the tshom du gyur nas mi len to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de ste ci bder khyer cig ces smras na/_long la the tshom du ma byed cig_/gleng gzhi ni rgyal po'i khab na ste/_dge slong drug sde dag gis bsil ba 
[\[164b\]]
[\[164b.1\]]tshal gyi dur khrod du dong ba dang /_shi ba'i yo byad gdugs dang /_shing dang /_gos dag mang po bor ba de dag gis mthong nas de'i nang nas gcig gis dga' bo nye dga' bo phyag dar khrod kyi gos rnyed kyis bkur ro zhes smras pa dang /_dga' bo legs so legs kyis 
[\[164b.2\]]bkur ro zhes smras nas de dag gis blangs te dong ngo /_/dur khrod kyi srung ma rigs ngan dag 'ongs nas des bsams pa/_dur khrod 'di na cung zad kyang med pas na kha cig gis dur brkus par gdon mi za'o snyam bsams nas/_yang 'di snyam du gang gis brkus pa de brnyogs 
[\[164b.3\]]pas slar yang 'ong bar gdon mi zas mngon par gab ste 'dug go snyam du bsams te nags stug po'i nang du zhugs nas nyin gcig bzhin du sdod cing 'dug pa dang /_drug sde dag zhag bdun nam brgyad lon te dga' bo nye dga' bo bdag cag gis dur khrod du ma dong nas da ring 
[\[164b.4\]]zhig lon te cung zad tsam rnyed kyang srid kyis yang 'deng ngo zhes smras pas de dag dong ngo /_/ji tsam de na gos dang /_gdugs dang /_shing dag bor ba de dag gis blang bar brtsams pa dang rigs ngan nags tshal stug po na 'dug pa des mthong nas brgyugs te 'ongs nas/_des 'phags 
[\[164b.5\]]pa dag bdag cag phu nu dang /_gnyen dang grogs po dag rgyal po'i bka' bzhin du byed pa yang dur khrod kyi gos 'di'i phyir yin na khyed cag gis ci'i phyir bdag po yod pa'i dur khrod kyi shi ba'i yo byad dag bkur bar bya zhes smras pa dang /_de dag gis bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]nged cag 
[\[164b.6\]]gis ni phyag dar khrod pa'i gos blangs so/_/des 'phags pa 'di la de dag phyag dar khrod kyi gos yin na rab tu legs so zhes smras pa dang /_de dag lan med nas cang mi zer bar 'dug go/_/de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[164b.7\]]bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag rigs ngan 'phya ba ni yus te/_de bas na dge slong dag bdag po yod pa'i dur khrod nas phyag dar khrod kyi gos ma len cig_/dge slong dag gis bdag po yod pa'i dur khrod kyi phyag dar khrod pa'i gos blangs na 'das pa dang bcas par 
[\[165a\]]
[\[165a.1\]]'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang dad par gyur pa dag gis de la 'phags pa dag ci bde bar khyer cig ces smras pa dang /_dge slong dag the tshom du gyur te ma blangs pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de ste bde bar long shig ces zer na blang bar 
[\[165a.2\]]bya ste de la the tshom du ma byed cig_/rkyang pa'i sgo gnyis pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa dang po'o//_//'dul ba gzhung dam pa/_bam po bzhi bcu pa/_mdor na/_gos la sogs pa shing bal dang /_/lha khang nas 'phrog de bzhin te/_/dge 'dun gyi ni chos 
[\[165a.3\]]gos gsum/_/gang zag dag las bslang mi bya/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te/_drug sde dag bzhon pa mang po'i shing rta dang lhan cig lam du zhugs nas lam gyi phyed du phyin pa dang /_
[\[165a.4\]]shing rta gcig gi srog shing chag nas tshong pa des srog shing yang brjes nas srog shing chag pa bor te song ngo /_/nye dga' bos shing rta'i srog shing de blangs te lam po che'i bzhi mdor bor nas smras pa/_dga' bo nye dga' bo 'di ni bdag cag gis srog shing dbang phyug ces bya ba'i 
[\[165a.5\]]lha rten du bca' ba'i phyir bcugs so zhes byas te dong ba las khyim bdag gzhan dag gis kyang der stegs bu brtsigs so/_/gzhan zhig gis kyang de la gsol ba btab ste/_gal te bdag gis don 'di dang 'di lta bu zhig grub na bdag gis 'dir khang pa brtsigs la 
[\[165a.6\]]bram ze brgya rtsa brgyad la ston mo bya'o zhes smras pa las de yang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang ldan pas de'i de yang grub nas des de ji ltar dam bcas pa thams cad bsgrubs nas de log pa'i lha khang du gyur te lha khang pas kyang byin gyis brlabs so/_/de nas tshong pa 'gron pa 
[\[165a.7\]]mang po dag cig lam der zhugs pa dang der gos dang /_bal dang /_shing bal dag mang du phul lo/_/drug sde dag slar log pa'i tshe lha khang de rab tu rgyas par mthong nas de dag gis smras pa/_dga' bo nye dga' bo shing rta'i srog shing dbang phyug gos dang /_bal dang /_shing 
[\[165b\]]
[\[165b.1\]]bal dag rab tu mang shing phun sum tshogs pa de bkur ro zhes de dag gis blang bar brtsams pa dang /_lha khang pa dag lhags te/_de dag gis 'phags pa dag lha khang 'di ni bdag cag gi steng 'di ni las dang byi dor bdag cag gis bgyis na lha'i gos rnams ci'i phyir len 
[\[165b.2\]]cing dbrog_/khyed cag ma byin par len pa ma spangs sam zhes smras pa dang /_de dag gis bkren pa 'di ji ltar khyed kyi lha khang nged cag gis shing rta srog shing chag pa zhig rten thabs su btsugs te bzhag go/_/zhes smras so/_/lha khang pa des ku cho bton pa dang /_de nas nye dga' 
[\[165b.3\]]bo khros nas de rdog pa gcig brgyab nas bsgyel bar byas so/_/de nas de snyems shing dregs pa rnams spa gong nas 'phags pa khyed dam gzhan gyis byas par gyur nas yang bdag cag ni 'di la rten cing 'tsho ba yang 'di la bltas na ci'i phyir khyed kyis 'phags pa'i chos ma yin pa byed 
[\[165b.4\]]ces smras pa dang /_de dag ma spobs te cang mi zer bar 'dug go/_/de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag log par lta ba'i lha khang na gnas pa dag 'phya ba ni yus te/_de lta 
[\[165b.5\]]bas na dge slong dag gis lha khang bdag po yod pa'i gos la sogs pa blang bar mi bya'o/_/dge slong dag gis lha khang bdag po yod pa'i gos la sogs pa blangs na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/_/log pa'i lha khang pa dad pa gzhan zhig gis ci bder spyod cig ces 
[\[165b.6\]]smras pa dang /_dge slong de dag the tshom skyes te ma blangs nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gal te ci bder byas pa ni blang bar bya ste/_de la the tshom du ma byed cig_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/_bcom ldan 'das kyis nad pa la skul cig ces gsungs 
[\[165b.7\]]pa dang /_ji tsam zhig na dge slong zhig na bar gyur pa de'i nad g.yog gis tshe dang ldan pa dge 'dun la cung zad cig phul cig ces smras pa dang /_des kyang bdag la cung zad tsam yang med mod kyi chos gos gsum dbul lo zhes smras pa dang /_de cang mi zer bar 'dug go/_/de chos gos 
[\[166a\]]
[\[166a.1\]]gsum phul nas de dag gis btsongs te bgos so/_/dge slong de phyir sos te langs nas chos gos gsum gyis phongs par gyur te/_de ltar gyur pa bcom ldan 'das la dge slong dag gis gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge 
[\[166a.2\]]slong dag gis dge slong la dge 'dun gyi phyir chos gos gsum ma bslang shig bslangs na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/_/dge 'dun gyis kyang ma blang shig_/de ste blangs na yang ma 'ged cig_/bgos na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/_/rkyang pa'i sgo gnyis 
[\[166a.3\]]pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa gnyis so//_//mdor na/_gnyi ga la yang gnang ba dang /_/rnam pa tha dad rjes su gnang /_/sum cha dang yang dge tshul dang /_/dge slob ma dang dge tshul ma/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa na dze ta'i tshal mgon med 
[\[166a.4\]]zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/dge slong drug bcu zhig ljongs rgyu ba spyod cing ri brags kyi grong zhig tu phyin nas de na khyim bdag dad pa zhig gnas pas des de dag de'i khyim du bshos la spyan drangs nas des dge slong re re zhing ras yug re re dbul lo snyam du bsams 
[\[166a.5\]]so/_/de dag zan za ba la zhugs pa dang /_dge slong ma drug bcu zhig kyang ljongs rgyu ba spyod cing ri brags kyi grong der phyin pa dang /_bsod snyoms slong ba la zhugs so/_/gzhan zhig gis khyim bdag 'di'i khyim na dge slong dag bshos gsol gyis der bzhud cig ces 
[\[166a.6\]]smras pa dang /_de dag der dong ste de dag gis kyang zan zos pa dang /_de nas khyim bdag des ras yug drug bcu zhig rgan rims kyi mdun du bzhag go/_/dge slong dag ji lta bur bgo ba mi shes nas/_de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_
[\[166a.7\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge 'dun sde gnyis kyis 'thob pa yin gyis/_dge 'dun sde gnyis su gos shig_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/_mnyan du yod pa na khyim bdag gzhan cig gis gtsug lag khang zhig brtsigs te/_des de'i zhal 
[\[166b\]]
[\[166b.1\]]bsros te/_dge 'dun sde gnyis bshos gsol nas rnyed pa yang mang du phul te dge slong dag gis bgos pa dang /_dge slong dag nged cag la ni chos gos gsum dgos kyis/_dge tshul pha dag gi stod g.yogs dang mthang gos su zad na/_ji ltar bdag cag dang 
[\[166b.2\]]mnyam par bgo zhes 'phya'o/_/de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dang dge slong ma ni skal ba mnyam par bgos shig_/dge tshul pha dang /_dge tshul ma dang /_dge slob ma dag la 
[\[166b.3\]]ni sum cha cig byin cig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge tshul pha dag la sum cha cig byin cig ces bka' stsal pa dang /_ji tsam zhig na dge tshul pha gzhan zhig lo nyi shu yang tshang zhing bsnyen par rdzogs par yang 'dod na de la dge slong gis tshe dang ldan pa lo nyi shu tshang na ci'i phyir 
[\[166b.4\]]bsnyen par rdzogs par mi byed ces smras pa dang /_des kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis ni bdag cag gi rnyed pa 'di lta bur bcas na stod g.yogs dang mthang gos su mi ldang na chos gos gsum lta ci smos/_ji ltar bsnyen par rdzogs par bya zhes smras so/_/de ltar gyur pa dge 
[\[166b.5\]]slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge tshul pha bsnyen par rdzogs par 'dod pa dang /_dge slob ma la sum gnyis byin cig_/dge tshul pha dang dge tshul ma gzhan ni skal ba sum char zad do/_/rkyang pa'i sgo gnyis kyi 
[\[166b.6\]]mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa gsum pa'o//_//mdor na/_ko sa la na drug bcu dang /_/brgya phrag phyed dang bcu gsum dang /_/sgra can zin dang dpal sbed dang /_/gtsug lag khang dang mchod rten de bzhin te/_/gdugs dang bris pa de bzhin sbyar/_/zan la mgron du bos 
[\[166b.7\]]pa'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ko sa lar ljongs rgyu zhing spyod pa na ri brags kyi grong gzhan zhig tu byon nas ri brags kyi grong de na khyim bdag cig gnas pas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun du bcas par khyim du bshos la spyan drangs so/_/dge slong ma drug bcu 
[\[167a\]]
[\[167a.1\]]zhig ljongs rgyu ba spyod pa na ri brags kyi grong der phyin nas de dag kyang der zan zos pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya phrag phyed dang bcu gsum dang lhan cig tu bshos gsol nas/_khyim bdag des ras yug brgya phrag phyed dang bcu gsum zhig rgan 
[\[167a.2\]]rims kyi mdun du bzhag go/_/dge slong dag gis ji ltar bgo ba mi shes nas dge slong ma dag gis de la gzhan byar ci yod/_sngon yang dge 'dun sde gnyis bshos gsol ba las bdag cag gis rnyed pa'i phyed thob na da yang bdag cag la rnyed pa'i phyed byin cig ces smras 
[\[167a.3\]]so/_/de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gang du dge slong ma mang la dge slong pha nyung na der rnyed pa dge 'dun gnyi gar bgos shig_/gang na dge slong pha mang la dge slong ma nyung na der mgo grangs 
[\[167a.4\]]bzhin du bgos shig_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/_khyim bdag cig gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dag bshos la spyan drangs so/_/dge slong gi dge 'dun dag ni dong /_bcom ldan 'das ni gtsug lag khang na bzhugs te bshos tshur 
[\[167a.5\]]mnos so/_/rnam pa lnga'i phyir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gtsug lag khang na bzhugs shing bshos mnos te gsol lo/_/lnga gang zhe na/_lha rnams la chos 'chad par bzhed pa yin/_nad pa dag gzigs par bzhed pa yin/_mal stan dag gzigs par 
[\[167a.6\]]bzhed pa yin/_nang du yang dag 'jog la 'jug par bzhed pa yin/_nyan thos rnams kyi 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gnas 'cha' bar bzhed pa yin no/_/don 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyis nyan thos rnams kyi 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gnas bca' bar bzhed pa'i phyir gtsug 
[\[167a.7\]]lag khang na bzhugs shing bshos mnos te gsol lo/_/khyim bdag de rgan pa dag la mngon par dad nas der rgan rims su mar dang /_mar las btsos pa'i bca' ba rnams brims/_bar ma dag la ni 'bru mar dang 'bru mar las btsos pa'i bca' ba dag brims/_
[\[167b\]]
[\[167b.1\]]gzhon nu la ni 'bru mar gyi tshigs ma dag brims so/_/de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa sgra can zin bcom ldan 'das kyi bshos mnos te/_des bcom ldan 'das kyi bshos mnos nas 'ongs pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis sgra can zin la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsod 
[\[167b.2\]]pa'i zas kyis tshim par byas sam zhes smras pa dang /_des gsol pa/_btsun pa rgan pa'i rnams tshim mo/_/sgra can zin khyod ci'i phyir rid cing nyam chung zhing de skad zer ba smros shig_/des tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_'bru mar gyis ni mthur 'gyur te/_/mar 
[\[167b.3\]]gyis kyang ni mdangs su 'gyur/_/'bru mar tshigs kyi tshod mas ni/_/mdangs ma mchis na stobs lta zhig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sgra can zin ci yin pa de smros shig_/des de ltar gyur pa bcom ldan 'das la zhib mor gsol to/_/bcom 
[\[167b.4\]]ldan 'das kyis sgra can zin la de na gnas brtan su zhig 'dug ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das mkhan po mchis so/_/sgra can zin la dge slong shA ri'i bus ni 'og ma dag ma brtags pas na ngan du zos pa yin no/_/de lta bu byung ba'i phyir bcom ldan 
[\[167b.5\]]'das kyis dge slong gi dge 'dun dag bsdus nas/_dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi mdun du gdan bting ba la bzhugs te/_nyan thos rnams kyi 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gnas bca' ba'i phyir dge slong dang dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan dge slong gis mtshungs par spyad pa'i 
[\[167b.6\]]chos ngas bca' ste/_dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan dge slong gis zan 'brim pa'i tshe snyoms par brims shig ces bsgo shig des tshod ma sna re re la'ang smras pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lan tshwa'am dang por gang brims pa de'i tshe smros shig_/
[\[167b.7\]]thams cad la ni ma yin no/_/dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan dge slong gis ji lta bur mtshungs par spyad pa'i chos bzhin ma byas na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gis zan zos pa smad do zhes thos nas/_des 
[\[168a\]]
[\[168a.1\]]bdag gis zan zos pa ston pas smad na 'di ltar 'dug pa'i mi rigs so zhes bsams nas des skyugs te btang ngo /_/dge slong dag the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 
[\[168a.2\]]'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la zan zos pa smad pa dang /_des slar skyugs pa la gzigs su gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag 'di 'ba' zhig ma yin gyi sngon 'das pa'i dus na yang ngas de la zan zos pa smad pa dang /_de'i phyir 
[\[168a.3\]]skyugs so/_/dge slong dag nyon cig_/sngon byung ba ni grong khyer gzhan zhig na mang po 'chad pa'i bram ze zhig gnas te/_de bram ze'i bu dang lhan cig tu ljongs rgyu zhing spyod pa na ri brags kyi grong zhig tu phyin nas de rdzing zhig gi 'gram du bram ze des bram ze'i bu der bzhag nas cung 
[\[168a.4\]]zad cig sdod/_nga grong du phye la sogs pa bslangs te slar 'ong ngo /_/de de na 'dug pa dang /_khyi sha can zhig rdzing du chu grog 'thung du 'ongs so/_/de la bram ze'i bus kye skyes bu bdag kyang chu grog cig gsol cig ces smras so/_/des kyang lo ma la snod drubs shig ces smras 
[\[168a.5\]]pa dang /_des snod drubs so/_/des de la khyi'i pags pa las byas pa'i sgye'u'i nang nas byung ba'i phye byin no/_/de snum pa dang bram ze'i bus phye 'di snum na ci zhig ces dris pa dang /_'di ni pags pa las sgye'u byas pa'i mthu ste/_des sgye'u dag ci las byas pa zhib mor byas na/_
[\[168a.6\]]bram ze'i bu des ma go'o/_/bram ze de slar 'ongs nas des bram ze'i bu khyod song la chu grog rgyu slongs shig ces smras pa dang /_des chu grog 'tshal lags so zhes smras so/_/sus byin mi pha bis byin no/_/des pha bi ni khyi sha can te/_des khyod la phye byin na de khyod kyis sdig 
[\[168a.7\]]par gyur to zhes smras nas/_des de la rab tu smad pa dang /_des zos pa slar skyugs so/_/dge slong dag mi shes sam/_gang mang po 'chad pa'i bram ze de ni da ltar gyi nga nyid yin no/_/de'i tshe de'i dus na bram ze'i bu de ni da ltar gyi dge slong shA ri'i bu ste/_de'i tshe na 
[\[168b\]]
[\[168b.1\]]yang ngas zas zos pa la rab tu smad nas des skyugs so/_/da 'dir yang ngas zos pa la rab tu smad nas 'dir yang skyugs par gyur to/_/gleng gzhi ni rgyal po'i khab na ste/_de'i tshe na rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer na khyim bdag me skyes kyi sring mo'i khyo gcer bu pa'i dge 
[\[168b.2\]]bsnyen dpal sbed ces bya ba zhig 'dug ste/_khyim bdag me skyes dad pa des 'di snyam du dpal sbed 'di dge 'dun dag la yon 'bul du bskul lo snyam bsams nas/_des de la dpal sbed dge 'dun dag la mchod pa dang /_yon phul cig dang khyod kyi bsod nams su 
[\[168b.3\]]'gyur ro zhes smras so/_/dpal sbed kyis smras pa/_ngas kyang dge 'dun dag la mchod cing yon dbul bar bya/_khyod kyis kyang gang po la sogs te rab tu byung ba'i dge 'dun dag la mchod cing bshos gsol cig_/me skyes kyis 'di snyam du bsams pa/_de ste khas 
[\[168b.4\]]ma blangs na dpal sbed kyis kyang dge 'dun la mchod pa'i bar chad du 'gyur na/_sems can thams cad la sbyin pa lta nyes pa med kyis gcer bu pa'i dge 'dun dag zas byin te bdag gis des dge 'dun la mchod cing yon 'bul ba'i bar chad mi bya'o snyam du bsams nas 
[\[168b.5\]]des zas sbyin no zhes khas blangs nas dpal sbed kyis 'di snyam du bdag gis dang por sangs rgyas la sogs te dge slong gi dge 'dun dag sngar bshos gsol na ni me skyes kyis phyis zan mi sbyin gyis gang po la sogs te rab tu byung ba'i dge 'dun dag bshos sngar gsol pa 
[\[168b.6\]]dang /_ngas phyis zas sbyin no snyam bsams nas/_me skyes la 'di skad ces smras so/_/me skyes khyod kyis dang po zan byin cig dang /_ngas kyang phyis dge sbyong gau ta ma dang nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dag la zan sbyin no/_/des kyang khas blangs nas de nas khyim bdag 
[\[168b.7\]]me skyes kyis gang po dag gang na 'dug pa der phyin nas gang po dang lhan cig rab tu dga' zhing mgu ba'i gtam sna tshogs dag byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas khyim bdag me skyes kyis gang po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/gang po 
[\[169a\]]
[\[169a.1\]]khyod sang bdag gi khyim du gcer bu pa mang po dang /_dge 'dun dang lhan cig tu bshos gsol gyis khas long shig_/gang pos bsams pa/_khyim bdag 'di ni gor ma chag par dge sbyong gau ta ma la sun par gyur nas bdag cag la rab tu 
[\[169a.2\]]dad par gyur te de ni bdag cag gi rnyed pa rab tu rnyed pa ste/_gang po bdag cag gi dge 'dun gyi rigs la rab tu dad par gyur to snyam nas des khas blangs so/_/de nas khyim bdag me skyes de dag spyan drangs nas song ngo /_/de nas khyim bdag me skyes kyis de'i nub mo 
[\[169a.3\]]rab tu bsod pa'i bca' ba dang bza' ba'i kha zas dag sbyar nas/_nang par sngar langs te langs nas stan bting /_ril ba dag chus bkang ste bzhag nas gang po dag la spyan 'dren pa'i dus gsol pa/_kye gang po bshos rnams bshams kyis dus mkhyen par mdzod 
[\[169a.4\]]cig_/de dag dong ba dang /_dpal sbed kyis de'i gnas su 'ongs te smras pa/_'phags pa gang po dge sbyong gau ta ma ni khyim bdag gi khyim du bzhud de de nang du bzhud kar sgo'i them pa la zhabs bzhag nas 'dzum pa ston te/_de nas nyan thos kun dga' bo zhes bya bas stod 
[\[169a.5\]]g.yogs phyogs gcig tu gzar/_pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te thal mo sbyar nas de bzhin gshegs pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos dag ni rgyu ma mchis rkyen ma mchis par 'dzum pa mi mdzad na/_btsun pa ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis 'dzum pa mdzad 
[\[169a.6\]]ces zhus pa dang /_des kyang kun dga' bo de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos dag ni rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa ston par mi mdzad de/_de ji lta bur dgongs pa bzhin lung bstan to zhes smras 
[\[169a.7\]]nas/_de la skye bo mang po dag kyang rab tu dad par gyur gyis khyod kyis kyang khyim bdag me skyes kyi khyim du 'gro ba'i tshe de ltar bya ba'i rigs so/_/'on kyang skye bo mang po dag rab tu dad par 'gyur ro/_/des khas blangs so/_/de nas gang po gcer bu pa mang pos bskor nas 
[\[169b\]]
[\[169b.1\]]khyim bdag me skyes kyi khyim du phyin pa dang /_khyim bdag me skyes kyi sgo'i them pa la rkang pa bzhag ste rta gad du bgad pa dang /_de'i nang nas gcer bu pa gcig cig gis rkang pa la btud de bcom ldan 'das skyes bu dam pa khyod lta bu rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad do zhes dris 
[\[169b.2\]]pa dang /_kye chu bo dregs bral gyi 'gram na spre'u pho zhig gis spre'u mo zhig mthong nas de la sems rab tu chags te spre'u mo de la rgal lo snyam nas brgyugs pa dang gred de shing gi rtse mo nas rdeg 'chos nas dus 'das so/_/de'i tshe nga 'di snyam du sems te/_sems can 'di ni 'dod 
[\[169b.3\]]pa'i rgyus sdug bsngal ba cher gyur to snyam mo/_/de skad du kha nas byung ma thag tu khyim bdag me skyes kyis thos nas des bsams pa/_bu zan mo'i bu gang po ni khab 'tshong ba slar khab rdung ba'i khyim du khab 'tshong bar sems pa bzhin te/_ji nas 'di la kyal ka zhig bya'o snyam nas 
[\[169b.4\]]de dag dbyug gu can mang po thams cad bde bar 'dug pa dang /_khyim bdag des gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bca' ba dang bza' bas phor pa bkang nas steng du tshod ma blugs te byin no/_/gang po gcig po la ni phor pa'i zhabs su tshod ma blugs nas steng du 'bras chan gyis g.yogs te byin 
[\[169b.5\]]no/_/gcer bu pa phal dag za zhing 'dug pa dang gang pos bsams pa/_gor ma chag par des ni nga la ston par dmigs te/_des tshod ma zhim po dang kha zas bzang po sbyin par bsams so snyam nas ji tsam tshod ma brims zin pa dang /_des bsams pa/_de ni brel bas 
[\[169b.6\]]brjed kyis bdag gis bskul lo snyam nas des bos nas khyim bdag nga la ni 'bras chan 'ba' zhig 'ongs kyis tshod ma ni med do zhes smras pa dang /_des slar tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_mi mthong ba ni mthong bar byed/_/mthong bar bya ba mi mthong ste/_/dregs bral 'gram 
[\[169b.7\]]gyi spre'u mthong la/_/phor bu'i nang gi tshod ma min/_/gang po yang de'i gdong bltas pa dang /_des phor bu'i zhabs na tshod ma 'dug pa bstan te/_gang po khyod kyis chu bo dregs bral gyi 'gram na spre'u 'dug pa ni mthong /_phor bu'i nang na tshod ma 'dug pa ni ma mthong ngo zhes smras 
[\[170a\]]
[\[170a.1\]]pa dang /_des bsams pa/_'dis bdag skyengs par byas kyis ci nas kyang 'jig rten 'di nas pha rol gnyi gar phan par mi 'gyur ba de ltar sbyin pa'i yon tan brjod do snyam du bsams pa dang me skyes kyis de skyengs par shes nas sbyin pa'i yon tan brjod pa'i 
[\[170a.2\]]tshe de'i mdun du ma 'dug go/_/des zan zos nas sbyin pa'i yon tan bklags pa/_sbyin bdag gis ni sbyin pa'i dus/_/dge sbyong gzhan ni za ba'i dus/_/lhag ma gzhan la 'ong ba'i dus/_/bsod nams mi dge yod ma yin/_/sgo ba zhig 'dug pa des sbyin pa'i yon tan 
[\[170a.3\]]brjod pa la nyan nyan te thos nas khros pa 'di 'dra ba'i sdig can zas zos la bsrung yang mi nus te/_'di 'dra ba'i sbyin pa'i yon tan lta ga la srid kyis bu zan mo'i bu 'di la kyal ka zhig bya'o snyam nas des 'bras khu bum pa gang sgo drung du pho'o/_/sgo gtan gyi gdang phyed tsam drangs 
[\[170a.4\]]te bzhag pa dang gcer bu pa de phyir byung ba dang 'bras khu las gred de klad pa sgo gtan la phog nas khrag byung ngo /_/de nas sgo ba des mthong ste/_tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_sgo gtan phyung ba'i dus la bab/_/'bras khu pho ba'i dus bab pas/_/mgo bo snad pa'i dus yin gyis/_/
[\[170a.5\]]dge dang mi dge'i dus med do/_/de klad pa la khrag zag bzhin du khyim bdag dpal sbed gang na ba der song ste drung du phyin pa dang /_dpal sbed kyis mthong nas btsun pa gang po ci nyes zhes dris pa dang /_des smras pa/_me skyes kyis 'di 'dra bar gnod pa byas so/_/
[\[170a.6\]]dpal sbed kyis smras pa dang /_khyod ni gson por thar gyis sdod cig dang /_ci nas 'di ltar dge sbyong gau ta ma nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas par kho bo'i khyim nas gson bzhin du phyir mi 'byung bar byas mi dgar ma byed cig_/dpal sbed kyis bsams pa/_'di'i dgra 
[\[170a.7\]]la lan glan gyis spyan 'dren du 'gro'o/_/de ste dge sbyong gau ta ma de thams cad mkhyen pa yin na ni mgron du bos kyang khas len du mi btub bo/_/de ste thams cad mkhyen pa ma yin na ni khas len to snyam du bsams nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin pa 
[\[170b\]]
[\[170b.1\]]dang /_bcom ldan 'das dang lhan cig tu dga' ba'i gtam sna tshogs byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas khyim bdag dpal sbed kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/kye gau ta ma sang bdag gi khyim du dge slong gi 
[\[170b.2\]]dge 'dun dang lhan cig bshos la gshegs par zhal gyis bzhes shig ces spyan drangs pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_gang gis nga las bden pa mthong bar 'gyur ba de 'di ltar byed do/_/de ste ngas khas ma blangs na ni bden pa'i bar chad dag tu 'gyur te/_
[\[170b.3\]]ji nas khas blang ngo snyam nas gshegs par zhal gyis bzhes so/_/dpal sbed kyis bsams pa/_'di ni thams cad mkhyen pa ma yin te/_de ste thams cad mkhyen pa yin na ni 'di ltar khas mi len pa'i rigs na/_ji nas 'di thams cad mkhyen du mi 'gyur bar dgra'i lan 
[\[170b.4\]]glan no snyam nas de nas de khyim du song ste/_de'i khyim gyi sgo kar dong chen po brkos nas nang du shing ka di da'i me mdag dud pa med pas bkang nas de'i steng du rtswas g.yogs nas sas bkab ste bzhag go/_/dug rnon pos bza' ba dang btung ba sbyar to/_/de nas me skyes kyi 
[\[170b.5\]]sring mos dpal sbed la jo bo ci zhig mdzad ces dris pa dang /_des smras pa/_dgra gsad par bya'o/_/jo bo la dgra su mchis/_dge sbyong gau ta ma'o/_/ji ste jo bo khyod kyi dgra bcom ldan 'das yin na mdza' bo su zhig mchis kyis jo bo 'di lta bu 'phags pas chos 
[\[170b.6\]]ma yin pa'i las bya bar mi rigs par soms shig ces smras pa dang /_de nas dpal sbed kyis bsams pa/_'di yang me skyes kyi gnyen du 'ong ste dge sbyong gau ta ma la dad pas na gsang shor bar 'gyur ro snyam nas des mo mdzod kyi nang du bcug ste sgo lcags bcug nas 
[\[170b.7\]]bzhag go/_/gang po la sogs pa gcer bu pa thams cad bos nas ngas dgra bsad pa la ltar shog shig_/dge sbyong gau ta ma gsad pa'i phyir sgor dong chen po brkos nas nang du seng ldeng gi me mdag gis bkang ste bzhag_/kha zas dang skom gyi nang du'ang dug rnon pos 
[\[171a\]]
[\[171a.1\]]bkang ngo /_/de dag yid rab tu dga' nas myur zhing [{]rings su [,]ring du [}]dong ste yang thog gi steng du 'dzegs te 'khod nas deng bdag cag bde bar 'khod do/_/dge sbyong gau ta ma me'i dong gi nang du ji ltar tshig pa dang /_dug rnon pos rab tu zhen pa dang /_yan 
[\[171a.2\]]man du sa la ji ltar 'gyel ba dag blta'o/_/dpal sbed kyis gdan bting nas bcom ldan 'das spyan 'dren pas dus gsol te/_gau ta ma bshos kyang sbyar lags kyis/_kye gau ta ma dus la bab par dgongs shig_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' 
[\[171a.3\]]bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo khyod song la dge slong dag la 'di skad du dpal sbed kyi khyim du de bzhin gshegs pa ma gshegs par dge slong su yang sngar ma 'dong shig_/btsun pa de bzhin du bgyi'o zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das las mnyan te/_dge 
[\[171a.4\]]slong dag la tshe dang ldan pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyis dpal sbed kyi khyim du de bzhin gshegs pa ma gshegs par sngar dge slong su yang ma 'dong shig ces bka' stsal to zhes bsgo'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro'i dus na sham thabs mnabs/_lhung bzed dang /_chos gos bsnams 
[\[171a.5\]]te/_dge slong mang pos bskor nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du byas te dpal sbed kyi khyim gang na ba de logs su gshegs so/_/de nas 'od ma'i tshal na gnas pa'i lha bran rnams sdug bsngal zhing yid mi dga' bas gzir te/_myur zhing rings par bcom ldan 'das gang na 
[\[171a.6\]]ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs te snying rje'i tshig gis 'di skad du bcom ldan 'das dpal sbed kyi khyim du gshegs pa'i mi rigs so zhes gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lha de na gnod pa ci zhig yod/_bcom 
[\[171a.7\]]ldan 'das dpal sbed ni bcom ldan 'das la ma rung bar bgyi ba'i slad du bshams so zhes smras pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lha de bzhin gshegs pa ni gnod pa thams cad dang bral na des nga la gnod pa ci zhig byar yod/_lha bran gyis gsol pa/_
[\[171b\]]
[\[171b.1\]]bcom ldan 'das des bcom ldan 'das dgrongs pa'i slad du dong chen po'i nang du seng ldeng gi me mdag gis bkang ngo zhes smras pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lha gang 'dod chags kyi me dang /_zhe sdang gi me dang /_gti mug gi me dag kyang ye shes kyi 
[\[171b.2\]]chus btab na zhi bar 'gyur/_me'i nang na tha ma des ci zhig byar yod kyis mya ngan ma byed par 'dug shig_/lha bran gyis gsol pa/_de gcig pu ma lags kyi gzhan dag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das dgrongs pa'i slad du bya ba sbyar te/_dug rnon po mi bzad pas kha zas 
[\[171b.3\]]dang btung ba'i nang du sbyar to zhes smras pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lha dug gi gnyen po ye shes kyis 'dod chags kyi dug dang /_zhe sdang gi dug dang /_gti mug gi dug kyang rab tu btang /_rab tu skyugs/_rab tu bor na dug gi nang na tha ma des 
[\[171b.4\]]byar ci zhig yod/_bdag slar log la bdag gi las la nan tan byos shig_/de nas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab tu byon pa dang /_rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa'i lha dag gis snga ma bzhin du gsol pa dang /_lha de dag la bcom ldan 'das kyis lha snga ma bzhin du bsgo ste 
[\[171b.5\]]slar bkye'o/_/de nas dpal sbed kyi khang pa'i sgor byon pa dang dpal sbed kyi khyim gyi lhas snga ma bzhin du gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis lha de dag kyang lha snga ma bzhin du bsgo ste slar bkye'o/_/de nas dpal sbed kyi chung mas bsams pa/_da ni bcom ldan 'das 
[\[171b.6\]]sgo dang por phyin cing da tsam ni dong gi steng du zhabs gzhog go/_/da tsam ni dong gi kha rtswas g.yogs pa'i steng nas lhung ste da tsam ni bcom ldan 'das me'i nang du lhung bas dud pas kyang 'tshal/_mchi ma yang byung /_me lces chos gos tshig pa'i dud pa'ang byung ngo snyam nas mi 
[\[171b.7\]]dga' ba des khang pa'i nang du bcug pas yid mi dga' ba skyes nas mig mchi mas gang zhing ngo 'dzum gnags nas brtabs mi dge ba la rtog ste ngu zhing 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad la phan pa la rab tu 'jug pa'i yid kyis sgo bar mar 
[\[172a\]]
[\[172a.1\]]byon nas me'i dong gi steng du zhabs bzhag pa dang /_de nas me'i dong gi steng du zhabs bzhag ma thag tu de thams cad kyang mtshe'u pad mo can du gyur te/_ud pa la dang /_pad mo dang /_ku mu da dang /_puN+Da rI ka dag gis ni khebs/_bya ngang pa dang /_kAr N+Da dang /_
[\[172a.2\]]ngur ba la sogs pa chu na spyod pa'i bya rnams kyis brgyan te/_bya de dag kyang skad sna tshogs 'byin pa ni ji ltar lha'i rdzing man da ka bzhin no/_/nam mkha' la gnas pa'i lha dag gis kyang lha'i me tog ku mu da dang /_lha'i me tog kha dog dang ldan pas steng nas gtor to/_/
[\[172a.3\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das pad ma'i snying po'i steng dag tu zhabs bzhag ste dpal sbed kyi khyim du byon pa dang /_khyim bdag dpal sbed ngo mtshar che ba'i mig gis bgrad de bltas nas/_btsun pa gang po bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul la ltos shig ces smras 
[\[172a.4\]]pa dang /_gang po mi dga' ba'i bzhin du bsgyur nas/_khyim bdag dge sbyong gau ta ma la dad dam de'i sgyu ma la dad dam zhes smras pa dang /_dpal sbed kyis smras pa/_btsun pa gang po de ltar 'di lta bus bsgrub du rung na ni khyod kyang thams cad mkhyen pa na sgyu ma de lta bu byos 
[\[172a.5\]]la ston cig_/de lta bus nga dang nga'i mdza' bo dang phu nu dag kyang bsgrub par gyis shig_/gang pos bsams pa dgos pa ma grub par gyur te/_slar 'gro'o snyam nas des de la spyos te khang pa'i steng nas babs te skyengs nas bcom ldan 'das la mngon du 'byung bar ma 
[\[172a.6\]]nus te/_de nas 'gros dal zhing bags kyis song nas gdong yang sa la bltas te dpal sbed kyi khyim nas byung ste bros te song ngo /_/de nas khyim bdag dpal sbed khyim bdag me skyes kyi sring mo gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/_sgo lcags phye ste bzang mo tshur shog_/de 
[\[172a.7\]]bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs la phyag 'tshol cig ces smras pa dang /_des bsams pa/_'di bdag la slu bar byed do snyam nas snying rje ba'i tshig gis dal nas smras pa/_sdig pa'i grogs pos bslus te bsad na bdag la bgam du ci zhig yod ces smras pa dang /_des 
[\[172b\]]
[\[172b.1\]]bzang mo bden par zer te bgam pa ni ma yin gyis/_bcom ldan 'das dgrongs par ma nus pas/_da bcom ldan 'das la mngon du 'byung bar mi nus kyis/_da khrid la song shig ces smras pa dang /_de nas dpal sbed kyi chung ma de dga' ba skyes nas mgu ba'i yid

[\[172b.3\]]pas na bcom ldan 'das la mi dge ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu dag bgyis so zhes smras pa dang /_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis glang po che'i sna 'dra ba'i phyag brkyang nas gsungs pa/_khyim bdag longs shig dang bzod do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa la ni mdza' ba dang dgrar bye

[\[172b.5\]]skyes nas/_mos pa'i yid kyis bcom ldan 'das la cung zad cig gzhes shig_/bdag gis bshos da gdod sbyar ro zhes gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_khyim bdag de bzhin gshegs pa la spyan 'dren pas dus gsol te/_gau ta ma 
[\[172b.6\]]bshos dag kyang sbyar lags kyis/_kye gau ta ma dus mkhyen par mdzod cig ces zer na da yang ci'i phyir na 'di skad du smra/_des gsol pa/_btsun pa bdag ni mi dge ba'i grogs po la lta bar gyur pa'i blos log par lta ba gsum du 'gro ba'i sdig pas de la gzhol te

[\[173a\]]
[\[173a.1\]]btsun pa bdag gis dug rnon pos zhal zas dang /_skyems kyi nang du sbyar gyis de dag pho la gdod sbyar ro zhes smras pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_khyim bdag gang 'dod chags kyi dug dang /_zhe sdang gi dug dang /_gti mug gi dug kyang

[\[173a.3\]]song la dge slong dag la 'di skad du nam rgan rims su 'byor tshogs so zhes skad ma phyung gi bar du su yang zan ma za zhig par sgo shig_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos dge slong dag la tshe dang ldan pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa ni rgan rims su 'byor tshogs

[\[173a.5\]]dang /_kha zas dang skom dag kyang dug med par gyur to/_/dpal sbed de dogs bzhin du kha zas dang skom dag 'brim zhing bsams pa/_rgan rims nas gzhon nu dag gi drung du 'ongs pa dang /_da tsam dge slong rgan rims dag ni dug rnon pos 'gyel gor ma chag go/_/gzhon 
[\[173a.6\]]nu nas yang rgan rims kyi drung du 'ongs nas yang 'di snyam du sems te/_de'i blo yang de lta bur skyes nas/_bcom ldan 'das ni 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug gi dug spangs kyi/_nyan thos thams cad kyi ma yin snyam du bsams nas/_de ltar dge slong 
[\[173a.7\]]dag thams cad kyis bshos gsol na gcig la yang gnod par ma gyur to/_/chung ngu na de'i lhag ma zos pa dag la yang gnod par ma gyur to/_/de nas khyim bdag dpal sbed phyi phyir dad pa skyes so/_/de chung ma dang gnyis kyis bcom ldan 'das bshos gsol nas/_

[\[173b.1\]]lhung bzed phyung ste phyag bcabs par shes nas stan dma' ba zhig blangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos nyan pa'i phyir 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dpal sbed dang chung ma'i bsam pa dang /_bag la nyal dang /_khams dang /_rang bzhin dag mkhyen

[\[173b.4\]]kyang ma bgyis/_snga ma'i mi dag gis kyang ma bgyis/_dge sbyong dang /_bram ze dag gis kyang ma bgyis te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi mchi ma dang khrag gi rgya mtsho ni bskams/_rus pa'i ri las ni bsgral/_ngan song gi sgo ni bcad/_mtho ris kyi sgo ni phye ste/_
[\[173b.5\]]bdag ni lha dang mi'i gnas su bzhag go zhes smras nas/_yang gsol pa/_nyes pa mang ba ma rungs pa/_/ngan du 'gro ba'i lam rnams te/_/khyod kyi mthus ni de dag bcad/_/mtho ris 'gro ba'i sgo phye bsod nams can/_/mya ngan 'da' ba'i lam yang bdag gis thob/_/
[\[173b.6\]]khyod la brtan pas thob pa nyes bral ba'i/_/bdag gi mig ni dag cing rnam par dag_/'phags pa dgyes pa'i gnas bzhi thob/_/sdug bsngal rgya mtsho pha rol rgal/_/skye bo lha min lha dang mi yis mchod/_/skye ba na ba rga shi rnam par bral/_/srid pa stong du'ang rnyed par 
[\[173b.7\]]shin tu dka'/_/thub pa khyod mthong deng ni 'bras bur ldan/_/btsun pa bdag ni mngon par rgal te mngon par rgal lo da ni bdag bcom ldan 'das dang /_chos dang /_dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchis/_deng phan chad nam mtsho'i bar du srog dang bsdos te skyabs su 
[\[174a\]]
[\[174a.1\]]mchi nas mngon du dad kyis/_bdag la dge bsnyen du zung shig_/btsun pa deng phan chad mu stegs can gcer bu pa dang /_gcer bu ma dang /_gcer bu pa'i nyan thos rnams la ni sgo bcad/_bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dang /_dge slong dang /_dge

[\[174a.3\]]bzhengs te bzhud do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das gtsug lag khang du byon nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gud du gdan bting ba la bzhugs so/_/bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag khyim bdag dpal sbed kyi khyim du de lta bu'i 
[\[174a.4\]]gnod pa dag byung ba de la der de bzhin gshegs pas mkhyen par ma gyur na gor ma chag par dge slong rab tu mang po zhig dug gis dus byas par 'gyur/_khyim bdag des ngan du spyad pas mtshams med pa'i sems can dmyal bar ltung ngo /_/de bas na dge 'dun gyi gnas 
[\[174a.5\]]brtan gyi dge slong la mtshungs par spyod pa'i chos bca'o/_/dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan dge slong gi rgan rims su 'dug nas kha zas dag bshams te 'ongs pa dang /_sngar chung ngu na lan tshwa tsam yang ma blang shig_/rgan rims su 'byor tshogs zhes skad ma phyung bar 
[\[174a.6\]]blangs na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/_de'i tshe na khyim bdag gzhan zhig gis gtsug lag khang chen po zhig rtsig pa la zhugs pa las/_des phyed tsam brtsigs pa dang dus 'das so/_/de'i bu khyim gyi bdag por gyur nas dge 
[\[174a.7\]]slong dag gis de'i gan du song ste bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]khyod kyi phas gtsug lag khang rtsig pa la zhugs pa dang /_de yang phyed tsam zin pa dang dus 'das so/_/de ni khyod kyis mjug bsgrub pa'i rigs so zhes smras pa dang /_de dad pa chung ste gtsug lag khang de ni che bas na 
[\[174b\]]
[\[174b.1\]]de tsam rtsig sus nus kyis/_de ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na ni chen po de bshig la chung ngur bskyungs te bgyi'o zhes smras pa dang /_de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de ste rtsig mi nus na

[\[175a\]]
[\[175a.1\]]gzhan zhig gis yang mchod rten chung ngu zhig rtsig tu zhugs pa las phyed tsam zin pa dang de dus 'das so/_/de'i bu yang khyim gyi bdag por gyur nas dge slong dag gis de la bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]khyod kyi phas mchod rten rtsig tu zhugs pa las phyed tsam zin pa dang 
[\[175a.2\]]de'ang dus las 'das na/_da khyod kyis mjug sgrubs shig ces smras pa dang /_de yang rab tu dad pa zhig ste/_bdag ni cher dad pa lags kyis/_de ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na bdag gis cher bskyed par bgyi'o zhes smras pa dang /_de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom 
[\[175a.3\]]ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de ste chung ngu bshig ste chen por byed nus na gnang gis byos shig_/de la the tshom du ma byed cig_/mchod rten dang gdugs rnyings shing zhig pa yang de bzhin no/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis chos shig ces bka' 
[\[175a.4\]]stsal pa dang /_gzhan zhig gis gdugs phab nas slar ma bsgrubs kyi bar du dus 'das pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rjes ma ma zin gyi bar du snga ma dbab par ma byed cig_/de bzhin du sku gzugs 'jim pa la byas pa dag rnyings nas/_dge 
[\[175a.5\]]slong dag the tshom skyes nas ma byas pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de dang 'dra ba'am/_de las lhag par ni byos shig_/chung ngu ni ma yin no/_/de bzhin du ri mor bris pa dag kyang ri mo byed pa dang /_dge slong dag the tshom skyes nas ri mor ma bris nas/_
[\[175a.6\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_byid na de nyid kyi rgyud slar bris shig_/de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi bka'i glegs bam dag byid par gyur nas/_dge slong dag gis the tshom skyes nas ma bris pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_byid na sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[175a.7\]]bka' slar bris shig_/de la the tshom du ma byed cig_/rkyang pa'i sgo gnyis pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa bzhi pa'o//_//'dul ba gzhung dam pa/_bam po bzhi bcu rtsa gcig pa/_mdor na/_gsar bus 'jug par bya ba dang /_/'khor rnams rnam pa lnga yis 
[\[175b\]]
[\[175b.1\]]dang /_/yon dang snod dang rol mo dang /_/dge bsnyen dag ni bsgrags pa'o/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzam bu'i grib ma na bzhugs pa'i sku gzugs la dus kyi mchod rten chen po dang bcas par byos la/_grong khyer gyi nang du bkur bar gyis 
[\[175b.2\]]shig ces bka' stsal pa dang /_dge slong dag gis sus bkur bar mi shes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong gzhon nu dag gis khyer cig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gzhon nu dag gis khyer cig par bka' stsal pa dang /_de 'khor med 
[\[175b.3\]]par gyur pas na mi mdzes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge slob ma dang /_dge tshul dang /_dge tshul ma'i 'khor lnga dang chos shig_/dad pa'i bram ze dang khyim bdag gis yon phul na sus kyang ma blangs pa dang /_bcom 
[\[175b.4\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag gis blang bar byos shig_/gzhon nus blang ngam rgan po rnams kyis blang ba de dag gis ma shes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rgan po rnams kyis long shig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge 
[\[175b.5\]]slong de dag gis bkur bar byos shig dang /_dge slong gnas brtan dag gis khyer te ngal bar gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong gnas brtan dag gis bsrungs la gzhan gyis bkur bar gyis shig_/dge slong dag gis rol mo med 
[\[175b.6\]]par dong ba dang /_khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na ni sku gzugs gshegs pa'i tshe bdag gis rol mo sbyar ro zhes smras pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_khyim bdag de ltar na gnang gis sbyor cig_/sangs rgyas 
[\[175b.7\]]bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pA lis zhus pa/_btsun pa dge slong rol mo bgyir rung ngam/_u pA li mi rung ngo /_/nam mchod pa'i dus na 'di skad du bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ston pa la mchod par byos shig ces sgo shig_/rkyang pa'i sgo gnyis pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa 
[\[176a\]]
[\[176a.1\]]lnga pa'o//_//mdor na/_sgrogs par byed dang snod sbed dang /_/shing rta tha dad byed pa dang /_/snod rnams bged pa dad pa dang /_/mdo'i tshigs su bcad par brjod pa'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa na dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas 
[\[176a.2\]]sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dus ston chen po gyis la shing 'dzam bu'i grib ma na bzhugs pa'i sku gzugs grong khyer du gshegs par rgyas par byos shig ces bka' stsal pa dang /_dge slong dag gis bram ze dang khyim bdag dag la ma 
[\[176a.3\]]sbran par dong ngo /_/de dag gis e ma'o 'phags pa dag nged cag la sngar sbran na ni nged kyis yon rnams sta gon bya ba zhig ces smras pa dang /_de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_zhag bdun 
[\[176a.4\]]nam brgyad kyi snga rol nas dus kyi mchod ston chen po byed do zhes grong khyer dang /_tshong dus dang /_srang dang /_lam dang /_lam gyi bzhi mdo dag tu bsgrag par byos shig_/de dag gis dus ston no dus ston no zhes bsgrags pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_zhag dus 
[\[176a.5\]]thob la zhag 'di snyed cig na dus ston byed do zhes sbron cig_/de ltar byas kyang 'jig rten thams cad kyis ma thos nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gro ga la bris la bal glang gi steng du zhog ste/_tshong dus dang /_srang dang /_lam dang /_lam gyi bzhi mdo 
[\[176a.6\]]dag tu bsgrags par gyis shig_/gang gi nyin mo bcom ldan 'das kyi dus ston chen po byed pa na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gnas brtan dang /_gnas brtan dag gis ni yon rnams srung shig_/gzhon nu rnams kyis ni khyer cig ces bka' stsal pa dang /_des 
[\[176a.7\]]khyer te bab bab tu bor ba dang /_ma byin par len pa dag gis brkus nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_snod spyad sbed pa'i dge slong skos shig_/bsko ba ni 'di ltar bsko'o/_/stan bting la gaN+DI brdungs shing dris pa la lan glon pa'i dge slong bskos te/_
[\[176b\]]
[\[176b.1\]]dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams tshogs shing 'khod pa dang /_sngar ni dad par byos shig_/khyod ming 'di zhes bya ba dge 'dun gyi snod sbed par bsko na dad dam zhes dris te/_dad na des kyang dad do zhes smros shig_/de'i 'og tu dge slong cig gis gsol pa dang las byos shig_/
[\[176b.2\]]gson cig btsun pa'i dge 'dun rnams/_ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi snod sbed par dad na/_de ste de dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang shig dang ming 'di zhes bgyi ba snod sbed par bskos te/_snod sbed pa ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge 'dun 
[\[176b.3\]]gyi snod sbed de/_'di ni gsol ba'o/_/las kyang 'di ltar bya ste/_gson cig btsun pa'i dge 'dun rnams ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi snod sbed par dad de/_dge 'dun gyis ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di snod sbed par bsko ste ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi 
[\[176b.4\]]snod sbed na tshe dang ldan pa'i rnams las gang la ming 'di zhes bgyi ba snod sbed du bsko bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig_/gang la mi bzod pa dag ni smros shig_/dge 'dun gyis ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di snod sbed par bsko ste/_dge 'dun gyis bzod cing 
[\[176b.5\]]gnang bas na cang mi gsung ste/_de de bzhin du 'dzin to/_/der yang rnyed pa dag mang du byung nas dge slong ma dag gis 'phags pa dag bdag cag la rnyed pa'i skal ba stsol cig ces smras kyang dge slong dag gis ma byin no/_/de dag gis phyi de nyin mo shing rta gzhan zhig 
[\[176b.6\]]bshams pa dang /_bram ze dang khyim bdag dag gis 'phags ma dag shing rta 'di nyid dam 'on te gzhan zhig ces dris na/_dge slong ma de dag gis kyang rnyed pa mang du gyur to/_/dge slong ma dag gis rnyed pa dang bkur sti la ngoms par gyur pa dge slong dag gis mthong 
[\[176b.7\]]nas 'phags pa khyed kyis kho mo cag la rnyed pa ma byin mod kyi/_bdag cag gis kyang shing rta logs shig tu bshams pas bdag cag la yang rnyed pa mang du thob par gyur to zhes smras pa dang /_de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/_bcom 
[\[177a\]]
[\[177a.1\]]ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_dge slong dag gang nyes pa'i dmigs su gyur pa ni dge slong ma dag gis dus ston gyi tshe shing rta gud du bshams pas de bas na dge slong dang dge slong ma dag gis shing rta logs shig tu mi bsham par dgongs nas/_
[\[177a.2\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag dge slong mas ni mi rigs par byas te/_de bas na dge slong mas dus ston gyi tshe shing rta logs shig tu ma shom shig_/dge slong ma dag gis dus ston gyi tshe shing rta logs shig tu bshams na dbyen byas pa dang /_
[\[177a.3\]]nye ba'i nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/snod de dag de bzhin du 'dug pa dang dge slong dag gis ji ltar bya ba mi shes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bgos shig ces gsungs pa dang /_de dag ji ltar bgo ba mi shes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_snod bged pa'i 
[\[177a.4\]]dge slong cig sko shig_/bsko ba ni 'di ltar bya'o/_/stan thing ste gaN+DI rdungs la dris pa la lan glon pa'i dge slong skos la dge 'dun thams cad 'dus te 'khod pa dang sngar dad par byos shig_/khyod dge 'dun gyi snod bged par bskon dad dam zhes dris la/_de ste dad do zhes zer na de'i 'og 
[\[177a.5\]]tu dge slong gcig gis gsol pa dang las byos shig_/gson cig btsun pa'i dge slong rnams/_snod bged pa ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi snod bged par dad na/_de ste dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na/_dge 'dun gyis gnang la dge 'dun gyis ming 'di 
[\[177a.6\]]zhes bgyi ba 'di snod bged par skos shig_/ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge 'dun gyi snod bged de 'di ni gsol ba'o/_/las kyang 'di ltar byos shig_/gson cig btsun pa'i dge 'dun rnams ming 'di zhes bgyi ba snod bged par dad nas dge 'dun gyi snod bged de/_dge 'dun 
[\[177a.7\]]gyis ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge 'dun gyi snod bged par tshe dang ldan pa rnams gang bzod pa ni cang ma gsung shig_/mi bzod pa ni smros shig_/dge 'dun gyis ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di snod bged par bskos te/_dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang bas na cang mi gsung ste de de bzhin 
[\[177b\]]
[\[177b.1\]]du 'dzin to/_/rkyang pa'i sgo gnyis kyi mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa drug pa'o//_//mdo bar ma ste/_rnam pa tha dad byas dang yon/_/gang gi tshe na gcig las lhag_/gang gi tshe na gnyis las gcig_/bdag gir bya bar mi rung ngo /_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[177b.2\]]mnyan du yod pa'i dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/gang gi tshe dus ston chen po byung ba na rnyed pa mang po dang ldan par gyur nas/_dge slong dag gis ji ltar bya ba'i thabs mi shes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gos 
[\[177b.3\]]sbed pa'i dge slong gis stan thing la gaN+DI brdungs te dris pa la lan glon pa'i dge slong bskos la dge 'dun thams cad 'dus shing 'khod pa'i nang du btsong bar bya'o/_/de dag gis sus rin thang gdab par ma shes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge 'dun gyi 
[\[177b.4\]]gnas brtan gyis thob shig_/de dag gis de nyid nyor bcug pa dang /_de nyid la nyor ma gzhug shig_/dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis rin cher btab ste sus kyang ma nyos nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_cher ma gdab shig ces gsungs pa dang shin tu chung 
[\[177b.5\]]ngu btab bo/_/shin tu chung ngu yang ma gdab par ran par thob shig_/gang gis thog mar rin thang bskyed pa de nyid nyor chug ces smras pa dang de la ma btsong bar gang gi tshe rin thang sus kyang ma bskyed na gdod de nyid la tshong shig_/drug sde dag gis rin cher btab ste 
[\[177b.6\]]rin cher bslangs na dge 'dun gyi don gyi phyir nged kyis rin thang bskyed do zhes smras pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gang nyo ba des rin thang skyed cig_/gzhan gyis rin thang bskyed na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/_/drug sde dag gis rin thang bskyed de 
[\[177b.7\]]nyos nas bkrus shing bgos so/_/rin len pa la de nyid slar byin no/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rin ma 'ongs kyi bar du de la ma sbyin cig_/rin ma byin par bgos na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/_/rkyang pa'i sgo gnyis kyi mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa bdun pa'o//_//
[\[178a\]]
[\[178a.1\]]mdor na/_gtsug lag khang ni zhig pa dang /_/lci ba'i phyir ni dben par bya/_/nam zhig 'jigs par gyur pa na/_/skad cig brnya ba dge 'dun gyi/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na 
[\[178a.2\]]bzhugs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag gnas khang lnga rtseg tu byos shig_/dri gtsang khang ni bdun rtseg sgo khang yang bdun rtseg tu byos shig ces bka' stsal to/_/dge slong ma'i gnas khang ni sum rtseg go/_/dri gtsang khang ni lnga rtseg go/_/sgo khang 
[\[178a.3\]]yang lnga rtseg go/_/steng gi lcid kyis rtsig pa 'jig tu byed de/_de ltar gyur pa dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_steng ma'i rim gcig phri shig_/'on kyang 'jig par gyur pa dang /_bcom ldan 
[\[178a.4\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de bzhin du rim gnyis nas bzhi'i bar du phri la 'og khang gcig pu zhog shig_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/_dge slong rnams la 'jigs pa dag byung nas/_gtsug lag khang stong par byas te/_dge 'dun gyi mal stan 
[\[178a.5\]]yang bor nas bros te dong ba dang /_ma byin par len pa dag gis brkus so/_/brkus pas dge slong dag phongs par gyur to/_/de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge 'dun gyi mal 
[\[178a.6\]]stan bor te ma 'dong shig_/gang du dong ba der khyer cig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis gang du 'dong bar khyer cig ces bka' stsal pa dang /_dge slong zhig gis bgo ba dag khyer te dge slong dag dang lhan cig tu bros te dong ba dang /_de na nub mo dge slong zhig gis tshe dang 
[\[178a.7\]]ldan pa 'di ni dge 'dun gyi nang na nga ni rgan te ji ltar rgan rims su dbang ngo zhes smras pa dang de byin no/_/des de byin nas ji tsam nam nangs pa dang /_des bsgo ba 'dis khyer cig ces smras pa dang /_des smras pa gang gi tshe bsgo bar bgos pa de'i tshe na ni khyod rgan pos 
[\[178b\]]
[\[178b.1\]]khyer la da bkur ba'i tshe ni nga la sbyin nam khyod nyid khyer cig_/de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gang gis 'jigs pa'i tshe khyer khyer ba de nyid kyi'o/_/gang gi tshe 'jigs pa med par gyur na yang 
[\[178b.2\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang ngo zhes slar ma phul ba dang /_de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag re zhig ngas dge 'dun gyi mal stan dag gnang gi gtan du ni ma yin gyi/_'jigs pa 
[\[178b.3\]]dang bral na slar phul la rgan rims su byin cig_/rkyang pa'i sgo gnyis kyi mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa brgyad pa'o//_//mdor na/_dze ta'i tshal du mchod ston tshe/_/rnga chen gyis ni 'du bar bya/_/gral ni chol bar 'khod pa dang /_/dge slong las ni zhal tar bsko/_/sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[178b.4\]]ldan 'das dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te/_khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin pas bcom ldan 'das la de ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na bdag gis dus ston chen po bgyi'o zhes gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[178b.5\]]khyim bdag ngas gnang gis byos shig_/de dze ta'i tshal du dus ston byas pa dang /_dge slong dag ma 'dus par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mchod ston chen po byed na gaN+DI dang /_rnga dang /_dung bus shig dang /_dge slong dag gdugs tshod la bab par dus rig par 'gyur 
[\[178b.6\]]ro zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_dge slong dag rnga dang dung dag gi sgras brdegs na chol bar 'khod do/_/de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong las zhal ta ba bskos te ci nas rgan rims su 'khod 
[\[178b.7\]]cig_/ji ltar rgan rims su 'khod pa dang /_nam zas dag rgan rims nas brims te/_gzhon nu'i gan du phyin tsam nas gdugs tshod kyang yol te/_dge slong dag zas kyi bar chad du gyur to/_/de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_
[\[179a\]]
[\[179a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lnga brgya phreng du gyis la kha zas ni rgan rims kyi mdun du zhog shig_/dge slong dag gis de bzhin du byas pa dang khyim bdag ni bza' ba 'brim pa la rku'o/_/de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 
[\[179a.2\]]'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'brim pa'i spyan pa dge slong skos shig_/de dag kyang kha zas kyi bar chad du gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de dag sngar zan byin la phyis zhal ta byed du chug shig_/rkyang pa'i 
[\[179a.3\]]sgo gnyis pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa dgu pa'o//_//mdor na/_dge slong ma ni mang du gyur/_/dge slong dang po yi rang dang /_/gcig dang gnyis dang mang po dang /_/bu chung rab tu dgar gyur pa'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi 
[\[179a.4\]]kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te/_ri brags kyi grong gzhan zhig na khyim bdag zhig gnas pa des dge slong ma mang zhig bshos la spyan drangs nas ji tsam zhig na dge slong gcig cig 'gron pa mang po dang lhan cig tu ljongs rgyu ba spyod cing ri brags kyi grong der phyin pa dang /_de der 
[\[179a.5\]]bsod snyoms la zhugs na de na gzhan zhig gis de la 'phags pa khyim 'di na dge slong ma dag bshos gsol zhing 'khod kyis der bzhud cig ces smras pa dang /_de yang der song nas dge 'dun ma'i gnas brtan sbom mo dga' ldan 'dug ste/_des 'phags pa de ste sbyin 
[\[179a.6\]]pa'i yon tan brjod nus na ni rgan rims su bzhugs shig_/de ste mi nus na phyogs gcig tu bshos bsnoms la bzhud cig ces smras pa dang /_de skyengs nas des bsams pa de ste bdag gis sbyin pa'i yon tan brjod kyi bar du 'dug na ni 'gron pa mang po dag kyang dong bar 
[\[179a.7\]]'gyur gyis phyogs gcig tu zan zos te 'gro'o snyam nas phyogs gcig tu zan zos te song ngo /_/rim bzhin du mnyan du yod par phyin pa dang /_dge slong dag gis tshe dang ldan pa bde bar 'ongs sam/_ci bde bar spyad dam zhes smras pa dang /_des smras pa/_ga la zhig 
[\[179b\]]
[\[179b.1\]]bde bar spyad/_dge slong mas kyal ka byas so/_/de ji ltar byas zhes smras pa dang /_de ltar gyur pa rgyas par dge slong dag la smras so/_/dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gang na dge slong gcig dang 
[\[179b.2\]]dge slong ma gcig gnas pa de na dge slong de gral kyang dang po/_chu yang dang po/_zan yang dang por zo shig_/gang na dge slong ma gnyis sam/_gsum mam/_de las lhag pa zhig la dge slong gcig cig 'ongs na dge slong gcig pu de stan yang dang po/_chu yang dang po/_
[\[179b.3\]]zan yang dang por zo shig_/gang de ste dge slong ma dag 'ba' zhig na yang rtag tu gral gyi dang por stan cig lhag par zhog la 'khod cig de ste dge tshul pha zhig 'ongs na yang de der 'dug la zo shig_/de ste des mi nus par gyur na yang dge slong mas sbyin pa'i yon tan lhogs 
[\[179b.4\]]shig_/dge slong mas de ltar ma byas na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/_khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin pas dze ta'i tshal du dus ston chen po byas nas bu dang chung ma dge 'dun la yon du phul ba dang /_dge slong dag gis ji 
[\[179b.5\]]ltar bya ba mi shes nas/_de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_khyim bdag la dris shig_/dris pa dang /_pha des smras pa/_'phags pa dag rin thang chod cig dang bdag gis glung gsol lo/_/
[\[179b.6\]]drug sde dag gis de la 'gran cing spel ba la zhugs pa dang /_de'i nang nas chung ma bu chung ngu ma can gyis khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi rkang pa la btud de jo bo bdag gi bu chung gis bdag ma gtang shig ces smras pa dang /_de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das
