[\[179b.7\]]la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag sems can gyi nang na bud med las snying chung ba med kyis 'jigs par ma bya shig_/de bas dge slong gis bud med kyi rin thang ma gcod cig_/bcad na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/_/sbyin 
[\[180a\]]
[\[180a.1\]]bdag gis ji ltar dga' zhing dga' ste byin bzhin du longs shig_/rkyang pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa bcu pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//mdor bsdus par na/_yo byad bus pa blun pa dang /_/gang gi ba dang de yi ste/_/de ltar khye'u las bslang mi bya/_/mgon med 
[\[180a.2\]]zas sbyin de bzhin te/_/spu gri dang ni 'khor rnams dang /_/chu dang bsdus par gsungs pa'o/_/mdor na/_yo byad rnams dang gnang ba dang /_/u pA lis ni dris pa ste/_/ji ltar byin gyis brlab par bya/_/yid gcugs tshigs bcad mdor gsungs pa'o/_/sangs 
[\[180a.3\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa na dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te/_dge slong dag ljongs rgyu ba spyod pa na na bar gyur te/_kha cig la sman med nas lhung bzed btsongs kyang khyim bdag gis ma nyos nas dus 'das par gyur to/_/de ltar 
[\[180a.4\]]gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na gnang gis yo byad dang gos chongs shig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis yo byad dang gos chongs shig ces gsungs pa dang /_dge slong dag gis bkrus nas 
[\[180a.5\]]kha bsgyur te bcangs pa dang rin chung ngur gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_ma bkrus kha ma bsgyur/_sar pa btags ma thag chongs shig_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pA lis zhus pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong 
[\[180a.6\]]dag gis yo byad bcu gsum chongs shig ces bka' stsal ni ji ltar byin gyis brlab par bgyi/_u pA li so sor byin gyis brlab par bya ste/_chos gos 'di ni sbyar mar byin gyis brlab ste/_bya ba zin pa yongs su spyad pa'o/_/de bzhin du stod g.yogs dang mthang gos 
[\[180a.7\]]dang /_sham thabs dang /_sham thabs kyi 'theb dang /_stod chags dang /_stod chags kyi 'theb dang /_gdong phyis dang /_lus phyi ba dang /_g.yan pa'i gos dang /_skra bzed dang /_g.yogs ma dang /_ras chen te gos 'di ni yo byad kyi gos su byin gyis brlabs 
[\[180b\]]
[\[180b.1\]]te/_na ba la dgos te bdag dang tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa'i phyir byin gyis brlab bo/_/yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pA lis zhus pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis yo byad bcu gsum byin gyis rlobs shig ces bka' stsal na/_de las lhag 
[\[180b.2\]]pa'i gos rnams ji ltar bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_u pA li de ni slob dpon dang /_mkhan po dang /_yid gcugs pa rnams la bsngos la bcang bar bya ste/_de yang 'di ltar bsngo bar bya'o/_/dge slong gcig gi mdun du 'dug la 'di skad smros shig_/
[\[180b.3\]]dgongs shig tshe dang ldan pa bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la gos 'di lhag par bsngo ste/_bsngo ba'i rigs pas na mkhan po la bsngo ste/_mkhan po yid bcugs pas bcang bar bgyi'o/_/de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du brjod par bya'o/_/rkyang pa'i nang na sgo gsum 
[\[180b.4\]]pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa dang po'o//_//mdor na/_bus pa blun la sogs shes pa/_/bcu gnyis kyi ni gang zag dang /_/de bzhin rnam par dbye ba dang /_/tshul bzhin pa ni gsum pa'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa na dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas 
[\[180b.5\]]sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pA lis zhus pa/_btsun pa gang zag du'i slar bzlog pa mi brtsan/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_u pA li bcu gnyis te/_bus pa dang /_blun po dang /_mi gsal ba dang /_
[\[180b.6\]]mi mkhas pa dang /_ngo tsha med pa dang /_khon du 'dzin pa dang /_mtshams kyi phyi rol na 'dug pa dang /_spangs pa dang /_tshig mi brtan pa dang /_spyod lam las 'gal ba dang /_tshul bzhin du mi gnas pa dang /_bslab pa byin pa'o/_/yang zhus pa btsun pa ji tsam gyis 
[\[180b.7\]]na byis pa lta bu nas ji tsam gyis na bslab pa stsal ba'i bar du lags/_u pA li gang log par bsam pa sems pa dang /_log par smra ba log par smra ba dang /_bzlog dka' bar bzlog pa yin te/_u pA li da ltar bgyis par 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa ji tsam na glen 
[\[181a\]]
[\[181a.1\]]pa lags/_mdo sde mi 'dzin pa/_'dul ba mi 'dzin pa/_ma lta bu mi 'dzin pa ste/_'di tsam gyis na/_u pA li glen pa yin no/_/btsun pa ji tsam gyis na mi gsal ba lags/_u pA li gang mdo sde yang 'dzin/_'dul ba yang 'dzin/_ma lta bu yang 
[\[181a.2\]]'dzin mod kyi/_'on kyang mdo sde dang /_'dul ba dang /_chos mngon du bya ba'i don mi shes pa ste/_'di tsam gyis na u pA li mi gsal ba yin no/_/btsun pa ji tsam gyis na mi mkhas pa lags/_u pA li gang mdo sde dang /_'dul ba dang /_ma lta bu yang 'dzin/_de 
[\[181a.3\]]dag gi don kyang shes mod kyi/_gzhan shes par byed mi nus pa ni u pA li mi mkhas pa ste/_'di tsam gyis na u pA li mi mkhas pa yin no/_/btsun pa ji tsam gyis na ngo tsha med pa lags/_u pA li de ni phas pham pa bzhi las gang yang rung nyes pa byung bar gyur pa ste/_u 
[\[181a.4\]]pA li de ni ngo tsha med par gyur pa'o/_/btsun pa ji tsam gyis na khon du 'dzin pa lags/_u pA li de khro ba dang /_thab mo dang /_gzhan yang gang dang gang du 'thab pa'i sgor gyur pa ste/_u pA li de tsam gyis na khon du 'dzin pa'o/_/btsun pa ji tsam gyis na mtshams kyi slad rol na 
[\[181a.5\]]mchis pa lags/_de ni u pA li dge slong gi mtshams kyi phyi rol na 'dug pa ste/_u pA li de tsam gyis na mtshams kyi phyi rol na 'dug pa'o/_/btsun pa ji tsam gyis na spangs pa lags/_u pA li de ni dge 'dun gyis gsol pa dang bzhi'i las kyis spangs pa ste/_u pA li 
[\[181a.6\]]de tsam gyis na spangs par gyur pa zhes bya'o/_/btsun pa ji tsam gyis na tshig mi brtan par gyur pa lags/_u pA li de ni tshig mi brtan par gyur pa dang /[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba dang /_phra ma dang /_tshig rtsub po dang /_tshig khyal par smra ba'o/_/u pA li de tsam gyis na tshig mi 
[\[181a.7\]]brtan par gyur pa'o/_/btsun pa ji tsam gyis na spyod lam las gal bar gyur pa lags/_u pA li de ni dge 'dun gyi nang nas langs te song ba'o/_/u pA li de ltar na spyod lam las gal bar gyur pa'o/_/btsun pa ji tsam gyis na tshul bzhin la mi gnas par gyur pa zhes 
[\[181b\]]
[\[181b.1\]]bgyi/_u pA li de ni mi spyod pa ni spyod dge slong gi bslab pa la mi slob pa'o/_/u pA li de tsam gyis na tshul bzhin la mi gnas par gyur pa zhes bya'o/_/btsun pa ji tsam gyis na bslab pa stsal bar gyur pa zhes bgyi/_u pA li de ni dge slong la dge 'dun gyis gsol ba 
[\[181b.2\]]dang bzhi'i las kyis nam 'tsho'i bar du bslab pa byin par gyur pa ste/_u pA li de lta bu ni bslab pa byin par gyur pa'o/_/yang gsol pa/_btsun pa ji tsam gyis na gang zag gis slar bzlog pa la brtsan pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_u pA li rnam pa gsum 
[\[181b.3\]]ste/_tshul bzhin la gnas pa dang /_tshig brtan pa dang /_spyod lam las ma gal ba'o/_/rkyang pa'i sgo gsum pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa gnyis pa'o//_//mdor na/_gang gi phyir ni bya ba dang /_/gang zag kyang ni bcu gnyis ni/_/bsnyen par rdzogs par byed pa dang /_/
[\[181b.4\]]khyim pa yin par khas blangs pa'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pA lis zhus pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis gang la las bya ba de'i slar bzlog 
[\[181b.5\]]pa mi brtsan no zhes bka' stsal na/_btsun pa gang zag bcu gnyis so sor bsgo ba'i tshe de dag 'di skad du mchi ste/_tshe dang ldan pa dag nged cag la ni ma sgo shig ces mchi na ci de dag gis slar bzlog pa yang mi brtsan nam/_u pA li brtsan no/_/de'i chad pa'i las la ngas dgongs te 
[\[181b.6\]]gsungs so/_/btsun pa bsnyen par rdzogs par bgyid pa khyim pa lags par khas blangs na bsnyen par rdzogs pa zhes bgyi'am bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa zhes bgyi/_u pA li bsnyen par rdzogs par zin kyang khyim pa yin par khas blangs na/_de yang bsnyen par ma rdzogs 
[\[181b.7\]]pa zhes bya na bsnyen par rdzogs par byed pa'i tshe lta smos kyang ci dgos/_rkyang pa'i sgo gsum pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa gsum pa'o//_//mdor na/_tshil bu dag ni mi rung ba/_/lnga po gang gis rkang mi bsku/_/dbang phyug bsgrag par bya ba dang /_/zhing gi dngos po dge 
[\[182a\]]
[\[182a.1\]]'dun gyi'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis mi rung ba rnam pa lnga'i lham ma 'chang shig ces bka' stsal pa dang /_drug sde dag gis mi rung ba rnam pa 
[\[182a.2\]]lnga po de dag gi tshil bus rkang pa byugs nas yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi bal glang gi drung du dong ste/_rdzi phyogs su 'khod pa dang /_bal glang dag gis dri tshor nas bros pa dang /_de dag gis tshe dang ldan pa dag zung shig ces smras pa dang /_de dag gis smras pa/_
[\[182a.3\]]bdag cag gis gzung bar mi nus so/_/bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]nged kyis gzung ngam/_'phags pa dag zung shig nged la ci sbyin/_bca' ba'i rin sbyin no/_/des de dag gi mdun du song ste rdzi mi ldang ba'i phyogs su 'dug pa dang /_bal glang de dag kyang 'khod do/_/de dag gis 
[\[182a.4\]]smras pa/_'phags pa dag ci khyed rig pa mkhyen nam/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]nged rig pa mi shes mod kyi/_nged kyi bal glang cang shes kyi tshil bus rkang pa bskus pas so/_/'phags pa dag rgyal po'i bal glang mchog dag bros par gyur nas/_khyed kyis rgyal po la gnod 
[\[182a.5\]]pa byas par mi 'gyur ram zhes smras nas de dag nyes pa ngor brjod cing 'phyas 'dogs te mi snyan par zer ro/_/de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag gis bal glang cang shes kyi tshil 
[\[182a.6\]]gyis rkang pa byug par ma byed cig_/dge slong gis bal glang cang shes kyi tshil gyis rkang pa la byug na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/_/ji ltar bal glang cang shes pa bzhin du rta cang shes dang /_seng ge dang /_stag dang /_gzig la sogs pa rgyas par brjod par 
[\[182a.7\]]bya'o/_/gleng gzhi ni rgyal po'i khab na ste/_de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo gang na ba der song ste drung du phyin pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 
[\[182b\]]
[\[182b.1\]]'dug nas rgyal po gzugs can snying pos tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'phags pa kun dga' bo seng ge'i gdan bshams pa 'di ci zhig bgyi ci deng chos bsgrags sam/_de'i tshe gso sbyin gyi dus la bab ste/_de rgyal po chen po dge slong gis 
[\[182b.2\]]mtshungs par bzung ba lags kyi khyim pas mtshungs par bzung ba ma lags so/_/zhes smras pa dang /_rgyal pos rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te song ngo /_/mkhyen bzhin du 'dri ba ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun 
[\[182b.3\]]dga' bo la ci'i phyir rgyal po chos ma mnyan par song zhes smras pa dang /_de ltar gyur pa bcom ldan 'das la zhib mor gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo khyod kyis nyes so/_/de ste rgyal po gzugs can snying po so sor thar pa thos par 
[\[182b.4\]]gyur na nges par de sdon pas kyang mngon du dga' bar 'gyur te/_dga' nas dga' ba'i dbang gis bya ba byed du gdon mi za'o/_/de bas na ngas gnang gis 'di 'dra ba'i skyes bu dam pa dad pa de dag la ni thos par gyis shig_/gzhan yang rab tu phyug la ma dad/_dbul la rab 
[\[182b.5\]]tu dad de/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bu dag la'ang thos par gyis shig_/gang gi tshe tshe dang ldan pa gro zhin bye ba nyi shu pa zhes bya ba skya bo bseng bseng po skem zhing rid la rmya zhing lus nyam chung bar gyur pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis gzigs te/_tshe dang 
[\[182b.6\]]ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo ci'i phyir na gro zhin bye ba nyi shu pa zhes bya ba skya bo bseng bseng po skem zhing rid la rmya zhing nyam chung bar gyur/_des bcom ldan 'das de dang po btsas nas thug pa 'ba' zhig gis lus bskyed pa lags so zhes gsol 
[\[182b.7\]]pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo de lta bas na ngas gnang gis gro zhin bye ba nyi shu pa la thug pa lud cig_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos gro zhin bye ba nyi shu pa la tshe dang ldan pa gro zhin bcom ldan 'das kyis khyod ni thug pa 'thung 
[\[183a\]]
[\[183a.1\]]shig par gnang ngo zhes bsgo ba dang /_des smras pa/_btsun pa kun dga' bo bdag gcig pu la'am/_de ste dge 'dun thams cad des smras pa/_khyod gcig pu'o/_/btsun pa kun dga' bo 'dis glengs pas na tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa 
[\[183a.2\]]dag gis kyang 'di skad du gro zhin bye ba nyi shu pa bstan pa la rab tu byung nas sngon grong khyer tsam pa na lo legs par gyur pa'i tshe/_bal glang bdun gyis drang ba yang spangs te rab tu byung na da thug pa tsam la yang chags so zhes zer gyis/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi phyir 
[\[183a.3\]]dge 'dun thams cad kyang thug pa gnang na bdag kyang gzod 'tshal bar bgyi'o zhes gsol pa dang /_de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de ltar na gnang gis gro zhin bye ba nyi shu pa'i phyir dge 
[\[183a.4\]]'dun thams cad kyang thug pa 'thung shig_/gang gi tshe rgyal po gzugs can snying po bcom ldan 'das kyis dge 'dun rnams thug pa 'thung bar gnang ngo zhes thos nas des dge 'dun la sa bon bum pa stong gis btab pa'i zhing dag phul ba dang /_dge slong dag gis ma 
[\[183a.5\]]blangs nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge 'dun gyi phyir na blang bar bya ste de la the tshom du ma byed cig_/de bas na zhing las byung ba rnams dge 'dun gyis spyad par gyis shig_/rkyang pa'i sgo gsum pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa bzhi pa'o//_//mdor na/_
[\[183a.6\]]gding dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa dang /_/dge tshul pha dang gsar bu dang /_/snyoms zhugs dang ni mi gnang ba/_/bslab pa byin pa gnyis pa'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa na dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/sangs 
[\[183a.7\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pA lis zhus pa/_btsun pa dge slong dang khyim pa gnyis lhan cig tu gding ba gcig la mchis su rung ngam/_u pA li de ni mi rung mod kyi/_de lta bu'i rkyen cig byung na gnang ngo /_/btsun pa dge tshul pha dang /_dge slong gsar bu dang /_
[\[183b\]]
[\[183b.1\]]ma ning dang /_za ma dang /_dge slong ma sun phyung ba dang /_pha bsad pa dang /_ma bsad pa dang /_dgra bcom pa bsad pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa la ngan sems kyis khrag phyung ba dang /_mu stegs can dang /_mu stegs can du song ba dang /_
[\[183b.2\]]rkun gnas dang /_so sor gnas pa dang /_mi gnas pa dag la sogs pa dang gding ba gcig gi steng na lhan cig tu mchis par rung ngam/_u pA li de ltar ni mi rung mod kyi/_de lta bu'i rkyen cig byung na gnang ngo de bzhin du stan gcig gam/_khri gcig gam/_khri'u gcig gam/_
[\[183b.3\]]par tang gcig tu mi rung mod kyi/_de lta bu'i rkyen cig byung na rung ngo /_/btsun pa khyim pa dang stegs bu la stan bting ba'i steng na lhan cig tu mchis par rung ngam/_mi rung mod kyi/_de lta bu'i rkyen cig byung na rung ngo /_/par tang dag bting yang mi rung mod kyi de lta bu'i rkyen cig byung 
[\[183b.4\]]na par tang dag bting bar gyur pa'ang de bzhin no/_/de bzhin du dge tshul pha dang /_dge slong gsar bu nas so sor gnas pa'i bar du ste/_de bzhin du gnas la nyes pa'i dmigs ma byung gi bar du lhan cig tu 'dug na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa bslab 
[\[183b.5\]]pa stsal ba gnyis shig stan gcig gi steng na lhan cig mchis su rung ngam/_u pA li de ni mi rung ngo /_/rkyang pa'i sgo gsum pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa lnga pa'o//_//'dul ba gzhung dam pa/_bam po bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis pa/_mdor na/_mi bslang ba dang khri'u 
[\[183b.6\]]gcig_/brel bar gyur pa'ang de bzhin te/_/cung zad brel bar gyur pa dang /_/rtswa dang shing yang dge 'dun gyi'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs pa'i tshe/_dge slong dag khri'u'i 
[\[183b.7\]]steng na btso blag gi las byed cing 'dug pa dang /_drug sde dag de nyid du 'dug cing gnod par byed de/_de dag brel bzhin du bslang ba dang de dag la gnod par gyur nas/_de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[184a\]]
[\[184a.1\]]bka' stsal pa/_dge slong btso blag gi las byed cing brel ba la dge slong dag gis ma bslang shig_/bslang na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/_dge slong dag zas za zhing 'khod pa rnams la drug sde dag 
[\[184a.2\]]gis rgan rims bzhin du bya'o zhes bslang ba dang /_dge slong dag ldang du ma btub nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_ji ltar rgan rims bzhin du 'dug shig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar rgan rims bzhin du 'dug shig ces bka' stsal pa dang /_
[\[184a.3\]]drug sde dag phyis 'ongs nas dge slong snga ma zas za zhing brel ba dag bslang ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong gis dge slong zas za zhing brel ba dag ma bslang bar gud du 'dug par bya ste/_bslang na 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[184a.4\]]ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pA lis zhus pa/_btsun pa ji tsam gyis na dge slong dag zan za zhing brel ba zhes bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_chung ngu lan tshwa'am/_shang ce'am/_la phug kyang rung brims par gyur pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong 
[\[184a.5\]]zas za zhing brel ba la ma bslang shig ces bka' stsal pa dang /_drug sde dag rgan rims kyis dang por 'dug nas/_zas za zhing ched du brel bar byed pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag gis gral ma yin par 'dug la zas za zhing brel bar 
[\[184a.6\]]ma byed cig_/byas na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag gral rims la mkhas par gyis shig_/de las gzhan du na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/_/dge 'dun gyi btso blag gi bum pa dang /_gzhong khung dag dge slong gis blangs nas btso blag gi 
[\[184a.7\]]las byed pa dang /_drug sde dag gis tshe dang ldan pa dag nged rgan pas nged sngar dbang ngo zhes smras nas/_tshon rtsi dag pho ste khyer ba dang /_dge slong dag brel bar gyur nas/_de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[184b\]]
[\[184b.1\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag gis bum pa'am/_gzhong khung dag brel ba la ma blang bar bya ba rnams zin nas gdong long shig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag gis bum pa'am/_gzhong khung dag brel ba la ma bslang shig ces bka' stsal pa dang /_
[\[184b.2\]]drug sde dag gis bsams bzhin du snod rnams tshon cung zad tsam zhig gis brel bar byas te bzhag pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_tshon rtsi thams cad snod gcig gi nang du blugs la dgos na blang bar gyis shig_/dge slong gis snod dag gi nang du 
[\[184b.3\]]tshon rtsi cung zad kyis brel bar bya ste/_ma bzhag shig_/bzhag na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/_khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis dze ta'i tshal shing thags kyis bskor ba dang /_khyim bdag dag gis bcag cing bcag 
[\[184b.4\]]cing khyer nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_ma bkur cig ces bsgo shig_/de dag gis bsgo ba dang /_shing dang rtswa yang bor te dong ngo /_/de dag chud zos nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_spyad du mi rung ba dag ni tshang mang du skyol cig_/
[\[184b.5\]]lhag ma dag ni las gsar du byed pa la phul cig_/drug sde dag gis las gsar du byar rung ba'i shing dag gshegs nas mer bus te btso blag gi las byed pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_las gsar du byar rung ba'i shing dag ni ma bud cig_/bus 
[\[184b.6\]]na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/_/rkyang pa'i sgo gsum pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa drug pa'o//_//mdor na/_mgon med zas sbyin gyi ni rgyan/_/'dug pa blang bar mi bya'o/_/snod spyad lag na thogs pa dang /_/lham yang phyi bar bya ba'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[184b.7\]]'das mnyan du yod pa'i dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'das kyis de ste gnang na bdag gis dze ta'i tshal yang dbul bar bgyi'o zhes gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[185a\]]
[\[185a.1\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_khyim bdag ngas gnang gis phul cig_/des shing gang pho'i ming du bya ba la ni pho'i rgyan gyis brgyan/_gang mo'i ming du bya ba la ni mo'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang /_dge slong dag gis ji ltar bya ba mi shes nas/_de ltar gyur pa dge slong 
[\[185a.2\]]dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_khyim bdag nyid la dris shig_/de dag gis khyim bdag nyid la dris pa dang /_des smras pa/_'phags pa ji ltar bsngos pa de bzhin du mdzod cig_/de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag 
[\[185a.3\]]gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gang shing pho'i ming du bya ba dang /_gang shing mo'i ming du bya ba rnams kyi rgyan so sor bsdus la thum por byos te zhog shig_/nam dus ston gyi tshe yang de bzhin du brgyan par gyis shig_/
[\[185a.4\]]rtsig pa'i ni ri mo'i yo byad du byos shig_/bsro khang gi rtsig pa dang /_ka ba dag gi ni las gsar du byos shig_/de'i sa'i ni dge 'dun gyi snang mar byos shig_/nad pa'i sman khang gi rtsig pa dang /_ka ba'i de dag ni las gsar du byos shig_/de'i sa'i sman gyi yo byad 
[\[185a.5\]]byos shig_/tshang mang gi rtsig pa dang ka ba'i ni de dag las gsar du byos shig_/de'i sa'i ni dge 'dun gyi bshos su gyis shig_/chu gang gi rtsig pa dang /_ka ba'i las gsar du gyis shig_/de'i sa'i ni skom du brims shig_/dugs khang gi rtsig pa dang /_
[\[185a.6\]]ka ba'i ni de'i las gsar du gyis shig_/de'i sa'i ni dugs khang du gyis shig_/bkad sa'i khang pa'i rtsig pa dang /_ka ba dag gis ni las gsar du gyis shig_/de'i sa'i ni snum pa'i zong gyis shig_/khyams dang /_stegs bu dang /_'chag sa dang /_sgo 
[\[185a.7\]]khang dang /_yang thog gi rtsig pa dang /_ka ba dag gis ni las gsar du gyis shig_/de'i sa'i ni dge 'dun spyir bgos shig_/gang rdzing bu'i ba de ni phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi spyir zhog shig_/dge slong spong ba'i khang bu'i nang na 'dug cing dge ba'i 
[\[185b\]]
[\[185b.1\]]phyogs spyod pa dang /_drug sde dag der 'ongs nas nged rgan no zhes zer nas de dag bslang ste btang ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rgan rims so zhes dge slong gis dge slong 'khod pa la ma bslang shig_/bslang na 'das pa dang bcas par 
[\[185b.2\]]'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag bya ba byas nas stan las langs te 'chag cing 'dug bzhin du gzhan gyis stan blangs nas ma ster nas dge slong dag brel bar gyur to/_/de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[185b.3\]]bya ba byas nas stan las langs na stan ma 'dzin cig_/dge slong dag ring zhig tu stan las 'dug nas langs te 'chag pa dang /_de'i sar drug sde dag 'dug nas de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[185b.4\]]der ma 'dug shig_/langs te 'chag tu 'gro na yang de'i steng du chos gos sam/_pus 'khyud cig zhog la chogs shig_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/_dge slong dag snod rnams thogs bzhin du gtsug lag khang du 'ongs pa dang /_de nas dge slong gcig gis 
[\[185b.5\]]thogs bzhin du phyag byas pa dang /_de'i ril ba chag par gyur to/_/gzhan zhig kyang khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]ka ba la lham brdabs pa dang /_dge slong dag 'phya bar gyur nas de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[185b.6\]]stsal pa/_ngas dge slong lam du 'jug pa'i mtshungs par spyod pa'i chos bca'o/_/dge slong lam du 'jug pas chu mthong na lhung bzed dang chos gos phog ste phyogs gcig tu zhog la/_de nas gos dag kyang sprugs te khrus byos la/_de nas rkang pa dang /_lag pa khrus la 
[\[185b.7\]]chu yang chu chags kyis tshogs te ra da gsher bas lham phyis la de'i 'og tu lag pa bsnyal nas bla 'og gi bgo ba legs par gyon la spyod lam zhi bzhin gtsug lag khang du 'gro bar bya'o/_/de las gzhan du na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/_/rkyang pa'i sgo gsum 
[\[186a\]]
[\[186a.1\]]pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa bdun pa'o//_//mdor na/_spu gri'i bdar dang sen mo bcad/_/smang tsher rkang pa'i rten dang ni/_/bshang bar bya dang gci ba'i gnas/_/bya ba byas pa mi bcang ngo /_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dze ta'i 
[\[186a.2\]]tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge 'dun gyi phyir spu gri'i snod chongs shig ces bka' stsal pa dang /_drug sde dag gis dge 'dun gyi spu gri khyer te bya ba byas kyang spu gri blangs nas da dung bya ba yod ces zer nas spu gri ma ster ro/_/de ltar 
[\[186a.3\]]gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_spu gri bya ba byas nas ma 'chang shig_/bcangs na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/_/spu gri ji lta ba de bzhin du bdar dang /_sen mo bcad pa dang /_smang tsher dang /_rkang pa 
[\[186a.4\]]brten pa rnams so/_/drug sde de dag gis gci ba'i gnas su zhugs te bya ba byas kyang da dung yang slar 'jug go zhes smras nas/_dge slong lhags pa'i rnams 'jug tu mi ster to/_/de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[186a.5\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong gis gci ba'i gnas su zhugs te bya ba byas na dge slong dag la ma bgags shig bgags na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/_/bshang ba'i sar yang de bzhin no/_/rkyang pa'i sgo gsum pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa brgyad pa'o//_//mdor na/_
[\[186a.6\]]g.yog dang dus ston chen po dang /_/rnyog pa can gyi chu dang ni/_/phye las brdzis dang skyo ma dang /_/sder bsdus de bzhin bsgrags pa'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/khyim bdag mgon 
[\[186a.7\]]med zas sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'das kyis de ste gnang na bdag gis sen mo dang dbu skra'i mchod rten la dus ston chen po bgyi'o zhes gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de ltar na gnang gis gyis shig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod 
[\[186b\]]
[\[186b.1\]]rten la dus ston gsol cig ces bka' stsal pa dang /_dge slong dag dus ston chen po'i tshe 'dus nas de dag rdzing bu'i nang du lhung bzed rnams bkrus pa dang /_gtsug lag khang na gnas pa dang /_dge bsnyen dag gis kyang mar dang /_'bru mar dang /_zho dang /_sbrang rtsi'i 
[\[186b.2\]]bum pa rnams kyang rdzing du bkrus pas na lhung bzed rnams dang bum pa de rnams kyi snum dag gis chu'i steng du zhag chags par gyur te/_de la dge slong dag the tshom skyes nas chu mi 'thung ngo /_/de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 
[\[186b.3\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_des kha zas kyi bya ba byed mi nus kyis dkrugs la 'thung shig_/de la the tshom du ma byed cig_/chu de kho ra khor yug tu skye bo mang po dag gis dkrugs pas na thams cad kyang rnyog pas gang ste gdong gi gzugs brnyan yang mi snang bar gyur/_chu 
[\[186b.4\]]tshags kyang rnyog pas 'gags nas chu mi zag pa dang /_de dag la gnod par gyur to/_/de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gang na gdong gi gzugs brnyan mi snang ba der lhung bzed chung ngu'am 
[\[186b.5\]]snod gzhan gyi chus la shing tog ka ta ka'i 'bras bu chug ste skad cig sdod la rtogs shig dang nges par gdong gi gzugs brnyan yang snang bar 'gyur ro/_/de lta bu med na zan gyi chang bu chug shig_/de snum med pas zhigs pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[186b.6\]]phye mar du gyis la der chug shig_/chu ba tshwa can du gyur nas dge slong dag the tshom skyes pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de ste des lan tshwa'i bya ba byed nus na byin len byos la 'thung shig_/de ste bya ba byed mi nus na chus la 'thung shig_/de la the tshom 
[\[186b.7\]]du ma byed cig_/rkyang pa'i sgo gsum pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa dgu pa'o//_//mdor na/_chu dang zho las chur gyur dang /_/bum pa bum bu'ang de bzhin te/_/lag pa bsnyal nas 'thung ba dang /_/dge tshul pha la'ang rnam bzhir bya/_/lhung bzed dang ni gdong 
[\[187a\]]
[\[187a.1\]]bkru dang /_/bsod snyoms pa la rnam pa gnyis/_/rgyags dang 'bras bu me tog dag_/phongs na rung gis bza' bar bya'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/
[\[187a.2\]]dge slong dag khron pa'i nang nas chu bcus te de dag gis btsags na 'bras can brul ma dang khur ba'i dum bu dag byung ngo /_/de dag the tshom skyes nas chags pa dang dum bu dag kyang 'khru bar gyur nas de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom 
[\[187a.3\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_des kha zas kyi bya ba byed mi nus kyis phyung ste bor la tshogs shig_/de la the tshom du ma byed cig_/dge slong dag rdzing nas chu 'chu ba dang der chu'i bum pa dang sbrang rtsi'i bum pa dag bkrus pa dang /_dge slong dag gis kyang lhung bzed snum 
[\[187a.4\]]can dag bkrus so/_/de dag gi snum gyis chu'i steng zhag tu chags par gyur/_zho'i 'brum bu dag kyang snang bar gyur nas/_dge slong dag the tshom skyes te ma bcus pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_des kha zas kyi bya ba byed mi nus kyis chus shig_/
[\[187a.5\]]phyi dro mi 'thung nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'thung shig bum pa dang ril ba dag gi nang du mi ldugs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_der lugs shig dge slong dag cig lam du zhugs te dong ba dang /_de na chu med de khyim bdag gis snod nas chu 
[\[187a.6\]]'gron pa mang po la byin pa dang /_dge slong dag gis 'thung du ma btub ste/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de ste gzhan med na rtogs la 'thung shig_/de dag bum pa dang ril ba'i nang du mi ldugs pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_der yang 
[\[187a.7\]]lugs shig_/phyi dro mi 'thung ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'thung shig lam na rdo chu sgrom yod pa dang /_dge slong dag the tshom skyes te chu ma blangs pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong rnams rdo chu sgrom ni bkru bkru ba yin 
[\[187b\]]
[\[187b.1\]]gyis/_rtogs la 'thung shig_/ril ba dang bum pa dag tu mi ldugs pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_der yang lugs shig_/phyi dro mi 'thung ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'thung shig_/de la the tshom du ma byed cig_/de 
[\[187b.2\]]bzhin du shing sgrom dang rkyal pa'i nang na 'dug pa yang rtogs la 'thung shig_/phyi dro dang /_ril ba dang /_bum pa'i nang du yang lugs shig_/de la the tshom du ma byed cig_/dge slong dag gis dge 'dun la chu brims pa dang /_de na dge slong dag gis tshe dang ldan pa chu rgyun lhung 
[\[187b.3\]]bzed kyi nang nas ma chad pas na bzhag par gyur to zhes smras te/_de dag gis ma blangs so/_/de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag khu ba thams cad kyi rgyud ni thur du 'bab kyi steng du mi 'gyur 
[\[187b.4\]]gyis 'thung la de la the tshom ma byed cig_/de bzhin du 'o ma dang /_zho dang /_zho'i chu dang /_dar ba dang /_rtsab mo dang /_tshwa la sogs pa la rgyas par brjod do/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/_dge slong dag ljongs rgyu zhing spyod pa las ba lang gi lhas su phyin pa dang /_de dag la 
[\[187b.5\]]de na chu med de/_de dag gis zho'i chu byin pa dang /_dge slong de dag the tshom skyes nas mi 'khru'o/_/de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gang na chu med pa zho'i chu dang /_dar ba dang bas khrus shig_/de 
[\[187b.6\]]la the tshom du ma byed cig_/dge slong dag gis ba lang rdzi la bum pa brnyas pa dang /_de dag gis mar gyi bum pa dang /_'o ma'i bum pa dag rnyed na de dag the tshom skyes nas ma blangs so/_/de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[187b.7\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag bum pa la rnam pa lnga ste/_bshang ba'i bum pa dang /_gci ba'i bum pa dang /_chang gi bum pa dang /_'bru mar gyi bum pa dang /_mar gyi bum pa'o/_/de la snga ma gsum ni ma bzhag pa yang ma bzhag shig_/gzhag na ni rgyang ring 
[\[188a\]]
[\[188a.1\]]por bor cig_/'bru mar gyi bum pa dang /_mar gyi bum pa ni me'i nang du bsregs la de nas lci ba'i ril bu'am/_ba lang gi lci bas rung bar gyis la chu chus te/_de snga dro dang phyi dro yang spyod cig_/de la the tshom du ma byed cig_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod 
[\[188a.2\]]pa na ste/_dge slong gzhan zhig gis bum pa'i nang nas chu 'thungs pa dang /_bung bas zos so/_/de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag bum bu'i nang nas chu ma 'thung shig_/'thung 
[\[188a.3\]]na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/_/sngar lag pa snyol la kha khrus te/_gdod chu 'thung shig_/bum bu'i kha gab med par ma bzhag shig_/de bas na ngas gnang gis bum pa'i kha gab chongs shig bcom ldan 'das kyis bum bu'i kha gab chongs shig ces bka' stsal na/_
[\[188a.4\]]dge slong dag gis kha gab ji lta bu bcang ba mi shes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shing las byas pa'am/_rdo las byas pa'am/_sa las byas pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis lag pa snyol la chu 'thung shig ces bka' stsal na/_lam du zhugs pa dag 
[\[188a.5\]]gcig la chu nyung bar gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'dab ma rang lhags pa tshol la de'i nang nas 'thung shig_/de yang med par gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_bag yod bzhin du shing la chags pa las 'thung shig_/de yang 
[\[188a.6\]]med par gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dben par 'dug la bum bu nyid nas 'thung shig_/gzhan gyis ma mthong ba dang mdzes par gyis shig_/dge slong dag ngas phongs pa na gnang ba de ma phongs pa'i tshe na ma spyod cig_/spyad na 'das pa dang 
[\[188a.7\]]bcas par 'gyur ro/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/_dge slong dag ljongs rgyu ba spyod cing dong ba las de dag gis rgyags dge tshul pha dag la bskur ba de dag ma theg nas de dag gis theg la bskur cig ces smras pa dang /_dge slong dag the tshom skyes nas ma bteg 
[\[188b\]]
[\[188b.1\]]go/_/de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_theg shig dge tshul pha dag ngal nas phog ste slang zhes smras pa dang /_dge slong dag gis ma phog nas/_de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 
[\[188b.2\]]'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_phog shig dge tshul phas ma bzung bzhin gdeg pa dang /_dbab pa dag byas nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge tshul phas ma gzung bar gdeg pa dang /_dbab pa ma byed cig_/dge 
[\[188b.3\]]tshul pha dag gis bdag cag chad de ngal bsos khyed kyis cung zhig khyer cig ces smras pa dang /_dge slong dag gis ma khyer ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_tha gus bcings la tha gu'i rtse mo dge tshul phas zung ste phyi bzhin 'brang du chug la dge slong gis 
[\[188b.4\]]khyer cig_/dge slong dag the tshom skyes nas de la mi za ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de la the tshom du ma byed par zo shig_/dge slong 'gron pa mang po dang lhan cig tu 'grogs te lam du zhugs pa dang /_'gron pa mang po dag rkun pos bcom pa dang /_
[\[188b.5\]]dge tshul gyis rgyags rnams bor nas bros te dong ngo /_/dge slong dag gi rgyags ma khyer nas de nyid na bor zhing 'dug pa dang /_'gron pa mang po dag gis 'phags pa khyed kyi rgyags ni rkun pos ma khyer ro zhes smras pa dang /_dge slong dag dge tshul pha dag la deng la rgyags 
[\[188b.6\]]long ste shog shig ces smras pa dang /_de dag skrag nas 'dong du ma btub ste khyed nyid ci'i phyir mi 'dong /_nged cag rkun pos gsad med ces smras pa dang /_de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[188b.7\]]long la gzod dge tshul phas byin cig_/dge slong dag gis the tshom skyes nas de dag ma zos pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de la the tshom du ma byed par zo shig_/klung rgal bar gyur pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge tshul pha dag 
[\[189a\]]
[\[189a.1\]]la khyed nyid kyis khyer te rgal bar nus sam zhes dris la de ste nus zhes zer na legs so/_/de ste mi nus so zhes zer na rgyags bdag cag gis khyer la rgol cig_/de la dge slong dag gis rgyags dag pha rol du bsgral bar bya na dge tshul phas bsgral bar 
[\[189a.2\]]gyis la brtag par gyis shig_/de ste dge tshul pha yang mi nus na dge slong dag gis rgyags pha rol du sgrol la/_de'i 'og tu dge tshul pha yang bsgral bar gyis shig_/de ste gnyi gar nus na dge tshul pha dang /_rgyags lhan cig tu bsgral bar gyis shig_/gnyi ga lhan 
[\[189a.3\]]cig tu bsgral ba dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas ma zos so/_/de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de la the tshom du ma byed par bza' bar gyis shig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong 
[\[189a.4\]]dag lhung bzed du zo shig ces bka' stsal pa dang /_dge slong zhig gis lhung bzed bkrus nas mthe bos brdabs na sgra mi gsang nas/_dge slong de la the tshom skyes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sgyu med par lan gnyis lan gsum du bkru bas 
[\[189a.5\]]khrus la mthe bos brdabs na sgra gsang bar byung na/_de la the tshom du ma byed par zo shig_/dge slong gzhan zhig gis lhung bzed bkrus te/_de bu ga na zas kyi tshigs ma zhig mthong ba dang /_de the tshom skyes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de la shing 
[\[189a.6\]]bus brus te lan gsum gyi bar du rab tu khrus la de la the tshom du ma byed cig_/dge slong gzhan zhig gis yang lhung bzed gas pa zhig gi nang du khu ba dron po zhig blangs pa dang /_de'i 'phro nas snum byung ba dang /_zhag steng du byung ba dang /_dge slong de the tshom skyes nas/_
[\[189a.7\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_steng gi zhag zhoms la btung bar gyis shig_/dge slong cig rlung nad kyis btab nas des phyi dro khu ba zhig 'thungs te/_nub kar lhung bzed de'i nang du skom btung zhes byas pa dang /_lhung bzed kyi nang du snum langs nas 
[\[189b\]]
[\[189b.1\]]de'i steng du zhag chags pa dang /_dge slong de the tshom skyes nas skom yang ma 'thungs so/_/de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lag pa dang kha bkrus nas snum zhoms te 'or te de la the tshom du ma 
[\[189b.2\]]byed par 'thung shig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis kha khrus shig ces bka' stsal na/_dge slong dag kha cis bkru ba mi shes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lci ba'am sa'am shing gi shun phrags la sogs pa gzhan gyis so/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[189b.3\]]la tshe dang ldan pa u pA lis zhus pa/_btsun pa ji tsam gyis kha bkrus pa zhes bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kha dang rma gnyis mtshungs te rtag tu zag pas ma 'bags pa mi nus mod kyi lan gsum du kha bkrus te chu bor ba ni kha bkrus pa zhes bya'o/_/dge 
[\[189b.4\]]slong cig gis bsod snyoms bslangs te gnas khang du bzhag nas phyi rol du byung ba dang /_khyim bdag gzhan zhig gis de'i steng du zas shig blugs te bzhag pa dang /_ji tsam bsod snyoms pa de slar 'ongs na bsod snyoms kyi steng na zas gzhan zhig blugs par mthong 
[\[189b.5\]]ste/_de the tshom skyes te zan ma zos so/_/de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de ste byin len byed pa yod na byin len byos la zo shig_/de ste med na steng gi sar pa de log shig tu 'or la the 
[\[189b.6\]]tshom du ma byed par zo shig_/dge slong gzhan zhig gis bsod snyoms blangs nas gnas khang du bzhag ste/_phyi rol du song ba dang /_de khyim pa zhig gis reg par mthong ste dge slong de the tshom skyes nas ma zos so/_/de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 
[\[189b.7\]]gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_khyim bdag de la ci'i phyir reg ces dris la/_des rtswa sbrangs ma dag bsal ba'i phyir reg ces zer na byin len byos la zo shig de ste 'dod pa'i phyir reg go zhes zer na de yang phyed mar gos la byin len byos te de la 
[\[190a\]]
[\[190a.1\]]the tshom du ma byed par zo zhig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag rgyags khyer cig ces bka' stsal na/_khyim pa dang dge tshul pha dag med nas/_de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[190a.2\]]bka' stsal pa/_sbyin pa'i bdag po spro ba skyed cig_/sbyin bdag kyang med na bdag nyid kyis slar khyer la de khyim pa dang rjes la zo shig_/de ste de la med na skal ba gnyis su chod la khyim pa la byin te/_des khyer na ni de'i skal ba slar slongs te byin len byos la zo shig_/
[\[190a.3\]]bdag gi skal ba ni de la byin cig_/de ste de ltar yang ma 'byor na nyi ma dang po'i tshe ni bsnyung bar 'dug shig_/phyi de nyin par byin len byed pa med na stag gi spar thabs gcig zo shig_/yang phyi de nyin mo yang byin len byed pa med na stag gi spar thabs gnyis zo shig_/de ste zhag 
[\[190a.4\]]bzhi'i nyin mo yang byin len byed pa med na ji tsam 'grangs pa'i bar du zo shig_/de la the tshom du ma byed cig_/de ste rgyags med na 'bras bu rang lhung ba de longs la gdugs tshod la bab kyi bar du khyer te song la de ste khyim pa dang phrad na skal ba gnyis su chod la gcig ni de la byin 
[\[190a.5\]]te/_de'i skal ba slar bdag gis slongs la rung bar byos te zo shig_/bdag gi de byin cig_/de ste ma phrad na snga dro 'am/_phyi dro yang rung /_rung bar bya ba'i phyir sgyu med na srog dang 'bral bas/_the tshom du ma byed par zo shig_/de ste yang lhung ba med na shing la 'dzegs te 
[\[190a.6\]]thogs shig_/yang na sprugs la byang phyogs kyi dus su bsngos te zo shig_/de bzhin du rtsa ba la sogs pa yang sa la sa rang gis brkos te phyung la the tshom du ma byed par zo shig_/ngas khyed la phongs pa'i tshe gnang ba de ma phongs pa'i tshe ma spyod cig_/spyad na 'das pa dang 
[\[190a.7\]]bcas par 'gyur ro/_/rkyang pa'i sgo gsum pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa bcu ste sgo gsum pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//mdor bsdus pa ste/_sa bon bum pa rkun po rku ba dang /_/lus kyis reg pa de bzhin te/_/'bras can lan tshwa song ba dang /_/bu ram shing dang rgun 
[\[190b\]]
[\[190b.1\]]'bru dang /_/glo bur 'ongs dang gnas pa'o/_/mdor na/_sa bon dum pa shing rta gru/_/khur dang 'o ma tshong pa de bzhin te/_/bya rog sbrang ma btso blag las/_/u pA li bzhi chog kun shes pa'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab bya ka lan da ka gnas pa 
[\[190b.2\]]na bzhugs te/_gang gi tshe rgyal po gzugs can snying pos bum pa stong gi sa bon btab pa phul ba de'i tshe dge slong dag gis de'i thog zos nas zhing yang tha bar bor te rtswa ku sha'i gnas su gyur to/_/de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po phyi rol du byung bas de dag mthong nas/_
[\[190b.3\]]des blon po la kye sus 'di ltar zhing kun tha bar bor nas ku sha'i gnas su gyur ces smras pa dang /_des lhas 'phags pa dag la bum pa stong gi sa bon gyis btab pa phul ba da de dag gis legs par blangs pa de dag gzigs mod ces smras pa dang /_rgyal pos ji 'phags pa de dag 
[\[190b.4\]]gis thun shas su yang ma btang ngam zhes de dag gis dge slong dag la smras pa dang /_de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge 'dun gyi zhing dag ni thun shas su thong shig_/dge slong dag gis thun 
[\[190b.5\]]shas su byin no/_/zhing pas zhing gshin pa'i rnams ni thams cad bdag cag khyer yang de dag gis skal ba ma blangs pa dang /_de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_zhing shas kyi skal ba long shig_/
[\[190b.6\]]dge slong dag gis blangs te de nyid du bzhag nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_skal ba gtsug lag khang du skyos shig ces gsungs pa dang /_sngar zhing pa nyid kyis der bskyas so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sngon du zhing bdag gis der 
[\[190b.7\]]skyos shig_/de dag skyed pa na yang brkus so/_/de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_srung ba'i dge slong rnams skos shig_/shing rta'i nang du skyed pa las shing rta chag kyang dge slong gis grogs ma 
[\[191a\]]
[\[191a.1\]]byas pa dang /_khyim bdag mi dga' bar gyur nas smras pa/_'phags pa 'di ni ci khyed cag gi na khyed kyis ci'i phyir grogs mi bya/_des smras pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo /_/de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 
[\[191a.2\]]gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shing rta la phyugs 'debs pa'i sa ma gtogs par der bskyab dang zhing pa'i grogs gyis shig_/dge slong gzhan zhig na bar gyur nas/_shing rta pa dag gis shing rta'i steng du zhon cig ces smras pa dang /_de the tshom 
[\[191a.3\]]skyes nas ma zhon nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_na na shing rta la zhon cig_/de la the tshom ma byed cig_/gru'i nang na mthun shas kyi skal ba skyed pa las gru yang chag par gyur nas/_dge slong dag gis grogs ma byas pa dang /_khyim bdag mi dga' bar gyur 
[\[191a.4\]]nas smras pa/_'di ni khyed kyi na/_khyod kyis ci'i phyir grogs mi bya/_de dag gis smras pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo /_/de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gru'i dngo ma gtogs 
[\[191a.5\]]par phul ba'i grogs dang zhing pa'i grogs gyis shig_/dge slong gzhan zhig yang klung gi 'gram nas song ba las na bar gyur nas mnyan pas 'phags pa 'di'i nang du zhugs zhes smras pa dang /_de the tshom skyes nas nang du ma zhugs so/_/de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis 
[\[191a.6\]]bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dngo ma gtogs par nang du zhugs pa de la the tshom ma byed cig_/gzhan yang khur gyis bskyas pa las de chad par gyur nas/_des 'phags pa 'di mar phob shig ces smras pa dang /_dge 
[\[191a.7\]]slong dag the tshom skyes nas ma phog go/_/de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_phog cig_/dge slong dag gis phab nas slar ma bteg pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_ji ltar phog 
[\[191b\]]
[\[191b.1\]]pa bzhin du theg cig_/lha gang gi sgor bor te dong ba dang /_ma byin par len pa dag gis brkus nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_nang du skyos shig_/dge slong gis sus nang du bskyab mi shes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_khyim 
[\[191b.2\]]pas so/_/khyim pa med na dge tshul phas so/_/dge tshul pha yang med nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_bdag cag nyid kyis nang du skyos shig_/dge slong dag gis bskyas nas bdag gis bskyas pa yin no snyam nas ma zos pa dang /_de ltar gyur pa dge slong 
[\[191b.3\]]dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de la the tshom ma byed par zo shig_/dge 'dun gyi zangs kyi nang du me cher 'bar bas 'o ma la sogs pa ni khol/_rung bar byed pa ni sgor song nas bo ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[191b.4\]]bka' stsal pa/_de phyi rol du ma 'gro shig_/de ste rkyen cig byung nas phyi rol du song na ma gal pa dag phyir drongs shig_/'on kyang de bzhin du lud pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_mdag ma dag phyir dbyung bar gyis shig_/mdag ma phyir phyung yang lud pa dang /_
[\[191b.5\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_chos gos kyi tha mas g.yobs shig_/'on kyang lud par gyur nas bdag nyid kyis gzar bu long la dkrug par gyis shig_/dge slong dag ngas phongs pa la gnang ba de ma phongs pa'i tshe ma spyod cig_/spyad na 'das pa dang bcas par 
[\[191b.6\]]'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du sman dag kyang dge tshul pha'am/_lha gang na gnas pas dkrug par gyis shig_/de yang phyi rol du song na de'i thabs snga ma bzhin no/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/_tshong pa mang po dag cig gis sangs rgyas dang /_dge slong gi dge 'dun la 
[\[191b.7\]]sogs pa bshos la spyan drangs so/_/de dag gis bshos sbyar te dro sar bskyas nas ma drangs kyi bar du tshong khang du me shor te de dag me gsod du song ba dang /_gdugs tshod yol la thug nas/_dge slong dag gis ji ltar gyur pa bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 
[\[192a\]]
[\[192a.1\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de'i sems kyis yongs su btang bas na/_dge slong dag de la the tshom ma byed par bza' bar bya'o/_/zos nas byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi dus su byin gyis rlobs shig_/dge 'dun gyis dro sar bya rog mchus zas la reg pa dang /_
[\[192a.2\]]dge slong dag the tshom skyes nas zan ma zos so/_/de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_mchu'i than kor 'or la de la the tshom ma byed par zo shig_/dge slong dag gis lhung bzed kyi kha zas kyi nang du bya rog 
[\[192a.3\]]gis reg nas de dag kha zas ma zos pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de'i mchu'i than kor 'or la the tshom ma byed par bza' bar gyis shig_/tshe dang ldan pa nam gru ci la yang the tshom za ste/_nam gru the tshom can nam gru the tshom can zhes ming du gyur to/_/de bshang 
[\[192a.4\]]sar 'ongs pa dang /_sbrang ma zhig mthong ngo /_/phyis yang de dang 'dra ba zhig bskos na zas kyi steng na 'dug pa mthong ba dang /_des tshe dang ldan pa dag bshang sa na mthong ba'i sbrang ma des 'dir 'ongs te kha zas la 'bags te ma rung bar byas so zhes smras pa dang /_de thos pa dang 
[\[192a.5\]]dge slong mang zhig gis zas ma zos par gyur to/_/de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong rnams sbrang ma ni mthon dman kun du rgyus des gang du reg pa de 'or la de la the tshom du ma byed par 
[\[192a.6\]]zo shig_/dge slong dag tshon rtsi'i las byed de/_de dag sems 'khrul bas tshon rtsi'i bum pa yin no snyam nas des dge 'dun gyi 'bru mar gyi bum pa dang /_mar gyi bum pa dag steng du bteg ste khyer ba dang /_de na gang gi tshe ngo shes pa de'i tshe na 'greng bzhin du bor nas chag pa 
[\[192a.7\]]ba dang /_de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_thang ma skas la 'dzegs pa las cung zad tsam zhig ni 'dzegs mang du las na slar bobs la gnas gar bde bar ma 'gyel bar zhog shig_/de ste 
[\[192b\]]
[\[192b.1\]]thang ma skas la mang du 'dzegs la thung du 'dzeg dgos na steng du 'dzegs la gnas bde bar ma 'gyel bar zhog shig_/dge slong dag the tshom skyes nas ma zos pa dang /_de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[192b.2\]]de la the tshom ma byed par zo shig_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pA lis zhus pa/_btsun pa bzhag pa rnam pa du 'tshal du rung /_u pA li rnam pa gnyis kyis te/_ngo tsha ba med cing bslab pa la mi mos pa dang /_gang la ngo tsha yod kyang dran pa nyams pa ste/_
[\[192b.3\]]de gnyis kyis bzhag pa rung gis gnyi ga zo shig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_byol song gi skye gnas su gyur pa'i sems can la sbyin pa byin na ni rnam par smin pa brgyar re bar bya'o/_/tshul khrims ngan pas zin pa'i mi la sbyin pa byin na ni rnam par smin pa stong du re 
[\[192b.4\]]bar bya'o/_/tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i skyes bu gang zag la sbyin pa byin na ni rnam par smin pa brgya phrag stong du re bar bya'o/_/phyi rol gyi drang srong 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang bral ba dag la sbyin pa byin na ni rnam par smin pa sa ya brgya stong du re bar bya'o/_/rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras 
[\[192b.5\]]bu mngon du byed par zhugs pa la ni tshad med do/_/rgyun du zhugs pa la de bas kyang tshad med do/_/lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon du byed par zhugs pa la de bas kyang tshad med do/_/lan gcig phyir ldog par rgyun du zhugs pa la de bas kyang tshad med do/_/phyir 
[\[192b.6\]]mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon du byed par zhugs pa la de bas kyang tshad med do/_/phyir mi 'ong ba'i rgyun du zhugs pa la de bas kyang tshad med do/_/dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byed par zhugs pa la de bas kyang tshad med do/_/dgra bcom pa la de bas kyang tshad med na rang sangs rgyas 
[\[192b.7\]]dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la lta smos kyang ci dgos bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa dag gis dge slong dag mchod rten la phyag 'tshal du dong ba la gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dag bskur ba dang /_dge slong dag 
[\[193a\]]
[\[193a.1\]]rnam pa de lta bu'i rkyen byung nas de dag gis gang du bskur bar bskur ma nus so/_/de dag gi nang nas kha cig gis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa ni gzhan du bsngos la gzhan du dbul bar ma byed cig ces byung /_kha cig 
[\[193a.2\]]gis yang smras pa/_de la gzhan byar ci yod/_bcom ldan 'das la zhu'o/_/de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong rnams rnam pa bzhi la ni nges par dbul dgos te byang chub pa dang /_chos 
[\[193a.3\]]kyi 'khor lo dang /_cho 'phrul chen po dang /_lha yul nas gshegs pa'o/_/'di dag la bsngos nas gzhan du sngo bar ma byed cig_/de las gzhan du bsngos pa'i rkyen rnam pa de lta bus na gzhan dag tu bsngor rung gis de la the tshom ma byed cig_/dge slong rnams ngas 
[\[193a.4\]]phongs pa'i tshe gnang ba de bzhin du ma phongs pa'i tshe ma spyod cig_/de ltar spyad na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pA lis zhus pa/_btsun pa dge slong gnyis shig 'khrug par gyur/_rtsod par gyur/_'thab 
[\[193a.5\]]par gyur pa de la gang mad par gzung /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa gang tshul khrims dang ldan pa'o/_/gnyi ga tshul khrims dang ldan pa na gang mang du thos pa'o/_/gnyi ga mang du thos na gang chog shes pa'o/_/gnyi ga chog shes na gang cher chog shes pa'o/_/
[\[193a.6\]]gnyi ga cher chog shes na u pA li gnyi ga cher chog shes pa las cher chog shes pa ni med de mi srid do/_/gnas med de de gnyis lta bu la ni 'khrug pa'am/_rtsod pa'am/_'thab par 'gyur ba 'byung ba'i gnas ma yin no/_/rkyang pa'i sgo'i mdo bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad 
[\[193a.7\]]pa dang po'o//_//'dul ba gzhung dam pa/_bam po bzhi bcu rtsa gsum pa/_mdor na/_rkun po gnas dang za ma dang /_/sngar 'khrugs pa la rnam pa bzhi/_/bslab pa byin pas tshul shing brims/_/de dag dge 'dun dbyen mi 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[193b\]]
[\[193b.1\]]ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dze ta'i tshal mgon med pa la zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pA lis zhus pa/_btsun pa tshul shing brims pa rkun gnas kyis tshul shing brims na dge 'dun gyi dbyen du 'gyur ram/_
[\[193b.2\]]u pA li mi 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa ma ning dang za ma dang /_dge slong ma sun phyung ba dang /_pha bsad pa dang /_ma bsad pa dang /_dgra bcom pa bsad pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa la ngan sems kyis khrag phyung ba dang /_mu stegs can dang /_mu stegs can du song 
[\[193b.3\]]ba dang /_tha dad du gnas pa dang /_mi gnas pa dag gis tshul shing brims na dge 'dun gyi dbyen du 'gyur ram/_u pA li mi 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa sngar 'khrugs pa bzhis tshul shing brims na dge 'dun gyi dbyen du 'gyur ram/_u pA li mi 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa bslab 
[\[193b.4\]]pa byin pas tshul shing brims na dge 'dun gyi dbyen du 'gyur ram/_u pA li mi 'gyur ro/_/rkyang pa'i sgo bzhi pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa gnyis pa'o//_//mdor na/_lus la reg dang rngul zan dang /_/char pa 'bab par bcad mi bya/_/tshang mang dang ni bshang gci sa/_/
[\[193b.5\]]ma rung nas ni mi dor ba'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dze ta'i tshal mgon med pa la zas sbyin pa'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/drug sde dag gis dge 'dun gyi mal stan dag kyang lus la reg par bgos/_rkang pa nas mgo'i bar du thang chad 
[\[193b.6\]]par bgos pa dang /_de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la zhus nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag gis dge 'dun gyi mal stan lus la reg par ma bgo shig_/bgos na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 
[\[193b.7\]]'das kyis dge slong dag dge 'dun gyi mal stan lus la reg par ma bgo shig ces bka' stsal pa na/_dge slong dag gis ji ltar bgo ba mi shes nas/_de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[194a\]]
[\[194a.1\]]gang zag gis rngul zan gyi steng du shes bzhin du dal nas khad kyis bgo bar gyis shig_/drug sde dag gis dge 'dun gyi gos bgos nas dbyar char gyi nang na bla gab med par 'dug go/_/de char gyis ma rung bar gyur nas/_de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag 
[\[194a.2\]]gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag gis dge 'dun gyi gos gyon la dbyar char gyi nang na bla gab med par ma 'dug shig_/'dug na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/_/drug sde dag gis dge 'dun gyi gos 
[\[194a.3\]]bgos nas tshang mang du 'jug ste/_de dud pas ma rung bar gyur nas de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag gis dge 'dun gyi gos gyon nas tshang mang du 'gro bar ma byed cig_/song na 
[\[194a.4\]]'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/_/drug sde dag gis dge 'dun gyi mal stan dag bgos nas bshang gci'i sar song ba dang /_bshang gci'i gzer ma dag gis phog nas ma rung bar gyur to/_/de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_
[\[194a.5\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag dge 'dun gyi mal stan gyon nas bshang gci'i sar ma 'gro shig_/song na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/_dge slong rnams dge 'dun gyi mal stan rdol ba dang /_ral ba rnams 
[\[194a.6\]]gar bab bab tu 'dor te de dag mi spyod pa dang /_de nyid ma rung bar gyur nas de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge 'dun gyi mal stan cung zad rdol tam/_ral na ma dor bar rdol na ni lhan 
[\[194a.7\]]pas glon cig ral na ni slar drub par gyis shig_/de'i nang na rnyings pa dag ni khol phyung la sar pa glon cig_/de rnying pa las rung ba yod na me mar gyi snying por gyis shig_/der yang mi rung na ba glang gi lci ba'am sa dang bsres la ka ba'i ser ga'am/_rtsig pa'i ser ga dag 
[\[194b\]]
[\[194b.1\]]gi zhal zhal du gyis shig_/sbyin par byed pa dang /_yon bdag gi yun ring du spyad par 'gyur ro/_/rkyang pa'i sgo bzhi pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa gsum pa'o//_//mdor na/_kha zas de ste me mar dang /_/byug par bya dang lham rnams dang /_/gos dang gdugs 
[\[194b.2\]]dang shing dag dang /_/rtsa ba sman rnams tha ma'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/mnyan du yod pa na khyim bdag gzhan zhig 'dug ste/_des yo byad thams cad dang ldan pa'i gtsug lag 
[\[194b.3\]]khang brtsigs te 'khor mang po'i dge slong dag cig la phul lo/_/de 'khor drug bcu dang der dbyar tshul du zhugs so/_/tshul nas byung nas lhan cig spyod pa dang /_nye gnas dag ljongs dang /_phyogs gang dang gang du 'khod pa de dang de dag nas de'i rkang pa la phyag bya bar 
[\[194b.4\]]lhags nas/_de dag gis de'i rkang pa la phyag byas te dong ba dang /_des tshe dang ldan pa rnams nga khyim bdag 'di zhes bya bas mgron du bos kyis khyed 'di nyid du 'khod cig ces smras pa dang /_de dag gis smras pa mkhan po mchi'o/_/des smras pa/_'o na 'khod de zan zo 
[\[194b.5\]]la deng shig_/de dag gis smras pa/_zas dang yo byad khyer te mchis la/_de nyid bdag cag 'tshal lo/_/des 'o na legs kyis de bzhin du byos shig ces smras pa dang /_zas dang yo byad dag khyer te dong ngo /_/de bzhin du kha cig gis me mar gyi mar/_kha cig gis 
[\[194b.6\]]ni rkang pa byug pa/_kha cig gis ni lham dag_/kha cig gis ni gos dag_/kha cig gis ni gdugs dag_/kha cig gis ni shing dag_/kha cig gis ni rtsa ba dang /_sdong bu dang /_lo ma dang /_me tog dang /_'bras bu'i sman rnams khyer te dong ba dang /_ring po ma lon 
[\[194b.7\]]par gtsug lag khang de yo byad kyis brel bar gyur nas dge slong de khyim bdag gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_khyim bdag khyod kyi yo byad dag ni zad do zhes smras pa dang /_'phags pa de na dge slong nyung la yo byad mang du phul na ci'i phyir myur du bas zhes smras pa 
[\[195a\]]
[\[195a.1\]]dang /_de dag gis rgyas par smras nas/_des 'phags pa bdag gis ni de na bzhugs pa rnams kyi phyir phul na/_de dag gzhan na gnas la ci'i phyir gzhan du spyod ces nyes pa ngor brjod do/_/de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das 
[\[195a.2\]]la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong rnams yon bdag de 'phya ba ni yus te/_de bas na dge slong dag gis gzhan du gnas shing gzhan gyi khyer ba ma spyod cig_/dge slong dag gzhan du gnas la gzhan gyi spyad dang /_de dag ji tsam 
[\[195a.3\]]spyad pa thams cad rin thang bzhin du phob shig_/rkyang pa'i sgo bzhi pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa bzhi pa'o//_//mdor na/_mtshan ma dang yang mngon mtshan dang /_/par tang dag dang ri mo can/_/khri'u rkang pa ri mo can/_/ral tshems bya ba dbyar mo khang /_/sangs 
[\[195a.4\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa na dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/mnyan du yod pa na mi spun gnyis shig rab tu byung ste/_de las gcig ni zhal ta'i gnas khang na 'dug go/_/gcig ni dze ta'i tshal na'o/_/ji tsam na zhal ta ba de don 
[\[195a.5\]]zhig gi phyir ri brags kyi grong du song ngo /_/dge slong de phu nu bo blta ba'i phyir bgo ba de bgos nas de'i thad du song ngo /_/des dge 'dun gyi bgo ba'i nang du gang zag gi bgo ba de bzhag nas gtam 'dzer cing 'khod do/_/de nas nor te dge 'dun gyi bgo ba zhig gyon te song ngo /_/
[\[195a.6\]]de nas zhal ta ba de slar 'ongs nas de na bgo ba chung ngu zhig mthong ste/_des tshe dang ldan pa ci dge 'dun gyis rnyed pa grub pa'am zhes smras pa dang /_des smras pa/_dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa cang med do/_/bgo ba 'di su'i 'di dag dge 'dun gyi'o/_/des smras pa/_nged cag ni 
[\[195a.7\]]che/_'di chung na/_'dir su yang bgo ba gyon te ma 'ongs sam/_'dir bdag gi phu nu bo zhig 'ongs so/_/song la dris shig de song nas dris te des bltas na dge 'dun gyi yin nas/_des smras pa/_bdag gis nor te dge 'dun gyi ni bdag gis khyer/_bdag gi 
[\[195b\]]
[\[195b.1\]]ni de na 'dug pa'i rigs so/_/des de khyer de 'ongs so/_/de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge 'dun gyi ni mtshan ma thob shig_/dge slong dag gis ji ltar mtshan ma gdab pa mi shes nas 
[\[195b.2\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong 'di zhes bya bas phul ba'o zhes yi ger bris shig_/dge slong gis dge 'dun gyi dang /_gang zag gi gnyi ga de bzhin du bris so/_/de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[195b.3\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_gang zag gi ni mngon mtshan thob shig_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/_bcom ldan 'das kyis dge 'dun gyi'am/_gang zag gi yang rung ste/_ri mo can ni gding ba med kyi bar du ma spyod cig ces bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag gang zag gi 
[\[195b.4\]]par tang stan byed pa la zhugs pa dang /_de'i nang nas kha cig gis smras pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis ni ri mo can las rnyed pa ni gnang gi_/bdag nyid kyis byas pa ni ma yin no zhes gsungs so/_/gzhan zhig gis yang byas pa'i dngos po spongs shig ces smras pa dang /_de ltar 
[\[195b.5\]]gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de bas na dge 'dun gyi ni par tang ri mo can rnyed dam byas na yang rung ngo /_/gang zag gis ni gzhan gyis byin na yon bdag nyid la bsngos na 'chang bar gnang gi_/rang 
[\[195b.6\]]byed du ni mi gnang ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge 'dun la ni par tang ri mo can rnyed pa'am/_byas pa'ang 'chang du gnang gi_/gang zag la ni gzhan gyis byin pa de nyid la bsngos na 'chang du gnang ngo zhes bka' stsal nas/_dge slong gzhan zhig gis khri'u rkang pa ri mo can zhig 
[\[195b.7\]]bdag gis ni ma byas gzhan gyis byin pa 'chang ngo /_/de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag ngas ri mo can ni dgongs te gsungs kyi/_khri'u rkang pa ri mo can la ma yin gyis/_de bas na 
[\[196a\]]
[\[196a.1\]]dge 'dun gyis khri'u rkang pa ri mo can rnyed dam byas kyang rung gnang gi_/gang zag la ni rjes su mi gnang ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong ma dbyar tshul nas byung nas ljongs rgyu ba spyod cig ces gsungs pa dang /_dbyar tshul du zhugs nas khang pa'i ral 
[\[196a.2\]]tshems dag ma byas par dong nas de dag gis ral tshems ma byas pas ma rung bar gyur to/_/de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong ma dbyar tshul du zhugs na ral tshems ma byas na 'das pa dang 
[\[196a.3\]]bcas par 'gyur ro/_/rkyang pa'i sgo bzhi pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa lnga pa'o//_//mdor na/_song nas slar 'ongs sbyin pa med/_/byin nas phyir yang 'ongs par gyur/_/dge 'dun gyis kyang sbyin par bya/_/gang las bskyis par gyur pa'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[196a.4\]]mnyan du yod pa'i dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/khyim pa zhig gis gnyen zhig dus 'das te mchod pa'i phyir rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan gyis drangs nas dur khrod du bskyal te/_de slar khyer te 'ongs nas/_dge slong dag la phul ba dang /_
[\[196a.5\]]dge slong dag gis ma blangs so/_/de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_song na slar 'ongs pa zhes byos la long shig_/kha cig ni dbul te phul ba de slar yang brnyas pa dang /_dge slong dag gis 
[\[196a.6\]]ma ster to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de ste slar slong na byin cig_/des brnyas nas de slar 'gyod pa skyes nas mi des slar yang phul ba dang /_dge slong dag gis ma blangs te/_de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_
[\[196a.7\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de nas slar yang 'ongs so zhes byos te long shig_/de la the tshom dang khro bar ma byed cig_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/_zhal ta byed pa'i dge slong zhig gis dge 'dun gyi phyir khyim pa zhig la nor zhig bskyis pa dang /_de dus 
[\[196b\]]
[\[196b.1\]]las 'das so/_/de dus las 'das so zhes thos nas des gtsug lag khang du 'ongs nas dris pa/_dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba zhig ga re zhes smras pa dang /_dge slong dag gis smras pa/_de dus las 'das so/_/des smras pa/_'phags pa bdag gi nor zhig des 
[\[196b.2\]]bskyis so/_/dge slong dag gis smras pa/_song la de nyid la dos shig_/des dge 'dun gyi phyir khyer gyi pha ma dang bdag gi phyir ma lags kyis khyed kyis stsol cig_/de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal 
[\[196b.3\]]pa/_de ste dge 'dun gyi phyir des khyer bar shes na/_dge 'dun gyis skyin pa byin cig_/dge slong rnams ngas las gsar du byed pa'i mtshungs pa'i dge slong gi chos bca'o/_/las gsar du byed pa'i dge slong gis bskyi ba dag rgan zhing rgan pa dag la dris la long shig_/
[\[196b.4\]]las gsar du byed pa rnams kyis mtshungs par spyad pa'i chos bcas pa bzhin du ma byas na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/_/rkyang pa'i sgo bzhi pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa drug pa'o//_//mdor na/_bu ram shing dang dge slong rnams/_/za zhing bgo ba phan gdags pa/_/
[\[196b.5\]]mi bgo ba dang bzhi pa dang /_/skar ma bstan par mi bya'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa na dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/dge 'dun dag gis bca' ba bu ram shing zhig rnyed de/_bcom ldan 'das kyis dge tshul pha dag 
[\[196b.6\]]la sum cha byin cig ces bka' stsal nas/_de dag la bu ram shing gi sum cha re re byin no/_/dge slong dag rgan rims su 'khod nas gral nyis rim du gyur pas/_slar yang rgan rims kyi thog tu 'ongs so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sgra can 'dzin bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug 
[\[196b.7\]]ste/_de bu ram shing gi dum bu za zhing bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du mig lta zhing 'dug go/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_tshe dang ldan pa sgra can 'dzin bu ram shing 'dod dam/_des smras pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'tshal lo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku 
[\[197a\]]
[\[197a.1\]]skal las bcad de dum bu gcig de la byin nas/_dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams bu ram shing gi bya ba byas te/_gtsug lag khang du 'ongs pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa sgra can 'dzin bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal ba'i phyir/_bcom ldan 'das kyi 
[\[197a.2\]]drung du 'ongs pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_tshe dang ldan pa sgra can 'dzin bu ram shing gi bza' bas tshim par gyur tam/_des gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag gi rnyed pa ni sum cha cig stsol cig ces bka' stsal bas ga la tshim mod kyi/_
[\[197a.3\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa des na gdod tshim par gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gi dge 'dun dag bsdus nas dge slong dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal pa/_ngas gos kyi thob pa ni dge tshul pha dag sum cha cig byin cig ces byas kyi/_kha zas kyi 
[\[197a.4\]]'thob pa dag ni mtshungs par bgos shig_/chung ngu na shing bu la sa'i lo ma tsam yang mnyam par bgos shig_/de las che chung ngu bgos na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/_mnyan du yod pa na khyim bdag gnas pa de dus dus su 
[\[197a.5\]]dze ta'i tshal du 'gro ba las dge slong zhig gis de la nor las byung ba'i bsod nams kyi dngos po bdun rgya cher snyan par bshad pa dang /_de dad pa skyes nas gtsug lag khang zhig brtsigs te/_der dge slong gang dag gnas pa de dag kha zas 'phral 'phral du sbyor bar 
[\[197a.6\]]byed pa las des de dag gi kha zas kyi rgyur kAr ShA pa Na dag cig byin pa las/_de dag gis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa bdag cag bsod snyoms la 'gro bas chos gos kyis brel gyi zas kyis ni ma yin gyis/_kAr ShA pa Na ni chos gos kyi phyir bgo'o/_/dge slong bdag cag 
[\[197a.7\]]las su yang khyim bdag de'i khyim du ma 'dong shig ces de dag gis dam bcas so/_/de nas dus phyi zhig na bsod snyoms pa zhig ljongs rgyu ba spyod cing mnyan du yod par phyin te/_de khyim bdag de'i gtsug lag khang du 'ongs nas/_dge slong dag gis de ngal sor 
[\[197b\]]
[\[197b.1\]]bcug ste/_gnas dang mal stan dag byin nas des bsams pa de ring la ngal bso zhing zan yang gral du zos la nang par nas bsod snyoms bslang ngo snyam du sems shing 'dug pa las/_dge slong gzhi na 'khod pa dag lhung bzed dang chos gos khyer te bsod snyoms la dong 
[\[197b.2\]]ba dang /_bsod snyoms pa des bsams pa/_gzhi na gnas pa'i dge slong dag ni de ltar phongs pa lta na/_bdag kyang de 'dra bar 'gyur gyis bsod snyoms slong du 'gro'o snyam nas/_des lhung bzed dang chos gos dang lde mig dang /_lde mig kyog po dang /_sgo lcags 
[\[197b.3\]]kyang khyer nas mnyan du yod par rim gyis bsod snyoms la zhugs pa las khyim bdag de'i khyim du 'ongs nas/_des de la bde bar phyin tam zhes tshig tu smras/_stan bting /_rkang pa la phyag byas nas de'i mdun du 'dug go/_/de de'i mdun du 'dug nas des de la nor las 
[\[197b.4\]]byung ba'i bsod nams kyi dngos po bdun du yon tan bshad pa dang /_khyim bdag des smras pa/_'phags pa bdag gis de thams cad bsgrubs lags so/_/bsod snyoms pas smras pa/_khyim bdag khyod kyis cung zad kyang sbyar ba med de/_khyod kyi gtsug lag 
[\[197b.5\]]khang na thog mar kha zas med do/_/des smras pa/_'phags pa ci gsung /_bdag gis der mang du phul na/_'phags pas gzhan zhig tu byon te nor ba snyam/_bsod snyoms pa des smras pa/_khyim bdag khyod kyis gtsug lag khang gi lde mig dang lde mig kyog 
[\[197b.6\]]po dag shes sam/_'phags pa 'tshal lo/_/des lde mig dang lde mig kyog po dag bstan pa dang /_des smras pa/_'phags pas de'i don glo bar chud do zhes smras pa dang /_bsod snyoms pas de khyer nas slar song ngo /_/khyim bdag kyang de'i phyi bzhin du song ste 
[\[197b.7\]]gtsug lag khang du 'dug nas ji tsam dge slong dag bsod snyoms khyer te 'ong ba mthong ste mthong nas des 'phags pa khyed cag gang nas byon ces smras pa dang /_de dag gis smras pa/_khyim bdag spyod yul gyi dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir ro/_/'phags pa kAr ShA pa Na 
[\[198a\]]
[\[198a.1\]]gar mchis/_khyim bdag gnas khang na yod do snoms te spyon/_de dag gis phyung ste byin no/_/des smras pa/_da spyod yul gyi dad pa skyed du bzhud cig_/de dag gis ma spobs nas/_cang mi zer bar 'dug nas/_de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom 
[\[198a.2\]]ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag khyim bdag de 'phya ba ni yus te/_de bas na rnam pa bzhis ni ma bgo shig_/de ni mchod rten thams cad kyi dang /_phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun thams cad kyi dang /_nad gsos kyi rin thams 
[\[198a.3\]]cad dang /_zas nar ma thams cad do/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/_drug sde dag ljongs rgyu ba spyod cing skar ma shar tsam zhig na gtsug lag khang zhig tu phyin pa dang /_dge slong de dag gis gang du mdza' ba'i gnas su ngal bso zhing 'dug tu bcug pa dang /_de dag gis 
[\[198a.4\]]smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag ci zhig bsdad du yod/_ston pa bzhugs bzhin du bstan pa zhig par bya'am/_rgan rims bzhin du ci'i phyir mi bgo/_/de dag ji ltar rgan rims bzhin du bged pa la zhugs pa dang /_gsar bu dag ma bgos par nam nangs so/_/de dag nam 
[\[198a.5\]]nangs pa dang langs te/_tshe dang ldan pa dag nged cag 'dong gis mal stan long shig_/dge slong dag gis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed cag skad cig 'khod pa'i phyir khyed kyis dge 'dun thams cad la gnod pa byas so/_/de dag gis smras pa/_de ni ston pa'i bka' lung 
[\[198a.6\]]bzhin no/_/de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag skar ma shar phan chad mal stan ma bgo shig_/bgos na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/_/mal stan bged pas kyang ma bgo 
[\[198a.7\]]shig_/bgos na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/_/rkyang pa'i sgo bzhi pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa bdun pa'o//_//mdor na/_rgun 'bru dang yang 'bra go gzhan/_/mes rung ba yang de bzhin te/_/zhugs thab mar me sdong bu dang /_/drang srong chen pos gnang 
[\[198b\]]
[\[198b.1\]]ba'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yul kun nas ljongs rgyu ba spyod cing ro hi ta kar gshegs te/_ro hi ta ka'i gnod sbyin bal glang ldan zhes bya ba'i gnas na bzhugs so/_/de nas gnod sbyin bal glang ldan bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_bcom ldan 
[\[198b.2\]]'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa do nub bdag gi gnas su dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu bzhugs par ci gnang /_de nas gnod sbyin bal glang ldan la bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar zhal gyis bzhes so/_/de nas 
[\[198b.3\]]gnod sbyin bal glang ldan bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar zhal gyis bzhes par rig nas/_des gtsug lag khang lnga brgya sprul/_stan nang tshangs can dang /_la ba dang /_sngas gru bzhi pa dag kyang lnga brgya lnga brgya sprul/_me mdag dud pa med pa bkang ba lnga brgya yang 
[\[198b.4\]]sprul te/_de nas bcom ldan 'das la ni gtsug lag khang chen po bskos/_de'i lhag ma dag ni dge slong dag la bskos te gtsug lag khang gi lhag ma dge slong dag la bskos nas/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la 
[\[198b.5\]]mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das sang bdag gi khyim du dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu bshos gsol bar ci gnang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang bas na gnod sbyin bal glang ldan la cang mi 
[\[198b.6\]]gsung bas zhal gyis bzhes pa dang /_gnod sbyin bal glang ldan gyi grogs po kha che'i yul na gnod sbyin u ni ko zhes bya ba zhig yod de/_des de la sang bdag gis bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas par bshos la spyan drangs kyis/_stod phyogs 
[\[198b.7\]]kyi nags kyi shing tog las skur ces spring ba dang /_des rgun 'bru dang /_bal po'i se'u dang 'bra go la sogs pas snod bkang ste gnod sbyin gyi lag tu bskur ro/_/des gtsug lag khang gi dag rar spungs te bzhag go/_/dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 
[\[199a\]]
[\[199a.1\]]gsol nas/_bcom ldan 'das 'di ci zhig lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong rnams 'di ni stod phyogs kyi nags kyi shing tog go/_/dge slong dag gis ji ltar bgyi zhes gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal 
[\[199a.2\]]pa/_mes rung bar gyis la zo shig_/dge slong dag gis re re nas rung bar byas pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_phung por spungs la kha gsum mam bzhir mes reg par byas pas rung bar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong rnams kyis de dag rung bar byas nas dge 
[\[199a.3\]]'dun dag la brims pa dang lhag nas/_dge slong rnams kyis ji ltar bya ba mi shes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de dag kun nyes la nang du chus lugs te der tshags kyis tshogs la phyi dro'i skom du 'thung shig_/de dag gis phyi dro'i skom du brims pa na/_'on kyang 
[\[199a.4\]]lhag nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_skol te zhog la de'i phyi de nyin skom du brims shig_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/_dgun gyi dus la bab pas dge slong rnams grang ste/_gzhi bstar ba'i steng du me bus pa dang /_gzhi bstar ba dag ma rung bar gyur 
[\[199a.5\]]nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gzhi bstar ba'i steng du me ma bud par zhugs ling gi steng du me bus shig_/zhugs ling gi steng du me bus pa dang dud par gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_phyi rol du zhugs ling gi nang du bus la dud pa 
[\[199a.6\]]med pa dang /_mdag ma la ci bder spyod cig_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/_bzo bo zhig gis dge slong rnams la me mar gyi sdong bu yal ga gcig pa zhig byin pa dang /_de dag gis ma blangs so/_/de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol 
[\[199a.7\]]pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge 'dun la mar me'i sdong bu yal ga gcig pa grub na gnang ngo /_/gang zag la yang gnang ngo /_/yal ga gnyis pa'am/_yal ga mang po dag ni dge 'dun la gnang gi gang zag la ni mi gnang ngo /_/rkyang 
[\[199b\]]
[\[199b.1\]]pa'i sgo bzhi pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa brgyad pa'o//_//mdor na/_glo bur gnyis po bya ba dang /_/chu klung pha rol gnyis po dang /_/mang du ma rung byas pa dang /_/lus kyi tshad ni chos gos so/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa na dze ta'i tshal mgon med 
[\[199b.2\]]zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/dge slong glo bur du lhags pa dag cig gtsug lag khang du phyin pa dang /_gzhi na gnas pa'i dge slong gis ngal bsor bcug go/_/de dag ngal bsos zin pa dang /_de dag gis ci yod pa de brkus te dong ngo /_/de ltar gyur pa dge slong 
[\[199b.3\]]dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gang ngo mi shes pa'i rnams ngal bsor ma gzhug shig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis ngo mi shes par ngal bsor ma gzhug shig ces bka' stsal nas/_ngo shes pa zhig ngal bsor bcug pa dang /_
[\[199b.4\]]de'i phyi bzhin du ngo mi shes pa'i dge slong zhig 'ongs te/_dge slong de phyi rol du song ba dang /_des de'i lhung bzed dang chos gos dag len pa la zhugs pa dang /_gzhi de na gnas pa'i dge slong gis bsams pa/_'di ni gdon mi za bar de'i grogs po zhig go snyam nas/_des de ma bgags 
[\[199b.5\]]nas des de khyer te bros so/_/phyis dge slong de slar 'ongs na chos gos dang lhung bzed mi snang nas/_des smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa bdag gi lhung bzed dang chos gos dag sus khyer/_gzhi na gnas pa'i dge slong gis smras pa/_khyod kyi grogs pos khyer ro/_/des smras pa/_nga dang ngo 
[\[199b.6\]]shes pa ni med kyi nga'i lhung bzed dang chos gos khyod kyis bor gyis/_khyod kyis skyin pa byin cig_/de dang dge slong gzhi na gnas pa dang lhan cig tu gcig la gcig rtsod par gyur nas/_de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[199b.7\]]stsal pa/_glo bur du 'ongs pa'i dge slong la 'di su zhig ces dris shig_/de ste dge slong de ngas ngo shes so zhes zer na/_dge slong de la de ste khyod kyis lhung bzed dang chos gos sam/_nga'i yang rung 'di brnya zhes zer na sbyin nam mi sbyin zhes dris shig_/de ste ma sbyin cig ces 
[\[200a\]]
[\[200a.1\]]zer na rin thang bzhin du chod la phob shig_/de ste byin cig ces zer ba las khyer na khyer du zad do/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/_dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa gzhan zhig gzhi na 'dug pa'i dge slong zhig gis ngal bsor bcug nas de'i phyi bzhin ngo mi 
[\[200a.2\]]shes pa'i dge slong zhig 'ongs te/_ji tsam na gzhi na gnas pa'i dge slong de so shing 'dor du phyi rol du song ngo /_/de nas de'i lhung bzed dang chos gos dag des khyer ba dang /_glo bur du 'ongs pa'i dge slong dag gis bsams pa/_'di yang sngon khyim 'di na gnas pa zhig yin 
[\[200a.3\]]no snyam nas des kyang cung zad kyang ma smras nas/_des khyer te bros so/_/gzhi na gnas pa'i dge slong de slar 'ongs pa dang /_lhung bzed dang chos gos mi snang nas/_des smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa nga'i lhung bzed dang chos gos sus khyer/_des smras pa/_gnas khang na 'dug 
[\[200a.4\]]pas khyer ro/_/nga'i gnas khang na gnas pa gang yin/_khyod kyis lhung bzed dang chos gos khyer gyis skyin pa byin cig_/de dang de gnyis lhan cig rtsod par gyur nas/_de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal 
[\[200a.5\]]pa/_glo bur du 'ongs pa'i dge slong gis gzhi na gnas pa'i dge slong la dge slong 'di khyod kyi cung zad ci yang rung ba slong na sbyin nam mi sbyin zhes dris shig_/de ste ma sbyin cig ces zer na rin thang bzhin du phob shig_/de ste byin cig ces zer ba las khyer na khyer du zad do/_/gleng gzhi 
[\[200a.6\]]ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/_dge slong zhig gis gzhi na gnas pa'i dge slong zhig la chos gos bzhag nas chems bzhag pa/_de ste nga song gi 'og tu nga'i slob ma dag 'ongs te 'dod ces zer na byin cig ces smras nas song ngo /_/de'i slob ma zhig gis chos gos khyer te bros so/_/
[\[200a.7\]]de la dge slong des blangs pa dang /_phan tshun rtsod par gyur nas/_de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de ste slob ma la byin cig ces zer na/_des khyer ba ni khyer rgyal du zad mod kyi gtan tshigs 
[\[200b\]]
[\[200b.1\]]yod na byin cig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis gtan tshigs yod na byin cig ces bka' stsal pa dang /_gtan tshigs kun gyis shes shing grags par springs te gzhan gyis thos nas brkus pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gsang ste gtan tshigs smros shig_/
[\[200b.2\]]de yang gtan tshigs 'di 'dra bar shes pa zhig 'ongs na de la byin cig ces bsgo shig_/dge slong dag cig lam du zhugs nas klung gi 'gram du phyin te de gru'i nang du zhugs pa dang /_de na dge slong gzhan zhig 'dug pa la gru'i nang du zhugs pas smras pa/_bdag gi tshang thur 'o ni
