[\[266b.3\]]'di ni myang ba'i rab tu ldan pa zhes bya'o/_/bza' ba'i rab tu ldan pa gang zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bza' ba rnam pa lnga gsungs pa 'di lta ste/_'bras chan dang /_nas chan dang /_'bras phye dang /_sha dang /_khur ba dang /_bza' ba 'di lnga ste/_dge 
[\[266b.4\]]slong rnams kyis shes bzhin du sgra chung ba dang /_balcag sgra med par na ba'i 'du shes dang /_sman gyi 'du shes dang /_rkyen gyi 'du shes dang /_phyir phan pa'i 'du shes nye bar bzhag ste bza' bar bya'o/_/'di ni bza' ba'i rab tu ldan pa zhes bya'o/_/lhung bzed kyi rab tu ldan 
[\[266b.5\]]pa gang zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la lhung bzed rnam pa gnyis gsungs te/_lcags las byas pa dang /_kham pa las byas pa'o/_/lhung bzed rnam pa brgyad ni mi gnang ba ste/_gser dang /_dngul dang /_bai DUr+ya las byas pa dang /_shel las 
[\[266b.6\]]byas pa dang /_shing las byas pa dang /_rdo las byas pa dang /_mching bu las byas pa dang /_khar ba las byas pa ste/_'di ni lhung bzed kyi rab tu ldan pa zhes bya'o/_/gos kyi rab tu ldan pa gang zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la gos rnam pa bcu gsum 
[\[266b.7\]]gsungs te/_'di lta ste/_sbyar ma dang /_stod g.yogs dang /_mthang gos dang /_gding ba dang /_khrus ras dang /_g.yan pa g.yogs pa dang /_stod chags dang /_stod chags kyi 'theb dang /_smad g.yogs dang /_smad g.yogs kyi 'theb dang /_lus phyi ba dang /_
[\[267a\]]
[\[267a.1\]]skra bzed pa dang /_dbyar gyi ras chen dang /_yo byad kyi gos bcu gsum ste/_chos gos bcu gsum po 'di rnams dge slong rnams kyis mtshon gyis gcad cing kha dog bsgyur te rung bar bya mi dgos par byin gyis brlabs pa'i dbang gis yongs su spyad par 
[\[267a.2\]]bya'o/_/'di ni gos kyi rab tu ldan pa zhes bya'o/_/steng g.yogs kyi rab tu ldan pa gang zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la mal stan dgab pa'i phyir steng g.yogs gnyis su gsungs te/_stug na ni chig rim/_srab na ni sbyar ma'o/_/'di ni 
[\[267a.3\]]steng g.yogs kyi rab tu ldan pa zhes bya'o/_/khab kyi rab tu ldan pa gang zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la gos 'tshem pa'i phyir lcags dang /_khar ba dang /_zangs dang /_ra gan gyi khab gnang ste/_'di ni khab kyi rab tu ldan pa zhes bya'o/_/khab ral 
[\[267a.4\]]gyi rab tu ldan pa gang zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la khab sba ba'i phyir khab ral gnang ste/_'di ni khab ral gyi rab tu ldan pa zhes bya'o//_//'dul ba gzhung dam pa/_bam po lnga bcu pa/_gnas 'cha' ba'i rab tu ldan pa gang zhe na/_sangs 
[\[267a.5\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis glo bur du lhags pa'i dge slong gis gnas bca' ba'i don gyi phyir dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang du 'ongs ma thag tu gnas ma bcas kyi bar du rkang pa'i rdul ma phyi shig_/chu snod ma len cig ces gsungs pa dang /_dge slong gzhan zhig glo bur du 
[\[267a.6\]]'ongs pas gnas bca' ba'i don gyi phyir gtsug lag khang du 'ongs na des bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pas gnas bca' ba'i don gyi phyir dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang du 'ongs na gnas ma bcas kyi bar du rkang pa'i rdul ma 'phyi shig_/chu snod kyang ma len cig 
[\[267a.7\]]ces bslab pa'i gnas bcas so zhes pa thos nas des gnas bca' ba'i phyir lus ngal/_lus tshegs che/_lus dub bzhin du phan tshun du brgyugs pa las brgyal te sa la 'gyel nas dus 'das so/_/de lta bur gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas bcom 
[\[267b\]]
[\[267b.1\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lhung bzed dang chos gos zhog la rkang pa'i rdul phyis chu snod long la gdod gnas chos shig_/dge slong de dag su las kyang rung gnas bab bab tu bca' ba dang /_dge ba'i chos yal bar gyur nas de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 
[\[267b.2\]]'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gnas 'cha' ba'i dge slong gis gnas 'cha' bar 'dod na ring thabs bab bab tu gnas ma 'cha' bar zhag gsum gyi bar du bsam pa shin tu soms/_brtag pa shin tu rtogs/_dpyad pa shin tu dpyad nas 
[\[267b.3\]]gdod gnas bca' bar bya'o/_/gang las gnas 'cha' bar 'dod pa dge slong de'i spyod pa ci 'dra ba dang /_'khor ci 'dra ba dang /_de'i gnyis po phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i grogs rnams ci 'dra ba dang /_lung bsgo'am mi bsgo ba dang /_rjes su ston nam mi ston pa dris shig_/
[\[267b.4\]]bdag dge slong de la 'jigs pa dang rim gro bkur sti byed par 'gyur ram mi 'gyur/_dge ba'i chos rnams skye'am/_de ste 'grib par 'gyur zhes bsam pa shin tu soms/_brtag pa shin tu rtogs/_dpyad pa shin tu dpyod la/_gdod gnas chos shig_/gnas sbyin 
[\[267b.5\]]pa'i dge slong gis kyang gnas sbyin par 'dod na/_gang la'ang rung rings par bab bab tu ma sbyin par zhag gsum gyi bar du shin tu soms/_brtag pa shin tu rtogs/_dpyad pa shin tu dpyod la gdod gnas byin cig_/gang la gnas sbyin par 'dod pa'i dge slong de'i spyod pa ci 
[\[267b.6\]]'dra ba dang /_de'i spyod lam ci 'dra ba dang /_kun tu spyod pa ci 'dra ba dris shig_/dge slong de bdag la 'jigs pa dang /_rim gro bkur sti byed pa dang /_dge ba'i chos skye bar 'gyur ram/_de ste 'grib par 'gyur/_dge slong de bdag la 'jigs par 'gyur ram 
[\[267b.7\]]mi 'gyur/_mos shing bkur sti dang dge ba'i chos 'phel lam mi 'phel shin tu bsams pa bsams/_brtag pa shin tu brtags/_dpyad pa shin tu dpyod la de ste sems mgu bar byed na gdod de la gnas byin cig_/de ni gnas 'cha' ba'i rab tu ldan pa zhes bya'o/_/
[\[268a\]]
[\[268a.1\]]gnas 'cha' ba blang ba'i rab tu ldan pa gang zhe na/_gnas 'cha' ba len par 'dod pa'i dge slong gis gnas bca' ba blang bar 'dod na 'di bzhin du gnas long shig_/stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu byos/_lag pa gnyis kyis rkang pa 
[\[268a.2\]]gnyis las bzung ste lan gnyis su tshir la tshig 'di skad du smros shig dgongs shig btsun pa/_bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba btsun pa las gnas 'cha' bar gsol na/_btsun pas bdag la gnas bca' ba stsol cig_/bdag btsun pa la gnas 'cha' zhing 
[\[268a.3\]]mchis so zhes de bzhin lan gnyis lan gsum du smros shig_/des kyang rigs so zhes smros shig_/des yang slar legs so zhes sam shin tu legs so zhes bya'o/_/slar yang bag yod par sgrubs shig_/ces pa 'di ni gnas 'cha' ba blang ba'i rab tu ldan pa 
[\[268a.4\]]zhes bya'o/_/gnas 'cha' ba sbyin pa'i rab tu ldan pa gang zhe na/_dge slong lo bcu ma lon pas gnas 'cha' ba mi sbyin no/_/lo bcu lon du zin kyang mi shes pa glen pa/_mi gsal ba/_mi mkhas par grags na des kyang gnas 'cha' ba ma sbyin cig_/chos lnga dang ldan 
[\[268a.5\]]pa'i dge slong gis gnas 'cha' ba sbyin par bya ste/_nyes pa shes pa dang /_nyes pa med pa shes pa dang /_lci ba shes pa dang /_yang ba shes pa dang /_so sor thar pa'i mdo dang rgyas pa shes par gyur pa ste/_de ni gnas 'cha' ba sbyin pa'i rab tu ldan pa zhes bya'o/_/gnas 
[\[268a.6\]]bca' ba so sor btang ba'i rab tu ldan pa gang zhe na/_chos lnga dang ldan na gnas bca' ba btang bar gyur te/_lnga gang zhe na/_dad pa med pa yin/_le lo can dang /_bkur sti med pa dang /_tshig ngan du smra ba dang /_sdig pa'i grogs po can yin no/_/gzhan yang rgyu lnga dang 
[\[268a.7\]]rkyen lngas na gnas 'cha' ba btang bar 'gyur te/_spyo ba dang /_song ba dang /_phyogs las gzhan gyi phyogs su song ba dang /_mkhan po mthong ma thag tu gnas 'cha' ba btang bar 'gyur ba dang /_gnyis kas kyang btang ba de ni gnas 'cha' ba btang ba'i rab tu ldan pa zhes bya'o/_/
[\[268b\]]
[\[268b.1\]]mkhan po'i rab tu ldan pa gang zhe na/_dge slong de dag mkhan po med par rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs par byas pas na ma dul bar gyur/_ngan par dul ba dang /_tshul dang mi ldan pa/_smad g.yogs mi sdug par gyon/_bla gos mi sdug par gyon/_spyod pa nyams shing 
[\[268b.2\]]mi sdug par spyod pa la zhugs pa dang /_cha lugs ngan/_cha lugs mi sdug pa la zhugs nas de la su yang nad g.yog mi byed par gyur pa dang /_de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_mkhan po 
[\[268b.3\]]yod pa dang /_des de dag 'dul bar byed/_lung bsgo bar byed/_rjes su yang ston par byed/_'chos par byed na yang bsnyen bkur dang nad g.yog byed par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bsnyen bkur byos shig ces gsungs pa 'di ni mkhan po'i 
[\[268b.4\]]rab tu ldan pa zhes bya'o/_/lhan cig spyod pa'i rab tu ldan pa gang zhe na/_de dge slong gi rab tu phyung bsnyen par rdzogs par byas na mkhan po la rim gro mi byed nas de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[268b.5\]]lhan cig spyod pas ni mkhan po la rim gro byos shig_/gzhar bar byos shig_/blta bar byos shig_/mgu bar byos shig_/rjes bzhin du 'brang bar byos shig_/bsnyen bkur byos shig_/bya ba thams cad kyang mkhan po la ma dris kyi bar du ma byed cig_/rnam 
[\[268b.6\]]pa gsum ma gtogs te/_bshang gci dang /_so shing dor ba dang /_mtshams kyi nang nas mchod rten la phyag 'tshal ba ma gtogs so/_/lhan cig spyod pa dang ldan pas kyang bya ba thams cad mkhan po la dris shing byos shig_/bshang gci dang /_so shing dor ba dang /_
[\[268b.7\]]mtshams kyi nang du mchod rten la phyag 'tshal ba ma gtogs so/_/lhan cig spyod pa dang ldan pa dag gis kyang lhan cig spyod pa'i mkhan po la bkur sti byos shig_/bla mar byos shig_/mchod par byos shig_/mgu bar byos shig_/de'i bya ba zhig yod na yang le lo 
[\[269a\]]
[\[269a.1\]]mi bya zhing shes bzhin du myur du gyis shig_/rim gro dang bcas/_'dzem pa dang bcas/_'jigs pa dang bcas par 'gyur bar byos shig_/ngo tsha ba dang /_sems dman pa dang /_bdag gi dge ba cir 'gyur snyam pa dang /_de log pa zhig la 'jug na 
[\[269a.2\]]yang mkhan pos bzlog par gyis shig_/mkhan po la yang des bzlog par gyis shig_/mkhan po na na des nad g.yog gus par bya/_bdag gi don kyang ma nyams par bya ba de ni lhan cig spyod pa'i rab tu ldan pa zhes bya'o/_/slob dpon gyi rab tu ldan pa gang zhe na/_dge 
[\[269a.3\]]slong de dag slob dpon med par rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs par byas pas na ma dul bar gyur/_ngan par dul ba dang /_tshul dang mi ldan/_sham thabs mi sdug par gyon/_bla gos mi ran par gyon/_spyod pa nyams shing mi sdug par spyod pa la zhugs pa dang /_cha 
[\[269a.4\]]lugs mi sdug_/cha lugs log pa la zhugs nas/_de la su yang nad g.yog mi byed par gyur pa dang /_de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_slob dpon yod kyang des de dag dul bar byed/_lung 
[\[269a.5\]]bsgo bar byed/_rjes su yang ston par byed/_'chos par byed/_na na yang bsnyen bkur dang nad g.yog byed par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bsnyen bkur byos shig ces gsungs pa 'di ni slob dpon gyi rab tu ldan pa zhes bya'o/_/nye gnas kyi 
[\[269a.6\]]rab tu ldan pa gang zhe na/_de dge slong dag gis rab tu phyung bsnyen par rdzogs par byas na slob dpon la rim gro mi byed nas/_de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_nye gnas kyis ni slob dpon 
[\[269a.7\]]la rim gro byos shig_/gzhar bar byos shig_/blta bar byos shig_/mgu bar byos shig_/rjes bzhin du 'brang bar byos shig_/bsnyen bkur byos shig_/bya ba thams cad kyang slob dpon la ma dris kyi bar du ma byed cig_/rnam pa gsum ma gtogs te/_bshang 
[\[269b\]]
[\[269b.1\]]gci dang /_so shing dor ba dang /_mtshams kyi nang du mchod rten la phyag 'tshal ba ma gtogs so/_/nye gnas dang ldan pas kyang bya ba thams cad slob dpon la dris shing byos shig_/bshang gci dang /_so shing dor ba dang /_mtshams kyi nang du mchod rten 
[\[269b.2\]]la phyag 'tshal ba ma gtogs so/_/nye gnas dang ldan pa dag gis kyang nye gnas kyis slob dpon la bkur stir byos shig_/bla mar byos shig_/mchod par byos shig_/mgu bar byos shig_/de'i bya ba zhig yod na yang le lo mi bya zhing shes bzhin du myur du gyis 
[\[269b.3\]]shig_/rim gro dang bcas/_'dzem pa dang bcas/_'jigs pa dang bcas par byos shig_/ngo tsha ba dang /_sems dman pa dang /_bdag gi dge ba cir 'gyur snyam pa dang /_de log pa zhig la 'jug pa na yang slob dpon gyis bzlog par gyis shig_/slob 
[\[269b.4\]]dpon la yang des bzlog par gyis shig_/slob dpon na na des nad g.yog gus par bya/_bdag gi don kyang ma nyams par bya ba de ni nye gnas kyi rab tu ldan pa zhes bya'o/_/mkhan po dang slob dpon dang lhan cig spyod pa dang nye gnas kyi rab tu ldan pa gang zhe na/_mkhan po dang 
[\[269b.5\]]slob dpon gyis lhan cig spyod pa dang nye gnas la bu lta bu'i 'du shes mngon du zhog shig_/lhan cig spyod pa dang nye gnas kyis kyang mkhan po dang slob dpon la phar 'du shes mngon du dga' bar bya ste/_'di ni mkhan po dang slob dpon dang lhan cig spyod pa dang nye gnas kyi rab tu ldan pa 
[\[269b.6\]]zhes bya'o/_/dge slong gi rab tu ldan pa dge tshul gyi rab tu ldan pa gang zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la dge tshul pha chongs shig par gnang ste/_tha ma ni bya rog skrod nus la lo bdun pa'o/_/de la nyes pa'i dmigs shig byung na dge bsnyen dad pa'i mdun du spyo zhing 
[\[269b.7\]]spongs shig_/sgren mor ma spang shig_/gos gcig par ma spang bar stod g.yogs mthang gos dang ldan par spang ste/_'di ni dge tshul gyi rab tu ldan pa zhes bya'o/_/dngos po'i rab tu ldan pa gang zhe na/_phyogs gar thog ma gtsug lag khang rtsig pa der las gsar du byed pa'i dge 
[\[270a\]]
[\[270a.1\]]slong gis rtogs shig_/sngar gtsug lag khang gi dngos po brtag pa ni 'od pa dang ldan nam/_skyed shing dang ldan nam/_chu dang ldan nam/_'chag sa dang ldan nam/_nye 'khor dang ldan nam/_rtsod pa med dam/_dog pa med dam/_spyod yul dang mi ring ngam/_ha 
[\[270a.2\]]cang yang mi nye'am/_nyin par ldugs mi mang ngam/_'khrug pa mi che'am/_mtshan mo yang sgra mi che'am/_ca co mi che'am/_gdug pa'i srog chags dang sbrang bu dang sbrul dang rlung dang tsha bas mi bde ba lta med dam/_zhi ba dben pa bsam gtan gyi rjes su mthun nam/_nang du yang 
[\[270a.3\]]dag 'jog pa'i gzhir rung ngam mi rung zhes shin tu rtogs par byas la gdod gtsug lag khang brtsig go/_/las gsar byed pa'i dge slong gis shin tu ma brtags par gtsug lag khang brtsigs na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur te/_'di ni dngos po'i rab tu ldan pa zhes bya'o/_/gtsug 
[\[270a.4\]]lag khang gi rab tu ldan pa gang zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la gtsug lag khang rab tu gnang ba ni khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]khyams bzhi pa dang /_khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]khyams bcu gnyis po de sgo khang ni bzhi rtseg gam bdun rtseg go/_/khang bu brtsegs pa dang /_bsro gang dang /_
[\[270a.5\]]tshang mang dang /_bkad sa dang /_'chag sa dang /_dugs khang dang /_rkang pa'i bkru khang dang /_gnas khang dang /_snga khang dang /_khang pa 'khor du bcas pa dang /_khang pa glo 'bur te/_dge 'dun gyi yang rung /_gang zag gi yang rung /_slob pa dang mi slob pa'i yang rung ste/_
[\[270a.6\]]spyod lam bzhir rung bar 'gyur ba ni gtsug lag khang gi rab tu ldan pa zhes bya'o/_/mal stan gyi rab tu ldan pa gang zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la mal stan rjes su gnang ba ni 'di lta ste/_khri dang /_khri'u dang /_stan nang tshangs can dang /_la ba dang /_sngas rten dang /_
[\[270a.7\]]gru bzhi pa ste/_dge 'dun gyi'ang rung gang zag gi yang rung /_gding ba dang /_bgo ba 'di ni mal stan gyi rab tu ldan pa zhes bya'o/_/las gsar gyi rab tu ldan pa gang zhe na/_de 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis gang gi tshe gtsug lag khang byos shig par rjes su gnang ba de na/_dge slong rnams 
[\[270b\]]
[\[270b.1\]]kyis ji ltar dga' ba bzhin du las gsar pa byed de/_de la kha cig gis ni brtsams pa las dus 'das par gyur/_kha cig gis ni brtsams nas dong /_kha cig gis ni zin par byed do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'brog dgon pa na 'brog dgon pa'i mchog gi nags na 
[\[270b.2\]]bzhugs te/_de'i tshe na dgon pa'i gtsug lag khang rnams zhig kyang las gsar pa mi byed de/_dgon pa'i gtsug lag khang zhig kyang las gsar pa mi byed par bcom ldan 'das kyis gzigs so/_/de ltar gzigs nas yang /_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la kun dga' bo ci'i rgyu 
[\[270b.3\]]ci'i rkyen gyis na dgon pa 'di dag las gsar pa mi byed ces gsungs pa dang /_btsun pa de 'di ltar dgon pa'i dge slong dag las kha cig ni dus las 'das/_kha cig ni dong /_kha cig ni legs par bgyid pas na btsun pa rgyu de dang rkyen de lta bu'i phyir dgon pa pa dag las gsar 
[\[270b.4\]]pa mi byed do zhes smras pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_las gsar du byed pa'i dge slong skos shig_/de yang rim bzhin du ma yin gyi gang rang bzhin gyis dge ba la brtson zhing le lo med pa brtson 'grus kyi nan tan dang ldan pa las gsar du byed nus pa/_las gsar 
[\[270b.5\]]pa la don byed pa de lta bu ni las gsar du byed par gsol pa dang /_gnyis kyi las kyis bsko bar bya'o/_/de na dge slong rnams 'di ltar rtsig pa ral ba las slar brtsig pa tsam mam/_bal glang gi lci ba byugs pa tsam dang /_gang ci yang rung ba zhag gcig tsam gyi phyir yang 
[\[270b.6\]]las gsar du byed pa'i dge slong bsko ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gang ci'i la yang rung zhag gcig tsam gyi phyir las gsar pa byed pa'i dge slong ma bsko bar/_gang mchod rten nam/_gtsug lag khang rnying pa slar bcos sam/_de ste gsar pa byed kyang rung 
[\[270b.7\]]gis de'i phyir las gsar pa byed pa skos shig_/de dag nam 'tsho ba'i bar du bskos te/_dud pa can gyi nang de nyid du 'khod par byed pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_nam 'tsho ba'i bar du ma bsko shig_/dud pa can gyi nang na 'khod par yang ma byed cig_/las 
[\[271a\]]
[\[271a.1\]]gsar du byed pa yang gnas khang rnying pa 'chos na lo drug tu skos shig_/gnas khang gsar pa la ni lo bcu gnyis so/_/las gsar dang rab tu ldan pa'i dge slong des kyang gtsug lag khang gang na gnas par dge slong des gtsug lag khang der dus dus su kun tu 
[\[271a.2\]]byul zhing rtogs shig_/de ste gtsug lag khang de na ral zhing zhig par mthong na de ste bdag nyid kyis nus par gyur na ni bdag nyid kyis slar gso bar byos shig_/bdag nyid kyis bya ba mi nus na tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa gzhan dag la ston cig_/ston la bdag 
[\[271a.3\]]gis mngon sum du zhal ta gyis la slar chos shig_/de yal bar ma dor cig_/phyal bar bor na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur te/_'di ni las gsar gyi rab tu ldan pa zhes bya'o/_/las gsar du byed par rab tu ldan pa gang zhe na/_de la las gsar du byed pa'i dge 
[\[271a.4\]]slong gis dge 'dun gyi las gsar du byed pa la zhugs na de dge 'dun gyi las kyis rmongs pas na las gsar du bya ba yang shor bar gyur nas/_de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_ngas rjes su gnang 
[\[271a.5\]]gis las gsar du byed pa'i dge slong la dge 'dun gyi las ma bsko shig_/gtsug lag khang rnying pa slar gso ba de la ni lo gnyis su las kyi res su mi bsko ste/_nam brtsigs g.yogs skyong nul zin gyi bar du'o/_/gang gis gnas khang bzhi pa'i gtsug lag khang zhig rtsig 
[\[271a.6\]]na de la lo bzhi'i bar du las su mi bsko ste/_nam brtsigs g.yogs skyong nul zin gyi bar du'o/_/gang gnas khang brgyad pa'i gtsug lag khang rtsig na de la lo brgyad kyi bar du las kyi res su mi bsko ste/_nam brtsigs g.yogs skyong nul zin gyi bar du'o/_/gnas khang 
[\[271a.7\]]khyams bcu gnyis pa'i gtsug lag khang zhig rtsig na de la lo bcu gnyis kyi bar du las kyi res su mi bsko ste/_nam brtsigs g.yogs skyong nul zin gyi bar du'o/_/gang mchod rten dang bcas pa'i dge 'dun kun dga' ra ba zhig rtsig la mal stan rnams kyang sbyor bar byed na nam 
[\[271b\]]
[\[271b.1\]]'tsho'i bar du las kyi res su mi bsko ste/_las gsar gyi rab tu ldan pa de yang chos lnga dang ldan pa'i dge slong las gsar la ma bskos na ni ma bsko shig_/bskos na ni phyung shig_/lnga gang zhe na/_mi brtson pa dang /_le lo can dang /_nan tan du mi byed pa dang /_myur du mi byed pa 
[\[271b.2\]]dang /_las gsar pa byas pa dang ma byas pa mi shes pa'o/_/chos rnam pa lnga dang ldan pa'i dge slong las gsar pa byed par ma bskos na ni bskos shig_/bskos na ni ma phyung shig_/lnga gang zhe na/_brtson pa can dang /_le lo med pa dang /_nan tan dang ldan pa dang /_
[\[271b.3\]]myur bar byed pa dang /_las gsar pa byas pa dang ma byas pa shes pa'o/_/las gsar pa byed pa'i dge slong gis kyang gtsug lag khang dus dus su byul cig_/ci nas gtsug lag khang las byed pa des kun tu spro bar bya ba ni ji ltar gtsug lag khang thams cad la las gsar 
[\[271b.4\]]pa byas pa nyams par mi 'gyur ba de lta bur spro ba bskyed par bya ste/_de ltar byas na ni legs/_de ltar ma byas na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur te/_de lta bu ni las gsar du byed pa dang rab tu ldan pa zhes bya'o/_/phyag 'tshal ba'i rab tu ldan pa gang zhe na/_bcom 
[\[271b.5\]]ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal ba rnam pa gnyis gnang ste/_dge slong la phyag bya ba dang /_ston pa la phyag bya ba'o/_/dge slong gis ni ji ltar rgan rims kyi dge slong la mngon du tshig snyan pa dang /_phyag bya ba dang /_mngon du ldang ba dang /_thal mo sbyar ba dang /_
[\[271b.6\]]phyag bya bar bya ste/_mgos rkang pa la phyag bya ba dang /_lag pa gnyis kyis rkang pa gnyis nas bzung zhing btsir ba'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa la ni dkyil 'khor lngas phyag bya ste/_de ni phyag bya ba'i rab tu ldan pa zhes bya'o/_/khu ba skyur po'i rab tu ldan pa gang zhe na/_khu ba 
[\[271b.7\]]skyur po ni dge slong na ba dang /_rlung nad can rnams la ste/_ji ltar tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la gnang ba bzhin no/_/rdzas gang la khu ba skyur po bya zhe na/_rtsa ba dang /_sdong bu dang /_lo ma dang /_me tog dang /_sman dang /_sa bon thams cad de dag gcig tu sbangs nas nam skyur bar gyur pa de na 
[\[272a\]]
[\[272a.1\]]dang ba/_ma rnyogs pa/_dar tshags kyis btsags la chus bslad de dang bar byas nas nyin par dang srod kyi bar du btung ste/_de ni khu ba skyur po'i rab tu ldan pa'o/_/phye ma'i rab tu ldan pa gang zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la phye ma rnam pa 
[\[272a.2\]]gnyis yongs su gnang ste/_sman gyi phye ma dang /_bkru ba'i phye ma'o/_/sman gyi phye ma rnams nad gzhil ba'i phyir gnang ngo /_/bkru ba'i phye ma dge slong rnams la gnang ba ni rgyags pa'i phyir ma yin/_dregs pa'i phyir ma yin/_mdzes pa'i phyir ma yin/_brgyan pa'i 
[\[272a.3\]]phyir ma yin gyi lus kyi dri ma bsal ba'i phyir ro/_/ci las bkru ba'i phye ma bya zhe na/_sran gre'u dang /_sran mA Sha dang /_rgya sran dang /_sran ma dang /_de rnams kyi phyi shun dang /_'bru hri min ta rnams la bya ste/_dge slong rnams la dri sna tshogs kyis sbags pa de brgyan 
[\[272a.4\]]pa'i phyir ma yin gyi bkru ba'i phye mar yongs su spyad par bya'o/_/ma bslangs par dri dang sbags pa zhig rnyed par gyur na nyes pa med de/_de dang mthun pa'i sman rnams kyis rang gis kyang sbags shing spyod na de bzhin te/_de ni phye ma'i rab tu ldan pa zhes bya'o/_/sman gyi 
[\[272a.5\]]rab tu ldan pa gang zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong nad pa rnams la nad gzhil ba'i phyir sman rjes su gnang ste/_snga dro dang /_phyi dro dang /_bdun pa dang /_nam 'tsho'i bar du ste/_rtswa ba'i sman dang /_sdong bu'i sman dang /_lo ma'i sman dang /_me tog gi sman dang /_
[\[272a.6\]]'bras bu'i sman no/_/dge slong mi na bas ni na ba'i sman yongs su mi spyad de/_'di ni sman gyi rab tu ldan pa zhes bya'o/_/btung ba'i rab tu ldan pa gang zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la drang srong kai n+ya ya zhes bya ba las te dge slong rnams la btung ba rnam pa 
[\[272a.7\]]brgyad rjes su gnang ngo /_/de dag gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_shing tog tso tsa'i dang /_mo tsa'i dang /_rgya shug gi dang /_'bra go'i dang /_pa ru sha dang /_a shwat+tha'i dang /_u dum bA ra'i dang /_rgun 'brum gyi ste/_btung ba rnam pa brgyad po 'di dag ni dge slong rnams 
[\[272b\]]
[\[272b.1\]]la gnang gis kha zas ma 'bags pa dang /_mi myos pa dang /_mi skyur ba dang /_sangs pa dang /_dang ba dang /_ma rnyogs par dar tshags kyis tshogs la chus slod de phyi dro'i byas pa btang ste/_'di ni btung ba'i rab tu ldan pa zhes bya'o/_/pags pa'i rab tu ldan pa 
[\[272b.2\]]gang zhe na/_dge slong gis pags pa gzhag par mi bya/_bcang bar mi bya/_byin gyis brlab par mi bya/_gding bar mi bya/_de la 'dug par mi bya/_stan du gding bar mi bya/_de la 'jug par mi bya/_de la 'dres par mi bya/_lham gong ral sbu bu can dang /_
[\[272b.3\]]mchil can dang /_gong cad dang /_yu thung ste/_khyim pa'i nang du de 'dra ba'i rkyen cig byung na ni pags pa la 'dug par bya'o/_/nad pas ni pags pa la 'dug par bya ste/_'di ni pags pa'i rab tu ldan pa zhes bya'o/_/lham gyi rab tu ldan pa gang zhe na/_bcom 
[\[272b.4\]]ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la lham rnam pa gnyis gnang ste/_lham mchil rim gcig pa dang /_khyim pa'i lham rim mang po yang rung ngo /_/dge slong gis ri mor bris pa'i lham ma 'chang shig_/de ni lham gyi rab tu ldan pa zhes bya'o/_/shing lham gyi rab tu ldan 
[\[272b.5\]]pa gang zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la shing lham rnam pa gnyis gnang ste/_bshang gci'i shing lham dang /_khri rten gyi shing lham mo/_/dge slong gis de ma yin par gzhan du shing lham mi bcang ste/_gzhan du bcangs na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur 
[\[272b.6\]]te/_'di ni shing lham gyi rab tu ldan pa zhes bya'o/_/drud pa'i rab tu ldan pa gang zhe na/_dge slong gis rta'i drud pa'am/_mtsho'i dbu ba'am/_gyo mos rkang pa drud pa ma 'chang shig_/de ni drud pa'i rab tu ldan pa zhes bya'o/_/khar ba'i rab tu ldan pa gang zhe na/_bcom 
[\[272b.7\]]ldan 'das kyis dge slong nad pa dang /_rgan po la khar ba rjes su gnang ngo /_/de ste rtsa bar gas na ni lcags kyis bskor cig_/rtse mor gas na ni sbu bur chug shig_/de ni khar ba'i rab tu ldan pa zhes bya ste/_rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer gyi bsil ba'i tshal gyi dur khrod na sbrul yod de/_
[\[273a\]]
[\[273a.1\]]dge slong rnams dur khrod kyi nang du dong ba dang /_sbrul gyis reg par gyur nas de lta bur gyur pa dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sbrul rnams bskrad pa'i phyir sgra dang bcas pa'i khar ba 'chang bar gnang 
[\[273a.2\]]ste/_'di ni khar ba'i rab tu ldan pa zhes bya'o/_/dra ba'i rab tu ldan pa gang zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong na ba dang rgas pa la dra ba gnang ste/_dge slong gis tshon sna tshogs kyis dra ba brgyan pa'i phyir ma 'chang shig_/'di ni dra ba'i rab tu ldan pa zhes bya'o/_/khar ba 
[\[273a.3\]]dang dra ba'i rab tu ldan pa gang zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong na ba dang rgas pa la khar ba dang dra ba'i sdom pa gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las kyis byin cig par rjes su gnang ste/_rgyas par ni 'dul ba las 'byung ba bzhin te/_'di ni khar ba dang dra ba'i rab tu ldan pa zhes bya'o/_/sgog 
[\[273a.4\]]skya'i rab tu ldan pa gang zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis na ba rlung nad can la sgog skya rjes su gnang ste/_ji ltar tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la gnang ba bzhin no/_/dge slong mi na bar sgog skya ma za shig_/za na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/_/de ste na zo la tshul bzhin du byos 
[\[273a.5\]]shig_/sgog pa'i tshul de ni 'di lta bu ste dge slong gis sgog skya zos na ston pa la ltar ma 'gro shig_/mkhan po dang slob dpon gyi drung du ma 'gro shig_/bla ma la yang ma yin/_bla ma'i gnas su gyur pa yang ma yin ston par yang ma byed cig_/nod par yang ma byed cig_/dran 
[\[273a.6\]]par yang ma yin/_'dri bar yang ma yin/_grong du yang ma 'jug shig_/zas la gral du yang mi bkad/_thug pa 'thung bar yang ma yin/_skyo ma 'thung bar yang ma yin/_chos nyan par yang ma yin/_dge slong rnams dang lhan cig tu 'dug par yang ma byed cig_/'du 
[\[273a.7\]]bar yang ma yin/_gzhan ci'i don la yang rung ste/_lhan cig mi 'dug_/gnas khang dben par 'dug par bya/_de ste gang zag gi gding ba dang bgo ba med par gyur na phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi ngan pa las long shig_/bshang gci'i sa yang logs shig tu byos shig_/de 
[\[273b\]]
[\[273b.1\]]ste zhag gcig sgog skya zos na zhag bdun gyi bar du song shig_/bdun du zos na yang bdun du song shig_/bdun 'das nas ni gding ba dang bgos pa yang khrus shig_/gnas khang yang byi bdar gyis shig_/gnas khang gi zla rnams kyang phyag dar phyogs shig_/zhal zhal 
[\[273b.2\]]gyis 'jam por gyis shig_/ba lang gi lci bas yugs shig_/bshang gci sar yang byi bdar gyis shig_/chos gos khrus shig_/khrus byos shig_/de'i 'og tu ci bder ston pa la ltar song shig_/mkhan po dang slob dpon dang /_bla ma'i gnas su 'gyur ba rnams la ltar 
[\[273b.3\]]song shig_/ston pa yang byin cig_/nod pa dang dran par bya ba dang /_dri ba yang byos shig_/grong du yang zhugs shig_/zas la gral du yang bkad par bya'o/_/skyo ma dang thug pa 'thung ba'i gral du yang bkad par bya/_chos mnyan par bya/_dge slong dang lhan 
[\[273b.4\]]cig tu 'dug par bya'o/_/sgog skya za ba'i dge slong gis ji ltar mtshungs par spyad pa'i chos bcas pa bzhin mtshungs par ma spyad na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur te/_'di ni sgog skya'i rab tu ldan pa zhes bya'o/_/spu gri'i rab tu ldan pa gang zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[273b.5\]]dge slong rnams la skra breg pa'i phyir spu gri rjes su gnang ba de ni spu gri'i rab tu ldan pa zhes bya'o/_/spu gri'i shubs rab tu ldan pa gang zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la spu gri'i tshas kyi phyir spu gri'i shubs rjes su gnang ba de ni spu gri'i shubs rab tu ldan pa zhes 
[\[273b.6\]]bya'o/_/lde mig kyog po'i rab tu ldan pa gang zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la mal stan drub pa dang /_dge 'dun la bde ba dang /_dge 'dun la dge bar spyod pa'i phyir lde mig kyog po rjes su gnang ste/_'di ni lde mig kyog po'i rab tu ldan pa zhes bya'o/_/
[\[273b.7\]]sgo lcags kyi rab tu ldan pa gang zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la sgo lcags rjes su gnang ba ni 'khrul 'khor byas pa lde mig gis rab tu dbye ba ste/_'di ni sgo lcags kyi rab tu ldan pa zhes bya'o/_/bzhon pa'i rab tu ldan pa gang zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong 
[\[274a\]]
[\[274a.1\]]rgan pa dang /_rgan 'khogs pa dang /_na ba dang /_rtsol mi nus pa dang /_dar la bab pa rnams kyi phyir bzhon pa rjes su gnang ste/_dge slong gis brgyan pa'i ri mo bris pa'i bzhon pa la ma zhon cig_/bzhon pa mo la rang gi bzhon par ma byed cig_/'di ni 
[\[274a.2\]]bzhon pa'i rab tu ldan pa zhes bya'o/_/gdugs kyi rab tu ldan pa gang zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la char dang tsha ba'i gnyen po'i phyir gdugs rjes su gnang ste/_gdugs bris pa ri mo can brgyan pa'i phyir ma 'chang shig_/yu ba ring po ma 'chang shig_/
[\[274a.3\]]gdugs thogs bzhin du grong du 'gro bar mi bya ste/_'di ni gdugs kyi rab tu ldan pa zhes bya'o/_/bsil yab kyi rab tu ldan pa gang zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la tsha ba'i gnyen po'i phyir bsil yab gnang ste/_dge slong gis bsil yab ri mo can brgyan 
[\[274a.4\]]pa'i phyir ma 'chang shig_/de ni bsil yab kyi rab tu ldan pa zhes bya'o/_/rnga ma'i sbrang yab kyi rab tu ldan pa gang zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la srog chags gdug pa dang sbrang bu bskrad pa'i phyir rnga ma'i sbrang yab gnang ste/_sbrang yab rnga ma gang las bya zhe na/_
[\[274a.5\]]rnga mo dang /[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dang /_skud pa'am/_ra da las te/_dge slong gis sbrang yab ri mo can brgyan pa'i phyir ma 'chang shig_/sbrang yab ni rnam pa gnyis te/_gcig ni rang bzhin gyis pa'o/_/gcig ni smug pa'o/_/'di ni rnga ma'i sbrang yab kyi rab tu ldan pa zhes bya'o/_/
[\[274a.6\]]sbrang yab kyi yu ba'i rab tu ldan pa gang zhe na/_dge slong gis rnga yab kyi yu ba ring po ma 'chang shig_/de ste rnyed na long shig_/long la sangs rgyas kyi mchod rten nam/_nyan thos kyi mchod rten la dbul te/_'di ni sbrang yab kyi yu ba'i rab tu ldan pa zhes bya'o/_/me long gi rab tu 
[\[274a.7\]]ldan pa gang zhe na/_dge slong rnams me long ngam/_lhung bzed kyi me long ngam/_chu long la gdong ma lta zhig_/de ste gdong la rma yod dam/_gdong sngon gyi dad da'ang ci 'dra ba'i phyir lta'am/_gdong gi gnyer ma dang skra dkar la lta'am/_'dus byas kyi dngos po 'di rnyings par 'gyur ba'o/_/
[\[274b\]]
[\[274b.1\]]'jig par 'gyur ba'o snyam du lta 'dod pa la ni nyes pa med de 'di ni me long gi rab tu ldan pa zhes bya'o/_/phreng ba dang /_dri dang /_byug pa'i rab tu ldan pa gang zhe na/_dge slong gis phreng ba dang /_dri dang /_byug pa rang la yang ma 'chang shig_/gzhan la yang ma sbyin cig_/de ste rnyed na 
[\[274b.2\]]yang long shig_/long la sangs rgyas kyi mchod rten nam/_nyan thos kyi mchod rten la phul cig_/'di ni phreng ba dang /_dri dang /_byug pa'i rab tu ldan pa zhes bya'o/_/gar dang glu dang rol mo brdung ba'i rab tu ldan pa gang zhe na/_dge slong gis gar dang glu dang brdung ba rang gis 
[\[274b.3\]]kyang ma byed cig_/gzhan la yang byed du ma 'jug shig_/bltar yang ma 'gro shig_/ci nas gar dang glu dang brdung ba spang bar bya ste/_'di ni gar dang glu dang rol mo brdung ba'i rab tu ldan pa zhes bya'o/_/tshul shing gi rab tu ldan pa gang zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong 
[\[274b.4\]]bgrang ba'i phyir tshul shing rjes su gnang ste/_tshul shing shin tu ring ba yang ma yin/_thung ba yang ma yin/_sbom pa yang ma yin/_phra ba yang ma yin/_'khyor ba yang ma yin/_rtsub pa yang ma yin par snyoms par bya/_drang ba dang /_'jam pa dang /_bzhin gnang ba lta bur bya'o/_/
[\[274b.5\]]'di ni tshul shing gi rab tu ldan pa zhes bya'o/_/mig sman gyi rab tu ldan pa gang zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong mig na ba la mig sman rnam pa lnga gnang ba ni 'di lta ste/_me tog gi mig sman dang /_phye ma'i mig sman dang /_ril bu'i mig sman dang /_bro'i mig sman dang /_mig 
[\[274b.6\]]sman nag po'o/_/dge slong rnams sgeg cing cha ba'i phyir ni mig sman mi 'chang bar bya'o/_/de ste na bar gyur na rjes su mthun pa'i sman de ba sku bar bya'o/_/de ni mig sman gyi rab tu ldan pa zhes bya'o/_/mig sman gyi thur ma'i rab tu ldan pa gang zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la mig 
[\[274b.7\]]sman dang thur ma gnang ba ni ji ltar 'dul ba las rgyas par 'byung ba bzhin te de ni mig sman gyi thur ma'i rab tu ldan pa zhes bya'o/_/mig sman gyi snod kyi rab tu ldan pa gang zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la mig sman gyi snod gnang ba ni ji ltar 'dul ba las rgyas par 'byung ba bzhin te/_
[\[275a\]]
[\[275a.1\]]de ni mig sman gyi snod dang rab tu ldan pa zhes bya'o/_/gtun dang rab tu ldan pa gang zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la sman 'thag pa'i phyir gtun dang gtun bu gnang ba de ni gtun gyi rab tu ldan pa zhes bya'o/_/nyal ba dang rab tu ldan pa gang zhe na/_dge 
[\[275a.2\]]slong rnams nyin par mi nyal/_me mar 'bar ba la yang ma yin/_de ste stur ba can zhig yin na ni langs te bcag par bya/_de ste mi nus na gzhan du 'gro bar bya'o/_/de'i rkyen gyis gzhan la yang mi gnod par bya ba de ni nyal ba dang rab tu ldan pa zhes bya'o/_/'dug pa'i 
[\[275a.3\]]rab tu ldan pa gang zhe na/_nyin par 'chag gam/_'dug pa'i tshe sgrib pa'i chos rnams sems la yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/nyin par 'chag cing 'dug pa'i tshe sgrib pa'i chos rnams sems la yongs su sbyangs nas mtshan mo mel tshe dang po la 'chag cing 'gro ba'i tshe yang 
[\[275a.4\]]sgrib pa'i chos rnams sems la yongs su sbyang bar bya/_mel tshe dang po'i tshe 'chag cing 'gro ba na sgrib pa'i chos rnams sems la yongs su sbyangs nas mtshan mo mel tshe bar ma'i tshe gtsug lag khang gi phyi rol du byung ste rkang pa bkrus nas gnas khang du zhugs te bla gos bzhi 
[\[275a.5\]]ltab tu bltab ste bting /_sbyar ma stug por bltab ste sngas su bcug la g.yas phyogs kyis nyal bar bya ste/_rkang pa la rkang pas mnan te yan lag mi dbral ba dang /_sems mi g.yeng ba dang /_gos ma gyes pa dang /_gnang bar 'du shes pa dang dran zhing shes pa dang ldang 
[\[275a.6\]]ba'i 'du shes yid la bya ste/_tho rangs myur zhing rings par langs te 'chag gam 'dug pa'i tshe sgrib pa'i chos rnams sems la yongs su sbyong ba'i de ni 'dug pa'i rab tu ldan pa zhes bya'o/_/pus 'khyud kyi rab tu ldan pa gang zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la na ba 
[\[275a.7\]]dang rgyab na ba'i phyir ji ltar tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la pus 'khyud gnang ba bzhin te/_dge slong gis pus 'khyud ri mo can brgyan pa'i phyir mi bcang bar bya ste/_de ni pus 'khyud kyi rab tu ldan pa zhes bya'o/_/brdung shing gi rab tu ldan pa gang zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong la 
[\[275b\]]
[\[275b.1\]]chos gos brdung ba'i phyir shing gi brdung gzhi dang brdung tho gnang ba de ni brdung shing gi rab tu ldan pa zhes bya'o/_/ska rags kyi rab tu ldan pa gang zhe na/_ska rags la rnam pa gsum ste/_bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la 'di lta ste/_ska rags lhas ma dang rgya cang dang lcag pod 
[\[275b.2\]]rnams gnang ste/_dge slong rnams brgyan pa'i phyir ska rags khra bo ma 'chang shig_/ska rags med par grong du ma 'gro shig_/mdud pa gcig bor ba yang grong du ma 'gro shig_/song na nyes byas su 'gyur te/_de ni ska rags kyi rab tu ldan pa zhes bya'o/_/'u rdo'i rab tu ldan pa 
[\[275b.3\]]gang zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la sgras rkun po rnams bskrad par bya ba'i phyir ni 'u rdo gnang ste/_rnam grangs kyis kyang phog par mi bya ste/_de ni 'u rdo'i rab tu ldan pa zhes bya'o/_/gos dkris shing mdud pa bor ba'i rab tu ldan pa gang zhe na/_dge slong rnams 
[\[275b.4\]]gos dkris shing mdud pa bor te 'gro bar ma byed cig_/khang steng na las byed pa ni ma gtogs te de ni gos dkris shing mdud pa bor ba'i rab tu ldan pa zhes bya'o/_/sa'i rab tu ldan pa gang zhe na/_sa la rnam pa gnyis te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la 'chag pa'i sa 
[\[275b.5\]]dang /_lha khang gi sa ni rjes su gnang ngo /_/de ni sa'i rab tu ldan pa zhes bya'o/_/skyed shing gi rab tu ldan pa gang zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das la dge slong dag gis ri bya rgod 'phungs pa'i shul der shing dag ma mchis la nam mkha' ma bsgribs pas bya rgod 'phungs pa'i ri la 'dzeg cing 'bab 
[\[275b.6\]]pa'i tshe tsha bas rmya bar gyur to zhes gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_der grib mar 'gyur ba'am/_me tog du 'gyur ba'am/_'bras bur 'gyur ba de dag bskyed par gnang ngo /_/de dang de dag tu skyed shing bsrung ba'i phyir 'od ma'i ra bas kyang bskor ba de ni skyed shing 
[\[275b.7\]]gi rab tu ldan pa zhes bya'o/_/dngos po'i rab tu ldan pa gang zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la ldum ra'i phyir zhing rjes su gnang ngo /_/ldum ra ni bcom ldan 'das kyis gtsug lag khang gi phyir rjes su gnang /_zhing gi dngos po dang ldum ra dang gtsug lag khang bcom 
[\[276a\]]
[\[276a.1\]]ldan 'das kyis dge slong gi phyir rjes su gnang ste/_de ni dngos po'i rab tu ldan pa zhes bya'o/_/tshal gyi rab tu ldan pa gang zhe na/_tshal zhes bya ba ni skyed shing gi tshal te der ji ltar rgan rims bzhin du bya ba ni rgyas par 'dul ba las 'byung ba bzhin te/_de ni 
[\[276a.2\]]tshal gyi rab tu ldan pa zhes bya'o/_/rtsod pa'i rab tu ldan pa gang zhe na/_rtsod pa zhes bya ba ni 'thab pa dang /_mtshang 'dru ba dang /_'khrug pa dang /_rtsod pa dang /_phra ma dang /_rnar gsang ba dang /_phan tshun tshig mi 'phrod pa dang /_mi 'dum pa dang /_mi mthun pa dang /_
[\[276a.3\]]yid mi gcig pa dang /_dge 'dun dbye ba dang /_dge 'dun sgrogs pa dang /_dge 'dun gnyis su chad pa dang /_dge 'dun tha dad du gyur pa dang /_dge 'dun gcig tu mi sbyor ba dang /_dge 'dun gcig tu mi sbyor ba'i gtsor gyur pa dang /_dus ma yin par mi bya ba 
[\[276a.4\]]dang /_gnod par 'gyur bar mi bya ba dang /_mthu med na chos bzhin du mi bya ba dang /_phyogs med dam grogs med na yang mi bya ba dang /_'khor med na yang mi bya ba dang /_bdag nyid la gnod par gyur na yang rtsod par mi bya/_pha rol la'ang 'jigs pa dang gnod par 'gyur bas 
[\[276a.5\]]rtsod par mi bya'o/_/'di lta bu dang gzhan la gzigs nas nyes pa'i dmigs su gyur te rtsod pa mi bya ba de ni rtsod pa'i rab tu ldan pa zhes bya'o/_/dbyen gyi rab tu ldan pa gang zhe na/_dbyen la rnam pa gnyis te dge 'dun gyi dbyen dang 'khor lo'i dbyen no/_/'khor lo'i dbyen ma yin gyi dge 
[\[276a.6\]]'dun gyi dbyen gang zhe na/_dbyen du 'gyur ba'i dngos po bcu bzhi'i nang nas gang yang rung dngos po gcig la shin tu legs so zhes 'dzin pa yin te/_chos bzhin kyang rung /_chos bzhin ma yin kyang rung /_'dul ba bzhin kyang rung /_'dul ba bzhin ma yin kyang rung /_ltung ba yang 
[\[276a.7\]]rung /_ltung ba ma yin kyang rung /_lci ba yang rung /_yang ba yang rung /_lhag ma bcas pa yang rung /_lhag ma ma lus pa yang rung /_bshags par bya ba yang rung /_bsdam par bya ba yang rung /_'dul ba las shin tu 'da' ba yang rung /_mi snyan par smra ba las byung ba yang rung ste/_
[\[276b\]]
[\[276b.1\]]dge slong rnams mtshams kyi nang na mtshungs par gnas pa rnams 'dus par dge 'dun gyi las byed de/_dge 'dun gyis bya ba'i gso sbyin dang /_skabs dbye ba dang /_gsol ba dang /_gsol ba dang gnyis dang /_gsol ba dang bzhi'i las byed pa de ni dge 'dun gyi dbyen 
[\[276b.2\]]zhes bya'i 'khor lo'i dbyen ma yin no/_/'khor lo'i dbyen gang zhe na/_de 'di ltar dge slong bdag nyid ston par rnam par 'jog ste/_tshul shing brims nas gsol ba byas te 'khor de nas 'gro ba ni 'khor lo'i dbyen zhes bya ste/_'phags pa'i lam gyi yan lag brgyad pa las 
[\[276b.3\]]de spangs nas gzhan gyi lam du 'jog pa 'di ni 'khor lo'i dbyen zhes bya ste/_snga ma dge 'dun gyi dbyen dang /_'khor lo'i dbyen gnyis gcig tu bsdus pa de ni dbyen gyi rab tu ldan pa zhes bya'o/_/'dus pa'i rab tu ldan pa gang zhe na/_'dus pa zhes bya ba ni dge 'dun 'dus 
[\[276b.4\]]pa ste/_dge slong ji snyed pa mtshams kyi nang na 'khod pa dang las la 'du ba de dag thams cad 'dus shing 'khod pa yin te/_dad pa len pas kyang dad pa blangs pa yin/_gang gis bskyod pa dang /_gang gis gzhag par byas na yang brtsan par 'gyur ba'i dge slong rnams 
[\[276b.5\]]kyis kyang bskyod pa yang med/_gzhag par bya ba yang med de/_las kyang byed pa 'di ni 'dus pa'i rab tu ldan pa zhes bya'o/_/phyag gi rab tu ldan pa gang zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa la 'di ltar phyag bya'o/_/de ltar mkhan po la yang de bzhin/_slob dpon la yang de bzhin/_
[\[276b.6\]]bla ma la yang de bzhin bla ma'i gnas su gyur pa la yang de bzhin/_rgan rims rnams la yang de bzhin/_gzhon nu rnams la yang de bzhin te/_de ltar na thams cad du yang phyag byas la mkhas par bya ba de ni phyag gi rab tu ldan pa zhes bya'o/_/ma lta bu'i rab tu ldan pa'i phung po zhes 
[\[276b.7\]]bya ba phung po gnyis pa rdzogs so//_//bya ba'i phung po gang zhe na/_phyung bas bya ba dang /_so sor gnas pas bya ba dang /_gzu bos bya ba dang /_de'i ngo bo nyid tshol bas bya ba dang /_bslab pa byin pas bya ba dang /_mtshams ma bcad pa'i gnas brtan gyi bya ba dang /_kun dga' 
[\[277a\]]
[\[277a.1\]]ra ba'i bya ba dang /_kun dga' ra ba'i gnas brtan gyi bya ba dang /_gnas khang gi bya ba dang /_gnas khang gi gnas brtan gyi bya ba dang /_khang pa 'khor du bcas pa'i bya ba dang /_khang pa 'khor du bcas pa'i gnas brtan gyi bya ba dang /_nags kyi bya ba dang /_mal 
[\[277a.2\]]stan gyi bya ba dang /_sgo leb kyi bya ba dang /_'khor lo'i bya ba dang /_gnas stong pa'i bya ba dang /_gnas stong pa'i gnas brtan gyi bya ba dang /_lhung bzed kyi bya ba dang /_chos gos kyi bya ba dang /_gding ba'i bya ba dang /_khab kyi bya ba dang /_khab ral gyi bya ba dang /_thug pa'i bya ba 
[\[277a.3\]]dang /_chu'i bya ba dang /_chu rdza'i bya ba dang /_yongs su sbyar ba'i chu rdza'i bya ba dang /_gtsang ma'i ril ba'i bya ba dang /_zas kyi bya ba dang /_bza' ba'i bya ba dang /_zas gtad pa'i bya ba dang /_bsod snyoms kyi bya ba dang /_bsod snyoms spyod pa'i bya ba dang /_zan nod pa'i bya ba dang /_
[\[277a.4\]]dgon pa'i bya ba dang /_dgon pa'i gnas brtan gyi bya ba dang /_grong 'dab kyi bya ba dang /_grong 'dab kyi gnas brtan gyi bya ba dang /_glo bur du 'ongs pa'i bya ba dang /_glo bur du 'ongs pa'i gnas brtan gyi bya ba dang /_'gro ba'i bya ba dang /_'gro ba'i gnas brtan gyi bya ba dang /_rkang pa 
[\[277a.5\]]bkru ba'i bya ba dang /_rkang pa bkru ba'i gnas brtan gyi bya ba dang /_'dug pa'i bya ba dang /_'dug pa'i gnas brtan gyi bya ba dang /_chos 'chad pa'i bya ba dang /_chos 'chad pa'i gnas brtan gyi bya ba dang /_dus kyi bya ba dang /_dus ma yin pa'i bya ba dang /_dus ma yin par dge 'dun 'du 
[\[277a.6\]]ba'i bya ba dang /_dus ma yin par dge 'dun 'du ba'i gnas brtan gyi bya ba dang /_smra ba'i bya ba dang /_mi smra ba'i bya ba dang /_dbyar tshul du 'jug pa'i bya ba dang /_dbyar tshul du zhugs pa'i bya ba dang /_dbyar tshul du zhugs pa'i gnas brtan gyi bya ba dang /_dbyar tshul na gnas pa'i 
[\[277a.7\]]bya ba dang /_'khor gyi bya ba dang /_'khor gyi nang du 'gro ba'i bya ba dang /_'khor gyi nang du zhugs pa'i bya ba dang /_'khor gyi nang du zhugs pa'i gnas brtan gyi bya ba dang /_gso sbyin gyi bya ba dang /_gso sbyin mngon du bya ba dang /_gso sbyin gyi las kyi bya ba dang /_so sor thar pa'i bya ba dang /_
[\[277b\]]
[\[277b.1\]]so sor thar pa klog pa'i bya ba dang /_so sor thar pa klog par byed pa'i bya ba dang /_gnas brtan gyi bya ba dang /_bar ma'i bya ba dang /_gsar bu'i bya ba dang /_gnas brtan gyi dang bar ma dang gsar bu'i bya ba dang /_dugs khang du bya ba dang /_dugs khang du khrus bya ba dang /_dugs 
[\[277b.2\]]khang du gnas brtan gyi bya ba dang /_mkhan po'i bya ba dang /_lhan cig spyod pa'i bya ba dang /_slob dpon gyi bya ba dang /_nye gnas kyi bya ba dang /_dge tshul gyi bya ba dang /_nan tan du bya ba dang /_phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong gi bya ba dang /_grong du nye bar 'gro ba'i bya ba dang /_grong 
[\[277b.3\]]du nye bar 'gro ba'i gnas brtan gyi bya ba dang /_grong du nye bar song ba'i bya ba dang /_grong du nye bar song ba'i gnas brtan gyi bya ba dang /_gzhi na gnas pa'i bya ba dang /_ngal bso ba'i bya ba dang /_bar snang gi bya ba dang /_gtan pa'i bya ba dang /_chu tshags kyi bya ba dang /_'chag 
[\[277b.4\]]sa'i bya ba dang /_'chag pa'i bya ba dang /_'phyen gyi bya ba dang /_gzhar ba'i bya ba dang /_bshang ba'i bya ba dang /_bshang sa'i bya ba dang /_bshang sa'i khung bu'i bya ba dang /_bshang sar gnas brtan gyi bya ba dang /_bshang sa'i khor yug gi bya ba dang /_gci ba'i bya ba dang /_gci 
[\[277b.5\]]ba'i sa'i bya ba dang /_gcis khung gi bya ba dang /_gci sar gnas brtan gyi bya ba dang /_gci sa'i 'khod phyogs kyi bya ba dang /_bkru ba'i bya ba dang /_bkru ba'i sa'i bya ba dang /_khrus kyi sa'i bu gu'i bya ba dang /_khrus kyi sar gnas brtan gyi bya ba dang /_khrus sa'i 'khor gyi bya ba dang /_
[\[277b.6\]]mchil ma'i bya ba dang /_mchil ma'i snod kyi bya ba dang /_so shing gi bya ba dang /_so drud pa'i bya ba dang /_lce bzhar ba'i bya ba dang /_rna spabs bru ba'i bya ba dang /_spyad pa dang mi spyad pa'o/_/ma lta bu'i dum bu gsum po'i dngos po rdzogs so//_//'dul 
[\[277b.7\]]ba gzhung dam pa/_bam po lnga bcu rtsa gcig pa/_phyung bas bya ba gang zhe na/_phyung ba zhes bya ba ni spangs pa yin te/_spangs pa'i dge slong gis ni bya ba 'di lta bu la 'jug par bya'o/_/spangs pa'i dge slong gis rab tu dbyung bar mi bya/_bsnyen par rdzogs par mi bya/_gnas 
[\[278a\]]
[\[278a.1\]]sbyin par mi bya/_lung bstan par mi bya/_dran par mi bya/_dri bar mi bya/_dge tshul pha nye bar mi gzhag_/dge slong ma la lung ston par mi bsko/_sdom pa mi bsko/_sngar bskos na yang dge slong ma la ston cing las ma byed cig_/dge slong de las byed par 
[\[278a.2\]]mi bsko/_las bsko bar ma byed cig_/las byed pa'i dge slong la dgag par ma byed cig_/'dul ba 'dzin pa gzhan yod na dge 'dun gyi nang du 'dul ba ma 'chad cig_/so sor thar pa'i mdo klog pa gzhan yod na dge 'dun gyi nang du so sor thar pa'i mdo klog par ma byed 
[\[278a.3\]]cig_/chos 'chad pa gzhan yod na dge 'dun gyi nang du chos ma 'chad cig_/tshul bzhin du gnas pa'i dge slong lung ston pa la 'gog par ma byed cig_/tshul bzhin gnas pa'i dge slong la gso sbyin bsgo bar ma byed cig_/tshul bzhin gnas pa'i dge slong la 
[\[278a.4\]]skabs 'byed pa 'gog par ma byed cig_/tshul bzhin gnas pa'i dge slong la ma gleng shig_/dran par ma byed cig_/de dag dang lhan cig sten par ma byed cig_/gang dge 'dun gyis phyung ba'i las byas pa dang /_gang de dang 'dra ba gzhan yang rung /_des de lta bu'i 
[\[278a.5\]]nyes pa phyis kyang ma byed cig_/de las thu ba yang ma byed cig_/des phyi phyir spu nyal ba lta bur bya/_'byung ba la 'jug par bya/_phyag 'tshal ba nye bar bstan par bya/_tshul bzhin gnas pa'i dge slong gis lhung bzed byin na yang des ma len cig_/chos gos kyang ma len 
[\[278a.6\]]cig_/zas kyang ma len cig_/de la skra breg pa yang ma 'chol cig_/dugs khang du yang las ma byed cig_/mi na ba'i bar du las thams cad la'ang tshul bzhin gnas pa'i dge slong gi las nyams su blang bar mi bya'o/_/dge 'dun thams cad 'dus shing 'khod pas 
[\[278a.7\]]gces su gsang ba'i gnas su sdom pas mi bsko/_dbang gi gnas thams cad du yang sdom pas mi bsko/_gang zag bcu gnyis kyi gnas su yang sdom pas byin gyis brlab par mi bya ba ni phyung bas bya ba zhes bya'o/_/so sor gnas pas bya ba gang zhe na/_so sor gnas pa la rnam 
[\[278b\]]
[\[278b.1\]]pa gnyis te/_gang bdag nyid kyis bdag so sor gnas par byed pa dang /_dge 'dun gyi chos bzhin du byas pa'o/_/bdag nyid kyis bdag so sor gnas par byed pa gang zhe na/_bsams bzhin du chos kyi phyogs pa las chos ma yin pa'i phyogs su song ba ste/_
[\[278b.2\]]de ltar na bdag nyid kyis bdag so sor gnas par byed pa'o/_/dge 'dun gyis chos bzhin du byas pa gang zhe na/_dge 'dun gyis bskyo ba med pa/_gzhag pa med par rigs pa'i gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis chos bzhin du 'dus pa'i dge 'dun gyis spangs pa yin te/_
[\[278b.3\]]de ltar na dge 'dun gyis chos bzhin du spangs pa'o/_/mtshungs par lhan cig gnas pa yang gnyis te/_bdag nyid kyis bdag nyid lhan cig gnas par byed pa dang /_dge 'dun gyis chos bzhin du byas pa'o/_/bdag nyid kyis bdag nyid lhan cig gnas par byed pa 
[\[278b.4\]]gang zhe na/_bsams bzhin chos ma yin pa'i phyogs las chos kyi phyogs su 'ongs pa ste/_de ltar na bdag nyid kyis bdag nyid lhan cig tu gnas par byed pa'o/_/dge 'dun gyis chos bzhin du byas pa gang zhe na/_dge 'dun gyis mi bskyob gzhag par mi rigs pas 
[\[278b.5\]]chos bzhin du 'dus pa'i dge 'dun gyis spangs pa ste/_mngon sum du gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis phyung ba yin te/_de ltar na dge 'dun gyis chos bzhin du byas pa'i so sor gnas pa'i dge slong des rab tu dbyung bar mi bya ba nas/_snga ma bzhin te/_ji ltar dge 'dun gyis 
[\[278b.6\]]gang la spangs pa'i las byas pa dang /_gzhan de dang 'dra ba ste/_des de lta bu'i nyes par yang mi bya/_de las yang thu bar yang mi bya ba'i bar du ste/_gang zag bcu gnyis las su yang sdom pas kyang mi bsko/_so sor gnas pa'i dge slong gis tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa'i 
[\[278b.7\]]gnas brtan dang /_bar ma dang /_gsar bu pa'ang rung ba dbab par bya/_nyes pa mi bya/_nyes pa zhig byas na yang slar 'byung ba'i tshul du bya'o/_/de ste slar 'byung ba'i tshul du mi byed na so sor gnas par bya ba nyid yin te/_de la 'di skad ces bsgo bar bya'o/_/dge 'dun gyis khyod la 
[\[279a\]]
[\[279a.1\]]thig btab pa bzhin byed do/_/phur pa btsugs pa bzhin byed do/_/nyes pa de yang dge 'dun la 'di nyid du bshags par bya'i 'di las phyi rol du ni ma yin no/_/khyod kyi las de yang dge 'dun de dag nyid kyis slar bde bar byed kyis 'di las phyi rol du ni ma yin no/_/
[\[279a.2\]]khyod kyis nyes pa de yang ma bshags sam slar ma byas na ni tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa shes pa dag gis gang du 'dod pa der gleng bar byed do/_/de ste yang de bzhin du byas pa las kyang dul bar ma gyur na gang zag de thig btab pa bzhin byas phur pa btsugs pa bzhin du byas la spang bar bya'o/_/
[\[279a.3\]]de 'di lta ste/_rta rgod bzhin te/_de ni so sor gnas par bya ba zhes bya'o/_/gzu bos bya ba gang zhe na/_rtsod pa zhi bar byed pa'i phyir dge slong gzu bo chos nyi shu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa btsal bar bya'o/_/nyi shu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/_tshul khrims dang ldan zhing sngar bsnyen par rdzogs 
[\[279a.4\]]par gyur pa dang /_ngo tsha zhing 'gyod pa can dang /_sdom zhing bslab pa la mos pa dang /_mang du thos la mang du thos pa 'dzin cing mang du thos pa bsags pa dang /_gzhung kha don lobs pa dang /_'dul ba dang 'dul ba lhag pa shin tu rtogs pa dang /_rtsod pa la mkhas pa dang /_rtsod 
[\[279a.5\]]pa byung ba la mkhas pa dang /_rtsod pa zhi bar bya ba la mkhas pa dang /_rtsod pa zhi bar gyur pa phyis mi 'byung bar mkhas pa dang /_bstan bcos la mkhas pa dang /_dngos po la mkhas shing dngos po spyod pa la mkhas pa dang /_khro ba med pa khro bzhin mi smra ba khro bar mi 'gyur ba dang /_'jam 
[\[279a.6\]]bzhin spyod pa dang /_lus dang /_ngag dang /_bsgo ba yang rtogs par byed pa dang /_rdzogs par bsgo zhing rdzogs par byed pa dang /_go bar byed cing go bar byas pas yang chud par byed pa dang /_brtags nas smra zhing brtags nas smras pa rtogs par byed pa dang /_'dod par 
[\[279a.7\]]mi 'gro ba dang /_zhe sdang du mi 'gro ba dang /_gti mug tu mi 'gro ba dang /_'jigs par mi 'gro ba ste/_gzu bo dge slong chos nyi shu rtsa gnyis po 'di dang ldan na gzhan la mi rten pa yin zhing phyogs gnyi ga la yang chos kyi longs spyod du 'gyur ro/_/'di ltar yang gzu bo'i dge slong 
[\[279b\]]
[\[279b.1\]]gis rgol ba dang lan glon pa'i dge slong rnams las snyan tshig tu smra ba dang /_phyag byed pa dang /_sngar ldang ba dang /_thal mo sbyor ba dang /_phyag byas par gyur pa rnams bdag gir ma byed cig_/de dag bsnyen bkur byed na yang nyams su ma len cig_/lhung bzed 'bul na yang 
[\[279b.2\]]mi blang /_chos gos 'bul na yang mi blang /_zas 'bul na yang mi blang /_yo byad gzhan ci yang rung dbul ba bdag gir mi bya'o/_/des kyang de dag la bsnyen bkur mi bya/_lhung bzed mi sbyin/_chos gos mi sbyin/_de dag las lung ston par yang mi blang /_dran par 
[\[279b.3\]]bya ba yang ma yin/_rnal 'byor yang ma yin/_yid la bya ba yang ma 'dri shig_/des kyang de dag la lung bstan pa ma sbyin cig_/dran par bya ba ma yin/_kun dri ba ma yin/_rnal 'byor ma yin/_yid la bya ba yang mi bsgo'o/_/stan gcig la 'dug par mi bya/_
[\[279b.4\]]'chag sa gcig tu 'chag par mi bya/_gnas khang gcig tu 'khod par mi bya/_gzhan du tshig 'di skad ces brjod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa khyed kyis 'di lta bu las legs par rnyed pa ci yod na 'di ltar khyed kyis legs par gsungs pa chos 'dul ba las rab tu byung na thab mo byed pa 
[\[279b.5\]]la zhugs shing rnam par bzung nas rtsod pa la zhugs te/_tshe dang ldan pa rnams rtsod pa gnyis su gyur pa ni gnyi ga rgyal bar mi 'gyur gyi/_de dag gtan la phab na gcig ni rgyal bar 'gyur/_gcig ni pham par 'gyur gyis tshe dang ldan pa rnams 'di ltar so sor rtsod pa dang /_rnam 
[\[279b.6\]]par rtsod pa dang /_mi mthun par smra ba de lta bu de thong shig ces bya ba de ni gzu bos bya ba zhes bya'o/_/de'i ngo bo nyid tshol ba byin pas bya ba gang zhe na/_dge slong gang gis nyes pa spyod pa de khas len khas blangs pa las bsnyon/_bsnyon pa las kyang slar khas len pa de la dge 'dun gyis bzhag 
[\[279b.7\]]pa ma yin pa bskyo ba ma yin pa gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis de'i ngo bo nyid tshol ba byin cig_/de'i ngo bo nyid tshol ba byin pa'i dge slong gis bya ba 'di lta bu la 'jug par bya'o/_/de'i ngo bo nyid tshol ba byin pa'i dge slong gis rab tu dbyung bar mi bya ba nas snga ma bzhin te/_gang la dge 'dun gyis 
[\[280a\]]
[\[280a.1\]]de'i ngo bo nyid tshol ba byin pa dang /_gang de dang 'dra bas kyang rung ste/_nyes pa de lta bu byung ba mi bya/_de bas thu ba yang ma byed cig pa'i bar du ste/_snga ma bzhin 'di ltar gang zag bcu gnyis kyir sdom pas mi bsgo ba de ni de'i ngo bo nyid tshol ba byin pas bya ba 
[\[280a.2\]]zhes bya'o/_/bslab pa byin pas bya ba gang zhe na/_dge slong gang mi tshangs par spyod pa 'khrig pa'i chos byas kyang de la se gol gcig gtogs pa tsam du yang bcab pa'i sems ma skyes pa ste/_de la dge 'dun gyis bskyo ba med/_gzhag pa med par gsol ba dang /_
[\[280a.3\]]bzhi'i las kyis bslab pa sbyin par bya ste/_ji ltar tshe dang ldan pa dga' ldan bzhin pa ni rgyas par 'dul ba dang sbyar ro/_/bslab pa byin pa'i dge slong gis rab tu dbyung bar mi bya ba nas snga ma bzhin te/_gang la dge 'dun gyis bslab pa byin pa dang gang de dang 'dra ba 
[\[280a.4\]]gzhan dag kyang rung ste/_nyes pa de lta bu'i ltung ba phyis kyang ma byed cig_/de bas thu ba yang ma byed cig pa'i bar du ste/_snga ma bzhin te de 'di ltar gang zag bcu gnyis kyis sdom pas mi bsko'o/_/bslab pa byin pa'i dge slong gis dge slong gi bslab pa thams cad la 
[\[280a.5\]]bslab par bya'o/_/dge 'dun gyi mthar 'dug par bya'o/_/des bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i rnams la byin len byos shig_/de la bsnyen par ma rdzogs pas byin len byos shig_/de bsnyen par rdzogs pa dang lhan cig nyal ba bsgyur zhing gud du phyung shig_/bslab pa byin 
[\[280a.6\]]pa'i dge slong gis las rnam pa gnyis byas te/_gso sbyin dang /_skabs dbye ba'o/_/bslab pa byin pas grangs su bskangs te gso sbyin ma byed cig_/dge 'dun gyi las gzhan la yang de bzhin no/_/de ste bslab pa byin pa gso sbyin gyi nang du 'ongs na ni ma bskyo shig_/
[\[280a.7\]]de ste 'gro na yang ma gzung shig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dge 'dun ma 'dus par yang mi 'gyur/_'dus par yang mi 'gyur te/_'di ni bslab pa byin pas bya ba zhes bya'o/_/mtshams ma bcad pa'i gnas brtan gyi bya ba gang zhe na/_mtshams ma bcad pa'i gnas brtan gyi 
[\[280b\]]
[\[280b.1\]]dge slong gis bya ba 'di lta bu la 'jug par bya'o/_/de la gang gsar bu'i dge slong 'khod pa rnams des de dag kun shes par bya/_bskyang bar bya/_rjes su bstan par bya/_sdig pa las bzlog par bya/_dge ba la gzhug par bya/_kha ton byed pa dang /_kun 'dri ba dang /_spong ba dang /_
[\[280b.2\]]so sor dben par 'jug pa dang /_rnal 'byor dang /_yid la byed pa'i rnams de dag la so sor lung bsgo bar bya/_kun mtshungs par spyod pa la gzhug par bya/_bslab par bya ba la so sor brtag par bya/_rnyed pa grub par bya/_nam so sor bged pa'i tshe so sor bgo skal snyoms par 
[\[280b.3\]]mig sngar bgo'o/_/nad pa la blta bar bya/_nad pa'i nad g.yog tu dge slong rnams spro bar bya/_nad pa rnams la chos kyi gtam bya/_lam dang lam ma yin pa yang dag par bsgrag par bya/_mthong ba rnam par spyod pa'i rgyud mi gtang bar bya/_rnam pa thams cad du 
[\[280b.4\]]yang nad pa la g.yel bar mi bya/_mtshams ma bcad pa'i gnas su dge slong rnams lhags pa la gang gzhan ci yang rung bya bar 'gyur ba de thams cad la dge slong gnas brtan gyis thog mar 'jug par bya ste/_'di ni mtshams ma bcad pa'i gnas brtan gyi bya ba zhes bya'o/_/
[\[280b.5\]]kun dga' ra ba'i bya ba gang zhe na/_kun dga' ra ba'i zhes bya ba ni dge 'dun rnams kun tu dga' ba'i gnas te de so so nas dge slong dag lhags pa rnams bya bar bcas pa yang tha dad pas na dge slong des 'di dag gis bya ba bcas pa de chos bzhin yin nam/_'on te chos bzhin ma 
[\[280b.6\]]yin zhes brtag par bya'o/_/de ste chos bzhin yin la bdag la yang gnod par mi 'gyur/_gzhan la yang gnod par mi 'gyur na g.yel bar gzhag go/_/de ste chos bzhin ma yin la bdag la yang gnod par 'gyur/_gzhan la yang gnod par 'gyur bar shes la bdag cag 
[\[280b.7\]]gi phyogs mthu dang ldan/_grogs dang ldan/_'khor dang ldan par gyur cing de lta bu'i phyir dge 'dun gyi dbyen dang /_dge 'dun 'khrugs pa dang /_dge 'dun gnyis su chad pa dang /_dge 'dun so sor yang mi 'gyur/_bdag gis chos bzhin ma yin par bya ba la bcas pa 
[\[281a\]]
[\[281a.1\]]de phyung nas chos bzhin bya'o/_/chos bzhin bya'o snyam du nus pa dang /_des dge 'dun rnams la kye 'di ni chos bzhin du bya bar bcas pa ma yin gyis 'di phyung la chos bzhin pa gzhan bya'o zhes go bar sgo shig_/de ste bdag cag gi phyogs mthu chung ngam/_
[\[281a.2\]]'gron pa med dam 'khor med par gyur pa de'i phyir dge 'dun kyang 'byed/_dge 'dun kyang 'khrugs dge 'dun so sor yang 'gyur zhing /_bdag gis chos ma yin par bca' ba 'di phyung la chos bzhin du bya bar mi nus par shes pa de cang ma zer bar 'dug shig_/yang na gud du song 
[\[281a.3\]]shig_/de lta bu'i rkyen gyis rnam par 'dzin cing ma 'dug shig_/kun dga' ra ba zhes bya ba ni 'di rnams kyang yin te/_kun dga' ra ba'i nang na khang phran dang /_khang pa dang /_khang bu brtsegs pa dang /_khang pa 'khor du bcas pa dang /_spyil po dang /_spyil bu'i dngos 
[\[281a.4\]]po dang /_'chag sa dang /_skyed shing dang /_gsing ma rnams thams cad kyang ji ltar rgan rims bzhin du bsgo bar bya'o/_/phyi bdar bya ba de ni kun dga' ra ba'i bya ba zhes bya'o/_/kun dga' ra ba'i gnas brtan gyi bya ba gang zhe na/_kun dga' ra ba'i dge slong gnas 
[\[281a.5\]]brtan gyis bya ba de lta bu la 'jug par bya/_kun dga' ra ba'i dge slong gi gnas brtan gyis bzhin mdog gsal bar bya/_khro gnyer med par bya/_sngar 'dzum par bya/_sngar smra bar bya'o/_/snyan par smra bar bya/_tshur shog bde bar 'ongs sam zhes snyan tshig smra bar bya/_tshig 
[\[281a.6\]]snyan cing mi rtsub pa mgu zhing rangs par smra bar bya/_gang de na dge slong gzhon nu gsar bu 'khod par gyur pa de dag ni shes par bya ba nas snga ma bzhin te/_thams cad du'ang dge slong gnas brtan gyis thog mar 'jug par bya/_rgyud mi gtang bar bya ba'i bar du ste/_'thab pa dang /_
[\[281a.7\]]mtshang 'dru ba dang /_'khrug pa dang /_rtsod pa'i rnams byung bar gyur na gdul ba'i phyir rig par bya/_zhi ba'i phyir rnam par zhi bar rig par bya/_'di ltar yang dge slong kun dga' ra ba'i gnas brtan gyis thog mar bza' ba'am/_bca' ba'am/_skyo ma'am/_thug pa'am/_nang 
[\[281b\]]
[\[281b.1\]]par bsgo'am/_gaN+DI brdungs sam/_sngar myur du 'gro bar bya/_sngar 'dug par bya/_bkur stir bcas/_spyi dma' bar bcas/_'jigs pa'i dbang du bcas/_sems dman pa dang /_rdul 'phyag pa'i sems lta bur byas la dge 'dun gyi mdun du 'gro bar 
[\[281b.2\]]bya'o/_/song nas kyang rgan rims kyi mthar phyag byas la rang gi stan ga la ba der 'dug par bya'o/_/gnas brtan dang /_bar ma dang /_gsar bu la byams pa'i sems dang /_phan pa'i sems dang /_rjes su brtse ba'i sems dang /_pha dang ma dang phu nu bor 'du shes 
[\[281b.3\]]bskyed de/_'khor thams cad la brtag par bya ste/_legs pa bzang por bcas sam/_su legs par bgos/_su legs par ma bgos brtags te/_gang bzang zhing legs par chas pa de dag la ni g.yel bar gzhag_/gang legs par ma chas shing mi sdug pa de 
[\[281b.4\]]dag ni bsgo zhing bcos par bya/_legs par bgos pa ni des g.yel bar gzhag_/legs par ma bgos pa de la ni brda dang mtshan ma bya/_des mtshan ma ma tshor na yang drung na 'dug pa la mtshan ma bya/_drung na 'dug pas kyang ma tshor na der dge slong gnas brtan nyid 
[\[281b.5\]]kyis ji nas legs par gyon pa dang /_sgra ma che bar sgo shig_/dge slong gnas brtan gyis rgan rims su gzar bu thogs nas kha zas 'brim par shom pa'i tshe rung bar byas sam/_ma byas zhes smros shig 'byor tshogs shes ma byung gi bar du skad cig sdod la thams cad 
[\[281b.6\]]la snyoms par brims shig ces smra bar bya'o/_/dge slong gnas brtan gyis gnas brtan dang bar ma dang gsar bu dag gi rjes su mthun par bya/_gnas brtan dang bar ma dang gsar bus kyang de'i rjes su mthun par gyis shig_/de ste dad pa'i bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams 
[\[281b.7\]]lhags na de dag la yang mtshungs par bgo zhing sbyin par bya'o/_/de ste de bgor ma dad dam/_dad pa'i bram ze dang khyim bdag ma 'dod na yang dge slong gnas brtan gyis chos kyi gtam yang dag par bstan par bya/_bstab par bya/_yang dag par gzengs bstod par bya/_
[\[282a\]]
[\[282a.1\]]yang dag par dga' bar byas la/_bdag cag la ni 'di yod do zhes smra bar bya ste/_'di ni kun dga' ra ba'i gnas brtan gyi bya ba zhes bya'o/_/gnas khang gi bya ba gang zhe na/_dge slong gang gnas khang na 'dug pa des gnas khang de dus dus su chag 
[\[282a.2\]]chag gdab/_phyag dar bya/_phyags pa dor bar bya/_lci bas shin tu 'jam por byug par bya/_sngo cung zad byung na yang med par bya/_gas pa dang /_zhigs pa dang /_gogs pa rnams slar bcos par bya/_bum pa chus bkang ste gzhag par bya ste/_yongs su 
[\[282a.3\]]spyad pa'i bum pa dang /_gtsang ma'i ril ba dang /_snam phyi sa'i ril ba dang /_rkang pa bkru ba rnams bkang ste bzhag pa de ni gnas khang gi bya ba zhes bya'o/_/gnas khang gi gnas brtan gyi bya ba gang zhe na/_gnas khang gi dge slong gnas brtan gyi bya ba ni des 'di lta bu la 
[\[282a.4\]]'jug par bya'o/_/dge slong gsar bu gang dag de na 'khod par gyur pa de dag shes par bya ba nas snga ma bzhin te/_dge slong gnas brtan gyis thams cad la thog mar 'jug par bya/_rgyud mi gtang bar bya ba'i bar du ste/_'di ni gnas khang gi dge slong gnas brtan gyi bya ba zhes 
[\[282a.5\]]bya'o/_/khang pa 'khor du bcas pa'i bya ba gang zhe na/_khang pa 'khor dang bcas pa de na dge slong gang 'dug pa des khang pa 'khor dang bcas pa de dus dus su byi bdar bya ba ni snga ma bzhin te/_rkang pa bkru ba'i rnams bkang ste gzhag pa'i bar du'o/_/khang pa 'khor dang bcas pa 
[\[282a.6\]]de na dge slong grogs po gang 'khod pa'i rnams la yang byams pa'i lus kyi las kyis mtshungs par spyad par bya/_byams pa'i ngag gi las dang /_byams pa'i yid kyi las kyang mtshungs par spyad par bya/_der yang thab mo mi dbyung bar bya/_mtshang 'dru ba dang /_'khrug pa dang /_
[\[282a.7\]]rtsod pa mi dbyung bar bya/_de ste der 'thab pa dang /_smod pa dang /_'khrug pa dang /_rtsod pa zhig byung na zhi bar nus na ni de bzhin legs/_de ste yang mi nus na gud du song shig_/'di ni khang pa 'khor du bcas pa'i bya ba zhes bya'o/_/khang pa 'khor du bcas pa'i gnas brtan 
[\[282b\]]
[\[282b.1\]]gyi bya ba gang zhe na/_khang pa 'khor du bcas pa'i dge slong gnas brtan gyi bya ba ni des 'di lta bu la 'jug par bya'o/_/de na dge slong gsar bu gang 'khod par gyur pa de dag kun shes par byas nas/_snga ma bzhin te/_thams cad du yang dge slong gnas brtan thog mar 'jug 
[\[282b.2\]]par bya ba dang /_rgyud mi gtang bar bya ba'i bar du ste/_'di ni khang pa'i 'khor dang bcas pa'i gnas brtan gyi bya ba zhes bya'o/_/nags kyi bya ba gang zhe na/_nags zhes bya ba ni skyed shing gi nags de na dge slong 'khod pa rnams kyis bdag cag gnas 'di na 'khod la 'tsho ba'i 
[\[282b.3\]]bar chad du 'gyur ba'am/_tshangs par spyod pa'i bar chad du 'gyur ba lta yod dam med ces rgyang grags gcig tshun chad 'khor yug tu brtag par bya'o/_/de ste yod par mthong na ring du dor bar bya'o/_/de ste med par mthong la dgos par gyur dang rgyang grags gcig tshun 
[\[282b.4\]]chad du sdom pa bsko bar bya/_rung ba'i sa yang bsko bar bya/_gso sbyin gyi gnas kyang bsko bar bya/_de na phan tshun kha zas kyi longs spyod dang /_chos kyi longs spyod kyis spro ba bskyed par bya/_de na 'thab pa mi 'byung ba dang /_mtshang 'dru ba mi 'byung ba dang /_khon pa mi 
[\[282b.5\]]'byung ba dang /_rtsod pa mi 'byung bar bya ba de ni nags kyi bya ba zhes bya'o/_/mal stan gyi bya ba gang zhe na/_dge slong rnams kyis mal stan dus dus su brtag par bya/_bskam par bya/_sprug par bya/_bgrang bar bya/_sba bar bya/_de ste dri ma can du gyur na bkru bar bya/_
[\[282b.6\]]rdol tam zad pa'i chos su gyur na ci nus su btsem zhing glan par bya/_'tshem zhing glon du gzhug par bya/_dge slong gis phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi gos bgos nas bshang ba'i sar 'gro bar mi bya/_gci ba'i sar mi 'gro/_dugs khang du ma yin/_rkang pa bkru ba'i sar 
[\[282b.7\]]ma yin/_tshang mang du ma yin/_char 'bab pa la gyon te 'dug par mi bya/_nyi ma tsha ba la ma yin bsro khang du gzhag par mi bya/_ci nas gnod par 'gyur ba'i sa thams cad du phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi gos dang 'jug par mi bya/_bgo bar mi bya/_gzhag par mi bya/_dge slong 
[\[283a\]]
[\[283a.1\]]rnams kyis mal stan rnam pa 'di lngar spyad par mi bya ste/_lnga gang zhe na/_dud pa dang /_rdul dang /_chu dang /_bshal ba dang /_drud pa'o/_/dge slong rnams kyis phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi gos bgos bzhin gtsug lag khang chag chag mi gdab/_
[\[283a.2\]]sa mi phyag_/phyag dar mi dor/_lci bas zhal zhal mi bya/_chu'i bum pa dgang bar mi bya/_yongs su spyod pa'i bum par ma yin/_gtsang ma'i ril bar ma yin/_bshang ba'i ril bar ma yin/_rkang pa bkru ba'i bum pa dgang bar mi bya/_snod 'brim par ma yin/_
[\[283a.3\]]gtsug lag khang skyong du ma yin/_lhung bzed kyi las byed par ma yin/_gos kyi las byed par ma yin/_dge slong rnams kyis phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi gos lus kyi mthang la bgo bar mi bya/_rngul zan med par bgo bar mi bya/_dge slong dag gis phyogs bzhi'i 
[\[283a.4\]]dge 'dun gyi mal stan rnams bla gab med pa la bting ba dang /_sgo khang phan chad nye 'khor 'dom bzhi bcu rtsa dgu'i bar du bor te ma 'gro shig_/de ste bshang ba'am/_gci ba'i sar 'gro na yang dge slong 'khod pa'i rnams la bsgo la song shig_/ji ltar bdag nyid 
[\[283a.5\]]kyis lhung bzed dang chos gos dang lus kyi pags pa bzhin du dge slong dag gis phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi mal stan rnams yongs su bsrung bar bya'o/_/dge slong dag gis ci'i mtha' nas kyang phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi mal stan yal bar mi bya ste/_'di ni dge 
[\[283a.6\]]'dun gyi mal stan gyi bya ba zhes bya'o/_/sgo leb kyi bya ba gang zhe na/_sgo leb ces bya ba ni sgo'i 'phar ma ste/_dge slong gis de la rdung na yun ring du brdung bar mi bya/_sngar nang na 'khod pa'i rnams kyis tshor bar bya ba'i phyir dal nas bags kyis brdung bar bya'o/_/dbye 
[\[283a.7\]]ba'i tshe yang drag tu mi dbye gcod pa'i tshe'ang drag tu mi gcad/_shes bzhin du dal nas bags kyis 'jug cing 'byung bar bya/_sgo'i phyogs gnyi gar kyang mi 'drud bzhin 'byung bar bya ste/_'di ni sgo leb kyi bya ba zhes bya'o/_/'khor lo'i bya ba gang zhe na/_'khor lo zhes bya ba 
[\[283b\]]
[\[283b.1\]]ni sgo'i [(]stan [,]sten [)]pa bla 'og ste/_de shin tu 'byor par bya'o/_/dge slong gtsug lag khang nas gud du 'dong na bla 'og gnyi ga chug la deng shig dang /_gtsug lag khang rub par 'gyur ro/_/gtsug lag khang rub na bdag cag nyid dang /_lhung bzed dang /_chos gos dang /_
[\[283b.2\]]mal stan rnams kyang rub par 'gyur te/_'di ni 'khor lo'i bya ba zhes bya'o/_/gnas stong pa'i bya ba gang zhe na/_dge slong gis gnas stong pa de chag chag gdab par bya/_sa phyag par bya/_phyag dar dor bar bya/_ci nus su lci bas zhal zhal 'jam por bya/_gsang 
[\[283b.3\]]dang /_zhigs pa dang /_gogs pa rnams slar bcos par bya/_de ste snod rnams so so nas 'dug par gyur na yang spyad du bzod na ni bkru zhing gzhag par bya/_mi bzod na dor bar bya/_de ste rung bar byed pa yod na yang rtswa sngon po rnams regs shig_/khyim pa dag 
[\[283b.4\]]lhags na de dag la chos kyi gtam bya bar bya/_dge slong gis gnas stong par zhugs na yang yal bar dor bar mi bya/_de ste gnas par mi 'dod na/_des ga las gar 'gro brtag par bya/_'gro ba'i nye 'khor dang /_bshang sa dang /_gci sa dang /_skas ka dang /_them 
[\[283b.5\]]skas dang /_sgo bcad pa dang /_spyod yul rnams kyang brtags la gnas par bya'o/_/ji ltar de dag gis phyir brel ba dang /_gnod par mi 'gyur bar bya ste/_de ni gnas stong pa'i bya ba zhes bya'o/_/gnas stong pa'i gnas brtan gyi bya ba gang zhe na/_gnas stong 
[\[283b.6\]]pa'i dge slong gnas brtan gyi bya ba ni des 'di lta bu la 'jug par bya'o/_/gnas stong pa'i dge slong gnas brtan gyi bzhin gsal ba dang /_khro gnyer med par bya ba nas snga ma bzhin/_thab mo dang /_mtshang 'dru ba dang /_khon pa dang /_rtsod pa'i rnams byung bar 
[\[283b.7\]]gyur pa gdul bar nan tan bya/_zhi bar bya/_rnam par zhi bar bya ba'i bar du ste/_'di ni gnas stong pa'i gnas brtan gyi bya ba zhes bya'o/_/lhung bzed kyi bya ba gang zhe na/_dge slong gis thal ba ma btsags pa lhung bzed bkru bar mi bya/_lci ba gseg ma can gyis bkru ba 
[\[284a\]]
[\[284a.1\]]ma yin/_bye ma dang 'dres pa'i sas ma yin/_bye ma dang 'dres pa'i lci ba'i ril bus ma yin gyi sran phyes lhung bzed bkru bar bya'o/_/lhung bzed langs te bkru bar mi bya/_bskam par mi bya/_snod du gzhug par mi bya/_sba bar mi bya/_lam du 'gro ba ma 
[\[284a.2\]]yin/_chu rgal ba la ma yin/_sa mi bde bar lhung bzed gzhag par mi bya/_dge slong gis lhung bzed kyis gnas khang du chag chag gdab par mi bya/_phyag dar dor bar mi bya/_lci bas zhal zhal 'jom por byug par mi bya/_lag pa bkru ba'i chu blang bar mi bya/_
[\[284a.3\]]rkang pa bkru ba'i chu la ma yin/_gdong bkru ba'i chu la ma yin/_lus bkru ba'i chu la ma yin/_des chu'i bum pa dgang bar mi bya/_dge slong gis lhung bzed bshang sar bkur bar mi bya/_gci ba'i sar ma yin/_dugs khang du ma yin/_rkang pa bkru ba'i sar ma 
[\[284a.4\]]yin te/_ci nas dge slong gis sa mi gtsang ba thams cad du lhung bzed bkur bar mi bya/_dge slong lhung bzed thogs bzhin du mchod rten la phyag bya bar mi bya/_glan pa'i rigs na glan par mi bya/_shin tu gsher bzhin gzhag par mi bya/_shin tu skam par g.yel bar mi bya/_
[\[284a.5\]]dal nas bags kyis shes bzhin du yongs su spyad par bya ste/_nam zhigs pa'i mthar thug gi bar du bcang bar bya ste/_dge slong gis lhung bzed de mig bzhin du bsrung bar bya'o/_/ci nas kyang phyin chad btsal mi dgos par byas te/_de ni lhung bzed kyi bya ba zhes 
[\[284a.6\]]bya'o/_/chos gos kyi bya ba gang zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams kyi chos gos gsum rjes su gnang ste/_dregs pa'i phyir ma yin/_rgyags pa bskyed pa'i phyir ma yin/_brgyan pa'i phyir ma yin/_bzhag pa'i phyir ma yin gyi/_de 'di ltar 
[\[284a.7\]]dge slong rnams bde bar spyod pa'i phyir te/_sbrang bu dang /_sbrang ma dang /_rlung dang /_tsha ba dang /_sbrul la sogs pa reg na mi bde ba'i gnyen po'i phyir ngo tsha ba dang /_khrel ba g.yog pa'i phyir ro/_/de yang dge slong rnams kyis ji ltar yongs su spyad pa bzhin yongs 
[\[284b\]]
[\[284b.1\]]su spyad par bya'o/_/de la sbyar ma yang sbyar ma'i spyad pa bzhin spyad par bya'o/_/stod g.yogs kyang stod g.yogs kyi spyad pa bzhin spyad par bya/_mthang gos kyang mthang gos kyi spyad pa bzhin spyad par bya'o/_/de la sbyar mas mi spyad pa ni 'di rnams te/_dge slong 
[\[284b.2\]]rnams sbyar ma gon bzhin gtsug lag khang du chag chag gdab par mi bya/_sa phyag par mi bya/_phyag dar dor bar mi bya/_lci bas zhal zhal 'jam por byug par mi bya/_chu'i snod dgang bar mi bya/_spyad pa'i bum par ma yin/_gtsang ba'i ril bar ma yin/_bshang 
[\[284b.3\]]ba'i ril bar ma yin/_rkang pa bkru ba'i sar ma yin/_snod bged par ma yin/_gtsug lag khang skyong du ma yin/_lhung bzed kyi las su ma yin/_chos gos kyi las su ma yin/_khrus mi bya/_sbyar ma bgos nas rtswa'am/_shing ngam/_lci ba'am sa'ang 
[\[284b.4\]]rung bkur bar mi bya/_sbyar ma bgos nas bshang sar mi 'jug gci sar mi 'jug_/dugs khang du ma yin/_rkang pa bkru ba'i sar ma yin te/_ci nas sbyar ma bgos la mi gtsang ba'i sa thams cad du 'gro bar mi bya/_mthang la bgo bar mi bya/_gding bar mi bya/_
[\[284b.5\]]de rgyun du bgo bar mi bya/_sbyar ma la 'jug par mi bya/_nyal bar mi bya ste/_'di ni sbyar ma de lta bur mi spyod pa'o/_/sbyar ma 'di ltar spyad par bya ste/_dge slong ma sbyar ma bgos nas bsod snyoms la 'jug par bya/_grong du 'jug par bya/_spyod yul du 'jug par bya/_
[\[284b.6\]]zas la 'jug par bya/_skyo ma dang thug pa la 'jug par bya/_'di ltar yang sbyar ma ni rnam pa gnyis su spyad pa bzhin spyad par bya ste/_yang na steng du bgo bar bya/_yang na sngas su gzhug par bya'o/_/stod g.yogs spyad pa yang 'di ltar spyad de/_dge slong rnams 
[\[284b.7\]]stod g.yogs bgos nas/_gtsug lag khang du chag chag gdab par mi bya/_sa phyag par mi bya/_phyag dar dor bar mi bya/_lci bas zhal zhal 'jam por byug par mi bya/_lhung bzed kyi las mi bya/_chos gos kyi las mi bya/_bkru bar mi bya/_stod g.yogs 
[\[285a\]]
[\[285a.1\]]bgos bzhin du rtswa'am/_shing ngam/_sa bkur bar mi bya/_stod g.yogs dang bshang ba'i sar 'jug par mi bya/_gci ba'i sar 'jug par mi bya/_dugs khang du ma yin/_rkang pa bkru ba'i sar ma yin te/_stod g.yogs dang bcas mi gtsang ba 
[\[285a.2\]]thams cad du 'jug par mi bya'o/_/lus kyi mthang la bgo bar mi bya/_rngul zan du gding ba mi bya/_rgyun du spyad cing bgo bar mi bya ste/_'di ni stod g.yogs te 'di ltar ni stod g.yogs mi spyad pa'o/_/stod g.yogs de 'di ltar spyad de/_stod g.yogs bgos nas 
[\[285a.3\]]chu'i rdza ma dgang bar bya/_spyad pa'i rdza ma dgang /_gtsang ma'i ril ba dgang /_bshang sa'i ril ba dgang /_rkang pa bkru ba'i ril ba yang dgang bar bya/_snod bgo bar bya/_gtsug lag khang skyong bya/_gzhan gang yang rung ste rung bar 'gyur ba thams cad la'ang stod 
[\[285a.4\]]g.yogs bgo bar bya'o/_/mthang gos ni thams cad du bgos te/_lus kyi mthang la bgo/_rtag tu yang bgo zhing spyad par bya'o/_/dge slong gis mi gtsang ba'i sar chos gos gzhag par mi bya/_ljid kyis mnan par mi bya/_drub par rigs na drub par bya/_bkru 
[\[285a.5\]]bar rigs na bkru bar bya/_kha bsgyur bar rigs na kha bsgyur bar bya/_dge slong gis tshon chen po rnam pa lnga po nyid bcang bar mi bya ste/_tshon chen po rnam pa lnga gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_thing shing dang /_le brgan rtsi dang /_rgya skyegs dang /_gur gum dang /_mtshal lo/_/
[\[285a.6\]]shun phrags kri ma sha ma gtogs te/_gzhan kha dog ngur smrig tu 'gyur ba shing gi shun phrags la kha dog can chongs shig_/de yang gzhan med par gyur na gdod nyes pa med do/_/sbyar ma nges par mtshan ma can du bya'o/_/stod g.yogs la nges par med la mthang 
[\[285a.7\]]gos la yang nges par med do/_/dge slong la chos gos ngan nam nyung na tshal bus logs shig nas glan par bya ste/_lnga'am/_bdun nam/_dgu'am/_bcu'am/_bcu gcig gam/_lhag par yang rung ste/_de ltar dge slong gis sbyar ma spyad pa ni sbyar mar spyod cig_/
[\[285b\]]
[\[285b.1\]]stod g.yogs su spyad pa ni stod g.yogs su spyod cig_/mthang gos su spyad pa ni mthang gos su spyod cig_/dge slong gis ji ltar rang gi pags pa bzhin du chos gos la bsrung bar bya'o/_/ci nas de phyi phyir btsal mi dgos par bya ste/_'di ni chos gos kyi bya ba 
[\[285b.2\]]zhes bya'o/_/gding ba'i bya ba gang zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la gding ba rnam pa gnyis rjes su gnang ste/_mal stan la bde ba'i phyir ro/_/stug na rim gcig bya/_srab na ni rim pa gnyis su bya'o/_/dge slong gis gding ba ma bting gi 
[\[285b.3\]]bar du 'dug par mi bya/_nyal bar mi bya/_gding ba gcig rkyang la bsngo bar mi bya/_gding ba med par zhag tu gnas par mi bya/_dge slong gis gding ba la nan tan du bya/_legs par bya/_ci nas de phyi phyir de btsal mi dgos par byas te/_'di ni gding ba'i bya ba 
[\[285b.4\]]zhes bya'o/_/khab kyi bya ba gang zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la khab rnam pa gnyis rjes su gnang ste/_chos gos drub pa'i phyir te/_lcags dang /_zangs kyi'o/_/dge slong rnams kyis khab med bzhin ljongs kyi spyad pa ma spyod cig_/dge slong 
[\[285b.5\]]gis khab legs par zhog shig_/legs par byos shig_/ci nas phyi phyir de btsal mi dgos par bya ste/_'di ni khab kyi bya ba zhes bya'o/_/khab ral gyi bya ba gang zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la khab ral rjes su gnang ste/_khab rnams sba ba'i 
[\[285b.6\]]phyir ro/_/dge slong gis ngo tsha med pa'i dge tshul rnams la khab ral ma gzhag cig_/mi stor bar bya/_bsnyen par rdzogs kyang yid mi ches na ma yin/_'di ltar yang gang zag lnga la khab ral gzhag par mi bya ste/_ngo tsha med pa dang /_khon yod pa dang /_mi mdza' ba 
[\[285b.7\]]dang /_dran pa nyams pa dang /_tshul bzhin mi gnas pa la'o/_/dge slong gis khab ral legs par gzhag par bya/_nan tan du bya/_ci nas phyi phyir de btsal mi dgos par bya ste/_'di ni khab ral gyi bya ba zhes bya'o/_/thug pa'i bya ba gang zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[286a\]]
[\[286a.1\]]dge slong rnams la thug pa rjes su gnang ste bde bar spyod pa'i phyir dang /_sbyin pa dang sbyin bdag rnams la byin pa'i chos rnams yongs su spyod pa'i phyir ro/_/dge slong gis sgra 'byin bzhin du thug pa ma 'thung shig_/shes bzhin du thug pa sgra 
[\[286a.2\]]bskyungs te 'thung bar bya/_dregs pa'i phyir ma yin/_nga rgyal gyi phyir ma yin/_snyems pa'i phyir ma yin/_bzang ba'i phyir ma yin gyi lus 'di rma gso ba'i phyir dang gzung ba'i phyir te/_'di ni thug pa'i bya ba zhes bya'o/_/chu'i bya ba gang zhe na/_dge slong 
[\[286a.3\]]gis chu shin tu brtag par bya/_dang ba/_gsal ba/_ma rnyogs pa/_ma 'dres pa/_sangs pa/_gtsang ma yongs su spyad par bya ste/_'di ni chu'i bya ba zhes bya'o/_/chu rdza'i bya ba gang zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la chu snod rjes su gnang ste/_
[\[286a.4\]]dge 'dun dang gang zag la yang rung zhabs rten dang chu dgab pa'i kha gab tu bcas pa'o/_/dge slong rnams kyis shin tu legs par khrus te skoms la gtsang mar bya ste bcang bar bya/_lag pa rung ba dang /_gos rung bas chu gzhag par bya/_brim par bya/_bram ze dang 
[\[286a.5\]]khyim bdag lhags na yang blud par bya/_dge slong rnams kyis chu rdza shin tu sba bar bya/_nan tan du bya/_ci nas phyi phyir btsal mi dgos par bya ste/_'di ni chu snod kyi bya ba zhes bya'o/_/yongs su spyad pa'i chu rdza'i bya ba gang zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong 
[\[286a.6\]]rnams la yongs su spyad pa'i chu rdza rjes su gnang ste/_shin tu bkrus/_bskams la gtsang mar byas te bcang bar bya/_bkang nas gtsug lag khang gi sgor gzhag par bya/_yongs su spyad pa'i rdza ma de dge slong rnams kyis dben par bya/_nan tan du bya/_ci nas phyi 
[\[286a.7\]]phyir de btsal mi dgos par bya ste/_'di ni yongs su spyad pa'i chu'i rdza ma'i bya ba zhes bya'o/_/gtsang ma'i ril ba'i bya ba gang zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la ril ba rjes su gnang ste/_de mchod rten gyi drung du gzhag par mi bya/_dge slong gis de dus dus su brtag 
[\[286b\]]
[\[286b.1\]]par bya/_bskam par bya/_dgang bar bya ste/_'di ni gtsang ma'i ril ba'i bya ba zhes bya'o/_/zas kyi bya ba gang zhe na/_bca' ba lnga dang /_bza' ba lnga ste/_dge slong rnams kyis bca' ba dang /_bza' ba rnams las gang yang rung ste/_bza' ba'i tshe dran pa mngon par 
[\[286b.2\]]gzhag par bya/_zas la brtag par bya/_btsal ba'o/_/nan tan gyis bsgrubs pa'o/_/de dang 'dra ba'o/_/yongs su spyad pa'o/_/nyam du 'gyur ba'o/_/'gyes pa'o snyam du shes par byas la bza' bar bya'o/_/dran pa nye bar bzhag cing sems mi g.yeng 
[\[286b.3\]]bar zas la rgyu mthun par 'du shes/_nad par 'du shes/_gzhan la rag las par 'du shes/_rkyen du 'du shes/_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung bar 'du shes/_mngon du bzhag la zas bza' bar bya/_'dus te za ba dang /_yang yang za ba dang /_chog par bya ba 
[\[286b.4\]]la'ang dran pa mngon du gzhag par bya ste/_de ni zas kyi bya ba zhes bya'o/_/bza' ba'i bya ba gang zhe na/_dge slong gis zan bza' ba'i tshe'am/_skyo ma'i tshe'am/_thug pa btung ba'i tshe yang rung dus bsgo ba'am/_gaN+DI brdungs ma thag tu myur du 'ong bar bya/_myur du 
[\[286b.5\]]'du bar bya/_shes bzhin du 'greng bar bya/_shes bzhin du 'dug par bya/_shes bzhin du bza' bar bya/_dran pa nye bar bzhag cing sems mi g.yeng bar bya ba dang /_chas bzang ba dang /_spyod lam du ldan pa dang /_shin tu bsdams shing rab tu dben par byas la/_sgra 
[\[286b.6\]]bskyungs shing mig mi g.yeng la mig gnya' shing gang tsam du blta/_rim gror bcas/_bdag dman par bcas/_'jigs pa dang /_gzhan gyi dbang du yid la bsams nas rdul phyag go snyam pa'i sems dang /_gnas brtan dang /_bar ma dang /_gsar bu rnams la
