[\[295b.5\]]yid phab la phyags ma lta bu'i sems su bcas la dge 'dun gyi nang du 'gro bar bya/_rgan rims su phyag byas nas rang gi stan la rab tu 'jug par bya/_gnas brtan dang /_bar ma dang /_gsar bu'i rnams la yang byams pa'i sems su bya/_phan pa'i sems su bya/_rjes su 
[\[295b.6\]]brtse ba'i sems su bya/_pha dang /_phu nu bo dang /_bur 'du shes mngon du bzhag_/'khor rnams la yang blta bar byas te/_gang chas sdug_/gang chas mi sdug_/gang mdzes par gyur/_gang mi mdzes par gyur/_gang gis legs par bgos/_gang gis mi sdug 
[\[295b.7\]]par bgos/_gang gis mdzes par chas pa de dag la ni g.yel bar gzhag_/gang gis mi mdzes par chas pa de dag la ni sbran par bya/_bsgo bar bya/_gang gis legs par bsgos pa de dag la yal bar gzhag_/gang gis mi sdug par bgos pa de dag la ni brda bya/_des 
[\[296a\]]
[\[296a.1\]]brda ma tshor na drung na 'dug pa la brda bya/_drung na 'dug pas kyang ma tshor na dge slong gnas brtan gyis der ci nas mi 'khrul ba'i tshul du sbran par bya/_ji nas legs par bgos pa dang /_sgra cher mi dbyung bar bya'o/_/dge slong gnas brtan gyis 'khor gyi 
[\[296a.2\]]nang du brtag par bya ba ni ci 'khor 'di dag chos bzhin du byed dam/_'on te chos bzhin ma yin/_de ste chos bzhin yin na ci bder byos shig ces las thams cad du byed du chug shig_/de ste chos bzhin ma yin na chos bzhin pa'i phyogs su gnas par bya/_chos 
[\[296a.3\]]bzhin du 'dri ba la sbyin/_yang cang mi smra bar stan las langs te 'gro bar bya/_de'i phyir rtsod pa dang /_'khrug pa rjes su 'byung bar mi bya ba 'di ni dus ma yin par dge 'dun 'du ba'i gnas brtan gyi bya ba zhes bya'o/_/smra ba'i bya ba gang zhe na/_rgyal po'i khab kyi 
[\[296a.4\]]grong khyer na mu stegs can kun tu rgyu ba gzhan dag cig tshes brgyad dang /_bcu bzhi dang /_bco lnga'i tshe/_gcig tu 'dus nas chos smra ba dang /_de na der skye bo mang po 'dus nas de dag la rnyed pa dag kyang rnyed par gyur/_bkur sti byed/_de dag gi 'khor dag kyang mang 
[\[296a.5\]]du 'phel bar gyur pa dang /_yul mnyam dka'i rgyal po mkhas pa can gzugs can snying po gsung rab 'di la dad par gyur nas des 'di snyam du bsams so/_/mu stegs can kun tu rgyu ba 'di dag chos brgyad ces bya ba nas/_de dag gi 'khor dag kyang mang du gyur ces 
[\[296a.6\]]bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin no/_/'di ltar dge slong yang tshes brgyad dang /_bcu bzhi dang /_bco lnga la gcig tu 'dug nas chos smra na bdag kyang der 'gro ste/_rgyal po yang 'gro'o snyam nas skye bo mang po dag kyang 'du bar 'gyur/_dge slong rnams kyis rnyed pa yang rnyed 
[\[296a.7\]]la bkur sti yang 'byung /_'khor rnams kyang mang du 'phel bar 'gyur/_skye bo mang po la'ang bsod nams mang du 'phel/_dge slong rnams kyang mi 'jigs par 'gyur/_bstan pa yang rgyas par 'gyur/_dam pa'i chos kyang yun ring du gnas par 'gyur/_chos kyi sgron 
[\[296b\]]
[\[296b.1\]]ma yang 'bar bar 'gyur/_phyi ma'i skye bo rnams la'ang snang bar byas par 'gyur ro snyam nas yul mnyam dka'i rgyal po mkhas pa can gzugs can snying po bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song nas drung du phyin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas 
[\[296b.2\]]phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug ste/_yul mnyam dka'i rgyal po gzugs can snying pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa mu stegs can kun tu rgyu ba gzhan ni tshes brgyad nas/_de dag gis 'khor dag kyang mang du 
[\[296b.3\]]gyur to zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin no/_/'di ltar dge slong rnams kyang tshes brgyad nas phyi ma'i skye bo rnams la snang bar bgyis par 'gyur na dgongs par ci gnang zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin no/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis yul mnyam dka'i rgyal po mkhas pa can gzugs 
[\[296b.4\]]can snying po la cang mi gsung bzhin dgongs so/_/de nas yul mnyam dka'i rgyal po mkhas pa can gzugs can snying pos bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bzhin dgongs par shes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 
[\[296b.5\]]'das kyi drung nas song ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yul mnyam dka'i rgyal po mkhas pa gzugs can snying po song nas ring po ma lon par mkhyen te/_dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na dge slong rnams ngas rjes su gnang gis tshes brgyad dang /_bcu bzhi dang bco 
[\[296b.6\]]lnga la gcig tu 'dus nas chos smra bar bya'o/_/de yang 'di lta bur smra bar bya ste/_chos smra ba'i dge slong gis don dang tshig gis 'khor rnams go bar byos shig_/de na dge slong dag tshig tha mal par smra ste tshig tha mal par smras pas 'khor rnams go bar ma gyur pa dang /_de ltar 
[\[296b.7\]]gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rjes su gnang gis dbyangs kyis chos smra bar bya'o/_/de dag gis ji lta bur 'dug bzhin du smras pa dang /_'khor de dag gis go bar ma gyur te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[297a\]]
[\[297a.1\]]stsal pa/_rjes su gnang gis stan mthon po chos shig_/de dag gis mdo sde chen po bsdus shing smras pa dang /_the tshom du gyur rgyas par yang mi byed la de nyid kyis nyi ma zad par byed de/_'khor rnams skyo bar gyur te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[297a.2\]]stsal pa/_rjes su gnang gis don gyi dbang du ci bder rgyas par byos shig_/de dag mdo sde'i las don nyi tshe thus te gtam brjod par bya/_gsungs pa'i bzhin du gzhung 'cha' bar 'dod pa dang /_de dag mdo sde'i mtha' ma rung bar mi 'gyur ram/_snyam du the tshom du gyur 
[\[297a.3\]]nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rjes su gnang gis mdo sde'i don nyi tshe thus la skabs skabs su gtam rgyud du yang bya/_gsungs pa yang gzhung bzhin byos te don dang tshig tu 'brel bas 'khor rnams go bar gyis shig_/mdo sde de dag kyang de bzhin du 
[\[297a.4\]]gzung bar bya'o/_/de dag gnyis 'khor lhan cig tu 'khor gcig la 'chad nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'khor gcig gi nang du gnyis lhan cig ma 'chad cig_/gang 'chad pa de ni nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/de dag 'khor 'khor du 'chad 
[\[297a.5\]]nas de dag 'khrugs par gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'khor 'khor du ma 'chad cig_/'chad na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/_/de yang 'khor gnyis la cig car 'chad par gyur pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[297a.6\]]'khor gnyis la cig car ma 'chad cig_/gang 'chad pa de nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/'di ltar 'chad pa las gnyis po 'khrug par mi 'gyur ba de lta bur bshad par bya'o/_/de dag 'khor ded cing 'dong nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'khor ded cing 
[\[297a.7\]]ma 'dong shig_/gang 'khor ded cing 'dong na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/_/bdag cag nyid dang de 'dong ba la ni nyes pa med do/_/de dag chos kyi sgo nas rnyed pa tshol te/_chos 'tshong bas 'tsho bar byed pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_chos kyi 
[\[297b\]]
[\[297b.1\]]sgo nas rnyed pa yang ma tshol cig_/chos 'tshong zhing 'tsho bar yang ma byed cig_/de nas smra ba med nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rjes su dran par byed pas rjes su dran par gyis shig_/rjes su dran par byed pa'ang med nas rim gyis smra bar gyis shig_/
[\[297b.2\]]tshigs bcad dang dbyangs su sbyar zhing byed nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_bdag nyid kyis smros shig_/yang na dge slong gzhan la chol cig_/bcol ba'i gang zag kyang rig par bya/_bdag nyid kyis mi smra/_yang na dge slong gzhan la ma bcol/_
[\[297b.3\]]bcol ba'i gang zag kyang shes par ma byas na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/_/de dag rim bzhin du bskos pa dang /_'di ltar zhar ba dang /_glen pa dang /_sgur po dag la mu stegs can kun tu rgyu ba gzhan dag dge sbyong shAkya'i bu'i nang na 'di dag 'di ni skyes bu dam 
[\[297b.4\]]pa'o/_/skyes bu gtso bo'o/_/skyes bu mchog go/_/zhes nyes pa ngor brjod cing 'phyas 'dogs mi snyan pa zer bar gyur to/_/ji ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_nus pa yod na chos smra 
[\[297b.5\]]ba rims su ma bsko shig_/gang nus pa de bsko bar bya'i/_'khor 'khrug par mi 'gyur ba de lta bu bsko bar bya'o/_/smra ba'i bya ba gzhan yang dus gang dang gang du yang rung ste/_dge slong rnams 'dus shing 'khod pa dang chos kyi gtam nges pa rnams brjod par bya'o/_/
[\[297b.6\]]de ste mi shes na'ang gcig la gcig dri bar bya/_gcig la gcig zhu bar bya/_bgam par mi bya/_glags btsal ba'i phyir mi bya/_'phyas bya ba'i phyir mi bya/_nyams bskyod par mi bya'i ci nas chos la rim gro dang bkur sti'i phyir dri bar bya/_zhu bar bya ste/_ci dge 
[\[297b.7\]]ba'am/_'on te mi dge ba'am/_ci kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa'am/_'on te kha na ma tho ba med pa yin/_ji ltar byas na dge bar 'gyur ram/_'on te sdig par 'gyur ba zhes bya ba 'di ni smra ba'i bya ba'o/_/mi smra ba'i bya ba gang zhe na/_gnas gang na dge slong 
[\[298a\]]
[\[298a.1\]]rnams smra zhing gzhan la brjod par mi 'dod pa de dag gis ji lta bur yid la bya ba grub pa de bzhin du bsgom par bya/_spyod lam bzhi la 'jug par bya/_phan tshun du mi smra bar 'jug pa la rgyas par bya ba ni 'di lta ste/_klung dga' ldan gyi dge slong rnams 
[\[298a.2\]]ji lta ba bzhin du bya ste/_'di ni mi smra ba'i bya ba zhes bya'o/_/dbyar tshul du 'jug pa'i bya ba gang zhe na/_dbyar tshul du 'jug par 'dod pa'i dge slong gis bsam pa shin tu bsams/_brtag pa shin tu brtags/_shin tu dpyad pa bzhin dpyad de/_tshul du 
[\[298a.3\]]'jug par bya ste/_bdag gnas de na dge slong ji ltar tshul khrims dang ldan/_yon tan dang ldan/_mkhas pa dang ldan/_dge ba'i chos dang ldan/_lta ba mtshungs/_gnas pa mtshungs/_grogs su mtshungs/_yid gcugs pa dag dang lhan cig gang bde 
[\[298a.4\]]bar 'gyur ba ni 'di lta ste/_'gro na yang rung /_smra yang rung ba dag gnas de na dge slong mdo sde 'dzin pa/_'dul ba 'dzin pa/_ma lta bu 'dzin pa gang bdag the tshom ma skyes pa las ni mi skyed/_skyes pa ni dul bar byed/_sdig pa lta bu ma skyes pa las ni mi skyed/_
[\[298a.5\]]skyes pa las ni dul bar byed pa yod dam/_gnas de na bdag na ba dang rjes su mthun pa'i sman dang /_zas dang /_yo byad dang /_bsnyen bkur byed par 'byor par 'gyur ram/_gnas de na bdag gi lus kyang rung /_sems kyang rung bde bar 'gyur ram/_gnas 
[\[298a.6\]]de na dge slong dag thab mo byed pa/_mtshang 'dru bar byed/_'khrug par byed/_rtsod pa gleng bar byed pa lta mi gnas grang /_des bdag la ma thob pa las thob pa dang /_ma chud pa las chud par bya ba dang /_mngon du ma byas pa las mngon du byed pa'i bar chad du mi 
[\[298a.7\]]'gyur/_gnas de na dbyar gyi nang du dge 'dun 'bye bar mi 'gyur grang zhes de bzhin du bsam pa shin tu bsams/_brtag pa shin tu brtags/_dpyad pa shin tu dpyad de/_na ba'i bsnyen bkur ba'i grogs mthun pa dang 'gro bar bya ste/_'di ni dbyar tshul du 'jug pa'i 
[\[298b\]]
[\[298b.1\]]bya ba zhes bya'o/_/dbyar tshul du zhugs pa'i bya ba gang zhe na/_dbyar tshul du zhugs pa'i dge slong gis don med pa'i phyir zhag gcig kyang mtshams kyi phyi rol du 'gro bar mi bya/_don cig yod par gyur na des zhag bdun nam/_zhag bzhi bcur byin gyis brlabs la 'gro bar bya/_
[\[298b.2\]]de yang don gyi phyir te/_don gang gi phyir zhe na/_dge slong gi don nam/_dge slong ma'i don nam/_dge tshul pha'i 'am/_dge tshul ma'i 'am/_dge bsnyen pha'i 'am/_dge bsnyen ma'i don kyang rung /_gnyen gyi don kyang rung /_bdag gi don kyang rung /_de ste sangs 
[\[298b.3\]]rgyas la'am/_chos la'am/_dge 'dun la'am/_sdug bsngal la'am/_kun 'byung la'am/_'gog pa la'am/_lam la yang rung /_the tshom du gyur tam/_yid gnyis su gyur tam/_dogs par gyur kyang rung /_ma thob pa las thob pa'i 'du shes su gyur/_
[\[298b.4\]]ma chud pa las chud pa'i 'du shes dang /_mngon du ma byas pa las mngon du bya ba'i 'du shes te/_de 'di ltar mu stegs can kun tu rgyu ba gzhan dag gi don la yang rung /_de ste dge slong des gnas der dbyar dge 'dun 'bye bar 'gyur ram/_mchod rten nam/_gtsug lag khang 
[\[298b.5\]]yang rung 'dral bar 'gyur ram/_tshig par 'gyur ba yang rung ste/_der dge slong des sangs rgyas kyang rung /_chos sam/_dge 'dun gyi don la yang rung ste/_zhag bdun nam/_zhag bzhi bcur byin gyis rlobs la 'gro bar bya ste/_der song ba las zhag bdun nam/_
[\[298b.6\]]zhag bzhi bcur yang rung lon par gyur na dge slong dbyar chad pa'i nyes pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/_de ni dbyar tshul du zhugs pa'i bya ba zhes bya'o/_/dbyar tshul du zhugs pa'i gnas brtan gyi bya ba gang zhe na/_dbyar tshul du zhugs pa'i dge slong gnas brtan gyis gtsug 
[\[298b.7\]]lag khang gi rnams dang /_mchod rten gyi rnams shes par bya/_ji lta bur ral tshems bya ba dang /_su byed pa la spro ba bskyed par bya/_bsgrag par bya/_su mi byed pa de la ni bskul bar bya/_dran par bya ba 'di ni dbyar tshul du zhugs pa'i gnas brtan gyi bya ba zhes bya'o/_/
[\[299a\]]
[\[299a.1\]]dbyar tshul na gnas pa'i bya ba gang zhe na/_dbyar tshul na gnas pa'i dge slong rnams kyis las rnam pa gsum bya ste/_dbyar gang du gnas pa'i gnas khang de dag gas pa dang zhig pa'i rnams bcos su gzhug par bya/_mtshan rtog par bya/_mtshan 
[\[299a.2\]]rtog par byed du gzhug_/gnas der gos gang rnyed pa'i gos de gtan par gding bar bya/_yang na gding du gzhug par bya ba 'di ni dbyar tshul na gnas pa'i bya ba zhes bya'o/_/'khor gyi bya ba gang zhe na/_'khor gyi gtso bo des dus dus su 'khor rnams la gang legs 
[\[299a.3\]]par spyod/_gang legs par mi spyod pa dang /_gang mdzes par sgrub gang mi mdzes par sgrub brtags te gang legs par spyod cing mdzes par sgrub pa de la ni yongs su bskyang bar bya ste/_tshe dang ldan pa legs so legs so/_/ji ltar khyod spyod pa de lta bur spyad par 
[\[299a.4\]]bya'o zhes spro ba bskyed par bya/_yang dag par dga' bar bya/_de dus dus su phyi phyir bstan par bya/_bslab par bya'o/_/gang legs par mi spyod dam mdzes par mi sgrub pa de la gang la ji lta bur 'os pa de lta bur chad pas gcad par bya ba ni 'khor gyi bya ba zhes bya'o/_/
[\[299a.5\]]'khor gyi nang du bya ba gang zhe na/_dge slong 'khor gyi nang du dran pa nye bar bzhag nas 'khor gyi nang du 'gro bar bya ste/_'di ni rgyal rigs kyi 'khor to/_/'di ni bram ze'i 'khor to/_/'di ni khyim bdag gi 'khor to/_/'di ni dge sbyong gi 'khor yin te/_der bdag 'di 
[\[299a.6\]]lta bur 'gro bar bya/_'di lta bur 'greng bar bya/_'di lta bur 'dug par bya ste/_'di lta bur smra bar bya/_'di lta bur smra bar mi bya'o zhes bya ba de ni 'khor gyi nang du 'gro ba'i bya ba zhes bya'o/_/'khor gyi nang du zhugs pa'i bya ba gang zhe na/_dge slong 'khor gyi nang du zhugs 
[\[299a.7\]]na des gtam sna tshogs mi bya/_gtam mi rigs pa'i rnams mi bya/_'khor rnams rigs par byas la de dag dang mthun pa'i gtam bya bar bya/_gtam byas nas stan las ldang bar bya ba de ni 'khor gyi nang du zhugs pa'i bya ba zhes bya'o/_/'khor gyi nang du zhugs pa'i gnas 
[\[299b\]]
[\[299b.1\]]brtan gyi bya ba gang zhe na/_'khor gyi nang du zhugs pa'i dge slong gnas brtan gyis 'khor rnams la 'di dag ji lta bu'i gtam la dga'am/_'on te cang mi smra ba la dga' zhes 'khor rnams la brtag par bya'o/_/de ste gtam la dga' ba dag cig yin na ni de dag la de dang mthun 
[\[299b.2\]]pa'i gtam bya'o/_/de ste mi smra ba la dga' ba dag cig yin na ni der cang mi smra bar 'dug par bya ste/_'di ni 'khor gyi nang du zhugs pa'i gnas brtan gyi bya ba zhes bya'o/_/gso sbyin gyi bya ba gang zhe na/_bcu bzhi'am/_bco lnga'i gso sbyong de nyid kyi tshe rang gi rgyud la brtag 
[\[299b.3\]]par bya ste/_mtshan mo'i rgyud dang /_nyin par gyi rgyud der bdag la skabs der ltung ba lta byung ngam/_de ste byung ba yod na dge slong yid brtan pa zhig rnyed na ni de'i mdun du bshags par bya/_de ste ma rnyed na sems kyi byin gyis brlab pa dang /_de ste nyes pa ma byung na ni sems 
[\[299b.4\]]bskyed par bya ste/_bdag ni ltung ba de las yongs su dag go zhes tshig tu brjod par bya/_gso sbyin ni tshul khrims yongs su dag par byed pa ste/_'di ni gso sbyin gyi bya ba zhes bya'o/_/gso sbyin mngon du bya ba'i bya ba gang zhe na/_dge slong gso sbyin mngon du byung la min 
[\[299b.5\]]na dad bzhin du yang 'gro bar bya ste/_de yang shes bzhin du 'gro bar bya ba nas snga ma bzhin te 'dug pa la mkhas par bya ba'i bar du'o/_/'dug nas kyang so sor thar pa'i mdo sde la ston pa'o snyam du 'du shes mngon du gzhag par bya/_bkur sti bya/_rim gror byas la mnyan/_
[\[299b.6\]]bla mar bya/_gces par bya/_yid la gzung bar bya/_sems gcig tu bya/_rna ba mi g.yel bar bya/_sems thams cad gcig tu dmigs nas mnyan par bya'o/_/mnyan nas kyang de lta bur nan tan bya/_bsgrub par bya ba de ni gso sbyin mngon du bya ba'i bya ba zhes bya'o/_/
[\[299b.7\]]gso sbyin gyi las kyi bya ba gang zhe na/_gso sbyin gyi bya ba la rnam pa lnga ste/_gdon pa dang /_bsngo ba dang /_dad pa yongs su dag pa dang /_skabs dbye ba dang /_sems kyis byin gyis brlab pa'o/_/gzhan yang gso sbyin gyi las la rnam pa bzhi ste/_chos bzhin ma 
[\[300a\]]
[\[300a.1\]]yin la ma 'dus par byed pa dang /_chos bzhin ma yin la 'dus par byed pa dang /_chos bzhin la ma 'dus par byed pa dang /_chos bzhin la 'dus par byed pa'o/_/de las chos bzhin byed pa'i gso sbyin gyi las de ni 'di lta ste/_chos bzhin byed pa 
[\[300a.2\]]yin no/_/de ni gso sbyin gyi las kyi bya ba zhes bya'o/_/so sor thar pa'i bya ba gang zhe na/_bcu bzhi'am/_bco lnga'i gso sbyin de nyid kyi tshe mtshams dang las kyi nang du phyin pa'i dge slong ji snyed pa de dag thams cad gcig tu 'dus shing 'khod pa dang /_dge 'dun gyi gnas 
[\[300a.3\]]brtan dge slong gis so sor thar pa'i mdo sde bklag par bya/_so sor thar pa'i mdo la yang ston par 'du shes mngon par gzhag par bya/_bkur sti dang rim gror byas la mnyan/_bla mar bya/_gces par bya/_yid la gzung bar bya/_mtshams gcig tu bya/_rna ba 
[\[300a.4\]]mi g.yel bar bya/_gzhan thams cad gcig tu thub par byas la mnyan par bya/_thos nas yang de bzhin du nan tan bya/_bsgrub par bya ste/_de ni so sor thar pa'i bya ba zhes bya'o/_/so sor thar pa klog pa'i bya ba gang zhe na/_so sor thar pa klog pa la rnam 
[\[300a.5\]]pa lnga ste/_gsol ba byas nas gleng gzhi bklags te/_lhag ma rnams ni thos pa bzhin no zhes bsgrag par bya ba dang /_de yang so sor thar pa bsgrags na so sor thar pa bklags pa zhes bya ste/_'di ni so sor thar pa klog pa dang po'o/_/gsol ba byas nas gleng 
[\[300a.6\]]gzhi bklags/_phas pham pa bzhi bklags pa la lhag ma rnams ni thos pa bzhin no zhes bsgrag par bya ste/_de yang so sor thar pa klog pa gnyis pa'o/_/gsol ba byas la gleng gzhi yang bklags/_phas pham pa bzhi yang bklags/_dge 'dun gyi lhag ma bcu 
[\[300a.7\]]gsum yang bklags nas lhag ma ni thos pa bzhin no zhes bsgrags pa ni so sor thar pa bklags pa yin te/_'di ni so sor thar pa klog pa gsum pa'o/_/gsol ba byas la gleng gzhi bklags/_phas pham pa bzhi yang bklags/_dge 'dun gyi lhag ma bcu gsum 
[\[300b\]]
[\[300b.1\]]yang bklags/_mi mngon pa'i chos gnyis po yang bklags la lhag ma rnams ni thos pa bzhin no zhes bsgrags pa yang so sor thar pa bklags pa yin te/_'di ni so sor thar pa klog pa bzhi pa'o/_/rgyas par so sor thar pa klog pa dang lnga ste/_'di ni so sor thar 
[\[300b.2\]]pa klog pa'i bya ba'o/_/so sor thar pa klog par byed pa'i bya ba gang zhe na/_so sor thar pa klog pa'i dge slong gis so sor thar pa'i mdo de kha ton du gsal por byang bar bya/_dran par bya/_gtan la phebs par bya/_nam klog pa'i tshe mi 'khrul bar legs par klog par 
[\[300b.3\]]bya/_des bdag gi rgyud kyang brtag par bya ste/_mtshan mo'i rgyud dang nyin par gyi rgyud las/_bdag de'i skabs su nyes pa lta byung ngam ma byung bar brtag ste/_de ste nyes pa byung bar gyur la yid brtan pa'i dge slong yod na de'i drung du bshags par bya/_de ste med na 
[\[300b.4\]]re zhig gso sbyin byas la de'i 'og tu bdag gis ltung ba ji ltar chos bzhin slar bshags par bya'o/_/snyam du sems kyis byin gyis brlab par bya'o/_/ji ltar so sor thar pa'i mdo las 'byung ba bzhin du des nan tan du bya ba de ni so sor thar pa klog par byed pa'i bya ba zhes 
[\[300b.5\]]bya'o/_/gnas brtan gyi bya ba gang zhe na/_de ste dge slong rnams khyim pa'i der zan la mgron du bos na de'i tshe dge slong gnas brtan gyis snga zad du sham thabs bgo bar bya/_dag rar byung ste 'dug par bya ba de ni gnas brtan gyi bya ba zhes bya'o/_/bar ma'i bya ba gang zhe na/_
[\[300b.6\]]dge slong bar mas dge slong gnas brtan mdun du byas nas grong du 'jug par bya/_de ste gnas brtan bshang ba'am gci ba zhig tu thogs nas des mi ring ba zhig tu song la bsdad par bya/_de ste ring du song na grong 'dab tu song la bsdad par bya/_de ste bram ze dang khyim bdag dag 
[\[300b.7\]]gis spyan 'dren pa btang na yang gnas brtan 'ongs kyi bar du cung zad bsdad de bya'o zhes smra bar bya/_de ste lag chu btang na gnas brtan la bsdad do zhes smra bar bya/_de ste gnas brtan 'ongs par gyur na yang 'khod pa thams cad ldang bar bya ste/_'di ni bar ma'i bya ba zhes bya'o/_/gsar 
[\[301a\]]
[\[301a.1\]]bu'i bya ba gang zhe na/_dge slong gsar bus gtsug lag khang chag chag gdab par bya/_sa phyag par bya/_phyag dar dor bar bya/_lci bas zhal zhal 'jam por byug par bya/_chu rnams so sor bcu zhing gzhag par bya/_stan rnams gding bar bya/_
[\[301a.2\]]zan rnams sko sar drang bar bya/_dugs khang du bsgrub pa'i rnams byas te/_der shing bskya bar bya/_'bru mar gzhag par bya/_sa dang phye ma gzhag par bya/_chu gzhag par bya/_dge slong gang las khas len pa de dag la las bya bar bya/_gzhan mtshungs par 
[\[301a.3\]]spyad pa gang yang rung ste/_thams cad gsar bus bya bar bya/_'di ltar yang dge slong gsar bus dge slong gnas brtan rnams la pha dang phu bo lta bur 'du shes nye bar gzhag cing bkur stir bcas/_bdag la dbang bcas/_'jigs pa dang dbang du 'gyur bar bcas/_
[\[301a.4\]]sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun la dmigs bzhin pa'i sems mngon du gzhag par bya/_mtshungs par spyad pa'i chos rnams ji lta bur bcas pa bzhin du rdzogs par bya ba 'di ni gsar bu'i bya ba zhes bya'o/_/gnas brtan dang bar ma dang gsar bu'i bya ba gang zhe na/_dge slong 
[\[301a.5\]]gnas brtan dang bar ma dang gsar bu thams cad kyis kyang rab tu byung ba'o snyam du sems mngon du gzhag par bya/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mgon mdzad pa la mgon po'o snyam du 'du shes mngon du gzhag par bya/_mya ngan 'da' ba la gzhol bar bya/_bslab 
[\[301a.6\]]pa'i gzhi ji lta bur bcas pa la mtshungs par spyad par bya/_bla ma'i khyad par du chud pa'i phyir nan tan du bya ste/_'di ni gnas brtan dang bar ma dang gsar bu'i bya ba zhes bya ba'o/_/dugs khang du bya ba gang zhe na/_dge slong dugs khang du 'jug par 'dod na des shes 
[\[301a.7\]]bzhin du nang du 'gro bar bya/_shes bzhin du nang du 'greng bar bya/_shes bzhin du 'dug par bya/_dran pa mngon du gzhag cing sems mi g.yeng bar bya/_spyod lam bzang ba dang /_shin tu mdzes pa dang /_shin tu bsdams pa dang /_sgra bskyung ba dang /_bkur stir 
[\[301b\]]
[\[301b.1\]]bcas/_'jigs pa dang dbang du 'gyur bar bcas/_yid dman pa'i sems phyags ma lta bur bya/_gnas brtan dang bar ma dang gsar bu la yang byams pa'i sems su bya/_phan pa'i sems dang rjes su brtse ba'i sems su bya/_pha dang bu dang phu nu bo lta bur 'du shes 
[\[301b.2\]]mngon du gzhag par bya/_dge slong dugs khang gi nang du zhugs nas/_gtam sna tshogs mi bya/_gtam mi rigs pa mi bya/_spyod lam gnyis la 'jug par bya ste/_'phags pa'i cang mi smra ba'am/_nges pa'i chos kyi gtam la ste/_de ni dugs khang gi bya ba zhes 
[\[301b.3\]]bya'o/_/dge slong dugs khang du khrus bya ba'i bya ba gang zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la dugs khang du rjes su gnang ba yang rgyags pa'i phyir ma yin/_dregs pa'i phyir ma yin/_brgyan pa'i phyir ma yin/_'khrul ba'i phyir ma yin gyi lus 'di gso ba'i 
[\[301b.4\]]phyir ro/_/dugs khang la yon tan rnam pa lnga ste/_rngul dang dri ma 'byang /_pags pa dang mdangs gsal/_pags pa la nad yod pa rnams 'byin/_rlung dang bad kan rnams med par byed/_dugs khang ni nad med par byed pa'o/_/gzhan yang yon tan rnam pa lnga ste/_
[\[301b.5\]]rngul dang dri ma 'byang /_pags pa dang mdangs gsal/_pags pa la nad yod pa rnams 'byin/_rlung dang bad kan rnams med par byed/_dugs khang du skyo ba bskyed par bya ba'o/_/dge slong gis dugs khang du khrus byed par 'dod na des sngar mkhan po la zhu bar byed bkru 
[\[301b.6\]]ba'i dus su bzod par bya/_shes bzhin du dugs khang gi nang du 'jug par bya/_skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug la na ba'i 'du shes mngon du gzhag par bya/_khrus bya mdun du 'dug la mi bde bar mi bya/_dran pa mngon du bzhag la las bya/_dge slong dag las kyang las 
[\[301b.7\]]byed pa nyams su blang bar bya/_mkhan po dang slob dpon la ma zhus kyi bar du mtshungs pa rnams la las mi bya/_byed pa yang bdag gir mi bya/_mkhan po dang slob dpon dag tu khon yod na de de dag gi drung du mi bskor/_de ste chu blugs par 'dod na chu grang mo dang bsres la lugs shig_/
[\[302a\]]
[\[302a.1\]]de ste chu tsha na grogs la yang chu tsha'o zhes sbron cig_/shes bzhin du khrus byas la dugs khang de na khri'u dang /_ril ba dang /_nya phyis dang /_khrus ras dang /_dugs khang gi snod spyad gzhan ci yod kyang rung legs par bkrus te gnas gnas su gzhag 
[\[302a.2\]]par bya ba 'di ni dugs khang du khrus byed pa'i bya ba zhes bya'o/_/dugs khang du gnas brtan gyi bya ba gang zhe na/_dugs khang du dge slong gnas brtan gyis gsar bu rnams la yo byad la zhugs na bslang bar mi bya/_dugs khang der chung ngu na lus las rdul byung ba tsam yang bslang 
[\[302a.3\]]bar mi bya/_de ste de na dge slong rnams spyod lam rnams mi mdzes sam/_mi bzang bar 'dug gam/_'on te gtam rgyud la zhugs la dge slong gnas brtan gyis slar zlog cing sgo shig_/rjes su bstan par bya/_mdzes shing bzang ba la gzud par bya/_ji lta bu der 
[\[302a.4\]]spyad pa'i chos bcas pa de lta bur gzud par bya/_de dag chos kyi gtam la gzud par bya ba de ni dugs khang du gnas brtan gyi bya ba zhes bya'o/_/mkhan po'i bya ba gang zhe na/_mkhan pos lhan cig spyod pa'i rnams bslab par bya/_gsal bar bya/_bsgo bar bya/_
[\[302a.5\]]rjes su bstan par bya/_sdig pa las bzlog par bya/_dge ba la gzud par bya/_sdig pa'i grogs po las bskal par bya/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen la gzhar bar bya/_lhung bzed kyis bsdu bar bya/_chos gos dang /_dra ba dang /_phor bu dang /_ska rags dang /_
[\[302a.6\]]rjes su dran pa dang /_slar 'dri ba dang /_lung bsgo ba dang /_kha thon la gzhug pa dang /_yid la byed pa la gzhug par bya/_nyes pa las bslang ba dang /_na na nad g.yog bya ba dang /_spong ba la gzhug par bya ba dang /_nang du yang dag 'jog la 'jug pa dang /_bla ma'i 
[\[302a.7\]]khyad par chud par bya ba la mtshungs par spyod du gzhug par bya/_lhan cig spyod pa phyogs gang na mi bde bar gnas pa de nas dbyung bar bya ba de ni mkhan po'i bya ba zhes bya'o//_//'dul ba gzhung dam pa/_bam po lnga bcu rtsa gsum pa/_lhan cig spyod pa'i bya ba gang zhe na/_lhan 
[\[302b\]]
[\[302b.1\]]cig spyod pas mkhan po la ston pa'o snyam du 'du shes mngon du gzhag par bya/_rim gro bya/_myur du ldang bar bya/_myur du 'gro bar bya/_gus par bya/_zhu bar bya ste/_lhan cig spyod pas mkhan po la ma zhus kyi bar du spyad 'brim pa'i las mi bya/_gtsug lag khang skyong gi res 
[\[302b.2\]]mi bya/_lhung bzed kyi las mi bya/_chos gos kyi las mi bya/_snga res mi bya/_phyad res mi bya/_zla res mi bya/_klung la spyod par mi bya/_ri la spyod par mi bya/_dur khrod du spyod par mi bya/_ljongs rgyu bar mi bya/_rkang pa bkru bar mi bya/_mal bca' bar mi bya/_chu 
[\[302b.3\]]bcu bar mi bya/_grong du 'jug par mi bya/_mtshams kyi phyi rol du 'gro bar mi bya/_mi rigs pa'i gang zag la gzhar bar mi bya/_de lta bu'i drung du 'dug pa yang bdag gir mi bya/_de 'dra ba'i drung nas bsnyen bkur yang bdag gis blang bar mi bya/_lhung bzed kyang 
[\[302b.4\]]blang bar mi bya/_chos gos blang bar mi bya/_zas blang bar mi bya/_sman blang bar mi bya/_yo byad gzhan gang yang rung byin na bdag gir mi bya'o/_/de lta bu la bsnyen bkur yang mi bya/_lhung bzed sbyin par mi bya/_zas sbyin par mi bya/_sman sbyin par mi bya/_
[\[302b.5\]]yo byad gang yang rung sbyin pa bdag gir mi bya/_de 'dra ba'i gang zag gi drung nas lung bsgo ba mi blang /_dran par bya ba ma yin/_yongs su dri bar bya ba ma yin/_yid la bya ba mi dri/_de lta bu dag la yang lung bsgo ba mi sbyin/_dran pa ma yin/_yongs su dri ba 
[\[302b.6\]]ma yin/_yid la bya ba yang mi bstan te/_bya'o cog thams cad kyang mkhan po la ma zhus kyi bar du mi bya'o/_/las rnam pa gsum ni ma gtogs te/_bshang gci dang /_so shing dor ba dang /_mtshams kyi nang du mchod rten la phyag bya ba'o/_/de ste mkhan po'i 
[\[302b.7\]]lhung bzed bkru'am/_sreg pa zhig tu gyur na yang de la ci nas mkhan po'i lhung bzed kyi las bdag gis bya'o snyam mam/_gzhan byed du gzhug go snyam du lhan cig spyod pa des myur du spro ba bskyed par bya'o/_/de ste mkhan po'i chos gos drub par gyur tam/_kha bkru bar gyur 
[\[303a\]]
[\[303a.1\]]tam/_kha bsgyur ba zhig tu gyur na yang de la bdag gis mkhan po'i chos gos kyi las rang gis bya'o snyam mam/_gzhan la byed du gzhug go snyam du lhan cig spyod pas myur du spro ba bskyed par bya/_de ste mkhan po na ba zhig tu gyur na yang de la 
[\[303a.2\]]bdag nyid kyis mkhan po na ba'i nad g.yog bya'o snyam mam/_gzhan la nad g.yog byed du gzhug go snyam du lhan cig spyod pas myur du spro ba bskyed par bya/_de ste mkhan po la the tshom zhig skyes par gyur na/_de la ci nas bdag gis mkhan po'i the tshom skyes pa 
[\[303a.3\]]de bdag nyid kyis slar bsal lo snyam mam/_gzhan mkhan po'i the tshom sel du gzhug go snyam du lhan cig spyod pas myur du spro ba bskyed par bya'o/_/de ste mkhan po sdig pa la lta bar gyur na yang de la ci nas bdag gis mkhan po sdig pa la lta bar gyur pa de slar gtang 
[\[303a.4\]]bar bya'o snyam mam/_gzhan la slar gtong bar byed du gzhug go snyam du lhan cig spyod pas myur du spro ba bskyed par bya'o/_/de ste mkhan po la chad pa'i las shig mngon du 'byung ngam byung bar gyur na/_de la ci nas bdag gis mkhan po chad pa'i las kyis gcod par byed dam 
[\[303a.5\]]bcad kyang rung ste/_dbyung bar bya'o snyam du lhan cig spyod pas spro ba myur du bskyed par bya'o/_/de ste mkhan po la spang ba'i las shig mngon du byed par 'gyur ram/_byas par gyur kyang rung ste/_der ci nas bdag gis mkhan po la spang ba'i las shig mngon du byed kyang rung 
[\[303a.6\]]byas kyang rung ste/_dbyung ngo snyam du lhan cig spyod pas myur du spro ba bskyed par bya'o/_/de ste mkhan po la dge 'dun gyi lhag ma'i nyes pa zhig byung bar gyur na/_de la ci nas bdag gis mkhan po la chad par byed pa byin cig pa dang /_gzhi nas bslang ba'i chad pa'am/_
[\[303a.7\]]chad pa byas zin nas yid mgu bar bya ba byin cig pa'am/_gzhi nas bslang ste yid mgu bar bya ba'am/_yid mgu bar spyad nas dbyung ba byin cig par lhan cig gnas pas spro ba bskyed par gyur na ni legs/_spro ba ma bskyed na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/_/de ltar 
[\[303b\]]
[\[303b.1\]]lhan cig spyod pas mkhan po la bya ba ci dang ci yod kyang rung spro ba bskyed par bya ba de bzhin du mkhan pos kyang lhan cig spyod pa la bya ba ci dang ci yod kyang rung spro ba bskyed par bya ste/_zhu ba rnams ni ma gtogs so/_/lhan cig spyod pas mkhan po'i stan gding bar bya/_rkang 
[\[303b.2\]]pa bkru ba'i chu dang /_lham yang bshams te phyogs gcig tu gzhag par bya/_rkang pa bkru bar bya/_bsku bar bya/_mal bya'o/_/gci ba'i snod dang bshang ba'i snod bshams te gzhag par bya/_de ste lung zhig mnod dgos par gyur na yang lung mnod par bya/_yid 
[\[303b.3\]]la byed pa zhig mnod dgos par gyur na'ang yid la byed pa mnod par bya/_phyogs gcig tu song ste 'dug nas bsgom par bya'o/_/nang par langs nas gci ba'i snod dang bshang ba'i snod dbyung bar bya/_mkhan po'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag byas te/_mkhan po bde 
[\[303b.4\]]bar mdzad dam/_bde bar bgyis sam/_bde bar spyad dam zhes dri bar bya/_de ste na bar gyur na yang na ba'i sman dang /_nad g.yog la spro ba bskyed par bya/_de ste mi na na ni bde bar yal bar gzhag_/de ste dge 'dun gyi zas shig gam mgron du bos pa'i zas kyang 
[\[303b.5\]]rung ste/_dge 'dun gyi zas ni mkhan po dang dge 'dun gyi zas mchis kyis deng dge ba bde bar spyod cig_/de ste bsod snyoms kyi zas na yang mkhan po bsod snyoms la gshegs kyis chos shig ces bsgo'o/_/lhan cig spyod pas mkhan po la so shing dang bde ba'i chu 
[\[303b.6\]]dang /_lci ba dang /_phye ma dbul bar bya/_nam mkhan pos las de rnams zin pa de na lhung bzed dang chos gos bstab par bya/_de ste dge 'dun dang lhan cig bsod snyoms la 'jug na ni mkhan po mdun du btang la bdag gis gral gang du bab pa nas 'gro bar bya/_de ste gang 
[\[303b.7\]]zag gi bsod snyoms la 'jug na ni mkhan po'i sbyar ma dang lhung bzed dang khar gsil dbul bar bya/_de ste rlung dang char pa dang dus grang ba zhig tu gyur na mkhan po'i sbyar ma 'og tu chug la bdag gi steng du phyung shig_/de ste yul dro na bdag gi sbyar ma 'og tu chug la mkhan po'i steng du 
[\[304a\]]
[\[304a.1\]]phyung shig_/lhan cig spyod pa mkhan po'i mdun du song la zil pa la sogs pa bsal bar bya/_de ste chu 'gram mam gang g.yang sa zhig na mkhan po'i lag pa nas bzung zhing brten par bya/_dong nas grong 'dab tu phyin na sbyar ma dang lhung bzed dang khar gsil dbul 
[\[304a.2\]]bar bya/_phul te mkhan po'i mdun du btang la grong gi nang du 'jug par bya'o/_/de ste skas sam/_them skas shig 'dzeg na yang lhan cig spyod pa sngon du 'dzegs la lag nas drang bar bya/_de na chos bzhin gyi rnyed pa zhig grub na yang bdag gis blang bar bya/_bsod 
[\[304a.3\]]snyoms spyad de slar grong gi phyi rol du byung na mkhan po'i sbyar ma dang lhung bzed dang khar gsil blangs la mkhan po'i mdun du btang nas gtsug lag khang du 'dong bar bya'o/_/der lhags nas lhung bzed dang chos gos bzhag ste mkhan po'i rkang pa bkru ba'i chu dang lham bsnyen te 
[\[304a.4\]]bzhag la rkang pa bkru bar bya'o/_/de nas dus la bab par gyur na mkhan po'i lhung bzed kyi gzhi gding zhing lhung bzed dbul bar bya'o/_/bdag gis zas bzang ba dang zhim pa dang /_dam pa ci yod pa mkhan po la dbul bar bya/_mkhan pos kyang tshod rig 
[\[304a.5\]]par bya/_zas kyi bya ba byas pa dang /_mkhan po la bde ba'i chu bsnyen par bya lci ba dang phye mas lhung bzed bkrus la lhung bzed dang chos gos slar gzhug par bya/_mkhan po la phyag byas nas mkhan po 'di bzhin bzhugs sam/_nyin par spyod par gshegs sam 
[\[304a.6\]]zhes dri bar bya/_de ste nyin par spyod par 'gro na yang mkhan po'i khri'u dang gding ba dang /_ril ba spyi [{]rings [,]ring [}]khyer la mkhan po mdun du bcug ste nyin par gang na spyod par 'gro'o/_/song nas mkhan po'i stan bting la lung mnod dgos na yang lung mnod par bya/_
[\[304a.7\]]yid la byed pa mnod dgos na yang yid la byed pa mnos la phyogs gcig tu song nas bsgom par bya'o/_/de nas dus la bab na mkhan po'i khri'u dang /_gding ba dang /_ril ba spyi [{]rings [,]ring [}]khyer te/_mkhan po mdun du byas la 'gro bar bya'o/_/de ste gso sbyin gyi dus 
[\[304b\]]
[\[304b.1\]]la bab ste/_'du bar gyur na yang mkhan po'i stan ltebs na brkyang bar bya/_brkyang na ni legs par gding bar bya/_de nas dus su bsgo'am/_gaN+DI brdungs kyang rung ste/_lag pa g.yon pas ni mkhan po'i lag pa nas bzung /_lag pa g.yas pas ni mar 
[\[304b.2\]]me thogs te mkhan po mdun du byas la gso sbyin gyi gnas su 'dong bar bya'o/_/so sor thar pa'i mdo bklags zin na mkhan po'i drung du song la/_mkhan po ci gshegs sam/_chos gsan cing bzhugs zhes dri bar bya/_de ste 'gro na lag pa g.yon pas 
[\[304b.3\]]mkhan po gzung /_lag pa g.yas par ni mar me thogs te mkhan po mdun du byas la gtsug lag khang du 'dong bar bya'o/_/de ste dugs khang du khrus byed pa zhig tu gyur na nang par sngar langs nas mkhan po deng dugs khang du khrus mdzad kyis char gsol zhes bsgo bar bya/_
[\[304b.4\]]lhan cig spyod pas mkhan po'i phyir dugs khang du stan dang khri'u dang /_ril ba spyi [{]rings [,]ring [}]dang /_khrus ras dang dugs khang gi yo byad gzhan gang yang rung ste khyer te mkhan po mdun du byas nas dugs khang du 'dong bar bya/_'ongs nas kyang chos gos phyogs gcig tu 
[\[304b.5\]]bzhag la mkhan po las mi nye mi ring bar 'dug par bya/_nam mkhan po rngul bar gyur na de na lhan cig spyod pa des de la rim bzhin rjes su las rnams bya ste bkru bar bya'o/_/bkrus nas mdun du bcug ste/_gtsug lag khang du bskyal bar bya/_de'i 'og tu bdag 
[\[304b.6\]]nyid bkru bar bya/_de ste lhan cig spyod pa de mkhan po'i drung nas dge ba'i chos mi 'phel bar gyur na mkhan po la bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di la gtad du gsol zhes smros shig_/mkhan pos kyang dge slong de la dge slong 'di ci 'dra/_de'i rjes su 
[\[304b.7\]]'brang ba dang drung na 'dug pa ci 'dra/_'di'i lung rnams ston tam/_de ste mi ston/_rjes su ston tam/_de ste mi ston pa brtag par bya/_dpyad par bya/_de bzhin du brtags dpyad nas de ste rung ba zhig tu gyur na/_de la gtad par bya/_de ste rung ba ma yin na gzhan la 
[\[305a\]]
[\[305a.1\]]gtad par bya'o/_/de ste mkhan po nyid rung ba ma yin la tshul dang mi ldan na ma zhus par song yang bla ste/_'di ni lhan cig spyod pa'i bya ba zhes bya'o/_/slob dpon gyi bya ba gang zhe na/_slob dpon gyis nye g.yog rnams shes par bya ba nas snga ma bzhin 
[\[305a.2\]]te/_phyogs gang na nye g.yog de nyon mongs shing 'dug pa zhig tu gyur na phyogs de nas dgug par bya/_dgug tu gzhug par bya ste/_'di ni slob dpon gyi bya ba zhes bya'o/_/nye g.yog gi bya ba gang zhe na/_nye g.yog gis slob dpon la ston pa'o snyam du 'du shes 
[\[305a.3\]]mngon du bzhag la rim gro bya ba nas/_snga ma bzhin ma zhus kyang 'gro bar bya ba'i bar du ste/_de ni nye g.yog gi bya ba zhes bya'o/_/dge tshul gyi bya ba gang zhe na/_dge tshul gyis mkhan po dang slob dpon la ston pa'o snyam du 'du shes mngon du bzhag la rim gro bya ba nas 
[\[305a.4\]]snga ma bzhin no/_/de ste mkhan po'am/_slob dpon sdig pa lta bar gyur na rang gis slar gtang bar bya/_yang na gtong du 'jug par bya ste/_de ltar spro ba skyes na ni de bzhin legs/_ma skyes na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/_/der yang dge tshul phas ji ltar 
[\[305a.5\]]mkhan po dang /_slob dpon la byung zhing gyur pa'i rnams ji ltar gyis shig ces spro ba bskyed par bya ba de bzhin du mkhan po dang /_slob dpon gyis kyang dge tshul pha la byung zhing gyur pa'i rnams ji ltar bya zhes spro ba bskyed par bya'o/_/de la zhu ba rnams ni ma gtogs so/_/
[\[305a.6\]]dge tshul phas mkhan po dang /_slob dpon gyi stan gding ba la sogs pa bya ba snga ma bzhin te bdag nyid tha mar bkru bar bya ba'i bar du'o/_/'di ltar dge tshul phas rtswa sngon po med par bya/_me tog rnams btog_/'bras bu rnams btog_/so shing rnams sbyin/_lhung 
[\[305a.7\]]bzed kyi gzhi lo ma rnams sbyin/_rung bar bya/_dge slong rnams la byin len du gzhug par bya/_mdzes pa dang /_bag yod par bsgrub par bya/_de ste dge tshul pha de mkhan po dang slob dpon gyi drung nas dge ba'i chos 'phel bar mi 'gyur ba nas/_snga ma bzhin ma zhus kyang song 
[\[305b\]]
[\[305b.1\]]yang bla ba'i bar du ste/_'di ni dge tshul pha'i bya ba zhes bya'o/_/nan tan du bya ba gang zhe na/_de ste dge 'dun gyi kun dga' ra bar gnod pa zhig byung na der dge slong gis ji ltar de mi shor zhing zin par bya/_de ste rnam grangs gang gis kyang zin par ma gyur na gzhan dag la ni bab bab tu smra bar mi 
[\[305b.2\]]bya'i/_thog mar rgyal po'i gnang ba rnams la bsgo bar bya/_de'i 'og tu btsun mo dang /_gzhon nu dang /_blon po dang /_ded dpon dang /_zhang blon dang /_zhabs 'bring ba rnams la bsgo bar bya/_de la nan tan du bya ba ni ji nas tshig gis bstan pa tsam gyis thar par 'gyur 
[\[305b.3\]]gyis de la gsang ba'i las rnams mi 'byung bar bya ste/_de ni nan tan du bya ba zhes bya'o/_/phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong gi bya ba gang zhe na/_phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong gis snga na mo'i dge sbyong las ring nas kyang ma yin/_shin tu bsnyen de yang ma yin/_phrag pa sbyar 
[\[305b.4\]]zhing yang mi 'gro bar bya/_khyim gyi nang du 'jug na yang gtam glo bur du de la mi bya/_phyi nas smra bar bya/_des bsgo ba rnams bya/_bkur stir bya/_bdag dman par bya/_'jigs pa dang dbang du 'gyur bar bya/_dge sbyong snga na po chos ma yin pa zhig smra na slar dgag 
[\[305b.5\]]par bya/_chos bzhin du smra na rjes su yi rang bar bya/_de la chos bzhin pa'i rnyed pa zhig byung na blang bar bya ste 'di ni phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong gi bya ba zhes bya'o/_/grong du nye bar 'gro ba'i bya ba gang zhe na/_rigs su ston pa'i dge slong gis dregs par mi bya/_
[\[305b.6\]]nga rgyal mi bskyed/_mi brtan par mi bya/_byung rgyal du mi smra/_mi gtsigs par mi bya/_yang dag par shes par bya/_nye bar gzhag par bya/_sems mi g.yeng bar bya/_dga' bar 'gyur ba dang /_spyod lam mdzes par bya/_shin tu bsdam pa dang /_shin tu bkab 
[\[305b.7\]]pa dang /_sgra chung ba dang /_mig gnya' shing gang tsam las mi g.yeng bar bya/_bkur stir bcas/_bdag nyid dman par bcas/_'jigs pa dang /_dbang du 'gyur bar bcas/_yid dman pa dang /_sems phyags ma dang 'dra bar bya/_rnyed pa dang bkur sti la 'dod par 
[\[306a\]]
[\[306a.1\]]mi bya/_phan par byed pa de ni grong du 'gro bar byed pa'i bya ba zhes bya'o/_/grong du 'gro ba'i bya ba gang zhe na/_dge slong grong du 'gror 'dod na shes bzhin du 'gro bar bya/_dran pa nye bar gzhag par bya/_sems mi g.yeng bar bya/_dbang po bsdam par 
[\[306a.2\]]bya/_yid mi g.yeng bar bya/_snga phyi la 'du shes pa dang /_bla 'og la 'du shes gzhag_/dge slong dran pa nyams bzhin du grong du 'gro na nyes pa'i dmigs rnam pa lngar rig par bya ste/_dge slong 'khod pa rnams la ma bsgo bzhin du grong du dus ma yin par 
[\[306a.3\]]'jug pa dang /_ma brtags par stan la 'dug pa dang /_rig pa'i skyes pa med bzhin du bud med la chos tshig lnga'am drug las lhag par ston pa dang /_bud med dang lhan cig gnyis su skyabs yod pa dben pa na 'dug par byed pa dang /_sman dang nad du bcas 
[\[306a.4\]]pa'i grong du nan gyis stan la 'dug par byed pa'o/_/dge slong dran pa nyams bzhin du grong du 'gro na gzhan yang nyes pa'i dmigs rnam pa lngar rig par bya ste/_phyi phyir bud med la blta ba dang /_lta ba las kyang gtam du 'dzer ba dang /_gtam zer ba las chags 
[\[306a.5\]]par gyur pa dang /_chags par gyur pa las tshul bzhin mi byed pa dang /_tshul bzhin yid la mi byed pas na ma dad bzhin mi tshangs par spyod par 'gyur te/_nyes pa 'byung bar 'gyur ba'am/_yang na bslab pa phul nas slar babs par 'gyur ro/_/dran pa nye bar 
[\[306a.6\]]bzhag bzhin du grong gi nang du 'jug na nyes pa'i dmigs de lta bu 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/_de ni grong du 'gro ba'i bya ba zhes bya'o/_/grong du nye bar song ba'i bya ba gang zhe na/_grong du song ba'i dge slong gis gtam sna tshogs mi smra/_gtam ngan pa mi bya/_chos kyi 
[\[306a.7\]]gtam smra bar bya/_gtam rgyud mi chad par bya/_khyim pa'i rnams la chos kyi gtam yang dag par bstan/_bstabs/_yang dag par gzengs bstod par bya/_rab tu mgu bar bya/_skyabs su 'gro ba'i bslab pa'i gnas 'dzin du gzhug_/dus khrims la 
[\[306b\]]
[\[306b.1\]]gnas pa dang /_tshangs par spyod pa la gnas pa dang /_sbyin pa dang /_dul ba dang /_sdom pa dang /_skyes bu dam pa bsnyen pa'i chos nyan pa dang /_tshul bzhin yid la byed pa dang /_chos dang rjes su mthun pa'i chos la nan tan du byed pa dang /_lam ma yin pa la 
[\[306b.2\]]lam ma yin par de ltar yang dag par bsgrag par bya/_ye shes dang lta ba rnam par sbyang bar bya ste/_de ni grong du nye bar song ba'i bya ba zhes bya'o/_/grong du nye bar song ba'i gnas brtan gyi bya ba gang zhe na/_grong du song ba'i dge slong gnas brtan gyis de na dge slong gsar bu 
[\[306b.3\]]rnams la bsgo bar bya/_rjes su bstan par bya/_ci rgyags pa dang /_dregs pa dang /_lus la 'tshog pa dang /_rtsed mo mi byed par bya/_dga' bar 'gyur ba la gzhug par bya/_ji ltar mtshungs par spyod pa bcas pa la gzhug par bya/_de dag gis kyang 
[\[306b.4\]]des ji ltar bsgo ba dang /_rjes su bstan pa'i tshig rnams la mnyan par bya ste/_de grong du song ba'i gnas brtan gyi bya ba zhes bya'o/_/gzhi na gnas pa'i bya ba gang zhe na/_gzhi na gnas pa'i dge slong gis mdangs bzang ba dang /_khro gnyer dang bral bar bya/_dran pa 
[\[306b.5\]]thog mar 'gro ba dang /_thog mar smra bar bya ste/_tshur spyon bde bar byon nam zhes tshig snyan pa dang /_tshig yid du 'ong ba dang /_mgu bar 'gyur bas smra bar bya/_glo bur du lhags pa'i dge slong dag mthong nas mdza' ba'i tshul gyis mdun du bsu bar bya/_snyan pa'i 
[\[306b.6\]]tshig gis rab tu dga' bar bya/_bde ba la reg par spyod dam/_bde bar lhags sam zhes dri bar bya/_de ste rgan pa zhig yin na ni de la phyag byas nas lhung bzed dang chos gos blangs te gtsug lag khang gi nang du bcug la stan la gzhag par bya/_rkang pa bkru zhing bla 
[\[306b.7\]]mar bya/_skom na chu grang mo blud par bya/_ji ltar nus shing mgu bar 'gyur ba'i chos bzhin bsgyur bar bya/_ji ltar rigs pa bzhin mal stan rnams kyang sbyin par bya/_ji srid du 'dug pa de la pha dang /_phu nu dang /_bu ltar 'du shes mngon du gzhag cing gzung bar bya'o/_/
[\[307a\]]
[\[307a.1\]]na na yang g.yel bar mi dor te/_de ni gzhi na gnas pa'i bya ba zhes bya'o/_/ngal bso ba'i bya ba gang zhe na/_glo bur du 'ongs pa'i dge slong gis gtsug lag khang du 'ongs na des gzhi na gnas pa'i dge slong dag las mal stan gyi rnams brkam 
[\[307a.2\]]zhing [{]rings [,]ring [}]thabs su dgug par mi bya/_snang ba'i gnas su 'dug par bya/_spyod lam bzang bar bya/_legs par bgo bar bya/_legs par bsdam par bya'o/_/'di yang ngal bso ba'i bya ba yin te/_gzhi na gnas pa'i dge slong dag gis dge slong glo bur 
[\[307a.3\]]du lhags pa mthong na de ste ngo shes na ngal bso bar bya/_ji ltar mtshungs par spyod pa'i chos bcas pa bzhin du mtshungs par spyad par bya/_de ste ngo mi shes na bab bab tu ngal bso bar mi bya/_dge slong dag la yang tshe dang ldan pa 'di su'i lhan cig spyod pa yin/_'di 
[\[307a.4\]]spyod pa ji lta bu zhes dri bar bya'o/_/de ste de'i spyod pa dang /_spyod yul dang /_tshul khrims dang /_sdom pa dang /_mtshungs par spyod pa'i rnams rtogs na gdod ngal bso bar bya'o/_/de gcig pu la gtsug lag khang gtad par mi bya/_dge 'dun gyi mdzod 
[\[307a.5\]]dang /_bang ba dang /_dge 'dun gyi mal la dbang du gzhug par mi bya/_shin tu rtogs par byas la gdod yid gcugs par bya ba de ni ngal bso ba'i bya ba zhes bya'o/_/bar snang gi bya ba gang zhe na/_bar snang thams cad ni mtshams gcig pa ma yin te/_der 
[\[307a.6\]]gnas pa dang /_'di na gnas pa lhan cig tu las bya zhing bskyo ba yang mi brtsan/_'di na gnas pa dang de na gnas pa dag lhan cig tu las byas par mi 'gyur/_bskyos pa yang mi brtsan no/_/dge slong skya rengs ma shar bar chos gos med bzhin du steng du mi 'byung /_dbyar 
[\[307a.7\]]tshul du zhugs na yang zhag bdun nam/_zhag bzhi bcur byin gyis ma brlabs par nam mkha' la byung zhing gnas par mi bya'o/_/de ste byung zhing gnas na chos gos dang bral bar 'gyur la dbyar kyang zhig par 'gyur te/_'di ni bar snang gi bya ba zhes bya'o/_/gtan pa'i bya ba gang zhe na/_gtan 
[\[307b\]]
[\[307b.1\]]pa la yon tan lnga ste/_zhag gcig gis bral ba med/_zhag bcu'i 'da' ba med/_zla ba gcig gis 'da' ba med/_ji snyed du dgos pa'i gos rnams byin gyis ma brlabs kyang 'chang du rung /_stod g.yogs dang mthang gos kyis ljongs rgyu bar rung ngo /_/
[\[307b.2\]]gzhan yang gtan pa la yon tan rnam pa lnga ste/_'dus shing za ba med/_yang yang za ba med/_phyi ma la ma bsgo bar 'gro ba med chos gos ji dgos pa tshol du rung /_ston zla tha [{]chungs [,]chung [}]nas dpyid zla ra ba'i bar du dbyar tshul du zhugs pa'i dge slong dge 'dun gyi rnyed 
[\[307b.3\]]pa ma bgos shing bzhag pa de yang gtan pa bting ba rnams kyis ma dad na gzhan la mi sbyin no/_/de ni gtan pa'i bya ba zhes bya'o/_/chu tshags kyi bya ba gang zhe na/_dge slong chu tshags med na lam du zhugs shing 'gro bar mi bya'o/_/de ste chu rgyun du 'bab la de yang rung bar gyur 
[\[307b.4\]]de chu gzhan dang ma 'dres pa zhig gam/_khron pa rung ba zhig gam/_rgyang grags phyed phyed du gtsug lag khang rgyun chags par yod pa ma gtogs te de ni chu tshags kyi bya ba zhes bya'o/_/'chag sa'i bya ba gang zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 'chag sa rnam pa gnyis 
[\[307b.5\]]rjes su gnang ste/_bsam gtan la zhugs pa dang /_kha ton la zhugs pa'o/_/bsam gtan la zhugs pa'i 'chag sa ni khru bco brgyad do/_/kha ton la zhugs pa'i 'chag sa ni khru bcu gnyis te de ni 'chag sa'i bya ba zhes bya'o/_/'chag pa'i bya ba gang zhe na/_
[\[307b.6\]]dge slong 'chag par 'dod na des drag tu yang ma yin/_dal nas 'chag par bya/_shes bzhin du 'chag par bya/_dran pa nye bar gzhag_/dbang po nang du gzhag_/yid phyir mi dbyung bar bya/_rdeg mi 'chos par bya/_phan tshun mi 'khyor bar bya/_drang por 'chag par 
[\[307b.7\]]bya/_de ste drang por 'chag mi nus na srad bu bre bar bya/_srad bu bres pa la [(]sngu [,]sdu [)]bu bcug nas de la 'ju zhing 'chag par bya ste/_'di ni 'chag pa'i bya ba zhes bya'o/_/'phyen gyi bya ba gang zhe na/_ston pa'i mdun du mi gtang /_mchod rten gyi drung du ma yin/_mkhan po dang slob 
[\[308a\]]
[\[308a.1\]]dpon gyi drung du ma yin/_bla ma'i drung du ma yin/_bla mar bya ba'i drung du ma yin/_grong gi nang du skye bo'i mdun du ma yin/_phyi phyir gtang bar mi bya/_de ste yang phyi phyir gtong ba zhig tu gyur na gnas gud du song la gtang bar bya'i/_de'i rkyen gyis gzhan 
[\[308a.2\]]la mi bde bar 'gyur bar mi bya ste/_'di ni 'phyen gyi bya ba zhes bya'o/_/gzhar ba'i bya ba gang zhe na/_dge slong gzhar 'dod na rno ba'i yo byad kyis gzhar bar mi bya/_rtswa bsdus pas mi bya/_lo ma'am/_ra da'am/_'jam pa gzhan gyis gzhar bar bya ste/_de ni 
[\[308a.3\]]gzhar ba'i bya ba zhes bya'o/_/bshang ba'i bya ba gang zhe na/_dge slong gis bab bab tu bshang bar mi bya/_rtsig pa'i drung du ma yin/_shing gi drung du ma yin/_shes bzhin du phyogs gcig tu bshang bar bya'o/_/de ste phyi phyir bshang ba zhig tu gyur na bshang ba'i 
[\[308a.4\]]gyo mo drung du gzhag par bya/_yang na khung bu brko bar bya ste/_'di ni bshang ba'i bya ba zhes bya'o/_/bshang sa'i bya ba gang zhe na/_dge slong bshang sar 'gro bar 'dod pas snga na 'dug pas tshor bar bya ba'i phyir se gol gtogs par bya/_sngon du zhugs pas lud pa 
[\[308a.5\]]dbyung bar bya/_shes bzhin du nang du 'gro bar bya/_chos gos legs par brdzes nas 'dug par bya/_bshang sa'i khung bur rkang rten gnyis la legs par brtags nas dbus su 'dug par bya/_bshang ba mi 'ong ba la nan gyis gzir bar mi bya/_'ong ba la'ang dgag 
[\[308a.6\]]par mi bya ste/_de ni bshang sa'i bya ba zhes bya'o/_/bshang sa'i khung bu'i bya ba gang zhe na/_dge slong bshang bar 'dod na dal nas bags kyis shes bzhin du bshang bar bya/_bshang sa'i khung kha rnams su gos shing chags par mi bya ste/_'di ni bshang sa'i khung bu'i bya ba 
[\[308a.7\]]zhes bya'o/_/bshang sar gnas brtan gyi bya ba gang zhe na/_bshang sar dge slong gnas brtan gyis gsar bu 'dug pa slar bslang bar mi bya/_bshang sar 'dug pa las slar bslang bar mi bya ba ni chung ngu bshang sa'i nang du zhugs pa las slar bzlog par mi bya ste/_de ni bshang 
[\[308b\]]
[\[308b.1\]]sar gnas brtan gyi bya ba zhes bya'o/_/bshang sa'i khor yug gi bya ba gang zhe na/_dge slong bshang sa'i nye 'khor na 'greng bar mi bya/_'dug par mi bya/_'chag par mi bya/_lung bsgo bar mi bya/_lung nod par mi bya/_dran par mi bya/_slar 'dri bar mi bya/_
[\[308b.2\]]rnal 'byor dang yid la byed pa mi bya/_gtam la zhugs shing mi bya/_lhung bzed kyi las mi bya/_chos gos kyi las mi bya/_so shing 'cha' bar mi bya/_lag pa dang rkang pa bkru bar mi bya/_bya'o cog thams cad kyang bshang sa'i phyogs kun tu mi bya'o/_/bshang 
[\[308b.3\]]sa'i gnas su nges par bya ba'i rnams ni ma gtogs te/_'di ni bshang sa'i nye 'khor gyi bya ba zhes bya'o/_/gci ba'i bya ba gang zhe na/_dge slong gis bab bab tu gci bar mi bya/_rtsig drung du gci bar mi bya/_shing drung du gci bar mi bya/_shes bzhin du phyogs 
[\[308b.4\]]gcig tu gci bar bya'o/_/de ste gcin snyi bar gyur na gcin snod gyo mo gtad par bya/_yang na khung bu brko bar bya ste/_'di ni gci ba'i bya ba zhes bya'o/_/gci ba'i sa'i bya ba gang zhe na/_dge slong gci sar 'jug par 'dod na des snga na 'dug pas tshor bar bya ba'i phyir 
[\[308b.5\]]se gol gtogs nas snga ma bzhin te/_mi bro ba la ni mi gzir/_bro ba la ni mi dgag pa'i bar du ste/_'di ni gci ba'i sa'i bya ba zhes bya'o/_/gci ba'i khung gi bya ba gang zhe na/_dge slong gis gci sa'i khung khar bags kyis shes bzhin du gci bar bya/_gcin 
[\[308b.6\]]khung gi khar mi gtor ba dang /_mi sbres par bya ste/_de ni gci sa'i bya ba zhes bya'o/_/gci sar gnas brtan gyi bya ba gang zhe na/_gci sar dge slong gnas brtan gyis gci sar dge slong gsar bu gci zhing 'dug pa bslang bar mi bya/_gci sar 'dug pa las 
[\[308b.7\]]mi bslang bar bya ba ni chung ngu na gci sar zhugs pa yang bzlog par mi bya ste/_'di ni gci sar gnas brtan gyi bya ba zhes bya ba'o/_/gci sa'i nye 'khor gyi bya ba gang zhe na/_dge slong gci sa'i nye 'khor du 'greng bar mi bya ba nas snga ma bzhin te/_gci ba'i nye 'khor gyi 
[\[309a\]]
[\[309a.1\]]bya ba ni ma gtogs so zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/_de ni gci ba'i sa'i nye 'khor gyi bya ba zhes bya'o/_/bkru ba'i bya ba gang zhe na/_dge slong gis ma bkrus kyi bar du ston pa la ltar 'gro bar mi bya/_mchod rten la ma yin/_mkhan po dang /_
[\[309a.2\]]slob dpon la ma yin/_bla ma la ma yin/_bla mar bya ba la ma yin te/_phyag mi bya/_kha ton mi bya/_lung mi bsgo/_blang bar mi bya/_dran par mi bya/_kun dri bar mi bya/_grong du 'jug par mi bya/_zas la 'dug par mi bya/_skyo ma la 'dug 
[\[309a.3\]]par mi bya/_thug pa la 'dug par mi bya/_'thung ba la 'dug par mi bya/_chos bshad pa la 'dug par mi bya/_phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi mal stan la 'dug par mi bya/_na bar gyur na ni nyes pa med de/_yang na mi'i lha chu yin par gyur tam/_de ste 
[\[309a.4\]]chu ma 'byor tam/_de ste bkru bar mi rung ba'i sman cig btang ba ni ma gtogs te/_de ni bkru ba'i bya ba zhes bya'o/_/bkru ba'i gnas kyi bya ba gang zhe na/_bkru ba'i gnas su 'gro ba'i dge slong gis se gol gtogs nas snga ma bzhin bkru ba'i gnas kyi dbus 
[\[309a.5\]]su 'dug par bya ba'i bar du ste/_'di ni bkru ba'i gnas kyi bya ba zhes bya'o/_/bkru ba'i gnas su rkang pa bzhag pa'i gnas kyi bya ba gang zhe na/_khrus byed par 'dod pa'i dge slong gis bkru ba'i tshe bkru ba'i gnas su kha chus mi dgang ba dang /_chus ma gsher bar bya 
[\[309a.6\]]ste/_'di ni bkru ba'i gnas kyi rkang pa bzhag pa'i gnas kyi bya ba zhes bya'o/_/khrus kyi sar gnas brtan gyi bya ba gang zhe na/_khrus sar dge slong gnas brtan gyis khrus sar dge slong gsar bu bslang bar mi bya/_khrus la zhugs pa las mi bslang ba ni chung ngu 
[\[309b\]]
[\[309b.1\]]na khrus sar zhugs pa las bzlog par mi bya ste/_de ni khrus sar gnas brtan gyi bya ba zhes bya'o/_/khrus sa'i nye 'khor gyi bya ba gang zhe na/_dge slong gis khrus sa'i nye 'khor du 'greng zhing 'dug par mi bya ba nas snga ma bzhin khrus sa'i nye 'khor du bya ba'i rnams ni ma 
[\[309b\]]
[\[309b.1\]]gtogs pa'i bar du ste/_de ni khrus sa'i nye 'khor gyi bya ba zhes bya'o/_/mchil ma'i bya ba gang zhe na/_de ni dge slong gis sgra dang bcas par mchil ma dor bar mi bya/_lce dril bar sos mnan par mi bya/_ston pa'i spyan sngar ma yin/_mchod rten gyi drung du ma 
[\[309b.2\]]yin/_mkhan po dang /_slob dpon gyi drung du ma yin/_bla ma'i drung du ma yin/_bla mar gyur pa'i drung du ma yin/_zan za ba na ma yin/_'thung ba la ma yin/_yongs su las bya ba'i sar ma yin/_dge slong gis bab bab tu mchil ma dor bar mi bya/_
[\[309b.3\]]mchil ma dor nas phyal bar mi bya ste/_yang na rkang pas nyes shig_/yang na sas khob shig_/dge slong gis mchil ma phyi phyir dor bar mi bya'o/_/de ste phyi phyir 'dor na de'i rkyen gyis gzhan mi bde bar mi 'gyur ba'i phyir gnas gzhan du 'gro bar bya ste/_de ni 
[\[309b.4\]]mchil ma'i bya ba zhes bya'o/_/mchil ma'i snod kyi bya ba gang zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la mchil ma dor ba'i phyir mchil ma'i snod rnam pa gnyis gnang ste/_rdza mkhan gyis byas pa dang /_bdag nyid kyis byas pa'o/_/dge slong 
[\[309b.5\]]gis mchil ma'i snod dus dus su brtag par bya/_bskam par bya/_dben par gzhag par bya/_shin tu bkru bar bya/_ci nas de'i rkyen gyis phyi phyir tshol bar mi 'gyur bar bya ste/_de ni mchil ma'i snod kyi bya ba zhes bya'o/_/so shing gi bya ba gang zhe na/_
[\[309b.6\]]dge slong gis so shing ring po bca' bar mi bya/_shin tu thung ba'ang ma yin/_shin tu sbom pa yang ma yin/_shin tu phra ba yang ma yin/_yun ring du yang ma yin/_ston pa'i spyan sngar ma yin/_mchod rten gyi drung du yang ma yin/_mkhan po dang /_slob 
[\[309b.7\]]dpon gyi thad du yang ma yin/_bla ma'i thad du yang ma yin/_bla mar gyur pa'i drung du ma yin/_me khang du ma yin/_bkad sar ma yin/_'chag sar ma yin/_dugs khang du ma yin/_rkang pa bkru ba'i sar ma yin/_gnas khang du ma yin/_rim khang du ma 
[\[310a\]]
[\[310a.1\]]yin/_sgo khang du ma yin/_bshang sar ma yin/_rtsig pa'i drung du ma yin/_shing drung du ma yin/_gtsug lag khang gi phyag dar bya ba'i khor yug tu ma yin/_skye bo mang po 'du ba thams cad du yang so shing 'dor bar mi bya/_dge slong gis rnam 
[\[310a.2\]]pa gsum dben par bya ste/_bshang ba dang /_gci ba dang /_so shing bca' ba'o/_/dge slong gis so shing 'chos nas/_de bzhin du mi dor gyi chus bkru bar bya/_yang na rdog pas mnye bar bya/_sa la drud par byas te/_'di ni so shing gi bya ba zhes bya'o/_/
[\[310a.3\]]so drud pa'i bya ba gang zhe na/_dge slong gis so shing rnon pos drud par mi bya/_bag med par nang du gzhug par mi bya/_dal nas bags kyis shes bzhin du drud par bya/_so rnyil drud par mi bya ste/_'di ni so drud pa'i bya ba zhes bya'o/_/lce bzhar ba'i bya ba gang 
[\[310a.4\]]zhe na/_dge slong gis lce bzhar ba rnon pos bzhar bar mi bya/_bag med par nang du gzhug par mi bya/_bags kyis dal nas shes bzhin du lce bzhar bar bya/_lce'i sha bzhar bar mi bya ste/_'di ni lce bzhar ba'i bya ba zhes bya'o/_/rna spabs bru ba'i bya ba 
[\[310a.5\]]gang zhe na/_dge slong gis rtse mo rnon pos rna spabs bru bar mi bya/_bag med par nang du gzhug par mi bya/_bags kyis dal nas shes bzhin du rna spabs bru bar bya/_rna ba'i sha bru bar mi bya ste/_'di ni rna spabs bru ba'i bya ba zhes bya'o/_/kun spyad pa gang zhe na/_dge 
[\[310a.6\]]sbyong gi yo byad thams cad mtshungs par spyod pa ni spyad pa'o/_/mi spyad pa gang zhe na/_de ltar bzlog pa ni mi spyad pa'o/_/ma lta bu'i bya ba'i phung po zhes bya ba'i phung po gsum pa rdzogs te/_ma lta bu rdzogs so//_//btsun pa 'dul ba'i lus gang lags/_
[\[310a.7\]]dmigs pa gang lags/_byin gyis brlabs pa gang lags/_mtshan nyid gang lags/_gleng gzhi gang lags/_ngo bo nyid gang lags/_'bras bu gang lags/_u pA li 'dul ba'i lus ni dmigs pa'o/_/dmigs pa ni nan tan no/_/byin gyis brlab 
[\[310b\]]
[\[310b.1\]]pa ni lus dang ngag dang yid do/_/mtshan nyid ni las so/_/gleng gzhi ni bsgrags pa'o/_/ngo bo nyid ni nyes pa'o/_/'bras bu ni mtho ris dang thar pa'o/_/'dul ba gzhung dam pa rdzogs te/_u pA lis kun dris pa rdzogs so//_//thams cad mkhyen pa 
[\[310b.2\]]la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'dul ba gzhung ni dam pa 'di/_/'phags pa nye ba 'khor gyis ni/_/ma 'ongs pa yi gang zag gi/_/ma rtogs la sogs bsal ba'i phyir/_/gzhi dang rnam 'byed la sogs kyi/_/'grel bshad nges pa don gyi lung /_/zhus nas rgyal 
[\[310b.3\]]bas bka' stsal to/_/de dag rnams kyang gang zhe na/_/spyi'i sdom la/_zhu ba 'dul byed gcig las 'phros/_/lnga tshan bcu drug tshan dang ni/_/gleng gzhi rkyang pa gtam gyi gzhi/_/ma na pi ka ma mo dang /_/lus sogs ston pa tha ma ste/_/le'u dag tu 
[\[310b.4\]]yang dag 'dod/_/thog mar zhus pa de yang ni/_/rnam 'byed ltung ba sde bzhi dang /_/rang byung la sogs gzhi rnams kyi/_/gtan la 'bebs pa dag tu 'dod/_/de nyid dris lan zhes kyang bsgrags/_/de nas 'dul byed dag yin te/_/pham pa bzhi dang lhag 
[\[310b.5\]]ma yi/_/smyan gyi ltung ba yan chad dag_/gtan la 'bebs par byed pa yin/_/de nas gcig las 'phros pa ste/_/gcig nas bcu yi bar du yin/_/gcig las 'dzegs pa zhes kyang bsgrags/_/de nas 'dul ba lnga tshan te/_/lnga lnga ston phyir lnga tshan no/_/bcu 
[\[310b.6\]]drug sde tshan ston pa'i phyir/_/de nas 'dul ba bcu drug tshan/_/gleng gzhi la ni sgo lnga las/_/dang po bzhi la sdom gyi ni/_/tshigs bcad bcu bcu'o lnga pa la/_/sdom gyi tshigs bcad drug yod de/_/gleng gzhi dag la brten pa'i phyir/_/gleng gzhi zhes ni btags pa yin/_/
[\[310b.7\]]byang ba sgo bzhi re re yang /_/tshigs bcad bcu bcu'o de nyid la/_/sil bu zhes bya bslab pa'i gzhi/_/rigs mi mthun pa phra mo rnams/_/ston phyir don dang ldan pa yin/_/'dul ba gtam gyi dngos po ni/_/ldebs kyi tshul du byung ba ste/_/sdom gyi tshig gis bsdus 
[\[311a\]]
[\[311a.1\]]pa med/_/mU la zhes pa'i sgra yi don/_/gzhi dang rtsa ba dngos po la'ang /_/'jug phyir gtam gyi gzhir yang 'gyur/_/ma na pi ka'i sgo dang po/_/tshigs bcad bcu yin gnyis pa la/_/tshigs bcad bcu dang lhag tsam yod/_/shin tu phra zhing 
[\[311a.2\]]che bas na/_/bram ze'i bu mo lta bu zhes/_/don dang mthun pa'i mtshan yin no/_/'dul ba ma mo lta bu la/_/bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i phung po dang /_/rab tu ldan dang bya ba yi/_/phung po gsum du shes par bya/_/ma dang 'dra phyir ma mo'o/_/lus dang dmigs pa byin 
[\[311a.3\]]brlab dang /_/mtshan nyid gleng gzhi ngo bo dang /_/'bras bu'i don rnams tha ma ste/_/u pA li yis zhus pa ni/_/de dag rnams kyis rdzogs pa yin/_/mtshan gyi grangs kyi rim pa dang /_/mtshan gyi bshad pa de yin pas/_/de ltar bsngogs nas blta bar bya/_/
[\[311a.4\]]de ltar na gzhung dam pa'i brjod bya don gyi lus ni de dag nyid yin la/_rjod byed gzhung gi lus ni zhu ba ma rdzogs pa la 'grel par/_'phags pa nye ba 'khor gyis zhus pa'i gzhung rgya gar yul pa yang sha lo ka nyis stong tsam gyi tshad cig la lan spyod pa kho na'o 
[\[311a.5\]]zhes yul kha cig na zhu ba ma rdzogs pa la sha lo ka nyis stong las med pa'ang bshad mod kyi/_bod du 'gyur ba'i zhu ba ma rdzogs pa la sha lo ka sum stong drug brgya ste bam po bcu gnyis dang /_zhu ba rdzogs pa la sha lo ka khri lnga stong dgu brgya ste/_bam po lnga bcu 
[\[311a.6\]]rtsa gsum yod pas spyir bsdoms na sha lo ka khri dgu stong lnga brgya ste/_bam po drug bcu rtsa lnga yod do//_//bsod nams chen po'i dpal gyis phyogs las rnam par rgyal ba stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po dang mtshungs pa rgyal po chen po'i bla'i mchod 
[\[311a.7\]]gnas bde bar gshegs pa'i gzhung lugs mang du thos pa/_rig pa dang grol ba'i spobs pa dge ba can/_lung dang rigs pa'i dbang phyug_/gangs can gyi rgyud kyi mkhas pa chen po/_sdom brtson dam pa shAkya'i dge slong 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis/_bka' 'gyur legs 
[\[311b\]]
[\[311b.1\]]par bzhengs pa rnams las 'di dag ni mkhan po chen po mchims kyis dge ba'i bshes gnyen rgya 'dul ba 'dzin pa zhal bzhugs pa'i dus na/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen 'dul ba 'dzin pa zhing mo che ba byang chub seng ges gnyer mdzad nas/_lung phran tshegs kyi bam 
[\[311b.2\]]po bcu gnyis ma tshang ba dang /_gzhung bla ma'i zhu ba ma rdzogs pa bam po bcu gnyis dang /_sdom tshig yi ge tshar gnyis ma tshang ba rnams bsam yas mchims phu la sogs pa dbus gtsang gi gtsug lag khang rnams nas btsal te/_la stod 'ol rgod kyi gtsug 
[\[311b.3\]]lag khang du gnas brtan d+harmA seng ges lung sde bzhi tshang bar bzhengs pa snar thang gi gtsug lag khang du gdan drangs te/_de la dpe phyi mdzad nas bzhengs pa dang /_gzhan yang chu mig ring mo'i gtsug lag khang dang /_rung klung shod grog gi gtsug lag khang gi 'dul 
[\[311b.4\]]ba lung la sogs pa rnams la gtugs te snga zhus legs par bgyis nas bzhengs pa sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa'i rtsa ba legs par gsungs pa dam pa'i chos 'dul ba lung sde bzhi'o/_/de'i bka' 'gyur gyi dpe phyi rnam par dag pa rnams/_mkhas 
[\[311b.5\]]pa'i 'byung gnas dpal snar thang gi gtsug lag khang nas gdan drangs te/_'phags pa 'jig rten dbang phyug gi sprul pa'i sku chos rgyal srong btsan sgam po'i nang blon chen po mgar stong btsan yul zungs kyi rgyud pa/_gtsug lag gnyis kyi mdzad pas/_
[\[311b.6\]]bstan pa rin po che'i zhabs tog la g.yel ba mi mnga' zhing /_'gro ba mang po'i mgon skyabs dam par gyur pa dpal ldan rgyal ba'i sde yis/_'gro ba ma lus pa'i gnas skabs dang /_mthar thug gi phan bde ma lus pa'i 'byung gnas rgyal 
[\[311b.7\]]ba'i bstan pa rin po che yun ring du gnas shing /_phyogs kun tu dar zhing rgyas par bya ba'i phyir/_bod khams su smon lam gyi stobs can mnga' bdag lha btsan po byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /_lo paN skyes mchog khyad par can rnams kyi bdag 
[\[312a\]]
[\[312a.1\]]rkyen la brten nas/_bde bar gshegs pa'i gsung rab thog mtha' bar du dge zhing sgro skur gyi mtha' dang bral la gzhung lugs ngan pa'i dri mas dben pa mdo sde dang /_rgyud sde'i phyogs snga phyir bod du 'gyur ro cog rnams mi'i dbang po tho gen 
[\[312a.2\]]the mur gyi ring la/_ti shri kun dga' rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po bstan pa skyong ba'i dus/_rgyal ba'i bstan pa lnga brgya bdun pa'i mthar nye ba/_'gro ba'i bla ma ston pa gdul bya'i ngor zhi bar gshegs pa'i tshul bstan nas/_lo sum stong bzhi brgya 
[\[312a.3\]]brgyad bcu 'das pa me mo phag gi lo gsar gyi zla ba tshes grangs gza' skar bzang po la dbu btsugs te/_rgyal ba'i sras po rig pa 'dzin pa byang chub dpal ldan gyis/_bstan pa la shes nas mi phyed pa'i dad pa brtan pos kun nas bslang nas zhal ta'i rim pa rnams dang /_
[\[312a.4\]]rgyu'i dngos po bzang zhing mang la kha na ma tho ba med pas mthun pa'i rkyen bsgrubs nas/_bstan pa'i 'byung gnas dpal na len dra dang mtshungs pa sprul pa'i rgyal po se chen gan gyi dgos kyi lha khang dpal gung thang gi gtsug lag khang chen por legs par bzhengs te/_sde snod kyi 
[\[312a.5\]]tshul la cung zad blo kha phyogs pa thang po che ba'i btsun pa kun dga' 'bum gyis kha ta dang /_zhus dag gi dang dos pa bgyis shing /_gzhan yang dad pa dang brtson 'grus che zhing blo gros gsal ba'i sdom brtson dam pa mang du thos shing sde snod 'dzin pa mkhas pa rnams kyis/_
[\[312a.6\]]rgya gar skad la sogs pa legs par sbyar ba'i skad sor bzhag rnams ni sngon gyi lots+tsha ba chen po rnams kyis mdzad pa'i bye brag tu rtogs byed chen po dang /_sgra sbyor bam po gnyis pa la sogs pa la brten nas dag par byas shing /_bod skad rnams ni yul skad dang /_'phral 
[\[312a.7\]]skad ngan pa rnams dang ma 'dres par bod yul gyi sngon gyi brda mes mkhan po rnams dang /_sgyur byed dam pa snga phyir byon pa rnams kyi brda gsar rnying dang /_skad gsar bcad la sogs pa'i rjes su 'brangs nas da drag dang /_ma mya dang /_sa [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]la sogs pa yod med 
[\[312b\]]
[\[312b.1\]]rnams mkhas pa rnams kyis ji ltar mdzad pa ltar brda don ma nor bar dag par bgyis nas/_gzhi dung gi sa gzhi ltar dkar 'jam mkhregs pa lho rgyal po lha khang gi sho gu la/_dam che zhing mdangs gsal ba ut+pal sngon po lta bu rgya nag chen po las 'ongs pa'i snag 
[\[312b.2\]]tshas/_'bur dkyus tshugs gsum la mkhas pa'i mthar phyin pas yi ge'i rig byed la slob dpon gyi go 'phang thob pas dag snyoms mdzes par bzhengs pa dpon dpal bzang rin chen dang /_sangs rgyas grags la sogs pa dbus gtsang gi yi ge pa yid gzhungs shing 
[\[312b.3\]]mkhas pa rnams kyis legs par bris pa la zhus dag lan gsum du bgyis te bzhengs pa rnams/_sa mo glang gi lo bkra shis lo gsar gyi zla ba la legs par grub cing /_'bras bu dang bsgrub pa'i dus kyi lnga brgya phrag drug dang /_lung mngon pa'i dus kyi 
[\[312b.4\]]bzhi brgya brgyad bcu rtsa gnyis 'das la/_lhag ma mngon pa'i lo bco brgyad dang /_mdo sde/_'dul ba/_rtags tsam 'dzin pa'i lnga brgya phrag gsum ste/_stong lnga brgya bco brgyad bstan pa'i lhag mar yod pa'i dus su bka' 'gyur legs par grub pa 
[\[312b.5\]]rnams las 'di dag ni lung sde bzhi'o/_/'dul ba lung phal che ba la dge slong pha ma'i so sor thar pa dang /_zhu ba ma rdzogs pa bzhengs pa med mod kyi 'on kyang so sor thar pa gnyis rnam 'byed gnyis kyi rtsa ba yin zhing /_rnam 'byed gnyis ni so sor thar pa rnam 
[\[312b.6\]]pa gnyis kyi 'grel pa yin la/_zhu ba ma rdzogs pa ni zhu ba dag shos yin pa'i phyir lung rnam 'byed so so'i dbu dang /_gzhung bla ma ma rdzogs pa dbu nyid du bzhengs so/_/lung sde bzhi'i [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]ni gzhi dang /_rnam par 'byed pa dang /_de dag gi dka' 
[\[312b.7\]]ba'i gnas zhus lan gyis gtan la 'bebs pa gzhung bla ma dang /_de dag tu ma tshang ba kha skong ba phran tshegs so/_/don gyi [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]de ltar yin yang mkhas pa rnams kyis gzhi dang /_rnam par 'byed pa'i rjes la phran tshegs dang /_de'i rjes la gzhung dam pa nyid 
[\[313a\]]
[\[313a.1\]]bris shing /_ka cog la sogs pas mdzad pa'i mtshan byang dkar chag las kyang rim pa de kho na ltar 'byung bas 'dir yang gzhung dam pa mjug nyid du bris so/_/'di rnams kyi bam po'i grangs ni shwo lo ka sum brgya la bam po rer byas nas 
[\[313a.2\]]lung gzhi la bam po brgya dang dgu/_dge slong pha'i rnam 'byed la bam po brgyad bcu rtsa gsum dang bam po sum cha/_dge slong ma'i rnam 'byed la bam po nyi shu rtsa brgyad/_phran tshegs la bam po lnga bcu rtsa dgu/_gzhung bla ma'i zhu ba ma rdzogs pa la bam po bcu 
[\[313a.3\]]gnyis/_zhu ba rdzogs pa'i gzhung dam pa la bam po lnga bcu rtsa gsum ste/_bsdoms na gzhung dam pa la bam po drug bcu rtsa lnga yod pas spyir lung sde bzhi chad pa la bam po sum brgya bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi dang bam po sum cha yod do/_/sngar ma tshang ba rnams 
[\[313a.4\]]tshang bar bzhengs pa'i tshul ni phran tshegs dang /_zhu ba ma rdzogs pa'i mjug dag tu bris zin pa'i phyir de dag tu blta bar bya'o//_//ye d+harmA he tu pra b+ha bA he dun te ShAn+ta thA ga to h+ya ba data/_te ShAny+tsa yo ni ro d+ha 
[\[313a.5\]]e ba~M bA dI ma hA shra ma Na//_//
